content: Shillong 03 Naiwieng:Ki trai jaka na shnong Thieddieng kaba hap ha Mawsynram konstitwensi ki la kynnoh ba ka NEEPCO ka la shu jynrat naphang ia ki bri ki bsah jongki haduh ba ki la lko pom khlem da ioh jingbit satia na ki kum ki trai jaka.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi, ka kong Kwintal Diamai bad ka kong Simarbon Syierlait ki la kynnoh ba ka kompeni NEEPCO kaba pyntrei ia ka Mawphu Hydro Power project ka la shu tih ia ki nala (tunnel) ban pyniaid um kiba dei ha jaka jongki, khlem da ioh jingbit satia na ki haduh ba ki la lko hi pom.Ki la kynnoh ba ka NEEPCO ryngkat ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut bad ki nongpyniaid shnong ki la tih donbor ia katei ka tunnel kaba kum ba 4 phut sawdong ban pyniaid um khlem ka jingtip jong ka kum ka trai jaka.“Ki la shu tih jubor ia ka jaka jong nga khlem da ioh jingbit namar ba ki don ka jingiasngwthuh jingmut bad ki nongpyniaid shnong”, la kynnoh ka kong Simarbon Syierlait haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi.Ka la ong ruh ba bun ki khlaw ki la shah pynjulor lut bad ka la ktah ia ka kamai kajih jong ki kum ki nongrep. “Nga wan hangne ban iathuh ia ki jingeh kiba la wan ban pynduh ia ki jaka puta jong nga ha kyntoit Rangshi khlem ka jingtip jong nga, kim don hok ban wan leh donbor”, ka la kam ka kong Simarbon.Ka la kynnoh ruh ba bun ki jaka kiba la shah leh donbor da kaba pom pathar ia ki dieng ki siej, ki la sdang ruh sa ha kiwei ki jaka bad ka dawa ban pyndap biang ia ka tunnel ba 4 phut kaba la pynjot.Ha kawei ka liang, ka Westaibon Synjoin kaba dei ka nongialam seng longkmie ka la kynnoh ia u MLA ka thain u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem uba la stad ban leit tuklar shabar ka konstitwensi jongki katba ia la kajong ka konstitwensi pat u sngap jar jar wat haba ki paidbah ki iakynduh jingeh.“Shano ki nongmihkhmat ki jah haduh ba la shah pynduh ia ka hok jong ki, ki nongialam shnong kim ju wan mih satia. Ka jingleh la kum ba udei ma u trai jaka ia ka shnong Thieddieng baroh kawei”, ka la ong.Ka la bynrap, “lada ki donkam ia ki jaka ki dei ban wan pan jingbit, ngin iai pyrshah haduh kaba kut”.Ka North East Electric Power Corporation Ltd ka la ioh ia ka jingmynjur na ka sorkar ban tei ia Mawphu Hydro Power Project Stage-II bad ka la pyntrei shaid shaid mynta ia ki kam jongka.
title: Jynrat naphang ka NEEPCO,  kam ki trai jaka na Thieddieng

content: Shillong, 3 Naiwieng:1,202 ngut ki nongshong shnong jong ka Khasi, Jaintia Hills, ki la rai ban weng noh ialade na u aadhar number bad katei ka dei, hadien ka jing pynshlur jong ka Meghalaya Peoples’ Committee on Aadhar (MPCA).Na ka liang jong ka MPCA, ka la tyrwa ban iarap sngewbha ia kito kiba kwah ban weng noh ialade na u aadhar, ha kaba la sdang naduh ka 30tarik Risaw haduh ka 3tarik Naiwieng 2017 ha Shillong bad ha Nongstoin.Ka MPAC, ka ong shuh shuh, ba namar ki dang don bun ngutkiba kwah ban law noh ialade ryngkat bad ka jingkyrpad bala ioh na kylleng ban pynjlan sngi shuh, la ia kut ban dang bteng haduhka sngi thohdieng, 10 tarik U Naiwieng, 2017 ha ki laijaka; kata, ha Shillong ha Office ka KSU Central Body, haNongstoin hapoh ka jingpynbeit ka KSU Nongstoin Circle bad ha Mawkyrwat hapoh ka jingpynbeit ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle, ong ka kyrwoh na U Bah Auguster Jyrwa, Rev. K. Pyrtuh, Rev. Dr. P. B. M. Basaiawmoit.
title: 1,202 ngut, ki la rai ban  weng ia u aadh ar number

content: Shillong, 3 Naiwieng:Ki nongialam ka seng NPP ki la kam ba kin nangbun shuh shuh kiwei pat ki MLA na kiwei ki seng saiñpyrthei ki ban wan ia soh sha katei ka seng bad ym dei satia tang na ka seng Congress, hynrei na kiwei pat ki seng ruh. Ki nongialam katei ka seng ki la ong ba kiba bun kitei ki MLA ki dei na ki konstitwensi nongkyndong. Ki la iathuh ba nalor ki MLA kiba la paw kyrteng ha ki kotkhubor kin dang don shuh sa kiwei pat kiba ka jingiakren ka dang iaid shakhmat bad ki pan por ban ai jubab naba ki dang ia syllok bad ki nongkyrshan jong ki.Ki nongialam NPP ki la pynpaw ka jingduh jingkyrmen lypa ha ki konstitwensi kiba don ha nongbah Shillong hynrei ki la pynpaw pat ka jingsngew skhem ba kin khur jingjop ha ki konstitwensi nongkyndong. U State President ka NPP u Dr.W Kharlukhi, haba ia kren bad ki lad khubor u la ong ba ym don satia kiba pan tiket na katei ka seng ha ki konstitwensi kiba hap hapoh sor Shillong lait noh tang ka North Shillong konstitwensi, hynrei u ngeit ba u kyrtong jong ki, na North Shillong ruh u dei uba la rem lypa.Katei ka seng ka la ong ba kan ia khun ha ki 50 tylli ki konstitwensi na ka 60 bad ka jingbuh thong jong ki ka long ban jop 15 konstitwensi na ri Lum Garo bad 18 na ri Lum Khasi -Jaintia bad katei ka biang pura ia ki ban thaw sorkar ha u 2018. Katkum ka jingiathuh ki nongialam katei ka seng ki la ong ba ha ri Lum Garo ki la don ki nongpan tiket ha baroh ki konstitwensi katba ha ri Lum Khasi -Jaintia ki nongpan tiket ki dei tang ha ki konstitwensi nongkyndong watla don iwei -ar ha sor kiba kim kyrmen poi sha ka thong. U Dr.Kharlukhi u la ong ba ha ki konstitwensi ia knieh tiket, ka NPP kan ai tiket beit tang sha kito ki briew kiba don ka jingkyrmen ban jop.
title: Kam ki nongialam NPP, ban  nangbun ki MLA ban wan ia soh

content: Shillong, 3 Naiwieng:Ki nongialam UDP jong ka Amlarem Circle, haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, ki kam, ba ki la dep phah ia ka shithi jingmynjur jong ka Circle, ba kin ai tiket ia U Ma Lahkmen Rymbai MLA barim jong katei ka Constituency, na ka tiket UDP, ha ka elekshon MLA 2018.Katei ka rai, ka dei kaba la shim, ha ka 27tarik Risaw 2017, da ki nongialam jong ka Circle. La iathuh ba haduh mynta, U Ma Rymbui, uba dei ruh U President jong ka West Jaintia District Congress Committee, u dang pan por na ki nongialam UDP, ha kaba ula buh por, ba un risain shwa na ka seng Congress, ha une u bnai Naiwieng, ha shwa ba un pyn iasoh ialade sha ka seng UDP bad ban shim ia ka tiket jong katei ka seng, na ka bynta ka elekshon 2018.
title: Kam ki nongialam UDP, ia U Ma Lahkmen

content: Shillong, 3 Naiwieng:U bah K.Pohshna u la ong ba la 5 snem mynta ym don skhim satia hapoh Amlarem Block bad ki paidbah ki shem jingeh shibun. U la ong ba ym shym la don kam pynroi satia ha baroh ki tnad sorkar hapoh Amlarem Sub-Division lait noh tang ka bylla 100 sngi ne ka MNREGS.U bah Pohshna u la ong ba ki la don ki skhim kiba la dep mang ia ki shnong bapher bapher hynrei ym tip satia na kaei ka daw la pynduh noh kaba ki lah shuh ban ioh. Ha ka Border Area ruh u la ong ba bun ki shnong kiba don ha ka thup kyrteng ki la shah pynduh. Ka khaïi pateng u la ong ba ka la ktah jur, ym lah shuh ban pyniaid iew ia u mawshun, u dewiong bad kumjuh ia ki mar -rep.Utei u rangbah u la kynnoh ba kine baroh ki jia na ka daw ka jingbym ler ki nongmihkhmat kum u MLA bad MDC ki bym lah ban treikam na ka bynta u paidbah. U la ong ba ym paw satia ha ki khubor ba u MLA ne MDC kin ia tai na bynta katei ka jingeh u paidbah. U la kyrpad ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma ba un plie ia ka iew khappud ha katei ka thaiñ bad ban pyllait noh ia ki challan khaïi mawshun, dewiong kumba u la dep ban aiti ia ki mat jingdawa ha u myntri rangbah.
title: 5 snem ym don skhim ha Amlarem

content: Shillong, 3 Naiwieng:Ki nongialam UDP jong ka Amlarem Circle, haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, ki kam, ba ki la dep phah ia ka shithi jingmynjur jong ka Circle, ba kin ai tiket ia U Ma Lahkmen Rymbai MLA barim jong katei ka Constituency, na ka tiket UDP, ha ka elekshon MLA 2018.Katei ka rai, ka dei kaba la shim, ha ka 27tarik Risaw 2017, da ki nongialam jong ka Circle. La iathuh ba haduh mynta, U Ma Rymbui, uba dei ruh U President jong ka West Jaintia District Congress Committee, u dang pan por na ki nongialam UDP, ha kaba ula buh por, ba un risain shwa na ka seng Congress, ha une u bnai Naiwieng, ha shwa ba un pyn iasoh ialade sha ka seng UDP bad ban shim ia ka tiket jong katei ka seng, na ka bynta ka elekshon 2018.
title: Kam ki nongialam UDP, ia U Ma Lahkmen

content: Nongstoiñ, 3 Naiwieng:Mynta ka sngi, ki nongshong shnong jong ka Mawrok Porsohsat, ki la ia mih paidbah, da ka jingthmu ban leit kyndang naphang ia ki lai tylli ki dukan kyiad, kiba shu mih kynsan, ha Kenkba, kaba don harud ka surok bah Nongtoin.Kitei ki 3 tylli ki dukan kyiad, ki dei kiba la long trai da ka kong Shandaris L Nonglait, B.Thabah bad ka T.S. Wine shop, ha kaba la shu plie sop sop, khlem da ioh jingtip jong ki paitbah ka shnong bad ba shu ialeh sop sop bad U Sordar Shnong.Ha katei ka jingiamih paitbah jong ki nongshong shnong jong ka Mawrok Porsohsat la iadon ryngkat lang ruh ki sengbhalang kiba kynthup ia ka KSU, FKJGP, HYC bad ki nongialam jong ki Seng longkmie bad ha katei ka sngi, ka la don ka jingialang kaba lyngkot ha kaba da kawei ka jingmut ki la shim ia ka rai ba baroh ki trai jong kitei ki wine store kin kit noh ia katei ka kyiad kaba don ha katei ka dukan bad ban lied noh ia katei ka jaka die kyiad.Hynrei kyndit kynsan kynsan ka jingkhluit bad bitar shla jong ki paidbah ka la sdang ban paw bad katba nang slem, ka la jan mih ruh ka jingiaklumar kaba shyrkhei ha kaba kala ima haduh katta katta namar ba ki paitbah ki la thmu ruh wat ban thang noh ia kitei ki wine store, namar ka jingbym wan u Sordar u Bah H.Wahlang ha katei ka jingialang hadien ba la phah khot nyngkong ban pynshai halor katei ka jingai jingmynjur.Shuh shuh hapdeng jong katei ka jingiaklumar la wan poi ruh u Dy Superintendent jong ka tnad Excise u Bah R.C. Lyngdoh u ba la pyrshang ban tem ia u paidbah ha kaba na ka liang jong ki paitbah ruh ki la iasngap shipor bad u bah Lyngdoh u la pynsngewthuh ruh ia ki paidbah ba kim dei ban thaw kino kino ki jingklumar, namar kitei ki trai jong kitei ki dukan kyiad (wine store) ki buh ia kitei ki dukan ruh ka dei namar ba ki la ioh ia ka jingmynjur na ka shnong bad lada ki kwah ban pynduh noh ruh ki hap ban leh da ka lynti kaba dei.Kham hadien katto katne por la wan hiar sa ki pulit ryngkat ka kong B Ranee, Magistrate bad ha katei ka por hi u sordar katei ka shnong u bah H.Wahlang u la wan mih namar ka jingphah khot na ka liang ka tnad Excise bad mar kumta la risa ki paitbah ryngkat ka jingthapkti arsap ia u sordar shnong bad ha katei ka jingiaklumar u sordar um shym la ioh ban kren wat shikyntien ruh namar ki paitbah ki la bitar bad mar ia kren ma u ki paitbah ki la pynphai ktien kylla, wat ki ktien ktien sang ruh ki la mih lut.Kumta ha katei ka por ka Kong Ranee, kaba dei ka Magistrate, ka la ialeh ban tem ia ki paitbah kiba don ha katei ka jaka ha kaba ka la kyrpad ia ki ba kim dei ban thaw ki jingklumar namar wat uwei ruh um don uba bah khlieh, lada mih ka jingia umsnam ha kaba ka la kyrpad ruh ban ailad ia ki nongtrei jong kitei ki winestore ba kin kit noh ia ki mar jong ki; hynrei hapdeng jong katei ka jingkren da ka jingpynshit jongno re jongno la mih biang ka jingklumar ha kaba ki paitbah ki la thmu ban ktah kti ia u sordar jong katei ka shnong, hynrei namar ka jinglah jong ki katto katne ki riew rangbah la lah ban tem noh ia katei ka jingjia.Ha katei ka jing iakhih paidbah, la ai por tang 2 lane 3 sngi, ba kitei ki wine store kin lied noh ia kitei ki dukan bad na ka liang jong ka Kong Ranee, ka la kular ruh ban phah pulit ha katei ka jaka ban ap miet khnang ba kan nym don kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih.Na ka liang jong ki nongthohkhubor ki la ioh lad ruh ban iakren bad u sordar katei ka shnong u Bah H.Wahlang ha kaba na ka liang jong u ula iathuh ba ia katei ka rai ban ai jingmynjur, ia kitei ki wine store la dep ban ai naduh ka snem 2014 da ka rai jong ka dorbar ha ryngkat kumba 100 ngut eiei ki nong wan dorbar, hynrei kaba sngew lyngngoh ka long ba na kano ka daw kitei ki paitbah ki don biang ban pyrshah ia kaei kaba ki la rai lang.Haba kylli pat na u Secretary jong ka shnong Mawrok Porsohsat u bah K.Iawphniaw u la iathuh ba katei ka rai ka la don naduh ka snem 2014 ban shah tang kawei ka wine store, ym lai tylli kumba la lap mynta.
title: Mih paidbah ki nong shongshnong Mawroh Porsohsat

content: Shillong, 4 Naiwieng:Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC), ka la rai ban bat naphang ia ki trok nabar jylla ban ym shah ba kin pynhap dewbilat hapoh kane ka jylla kiba khlem ioh ia ka trading license bad ia ka special permit namar ba ka la ktah jur ia ka kamai kajih jong ki trok ki trai jylla na ka jingioh laitlan jongki ban wan kamai sahuh ha kane ka jylla. Ki la buh por ba ki bor ba dei peit kin jubab happoh ka 10 tarik bad lada kim jubab, kin sa shong jingialang ha ka 9 tarik ban shim ia ka rai da kumwei pat halor kane ka kam.Ban pynkhlain ia kane, la thaw ruh ia ka JAC Indigenous People Economic Rights ba kynthup ia ka Meghalaya Commercial Vehicles Union (MCVU), HYC, KSU Jaintia Hills, JSU,AJSU bad kiwei ki seng.U nongaibuit ka JAC u Bah Peter J Lawai, haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor, u la ong ba ka jingialang jong ka JAC kaba long dang shen ha Jaintia Hills, ka la shim ia kane ka rai hadien ba ki district council bad ka tnad Transport ka sorkar jylla kim shym la leh eiei ban tehlakam ia ka jingwan leh kam khaii ki briew nabar ka jylla, khlem ioh trading license, labour license bad ka work permit haduh ba ka la ktah jur ia ka pliang ja ki trai jaka.“Katkum ka motor vehicle Act 1982, ki kali ba ioh national permit kim lah ban wan kamai ha ka jylla ban kit mar na kawei ka jaka sha kawei pat lait tang na kawei ka jylla sha kawei ka jylla lada kim ioh ia ka special permit, ka trading license”, la ong u Bah Peter.U la ong ba kaba lyngngoh ba kumno ki district council kiba don ha kane ka jylla kim lah ban leh ia kane bad ka paw ba ka jingdon jongki, kam don jingmyntoi eiei ia ki trai jaka.U la ong ba ka jingioh laitlan ki trok nabar jylla ban wan kit dewbilat na ki kompeni ba don ha lum Jaintia hills, ka la ktah jur ia ka kamai kajih jong ki trai jylla bad kaba kham sngew phylla ka long ba kumno ki district council bad ka sorkar jylla kam leh eiei halor kane.Katkum ka jingong jongu, ki don da ki hajar ki trok ki trai muluk kiba shu shong khlem kam khlem jam shuh naduh ba la khang tih dewiong ha ka jylla bad ka lad jongki, ka dei sa tang ban kit dewbilat hynrei ha kane ka lynti ruh ki iakynduh jingeh namar ka jingleh mon ki kompeni shna dewbilat kiba oh da ka dor lajong khlem burom ia ka dor ba la buh ka sorkar kaba long T.12 shi ton.U la ong ba kine ki kompeni kila shu khein da ka dor lajong da kaba ai daw katkum ka dor iew dor hat.U la ong ba ka jingai laitlan ka sorkar ia ki kali ban wan kamai sha kane ka jylla naduh kiba kit briew shangkai kam la shym la ai jingmyntoi eiei ia ki trai jylla bad u la ong ba dei ban leh kum ha jylla Sikkim ha kaba ki kali ba wan nabar kin hap ban iengha kawei ka jaka ba buh ka sorkar bad kin shim pat da ki kali trai jaka ban leit buh sha kylleng ki jaka ia ki nongwan rkai pyrthei.Katba u chairman ka JAC u Bah Handle Mukhim u la ong ba lada ki bor ba dei peit kim jubab hapoh ka 10 tarik, kin sa shong jingialang biang ha ka 9 tarik ban shim ia ka rai kumno ban leh ha kaba iadei bad kane ka kam.U la ong ba ka JAC ka ai jingmut ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban buh noh da ka inter state maxi cab terminus khnang ban khang lad ia ki kalai kamai nabar jylla ba wan shane ban iaid sahuh bad kane kan ai kam ia ki samla khlem jam ha ka jylla ba kin kit pat ia ki briew kiba kwah ban leit kai kylleng ki jaka ha kane ka jylla namar ba kumba ka long mynta, la shu ai laitlan ia ki kali ba wan nabar.U Bah Handle u la ong ba naduh ba na ka jingkhang dewiong ka NGT, ki la iakynduh jingeh ha ka kamai kajih namar ba ki trok ki la duh kamai lut. Mynshwa ki la khein 14 spah shi ton ka bai kit dewbilat, hynrei naduh ba khang dewiong, ki pynhiar sha ka T. 7-8 spah shi ton bad kane ka la ktah jur ia ki trok kamai khamtam ka jingai laitlan ka sorkar ia ki kali nabar ban wan kamai sahuh ha kane ka jylla.U Bah Handle u la ong ba haba ki wan ki kali kiba dei nabar jylla, ki donkam ban ioh ia ka regional permit, ka special permit ban rung sha jylla hynrei ha kane ka jylla, ka sorkar ka shu ai laitlan beit khlem kano kano ka jingbuh kyndon katba ki kali ba leit na kane ka jylla shabar jylla ki iakynduh shibun ki jingeh.
title: Yn bat naphang ka JAC ia ki  trok nabar, ba kamai ha jylla

content: Shillong, 05 Naiwieng:U myntri ka tnad jngohkai ka sorkar India u Alphons Joseph Kannan-thanam un wan sha kane ka jylla naduh ka 9 tarik ban leit iashim bynta ha ka shad Wangala jong ki Garo kaban long ha ka 10 tarik.Haba iakren bad u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh u president ka BJP, u Alphons un wan ha ka 9 tarik bad ha kane yn iakynduh ia ki nongialam BJP, ki nongtrei party jong ka Garo Hills shi bynta ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon bad ha ka sngi ba bud, yn leit ban iashim bynta ha ka shad Wangala.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Shibun un nym wan sha Shillong namar ba u dang bun kam bad un sa wan ha kawei ka sngi pat. Ha kawei ka liang, u Bah Shibun u la ong ba u President ka BJP u Amit Shah un wan hadien ba la kut ka MLA elekshon ha Gujarat sha kane ka jylla.U la ong ruh ba ha ka jingshisha ka la don ka jingiapynbeit bad ki katto katne ki MLA kiba kwan ban iasoh bad ka BJP ha ka jingiakynduh ha Delhi bad u Amit Shah hynrei ka jingrung jongki, ka lah ban kham pynslem khyndiat namar ba ka don ka elekshon ha Gujarat.“Ka jingthmu jong ki MLA ban rung sha ka party kan long hadien katto katne bad ym slem shuh namar ba ki dang don kiba ki kam ban hap ap”, la ong u Bah Shibun.Katkum ka jingong jongu, ka jingslem jong ki MLA ban rung sha ka BJP ka dei namar ba ki dang don kiba ap ban pynlait lut ia ka MLA skhim namar ba mynta ka dang bun ka pisa ka MLA skhim kaba dang sah ban pynlait.
title: Yn wan shad Wangala u Alphons

content: Shillong, 5 Naiwieng:Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) Mawsynram Border Area ka la takraiñ tyngeh ia u MLA ka Mawsynram u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem, namar ka jingjot rathai ka surok kiba hap ban iaid lynti sha ki shnong kiba don ha khappud ha Mawsynram konstitwensi. Haba kren sha ki lad khubor u Chairman katei ka JAC u bah Kyllang Thongni u la ong napdeng ki mat treikam kiba u bah Pynshngaiñ u la khlei ha ki kular elekshon jong u ym pat don tang kawei ruh kaba u lah ban pyndep. U la ong ba na ki mat treikam ba u buh hakhmat eh ka dei ka surok , ki umbam umdih, hynrei kam poi shano shano ruh, “Tang kawei ka mat treikam ruh um lah ban pyndep, yn jia aiu ia ki shnong ki thaw lada jai lei bym don sa ka skhim 100 sngi ka MNREGA” ong u bah Kyllang.U la ong ba kata ktah eh dei ka ‘Non Co-operation Movement’ ba u MLA jong ki u pynbna pyrshah ïa ka sorkar jylla bad katei ka la buh ia ka Mawsynram konstitwensi ha ka jingeh kaba khraw ha kaba la sahkut lut ki kam pynroi baroh. U la kynnoh ruh ba u MLA um ju poi shuh sha konstitwensi la 5 snem mynta, “Imat um tip ia ka jingeh ki paidbah ba um ju poi konstitwensi la 5 snem mynta” u la ong. U la iathuh ba ka surok kaba sniew jubor mynta ka dei naduh rum Trongpleng ter ter shaduh Lad Bakli . Katei ka surok ka la pynlong ïa ka kynhun ki sengbhalang na ka thaiñ khappud Mawsynram kumjuh ki riew paidbah ban tylli lang kawei ban pynsngew ïa katei ka sur sha ka sorkar ba kan tuklar noh mardor shwa ba katei ka thaiñ kan shah dkhat jubor ha ka leit ka wan.
title: Takraiñ ka JAC ia u bah Pynshngaiñ,  ba jot ka surok Mawsynram

content: Shillong, 5 Naiwieng:Ka HNLC, mynta ka sngi, ka ai burom halor ka rai jong ka High Court jong ka Meghalaya, halor ka bamsap tah sia lieh, ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthung nonghikai bad ka seng, ka kynnoh shuh shuh, ba ki la don shibun ki jingtohkit lane ki komishon, halor ka jingsiat briew pathar, ba kynthup ia U Fullmoon dhar, ka jingsiat briew ha Mookhep, ka jingpyniap ia U Ajaju, Political Secretery jong ka ANVC bad kitei ki jingtohkit, ki dei tang kum ki tyngshop jong U Mukul Sangma Ka HNLC, ka ong shuh, ba ka bamsap sia lieh jong ki nonghikai, ka dei ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, kaba dei kaba ha khmat duh bad kumta, ka dei ban shong phatok shi jingim bad ka HNLC, ka ong shuh shuh “Kum ka myntri sorkar, kaba shah budnam, kan shakri ia ki paidbah”.Ka HNLC, ka pynkynmaw ba ka la thwet kham mynshwa ia U bah HS Shylla, hynrei, u donbok, ba ula lait im bad ka ong biang katei ka seng, ba ki don ki riew sain pyrthei, kiba shet ia ka jaitbynriew bad ki don mynta ha ka jingap tha jong ka HNLC. “Ngi dang sngap jar mynta, namar ba ngin dang pynkhreh ia ki kyrteng jong kito ki riew shet kylla”.Ka HNLC, ka byrngem ruh, ba u Mukul Sangma, u dei uba ka seng, ka thwet bha bad ka kren shai, ba lada u rem elekshon ha ka 2018, kan pynsuk shibun ia katei ka seng, ba kan thwet tyngeh ia u bad ka HNLC, ka ong ba utei u dei u briew, uba ju tyrwa ban iakren iasuk, hynrei, u dei pat ruh, uwei na kiba shet kylla.
title: Ka kong Ampareen, ka dei ban  shong phatok, ong ka HNLC

content: Shillong,5 Naiwieng:U Senior Working President jong ka seng UDP u bah Bindo M Lanong, u la thalaiñ ia ka seng Congress bad ka sorkar ba katei ka seng ka ialam ha kaba u la ong ba ka dei ka sorkar ka bym lah ban ai jingiada ia u paidbah kane ka jylla. “Tih dewiong ruh ym long, tih mawshun ym long, khat shyiap ruh ym long, pom dieng ruh ym long lait noh tik tak tang ban shna synduk iap briew kata ruh hap ioh jingbit, ka sorkar aiu kum kane?” ong u bah Bindo.U bah Bindo u la ong ba kine baroh ki jia namar ka jingtlot ka sorkar haduh ba ka kashari kaba long kum u Linesman ha madan ialehkai phutbol, ka la mih sha madan ban ialehkai phutbol lang. “Ka dei ka sorkar kaba tlot bad ka sorkar kaba biej, ka mut pynkhyllem dieng ia kito ba lah kyllon, ka kashari ka on gem u Mukul ruh u sngap noh, ka kashari kaba hap ban shu kaweh lama kum u Lines man ruh ka la mih ban ia lehkai lang ha madan” ong u bah Bindo. Haba kren sha ki paidbah ka Umroi konstitwensi ha ka jingialang ha Bhoirymbong u bah Bindo u la ong “U MLA jong phi ruh u ia don bynta lang bad kane ka sorkar, nga lah kren ha kiba bun jaka ha ri Bhoi ba u MLA jong phi te dei uba triem shisha, un ym triem kumno haba shonging ruh ha Dwar u Ksuid te, ym don ba nud ban shong ing ha Dwar u Ksuid ute u shong, nangta ki kam baroh nga iohsngew ba u khur lut marwei” ong biang u bah Bindo haba ialap pyrshah ia u MLA ka Umroi u bah Ngaitlang Dhar.U bah Bindo u la ong ba kat shaba phai mynta ki paidbah ki la shah lehbeiñ ha ka sorkar, “Ym don jingiada shuh ha ka rep ka riang ruh, ym don jingiada ia kiba treikam business ruh, ia ki nonghikai ruh tabaiñ da ka sia lieh, u Mukul ruh u don bynta lang bad kato ka Minister kynthei ka Ampareen, nongtrei sorkar ruh u ong ym shah shuh ban long Rangbah Shnong, Secretary Shnong,bat kam ha ki kam Sports ruh ym long shuh, u kham triem shuh shuh une ban ia u Ngaitlang ruh” bteng biang u bah Bindo.Dei na katei ka daw u bah Bindo u la ong ba wat ki MLA Congress ruh kim sngew neh shan ban don ha katei ka seng bad kim treh shuh ban ia khun na katei ka seng ha u 2018, “Rowell, Prestone kiba shong ha dwar u ksuid, na Nartiang kim treh shuh, nangta I longkmie nangtei na Iewduh na Motphran ruh im treh shuh, u RC Laloo na jowai ruh um treh shuh, ym don ba treh shuh hynrei nga lyngngoh ba u khun u President barim jong ngi u dang leit sha katei ka seng kaba ki trai seng ruh ki phet lut” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la bteng biang da kaba ong, “Dang katno mynta u bah E.K Mawlong u la khlad hynrei ki khun ki la klet ia la u kpa ki leit rung sha ka seng kaba ki shyrkhei ruh ki la phet, nga la kren ia u George nga la ong ia u peit kum ka burom ia u kpa jong phi lada phi don jingmut ban ia khun elekshon wan, ngi la tyrwa ia u kum ka burom ia u kpa hynrei um treh mynta pat ngi iohsngew ba u leit sha kata ka seng ba ki trai seng ruh ki phet iap lut” ong u bah Bindo. U la ong ba mynta ka la dei ka por ia ki paidbah ban ailad ia ka UDP bad ki seng riewlum ban synshar ym shuh ban ailad ia kiba na ri Lum Garo ban iai synshar shi synshar, “Ngi don ka Team kaba khlaiñ, ngi long kum ka Team phutbol ngi tip ia ki jingdonkam jong phi kiab phi ruh phin ym tip nai ia kren ia kata ka riang ka riang ka pule puthi hynrei ailad ha ngi, ngi tip bha ia kaba phi phi donkam eh, ngi lah ban leh ia kata tang lada ngi wan ha ka bor synshar, ka la dei ka por ban synshar ma ngi ym shuh na Garo Hills” u la ong.
title: U MLA ba shong ha dwar u ksuid,  ka sorkar tabaiñ sia lieh: Bindo

content: Shillong, 05 Naiwieng:Ka People’s Democratic Front (PDF) kam pat don kyrtong satia na Mawphlang watla ka la dep thaw ia ka tnat jongka.U samla Auspicious Lyngdoh uba dei u General Secretary ka PDF Central Executive Committee bad uba dei ruh u nongshong shnong ka Mawphlang u la pynpaw ba u kyrtong na ka Mawphlang Constituency u dei ban long u briew uba don ia ka jingkit khlieh na ka bynta ka bha ka miat bad uba bud ryntih ia ki riti treikam ka Party.Haba kren halor ki jingeh kiba kum ki nongshong shnong ka Constituency ki mad, u samla Auspicious u la ban jur ba ka PDF ka mih halor ka nongrim ban ioh ia ka jingiatrei lang bad ki kynhun nongrep, nongbylla sngi bad kiwei kiwei pat kiba ka sorkar kam shym la phai khmat ban pyntrei kam ban kyntiew ia ki da ki rukom treikam kiba biang kum ha kiwei pat ha ka jylla.U samla Auspicious uba la kren shibun kiei kiei kiba ka sorkar kam shym la pyntrei ha ka jylla naduh ki rukom treikam ban kyntiew ia ki nongrep, ki nongbylla sngi, ki nong niah kali kamai bad kdew ruh ba haduh 39,000 ngut ki samla kiba don jingkhein ki ïaid khlem kam khlem jam bad ka sorkar kam shym la pyntrei kam ia ki lad kumno ban iarap ia ki samla la ha ka liang ki kam ialehkai bad kiwei kiwei.Kiwei pat kiba la ai jingkren ha kane ka jingialang ban thaw ia ka Zonal Committee ha Mawphlang ha ka 4 tarik u Naiwieng ki kynthup ia u Bah Hamlet Dohling bad u Bah Judah Wahlang kiba long ki kyrtong ka PDF na Mylliem bad Sohiong Constituency. Ha kane ka sngi la pynskhem ruh ia ki nongkitkam ka Zonal Committee ha ki ar tylli ki bynta kata jong ki rangbah bad ki samla da u Bah Ivanlumlang Marbaniang uba dei u President ha ka jingiadon lang u Bah AL Nonglait uba dei u Finance Secretary, u Bah Dipshon Ryntathiang lem bad kiwei kiwei. La pynskhem Ia u samla Auspicious Lyngdoh kum u President, u Bah Chester Myrthong kum u Working President, u Bah Marpherstar Babai kum u General Secretary lem bad kiwei kiwei katba ha ka liang jong ki samla pat la pynskhem ia u samla Sainbok Kharsahnoh kum u President, u samla Franky Thabah kum u Working President, u samla Pynkhrawbor Lyngdoh kum u General Secretary lem bad kiwei kiwei pat ki dkhot.
title: Ym pat ioh kyrtong ka PDF na Mawphlang

content: Nongstoiñ, 5 Naiwieng:Ki nongrep tang mar iapoi u bnai Naiwieng ki ju don ia ka mynsiew kaba kmen bad ka dur khmat kaba phuh samrkhie namar ba ka la dei ka por ba kin kheit noh ia u soh ia kaba ki la bet bad trei shitom baroh shisnem.Hynrei ha kaba kum katei ka por kyndit kynsan kynsan ha ka jingbym poi pyrkhat ki nongrep, ki la hap ban jaw ia ki ummat kiba kthang namar ka jingwan kynsan kynsan u phria ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka West Khasi Hills District, u bala pynjulor lut khait ia ki jingthung jingtep khamtam ia u kba.Katkum ka tyllong khubor bala ioh lum da u nongthoh khubor la ong ba mynta ka janmiet ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje nohsngi ei ei, u phria u ba jur bad u ba heh u la wan ban ther kynsan kynsan ha ki katto katne tylli ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka West Khasi Hills District, bad ki shnong kiba shah ktah ki kynthup ia ka shnong Mawkhan Pambeh, ka Mawlai Syiem, Langlew, Marngor bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong kiba marjan ha katei ka thain.Shuh shuh ka tyllong khubor ka iathuh ruh ba ka shnong kaba la jur bah ka jingshah ktah kadei ka Mawkhan Pambeh kaba don ha ka thain Marngor bad la ong ruh ba u phria u ba heh u la ther tyngeh naduh ka thain Ramtangi ka lynti ban leit sha Marngor ter ter haduh ba ki kba ki la lwet lut plain bad la ong ruh ba don ki nongrep kiba la dep ban ot bad ki dang buh thad ha pynthor bad haba leit ban peit hadien katei ka jingjia kila lap ba ym shym la don eiei shuh bad sah satang ki jyntang kba suda.
title: Ther kynsan u phria sha  Nongstoiñ, julor ki mar rep

content: Shillong, 5 Naiwieng:“Ngam shym la weng satia ia ka jing ia tainia bad U Lotha, ai un buh tarik bad ka jaka, haei ba ngin iatai” ong U U Rajaul Karim Laskar, uba dei u pyrman, ba peit ia ki rit paid jong ka seng Congress.U Laskar, ula iathuh, ba ula mynjur ruh ia ka por kaba 2 sngi kynthih, lane kaba 48 kynta ka jing iatainia, kumba la kwah da U Lotha, uba dei U General Secretery jong ka BJP, uba peit ia ki Scheduled Tribe, tangba ula kren shai, ba un nym mynjur ban ialam ia U Mukul Sangma, myntri rangbah ban iatai bad U Lotha, ha ka sngi kaba lai jong ka jing ia tainia jong kitei ki masi kyrtong jong ki ar tylli ki seng heh.Namar ba kitei ki ar ngut, ki la kren kob tyngeh ha ki kotkhubor, na bynta ka jing ia tainia, kumta ki paidbah jong ka Ri Khasi Jaintia, ki kwah ban tip, la ka jingiakob ka dang don, ne ka la shu kut, tangba ia byrngem ha ki kotkhubor, kumta U Laskar, u kren shai, ba na ka liang jongu, un nym kynran dien satia bad ia mynta u ap, sa tang ia ka jubab na U Lotha. “Ngan nym kynran dien satia” ong U Laskar bad u ong ruh, ba kum U Secretery ba peit ia ki rit paid, u kwah shibun ban kren ia ka bha ka miat bad kiei ki mat, kiba ka Congress, ka don na bynta jong ki jaitbynriew rit paid, tangba u kwah ban kren shai, ba ka jing ia tainia pat kam dei kaba don ka jingbuh kyndon.Lah ban pynkynmaw, ba ka jing ia kob ia tainia, ka sdang shwa, na U HB Lotha, uba kwah ban ia tainia bad U Mukul Sangma, myntri rangbah ka Jylla, ha ka jingkynnoh, ba kane ka sorkar U Mukul, ka dei kaba bam sap tam bad ka dei halor katei ka jingkynnoh, ba ula mih paw sa U Laskar, ha kaba ula kob ban mih bujli ha ka jing iatainia, ha ka jaka jong U Mukul Sangma bad U Laskar, u tyrwa ia ka jing ia tainia, kaba shiphew kynta, katba U Lotha, u kwah da kaba 48 kynta.Dei ban pynbeit ki lad pathai khubor ban iatainia u heh BJP bad CongressU President ka BJP u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh, u la ong ba ka jingiakop tainia u Hayithung Bill Lotha u nongialam ka BJP ba peit ia ki Scheduled Tribe/ Scheduled Caste bad u nongialam ka Congress ba peit ia ki rit paid u Rejaul Karim Laskar, ka shu long tang ha ka jingiakop ha kot khubor bad na ka liang jongu, um pat ioh kano kano ka jingthoh ban pynthikna ia kane. Haba kren mynta ka sngi, u Bah Shibun u la ong ba lada ka long ban iatainia shisha, la dei ban pynbeit ki lad pathai khubor kum ki riew pdeng ym ban pyniaid mano mano pat.“Ngam ioh jingtip eiei halor kane hynrei la shu iohi ha lad pathai khubor. Hynrei lada ki kwah ban iatainia shisha, la dei ba pynbeit da ki lad pathai khubor ban khot lang ia ki baroh ar ngut”, la ong u Bah Shibun.U president ka BJP u la ong ba ka jingiakop tainia kam dab ha than hynrei ka donkam ban iapyni ia ka thong hynrei kumba kila iakop baroh ar ngut, ka shong ha ki ban iatainia.U Lotha ha ka jingwan jongu sha Shillong dang shen, u la kop iatainia ia u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u Dr Mukul Sangma halor ki kam bym ler ka sorkar Congress ha kane ka jylla bad ki kam bamsap ba shyerkhei.Hynrei na ka liang u Laskar u la kwah ban mih ha jaka u Dr Mukul ban iatainia bad une u heh ka BJP da kaba u la kop ban iatainai haduh ar sngi ruh kampher.U Rupang, ula iakren bad U Lotha, halor katei ka jing ia tainia, hynrei, ula buh noh ia ka mobile jongu bad la shu sngew kumba u ong “Ngan sa kren hadien” bad haba la phah da ka mesej ruh, hynrei, um shym la jubab satia.
title: Ngam shym la weng satia,  ia ka jingiatainia bad U Lotha

content: Nongpoh, 06 Risaw:Hadien ba la ioh jingtip halor ka jingdon jong ki katto katne tylli ki dukan kiba ju mlien ban die beain ia ka kyiad ha Nongph, mynta ka sngi ki pulit ka Nongpoh Police Station, ki la pynlong ia ka jingleit khynra ba kynsan kynsan ha ki katto katne ki jaka ha Nongpoh bad ha kane ka jingleit khynra, ki la ioh ruh ban kurup shibun ka kyiad kaba kynthup ia ka kyiad Khasi bad kyiad phareng.Ki pulit ka Nongpoh PS, hadien ba ki la ioh ban kurup ia katei ka kyiad, ki la theh lut sha madan.Ki pulit ki la maham ruh ia kito ki briew kiba ju mlien ban die beain ia ka kyiad ba kim dei ban lehshuh, namar ki pulit nangne shakhmat kin dang iai pynlong ia kaba kum katei ka jingkhynra kaba kyndit kyndit.
title: Khynra kynsan ki pulit ka Nongpoh,  kurup kyiad da ki spah liter

content: Shillong, 6 Naiwieng:U bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem MDC ka Soh-ryngkham konstitwensi un pyniasoh ialade sha ka seng NPP ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka jingialang bah ka ban long ha Sohryngkham ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai. La ioh jingtip ba nalor u bah Pyniaid kin don ruh sa kiwei pat ki MDC jong ka KHADC ki ban wan ia soh sha katei ka seng ha kaba la ong ba u bah Ricky Shullai u la wan kynduh mynta ka sngi bad ki nongialam ka NPP ban pan tiket ban ia khun na katei ka seng ha ka elekshon MLA 2018. Kiwei pat ki MDC ki ban sa ia soh sha katei ka seng ki long u bah Jansing Tynsong, bah Victor Rani bad kiwei pat.
title: 11 tarik yn rung NPP u bah Pyniaid

content: Shillong, 29 Risaw:U pyrman jong ka seng Congress, U Rejaul Karim Laskar, myn hynnin ka sngi, ula kob ia U HB Lotha National Secretery ka BJP, ban pynlong ka jing iakob ia tainia, kaba shiphew kynta, ha ka nongbah Shillong, lane ha kano kano ka jaka, hapoh Meghalaya.U Laskar, u ong, ba kam don jingmut ban ia tainia pyrshah bad u myntri rangbah ka Jylla bad ula ong shuh shuh “U Lotha, u dei ban pynbeit ban ia tainia bad nga halor ki mat treikam jong ka BJP bad ka Congress, halor ka roi ka par jong ki rit paid ha Meghalaya, khnang ba ki paidbah kin rai, sha kaei ka seng, ba kin ai jingkyrshan, ha ka jingiadei bad ka bha ka miat jong ki rit paid ha ka Jylla”.U Laskar, u ong shuh shuh ba naduh ba ka sorkar jong U Modi, u don ha ka bor, ki don bun ki jaka jong ki rit paid, kiba la die lilam. Ula ong shuh shuh, ba ka Congress, ka la thaw ia ka ain, kaba dei na ka bynta ban iada ia ki jaka puta jong ki rit paid ha u snem 2006, lyngba kata ka ain kaba ki ai kyrteng Scheduled Tribes and Other Traditional Forest Dwellers (Recognition of Forest Rights) Act, 2006, hynrei ka sorkar U Modi, ka la die lut ia ki jaka puta jong ki rit paid jong ka ri India, lyngba ka ain jong ka, kaba la ai kyrteng Compensatory Afforestation Fund Management and Planning Authority (CAMPA). Ula ong shuh shuh ba kane ka sorkar, ka la khang ia ka jingkhaii masi, kaba la ktah shibun ia ka bam ka dih jong ki rit paid.U Laskar, ula kynnoh ruh halor ka jingshah thombor jong ki Kristan, ha kaba u ong ba lada jer ia kitei ki jingjia baroh, yn nym dap shuh ban thoh ha kano kano ka kot.U Laskar, u ong ba ka por ba U Lotha, u kwah ban iatainia, ka long san kynta, hynrei, na ka liang U Laskar, ka long ar shah, ia ka por jong U Laskar, lane kaba long shiphew kynta, na kaba la tyrwa da U Lotha, ban iatainia pyrshah ia U Mukul Sangma
title: To ngin iakob ia tainia shiphew kynta syndon

content: Shillong, 29 Risaw:Ka Seng Sain pyrthei ba dang shu mih thymmai, ka lah ban nang duh shuh ia ki nongialam jongka, khamtam ki MDC shwa ban poi ka elekshon MLA mynta u snem.Tang hadien ar taiew eiei ba la la ioh ia ka shap mombati, kane ka seng ka la duh pynban saw ngut ki MDC kynthup u Bah HS Shylla, u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem, u Bah Jansing Tynsong bad u Bah Victor Ranee kiba lah ban iasoh noh bad ka NPP, bad ia kane la pynsngew da u Bah HS Shylla, haba kren dang shen bad ki nongthoh khubor ha ka por ba u la wan rung sha ka NPP.Hynrei katkum ka khubor, kane ka seng thymmai ka lah ban nang duh shuh shuh ia ki MDC jongka, namar ba dang don kiba lah ban mih noh ban leit iasoh sha kiwei ki party ba khlain kum ka UDP, NPP, bad kiwei.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum, la iathuh ba ki don sa kumba ar ne lai ngut eiei ki MDC kiba long ruh ki Executive Member (EM) ha ka Executive Committee ba la khlieh da u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem kum u CEM, kiban sa mih noh ban iakhun na kiwei ki party. Tangba haduh la iathuh ba kin sa pynpaw pyrthei ha kine ki sngi la kumno kumno ha u Naiwieng.Baroh ki khmih lynti ba u Bah Pynshngain un shimti ia kane ka seng thymmai, ha shwa ban wan ka elekshon hynrei haduh mynta kane ka jingthmu kam pat urlong satia watla u la pynbna teng ha ki lad pathai khubor ba un risain ia ka kam MLA ha u Naiur ba la dep.
title: “Shwa ka elekshon” yn dang don  shuh ki MDC ban mih na ka PDF

content: Jowai, 29 Risaw:Ka jingtih lane sei dewiong bad shallan dewiong ha East Jaintia Hills bad shallan ia u dewiong sha Assam ka dang bteng haduh mynta wat hapdeng ka jingkhang jong ka Iing Bishar ba don burom ka Green Court jong ka National Green Tribunal.Ia kane ka jingtih deiwong be-ain la pyntikna da uwei u heh pulit ka East Jaintia Hills. Haba iakren bad une u nongthoh khubor u la iathuh ba ki bun kam haduh katta katta ban hiar jurip ia ki par dewiong ha ka district.“Ki dang don bun kiba trei be-ain bad ngi kum ki pulit hangne ha East Jaintia Hills ngi ia kynduh jingeh shi katdei eh ban teh lakam namar ka jingduna briew”, u la iathuh.Ki pulit ka West Jaintia Hills pat, ki la ioh bat hynnin ka meit ar tylli ki trok kit dewiong kiba la tap moh tarpal bad lyntang bha ban lait na ka jinglap ki pulit hynrei da ka jingtrei shitom ki pulit ka Phramer ki la ioh bat ia kitei ki trok.Kitei ki trok kidei kiba long trai da u Kalip Suchiang na Mootyrshiah kaba don ia u No. AS01GC- 4173 bad u Pawan Kumar Mishra kaba don ia u No. AS01FC-1741 katba u dewiong baroh ar trok la dei trai da u Kalip Suchiang.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ki pulit ka East Jaintia Hills kila buh iaka khyrdop kaba 24 kynta ha Shohshrieh – ha u pud hadpeng ka East bad West Jaintia Hills bad ki pulit ka West Jaintia Hills pat ha Phramer Traffic Cell. Ki pulit ka West Jaintia Hills bad ki pulit ka Ribhoi man ka por ki ioh bat da bun tylli ki trok kit dewiong be-ain bad kaba lynngoh pat ba ki pulit ka EJH kim shym la burom ia ka rai jong ka NGT ha kaba kim ju lap satia ia ka jingkit dewiong be-ain.
title: Bteng ka jing tih bad shallan dewiong  tuh na East Jaiñtia sha Assam

content: Shillong, 30 Risaw:Ki shnong ka thain East Jaintia Hills District ki la byrngem ban ujor noh sha ka Consumer Court pyrshah ia ka kompeni samding ka sorkar jylla ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) halor ka jingbym lah ban pynbiang ia ka bording.Kine ki shnong kynthup ka Umstain, Tongseng, Sonapyrdi, Lum Myrli, Chymplong, Kuliang, Pyrtakuna, Umkiang, Lymphyllut, Lum Soski, Dona umbluh, dona skul, Ratecherra , Dona Bhoi hapoh ka Narpuh Elaka Dalloiship ki la aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u Deputy commissioner ha kane ka sngi Nyngkong pyrshah ia ka jingbym lah ka MeECL ban ai ding ia ki shnong ha ka rukom kaba dei.U Bah Kynjaimon Amse u la ong ba ki shnong ki la dawa ba u DC u dei ban shim khia, ia ka jingbym lah ka MeECL ban pynbiang ia ka jingsam ding sha kine ki shnong bad lada kam leh, kim banse ban kiew sha ka kashari Consumer Court ba kan tuklar ia ka jingshah iehbein ki paidbah.U la ong ba katba ka ding ym ju thikna hynrei ka jingwan lum bill man u bnai pat ka thikna thik thik bad kin banse ban leit sha ka Consumer Protection Act 1986 ban dawa ia ka hok jong ki paidbah.Kine ki shnong kim ju ioh ding thikna la bun snem mynta bad don ki sngi ba shu ioh tuk tak bad don ki bym ju ioh ding. Nalor ka jingshim bill kaba thik thik khlem ioh ding, ki briew jong ka MeECL ki shu shna bill khlem wan peit satia ia ki meter.“Ki shu pyniadei ia ka jingkhein bill na ophis khlem wan peit satia ia ki meter” la ong une u rangbah.Ki la dawa ba nalor ban pynbiang ding, ka MeECL ka dei ban thung ia ki nongshna sha katei ka thain khamtam ha Umkiang ban peit ia ki jingeh jong ki paidbah.
title: Byrngem ki shnong ka East Jaintia Hills ia ka MeECL

content: Shillong, 30 Risaw:U MLA ka Songsak u Nihim D Shira u la ong ba wat u myntri rangbah duh ka ri U Narendra Modi ruh lada u wan ia khun na konstitwensi jong u, un pynrem beit bad u ong ba ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla lei kaba suk eh, “Wat lada u Modi un wan ia khun pyrshah na konstitwensi jong nga ruh, nga kob shisha ba ngan pynrem kput ia u sa ia u Dr.Mukul lei ngam kheiñ briew” ong u Nihim D Shira haba ia kren bad u Rupang lyngba ka telephone.Haba kylli kumno ka jingiakhun jong u pyrshah ia u Dr.Mukul mynta ka kynti la u sngew tieng ne-em, “Nga lah ong ia phi wat ia u Modi ruh ngam tieng u Mukul lei un long aiu, ha ha ha” rkhie u Nihim. U Nihim u la iathuh ba kumba ka long mynta u Dr.Mukul u la wan thaid shi thaid sh akonstitwensi jong u ban sam skhim naduh ki symbai dieng Agra bad kiwei, “Hynrei nga ong ia phi theh katba theh seh, ki briew hangne kim biej u briew lajong te u briew lajong-Mande” u la ong ha ka ktien Garo. U Nihim u la ong ba ki don mynta kumba 4 ngut eiei ki kyrtong ba ia khun pyrshah ia u hynrei u ong ba ki paidbah ki tip bha iano ban jied.“Hangne ngan ia thuh nga ia phi ka pher bha, ki paidbah kim biej ia ki skhim kiba phi wanrah kynsan puk hynrei ki tip bha nga dei uei, na kata ka daw nga kob ba watla wan sa uei uei ruh kan logn lehnohei, kin ym jop satia, synei ia u Dr.Mukul” u la ong. “Mynta lei ba ki paidbah ki tip bha ba ka NPP kan wan ha ka bor synshar, ki kwah ban pynjop don burom ia nga, ha Khasi-Jaintia hills ngi la tikna ba ngin tam, na Garo hills lei ngin khur jem” u la ong. La kylli hato u Dr.Mukul u ban ia khun na ar tylli ki konstitwensi u long kumno ha konstitwensi lajong ha Ampati, “Nga shu ioh sngew ba u kyrtong ka BJP un leh bha, lada ka long kumta kumba nga iohsngew ngi ka NPP ruh ngin ailad ba un ia khun para marwei ban pynrem ia u Mukul” ong u Nihim.
title: Ngan pynrem ia u Modi ruh lada u  wan ia khun, sa ia u Mukul: Nihim

content: Shillong, 24 Risaw:U MLA ka South Shillong u Bah Sanbor Shullai, u la shah kynnoh ba u la pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa haduh T. 2.52 klur ha kine ki saw snem ba la dep na ka MLA skhim (Special Urban Welfare Programme) bad ia kane la pynpaw da u Bah Banri Kupar Wahlang hadien ba u la wad jingtip da ka ain wad jingtip paidbah.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, u Bah Banri u la sei ia ki kot ki sla katkum ka jingtip, la kynnoh ba u MLA u la pyndonkam bakla ia kane ka skhim na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi shimet jongu.U Bah Banri u la ong ba u MLA u la thied tiar jingbam kum ki pliang, ki siang haduh 13,000 tylli ha ka dor T. 500 kawei bad ka jingkut baroh ka long T.50.50 lak bad la pyni ba kiba ioh jingmyntoi ki long tang 851 ngut, bad ki dang jah haduh 12250 ki pliang ki siang. “Shaei kine ki jah, ne ka dei tang ka jingpynheh jubor ia ka dor ha ka rusit”, la buh jingkylli u Bah Banri.Shuh shuh u la ong ba u MLA u la thied ia ki shuki 1780 tylli ha ka dor T. 566 kawei bad baroh ka long T. 3.56 lak, hynrei la pynmih khubor ha u bnai Risaw mynta u snem ba sam 10 hajar bad shaei ki jah kiwei pat naduh Rymphang mynta u snem khlem pat sam lut namar ba katkum ka kyndon dei ban pyndep tang hapoh 30 sngi.La pyni ruh ba ha 2014, la thied 5000tylli ki pla jri pynsyaid ha ka jinglut baroh T. 12.50 lak, hynrei kane kam don jingthoh shaei bad hangno la ai bad kane ka la buh ha ka umdum ia ka jingpyndonkam ia ka pisa.Ha 2014-15, la thied kopi 45 hajar ha ka jingmang T. 17. 55 lak bad ki don 1412 longiing kiba ioh 12 tylli ki kopi kawei ka longing kaba long tang 17,000 kopi bad ki dang jah sa 29,000 kopi ki bym pat sam, la ong u Bah Banri.Kumjuh ha u 2014, la thied kopi shuh 45 hajar tylli ha ka dor T. 19.80 lak bad ha u 2016 u thied biang 15 hajar kopi ha ka jinglut T. 6 lak hynrei ym don kyrteng kiba ioh.U Bah Banri u la ong ruh ba u MLA u la thied laptop 100 (ASUS) tylli ha ka dor T. 25 hajar kawei kaba dei tang T. 19 hajar kawei bad la pynlut T. 25 lak. Ia kine la thied na uwei u briew ba kyrteng u K Lynrah na Sohra bad ka jingkylli balei ym thied na Shillong kaba kham jan.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ha u 2017, la thied LED (blub) haduh T. 8 lak ban sam sha ia ki kynhun niam ba pynlong tamasa hynrei haduh mynta ym pat don ba ioh satia tang uwei ruh une u blub.La pyni ruh ba u MLA u la thied sopti uniphom 100 song tylli ha jinglut T. 3 lak bad 400 tylli ki khusnam ha ka jinglut T. 8 lak hynrei khlem ai jingkhein ia kiba ioh ia kane.Kawei pat ka jingpyndohkam bakla ia ka MLA skhim ka dei ka jingshna ia ka kynroh ha madan Laban ha kaba la mang T. 40 lak kaba jrong 25 phut bad lynter 30 phut bad ia ki jingdonkam baroh la suplai da u K Lynrah na Sohra. Ha kane ka jingshna la pynlut ban thied mawthup 142 trok, dewbilat 856 byrni, shyiap 62 trok bad nar rod 99 kwintal.“Baroh ka jingpyndonkam bakla ia ka MLA skhim ka la kot sha ka T. 2.52 klur bad kaba ishan khmat ka long ba la thied tiar beit na uwei u briew u K Lynrah baroh, uba dei na Sohra. Kata ruh la shu ai da ka pisa nokot da ki lak kaba ka sorkar India ka la mana ba dei ban ai da ka cheque”, la ong u Bah Banri.Halor kane, u la dawa ba dei ban thung jingtohkit halor kane, ban pynngat ia ka jingkitkhlieh ia kiba donkti, ban wad ia ka jinglong shisha u K Lynrah na Sohra, bad ban pynngat ha ka ain ia kiba donkti.
title: T.500 kawei ka pliang, jah 12,250  tylli ki pliang U Bah Sanbor

content: Shillong, 24 Risaw:U Pastor Kyrsoi Pyrtuh uwei na ki nongialam jong ka Meghalaya People’s Committee on Aadhaar u la kob ban ia tai nia bad u MP ka Shillong u bah Vincent Pala halor u Aadhaar nombar. U Pastor Pyrtuh u la ong ba u bah Pala u la kren sha ki kotkhubor ba ka jingpynrung kyrteng ia ki paidbah na ka bynta u Aadhaar nombar kam dei kaba bakla ha kaba u la pynksan ia la ka nia da kaba ong ba la ju leh sha kiwei ki jaka bad sha kiwei ki ri ruh. U la ong ba u bah Pala u la ong ruh ba u Aadhaar nombar u long kum u Social Security Number ha ka ri Amerika.“Nga kloi ban ia tai nia bad u MP ka Shillong halor katei ka kynthoh jong u ha kaba ia dei bad u Aadhaar, u pyniadei ia u Aadhaar bad u Social Security Number ka Amerika, hynrei nga ong Em ka ia pher shibun bah” ong u Pastor Pyrtuh. U Pastor u la ruh ba ha u Social Security Number ki paidbah kim donkam ban ai ia ka biometric information jong ki, hynrei ha u Aadhaar hap leh Bionetric, hap ring dur ia ki shympriahkti bad hap ring dur ruh ia ki pyllew mat.U la ong ba ha Amerika ki la pyrshang ban leh ia katei ka Biometric hynrei ki paidbah ki pyrshah la sangeh noh, hadien katei u la ong ba la pyrshang ban pyntreikam da ka Biometric Enrollment and Locally Stored Information hynrei ym shym la lah satia namar ka jingpyrshah ki riew ngeit Kristan. Kumta u la ong ba dei ha ka por ba long President u Roosevelt ba la pyntreikam ia u Social Security number namarba ka don ka jingkhyllem ha ka ioh ka kot ka Amerika bad ka jingpyntreikam ka long beit ba ki jingiarap ba ka sorkar ka ai sha u paidbah ki dei ban poi beit sha ki hynrei kam don eiei pat ka ban ktah ia ka jinglong shimet kumba long u Aadhaar.Haba kren shaphang ka jingma jong u Aadhaar u Pastor Pyrtuh u la ong ba kaba nyngkong eh ka dei ba ia ka jingim jong u briew la tehlakam tang da kaba pyndonkam ia u 12 tylli u nombar jong ki. “Lada ki KSU ki ia khih, ki phet ioh shah kem, kin shu switch off beit ia u Aadhaar nombar kumba switch off phone tang katta phin ym ioh leit jingleit , phin ym ioh sei pisa. Lada phi don jingthud bad u BDO ha Block un shu ong beit itei shi itei un shu switch off beit tang katta ka shnong baroh kawei ka la duh ia ki jingmyntoi” ong u Pastor Pyrtuh.Shuh shuh u la ong ba dang shen ka RBI ka la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna ba lada ym don Aadhaar haduh u nohprah mynta u snem yn pynngat ia ki paidbah ha ka Money Laundering Act kaba mut ba ki dei ki nongpyniaid lane kiba bat ia ki pisa tuh, “Hato lada ngim don Aadhaar, yn pynshitom ia ngi ban ong ba ngi pyniaid ia ka pisa tuh kaba ngi trei shitom” u la ong. “Ha Meghalaya ki don kumba 70 ne 75 na ka 100 kiba pule Bible, ki ngeit ba u Aadhaar u dei u mrad khlaw katkum ka Kitab Jingpynpaw, ngi hap burom ia ka jingngeit bad ka jingshem mynsiem jong ki, hato nga don hok aiu ma nga ban tuklar ia ka jingngeit jong kiwei?” u la ong biang.Utei u Pastor u la ong ba wat ha ka rai bishar jong ki nongbishar ka Supreme Court kaba don haduh 527 sla ruh , ki nongbishar ki la sot ia ka jingthoh na ka Bible ka ka shithi kaba nyngkong sha ki Thesoloni ka lynnong kaba 4 bad ka dkhot kaba 16 kaba ki la kdew ia ka jingngeit ki Kristan kaba ki nongbishar ki la ong ba u Aadhaar u ktah ia ka hok ha ka jingim shimet jong ki briew ( Right To Privacy). “Ki nongialap ha ki spah snem mynshuwa ki ia thuh lypa ba kan poi ka por ba lada ym don ia ka shap jong uta u mrad khlaw yn duh ka bam ka dih, imat u la dei une u Aadhar kumba jia ha Jharkhand, hato lada nga ngeit ia kata phin ong ba nga dei uba ngeit biej” ong u Pastor Pyrtuh da kava pynkut ba ka hok ha ka jingim shimet ka dei ka waitlam kaba khlaiñ mynta ha ka jingiakhun ha Supreme Court na bynta u Aadhaar.
title: Kob U Pastor Pyrtuh ban ia tai nia  bad U MP, halor u Aadhaar nombar

content: Shillong, 24 Risaw:Kawei ka longkmie na ka shnong Mawroh kaba don ha ki thaiñ Markasa ka la shah tait shnong, ka la shah weng na ka balang Presbyterian tang na ka daw ba kam treh ban shon dur aadhaar. Ka la shah pynduh ruh ia ka skul shimet jong ka, namarba kam treh shon Aadhaar ialade bad ia ki khynnah skul ruh. Katei ka longkmie ka dei kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka kong Phrim Sohshang.Ka kong Phrim ka la phla ia katei ka jingshem lanot jong ka mynta ka sngi ha ka jingialang pynshai Aadhaar kaba la long ha Khasi National Dorbar Hall, Mawkhar-Shillong. Ka la ong ba kam treh ban shon Aadhaar bad kam treh pynrung kyrteng ha ka NPR kumta ka la shah tait shnong, “Ki tymmen basan ki la wan ha nga ba kim lah ban pynsah hapoh ka balang namar ba ka balang ruh ka hap hapoh ka jingpeit ka shnong bad ka shnong hapoh ka sorkar” ka la ong.Katei ka longkmie ka la ong ba ka daw ba kam treh ban shon Aadhaar ka dei namar ba ka la mih ka sur kren na u Jisu ha ka ba um sngewbha satia ia utei u aadhaar nombar, “Ngam treh Biometric, ngam treh NPR, ngam treh Aadhaar , u dei u mrad khlaw” ka la ong.Ka la iathuh ba ka ophis kaba dei peit ia ki skul ka la phah ktien sha ka ba kan wan mih sha ophis jong ki, “Ki la phah wan ia nga sha Mairang, ki kylli nga iathuh ha u Sahep ba ki long ki jingshisha ba ngam treh bad uta u sahep u la ong ba ia ka skul jong nga hap khang noh ha u nohprah hynrei mynta la shimti pat ban pyniaid da kiwei” ong katei ka longkmie.
title: Shah tait shnong, shah weng Balang  ka longkmie Bym Shon Aadhaar

content: Shillong, 25 Risaw:U general secretary ka BJP ba peit ia ki Scheduled tribe bad scheduled caste u Hayithung Bill Lotha u la kynnoh ba u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Dr Mukul Sangma u dei uwei uba bamsap tam ha India.“U Dr Mukul u dei riew bamsap ba shyrkhei tam ha India. Nga shaiong ngain ban lap ba ki surok ha konstitwensi jongu, ki dap sa tang ki thliew ki syar suda wat ha ka jingshisha u la rah lut khoit ia ka pisa ka sorkar sha ka konstitwensi lajong”, ong U Lotha, haba kren mynta ka sngi sha ki nongthoh khubor ha Shillong.U la ong ba ki surok ha Ampati konstitwensi ki long kum ki pung dohkha bad kane ka la pyni shai ba ki kam bamsap jongu, ka long kaba shyrkhei bha. “Bun ki surok ha Ampati ki long kum ki pung dohkha, wat ki briew ki lah ban leit khwai dohka ha surok”, u la ong.Haba ther ia ka jingthaw ia ki district ha u snem 2013, u la ong u Dr Mukul u la thaw ia ki district, ki sub-division ha ka jylla hynrei kaba sngew thamula ka long ba kine ki shu long tang ka met kaba khongreng khlem don eiei lait tang ka jingdon u DC, SDO marwei khlem kam khlem jam.“Ki district ba la thaw ha 2013, ki shu shong khongreng khlem treikam eiei bad la shu buh tang ia u DC bad SDO khlem don eiei”, la ong u Lotha.U la kynnoh ba u Dr Mukul u dei u nongpynbna paidbah uba triem bha ban pynbna ia ki prokram ka sorkar bapher bapher hynrei ki bym myntoi eiei ia ki paidbah lait tang ban shu pynbiej kai namar ba la jan ka elekshon.“U Dr Mukul u dei u nongpynbna paidbah ia ki skhim ba triem bha ha India tang ban pynbiej paidbah ba la jan ka elekshon bad kine ki paw ha kaba ka Medical college kiba u la pynbna bun snem, khlem iohi dak eiei haduh mynta”, la kynnoh u Lotha.U la kynnoh ba kane ka sorkar jylla ka la pyndonkam bakla da ka spah klur na ka skhim PMGSY ban shna surok sha nongkyndong.“Ka surok PMGSY na Mawlangsu, Rambrai, Nonglang-Khanduli, Kyrshai kiba shong dor da ka 100 klur la shu pyndonkam bakla bad ki surok pat sop tang ka khyndew pump um suda”, la kam u Lotha.Ha kawei ka liang, u Lotha u la ong ba ka jingkren jong u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh ba ka BJP kan pynduh noh ia ka bhah, lada kan wan ha ka bor, ka dei tang ka jingkren ba shu jler bad shu thok, namar ba ka sorkar BJP hapoh ka jingialam u Narendra Modi ka la shim khia bha ban kyntiew ia ki schedule tribe bad schedule caste bad kan nym pynduh satia ia ka bhah thungkam jongki.
title: U Mukul, u riew bamsap ba  shyrkhei ha India, ong u heh BJP

content: Nongstoiñ, 25 Risaw:Ha kawei ka jingjia ka bym lah ban mutdur kaba la jia ha ka shnong Kynshi Mawria, kawei ka khynnah samla kaba dang 16 snem, ka la shah leh beijot ha la u kpa u jong ka u ba la tip kyrteng kum u Dobelsing L. Nonglait 40 snem.Katkum ka tyllong khubor ba la ioh mynta ka sngi, la iathuh ba katei ka jingjia, ka la jia naduh u snem 2014, hynrei katei ka khynnah, kam shym la nud ban iathuh ia katei ka jingshem pap ka jongka hano hano ruh, namar ba u tei u kpa jong ka u la byrngem byrsit ia ka ba ka tang shu iathuh un pyniap bad da ka jingtieng katei ka samla ka la shu sngap haduh ba u tei u kpa u la leh ia katei ka kam pap kam sang haduh mynta u snem 2017.Hynrei dei tad haduh ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai kumno re kumno katei ka samla ka la phla ia katei ka jingshem pap ka jong ka ha kiba ha iing ha sem ha kaba katei ka khun ka la iathuh bniah ia kaba la jia baroh bad hadien katei na ka liang kiba ha iing jong katei ka samla mynta ka sngi, kila leit ban ujor da ka ehajar pyrshah ia u tei u kpa ha Mairang Police Station.Na ka liang jong ki pulit ruh mar ia ioh ia katei ka jingujor kila leit ban kem noh ia utei u briew u ba dei u kpa jong katei ka samla bad kila register ruh ia ka mukotduma katkum ki kyndon case No.41(10)17 U/S 506 IPC R/W Section 5(l)(n)/6 POCSO Act, bad ia utei u briew na ka liang jong ki pulit kila phah sha ka kashari.
title: 3snem kynthih bat tnga jubor  u kpa ia ka khun khie samla

content: Jowai, 25 Risaw:U ma Modonbai Rymbai, uba ju tip kum u ma MB Rymbai MDC na Khliehtyrshi uba la ju long ruh kum u CEM ka JHADC ha u snem 2013-14 u la weng noh ia lade na ka seng Congress mynhynnin ka sngi.Ia ka shithi iehnohkam, u ma MB Rymbai u la aiti ha u President jong ka Jowai Block Congress Committee ka Jowai Block, u ma Awhoi Andrew Shulla uba dei ruh u CEM ka JHADC.Ka jingmih noh u ma Rymbai naka seng Congress ka long ka jingduh kaba khraw ia ka seng Congress, la ong ka tyllong khubor.“Ka Shnong Khliehtyrshi naduh u ma KS Rymbai, MDC barim haduh u pyrsa jong u, u ma MB Rymbai kadei ka shnong ba khlain bha jong ka seng Congress”, la ong u wei na ki nongkyrshan ka seng Congress na ka shnong Jowai.Ka tyllong khubor ka la iathuh ruh ba u ma Rymbai u lah ban kyrshan ia u kyrtong ka NPP, u ma Wailad Shylla u kyrtong na Jowai Constituency u ban ia khun pyrshah ia u Dr. RC Laloo ha kane ka Election ka ban sa long ha u 2018.Haba iakren bad u ma Rymbai, u la ong ba ka jingmih noh na ka Congress kam don kano kano ka daw, hynrei kadei tang na ka daw shimet jong u.
title: Mih U CEM barim ka  JHADC na ka seng Congress

content: Shillong, 25 Risaw:Ka jingkhang dewiong ka National Green Tribunal (NGT) ha ka jylla, ka dei kawei ka mat kaba kongsan bha kaba u general secretary ka AICC ba peit ia ka Meghalaya u Dr CP Joshi u la iakren bad ki nongialam ka Congress bad ki nongtrei ha ka jingialang kaba long mynta ha ophis ka MPCC , Shillong.U Joshi haba kren sha ki nongthoh hadien ba la wan ka jingialang, u la ong ba “Ka jingkhang tih dewiong ka NGT, ka dei kawei ka mat kaba hakhmat eh ba ki nongtrei ki la iakren bad pan jingshai na u”.Katkum u Joshi, ka jingbteng ka jingkhang dewiong ha kane ka jylla, ka dei namar ba ka sorkar BJP kam shim khia ban pynbeit ia kane ka kam watla ka don ha ka bor ha Delhi.Haba jubab balei u tei pop ia ka BJP haba hangne ka dei ka sorkar Congress, u Joshi u la ong, “Lada ka BJP ka kynnoh ba ka Congress kam leh eiei, ka leh aiu pat ha kine ki lai snem haba ka don ha ka bor ha Delhi”.U la ong ba ka jingkynnoh kam dei ia ka sorkar jylla, namar ba ka la leh ia ka kamram ba ka dei ban leh hynrei ka dei ka sorkar BJP ha Delhi ka bym leh eiei ia kane ka kam haduh ba ka la wanrah jingeh ia ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya.“Ka sorkar BJP khamtam u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi u la kular tang ha lyer khlem ki kam tang ban pynbiej ia ki paidbah”, la kynnoh u Joshi.Ha kajuh ka por, u la ong ba khlem artatien, ka Congress ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya kan sa thaw biang ia ka sorkar hadien ka elekshon MLA ban wan.“Ngi la ioh ia ka jingai jingmut na ki nongtrei ka party na ki tnad bapher bapher ha ka jylla, bad hadien ka elekshon ngin sa jop biang ban thaw ia ka sorkar”, u la kam u Joshi.U la ther ruh ia kito ki MLA kiba phet seng da kaba kynnoh, ba ki dei kiba ju mlien ban leh ia kane ka kam ha kine ki ar snem haba ki dang don ha ka sorkar bad ka jingmih jongki, kam nym ktah eiei ia ka party namar ba ka don bun kiwei pat ki nongialam kiba biang.
title: Ka jingkhang dewiong, iakren  u Joshi bad ki nongtrei Congress

content: Shillong, 25 Risaw:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la kop ba un pynliem lyndang khoit ia kito ki MLA ka Congress kiba phet seng ha kane ka elekshon ban wan ha ka jylla.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli hadien ba la wai ka jingialang bad ki nongtrei ka party, ba la don lang u General Secretary ba peit ia ka Meghalaya u Dr CP Joshi mynta ka sngi, u Dr Mukul u la ong, “Kiei kito ki briew (MLA Congress), kiba thmu phet seng, ngim dei ka party kaba kyrduh briew ngi don kiwei kiba bit bha ban mih bujli ha jaka jongki”.U la ong biang, “Ngi la tip ia ki kam jongki bad ngin pynliem ia ki baroh ha kane ka elekshon ban wan”.Kumba ka paw mynta, ki don san ngut ki MLA ka Congress kiban phet noh na kam party kynthup u Bah Rowell Lyngdoh (Mawkyrwat), bah Prestone Tynsong (Pynursla), Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar (Nartiang), Bah Ngaitlang Dhar (Umroi), kiba lah ban phet sha ka NPP bad u MLA ka Mawsynram u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem uba shah sospen ha ka party lai snem uba lah ban phet sha ka PDF.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka seng Congress kam dei ba shu shaniah tang ha ki MLA hynrei la don bun ki khep ha kaba kam ju ai tiket ia ki MLA ba dang jop ruh, namar ba ka don ki briew ba biang ban mih bujli bad ka jingmih noh jong ki katto katne kam don eiei ban ktah ia ka party.“Ka la don ka por ba ka party kam ju ai tiket ia ki MLA ba dang jop ruh, kam da donkam ia ka party ban leh kumta, ka don bun ki briew kiba kham bit”,u la ong.Haba ther shuh shuh ia kine ki MLA thmu phet seng, u la ong ba ka don kawei ka daw ia ki ba ki phet na ka party bad kata ka dei ka jingmut khwan myntoi ialade.“Balei ki mih na ka party, ka don kawei ka daw bad kata ka long namar ba ki don ka jingmut khwan myntoi shimet ialade”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ka party ka la tip bad ka nang kumno ban mih sha madan thma ban iakhun kum ia kine ki jait briew bad kan pynthikna ba kin liem ha kane ka elekshon.
title: Ngin pynliem lyndang lut ia  kiba phet seng, kob u Dr Mukul

content: Shillong, 25 Risaw:Lashai ka sngi, kan don ka jingialang bah kaba la lum da u Dr.P.W Khongjee MLA barim ka Sohra ha madan Maraikaphon, Sohra ha ka por 12 baje shiteng sngi. Ha katei ka jingialang kin wan 2 ngut ki heh BJP na Delhi u Alphons Kannanthanam bad u Nalin Kohli bad kin kren ruh ha katei ka jingialang paidbah. Haba ia kren bad u Vice President jong ka BJP ha Meghalaya u bah J.A Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka ophis jong ka BJP ka la ioh jingtip ia kane bad la ai jingtip ba baroh ki nongialam na kane ka jylla Meghalaya, ki dei ban hiar sha Sohra ban ia don bynta lang ha katei ka jingialang. U bah Lyngdoh u la ong ba la pynbeit ruh ia ka kali ha ophis kaba ki heh BJP na Shillong kin hiar sha Sohra lashai ka sngi.Haba ia kren pat bad u President ka BJP East Khasi Hills u bah Babul Suting u la ong ba um don jingtip eiei bad ym shym la pyntip satia ia u, “Ngim ioh jingtip eiei ba ka Party ka pynlong jingialang lashai ka sngi ha Sohra” u la ong. Haba la kylli la un leit ne-em sha katei ka jingialang u la ong “Kumno ngin leit haba ym don ba khot ym don ba pyntip”. U bah Suting u la ong ruh ba um don jingtip la u Dr.Khongjee u dei ne-em u dkhot ka BJP bad u la ong ba ha u ym don satia ia ki kot ki sla ban pyni ia ka jinglong dkhot u Dr.Khongjee ha ka BJP.La ia kren ruh bad u General Secretary ka BJP na Sohra Mandal u bah Rothel Khongsit, utei u la ong ba ka Party BJP ha Sohra Mandal kam don jingtip eiei shaphang ka jingialang ha Sohra. La kylli hato la khot ne-em ia ki BJP ha Sohra ban wan sha katei ka jingialang, u la ong ba ym shym la pyntip bad ym shym la khot satia. “U Dr.Khongjee u phone ia nga bad u khot sha katei ka jingialang, Uei uta u Dr.Khongjee ngim tip, u Dr.Khongjee um dei satia u dkhot jong ka BJP kumno ngin leit sha kata ka jingialang jong u briew u bym dei na ka Party, ioh ngi shah pynshitom pynban ha ka Party” u la ong.U bah Rothel u la ong ba baroh ki dkhot jong ka BJP na Sohra Mandal kin ym leit satia sha katei ka jingialang bad la pyntip sha baroh ki dkhot ba kim dei ban leit.
title: Mynta yn hiar ki heh BJP sha  ka jingialang U Dr.Khongjee

content: Shillong, 26 Risaw:Ka seng Meghalaya People United Front ka pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur, halor ka jingsniew bad jot palat u surok hapoh ka shnong jowai khamtam ha ki artylli ki bynta ki ba long ha pdeng eh jong ka sor jowai, kawei ka dei ka jaka ka ba don mar syndah bad ka iing dak bad kawei ka dei ka jaka ka ban leit sha ophis U Superintendent of police (SP) bad sha inspection Banglow (IB) jong ka sorkar.Ka seng, ka ong ba lada phai pat sa sha u national highway NH44, la iohi ba ki kali ki shem jynjar ban leit khamtam ha ki bynta shuwa ban poi ha ka jaka thew kali ha hynniew mer, kaba long tang sa khyndiat eh ia ka company G&R infrastructure project ltd ban pyndep, hynrei ka shimpor da ki snem bad ka seng, ka kren artatien ia ki bynta ba shakhmat kiba sha umkiang kumta ter ter, ia ka jingtrei jong katei ka kompeni.
title: Sniew surok palat ha sor  Jowai, ong ka MPUF

content: Shillong, 26 Risaw:U MLA ka South Shillong u Bah Sanbor Shullai u la takrain kylla ia kito kiba thad ba u pyndonkam bakla ia ka MLA kumba ki kam na ka ain wad jingtip, da kaba kynnoh ba u Bah Banri Kupar Wahlang u dei u nongialam jong ka seng “Political RTI Contractual Agency”.Haba pynshai halor kane mynta ka sngi, u Bah Sanbor u la ong, ” Ka jingsam tiar kum ki khiew ki pliang bad kiwei ki jingdonkam ki dei kiba kongsan bha bad baroh 31,000 ngut ki nongthep vote ka South Shillong ki kmen bha”, bad u la bynrap, “Ngam lei lei lada saw ne san ngut ki briew kim hun namar ba ki dei kiba sngew bishni’.Dang shen, u Bah Banri Kupar Wahlang u la kynnoh ba u MLA ka South Shillong u la pyndonkam bakla ia ka MLA kaba kot sha ka T.2.52 klur ha kine ki saw snem ba u long MLA.U bah Sanbor u la ong ba la thied ia kine ki tiar ban pynnoh jingiarap ia ki briew kiba duk ba rangli jong ka konstitwensi bad kam don satia ka jingpyndonkam bakla.“U Bah Wahlang u dei uba shah kyntait ha ki paidbah ha ka elekshon bad namar ba um don kam ban leh, u la thaw ia ka Political RTI Contractual Agency lem bad ki katto katne ngut ki dkhot, kiba dei kiba haiing hasem jongu hi”, la kynnoh sa u bah Sanbor.U la ong ba ar ngut ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun jong u Bah Wahlang kynthup D Passah bad V Marbaniang kim dei ki nongkyrshan jongu, hynrei kiba haiing jongki, ki dei ki nongioh bynta na ka MLA skhim.U la ong ba ka jingkynnoh ba pyndonkam bakla ia ka MLA skhim, ka dei beit tang ka kam politik kumba ju leh ia u ha u snem 2013, shwa ka elekshon ban pynbiej ia ki paidbah.Halor ka jingkynnoh ba shim suplai na u nongdie na Sohra, u Bah Sanbor u la ong ba kam don kano kano ka kyndon kaba ong ban thied tiar tang na Shillong bad ban kynnoh ba pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa tang ba la thied na Sohra kam don jingmut eiei.“Lada u nongdie u dei na Sohra lane na Tura, ne na Nongstoin, kam don eiei ka jingpher bad ban ong ba dei na Sohra la pyndonkam bakla ia ka MLA skhim ka dei kaba bakla bad ka bym nongrim”, u la ong.U la kyntu ia u bah Wahlang ban pule bha ia ki kyndon ka MLA skhim shwa ban thad madan ban pynpaw biej ialade kum u khynnah.
title: Kmen ki 31 hajar ba sam  pliang, ong u Bah Sanbor

content: Shillong, 26 Risaw:U ophisar ba shu sieh IAS uba shong thait mon sngewbha noh u Bah Himalaya Muktan Shangpliang, u la rung sha ka Congress mynta ka sngi bad ia u, la pdiang burom da u Working president ka MPCC u bah James Lyngdoh ha ka jingialang kaba la wan sakhi lang ki dkhot Congress na thain Mawsynram kaba la pyndap smam ia ka ophis ka MPCC.Haba ther ia u MLA ka Mawsynram, U bah Shangpliang, ula ong “Ha kine ki shiphew snem (jinglong MLA u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem) ka Mawsynram ka shu tyrkhong beit, ym ju iohi wat tang ia ka MLA skhim ruh”, la ong u Bah Himalaya haba kren ha kane ka jingialang pdiang burom ia u.U la bynrap biang, “Ha kine ki shiphew snem, ka Mawsynram ka dei kaba duk tam napdeng baroh ki konstitwensi ha ka jylla bad kane ka la ktah jur ia nga”.U Bah Himalaya u la ioh ia ka jingpynskhem na ka sorkar ban shongthait ha kane ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai, hadien ba u la pan da ka VRS ban iakhun elekshon noh na Mawsynram ha kane ka ban wan.U la iathuh ba wat la u dang don sa hynriew snem ha ka kam sokar, hynrei ka daw ka jingrung jongu sha ka politik ka dei namar ba u kwah ban shakri ia ki paidbah.“Kaei ka politik, ka politik ka mut ban shakri ia ki paidbah, ym ban shakri ia ka pisa”, la ong u Bah Himalaya.U la ong ruh ba kum u ophisar sorkar la laiphew snem, u la trei bun kynta ban pyndep ia ki kam hynrei lada un long nongmihkhmat un aiti kham palat. “Lada nga trei 10 kynta ia ka kam sorkar, ngan trei 14 kynta lada long u nongmihkhmat na ka bynta u paidbah”, u la ong.U la iaroh ia u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma uba la tbit ban synshar ha ka jylla, namar ba hapoh ka jingialam jongu, ka jylla ka shongsuk shongsain bad bun ki kam pynroi ki mared sted.“Ngi donkam ia u nongialam kum u Dr Mukul Sangma bad kum u Dr DD Lapang uba long kum u nonghikai jong nga”, la ong u Bah Himalaya.Ha ka jingshisha ia u Bah Himalaya la dei ban pdiang burom da u Bah Lapang, hynrei namar ba um don ka met kaba koit ba khiah, u la hap ban pep noh bad la aiti ban leh da u Bah James Lyngdoh.Haba phla ba u la don ka jingsngew ieid ia ka party Congress naduh dang khynnah, u Bah Himalaya u la ong, “Naduh dang khynnah nga ju ieid ia ka Congress namar ba ka don ki nongialam kiba tbit bad ka don ha ka met bad ka mynsiem jongu”.Da kaba kyntu ia ki paidbah nongkyrshan ban pynjop kput ia u ha kane ka elekshon, u bah Himalaya u la ong, ba ki don lai tylli ki mat kiba u angnud bad kito ki long ban wanrah iaka lad jingsumar kaba bha, ka pule puthi kaba bha bad ki surok ba bha ha ka thain Mawsynram.“Ngan aiti 100% na ka bynta ka roi ka par ka Mawsynram. Ngam don daw hynrei nga don lai tylli ki mat bad kita ki long ban wanrah ia ka lad jingsumar kaba bha, ka pule puthi kaba bha bad ki surok ba bha ha ka thain Mawsynram”, u la ong.Ki nongialam ka Congress Mawsynram, ki la kam ba tang ki dkhot ka Congress ki la don 3875 ngut khlem pat khein ia ki Mahila bad ki samla.
title: Tyrkhong beit ki 10 snem ha  Mawsynram “Ym don MLA skhim”

content: Sohra, 26 Risaw:Ki paidbah ba la wan sha ka jingialang jong ka BJP kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha madan Maraikaphon, Sohra ki la shongshit puk tang mar ia kren Khasi u nongialam ka BJP na Delhi u Nalin Kohli. Tang mar ia ïeng na jaka shong ban ai jingkren u Nalin Kohli u la kren da ka ktien Khasi bad u la ong “Khublei ia phi baroh, nga kmen ban iohi ia phi baroh, nga ai khublei ia u Dr.Khongjee uba la pynlong jingialang mynta ka sngi”. Ha katei ka por shaid ki paidbah ki la thap kti bad ki la risa, hynrei u Kohli u la ong ba mynta u dang hikai ban kren Khasi bad katba nangiaid ki sngi un sa nang kham tbit shuh shuh. Hadien katei u la bteng ia ka jingkren jong u ha ka ktien Phareng kaba la pynkylla Khasi da ka kong Bianca Kyndiah State Executive Member jong ka BJP.Haba kren ha katei ka jingialang ki nongialam ka BJP ki la ai ksai ba ia ka tiket BJP ha Sohra ka lah ban poi sha u Dr.P.W Khongjee. U Nalin Kohli ha ka jingkren jong u, u la ong ba haba u poi ha kane ka jylla u iohsngew ba u Dr.P.W Khongjee MLA barim ka Sohra u dei u briew uba la bna nam bha ha Sohra bad uba ki paidbah ki ieit, “U la shakri kum u doktor ban sumar briew, u la shakri kum u MLA bad mynta u kwah ban ia khun na ka seng BJP, ka BJP ka donkam ia kum kine ki briew” ong u Kohli.U Kohli u la pynpaw ka jingsngewhun ban iohi ia ka jingiabun ki paidbah kiba u Dr.Khongjee u la lum ha ka jingialang mynta ka sngi bad u la ong ba un dang wan biang sha Sohra ban ia kynduh ia ki paidbah hynrei ia ka tiket pat u la ong ba un hap ban lei tai jingtip sha Delhi shaphang katei ka jingialang. U Alphons Kannanthanam pat haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor u la ong ba ka Party ka ai ia ka tiket sha u briew uba ki paidbah ki mon bad u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewhun ban iohi ia ki briew kiba la poi sha ka jingialang jong ka BJP mynta ka sngi ha Sohra, “Ia ka tiket ngin ai sha u briew uba ki paidbah ki kwah” u la ong.U Dr.Khongjee ula kren ba ka jingrung BJP jong u ka dei hadien ba u iohi ia ki kam ba ka BJP hapoh ka jingialam u Narendra Modi ka trei ha ka sorkar na ka bynta ki paidbah. U la ong ba un wanrah jingjop ia katei ka seng na Sohra konstitwensi. U la aiti ruh ia ka mat jingdawa sha u myntri ka tnad kam jngohkai pyrthei ka sorkar pdeng bad katei ka mat jingdawa ka dei kumno ban wanrah ia ka projek kaba sa snem ban kyntiew ia ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ha Sohra. U Alphons haba jubab ia katei ka mat jingdawa kaba u Dr.Khongjee u la aiti u la ong ba un sa pule bha bad kaei kaba ka sorkar ka lah ban leh, kan leh beit. Kiwei pat kiba la ai jingkren ki long ki Vice President jong ka State BJP u bah E.Mawrie bad bah J.A Lyngdoh, u Rangbah Shnong ka Marakaiphon. Kiwei pat kiba la donlang ki long u Secretary bah Bashai Khongngai, kong Bianca Kyndiah bad kiwei pat ki nongialam jong ka BJP.
title: Shongshit ki paidbah ba kren  Khasi U Nalin Kohli ha Sohra

content: Nongpoh, 26 Risaw:Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) jong ki ar-tylli ki kynhun nongniah kali kamai kiba kynthup ia ki nongniah Auto bad Maruti, Pahambir Unit, mynta ka sngi ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingbymshimkhia da ki nongpyniaid ia ka kali ia ki Bus saw, ia kaba la buh khnang ha katei ka thain na ka bynta ban kit ia ki khynnah skul.Katkum ka jingia-thuh da ki nongialam jong katei ka JAC kiba kynthup ia u Bah Cyril Maring, uba long kum u General Secretary, la ong ba katei ka Bus saw kaba la phah kyrpang ha katei ka thain ka long ban kit tang ia ki khynnah skul, hynrei ha ka jingiohi jong ki la lap ba ia katei ka Bus la pyndonkam bakla namar kam shym la pyndep katkum ka kamram kaba la bynshet.Kumta na ka liang ki nongialam jong katei ka JAC ki la kyntu ia ki nongpyniaid jong katei ka Bus saw kaba don ha katei ka jaka, ba ki dei ban shimkhia bad pynbiang ia ka por leit buh bad leit shaw ia ki khynnah skul kiba leit ha ka skul bapher bapher ha Nongpoh.
title: Bynniaw ka JAC ki nongniah kali,  bym shimkhia ki nongpyniaid Bus saw

content: Shillong, 26 Risaw:Ka donkam ban ioh ia ka sorkar bym dei Congress ha ka Jylla Meghalaya, ban nym ia tyngkhuh bad ka sorkar pdeng ha Delhi, kaba dei ka sorkar BJP bad katei ka dei ka rai jong ki nongkyrshan jong U bah HS Shylla, MDC, kiba ia kynduh ha ka 24tarik mynta u bnai, ha kaba la pyniaid da U bah Hilarius Warbah. Katei kan lah ban weng ia ki jingeh jong ka jylla Meghalaya, na ka jingduk jingkyrduh bad ka jing jynjar ki paidbah, na ka daw jong ka jingleh mon bad leh thurmur jong ka sorkar Congress, ha ki snem ba ladep.Ha katei ka jing-ialang, la iatai sani bha halor ka jingrit jylli jong ka Seng UDP, HSPDP bad PDF, kata, ba ki kham don bad paw tang ha Khasi Hills bad kim khlain wat tang ha Jaintia Hills, khlem da ia kren sha Garo Hills bad ki ong ba ka Seng NPP nalor ba ka khlain bha ha Garo Hills, ka la nang kiew stet ka jingkhlain jong ka ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hills, da ka jingpynkhreh jong ki MLA ki bym duna ia ka shiphew ngut ia kiba la paw kyrteng ha ki kot khubor ha kine ki sngi ban ialeh na ka NPP ha kane ka elekshon 2018 nalor katto katne ngut ki MDC.“Shuh shuh ia ka jingpynbna ba shai kdar jong u President Rangbah jong ka NPP u Conrad K. Sangma, MP ba ka kam myntri rangbah, kan leit sha kata ka bynta jong ka Meghalaya ba jop bun ki MLA na ka seng NPP bad ba u da pynmih ruh ia ka kyrteng jong U Bah Prestone Tynsong, MLA, Ex-Cabinet Minister ba u long uba la tbit bah ban long myntri rangbah. Ka jingialang, haba ka la iatai sani bha ia kine kiei kiei ka la shim ia ka rai da kawei ka jingmut ba ka Nongkrem Constituency kam dei shuh ban dang don shabar na ka Seng ka ban bat ia ka jingsynshar ha Meghalaya kumba ka la mad ha ki shiphew snem kiba la dep (2088-2018) ha kiba u MLA jong ka u ioh ban ai daw ia ki paidbah bad ki nongkitkam shnong bad kam skul man ka por ba ki leit ban ud ia kiba bun ki jingeh da kine ki kyntien – “NGAM DON HA KA BOR”. La ong shuh shuh, ba ka suk ia ki MLA ban ai daw kumta, namar ia lade ki biang haba la siew tulop shi lak shi bnai bad mynta ba la pynkiew ar lak shi bnai, hynrei ka constituency ka iam ka lynniar la shiphew snem kynthih.La rai ruh namarkata ban khot ia ka jingialang heh jong ki nong kyrshan jong U bah HS Shylla, ha ka 6tarik Naiwieng 2017 ha Lad Nongkrem ha ka por 7.00 baje janmiet bad U bah Shylla, u ong shuh shuh “Na ka liang jong nga nga pdiang ia kane ka rai jong ka Executive Committee bad nga ai khublei ia ka Peoples Democratic Front kaba la pdiang ia U Bah Hilarius Pohshen ban ialeh na Nongkrem Constituency ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynne ka step ha ophis treikam U Bah P.N.Syiem, CEM ha Nongrim Hills”.
title: Ka sorkar bym dei Congress, ban  nym ia tyngkhuh bad ka sorkar pdeng

content: Sohra, 26 Risaw:U nongaiktien ka BJP U Nalin Kohli haba kren paidbah ha ka jingialang jong ka seng BJP kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha madan Maraikaphon, Sohra u la ong ba ha ka jingsynshar jong ka sorkar BJP ha kine ki 3 snem mynta ka sorkar ka la pynleit jingmut bha kumno ban kyntiew ia ka thaiñ shatei Lam Mihngi bad dei na kata ka daw ba hapoh 3 snem ka jingsynshar ki myntri sorkar pdeng ki la wan ban peit ia kane ka thaiñ la palat 200 sien, “Tang hapoh 3 snem ba ka BJP ka synshar ki myntri sorkar pdeng ki la wan la palat 200 sien shane, mynno phi ju iohi myntri sorkar pdeng ha ka por ba ka Congress ka synshar, hato phi ju iohi ia ki ba kin wan shane?” ong u Nalin Kohli.U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar pdeng na Delhi ka theh tyngka bha kumno ban kyntiew ia kane ka thaiñ bad jan baroh ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei Lam Mihngi ki la kiew ha ka roi ka par hynrei tang ka jylla Meghalaya kaba sahdien, “Peit ha Assam, Arunachal Pradesh, Manipur, Nagaland ki surok ki la bha lut, hynrei ha Meghalaya shaei lut ki buh ia ka tyngka kaba tuid na Delhi, nga lyngngoh shano ka sorkar Meghalaya ka buh ia ka pisa ba phah sha Delhi, ka pisa ka wan beit kam dei ba kam wan hynrei haei la pyntreikam ia ka” u la ong.U Nalin Kohli u la ong ba dei na kata ka daw ki paidbah jong kitei ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi ki iohi ia ka jingtreikam ka sorkar BJP bad ki sa ai jingjop ha ka elekshon ba katei ka seng kan wan ha ka bor synshar ha ka jylla jong ki ruh, “Ngi kwah ba phi ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya ruh , phin ai lad ia ka BJP ban wan ha ka bor synshar bad phin sa iohi ia ka jingkiew ka roi ka par tang ha ki khyndiat snem” u la ong. U Nalin Kohli u la kren ia ka jingeh ba kane ka jylla Meghalaya ka ia kynduh bad u la ong ba haba peit lei lei ia ki surok ha ri Lum Garo la dap sa tang da ki thliew ki syar, ki jingkieng da ki spah tylli tang da ki jingkieng ba pun da ki dieng. “Shaei keiñ ka sorkar ka buh ia ka pisa ba ai na Delhi?” u la ong.Utei u nongaiktien ka BJP na Delhi u la ong ruh ba ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya ki ia kynduh ia ka jingeh kaba khraw ha kine ki sngi namar ka jingkhang dewiong, ka jingkhang mawshun, ka jingkhang tih maw tih shyiap bad ka la ktah ia ka kam ka jam jong ki briew, “Ka long kaba dei ban sumar ia ka mei mariang hynrei ki briew ruh ki donkam ia ka kam ka jam ban im, ka sorkar Congress hangne kam shym la lah ban pyllait ia ki paidbah na kane ka jingeh hynrei nga kular ha phi ba lada phi ailad ia ka BJP ban wan ha ka bor synshar tang hapoh 6 lane 8 bnai ngin weng ia ka jingkhang dewiong, jingkhang mawshun” ong u Nalin Kohli haba kren ha ka jingialang paidbah ha Sohra.
title: Lada ngi wan ha ka bor, hapoh 6 bnai ngin  weng ia ka jingkhang dewiong: Kohli

content: Shillong, 26 Risaw:Ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) kan pynlong ia ka jingialang bah jong ka ha ka 31 tarik Risaw, 2017 ha ka por 11 baje mynstep ha Dinam Hall, Jaiaw. La kyrpad ia baroh ki nongmihkhmat kiban mihkhmat na ki konstitwensi bapher bapher ba kin ia poi ryntih ha katei ka sngi ha ka por ba la buh khnang ba ka jingialang kan long kaba iaid beit iaid ryntih bad kaba i shongkun. Ha kajuh ka por, ka seng ka kwah ban pyntip ba tang ia ki delegates kiba la shah jied na ki constituency bapher bapher yn shah ban wan sha katei ka jingialang.
title: 11tarik, jingialang bah ka HSPDP

content: Sohra, 26 Risaw:U myntri ka tnad jngohkai kai pyrthei ka sorkar pdeng u Alphons Kannanthanam ha ka jingkren paidbah jong ha ka jingialang jong ka BJP kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha madan Maraikaphon, Sohra u la ong ba u la heh la san bad u la pule ha nongbah Shillong la bun snem, haduh ba un da dep ia ka Graduation ha ka Economics. Dei na kata ka daw u la ong ba u tip bha ia ka jinglong ki briew kane ka jylla ba ki dei ki briew kiba smat bad kiba trei shitom bad ki dei ruh ki briew kiba don bun ki sap ki talen, hynrei kaba lyngngoh pat u ong balei ka Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla kaba duk tam ha ka ri India.“Nga lyngngoh bha, nga la pyrshang ban wad ia ki daw balei ba ki briew ha Meghalaya ki duk, hynrei hadien nga lap ba ka jingduk ha Meghalaya ka dei na ka daw ka jinglehbeiñ bad khniot beiñ ka sorkar ia ki paidbah. Balei ym don surok kaba bha, balei ym don jaka pule kaba bha, balei ki samla kim donkam donjam , baroh ka daw ka dei ba u myntri rangbah bad ki myntri sorkar ki pynkdang tang ialade” u la ong.U Alphons u la ong biang, “U myntri rangbah jong phi bad ki myntri sorkar jong phi, ki don ia ki ïng paki dulan kiba rem dor, ki don ki kali kiba rem dor, ki shong liengsuiñ da ki tiket kiba rem dor, ki don ia ki ïng basa (Guest House) hapoh Singapore bad Hongkong phi pat ki paidbah phim ioh tang ka ja ban bam ruh”. U la bteng biang da kaba ong “Kyndit bynriew noh kane ka elekshon ka dei ka kabu ksiar ia phi, pyn sangeh noh ia kine ki jingshah lute jong phi, kynjat lut noh ia kine baroh, dei tang kane ka kabu ksiar ia phi”.Utei u heh BJP uba dei ruh u myntri sorkar pdeng uba wan na Delhi u la pynithuh sha ki paidbah ba u dei u Kristan uba ju leit jingiaseng manla ka sngi u blei, u la ong ba u dei u IAS ophisar jong u snem 1979 , u la long kum u Deputy Commissioner la 30 snem, u la long u Secretary jong ka jylla Kerala hadien u la ia khun elekshon bad long kum u MLA shimet ha Kerela bad u ju kyrshan bha ia ka Communist bad u la ia khun MP kum u kyrtong ka BJP bad mynta u la long u myntri sorkar ka ri India.U la ong ia ki paidbah ba lada ki kwah ban wanrah jingkylla ki dei ban ailad ia ka seng BJP ba kan synshar ha kane ka jylla.“Phi kwah ba ki khun jong phi kin ioh ka jingpule kaba bha, phi kwah Engineering College, phi kwah Medical College, ki samla ki kwah kam kwah jam, nga kular ia phi ba lada phi ailad ia ka BJP ba kan wan ha ka bor synshar ngin wanrah ia kita baroh ki jingdonkam jong phi.
