U Bah Wahlang u dei ruh u khun jong u Pastor PBM Basaiawmoit uba ju iakhun elekshon MP teng ha ki snem ba la dep.Ia ka rai ban pyniakhun da u Bah Wahlang, la pynbna ha ka jingialang kaba long ha ka 28 tarik u Nailur ha Sohiong.U Bah Judah u wan pyniasnoh sha ka PDF ryngkat ka jingwan ia synran lang u kpa jong u hi u Pastor PBM Basaiawmoit, ka kmie jong u, ki kni, ki meinah meisan lem ryngkat ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong u na kylleng ki dong bad shnong jong ka Constituency, ha ka jingialang kaba la pynlong ha ka shnong Nongbsap ba la pdiang burom da u President ka PDF State Executive Committee u Bah Ivanlumlang Marbaniang bad kiwei.Ha kane ka sngi wat hapdeng ka jingslap jong ka suin-bneng, ki paidbah ki la wan ban ia donlang ban sakhi ia ka jingthaw ia ka PDF Zonal Committee Sohiong Constituency, ha kaba la thung ruh ia ki nongkitkam.
title: U khun U Pastor PBM,  na ka PDF na Sohiong

content: Nongstoiñ, 28 Nailur:U wei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u bah K. Paliar uba la thmu ban leit shim bor ding noh ha ka Iing ka jong u, na ka tnad treikam jong ka MeECL ha Nongstoiñ, u la hap ban mad ia shibun ki jingeh bad shah kyntait ruh ban ai bording ilektrik na katei ka ophis tang na ka daw ba um don ia u Adhar, wat la u tei u rangbah u la don bad pynbiang lut ia baroh ki kot ki sla ba donkam.“Da ka jingthmu ban tan bad ring bording noh ha la Iing nga la pynbiang lut ia ki kot ki sla kiba donkam baroh ha kiba kynthup naduh ki Epic bad kiwei kiwei bad haba nga la leit ban ai ha katei ka ophis MeECL ha Nongstoiñ, uwei na ki ophisar u la kyntait mardor bad u la ong pynban ia nga, ba lada ngam don Adhar da lei lei yn nym ai bording ia nga kumta na ka liang jong nga haba ngam pat kwah ban leit shon Adhar nga la ong ba ngam don hynrei u la pynbor ia nga da kaba phai ktien biang bad ong ruh lada phim wanrah Adhaar ngin ym ai satia ia ka bording” ong utei u rangbah haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor.La iathuh da utei u rangbah, ba ym pat da donkam than ban shon lada ym pat mon, kumta u la leit biang sa shisien ban kyrpad ia u tei u ophisar, hynrei u tei u rangbah u hap ban phai thylli biang.Ki nongialam jong ka KSU, ki la iakren bad u SDO bad ki nongthoh khubor, ki la iohlad ban iakren bad u tei u ophisar ha kaba u la ong “Ha ka jingshisha na ka liang jong nga nga shu pyrshang ban iakren bad utei u bah Paliar da kaba nga shu ong ba u dei ban wanrah ia ka Adhaar card lada u don namar katkum ka phom la don ia ki bynta ban pyndap la ngi don ne ngim don ia ka Adhaar card bad ngam shem la ong ba u dei ban wan rah lem kumta ngin ym pdiang kata ka long kaba u la kum sngewthuh bakla”.Ka Seng KSU ka la pynpaw da kaba ong, ba haba ym pat ioh ia ka hukum na ki bor kiba halor ba ia u Adhaar Card dei ban pynlong kongsan (mandatory) pynban kiba bun ki jingiatyngkhuh, ki la long pynban kum ka jingpynbor lypa ha ki kam kiba bunjait kumta na ka liang jong ka Seng ka kyntu ba katba u Adhar um pat long treikam, ki ophis sorkar kim dei ban pynbor iano iano ban don Adhar ailad ha ka jingkwah bad ka mon laitluid jong kiba shem bad kina sngewdonkam ban leh.
title: Khlem Adhar, ym treh ai bording  ka MeECL ha Nongstoiñ

content: Shillong, 28 Nailur:Ka Peoples Democratic Front (PDF), ka mih namar ba ki ain ba shna ka District Council (ADC), ki shah khylliap lut ha ka sorkar jylla ban pyniada ia ka jaitbynriew, la ong u MDC ka PDF u Bah Latiplang Kharkongor.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi Palei, u Bah Latiplang u la ong ba kum ki MDC kiba la don ha ka KHADC, la lap ba ki ain ba shna ka Council, kim shym la lah ban ieng namar ba la shah khylliap lut, ynda la poi ha ka sorkar jylla bad na kata ka daw, ki MDC ki la rai ban iakhun noh da ka elekshon MLA ha ka kyrteng ka PDF na ka bynta ban iasaid ha ka iing dorbar ban iada ia ka jaitbynriew.“Ngi hap mih ha u 2018 ban iada ia ka jaitbynriew. Bun ki mat kiba iadei ban iada da ki ain ia ka jaitbynriew ki shah khylliap noh ynda la poi ha ka sorkar jylla”, la ong u Bah Latiplang.U la ong ba ka PDF ka kwah ban ieng ha la ka nongrim, katkum ka rukom pyrkhat jongka ban iada ia ka jaitbynriew da kaba thaw da ki ain kiba khlain na ka jingshah banbein naduh ka jingkhang dewiong, jingkhang shyiap, ka jingkyntur ka MUDA, ka kam rangbah shnong bad kiwei.U Bah Latiplang u la ong ba ka donkam ban mih da ka kynhun namar ba lada iakhun marwei kan nym poi shano shano ruh hynrei ka donkam da ka kynhun ban iasaid bad ban iada ia ka jaitbynriew.“Ngi la thaw ia ka PDF, namar ba ngi donkam ban mih da ka kynhun, namar marrwei ym lah ban leh eiei”, u la ong.U la kynthah ia kane ka sorkar jylla da kaba ong ba ka la leh shibun ki kam kiba ktah jur ia ka jaitbynriew bad lada ailad biang kaei kaban jia ia ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew.U la ong ba kumba ka long mynta ka jingdon ka ain bat khyndew ne ka Land Transfer Act 1972, ka jylla ka la ngam lut, namar ba ki bar jylla kin sa thied duh ia ki jaka ki puta ha kane ka jylla.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jinglong nongialam u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem, u Bah Latiplang u la ong ba ia mynta u kitkhia bad sngew khia bha ia ka jaitbynriew hynrei ym lah pat ban tip ia kaba hadien.
title: Ba shah khylliap ha ka sorkar jylla,  donkam ban rung ha Iing dorbar

content: Shillong, 28 Nailur:Ki riew ngeit na ka Balang Mawphlang Presbytery ka la kyntu ia ka Balang ban ym pdiang ia ka pisa ba la noh synniang u Chief Engineer barim ka PHE u Bah SK Sun kaba T. 6 lak.Ha ka jingshisha, u Bah SK Sun u la noh synniang sha ka Khraw Sing College da ka mon sngewbha ha kane ka taiew ba la dep.Ha ka jingpynlait kyrwoh, ki riew ngeit Balang kynthup ia ki Pastor bad ki nongialam Balang jong ka Presbyterian Church, ki la ong ba ka Balang kam kwah ban pyniakhleh ia ka pisa ba shu ioh ei bad ka pisa ba la pynlang da kawei na ka shiphew jong ki para bangeit katkum ka jinghikai jong u Jisu Khrist.Ki nongialam Balang ki la kdew ia ka kaiphod jong u CAG ba u Bah SK Sun, u la pyndonkam bakla da ki klur ha ka kyrteng ki skhim ba shu thok na ka tnad PHE.Halor kane, ki la kyntu ia ki nongialam Balang ban kyndit thiah bad ban buh jingkylli, la ki tip tynrai ne em, naei u Bah SK Sun u ioh pisa ban ai sha ka Balang.Lah ban kdew ba u Bah S.K Sun dang shen ha ka sngi balang mynta ka taiew u la noh synniang da ka song pisa T.6 lak, lai tylli ki Computer bad kawei ka Printer/Xerox Machine sha ka Khrawsing Christian College, Mawngap kaba dei ka Project jong ka Presbytery Mawphlang.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da ki dkhot ka Governing Body jong ka College, Christian Education Department, ki nongkitkam ka Jingïaseng Kynthei, Jingïaseng Samla, Presbyrtery, ki nonghikai bad ki samla pule ha kaba la pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang da u President ka Governing Body u Tbn. K. Lyngkhoi.La ïoh jingkren lyngkot na ka Presbytery kynthup na ka Jingïaseng Kynthei, Jingïaseng Samla kiba la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa une u rangbah uba la noh synniang ïa ka pisa bad kine ki tiar kiba la long ka jingkyrkhu ïa ka College ha ka por kaba dang donkam eh.U Bah SK Sun u la rai ban iakhun ia ka elekshon MLA 2018 na Mawphlang kaba mihkhmat mynta da u MLA ka Congress u Bah Kennedy C Khyriem.U Pastor Newyear Mawlong, uba dei u dkhot jong ka College, haba iakren bad U Rupang, um mynjur satia ia katei ka jingthoh pyrshah, ha kaba u ong “Ka dei ka jingai sngewbha ba ki ai ki briew, ngin leit bishar lei mangi.”U iathuh ruh ba ka jingai pisa, ka dei beit halor ka jingpynbeit jong ka College, ha kaba ka Balang kam don bynta eiei.Uwei pat u rangbah jong ka Balang Presbyterian, Mawphalng, haba iakren bad u nongthoh, u ong “Haba ioh balei ban kyntait”hynrei ha kajuh ka por, u ong shuh shuh ba ki shu bun kiba sngew lyngngoh, ba U bah Sun, u mih ban iarap, ha kane ka kynti, katba ha ki snem kiba mynshwa, um juh leh eiei.
title: “Wat pyn iakhleh ia ka pisa bym  hok bad kawei na ka shiphew”

content: Nongstoiñ, 29 Nailur:Ka Seng People’s Democratic Front (PDF), ka la jied mynta ka sngi, ia U Ma Synran Nongshlong, ban iakhun pyrshah ia u bah KP Pangniang u ba dei u MLA ba mynta jong katei ka Konstitwensi.U tei u samla, u dei uwei na ki nongpan tiket na ka seng HSPDP ban iakhun ia ka election shiteng samoi sha ka KHADC na katei ka Konstitwensi bad u ba la bat teng ruh kum u President ki samla joong ka HSPDP na Rambrai Jyrngam Konstitwensi.Katei ka rai jong ka PDF ka la paw shai, ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi hapoh ka Iing Dorbar jong ka RL Iew Rambrai ha kaba ki heh nongialam jong ka PDF na Shillong, ki la pdiang ia u bah Synran Nongshlong lem bad ia ki nongbud u bad ha katei ka sngi la ioh ruh ban thaw ia ka Zonal Committee jong ka PDF ha Rambrai Konstitwensi bad u bah Nongshlong un long kum u President.U bah Ivanlumlang Marbaniang President Rangbah jong ka PDF, u la ai khublei kyrpang ia u bah Synran, uba la kohnguh ban mih shakhmat bad kumjuh u la ai khublei ruh ia kiba ha Iing ha seng bad ki nongbud jong u, ha kaba u la pynpaw ruh da kaba u ong ba lada ym don ka jingiasngewthuh na Iing na sem kam myntoi ban iamih madan na ka bynta ban ialeh election.Katba na ka liang jong u bah Synran haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang u la ong “Nga la don ka jingthmu la kham slem na ka bynta ban iatrei bad ban ia kit ia bah ia ki kam jong ka Konstitwensi ha kaba nga la pyrshang ruh ban pan tiket na ka HSPDP ban iakhun ia ka election shiteng samoi sha KHADC, hynrei ngam pat ju iohlad satia bad mynta kala plie ka lad ia nga lyngba ka jingwan ban wad hi ka PDF”.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba jia katba jia long katba long lada u Blei u i bit ia u ban un long kum u nongmih khmat, kam don jingeh ia ki paidbah bad kumjuh ia u kum u samla wat la ka Rambrai Konstitwensi ka dei ka Konstitwensi kaba heh bad kaba iar kaba don ruh kumba 228 tylli ki shnong bad hadub 60 tylli ki Polling Station, hynrei kum ki briew ngin shaniah ha ka jingpyniaid ba stad jong u Blei nongbuh nongthaw.U bah LG Nongsiej MDC ka Nongstoiñ haba ai jingkren u la ong ba lada ki paidbah kin ailad bad lada ka PDF kan wan ha ka bor khlem pep ngin sa lah ban pynduh noh ia ki ain khyllah, ba la wanrah da ka sorkar Congress da kaba ngin pynduh da kaba ngin tar syndon ia kitei ki ain khyllah hapoh ka Iing dorbar thaw ain jong ka Jylla.Nalor kitei kiba la ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang la iadon lang ruh u bah Morning Mawsor MDC ka Mawshynrut, u bah Aibor L Nonglait Secretary PDF Central Body, u bah Auspicious L Mawphlang Secretary ka PDF sengkmie, u bah H.S. Marngar Adviser ka PDF bad kiwei kiwei kiba la ai jingkren bad pynshai ia ki nongrim jong ka party PDF.Ha katei ka jingialang la wan ban iashim bynta ruh da ki spah ngut ki paidbah na kylleng ki dong jong ka Rambrai Jyrngam Konstitwensi bad ha katei ka jingialang ka ioh ruh ban jied ia ki dkhot jong ki nongkitkam ka PDF Zonal Committee jong ka Rambrai Jyrngam Konstitwensi, ha kaba la pynskhem da u President ba rangbah jong ka party PDF.
title: Da U Synran na ka PDF, pyrshah  ia U Bah Pangniang ha Rambrai

content: Jowai, 29 Nailur:Mynta ka sngi, ki nongshong shnong ka Ummulong, ki la ïa ïaid paidbah bad pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jongki, ia ka jingtrei kam jong U Rangbah Shnong ka Ummulong lem bad kiwei de, kiba don ha ka kynhun U Rangbah Shnong.Kitei ki paidbah, kiba don da ki spah ngut, ki dawa ba U Ma Shelsing Langi Rangbah, U Chairman ka shnong Ummulong, U Ma Briwon Pohshna bad u Secretary Shnong u Pyrkhatbha Lamare ba kin hiar shuki noh mardor.La kynnoh ba kitei ki nongialam shnong, ki la ïalam bakla ïa u Dolloi ka Elaka Jowai, ha kaba ki iathuh ba u paidbah ka shnong Ummulong, um kwah satia ban pynlong dorbar Shnong; katba ha kawei ka liang, ki paidbah katei ka shnong, ki la kynnoh ba hadien ba ki la ujor sha u Dolloi ba kim ju ïoh Dorbar, kumta u Dolloi ula bthah ïa u Ma Langi, ba un khot noh ha ka 28tarik une u bnai ban pynbeit ia huri hura hapoh katei ka Shnong.Shuwa ban ïaid paidbah, la don ka jingkynduh lang ha ïing dorbar ka Ummulong bad hadien kata ki sa ia mih paidbah, ha ryngkat ki jingthoh placard ban pynrem ïa ki nongïalam shnong.Ki Pulit ka Ummulong, ki la pyrshang ban pynsangeh ïa katei ka jingiaid paidbah, hynrei ki paidbah kim shym la patiaw ïa u pulit bad iaid la iaid paidbah ha ryngkat ka jingpyrta pynrem ïa ki nongialam shnong.
title: Mih ki paidbah Ummulong, ban  dawa hiar shuki Rangbah Shnong

content: Shillong, 19 Nailur:“Kum u Khristan nga don ka jingiadei bad ka Balang, ngan leit iakynduh ia u Archbishop, Ki pastor ka Presbyterian bad ia kiwei ki kynhun niam”, ong U Alphons Kananthanam, myntri ka sorkar India mynta ka sngi.U myntri ka sorkar pdeng, u leit iakynduh ia u Arch Bishop mynta ka janmiet bad ruh ia ki Pastor ka Balang Presbyterian kum shi bynta ka jingwan iuhkjat jongu sha ka jylla hadien ba u la shah thung kum u nongpeit ia ka BJP Meghalaya na ka bynta ka elekshon ban wan.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor hadien ba la iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka BJP ha ka nongbah mynta ka sngi, u Alphons u la ong ba un leit iakynduh ia u Arch Bishop mynta ka janmiet bad ruh ia ki Pastor ka Presbyterian nalor kiwei pat ki nongialam jong ki jait niam.U la ong ba ym tang ban iakynduh ia ki nongialam niam hynrei un leit iakynduh ruh ia baroh ki kynhun bapher bapher ban iakren ban iaphylliew jingmut bad ki.Kumjuh ruh u President ka BJP u Amit Shah u la buh prokram ban iakynduh ia baroh ki nongialam niam ha ka jingwan jongu shane ka jylla tangba ym pat thikna ia ka jingwan jongu hadien ba u la weng noh namar ka jingdonkam kyrkieh.Ha ka jingshisha, u Amit Shah u la thmu ban wan sha ka nongbah ha ka 7 tarik u bnai ban wan hynrei la hap ban kynriah noh namar ba um pat lait.
title: Kum u Khristan, nga don jingiadei  bad ka Balang, ong U Alphons

content: Shillong, 29 Nailur:“Phi la ioh sngew ba ki don ki Khristan kiba shah shoh shah thang, ka jingshah pynpra ki iingmane ne ki mosque?” kylli U Alphonse Kananthanam, myntri ka sorkar India mynta ka sngi, haba kren ha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi.“Haba ka BJP ka wan ha ka bor ha u snem 2014, ki paidbah ka ri ki la ong ba ki Khristan kin shah shoh shah dat shah thang bad ki iingmane kin shah pynpra bad ki Mosque” ong biang U Alphons uba long u Khristan na Kerela uba la pule college ha St Anthony College Shillong bad ia ka post graduate na NEHU, Shillong ha ki snem ba mynshwa. U Alphonse, ula wan iuhkjat ha ka sien ba nyngkong, hadien ba u la shah jied ban peit ia ka BJP Meghalaya na ka bynta ka elekshon ban wan.U la kyntait ruh, ba ka jingsaphriang ha ki lad social media ba shah shoh shah thang bad shah pynpra ki iingmane, ka dei ki kam mutlop ban pynjah burom bad pynbudnam ia ka BJP.“Ka dei ka jingpyrshang mutlop suda ki bym shisha haei haei ruh. Ym don tang iwei I iingmane ba shah pynpra ne u riewngeit Khristan ba shah shoh shah dat. Nga dei u Khristan nga la long uba husiar ban peit ioh don shisha kum kane ka jingjia ha kylleng ka ri”, la ong u Alphons.U la ong ba kum kane ka jingpynsaphriang ha ki lad sam khubor, ka dei tang kumba leh ka Pakistan, kaba kynnoh khlem nongrim ia ka India ha ka dorbar UN da kaba pyni ia ka dur jong ka briew kaba bym dei satia ha IndiaU la ong ba u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi u la burom ia baroh ki jaitbynriew bad ki jingngeit ha ka ri.“Ngi burom ia ka jingngeit jong phi, la ong u Modi, ngi la don 7 ngut ki MLA Khristan ha Goa, 2 ngut ki Khristan kiba dei ki myntri BJP ha ka sorkar ha Manipur, 2 ngut ha Nagaland bad 7 ngut ha Arunachal Pradesh”, la ong u Alphons.U la ong ruh ba u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u la shim khia da kaba pynlait im ia u Phadar Tom na kaba shah rahbor ha ki runar ha ri Yemen, kane ka sorkar ka la pynlait im ruh ia kawei ka sister kaba na Kolkata na ka jingshah rahbor.“Kane ka sorkar ka long na ka bynta ki paidbah baroh khlem kano kano ka jingsngew niam bad ngi kwah ba ki paidbah ka Meghalaya kin mad bad shim kabu ia kane ka jingangnud jong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri ban pynlong ia ka ri India kaba roi bad kaba khlain bym don bamsap”, la ong u Alphons.Halor ka jingkhang bam doh masi, u Alphons u la ong ba kane ka sorkar pdeng kam don bynta eiei ban khang ban hukum ia ki briew ban khang ne ban nym bam doh, hynrei ka shong ha ki briew kane ka jylla kumno ki kwah ban bam, ban riam.“Ki paidbah ka jylla ki dei ban rai hi, kaei ki kwah ban bam, kaei ki kwah ban riam bad kane ka dei ka nongrim jong ka BJP”, u la ong.U la ong ba ka jingkhang bam doh masi ka dei ka kam jong ka sorkar jylla bad ka sorkar pdeng kam don eiei ka jinghukum ban leh ia kane.Halor ka jingrakhe ia ka 25 tarik Nohprah kum ka Good Governance Day kaba dei ka sngi kyrpang ki Khristan, u Alphons u la ong ba kam dei ka good governance day hynrei ka Good Governance Week.“Ka sorkar kam kwah ban pynthut ia ka jingsngew jong kiwei ki jingngeit, ngi burom ia baroh ki jait niam”, u la ong.Halor ka jingthung myntri ia u da u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri, u Alphons u la ong ba kane ka sorkar BJP ka burom ia baroh ki jaitbynriew rit paid bad na kata ka daw, ki don ki myntri sorkar ba dei na ka jingngeit Khristan kum ma u bad don ruh ki Muslim kiba long myntri ha ka sorkar u Narendra Modi.“Ngam dei u MP hynrei nga shah thung kum u myntri sorkar, kaei ka pyni, ka pyni ba u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u kwah ba kane ka sorkar ka dei ia baroh ym ka jongno jongno”, u la ong.
title: Phi la iohsngew ba don ki Khristan  kiba shah shoh, shah pynpra  iingmane, kylli U Alphons

content: Shillong, 1 Risaw:Naduh u Snem 1971 shaneng ki don kumba 8,54,038 ki Bengali Hindu kiba lah wanphet sha Meghalaya, kata tang kiba la pynrung kyrteng,hynrei ki don bun bah sa kito kiba khlem don jingkhein shuh, ong ka HNLC, ha ka kyrwoh mynta ka sngi bad katei ka seng, ka kynnoh, ba ka dei ka jingleh jong ka sorkar Congress, ba ka kwah ban iarap ia ki hindu Bangladesh, kiba long ki sohpdung ha ka Pakistan. Katei ka seng, ka ong namarkata, ba lada ka sorkar India, ka beh ia ki Rohingya, kiba don kumba 40hajar ngut, ka dei ban beh ruh ia ki poiwir Hindu, kiba don ha Meghalaya. Ka HNLC, ka ong ba lada ka Sorkar kam patiaw, ka jaidbynriew kan hap ban khyrwait na tdong u khla ka India, kumba ki la jia ki jingiakhih mynder ha ki snem 1979, 1987 lane 1992.Katei ka kyrwoh, ka ong shuh shuh, ba kat kum ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 6 tarik, Nailur 2017, U Brigadier ki shipai u kam ba ki len shipai ki don ka jingma na ka HNLC, kumta hap ban pyrkhing iaki paidbah bad ka seng, ka ong ba kane ka jingkam jong u ka long tang ban tap eitmiaw khnang ba ka tnadshipai kan nang ioh shuh shuh ban skud jubor iaki jaka paidbah, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw, Publicity Secretary, HNLC.
title: 8lak tam ki Bengali Hindu, kiba  wan phet sha Meghalaya:HNLC

content: Shillong, 01 Risaw:U MLA ka Congress na Nartiang u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la ong ba un sa peit ban pan tiket ne em na ka Congress bad yn sa leh ia kane hadien.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli halor ka jingbym pan tiket na ka Congress, ha kane ka sngi Saitjain hadien ka jingialang ha Nartiang, u Bah Sniawbhalang u la shu kren lyngkut, “Ngan sa peit ngan sa pan hadien ruh”.Haba kylli biang, u la jubab da kaba ong, “Phi ( nongthoh khubor) phi kham tip kham bha”.U MLA ka Nartiang um kren jrong shuh hadien kane bad u la iaid noh.Lah ban kdew ba san ngut ki MLA ka Congress kynthup u Bah Sniawbhalang na Nartiang kim shym la shim phom satia na ka party ban pan tiket na ka bynta ka elekshon MLA ban wan.Kiwei pat ki kynthup ia u Bah Prestone Tynsong na Pynursla, u Bah Rowel Lyngdoh na Mawkyrwat, u Bah Ngaitlang Dhar na Umroi, bad u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem uba shah sospen na Mawsynram.Ka jingthep phom ka la kut naduh ka 15 tarik u bnai ba la dep bad kumba ka paw, na kine ki jaka ba kine ki MLA kim pan tiket, la don da kiwei pat ki briew kiba la pan tiket na ka Congress.Katba ka kynhun jong u Bah Sniawbhalang, Bah Prestone, Bah Rowel bad bah Ngaitlang ki la lah ban leit iakhun noh na ka NPP katba u Bah Pyshngain u lah ban iakhun noh na ka party thymmai ka PDF.
title: ‘Ngan sa pan tiket hadien’, ong u Ma Sniawbhalang

content: Shillong, 01 Risaw:U President ka Ri u Ram Nath Kovind ha ka sngi Saitjain ula thung ïa u Lat ba pura jong ka Jylla Meghalaya u Ganga Prasad.Kane ka jingthung ia u Lat ba pura ka long hadien phra bnai naduh ba u Lat barim u V.Shanmuganathan u la risain na ka shuki, ha ka 26 tarik Kyllalyngkot mynta u snem.Ia u Prasad la jied kum u Member of the Legislative Council (MLC) ka Bihar ha u snem 1994. U la long u dkhot ka MLC la 18 snem lynter bad u la long ruh kum u nongïalam ka BJP ha katei ka Council.Ia u Ganga Prasad la kha ha ka 8 tarik Naitung 1937 ha Patna, Bihar. U la pyndep ïa ka jingpule haduh ka B.Com bad u dei uwei na ki nongïalam ba la rim bha jongka BJP. U la long teng ruh u General Secretary ka BJP ha Bihar. U la ïalam ïa ka Liang pyrshah ha ka Legislative Council na ka bynta 5 snem.Na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka Bihar u Nitish Kumar u la ai khublei ïa u Prasad uba la shah thung kum u Lat ka jylla Meghalaya bad u kitbok kit rwiang ïa u ba un lah ban ai ka jingshakri ba bha tam.U Lat ba shipor ka Meghalaya u Banwarilal Purohit uba peit ia ka Jylla Assam, ula shah thung mynta kum u Lat ba pura ka Jylla Tamil Nadu ha ka jaka jong u C Vidyasagar Lat ka Jylla Maharashtra, uba peitlang shipor ïa ka Tamil Nadu.Ha ka jaka jong u Purohit, la thung ïa u MLA barim ka BJP na Delhi u Jagdish Mukhi kum u Lat ka Assam. U Nong ïalam ka BJP u Satya Pal Malik ula shah thung kum u Lat ba thymmai ka Bihar, kaba u Kovind u bat ïa ka shuki kum u Lat shuwa ban shah jied kum u President. U Heh shipai bala shongthait u Brigadier (Dr) BD Mishra ula shah thung kum u Lat ka Jylla Arunachal Pradesh kaba ju peit lang shipor da u Lat ka Jylla Nagaland u Padmanabha Balakrishna Acharya.Ha kajuh ka por, u President ula thung ruh ïa u Chief Admiral bala shongthait ka Navy, u Devendra Kumar Joshi kum u Lieutenant Governor ka Andaman and Nicobar Island.
title: U Lat ka Jylla, u nong-Bihar

content: Shillong, 01 Risaw:Ka UDP ka la thalain tyngeh ia ka jingleh sting ka sorkar jylla ia ka tnad ka rep ka riang, haduh ba ka la pynbat director ha kawei ka briew haduh lai tylli ki tnad kiba don ha ka.Haba pyntip ia kane, u General Secretary ka UDP u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la ong ba mynta la shi snem tam, ka director jong ka tnad ka Rep ka riang ka la bat lang ia ka kam director jong ka Agriculture and Research & Training bad ruh ia ka tnad Horticulture.“Kane ka dei ka jingleh sting ka sorkar jylla khamtam ia kine ki tnad kiba donkam bha kiba iadei bad ki paidbah nongrep”, la ong u Dr Jemino haba kren mynta ka sngi.U la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka pyrta man ka por ban pynkiew ia ka rep ka riang ha ka jylla hynrei kaba lyngngoh ka long ba ia ki kam ba kongsan ba dei ban pyniaid sted ia ki kam ki jam, la bynshet tang ha kawei ka briew khlem pyndap haduh kine ki sngi.Ym tang katta, ha ka tnad Horticulture, wat ia ki kam District Horticulture ba bun la shu pynthylli kai kumto bad kane ym tang ba ka pyndkoh ia ka jingtreikam hynrei kan pynduh lad ruh ia kiba dei ban ioh kiew kyrdan ha kane ka tnad.“Ym tang ia kine, ia ki 3 tylli ki kam joint director ruh khlem pat pyndap ka sorkar ha kane ka tnad”, la ong u Dr Jemino.U la ong ba ha ka por ba u wanrah ia ka jingkylli balei ka sorkar kam shym la pyndap ne thung ia ki 73 tylli ki kam ba lait ha ka tnad ka rep ka riang hynrei ka jubab ka long ba ka dang don ha ka jingiakhun mukotduma. Katkum ka jingong u Dr Jemino ka sorkar ka lah ban leh da kawei ka lynti ban thung kam ia kiba biang wat haba ka don ha ka mukotduma namar ba ki lah ban palat rta lashai bad kim lah shuh ban aplai kam.
title: Palat shi snem, kawei ka director  ia lai tylli ki tnad rep ka Jylla

content: Jowai, 2 Risaw:U Rangbah shnong bad Secretary Shnong ka Ummulong ki la ujor ejahar ia ki paidbah nong shong shnong ka Ummulong kiba la iaid paidbah ha kane ka 29 tarik kum ka dak ka jingpyrshah jong ki ia utei u rangbah shnong bad Chairman Shnong bad Secretary ShnongU ma SS Langngi bad u ma Pyrkhatbha Lamare ki la ujor FIR ia u Chambel Myrboh bad ia kiwei kiwei kiba leit ban pyrta pyrshah ia ka jingleh kitei ki nongialam shnong.Kitei ki paidbah ki la iaid paidbah bad pyrta ba ki kwah dorbar shnong, ki kwah ban jied rangbah noh da kiwei.La kynnoh ruh ba kitei ki nongialam shnong kim shym la khot dorbar la lai snem eiei mynta. Haba la dawa ki paidbah ruh kitei ki nongialam shnong kim shym la khot ia ka Dorbar bad kumta ki la thoh sha u Dolloi bad na ka liang u Dolloi ka Elaka Jowai ruh u la thoh sha u Rangbah ban hukum ia u Rangbah shnong ban lum ia ka Dorbar ha ka 28 tarik.“Kitei ki nongialam shnong ki la thok ia u Dolloi ha kaba ki la jubab ba la dep pynlong ia ka Dorbar”, la ong ki paidbah na katei ka shnong.
title: Ujor ejahar U Rangbah Shnong ia ki paidbah Ummulong

content: Shillong, 01 Risaw:U Myntri sorkar barim u Bah Robert G Lyngdoh u lah ban long kum uwei na ki nongialap elekshon lem ia ka UDP ha kane ka elekshon ban wan.Ha ka jingialang jong ka UDP Youth Wing Shillong City kaba long ha kane ka sngi Saitjain, u Bah Robert u la iadon lang ha kaba u la ai jingkren ruh hakhmat ki samla ka UDP.U General Secretary ka UDP, u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la ong ba ka jingwan iadon bynta lang u Bah Robert ka ai mynsiem shibun ia ka seng, namar ba u dei u met ba kynsai ha ka jylla uba la noh synniang ha ka roi ka par bad ha ka sain pyrthei.“Ka jingdon jongu, ka la ai mynsiem ia ka UDP hynrei ngim pat lah ban ong ba un wan iasoh bad ka party. Ngi khot ia u ban ia ai jingmut lang kum uwei na ki riew sain dur ha ka roi ka par”, la ong u Dr Jemino.Ha kajuh ka por, u Dr Jemino u la ong ba ka jingiadon lang jongu ka thew ba u lah ban don bynta bad ka party ban long kum uwei na ki nongialap elekshon watla um pat rung sha ka party.“Ka jingdon mynsiem jongu bad ka party ka thew ba u lah ban iadon bynta hynrei kaba kongsan ka long ba ka shong u kum u rangbah ba la ih”, la ong u general secretary ka UDP.Ha ka jingialang ha kane ka sngi Saitjain, la don lang u Bah Bindo M Lanong, nalor u Bah Joe Marwein, bad u Bah Allan F DKhar.Ka jingialang ka long ban pynnep ia ki samla kumno ban tur na ka bynta ban trei ha kane ka elekshon ban pynthikna ba ka party kan ioh ia ka bor synshar ha ka jylla.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, ba la phah da U bah BM Lanong Senior Working President ka UDP, la iathuh ba ka jingialang ki samla UDP ka sor Shillong kaba la long ha ka sngi saitjain 30 tarik Nailur,da kawei ka sur ka pynpaw ba ka por ka la dei ban weng noh ia ka Sorkar Congress u Mukul Sangma ha ka election 2018 bad ban ailad noh ia ki seng trai ri UDP-HSPDP-GNC ban shimti ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya. Ka jingialang ka kyrpad ia ki paidbah ka Ri ba kin kyrshan ia katei ka jingthmu, khnang ban wanrah jingshngain bad jingroi-jingpar ha ka jylla, ha bun ki liang, namar ki nongialam Seng Trai ri ba mynta ki kham shemphang, kham tbit, kham hok bad kham don ka mynsiem shakri, ban ia ka kynhun Congress u Mukul Sangma.U Bah R.G.Lyngdoh Minister bad Vice Chancellor barim uba la long u kongsan, u kyntu ia ki samla ba kin long kiba iohi jngai haba kyrshan ia kino-kino ki seng bad ban wanrah noh ia ki jingkylla, namar ka sorkar Congress kam don ki nongialam babit bad ka sorkar ka tlot ban wanrah jingroi ha ka ri, namar ka dei ka Sorkar kaba trei matlah khlem Policy bad ba ka jur ruh shibun ka bamsap.Ka la don ka jingsngew khia ia ki jingma babun kiba ap ia ka jylla bad ia ki paidbah ha kine ki por bad ki nongkren ki la kyntu ia ki samla bad ia ki paidbah ba kin long kiba peitngor, husiar bha bad ban ieng tylli lang ha ka nongrim ban iada ia ka jylla bad ia ki paidbah da ka jingiatylli lang.Ka jingialang ka la duwai kyrpang na ka bynta arngut ki samla kiba la khlad kyndit kiba long ki nongkit kam ka UDP bad la ieng sngap jar ar minit ban duwai na ka bynta ka jingjah thait basuk kitei ki arngut ki samla, u Yosil Mawlein bad u Gary Field Basaiawmoit.
title: Lah ban long nongialap elekshon  u Bah RG Lyngdoh ia ka UDP

content: Shillong, 22 Nailur:Ka sorkar jylla ka la mynjur ban bah khlieh ia ka MeECL haduh T. 800 klur ba kan shim ram na ki bynta ki jingdonkam jongka.Ia kane la mynjur da ka kynhun Myntri mynta ka sngi.U Mukul Sangma, Myntri Rangbah, haba kren hadien ba wai ka jingialang, ula ong ba ka jingmih na ka jingkamai ka MeECL ka don shibun ka jingiapher ka jingpynlut bad kane ka tnad sam ding ka jylla, bad haba peit ia ka rukom treikam jongka, ka sorkar ka la rai ban ai biang ia ka jingkyrshan ba kan lah ban shim ram ym palat ia ka T. 8 spah kur.Katkum ka jingong u Mukul ka MeECL, ka lah ban pynmih khajna tang kumba 200 klur tam ha ka shi snem.“Ka sorkar kan bteng ban kyrshan ia ka MeECL ban bah khlieh lem haduh ka jingmang kaba T. 800 klur”, la ong u Mukul bad bynrap, ba kane ka mut ba ka MeECL ka lah ban shim ram na ki bank lyngba ka jingbah khlieh ka sorkar katkum kane ka dor ba la buh.U la ong ba ka jingbah khlieh ka sorkar ka la long haduh T. 1174 klur hynrei ka MeECL ka la lah ban pynlait noh haduh T. 595.64 klur bad namar kane, ka la ka la hiar sha ka T.800 klur.“Ka MeECL ka la pynlait noh T. 595.64 klur sha ka sorkar namar ba kam lah ban pyndonkam”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah.U la ong ba shi bynta na kane ka long kum ka jingpyrshang ka sorkar ba thaw thymmai ban pyniaid ia ka kam pisa pilain ha kane ka tnad.
title: Mynjur ka Sorkar ban bah khlieh  ia ka MeECL haduh T. 800 klur

content: Shillong, 22 Nailur:3 ngut ki MDC jong ka seng Congress ha JHADC ki la pep ha ka dorbar kyrpang mynta ka sngi. Kitei ki 3 ngut ki kynthup ia u CEM uba dang shu risaiñ u ma Thombor Shiwat bad kiwei pat ki 2 ngut ki long u Joinwell Pyrtuh bad u ma Badon Rymbai.Katei ka dorbar ba la pyniaid da u Chairman u Arborhima Darnei, ka la neh tang katto katne minit namarba ka long tang ka dorbar ban pyntip ba u CEM u la risaiñ ban pyntip sha u Lat ka jylla ba un buh sngi ia ka dorbar kyrpang ban jied CEM thymmai.Lah ban kdew ba ka seng Congress kaba bat ia ka bor synshar ha JHADC ka la thung ia u ma Andrew Shullai kum u nongialam ba thymmai jong ka ha JHADC.
title: Pep dorbar 3 ngut ki MDC Congress ka JHADC

content: Shillong, 22 Nailur:Ki lad khubor ki la pynthikna ba u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma un ym ia khun satia ar konstitwensi kumba la saphriang ki khubor ha kine ki khyndiat sngi. Ka khubor ba la ioh lum la iathuh ba u Dr.Mukul u khlem shim phom satia na Songsak ha ka jingdie phom pan tiket ka Congress. La iathuh ba u Dr.Mukul u don jingmut ban pyniakhun da u MLA barim jong katei ka konstitwensi na ka seng Congress u Tonsing N Marak.Katei ka tyllong khubor kab ala ioh lum ka la pynthikna ba u myntri rangbah un ia khun beit thik tang na Ampati konstitwensi ha kane ka elekshon MLA 2018 bad la ong ba ka jingleit tur jong u ha kine ki sngi sha Songsak ka dei ba u kwah ban pyntroiñ ia ka seng NPP kaba mihkhmat ia katei ka konstitwensi da u Nihim D Shira. Lah ban kdew ba ha ki khyndiat sngi ki khubor ki la saphriang bha ba u myntri rangbah ka jylla u DR.Mukul Sangma un ia khun ar tylli ki konstitwensi hynrei hadien ka jingdie phom tiket jong ka seng Congress la pynthikna ba u myntri rangbah u khlem shim phom, hynrei la shim phom da u Tonsing N Marak.
title: U Mukul un ia khun tang na Ampati

content: Shillong, 22 Nailur:Ka sorkar ka la pdiang ia ka kyndon ka skhim shispah sngi ne MGNREGS Act 2005 ban buria ia ki nongbylla lada kim pat ioh ia ka bai nong hadien 15 sngi ba la dep trei.“Ka jingialang kynhun myntri ka la rai ba katkum ka kyndon ka MGNREGS, ki nongbylla ki bym pat ioh ia ka bai nong hadien 15 sngi, yn buria ia ki da kaba khein na ka bai bylla ba ki dei ban ioh”, la ong u Mukul Sangma hadien ba la wai ka jingialang ka kynhun myntri.U la ong ba ka sorkar kan buria ia ki ha ka jingkhein kaba long .05 percent.“Ngi la buh khnang ia ka pisa T. 35 klur na ka bynta kane ka jingthmu lada donkam”, la ong u Mukul.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kane ka T. 35 klur ka dei ruh na ka bynta ban nang siew ia ka bai nong jong ki nongbylla lada ka sorkar pdeng ka slem ban pynlait pisa.U Mukul Sangma haba pyntip ia kane u la ong ba bunsien ki nongbylla kim ioh ia ka bainong hapoh ka 15 sngi bad lyngba kane ka jingpyntreikam ka sorkar, kin ioh ia ka jingburia nalor ka bainong lada slem ban siew ia ki.Ki don kumba 4 lak ngut ki briew ba don job card ha jylla baroh.
title: Kiba khlem ioh bylla hadien  15 sngi, yn buria ka sorkar

content: Shillong, 14 Nailur:Ka Joint Action Committee South Lyngngam Border Area (JACSLBA), ka sngew lyngngoh tyngeh, ba U Bah Airmarshal Diengngan, uba don tang 11 sngi ha ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP), ba ula pynbna ba un iakhun ia ka elekshon MLA 2018,wat hadien ba ula shah kyntait ia ka tiket, ha ka seng UDP; hadien ba la tyrwa ia ka tiket sha U bah Pious Marwein, ba un iakhun na ka Ranikor Constituency.Na ka liang jong ka komiti, ka kren shai, ba kan kyrshan ha kane ka kynti ia U Bah Marwei, uba dei u kandidet jong ka seng UDP, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah WG Dkhar bad U bah C Nongbri Secretery ka JAC South Lyngngam Border Area, kumba ki la ia rai ha ka jingialang paidbah kaba la long ha ka 26tarik Nailar 2017.
title: U Airmarshal, tang 11 sngi ha UDP

content: Shillong, 14 Nailur:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ki seng sain pyrthei ki dei ban kiar na kaba pynlong kam sain hima sima ia ka kam iakajia pud bad ka Assam namar ba katba nang ialeh politik, kan nang pynjynjar pynban ia ki paidbah ba sah ha ki thain khappud.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, u Dr Mukul u la ong,“Kam don ka daw ban ialeh ne pynlong kam sain hima sima ia ka kam khappud bad ka Assam. Lada ngi pynlong kum ka kam politik, ka jingjynjar kaba kham jur kan long ia ki paidbah bapli ba sah ha khappud bad ka Assam”.U la ong ba ka jingkynnoh ka Assam ba kyntur pud ka Meghalaya ka long ka bym iahap bad kumjuh ruh ban iakynnoh mar kylliang, kan nym poi shano shano ruh hynrei ka donkam ban iakren iasyllok ban poi sha ka lynti ka jingiabeit mar kylliang.“Kum kata ka jingkynnoh bad ka jingpyni nia mar kylliang kan nym bha ha ka thai mihngi. Ngi la bat ia ka kular ba ia kane ka kam iaknieh jaka khappud, kaba bha tam ka long ban iakren ha miej markhmat namar ba ngi la iohi ia ka jingjynjar ba ki paidbah ba sah ha khappud katno ki shem jynjar”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah.U la ong ba na ka liang ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la dep rai ban rah ia kane ka kam sha ka sorkar pdeng ban iapynbeit hynrei na ka liang ka Assam ka la kyntait bad kam pdiang.“Ngi la dep iakren bunsien bad ka Assam naduh ka kyrdan u Myntri Rangbah haduh ka kyrdan jong u Chief Secretary bad ka dei ka bynta jong ka Assam ban pyni ia ka jinglong rangbah bad ka jingkut jingmut ban iapynbeit ia kane ka kam”, u la ong.U la ong ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la dep phah ia ki dulir jingpynshisha ia ki jaka ba ka kam hynrei na ka liang ka Assam ka la pan por shi pan por haduh mynta.“Ngi la dep pynbit pynbiang ia ki sakhi satar ban pynshisha ia ki jaka ba ngi kam hynrei ki (Assam) ki pan por bad ki pan por biang ba ki dang donkam ban pynbeit ia kane ka kam”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba kaba kongsan ka long ba ki ar tylli ki jylla, kata ka Assam bad ka Meghalaya ki dei ban iakren markhmat ban iapynbeit ia kane ka kam kaba sahteng slem bah haduh mynta mynne.
title: Wat pynlong politik ia ka kam  khappud, ong u Dr Mukul

content: Nongpoh, 14 Nailur:Da kaba pyrshah halor ka jingpynduh kynsan ia ka Umroi Block Congress Committee, ki nongialam ba ha khmat ka Umroi Assembly Youth Congress, hapoh ka jingialam u samla P.P Rynghang kum u President lem bad kiwei ki nongialam mynta ka sngi ki la pyndkut noh ialade na ka jinglong kum ki dkhot ka seng Congress, da kaba mih noh ialade na ban long kum ki nongialam bad ki dkhot hapoh ka Umroi Assembly Youth Congress.Haba pyntip sha ki nongthohkhubor, u President ka Umroi Assembly Youth Congress, u samla P.P Rynghang, u la ong ba ka daw hi kaba la pynlong ia ki samla ban mih noh na ka jinglong kum ki nongialam bad dkhot ka seng Congress, ka dei halor ka nongrim ba ki pyrshah jur halor ka rukom treikam ka Ri Bhoi District Congress Committee.U la ong ruh ba kum ka Youth Congress, ki la trei shitom ha kane ka Ilekshon kaba la dep bad ha kajuh ruh ka por ki la lah ban pynjop don burom ia u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, ha kaba ka seng, ka la nangkhlain nangkhlain katba nangmih ki sngi bad khamtam eh haba iadei bad kka jingpynkhreh ha kane ka Ilekshon 2018, hynrei tang namar ka jinglehdonbor ka Ri Bhoi District Congress Committee ban pynduh jubor ia ka Umroi Block Congress Committee ha ka jingialam u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, MLA ka Umroi kum u President, kan ktah shikatdei eh ia ka seng, ha ka jingpynkhreh ha kane ka Ilekshon 2018.Ka jingpynduh noh ia ka Umroi Block Congress Committee, ka dei kawei na ka daw bah ba kum ki nongialam ka Youth ki pyrshah bad ki la shim ruh ka rai ban iehnoh kam noh na ka kam nongialam ka Youth Congress kaba dei halor ka nongrim ba ka Party Congress ka la shu leh donbor bad khlem da sngaplang ia ka sur jong ki nongialam ka party, la ong u P.P Rynghang.Kumta ia mynta kum ki nongialam ka Youth Congress, kim don bynta ei ei shuh ha ka party Congress bad ia ka rai kaba kin pyniasoh noh sha kiwei pat ki party kin sa shim rai kham hadien, u la bynrap.
title: Mih ki heh Congress na Umroi

content: Shillong, 14 Nailur:U MP ka Congress na Shillong u Bah Vincent H Pala u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong ki katto katne ngut ki MLA ban mih noh na ka party lehse namar ba ki iohi ba ka party kan nym wan shuh ha ka bor ha ka elekshon ban wan hynrei ym lah ban tip ba ka jingmut dur jongki, ka lah ban nym urlong.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, u Bah Pala u la ong ba ka jingkynrum kynram ha ka seng, kam dei kaba thymmai hynrei mynta ka kham jur namar ba ki MLA ba kham rim ki la mih na ka seng, kum jong u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u Bah Sniawbalang Dhar, wat u Bah Ngaitlang Dhar bad u Bah Rowel Lyngdoh.“Ka kynrum kynram ka dei ka bynta ka politik bad man ka por ka ju don hynrei mynta ka kham jur namar ba ka BJP ka don ha ka bor ha Delhi. Ki mih ym ba isih Congress hynrei ki mutdur ba ka BJP kaba don ha ka bor ha Delhi kan sa don ha ka bor ha kane ka jylla ruh”, la ong u Bah Pala.U la ong ba kine ki MLA ka party ki sngew ba ban leh politik khlem ka bor kim lah ban leh eiei bad na kata ka daw ki sa mih noh bad ym lah ban pynrem iano iano hynrei ka shong ka jingstad jongki.“Hynrei ki don kiba lah ban shong khlem ka bor, ki don ki bym lah”, la ong u Bah Pala.U la ong ruh ba ka jingpyndam ia ki 7 tylli ki Block Congress ka dei ka jingstad bad ka jingshemphang jong u President ka MPCC u Bah DD Lapang uba la don ha ka sain pyrthei palat ia ka sanphew snem.“Ban iada ia ka jingthmu ban pynsniew dur ia ka party bad kum ka pary kam lah ban shu sngap ban shu peit ia kaei kaba ki thmu ban pynsniew namar ba u Bah Lapang uba la shemphang la sanphew snem tam, kaei kaei kaba u leh u la tip bad da thew”, la ong u Bah Pala bad bynrap, “ka dei ka bynta jong ka jingtreikam jongki (MPCC), kam dei eiei kaba bakla”.U Bah Pala ula kam ruh ba u la don ka jingtip ba kin sa mih bad u la iakren ruh ia u Bah Lapang halor kane ka bynta ba dei ban leh eiei ym ban ap haduh ban kin da mih ioh kan nang sniew shuh shuh.“Nga ruh nga la tip hi ba kin sa mih bad nga la kren ruh ia u Bah Lapang bad ban ia kaba ap haduh ba kin da mih, ka bha ba leh noh mynta namar ba maki ruh ki pyrkhat hi, namar ba lada nga smat, kiwei ki lah ban kham smat”, u la ong.U la kyntait ba ka dei ka bor jong ka BJP ban pynpait ia ka BJP hynrei u la og ba ka dei ka jingpyrkhat jongki ba kin don ha ka Congress kan nym wan shuh ha ka bor.“Kam dei ka bor BJP hynrei ka dei ka jingpyrkhat ba ka Congress kam nym wan ha ka bor bad ngam tharai ka jingmut jongki kan urlong ne em”, u la ong.Haba twad jingmut la ka Congress kan wan biang ne em ha ka bor ha ka elekshon ban wan, u Bah Pala u la ong ba ka por ka dang kloi than ban kren ia kane namar ba wat tang ia ki kyrtong ruh ka party kam pynbna satia.
title: “Ki mutdur ba ka Congress  kan nym wan shuh ha ka bor”

content: Shillong, 08 Nailur:Ban kyntiew ia ka mynsiem iakop ban leh bha hapdeng ki skul, ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ka la pyntreikam ia ka kyndon ba naduh ka samoi 2018, kan sa mait naphang ban nym ithuh shuh ia kino kino ki skul ki bym lah ban pass ia ka eksamin matrik ne Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC).Kane ka sienjam ba ka Board ka la shim ka long ban pynlong ia ki skul ba kin trei shitom ban pynthikna ba ka jingpass percentage kam dei ban duna ia kaba la buh lada ki dang kwah ban ioh ia ka jingithuh.U Joint Director ka Board u Bah M Marbaniang haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u la ong ba kane ka sien jam ba la shim ka long hadien ba ka Board ka la lap ba don bun ki skul ki bym shym la lah ban pynpass ia ki khynnah sha ka 50 percent haduh lai ne saw snem ruh katba ka tulop ki ioh kaba heh na ka sorkar.“Ngi don kumba 566 tylli ki skul ba la pyniasoh (affiliated) bad ka MBoSE na ki kumba 2000 tam ha ka jylla bad na kine, ki don kumba 60 tylli kiba tlot bha ki bym lah ban kot sha ka 50 percent”, la ong u Bah Marbaniang.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Marbaniang, ka jingbuh kyndon ka Board ka long ban pynthikna ba ki skul ki dei ban trei shitom ban leh bha ban pynlah ban pynpass bha ia ki khynnah bad kane ka long shi bynta ban wanrah ia ka pule pule kaba bha ha ka jylla.Shisien ba ki la shah pynduh noh ia ka jingithuh, kin sa kylla skul private noh bad bad ki adhoc grant na ka sorkar ruh ki lah ban nym ioh shuh, la ong u Bah Marbaniang.“Kane ka kyndon kan treikam naduh ka samoi eksamin 2018”, la bynrap u Joint Director ka Board bad bynrap, ‘lada ki lah ban leh bha biang, kam don jingeh ia ka Board ban ai ka jingithuh biang’.Ha kawei ka liang, u President ka Khasi Jaintia Deficit School Teachers Association bad u chairman ka JACATAM u Bah ED Nongsiang u la ong ba ka seng ka pdiang bad iahap bha ia kane ka kyndon ba la wanrah ka MBoSE ban pynkiew ia ka pule puthi ha ka jylla.“Ha ngi, ka biang bha kane ka jingleh ka MBoSE namar ba kito ki skul kim lah ban leh bha ym tang shisien hynrei la bun sien”, la ong u Bah Nongsiang.U la ong ba ka jingai daw ba kan ktah sha nongkyndong kam da shongnia than namar ba ki skul kiba la ioh jingithuh na ka Board kila ioh ia ka tulop kaba biang na ka sorkar bad ki nonghikai kim dei ban leh sting.“Ki don ki skul ki bym pass bha hynrei ki ioh ki jingmyntoi baroh kumba ioh kiwei ruh bad kane kan pynkyndit ia ki ban lehbha”, la ong u Bah Nongsiang.Katkum ka jingong u President ka KJDSTA ka dei ka sienjam ban kyntiew ia ka pule puthi ha ka jylla namar ba bunsien ha nongkyndong ki nonghikai ki lah ban leh sting tang namar ba ioh tulop kaba biang na ka sorkar. “Ka dei ka thong jong ngi ki nonghikai ban pynlong ia ka pule puthi kaba bha”, u la ong.Kumjuh u Publicity secretary ka KJDSTA u Babu Kular Khongjirem u la ong ba ka long kaba bha eh namar ba ka seng ka la dep ai jingmut ruh sha ka sorkar lyngba ka 5th Pay Commission ba ia kito ki skul bym pat ioh deficit lada ki leh bha, ka dei ban pynrung ha ka deficit“Ki skul ki dei ban don ka jingiakop khnang ban kyntiewia ka pule puthi”, la ong u Babu Khongjirem.Katkum ka jingtip,kiba bun ki skul ki bym kot ia kane ka percetage ki dei na rilum Garo bad katto katne ha Khasi Hills.Lah ban kdew ba ka MBoSE ka bthah ïa baroh ki skul kiba pynïasnoh bad kiba la ïoh jingithuh na ka Board katkum Affiliation Chapter iv.2i, ki dei ban pynneh ïa ka Average Pass Percentage kaba long 50% ha baroh ki eksamin ba la pynlong da ka Board.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Pravin Bakshi, Executive Chairman ka MBoSE, u la ong, Executive Chairman ka Meghalaya Board of School Education u la ong ha kine ki lai snem ba ladep katkum ka rekod jong ka eksamin SSLC bad HSSLC ka la pyni bun tylli ki skul kim shym la lah ban kot ïa kane ka kyndon ba la bthah da ka Board.Ka Board, kaba la shimkhia bha halor kane, namarkata, ka la maham tyngeh ïa kum kine ki skul ba ki dei ban kot ïa kane ka pass percentage ha ki snem ban sa wan, hynrei lym kumta ka Board kan shim da ka rai kaba tyngeh katkum ka kyndon (Regulations) kaba lah ban poi wat haduh u pud ban pynduh noh ïa ka jingai jingithuh (de-affiliation) lada long kaba idonkam.
title: Ki skul bym lah ia ka 50 percent  ha ka SSLC, kin kylla private biang

content: Shillong, 8 Nailur:“Wat kren ha ka kyrteng ka Federation” dumok U Chief Executive Member ka Khasi District Council, ia U bah John Kharshiing mynta ka sngi, ha ka jingialang kaba long ha ka Conference Room jong ka Khasi District Council bad ula ong shuh “Ban kren ia ka FKS, ki dei ban long tang ki Syiem, ki Lyngdoh”.Ha ka jingiakren bad u Rupang, U Bah John F Kharshiing, uba dei U Chairman ka Dorbar ki khlieh nongsynshar, ula iathuh ba u leit sha katei ka dorbar, kum u dkhot jong ka Meghalaya Indigenous Tribal Constitutional Rights Movement (MITCRM), ha kaba ka Federation of Khasi States ruh, ka don lang ha katei ka Movement bad ba na ka liang katei ka kynhun, ki la pynkhreh ia ki jingthoh, kiba iadei bad ka mat kaba dei halor ka jing pynkylla ia ka Sixth Schedule. Haba kylli, la u sngew kumno, halor katei ka jing shah khanglad ha U Bah PN Syiem, U bah John, u ong “Nga la sngew kum ban mih noh, hynrei, namar nga sngew burom ia kiwei pat kiba ia wan lang, kumta nga shong la ka shnong” bad u ong biang “Shwa ban kut ruh nga ban biang. Haba kren jingshisha don kiba…..”.Ha ka kyrwoh, kaba la phah da U bah Kharshiing, u ong ba katei ka jingjia, ka long kaba khlem poi pyrkhat bad kaba sngewsih”.U Bah John, u iathuh ba ha katei ka jingialang, ula ien gban kren halor ka dorkhas, ba ka District kam shym la jubab, halor ka shithi, kaba ki la pan jingshai halor ka Instrument of Accession bad ka Annexement Agreement lane ka IOA & AA, kaba la phah da ka sorkar India, sha ka Federation of Khasi State, ha U Naitung 2012 bad kaba ki la phah sha KHADC, naduh ka 3tarik Nailar 2012.U bah John, u ong shuh shuh “Ngi la pynpaw ka jingbym sngew iahap ia ka jingong u CEM, haba u la ong ba ka Sixth Schedule ka mih ha ka nongrim IOA & AA, namar ka bakla jur” bad u ong ba ka IOA &AA ka dei kaba kham khlain kyndon namar ka plie lad ia ka Assembly ki Hima Khasi States bad ka khang ia ki Ain Ri India ban rung bad trei katba mom, bad ha ka Assembly ki Hima Khasi State ki nongmihkhmat ki mih na ka bynta ki Hima, katkum u pud Hima Khasi States, katba ha ka kyrdan Sixth Schedule la mih ki MDC na ka bynta ki Party, kumta ym lah ban ia pynryngkat kyrdan.
title: Wat kren ha kyrteng ka Federation,  dumok U CEM ia U bah John “Dei ban kren tang ki Syiem, ki Lyngdoh”

content: Shillong, 8 Nailur:Ki bos saw khmut, ki la sdang ban kamai kit briew na Nongstoin sha Shillong bad kit lynti ter ter namar. Kitei ki bos saw (SPTS), ki la sdang ban kamai naduh ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka bos kaba don ia u number ML01-7388 kan mih na Shillong ban leit sha Nongstoin man ka sngi ha ka por 8 baje mynstep bad ka jaka ieng ka dei na ka jaka ieng bos jong ka MUDA Iew Mawlong. Kane ka juh ka bos kan sa mih biang na Nongstoin sha Shillong ha ka por 3 baje janmiet na ka jaka ieng kali kaba don hajan ka Skul Anderson, Nongstoin.Kawei pat ka bos kaba don ia u number ML01-7374 kan mih na Nongstoin man ka sngi ha ka por 6.45 baje mynstep na ka jaka ieng kali kaba don ha Nonbah, Nongstoin. Kane ka juh ka bos kan leit phai biang sha Nongstoin na Shillong ha ka por 3 baje janmiet na ka jaka ieng kali stand Sohra Iew Mawlong bad kan sdang ieng ha kane ka jaka naduh ka por 1 baje nohphai sngi tad haduh ka por ban mih 3 baje janmiet. Na ka bynta ka jingtip ba kham bniah lah ban phone ha kine ki number 9862510050/9863787717.
title: Ki bos saw sha Nongstoin

content: Shillong, 8nailar:Ka UDP Democratic Party State Youth Wing ka la ia kynduh ia u Executive Engineer jong ka Grater Shillong Water Supply ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai ha ophis treikam jong u bad ki la ai jingthoh ban ia kren halor ka jinglong ka um ba la sam sha manla ki ing briew ha sor Shillong kiba hap hapoh ka GSWS ki bym long satia ban dih khamtam ha ka por slap.Ha katei ka jingiakyn-duh bad ki ophisar jong ka GSWS bad u Joint Secretary ka UDP Youth Wing la kular ha ki ba katei ka tnad kan shimkhia halor katei ka jingeh kham kloi.
title: Ka um dih ha sor Shillong kaba jaboh

content: Shillong, 10 Nailur:Ka Hima Khyrim kan sa ai jingthoh sha ka sorkar jylla, lyngba ka tnad kam jngohkai ba kan pyrkhat na ka bynta ban pynbna kum ka shuti ka jylla ne state holiday ia ka shad Pom Blang ka Hima Khyrim.Mynta ka sngi, u Syiem ka Hima u Dr Balajied Sing Syiem u la pdiang ia ka kaiphod lum jingtip ba la leh da ki khynnah skul ka Smit Higher Secondary School ba la aiti da u chairman ka Grand Council of Chiefs of Meghalaya ba ialam u Bah John F Kharshiing ha ka jingialang kaba long ha Smit.Kane ka kaiphod ka dei kaba la leh bad lum tang ha ka sngi shad Pom Blang naduh 10 baje mynstep haduh 7 baje janmiet ha ka 8 tarik Nohprah, da ki khynnah klas IX, X, XI bad XII lyngba ka jingphah ka Hima Khyrim, ban buh jingthoh ia ki briew kiba wan ban sakhi sha ka Shad Pomblang ka Hima Khyrim mynshem snem. La iarap lang ruh da ki dkhot ki nongkitkam shnong, ki dkhot ka Grand Council of Chief of Meghalaya, ka Society for promotion of Indigenous Knowledge and Practices (SPIKAP) ha ki san tylli ki jaka ba la buh ban rung sha madan shad.Wat la ka dei tang ka jingsdang, hynrei ka jingmut jongka, ka long ban ioh jingkhein ia ki briew kiba la wan nabar bad na kane ka ri ban sakhi ia kane ka shad pomblang.Katkum ka jingkhein kyllum, ki don kumba 50 hajar ngut kiba la wan ban sakhi ha kane ka shad ha u snem ba la dep bad kiba la ioh ban rejister ia ki kyrteng ki don 3939 ngut kynthup na ki briew kiba wan nabar jylla bad na bar ri. Na kine, 1470 ki dei ki khynnah skul, bad 100 ngut ki dei ki jaitbynriew bym dei riewlum.Katkum ka ripot ki don 36 ngut ki briew ba wan nabar jylla ban sakhi ia kane ka shad bad ki don kumba 250 tylli kiba la wan ban iashim bynta ha ka shad.Kane ka jingthmu ka jinglum jingtip ka long ban buh jingkynmaw ha kaba ka Hima kan sa leit ai pat sha ka sorkar jylla ba kan pynlong ne pynbna ia ka Shad Pomblang kum ka Shuti ka Jylla ym shuh tang ka shuti ki district.U Bah John u la ong ba na ka ripot, ki don ki briew na ki 6 tylli ki district kiba wan ban sakhi ia kane ka shad kynthup na Garo Hills ruh bad ka rekod ka long ban kyrpad ia ka sorkar ba kan shim ba ka shad Pomblang ka dei ban pynbna noh kum ka shuti paidbah ha ka jylla, ym shuh tang ka shuti jong ki district. U la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban thoh sha ka sorkar India ba ka dei ban ai Visa noh wut wut ia ki briew nabar ri mar ia poi ha jaka kad liengsuin kiba kwah ban wan sha ka shad pomblang.Ha kane ka sngi la iadonlang ruh ka Principal ka Smit Higher Secondary School, bad ki khynnah skul jong ka.
title: Kwah shuti jylla, ka Hima Khyrim  ha ka sngi Shad Pomblang

content: Shillong, 10 Nailur:Ka MLA na Williamnagar konstitwensi kaba dei ruh ka myntri sorkar ka Deborah C Marak ka la ong ba la jied MP ia u Conrad K Sangma da ka jingsngew synei ha kato ka por namar ba u dang shu iap u kpa jong u, u Purno A Sangma hynrei ka la ong ba mynta katei ka mynsiem sngew synei ka la kut noh. “Ngi jied ia u MP da ka jingsngew synei, hynrei katei ka jingsngew synei mynta ka la kut” ong ka Deborah Marak ha ka jingialang jong katei ka seng ha Williamnagar.Ka Deborah ka la ong ba haduh mynta ki paidbah ka ri Lum Garo kim pat iohi ia kiwei pat ki Party kiba khlaiñ ha ka rukom treikam lait noh na ka seng Congress. Yn ym don jaka ia ka BJP ha ri Lum Garo, kam dei ka Party kaba pyrkhat ia ki rit paid kum ngi la ka long ha ka niam ne ha kiwei pat ki rukom, ngi la khlaiñ bor naduh ka por jong u Late Capt William Sangma haduh mynta ruh” ka la ong. Ka Deborah ka la ong ba ka BJP ka dei ka paralok jong ka NPP, “Ka long kaba sniewbok ban iohi ba ka NPP ka dei ka paralok jong ka NPP bad ka hap ban shu peitkai ia ka jingshah lehbeiñ ki rit paid” ka la ong biang.Ka Deborah ka la ong ruh ba ka seng BJP kan ialap elekshon shen ha ri Lum Garo bad ka lah ruh ban wanrah da u myntri rangbah duh ka Ri u Narendra Modi ban pynbiej ia u paidbah da kaba kynnoh ia ka seng Congress bun jait bad kin wan ruh ban kular da kaba kin ong ba kin phah da ki klur tyngka ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi ha kane ka jylla, “Hynrei peit ia ki paidbah ka Assam ki lynniar mynta bad kim iohi ia kita ki jingkular elekshon ka BJP, ki ju kynmaw beit ia ka por myntri rangbah duh u Manmohan Singh” ong biang ka Deborah.Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ka East Garo Hills District Youth Congress ka la pynlong ia ka District Youth Convention ha Williamnagar bad ia katei ka jingialang la pyniaid da u Alphonse R Marak-Vice President, la donlang u Richard Marak, President, MPYC, u Sengbath Marak, President DCC, East Garo Hills, u Andriano Marak, President, West Garo Hills DYC bad kiwei pat.
title: “Ngi jied ia U MP da ka jingsngew  synei, ka jingsngew synei ka la kut”

content: Shillong, 10 Nailur:U Bah John F Kharshiing u la pynkhreh ban pan tiket na ka Congress na Nongkrem ha kane ka elekshon ban wan.U Bah John uba la ialeh teng na UDP ha u snem 1998, u la rai ban iakhun mynta ha kane ka kynti na ka Congress.Haba pynthikna ia kane, u Bah John, u la ong ba un sa aplai ia ka tiket na ka party ha kine ki sngi shwa ban kut ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai, ba la buh ban pynpoi ia baroh ki kyrtong ba kwah ban pynpoi ia ki aplikeshon jongki.“Ngan pan tiket na ka party ha kane ka kynti bad ngan sa leit ban submit shwa ban kut ka 15 tarik kumba la buh por ka party”, la ong u Bah John haba kren ha kane ka sngi Saitjain.Katkum ka jingtip, ki don kiwei kiba thmu ban pan tiket na ka Congress na Nongkrem kynthup u Bah Lambor Malngiang uba la long MLA teng bad u Bah Lambor Nongrum.Haba twad jingmut na ka liang u Bah John, u la ong ba u Bah Lambor Nongrum u lah ban nym iakhun bad ban shu kyrshan ia u kyrtong ba ai tiket ka party hynrei ia u Bah Lambor Malngiang ym lah ban tip.Ha Nongkrem kat haduh mynta, kiba la paw kyrteng ban iakhun ki kynthup ia ki CEM barim ar ngut, u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit uba long u MLA ba mynta bad u Bah HS Shylla uba dei u MDC ba mynta.Ka Jingiakhun na Nongkrem kan long kaba kham satar bha namar ba ki nongialeh baroh ki dei kiba satar ha ka jingiakawang uwei ia uwei pat.
title: Yn iakhun u Bah John, pyrshah  ia 2 ki CEM barim na Nongkrem

content: Shillong, 10 Nailur:Ka Pynursla Block Congress Committee (PBCC) ba thymmai hapoh ka jingialam U bah Hanbor Khongtani, President jongka ryngkat bad kiwei de ki dkhot jong ka komiti, ki pynshai ba ka jing pynwai ia ka Committee barim, ka dei tang ia kito ki dkhot, kiba don ha ka Block, ym ia ki Primary Member lane ki Unit bad ka Youth Congress Committee. Ka P.B.C.C ba thymmai ka wad ka kyntu ia ki Primary Unit, Youth Wing, Women Wing (Mahila), jong ka Seng, ba kin don ha syndah jong ka P.B.C.C ba thymmai khnang ba ka kam jong ka seng, kan long ka ba iaid beit shakhmat. La kyrpad shuh shuh ia ki nongkyrshan jong ka seng, ba kin iai don ryngkat bad ka P.B.C.C bathymmai khnang ban iohi ia ki jingkylla. La ong ruh“Lada phi kwah ban ioh ia ka jingshai sngewbha ia kynduh ia u President ba thymmai ka P.B.C.C lane phone ha une u number, 7641020702”.
title: Pynwai tang ia ka Pynursla Block, ong U President

content: Shillong, 10 Nailur:Ka kynhun jong ki seng bapher jong ka thain shatei lam mihngi, ka dawa na ka sorkar India, ban pynkiew noh ia ka jingbun ki dkhot sha Lok Sabbha, na ka 2ngut sha ka 5ngut bad 35 sha ka 60ngut ha ka dong shatei lam mihngi.Ka ANVC, ha ka jingkren jongka, ka pynsngew ia ka jingma, na ka jingtyllep jong ki khar Muslim sha Garo Hills, kaba long ka jingma kaba khraw ia ki briew jong katei ka thain.Kitei ki mat jingiakren, ki long ha ka 6 bad 7tarik Nailur 2017, ha ka jingialang ba la pynbeit da ka North East Indiginous People’s Forum (NEIPF) ha Assam(Guwahati); ha kaba la shim bynta da ka FKJGP Central Body bad kiwei de ki seng, kiba kynthup ia ka ULFA, NSCN(IM), ANVC, DHD, ENPO bad kiwei de ki seng na kylleng ki dong shatei lam mihngi.Ha kane ka jingialang ki mat ba kong san ki long beit ban iada ia ki jaitbynriew Rilum na ki daw ki ba lah ban wanrah jingeh bad jingma ia ka jinglong kyrpang jong ki. Lah ioh ruh bun ki jingkren na ki babun ki briew ki ba wan na kiwei ki states kum na Tripura, Manipur, Arunachal bad Assam etc haka ba ki la bynniaw ia ka jingduh jait noh jong ki hala ki jong ki jaka bad ka jingshah thombor ki Trai Ri Trai Muluk da ki ain iakjakor(Draconian Laws) kiba ka sorkar India ka la pyntrei kam ha kine ki jaka kum ka AFSPA bad kiwei kiwei.Ka seng FKJGP haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi ka la pynpaw ia ki juh ki jingeh ba ka ri ka mad kum ka jingtuid ki bar jylla bad ki jingeh kiba iadei bad u pud u sam. Ka seng ka lah dawa ruh na ka Government of India(GOI) ba kan ai jingithuh kyrpang(Special Status) ia ki North East States bad ruh ban pynkiew noh ia ki seat MP na ka 35 seat sha ka 60 seat, ka ban kynthup ia ka Meghalaya na ka 2 seat sha ka 5 seat khnang ba ki jingeh jong ki jylla lammihngi kan kham ioh sur sawa ha Parliament. Ha kane ka sngi lah pynmih ruh ia ka rai jong ka NEIPF haka ba ka jingwanrah haka juh ka lympung ia baroh ki Indigenous and Ethnic people sha ka juh ka lawei bad lah pynpaw ruh ha kane ka rai, ia ki jingma ba ki jaitbynriew riewlum ki mad khamtam na ka jingtuid ki bar Jylla, kaba lah ban pynduh jait syndon ia ki.Na ka liang ki nongkren na ka Assam(ULFA) ki la dawa ia ka Land Transfer Act ha kane ka jingialang ba ka sorkar Assam ka dei ban pyntrei kam noh mardor ia kane ka act haka jylla Assam. Na ka liang u nongkren ka NSCN(IM)u General VS Atem u la pynpaw ia ka jingbitar ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ki ain kiba triem, kum ka AFSPA lah bun bun snem ha kaba ki dkhot ki jong ka ki lah shah pyniap ha ka jingialeh ban iada ia ka ri Naga na ka jing bat bor jong ki shipai ia ki khynnah khyllung, longkmie bad kum juh ruh ia ka jingleh donbor ban iuh roit ia ki hok longtrai jong ki paid naga. Na ka liang ka Tripura haba ai jingkren bad ryngkat ki jingjaw ummat na ka longkmie ka la iathuh ba ha jylla Tripura ki trai ri trai mluk ki don satang 19% ha jylla Tripura bad na ka liang ki nongkren Arunachal Pradesh ki lah pynrem jur ia ka sorkar ha kaba iadei ban shna ia ki project jong ki Mega dam namar ka lah shu knieh lyndet ia ki jaka ki khyndew jong ki trai ri trai mluk. Ki nongkren jong ka ANVC ba mih khmat da u chairman, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingbitar ia ka jing shah tyllep jong ki trai ri trai mluk haki paid Bangladeshi Muslim kiba wan na Assam bad Bangladesh bad bun ki jaka ha ri lum Garo Hills lah jyllei daki barjylla, bad ka seng kan dang iakhun ia kine ki jingeh.Ka Seng FKJGP ka pynbna ba kan pdiang sngewbha ia ka jingialang jong ka NEIPF ka ban long ha ka nong bah Shillong ha ka 20tarik Nailur 2017, ha kaba baroh ki nongialam jong ki seng kiba kynthup naka ULFA, NSCN(IM), ANVC, DHD, ANPO bad ryngkat kiwei ki jylla jong ka thain shatei lam mihngi, kin poi ha kane ka jingialang.
title: 5 na Meghalaya & 60ngut  na ka Dong Shatei Mihngi

content: Jowai, 10 Nailur:Ka Rilum Jaintia ka don ha ka jingma ha kaba iadei bad ki jaka puta, namar kadei ka jaka ka hap hapoh ka British Territory katkum ka Notification 1982 la ong u bah PN Syiem, CEM ka KHADC haba kren ha ka jingialang kaba la long myn ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ha Tpep Pale Hall, Jowai.Utei u nongialam ka PDF, u la ong ba hadien bala ioh laitluid ha u snem 1947, baroh ki jaka ka sorkar Bilat lane British Territory ki la shah pynduh noh bad hadien ka jingwan ka Sixth Scheduled la ai ia ka hok long trai sha ki paidbah.“Hangne ha Ri Khasi Jaintia ki don ar jait ki khyndew kawei ka dei ka kaba ki ong 25 Khasi State bad kawei pat ka British Territory ne ki khyndew sorkar, hynrei kaba sngewsih pat ka long ba ngi ioh ia ka jingpynbna kaba wan na ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner East Khasi Hills District, kaba la pynmih haka 18 tarik Kyllalyngkot 1982 kaba ong ba ka KHADC kam lah shuh ban ai pata khyndew sha ki paidbah namar ka Elaka Saitsohpen ka hap haka British Territory ne ka jaka kaba la shim da ka sorkar Phareng na u Syiem Hima Sohra bad kane ka juh kan jia ha Jaintia Hills namar ka Jaintia Hills ka hap ha poh ka British Territory”, la batai u bah Syiem.Ula ong balei ki MLA na Jaiñtia ki sngap jar jar ia kane ka jingpynbna 1982 kaba buh ia ka jingma iaki paid ka ri Jaiñtia.Ula dawa ba ka katei ka jingpynbna dei ban pynduh pyndam noh shi syndon khnang ba kan um long maw jynthuh iaki pateng ban wan.Ha katei ka sngi u bah PN. Syiem ula batai ruh iaka Six Schedule kaba ailad ia ka jaitbynriew lyngba ki District Council ba kin shna ia ki ain bapher bapher naduh ka ban pynneh pynsah ia ki riti ki dustur, la ha ka jinglong trai ia ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka Synshar ka Khaddar ne ha kiwei kiwei pat ki kam ki ban iada na ka jingktah jong ki ain ka Sorkar India ia ka jaitbynriew ba kyrpang jong ngi.
title: Na ka ain 1982, ap jingma ia  ka Rilum Jaintia: PN Syiem

content: Shillong, 11 Nailur:La dawa ban pyn-dam noh ia ka Akhil Bha-ratiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP), na Kiang Nangbah Govt College, namar ba ka ain jong ka kolej, kam shah ban don kino kino ki kynhun, lait noh ka Kiang Nangbah Govt College Students Union (KNGCSU), ong ka kyrwoh, ba la pynmih mynta ka sngi, da U bah Justice Paul Lyngdoh u ba long ruh kum u General Secretary barim jong ka Kiang Nangbah Govt College Students Union (KNGCSU).
title: Dawa pyndam ia ka ABVP na Kiang Nangbah

content: Shillong, 11 Nailur:U President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) u Bah DD Lapang, ula ong ba ka jingpynduh ia ki san tylli ki Block Congress, ka dei halor ka nongrim ba la ioh ia ki sakhi kiba biang ba ki nongialam ki thmu ban pyntlot ia ka party.“Ka jingpyndam ia ki Block Congress ka dei namar ba ngi kwah ban pynkhlain ia ki unit baroh, ngim wad daw iano iano ruh.Ka dei ka kam iing ka MPCC”, la ong u Bah Lapang bad u la bynrap, “Ia kiwei ruh ngi leh kumta hi te, ym tang ia ka Pynursla, ki briew jongki hi ki wan ki ai ia ka report,ia ka Mairang, Mawkyrwat, Nartiang ruh ngi leh kumta baroh”.Hynniew tylli ki Block Congress kynthup ka Pynursla, Mairang, Mawthadraishan, Mawkyrwat, Mawshynrut, Umroi bad ka Nartiang la shah pyndam bad la bynshet pat da ki nongpeit.Ka Pynursla, ka Mawkyrwat, Nartiang bad ka Umroi ki dei ki konstitwensi ba don ki MLA kynthup Bah Prestone Tynsong, Bah Rowel Lyngdoh, Sniawbhalang Dhar, bad u Bah Ngaitlang Dhar.Haba kylli la kan ktah ne em ia ka party da ka jingpyndam noh ia ki Block Congress, khamtam ha ki jaka ba don ki MLA, u Bah Lapang ula ong, “Kan nym ktah ia ka party ha ka elekshon namar ba ngi mut ban pynbha te, kan ktah kumno haba ngi pynbha”.U la ong biamg, “Namar ba ki BCC kim treikam, ngi pynkylla noh ba kan treikam. Ban ong ba kan ktah ia ka party ha ka elekshon, kam dei namar ba kata ka shong ha u paidbah bad sa peit ha ka elekshon lehse kan kham bha pynban namar ba ngi mut ia kaba bha te. Ngim dei ki nongpeit khlur ban iathuh lypa ia kaei kaban mih. Kiwei haba ym bit ia ka met lajong te ki ong kaba sniew”.Haba kylli ha kano ka rukom ba ka MPCC ka pyndam ia ki Block khlem kynjoh ktien eiei, u Bah Lapang ula ong, “Hato bym don disciplie ma ki (Pynursla Block Congress) ne ym don discipline ka MPCC ne, ki dei ban kylli shwa na ki, ym ba leh ma ngi ka MPCC hynrei dei ba wan ki briew jongki kiba la report sha ka MPCC bad katkum ka report jongki briew na ka Block, ngi leh kumta ban pynkhlain ia ka party. Ngi peit ba kan kham khlain ban leh kumto”.Ula buh jingkylli ruh balei tang ki nongkitkam ka Pynursla Block Congress ki pyrshah haba kiwei kum ka Nartiang, ka Umroi, ka Mawkyrwat, Mairang, kim ong eiei.Halor ka jingkylli la ka jingpynduh ia ki Block ka mut ba ka party kam shaniah shuh ia ki MLA, u Bah Lapang ula ong ba ka party Congress kam shym la khang ia ki MLA ba kin pan tiket, kiba kwah ki lah ban pan bad ka shong ha ka AICC ba kan shim ia ka rai ban ai tiket.“Balei ngin leit bat jubor ia kiba kwah phet, balei ngin leit teh tyllai, ki long laitluid ban mih lada kim mon shuh. Kiba kwah mih ki lah ban mih noh kam don jingkhang ia ka jingkwah jongki, ka Congress kam dei ka party kaba duna briew kaba duna nongialam”, u la ong.Haba kyntait ba ka jingpyndam ia ki Block kam dei satia kaba beh seng ia ki briew hynrei tang ka jingpynkhain ia ka party, u Bah Lapang u la ong, “Ka jingpyndam kam dei ba beh ia ki MLA ne ia ki Congress, kata ka dei kaba bakla ka jingmut, kiba kwah ban aplai ki lah ban pan tiket dang don ka por”, .Ha kawei ka liang, u la iathuh ba ki MLA ne kino kiba kwah ban pan tiket ka dang don ka por ba kin wan aplai bad ka jingai tiket kam dei ha ka MPCC hynrei kan shong ha ka AICC.Ka tarik ba khadduh ban pynpoi ia ka phom kiba kwah ban pan tiket ka long ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai bad hadien kane, yn sa tip lut ia kiba pan tiket.
title: Ngim dei ki nongpeit khlur ban iathuh  lypa ia ka rem ka jop: DD Lapang

content: Nongstoiñ, 11 Nailur:Kawei ka taxi kamai kaba don ia u number ML06- 7484, ka la leit ban tynrah ia kawei ka Sumo kaba don ia u number ML06-6757, haduh ba ki bynta kiba sha khmat jong katei ka taxi kamai ka la pra lut phom, hynrei donbok ba ha katei ka jingjia, ym shym la don kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih hynrei baroh ki briew kiba don hapoh jong katei ka taksi kamai ki la mynsaw jur.Katei ka jingjia ia takhuh kali kaba la i shyrkhei bha, ka la jia mynta ka janmiet ha kapor kumba 5 baje ei ei, ha kawei na ki jaka jong ka surok bah Nongstoiñ-Shillong kaba hap ruh ha mar pdeng jong ka shnong Mawlangkhar bad Ksehkohlong West Khasi Hills District bad la suba jur ruh ba u nongniah jong katei ka taxi kamai u la shong shit khawiang.Kat kum ka jingiathuh jong ki paidbah kiba lap bad iohi ia katei ka jingjia, ki la ong ba katei ka taxi kamai kaba dang wan na ki thain Nongstoiñ da ka jingthmu ban kiew sha ki thain Umlieh mar iapoi ha katei ka jaka kaba long beit bha, ka la pynher stet bha da kaba ka la shim pass ruh ia kawei ka kali kaba iaid na khmat, hynrei namar ka jingpynher stet palat u nongniah jong katei ka taxi um shym la lah shuh ban tehlakam bad u la leit ban tynrah beit ia katei ka Sumo kaba dang wan na Shillong kaba dang iaid artad na ka liang la jong.Ia kitei ki briew kiba shong hapoh jong katei ka taxi kamai kiba la mynsaw jur ruh na ka daw jong katei ka jingjia la pynkit noh ia ki baroh kynthup ia u nongniah sha Civil Hospital Nongstoiñ, na ka bynta ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba kyrkieh.
title: Ba buaid u nongniah, tynrah  ka Taksi, mynsaw jur bun ngut

content: Shillong, 11 Nailur:Ka National Green Tribunal (NGT), ha ka 4tarik mynta u bnai, ka la shong bishar ban iakren, halor ka jing sumar khuid ia ka Wah Myntdu, ha kaba na ka liang jong u riewsaid, uba mihkhmat ia U Bah Sajay Laloo, ula pyni ia ka jingdkoh, kaba dei bad ka jing bym pynkhuid satia ia katei ka wah, kaba kongsan ha ka sor Jowai.Ka Green Tribunal, ka pan jingshai na ka sorkar Jylla bad na ka Jowai Municipal Board, ha katei ka jingshong bishar, la ki la thaw ne em ia ki nala, na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong, ha shwa ba ka um kan tuid sha Wah Myntdu bad ka NGT, ka bthah ia ka sorkar Jylla, ba kan ioh jingmynjur noh kyrkieh na ki bor shnong lane na ka Jaintia District Council, na ka bynta ban shna ia ki jaka bret niut kiba biang ha ka nongbah Jowai bad ba kin pyntip ha kawei pat ka jingshong bishar, halor ki lad ki lynti ba ki la nang pynkhreh.Ka Jowai Municipal Board, ka iathuh ha ka NGT, ba ka kam ban mynjur ka ka kam shna iing, ka shong ha ka bor jong ka Jaintia District Council bad kam dei satia ha ka sorkar Jylla bad halor katei la shim, ba ka jubab, ka dei kaba bakla, namar ba ka nongbah Jowai, ka hap ha ka jingpeit jong ka tnat pynroi sor, ka sorkar Jylla, lait noh ha ki saw tylli ki dong jong ka sor Jowai.Ka jingbret jaboh pathar, ha Iawmusiang, kaba kynthup ia ki jaka ba la pyniaid da ka Seinraj Jowai, ka Jaintia District Council, ka Balang CNI bad ka Balang Presbtyrian, ki dei kiba la iakren ha khmat jong ka Tribunal bad kitei ki bor pyniaid kim shym la kitkhia ne kim salia ban shah shkor ia ka jingbthah ban buh ia ka jaka bret jaboh kaba biang bad katei ka pyni, ba kam don ka hukum kaba khlain ban teh lakam ia ki nong theh niut pathar.Na ka liang jong ka Central Pollution Controll Board, ka iathuh ha ka NGT, ba ka la iakren ia kane ka kam bad ka Jowai Municipal Board, hynrei, ka jubab jongki, ka long ban lum niut, na kawei ka jaka bad ban bret shawei pat bad katei ka pyni, ba kim don ka jaka bret niut kaba biang kam don satia, hynrei ban shu lum nawei bad ba ki pynjaboh shawei pat.
title: Khohreh ka NGT ban shna nala  pynlang um, ha ka sor Jowai

content: Shillong, 11 Nailur:Ka jingkam kawei ka briew ha Facebook ba ka la iathiah tnga bad shibun ki shynrang, ka lah ban long ba dei kaba thok ne kaba shisha bad na ka liang ki pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor kane.Haba iakren bad u SP ka East Khasi Hills u Davis NR Marak u la ong ba mynta ka sngi ruh la ioh pdiang katto katne ki ejahar ha ka ophis pyrshah ia kane ka briew bad ki pulit ki dang don mynta ha ka kam ban tih bniah la ka dei kaba shisha ne em ka jingthoh ha Facebook.“Ngi la ioh pdiang mynta ka sngi ruh ia ka ejahar na ki katto katne ki briew halor kane ka jingjia, bad ngin dang tohkit bad wad bniah ia kane namar ba ka lah ban dei kaba shu thok ne kaba shisha ruh, ym pat lah ban tip”, la ong u SP.U la ong ba bun ki account facebook mynta ki dei kiba shu thok khamtam haba ki kam ne pynbna ia kum kine ki jingthoh tang ban pynjah burom ia kiwei.“Ngi hap ban wad ia ka jingshisha namar ba bun ki facebook account kiba shu thaw da ka kyrteng jongno jongno tang ban pynjah burom ia kiwei”,la ong u Marak.Katkum ka jingong u SP, ki pulit kiba dei peit ia kane, kin sa tohkit bniah ban wad ia ka jingshisha bad haduh mynta ym pat lah ban ong eiei.Lah ban kdew ba katkum ka jingmih khubor ym ha u Rupang, kawei ka samla ka la pynsaphriang da ka jingkynthoh ha ka Facebook ba la ai kyrteng “Thad Madan” ka la shah mudui ejahar ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ha Laitumkhrah Police Station ha kito ki briew kiba ka la pynpaw kyrteng hadien ba ka la thad ia ki briew ba ka la kam ba ka la iathiah tnga.Katkum ka jingkynthoh ha ka sla Facebook da kane ka samla, ka la kam ba ki don haduh 22 ngut ki khynnah skul, 65 ngut ki khynnah college, uwei u nonghikai, uwei u doctor, 3 ngut ki Minister ka jylla kiba ju iathiah tnga bad ka.Kane ka samla ka la thad madan ruh ïa ka kyrteng jong ka Marvelene’s Inn kaba la pynïaid da u Khun jong Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ka ktem ialeh ia ki kam awria.Ka ejahar ba la ujor da ki nongmudui, ki la pynpaw ba ka jingkam jong kane ka samla ka dei bym shisha bad kaba la shu kynnoh khlem nongrim tang ban pynjah burom ia ki.Mynta ka sngi, une u nongthoh, ula peit ia ka kyrteng jong ka Phiba Sharai, ha ka por mynstep, u dang lah ban iohi, hynrei, ha ka por janmiet, katei ka kyrteng, ka la jah noh bad ym lah shuh ban plie.
title: Kam kawei ka briew, ba ka ia  thiah bad u doktor, u nonghikai

content: Guwahati, 12 Nailur:Ka Assam Don Bosco University, ka la pynlong ia ka convocation ba 6 jong ka hapoh kawei na ki campus, ka Azara campus, ha ka 9tarik Nailur 2017, ha kaba 724 ngut ki samla pule ki lah ioh pdiang ia ki degree ki jong ki. Na kine don kumba 309 ngut ki samla ba lah ioh pdiang iaki degree lyngba ka Distance Education hapoh ka DBU-Global bad 208 ngut ki samla ba ioh pdiang ia ka degree B.Tech; M.Tech(41); MSW(54); MCA(20); MBA(34); MA Psychological counseling(9); MA-Human Rights(5); MA Mass communication(4); MA Education(7); M.Sc Physics(13); Master in Life science(14); PhD(6).Ka long ka sngi ba kyrpang na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew Khasi Jaintia ha kaba 3 ngut ki samla pule napoh Meghalaya ki ba pule hapoh kane ka skul bah, ki lah ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar (Gold medals) ha ka jingpule ka jong ki. Kine ki lai ngut ki kynthup ia ka samla Regina Nongkynrih (MCA) napoh Azara campus; ka samla Valerie Dondor Nongkynrih (MSC psychological counseling) napoh Tapesia campus lem bad u samla Russel Pariat(MBA) napoh Kharguli campus. Ia kine ki khusnam lah ai haduh 16 tylli sha ki samla pule ba wan ha ka kyrdan 1st class 1st (Gold Medalist).U Lat ka jylla Assam, U Banwarilal Purohit u dei u kongsan ha kane ka sngi. Ia kane ka convocation ba 6, lah plie pyrda da u chancellor ka ADBU, Fr. V.M. Thomas jong ka Salesian provincial ka Guwahati circle. U la ai khublei kyrpang ia ki samla pule kane ka skul bah ha shwa ba kin sdang noh iaka jingim ba thymmai ka jong ki. U bynrap ruh ba wat lada ka dong shatei mihngi, ka dang sah dien ha kaba bun ki liang, hynrei ka don pat ia shibun ki liang ki ba ka kiew shakhmat bad u ong ruh ba ka por ka lah ih ban pyniar ia kane ka jaka ha ki liang ka jngohkai pythei(tourism). U lah pynkut ruh da ka ba kyntu iaki samla pule ba kat sha ba ki phai haka jingim ka jong ki, ki dei ban ai kylla sha ka imlang sahlang bad kin long ki samla ki ba kloi ban iarap bad ban long ki VIP’s( V-Visionary, lane ki nong ii jngai; I-Inspirational, lane ki nuksa ba bha; bad P-Performing, lane ki nongialam ba trei hok iaka kam.U Vice Chancellor, Dr(Fr.) Stephen Mavely, u sdang da kaba pdiang burom ia u lat ka jylla lem bad ki samla pule bad kumjuh ia ki shah khot sngewbha. U Fr.Mavely ha kane ka jingialang u ai ia ka kaiphod treikam jong ka university ha baroh ki liang ki ba kynthup ia ka jingwad bniah, ka jingpule bad kiwei de ki kam ba bha ba ka university ka lah dep leh ha une u snem la lah leit. U Fr.Stephen, u pynkut da ka ba ong “Ba ia ka lawei ka jong phi, ka don ha kti jong phi…carpe diem”! Ka ba mut, pyndonkam bha ia ka sngi ka jong phi khlem da tyngkai.
title: Takma ksiar ia 3ngut ki samla Khasi ha Assam Don Bosco University

content: Shillong, 12 Nailur:Ka jingkawang ktieh hapdeng ki dkhot ka longiing ka Congress Mawkyrwat ka la nangpaw ha kine ki sngi katba nang iaid ki sngi khamtam ba la pynduh ia ka Mawkyrwat Block Congress da ka MPCC.U nongthoh khubor u la ioh ban iakren ia u MLA u Bah Rowel Lyngdoh bad u Bah Mansturdy Nongrem uba dei u President ka South West Khasi Hills District, kiba la pynpaw ia la kijong ki nia jongki.“Nga sngew pher kein ia ka shu pynduh pyndam ia ka Mawkyrwat Block Congress khlem kano kano ka jingkynjoh ktien bad nga u MLA”, la ong u Bah Rowel haba iakren mynta ka sngi.U Bah Rowel uba dei uwei na ki nongialam rangbah ka party, u la ong biang, “Ki nongialam ki kwah ban pynpra ia ka party ha ka Mawkyrwat konstitwensi bad ngan sa peit la ngan pan tiket ne em”,.U la bteng biang, “Ngan iashong jingialang shwa bad ki nongialam bad ki nongkyrshan la ngan pan tiket ne em na ka party”.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Rowel, ki don ruh ki nongkyrshan ka Congress kiba la leit sha kiwei ki party hynrei na ka liang jogu, un sa shong jingialang lashai ne lashi sngi shwa ban shim ia ka rai ban pan tiket ne em.Katba u Bah Mansturdy u la kam ba katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum, u Bah Rowel u la leit pynshai sha ki nongkyrshan jongu, ba un nym ialeh shuh ia ka elekshon na ka Congress.“Nga shu ioh sngew ba u (Bah Rowel) u la leit batai sha ki paidbah ba un nym iakhun shuh ia ka elekshon”, la ong u bah Nongrem.U la ong ba haduh mynta ym pat lah ban ong eiei la u Bah Rowel un pan tiket ne em na ka party hynrei kumba ka long haduh mynta um pat shym la wan thied phom na ka party.“Em, um pat pan tiket na ka party haduh mynta hynrei ngin sa peit ha kine ki sngi namar ba dang don ka por”, u la ong u Bah Nongrem.U la ong ruh ba haduh mynta ka party ka la ioh pdiang ia kawei ka aplikeshon na u Bah Carnes Sohshang na Mawkyrwat.“Ngam shym ialeh ia ka elekshon MLA na Mawkyrwat, nga dei tang u nongpynshong shit, ngi la ioh pdiang tang kawei ka aplikeshon na u Bah Carnes Sohshang na Mawkyrwat”, la ong u Bah Nongrem.U la ong ruh kum u briew ka party, uno uno uba ai tiket ka party un kyrshan beit ia uta.
title: Nga sngewpher ia ka jing-  pynduh ia ka Block: Rowel

content: Shillong, 12 Nailur:U Bah Bipul R Ryntathiang, uwei na ki heh ha ka Congress Party jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad uba long ruh u kyrtong ba la iakhun teng ha ka MDC ilekshon 2014 na Umsning Constituency, u la rai ban iehnoh noh ia ka jinglong dkhot jong u na katei ka party.U Bah Bipul u la ong ba um don kano kano ka daw ban pyrshah ia ka Congress hi baroh kawei, hynrei dei tang na ki daw shimet jong u hi ba u kwah ban iehnoh ia katei ka party naduh kane ka sngi bad ia ka shithi iehnoh kam u la phah ban pynpoi sha ka kti ki heh ka Congress ka jylla.U Bah Bipul u la long teng u Secretary ka Meghalaya Pradesh Youth Congress Committee (MPYCC), u Working President ka District Congress Committee (DCC) ka Ri-Bhoi district, u President ka District Youth Congress Committee (DYCC) bad u kyrtong MDC 2014 na katei ka party.Nalor ka jingbym don shuh u Bah Cleophas Ban Syiem kum uwei na ki heh ka Congress ha Ri-Bhoi district, sa une uwei pat u heh ka Congress mynta u la shim ia kane ka rai ban iehnoh ia ka jingiadei bad ka Congress ha Ri-Bhoi kaba lah ban pynktha janor ia ka Congress mynta ka kynti bad kan duh ruh ia ka jingshaniah na ki paidbah ha ka ilekshon ban sa long shen sa tang katto katne bnai sha ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ jong ka jylla.
title: Phet Congress u Bah Bipul na Umsning

content: Shillong, 12 Nailur:Ka North Eastern Council (NEC) ka la buh kyndon ba kino kino ki kam ba ka la bei pisa sha ki sorkar jylla, lada kim lah ban pynbiang ia ka Utilization Certificate (UC) hapoh shi snem shiteng, yn sa sangeh ka jingbei pisa.Haba kren sha kane ka sngi Hatmajai sha ki nongthoh khubor, u Secretary ka NEC u Ram Muivah u la ong ba ka NEC bunsien ka ju thoh shithi sha baroh ki sorkar jylla jong kane ka thain mihngi bad ka la khot iakren ruh halor ki kam ba ka la bei pisa bad kyntu ba ki dei ban pynbiang ia ka UC ha ka por kaba biang.“Ngi la ju thoh shithi bunsien sha ki sorkar jylla jong kane ka dong mihngi bad ngi la ong iaki, ba ki dei ban pynbiang ia ka UC hapoh shisnem shiteng bad lada kim lah yn sa sangeh noh ban bei pisa”, la ong u bah Muivah.U la ong ba kino kino ki kam kiba ki sorkar jylla kim lah ban pynbiang ia ka UC hapoh san snem, ka NEC ka la weng noh beit na ka jingkyrshan pisa bad ym donkam ban iakren.Hynrei ha kajuh ka por, u Secretary ka NEC u la ong ba la don ka jingpynjynsur khyndiat ia ki kam ba iadei bad ka jingshna ia ka surok bad ka bording namar ba don ki khep ba ki shem jingeh ban pyndep ha ka por kaba biang namar ka jingdon bun ki daw.Ha kaba iadei bad ki surok ha Meghalaya, u Muivah u la ong watla ki suki ban treikam hynrei ka jingbha ka biang bad lait noh tang ha ki katto katne ki bynta ha Khasi Hills bad ha Garo Hills.“Kito ki kam bym lah ban pynbiang UC, ka tnad Pla Tyngka ka ri, kan sangeh ban ai pisa”, la ong u Secretary.U la ong ba ia ka jingmoramot ia ki surok, la shem jingeh da ka sorkar jylla khamtam ha ka por mynshwa ha kaba la shu pan pisa na ki tnad ka sorkar pdeng bapher bapher hynrei mynta ka Niti Ayog ka la pynmih ia ka kyndon ba kano kano ka projek kaba mang, dei ban mang ruh 10 percent na ka bynta ban moramot ia ki surok.Katkum ka jingong u Secretary ka NEC, kumba 65 hajar km ki surok la shna da ka jingbei pisa ka NEC haduh mynta ha baroh kawei ka dong mihngi.U la iathuh ba ka NEC ka la pynkhreh ia ka Detail Project Report (DPR) na ka bynta lai snem kaban iahap bad ia kane la buh thong ban pyndep haduh 2020.“Ngi la pynmang pisa T. 7500 klur ha ki lai snem kaba mut T.2500 klur shi snem na ka bynta ki jylla ka thain bad ia kane dang ap ia ka jingmynjur na ka tnad pla tyngka ka sorkar India”, u la ong.U la iathuh ba ka la thaw ruh ia ka skhim North East Road Development Scheme ban shna surok ha kane ka thain bad la aiti ha ka IIT Guwahati ba kan long ka nongpeit bad bishar ia ki kam bad ka rukom pyntrei.Ha kane ka skhim, la buh thong ban shna 50 tylli ki surok ha ka jingmang pisa kaban long T.3500 klur bad kumba 15000 km yn shna ha ki lai snem ban wan.Kine ki surok ki dei ban iasoh na kawei ka jylla sha kawei pat bad kumjuh ki surok kiba kham kongsan hapoh ki jylla ba la phah da ki sorkar jylla.Ha kajuh ka por, u Secretary ka NEC u la sngew iahap ia ka jingong u Conrad K Sangma ba ka NEC kam dei ban long tang ka nongsam skhim hynrei ka dei ban long kum ka met ban saindur ia ki kam ban kyntiew ia ka thain baroh kawei.“Ka dei ka jingai jingmut kaba biang jong u MP (Conrad K Sangma) ba ka NEC ka dei ban long kum ka nongsaindur ia ka thain ban long kum ka World Bank, ADB”, u la ong.Hynrei kawei ka jingeh ka long ba ka NEC ka donkam ia ki nongtrei kiba tbit bad ban ioh ia ki nongtrei kiba tbit, donkam ban siew kaba biang.“Ka tulop jong ki nongtrei ka
