content: Shillong, 26 Naitung:Ka Supreme Court jong ka India, ka la shong bishar mynta ka sngi, ha ka jingiadei bad ka mukotduma jong U Bimolangshu Roy, uba la khlad noh, uba ialeh mukotduma pyrshah ia ka sorkar Jylla bad katei ka dei ka mukotduma, kaba la pynkynriah noh na ka High Court jong ka Assam sha Supreme Court bad ka dei halor ka jingthaw ia ka ain ban thung Parliamentary Secretary, ha kaba la thung bad la ai ia ki jingmyntoi bapher, ha ka jingioh tulop bad kiwei de ki jingmyntoi, lyngba ka ain kaba ha u snem 2004.Ka Kashari, ka pyni, ba ha ka 1tarik Kyllalyngkot 2004, ka Parliament, ka la mynjur ia ka ain, ba ka jingdon ki myntri ha ki Jylla, kam dei ban palat ia ka 15 percent, na ka jingdon jong ki dkhot bad ha katei ka por, ki myntri, ki don 36ngut, na ka jingdon ki dkhot kaba 126ngut bad kumta, la donkam ban pynhiar sha ka 19ngut, katba kum katei ka ain, hynrei ha ka 3tarik Naiwieng 2004, la thaw ia ka ain Assam Parliamentary Secretaries (Appointment, Salaries, Allowances and Miscellaneous Provisions) Ordinance, 2004 bad la mudui ha Guwahati High Court, ban pyrshah ia katei ka ain, ha ka 13tarik Iaiong 2005 bad ha u snem 2006, ka Gauhati High Court, ka la iehnoh ban tuklar, ia katei ka kam, namar ba katei kajuh ka jingmudui, ka don ha Supreme Court.Hadien ki jing ia said, kiba la bunsien, ka Supreme Court mynta ka sngi, ka shim ba ka ain, kaba la thaw da ka Assam, kam don jingshisha bad ka dei ka ain, kaba dei ban weng noh bad la shim namarkata, ba ka ain ban thung ia ki Parliamentary Secretery, ka dei kaba beain.Na ka liang U Bah Madal Sumer, na Jowai, ula ujor ha ka High Court jong ka Meghalaya, halor katei ka jingthung Parliamentary Secretery ha Meghalya bad na kaei kaba paw shai, ka pyni ba ka sorkar Jylla, kam lah ban thaw ia ka ain, ha kaba dei bad ka jingthung Parliamentary Secretery.
title: Ka jingthung Parliamentary  Secretery kaba beain, ong ka SC

content: Nongstoiñ, 27 Naitung:Ka jingbym pat lah jong ka sorkar bad ki bor ba dei peit ban plie noh ia ka Sub Centre kaba don hapoh ka shnong Umdang West Khasi Hills District, kala wanrah ia ka jingeh kaba khraw ia ki paidbah noh shong shnong jong katei ka thain namar ba wat hadien bala dep ban tei ia katei ka sub center naduh u bnai November jong u snem 2014 hynrei haduh mynta mynne katei ka sub center kala shu sah khong reng.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka jingpynslem jong ka sorkar ban plie noh ia katei ka sub centre na ka liang jong ka seng Lyngam Indigenous Federation (LIF) dang shen kala dep ban leit jurip ia katei ka sub center ha kaba na ka liang jong ka seng kala lap ba katei ka jaka tang ha teng ha teng kala long pynban kum ka ktem rieh tngen ia ki nong kam sniew da kaba ki shim kabu ia ka iing jah.U Samla Everpearl Mawsor President ka (LIF) haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ong ba na ka liang jong ka seng ka dap da ka jinglyngoh haba mynta la 3 snem kynthih naduh ba lah dep shna ia katei ka sub center haduh mynta ym pat shem la lah ban pyndonkam da ka tnad jong ka koit ka khiah.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ha ka jingshisha jin lada la lah ban plie noh sa ia katei ka sub center kan long ka jingmyntoi bad ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw na ka bynta ka thain bad kan pynsting ruh ia ka PHC kaba ha Chahlang namar haduh mynta mynne ruh ki briew jong ka thain tang na ka bynta ki jingpang ki barit baria ruh ki hap ban mareh shaduh sha Riangdo Nongstoin bad Chahlang tang namar ba ym don jaka sumar.“Ngi la pyrshang ban leit ia kynduh ia ki bor ki bahalor ban kyrpad ia ki ba kin plie noh ia kane ka sub center hynrei na ka liang jong ka tnad ka la jubab da kaba ong ngim pat don pisa, ka kur kaba la ai sngewbha ia kane ka jaka ruh ka long kaba la kloi ban pyniar shuh shuh ban noh synniang biang ia ka khyndew lada ka kam ka iaid beit” ong biang u Samla Mawsor da kaba u la bynrap shuh shuh da kaba ong ba ka seng ka kyntu ruh ia ka sorkar ba kan plie noh khamkloi khnang ba katei ka jaka kan nym kylla long ka ktem awria.
title: Khongreng ka Sub Centre, ha  Umdang, ym lah plie haduh 3 snem

content: Shillong, 27 Naitung:Ki dkhot ka CEC ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council mynta ka sngi ki la pynlong ia ka jingiashong kyraiñ ha Parking Lot ka Addl. Secretariat kum ka dak ka jingpyrshah ia ka sorkar halor ka jingkuman bad ka jingleh mutlop jong ka halor ki 14 tylli ki mat ba katei ka seng ka dawa bad ka kwah ban iatai, kawei na kitei ki mat ka dei ka Inner Line Permit lane ka ILP. Ha katei ka jingshong kyraiñ ki dkhot ka HYC ki la pyrta jam da kaba ong ‘We Demand ILP, No ILP No Rest’ ki la pynrem jur ruh ia u Dr.Mukul bad ki myntri sorkar jong u da kaba ong ‘Dr.Mukul Sangma Down Down’ bad ‘Cabinet Minister Down Down’.Hadien ka jingshong kyllaiñ mongor kaba shi kynta tam ha katei ka jaka, ki dkhot ka HYC ki la ieng khrui bad ki la sei ia ka tin theh ñiut kaba don ia ka dur u Dr.Mukul Sangma myntri rangbah ka jylla hynrei ha katei ka por ki bor District ki la wan ban ia kren ba yn ym ailad satia ba kin thang tyngshop ha katei ka jaka.Shipor ka la mih ka jingiapyni nia hynrei kham hadien ki dkhot ka HYC ki la ong ba kin iaid katkum ka jingbit ba ki ioh na ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner.Namar ka jingbym iohlad ban thang tyngshop ki la sei ia ka dur jong ki myntri sorkar ka jylla bad ki la tar lyngkhot lyngkhai bad bret ia ki kitei ki kot lyngkhot ha katei ka tin theh niut kaba don ka dur u Dr.Mukul Sangma .Haba kren ha katei ka jingialang ba lyngkot jong katei ka seng u bah Robertjune Kharjahrin, General Secretary u la ong ba ki bor Distrik kim shym la shah ban thang tyngshop bad ki hap ban shu tar noh ia ka dur ki synran jong u Dr.Mukul bad ki synran jong u.U la ong ba ha ka sngi ba ki dkhot katei ka seng ki teh lama iong ka la don ka jingshah rah ha ki pulit da kaba kynnoh ba ki iaid proseshon bad ba ki pynbor ia ki briew ban deng lama iong hynrei u la ong ba katei ka dei ka bym shisha bad ym don uwei ruh u riew paidbah uba shah pyn teh lama iong da ka bor. “Lada ki dkhot jong ngi kim iaid ban leit teh lama iong kylleng kylleng, phi mutdur kin leh kumno kin shu par, kim dei ki Spider Man ne ki Superman hynrei ki dei ki Common man, ki hap ban iaid” ong u bah Robert.Shuh shuh u la ong ba katba ka HYC ka dang iaid da ka lynti ia khih kaba jai jai ki don ki ‘lang iong na ki pulit hi kiba pynshit bad kiba thmu ban pynthut “Kynmaw ba ngi don haduh 4/5 hajar ngut ki dkhot kiba dang shit, lada jia ba ki nongialam ka CEC kim lah shuh ban teh lakam mano ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh” ong biang u bah Robert. Utei u nongialam ka HYC u la bteng da kaba ong ba ki don bun ki nongtrei sorkar bad ki pulit kiba kwah ia ka ILP bad kiba pyrkhat ia ki khun ki kti bad ki pateng jong ki bad kiba kyrshan ia ka jingiakhih jong ka HYC hynrei kitei kim banse ki hap ban pyndep ia ka kamram jong ki katba ki dang don ha ka kam.“Hynrei don pat ki pulit ki bym na ka jaitbynriew jong ngi kiba don da kawei pat ka kam wat hadien ba ka kam jong ki, ka la dep ruh bad katei ka dei ka mishon barieh jong ki kumno ban iada ia ki para jait jong ki, nga kyntu ia ki pulit Khasi bad ki nongtrei sorkar na ka jaitbynriew jong ngi ba lada kitei ki briew na kawei pat ka jaitbynriew ki lah ban don ia ka mishon ba rieh jong ki-ki ruh ki dei ban don kata ka mynsiem ban ia donlang kata ka mishon ba rieh na bynta ka Ri bad ka jaitbynriew” ong u bah Robert.Ka HYC ka la pynbna ba ka 29 tarik u naitung ka dei ka sngi ba ka la khot ia ki MLA kiba don ha ka liang synshar ba kin wan sha ka jingiakren bad katei kan dei ka sngi khadduh ba ka HYC ka kwah ban ia kren bad lada kim wan kan pyni ba ki ruh ki donkti ha ka jingpynjot ia ka jaitbynriew.
title: Khang ban thang tyngshop,  tar ia ki dur myntri sorkar

content: Shillong, 27 Naitung:Ka bor pyniaid ka kompeni 02 Private Ltd jong ka Shillong ki la kyntait halor ka jingmih khubor ba ki samla kynthei ba la phah shah hikai shabar ki shah ialam bakla ha kane ka kompeni ban trei ha kiwei pat ki kam ba ktah ia ka akor ka burom.Kane ka kompeni bym dei sorkar kaba dei na Hyderabad ka la wan ha nongbah Shillong kaba don mynta ha lyndet ka Shillong Law College, naduh u snem 2013 kaba long kum ka ejen ban phah ia ki samla kynthei bad shynrang kiba kwah ban leit shah hikai ha ka liang ka jingpynbha briew, ha hospitality bad ka Spa ne khem met.Haba iakren bad u Bah Nicky War uba dei u State Coordinator mynta ka sngi, u la iathuh ba ka kompeni ka la sngew kyndit ia ka jingkynnoh kawei samla ba ka shah pyntrei kam ha kiwei ki kam ki bym iahap kumba la phah hikai bad ka la wad jingtip na kiwei ki kynthei kiba leit pule lang bad ka, ha kane ka juh ka jaka ban lap ia ka jingshisha.“Ngi la wad jingtip ia kane na kiwei ki kynthei kiba leit shah hikai lang ha kane ka lain kiba don ha Hyderabad hadien ba la mih ka jingujor na kawei ka samla, hynrei la iathuh ba kita ruh ki sngew lyngngoh hadien ba la mih kum kane ka khubor namar ba kam don satia kaba kum kata”, la ong u Bah War.U la ong ba kane ka khynnah ka la pyntip sha ka ophis ha Shillong ba kwah ban wan phai noh sha shnong bad na ka liang ka ophis kam pat lah ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam ban leit shwa ia ka bad namar kane, ka la pynlong ia ka ba kan wan hi shane bad leit kynduh ia ka Kong Agnes Kharshiing, ha kaba ki la ujor sha ki pulit.U la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ka ophis, shwa ba kan phah ia ki khynnah sha ka jaka shah hikai kam ju pynbor ne pynbiej eiei bad ka da khot lang ia ki kmie kpa ba pynshai bad hadien ba ki la hun bad sngewthuh ka la ialam ia ki lada ki kwah.U la iathuh ba haduh mynta kane ka kompeni ka la phah ia ki khynnah haduh palat 500 ngut eiei ban leit shah hikai shabar ha ki lain pyntbit bapher bapher lyngba ka jingiatreilang bad ka sorkar jylla.“Haduh mynta, la phah shah hikai 518 ngut ki samla bad na kine, 467 ngut kiba la ioh jaka treikam bad ia kane la leh ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka State Skill Training Development ka sorkar jylla”, u la ong.U Bah War u la iathuh ba ha ki snem ba la dep la don ki samla kiba kwah ban wan phai noh khlem pat dep ia ka jingshah hikai bad ia kane ym lah ban khang bad ka shong ha ki hi bad ka kompeni ka leit shaw noh ia ki.U la ong ba ki jingshah hikai ki long lai bnai bad hadien ba la dep shah hikai, ki dei ban trei 9 bnai kum ka jingiateh ha ki kompeni, ha ki hotel, ha ki kad liengsuin.Katkum ka jingong u Bah War, kane ka kompeni ka ai jinghikai kham bun ha ka lain spa bad la shim ia kito kiba hapdeng 18-35 snem.Shwa ban phah ia ki sha jaka shah hikai, la hap soi da ki kmie ki kpa ia ka phom ba mynjur, la hap ban leh ia ka jingpynshisha na ki pulit bad kawei kawei ka kynhun kan kynthup 10 ngut eiei ki samla.Bun na ki samla kiba leit shah hikai ki dei kiba la pep skul noh bad kiba hapdeng ka klas VIII shaneng bad don kiba la pyndep ia ka jingpule ba kham shalor ruh.Katkum ka jingong u state coordinator, bun ki samla kiba la trei ha ki kompeni bapher bapher ki sngew tynnad bad kim don kano kano ka jingshah pyndik bad ia kane la pynthikna namar ba haba ki wan sha Shillong ki don kiba wan sha ka ophis.U la ong ba kane ka jingmih ba katei ka samla ka la shah pyntrei kam bakla ka la pynkyndit bad pyntieng ia kiwei hynrei ka kompeni ka kwah ban pynshai ba kam ju ieh beit kumto ia ki samla hynrei ka buddien ia ki khamtam haba ki dang don ha ka jingshah hikai.
title: La 500 ngut tam ki samla, la  dep phah shah hikai shabar

content: Shillong, 18 Naitung:Ki nongrep ka thaiñ Ri-War Mihngi na ki 4 tylli ki shnong ki la khmih lynti ba ha u jylliew kin sa ioh ia ka bai lutksan jaka, kaba ka sorkar ka la kular ban siew ha ki na bynta ka jingker sainar shiah ha khappud ka India bad Bangladesh hynrei katei ka jingkhmih lynti jong ki kam shym la urlong satia naba haduh mynta kim pat ioh ia katei ka pisa. Ki nongrep na ki 4 tylli ki shnong ba kynthup ia ka Nongjri, ka Umñiuh -Tmar, ka Tangriang bad Nongshken ki la iathuh ba ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills ka la kular ban pynpoi ia katei ka pisa ha u bnai jylliew hynrei katei kam shym la urlong satia.Haba ia kren bad u Rupang kitei ki nongrep ki la iathuh ba ha ka por ba la wan pynsngew paidbah la kular ha ki ban pynpoi noh ia ka pisa ha u bnai jylliew, “Ngi sngew lyngngoh ba ka ophis u DC ka la nud ban kular ia ngi ha u jylliew hynrei haba ngi leit wad jingtip la jubab ba ka pisa kam pat poi na ka sorkar pdeng sha ka sorkar jylla, kumno ki nud ban kular ha ngi la kumba ka pisa ka la don lypa ha kti jong ki, don napdeng ki para nongrep kiba la shim ram lypa ruh da ka jingkhmih lynti ba kin pynphai ia ka pisa hadien ba la ioh ia katei ka bai lutksan jaka” ong uwei u nongrep na ka shnong Umñiuh-Tmar haba ia kren bad u Rupang.Shuh shuh ki la ong ba katkum ka Land Acquisation Act lei ka la kdew ba ka dor jong ka jingshim jaka kan long katkum ka dor iew dor hat ha ka iew ia die ia thied jaka hynrei ha kitei ki jaka ba ka sorkar ka donkam ban ker sainar shiah ym shym la ai lad ia ki ban buh dor bad la bh dor hi da ki briew sorkar bad ki ruh ki pdiang la ka pdiang. Haba la kylli katno ka dor kaba ki la ia kut bad ka sorkar la jubab ba ka dei T.135 tyngka shi sq.m.Katkum ka jingtip ba ki iathuh ha u Rupang ki la ong ba ki trai jaka kiba dei ban ioh ia katei ka bai lutksan ka dei beit tang kito kiba don jaka hapoh ka 11 mitar lait noh ka 140 na ka 150 Yard. Na kitei ki don 45 ngut na ka shnong Umñiuh-Tmar, kumba 90 ngut na ka shnong Nongjri, 23 ngut na ka shnong Tangriang bad kiba bun da ki spah ngut ki dei na ka shnong Nongshken.Haba kylli ia ka pisa kaba dei ban pynpoi sha ki-ki la ong ba ha ka shnong Umñiuh-Tmar baroh kaba dei ban poi ka long T.4.50 klur tyngka ( Saw klur shiteng) , ha ka shnong Tangriang T.2 klur tam, ha ka shnong Nongjri kumba T.7 klur tyngka bad ha ka shnong Nongshken ruh kumba T.7 klur tyngka eiei.
title: “Thok ka sorkar” bym poi ka  bai sainar shiah, ong ki nongrep

content: Shillong, 18 Naitung:“Trak trak tak tak..o ha ita i sur ngin ia iuh baroh baroh, kumba phah I mei na ing…hoii kiw howww kiw”, la sawa ka sur pdiang sngewbha ki paidbah ka Mawpat ia u Myntri Rangbah U Mukul Sangma, namar ba ioh Block khlem poi pyrkhat. Kane ka jingiakynhoi ka long mar ia poi u Myntri Rangbah uba plie ia ka Mawpat Block mynta ka sngi ha shnong Mawpat. Ka Mawpat kan dei ka Block kaba 45, na ka jingdon ki block ha ka jylla kaba shu ioh khlem mutdur, ha kaba la pynbna dang ha kane ka taiew hadien ba la mih ka jingiaknieh jaka bad ka Mawlai.Kane ka jingthaw ia ka Mawpat ka dei ka jingai kaba u Myntri rangbah u la leh sa tang hynniew bnai ba ka jylla kan leit sha ka elekshon ban jied ia ki nongmihkhmat.U Myntri Rangbah u la aiti ruh ia ka work order kaba T. 25 lak sha u Rangbah Shnong ka Mawpat ,na ka bynta ban shna ia ka ophis ka block katba na ka liang ka shnong ka la aiti ia ka patta jaka sha ka sorkar ban shna ia ka ophis ka Block.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi da ki paidbah ka shnong Mawpat bad ki marjan nalor ki myntri sorkar kynthup u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar myntri ka tnad nongkyndong, bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh myntri sor, MLA ka thain Bah AL Hek, Bah Embhahlang Syiemlieh, Dr Jemino Mawthoh, Bah David Nongrum bad ki nongkitkam shnong Mawpat, ki nongkitkam ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar ka Bri Hynniewtrep bad kiwei.Ia mynta ka Mawpat kan treikam shwa na ing shipor kaba don ha Mawpat haduh ban ioh ia ka ing lajong, ha kaba ia ka jaka lah ai sngewbha da ka shnong.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka jingthaw ia ka Mawpat Block ka long hadien ba ka sorkar ka la iohi ba ka jingbun briew ka Mylliem ka la long kaba ka jubor bha bad ka la donkam ia ka sorkar ba kan thaw noh sa kawei ka Block nalor ka Mawlai, namar ba lada kdup lang ki shnong na thain Mawpat ruh, ka jingheh ka Mawlai Block ka dang jur hi wat la ka la iakhlad noh na Mylliem ruh.“Namar kane ka daw, ka sorkar ka la thaw ia ka Mawpat na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi kham paka bad kham jan sha ki paidbah”, la ong u Mukul bad bynrap, ba ka jingthaw ia ki Block, ki district bad ki sub-division nalor ki police station ka dei ka mat elekshon jong ka sorkar kaba la kular ia ki paidbah.U la ong ba ka sorkar ka la lap ba bunsien ki prokram bad ki kam ka sorkar kim ju lah ban poi sha ki paidbah, namar ki don bun ki daw, hynrei lyngba ka jingdon jong ki block, kan pynlong ia ki kam ka sorkar ban poi bad ban treikam kham bha na ka bynta ban shakri ia ki paidbah nongkyndong ban kyntiew ha ka ioh kam ioh kam, ka seng kam seng jam bad kiwei kiwei.“Hadien 45 snem ba ngi la ioh ia ka jylla, ngim nang ban sumar ia la ki briew lajong hynrei mynta ngi la sdang ban peit ban sumar ia ki briew lajong”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah da kaba kdew ia ka jingsah dien ki briew ka jylla kiba don ha khappud.Baroh kiwei pat ki nongkren ha kane ka sngi kynthup u myntri ka tnad nongkyndong u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, u myntri sor u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh, ki MLA kum u Bah David Nongrum, bad u Bah AL Hek uba pyniaid ia ka jingialang, u la iaroh ia u Myntri Rangbah uba la lah ban thaw ia ka Block Mawpat.
title: ‘Trak tak tak’, kynhoi ki paidbah  Mawpat ba kmen ka ioh Block

content: Shillong, 18 Naitung:U Boston Marak jong ka seng Congress, u la jop ia ka elekshon CEM ka GHADC kaba la long mynta ka sngi da kaba pynliem noh ia u kyrtong ka NPP u Sukharam Sangma. Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u Boston u la iathuh ba baroh ki MDC jong ka GHADC ki la wan ban thep ia ka vote jong ki bad haba la dei ka por niew u la ioh 17 vote katba u kyrtong ka NPP u la ioh tang 11 vote, “Nga la dei ban ioh 18 vote hynrei ka don noh kawei ka vote kaba la shah kyntait” u la ong.Utei u CEM thymmai ka GHADC u la ong ba mynta u ap ia u Lat ka jylla ban leh ia kaba donkam bad hadien katei un sa shong jingialang bad ki para MDC kumno ban pyntyllun ia ka Executive Committee kaba thymmai bad ha katei ka jingialang u la ong ruh ba yn jied iano ban pynieng kyrtong ha ka elekshon Chairman. U Boston u la ong ba haduh mynta um pat kwah ban ong eiei kiei ki kam ba un leh hynrei tad haduh ban da la pynkupbor ia u da u Lat un sa kren ia kiba dei ban kren.Ha kawei pat ka khubor ka Meghalaya Pradesh Youth Congress ka la ai khublei ia u Boston halor katei ka jingjop jong u , ka kyrwoh na u President ka MPYC u Richard Marak ka la ong ba kate ka jingjop u boston ka pyni ba ka don ka jingshaniah hapoh ka jingialam jong u. U la ong ruh ba ka jingshah kyntait ka vote na ka ktem jong ka NPP bad BJP ka pyni ba ka don ka jingbym shaniah para ma ki ia ka jingjied nongialam na katei ka kynhun.Ka NPP mynta ka sngi, ka la dawa ba dei ban sospon noh ia ki 5 ngut ki MDC kiba kyntiap seng shiphang na kawei ka party bad shiphang sha kawei pat.Kitei ki 5 ngut ki MDC kiba ka NPP ka la kdew ki long u Ismail Marak, Rightious Sangma, Jimberth Goera Marak, Dhormonath Sangma bad u Wennison Marak, ka NPP ka la kynnoh ba dei na ka daw jong kitei ki 5 ngut ba kam don shuh ka jingskhem EC ha District Council hynrei ia katei ka jingujor la kyntait da u Deputy Chairman.U Ismail Marak u la shah jied na ka seng Congress, u la phet noh sha ka BJP bad hadien u la wan phai biang sha ka Congress. U Wenison bad u Jimberth ki dei na ka GNC , u Rightious Sangma u la jop na ka NCP u la leit sha ka BJP hadien pat u leit sha ka Congress, u Dhormonath Sangma u la shah jied na ka Congress hadien u iasoh NPP hadien u leit phai biang sha ka Congress.U CEM barim ka GHADC na ka seng NPP u Denang T Sangma u la ujor sha u Dy.Chairman u Metrinson Momin bym dei ban shah thep vote ia kitei ki 5 ngut bad ki la ong ba ki kwah ba ka jingujor ia u Ismail Marak bad u Rightious Sangma ka dei ban leit sha u Lat naba kitei ki ia soh sha ka BJP hynrei haduh mynta ruh kim pat risaiñ na ka jinglong dkhot na katei ka seng ha ka por ba ki thep vote. “Kumno ki lah ban vote ia ka Congress haba ki dang don ha ka BJP, ngi kwah ban ioh jingshai na katei ka daw ngi kwah ba u Dy.Chairman un phah ia kane ka jingujor sha u Lat shuwa ban ai lad ia ki ban thep vote” ong u Sofiur Rehman ka BJP.
title: Jop u Boston ia ka elekshon CEM  ka GHADC, 11 vote ioh ka NPP

content: Shillong, 11 Naitung:Ka Projek pynmih bording kaba ai kyrteng Mawphu hydro-electric project (stage II) ban pyntreikam ka North Eastern Electric Power Corporation Limited (NEEPCO) lah ban pynkylla kyrteng sha ka wah Kongkhen ne ka shnong Thieddieng namar ba bun ki shnong kiba shah ktah na kane ka projek kin dei na ka thaiñ Thieddieng ym na ka thaiñ Mawphu.U nongthoh khubor u la ioh ban iakren kham bniah halor kane ka projek bad u Head Project ne u General Manager ba peit ia kane ka projek, u SK Dey, u la ong ba ka la don ka jingiakren ban pynkylla ia ka kyrteng jong kane ka projek namar ba kham bun ki shnong ban shah ktah ki dei na ka thaiñ Thieddieng kumba la dawa ki paidbah.Hynrei u Dey u la ong ba kane ka shong ha ka bor jong ka sorkar jylla ba kan leh ia kaba donkam. “Ka dang don ha ka jingbishar bniah ka sorkar jylla ban leh ia kaba donkam halor kane”, la ong u Dey uba dei peit ia kane ka projek jong ka NEEPCO.U la iathuh ba katkum ka jingiateh soskular, kito kiba shah ktah ki jaka jongki, yn ai kam uwei na kawei pa kawei ka longïing lane ki bym kwah kam ki lah ban shu shim ia ka pisa 5 lak shisien siew. Hynrei lada kim kwah ia kane ka 5 lak, ka NEEPCO kan shu siew pisa ia ki ym duna ia ka T. 2000 shi bnai ne katkum ka jinglong ka iew ka hat kaban kiew na ka snem sha ka snem sha ka longïing haduh 20 snem.U la iathuh ruh ba la iasoi ha kaba 100 unit ka ding yn ai ei sha ki longïing ba shah ktah man u bnai nalor 1 percent ka ding yn ai ei ban leh ia ki kam pynroi ha ka thaiñ.Nalor kane, ka NEEPCO ka la ai bording ei ruh haduh 12 percent ia ka sorkar jylla.Kumba ju long, ka jingim jong kano kano ka projek bording kan long 30 snem hynrei ka lah ban treikam ruh haduh 50-60 snem tangba ka donkam ia ka jingpynthymmai ia ki tiar ki tar kiba rim.U Dey u la kyntait ia ka jingsngew tieng jong ki paidbah ba lada tei ia ka dam kan sa tap lut ia ki jaka ki puta jongki bad kin sa kylla nongphetwir. U la ong ba ka jingmut dur jong ki katto katne ki paidbah jong ki shnong ban shah ktah na kane ka projek ba kin kylla phetwir, kin shah dap lut ha ka um, ka dei kaba bakla bad ka jingshah pynsngewthuh bakla namar ba ka jingshisha kam long kumta.U la ong ba ki don 74 tylli ki longïing kiban shah ktah na kane ka projek hynrei ka jingshah ktah kam dei ba kin shah tap lut ki iing ki sem, hynrei dei tang ki katto katne ki jaka kiban shah ktah na kane ka projek.“Ka dei tang ka jingsngewthuh bakla jong ki briew ban shah tap um lut ki iing ki sem bad ki jaka ki puta”, la ong u Dey.U la ong ba katkum ka Jingpynkhreh Kam ne Project Report, ka donkam ia ka NEEPCO ban shim jaka 110 akar bad na kane, kumba 22 akar ka hap kum ka jaka khlaw.“Ia ka jingburia ia ka jingduh ki jaka bad ki jingthung jingtep yn siew nadong shadong da ka NEEPCO katkum ka dor jong ka iew ka hat kaba thymmai tam”, la ong u Dey.U la ong ba ka tnad jong ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka Social Impact Assessment (SIA) kan pynlong ruh ia ka jingjurip bad bishar bniah sha katei ka jaka ha kaba kan ai kaiphod pat sha ka sorkar ba leh ia kane.Ia ka dor jong ka jaka ka puta, ki jingthung jingtep yn buh da ka sorkar jylla bad ka NEEPCO kan shu ai pisa beit bad kan nym lah ban tuklar eiei.U Dey u la ong ba katkum ka ain Right to Fair Compensation and Transparency in Land Acquisition, Rehabilitation and Resettlement (Amendment) 2015, ka NEEPCO kan hap ban buria ia ka jingduh ki jaka ki jingthung jingtep saw shah ka dor na ka dor ha iew ha hat.Ha kajuh ka por, u Dey u la iahtuh ba ka NEEPCO kan wanrah bun ki kam pynroi kum ka jingshna surok, ki skul, ki mobile dispensary bad kiwei ki lad pynroi sha ki shnong ba shah ktah.“Katkum ka jingiateh soskular ne Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) bad ka sorkar Meghalaya, 80 percent ki kam ha ka kyrdan C bad D, yn ai ia ki trai shnong kiba shah ktah na kane ka projek bad ki para marjan.Ka jingmang pisa ban shna ia kane ka projek bording ka long T.907.35 klur haduh u Nailar 2016 hynrei ka lah ban kiew katkum ka jingiaid ka iew ka hat.Katkum ka jingong u Dey, lada kam don ka jingthut da kumwei pat, ka NEEPCO kan lah ban pynmih ding hapoh 55 bnai ne san snem duna bad ka jingpynmih kan long 85 megawatt bad ki don ar tylli ki tnad ne unit, kawei kawei kan pynmih 42.5 megawatt.
title: Lah ban kylla ka Projek  Mawphu sha ka Wah Kongkhen

content: Shillong, 11 Naitung:Ka tnad Legal Meteorology ka jylla ka la shem jingeh ban pyndonkam ia ka kali trok Testing Kit namar ka jingjubor palat ka jingkhia bad ka jingeh jongka. Kane ka kali ka khia haduh 30 ton bad ka kam jongka, ka long ban pyntrei ha kaba leit thew kylleng ki jaka, ka hap ban shu shong ei noh.Namar kane ka daw, ka tnad Legal Meteorology ka la phah jingthoh sha ka sorkar pdeng ba kan shim noh ia kane ka kali namar ba kam iahap ban pyndonkam ha kane ka jaka rilum. Haduh mynta ia kane ka kali, la shu buh kumto ha phyllaw ka ophis ka District Transport Officer, ha Lachumiere, Shillong.Katkum ka jingong u Director ka Legal Meteorology kane ka tnad, u Bah Israel W Ingty ka sorkar India ka la ai ei ia kane ka kali ha u snem 2010 na ka bynta ban pyndonkam ban leit thew ia ki jingkieng thew ne weighbridge hynrei tang ban iaid na Shillong sha Jowai, ka shim por kumba 6 kynta eiei bad ka jinglut ka long haduh 6 hajar.“Kane ka kali kam iahap ban pyndonkam ha kane ka jaka rilum ha kaba ka shim por haduh 6 kynta tam na Shillong sha Jowai ban iaid bad ka jinglut ruh ka long ka la poi sha ka T. 6 hajar eiei”, la ong u Director ka tnad Legal Metrology haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi.U la iathuh ba ka tnad ka la phah jingthoh sha ka India ba kan shim noh ia kane ka kali ne ban ai noh sha ka Assam kaba long jaka madan hynrei haduh mynta kam pat ioh jubab eiei.U la ong ba ka sorkar pdeng ka la ai noh da kiba kham rit lai tylli ki kali ba khia 16 ton kawei na ka bynta ban leit test.U Director ka Legal Metrology u la iathuh ruh ba ki don 180 tylli ki jingkieng thew ha ka jylla kynthup jong ka sorkar jylla, ki kompeni bad ki riew shimet kiba ju leit ban pynthikna da kane ka tnad la ki biang ne em.Katkum ka jingong jong u Director kane ka tnad, ha ka jingleit pynshisha jongki la ki biang ne em kine ki jaka thew, la shem ba ki biang bad kam don kano kano ka jingleh tuh ne jingbakla.Ha kajuh ka por, u Director u la iathuh ba ka tnad ka la dep pynlong ruh ia ka jingleit pynshisha ia ki jingthew ia baroh 92 tylli ki petrol pump ha ka jylla bad baroh la shem ba ki biang nadong shadong bad kim don jingduna eiei.
title: Ym lah pyndonkam ka tnad Legal  Meteorology, ia ka kali ba 30 ton

content: Shillong, 11 Naitung:Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council kan bteng ia ka jingdawa jong ka seng ban pyntreikam noh ia ki 14 tylli ki mat dawa jong ka seng (Ki ain ban iada ia ki Hok Trai Ri) kum ka Inner Line Permit System ka ban teh lakam ia ka jingrung laitlan ki poiwir ha ka Bri Hynniewtrep, ka ban kynthup ia ka jingdawa ban pynsangeh noh ia ka jingshna lynti rel, kat bym pat pyntreikam ia ka ILP, nangta ka Residential Permit For Immigrants ka ban pyrkhing ia ka jingioh shongwai bad shong basa thurmur ki mynder ha ka Bri Hynniewtrep.Kawei pat ka mat kaba ka seng, ka dawa, ka long ban pyrkhing ia ka jingioh khaii lait lan ki mynder ha ka Bri Hynniewtrep, ka Work Permit For Non Indigenous People ka ban teh lakam ia ka jingioh bylla laitlan ki poiwir ha ka Bri Hynniewtrep, ban nang pynkhlain shuh ia ka Prohibition and Detection of Benami Transaction, ba yn lah ban rat dyngkhong ia ka kam Benami bad nangta ia ka State Permanent Citizenship Registration Act ka ban shim ia u snem 1971 kum u snem ot kyrteng bad ka jingthep vote, ha ka shnong tynrai jong u briew, khnang ban khanglad noh ia ki poiwir bad ki mynder ba kin ioh thep Vote ha ka Bri U Hynniewtrep bad kiwei, ha kaba na ka liang ka seng ka la leit buh ia ka dorkhas ha u myntri rangbah ka Jylla, ha ka 23tarik Rymphang 2017.Na ka liang jong ka seng, ha ka 17tarik Naitung 2017, kaba dei ka lyngkhuh sngi iap U Tirot Sing, kan pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah bad shong kyrain. Ha shwa ban pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah, ha ka por 10.00 baje mynstep, yn pynlong shwa ia ka jingialang ha Dinam Hall Jaiaw, ha kaba kan don ruh ka jingduwai ban nang pyneh rngiew ia ka Jaidbynriew Hynniewtrep bad hadien katta sa ka jingiaid paidbah na Diman Hall haduh u mot Laidong ha syndah ka Soso Tham Auditorium Hall bad hangne yn pynlong ia ka jingshong kyrain.Ha ka 22tarik Naitung 2017, ka seng kan pynlong ia ka jingialang ban iathir iatai jingmut bad u Mukul Sangma ha ryngkat ki myntri jongu, ha kaba yn pynlong ha Khasi National Durbar Hall, Mawkhar, Shillong. “Ngi la kyrpad ia u ba un khot ia kren ia ngi hynrei um shem la khot kumta ngin khot noh mangi ia u ba un wan noh ma u ha ryngkat ki Minister jong u khnang ba ngin ioh ka lad ban iatai halor ki mat dawa jong ka seng kaba kynthup ia ka ILP bad kiwei pat. Lada u Mukul bad ki Minister kim wan na ka liang ka seng ka la pynkhreh lypa ia ki jingiakhih pyrshah ia ki” ong shuh ka kyrwoh jong ka seng.Ha ka 29tarik Naitung 2017, yn pynlong ia ka jingialang ban iathir iatai jingmut bad baroh ki MLA na ka Bri u Hynniewtrep, halor ki mat dawa ia kaba ka seng ka la dep pyntip ia ki lyngba ki shithi bad ha kane ka jing ialang yn dawa na ki MLA ba kin iathir iatai ia kine ki mat ha ka ing durbar Thawain, ha kaba ia kane ka jingiathir iatai yn pynlong ha Khasi National Durbar Hall, Mawkhar, Shillong. “Lada ki MLA kim wan naka liang ka seng ka la Pynkhreh lypa ki jingkhih pyrshah ia ki bad ia kine ki jingiakhih yn pynlong ha ki Ing ki sem jong ki bad ha ki Constituency jong ki” ong biang ka kyrwoh jong ka seng ba la phah da U Bah Isaac W Basaiawmoit, Organising Secretary, HYC-CEC.
title: 17tarik, yn iaid paidbah sha State Central &  22tarik yn iatai bad U Mukul ha Durbar Hall

content: Shillong, 14 Naitung:Ki jugali ki la rai ban leit shong sngi hakhmat ha ka khyrdop ka MeECL naduh ka sngi Balang lada kim ioh ia ka shithi thungkam haduh ka sngi baar.La shim ia kane ka rai jongki, hadien ba ki la dep iashong kyrain ar sngi kynthih ha phyllaw ka Additional Secretariat kaba kut mynta ka sngi, ban dawa ba ka sorkar (MeCEL) ka dei ban ai noh ia ka shithi thungkam kaba la dawa la slem hadien ba ki la pass ia ka eksamin ba pyniaid da kane ka tnad naduh u 2011.Ia kine ki jugali la kyrshan bad ai mynsiem da ka KHNAM samla hapoh ka jingialam u President u Bah Thomas Passah, ha kaba ki la aiti ruh ia ka dorkhas jingdawa hynne ka sngi ha ka ophis u Myntri Rangbah u Mukul Sangma namar ba um don ha ophis.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Passah, por ban thungkam ia ki Jugali kan kut noh ha ka 2 tarik u bnai ban wan bad lada kim ioh noh ia ka shithi thungkam shwa kane ka por, kan sa kylla bijai ei noh namar ba bun kiba la palat rta ban wad kam biang. Nalor kata, ki don la ka iing ka sem ban bsa ban pjiah ia ki khun ki kti bad ka jingleh ka MeECL ka long ka jingibein ia ki.“Lada ka sorkar bad ka MeECL kam sngap ia ka jingud jong ki Jugali, naduh sngi Balang ngin leit shong hakhmat ka khyrdop ka MeECL khlem pud por haduh ba kan ai ia ka shithi thungkam ia baroh ki Jugali kiba dang sah”, la ong u Bah Passah bad bynrap, ba wat ia ka PIL ruh la pynkhreh ban ujor pyrshah ia ka MeECLKine ki Jugalis kiba don 466 ngut kila pyndep ia ka eksamin, ki la pynlong ia ka jingshong kyrain ryngkat ki plakad ha phyllaw ka Additional Secretariat ban dawa ba ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) ka dei ban ai noh ka shithi thungkam ia ki 466 ngut, hadien ba ka sorkar jylla ka la pynslem wat hadien bun sien ki la iai dawa bad pynkynmaw.U Bah Passah u la ong ba mynshem bnai haba ki pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah, ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) lyngba u secretary u Debojit Warjri ka la pynthikna ia ki ba kin sam noh ia ka shithi thungkam hynrei haduh mynta jar jar khlem leh eiei.Ka jingthungkam la ong ban leh ha ki lai bynta kata ha ka bynta ba nyngkong lah dep thung ia ki 336 ngut katba ka bynta baar bad balai kaba kynthup 233 ngut kawei pa kawei ka thup ka dang sah teng.U Bah Passah u la ong ba ka jingthungkam ia ki Jugalis jong ka bynta II bad III ka dang sah teng.
title: Naduh sngi Balang, yn leit shong  ki Jugali ha khyrdop ka MeCEL

content: Shillong, 14 Naitung:U Rejaul Karim Laskar, uba dei u pyrman jong ka kynhun rit paid jong ka All India Congress Committee, uba peit ia ka Meghalaya, Nagaland and Mizoram Rejaul Karim Laskar, ula ia kynduh mynta ka sngi, ia U Rev VL Luaia Hranleh, Senior Administrative Secretary ha Shillong. Ka jingiakynduh, ka dei tang ka jing ia shongkai paralok, ka la long ha ophis jong ka Presbyterian Church of India ha Shillong. U Laskar, u kam ba ka jingiakren, ka long kaba sngewtynnad, ha kaba ki iakren ia ka jinglong ka Ri ha kine ki sngi, ha kaba U Laskar, u pynpaw ia ka jingsngew donkam ban pynneh ia ka jinglaitluid ki niam ha ka Ri. U Laskar, ula leit jngoh ruh ia ka Cathedral of Mary Help of Christians, Shillong.
title: U heh AICC bad  U Pastor ha Shillong

content: Shilllong, 14 Naitung:Ka BJYM Meghala-ya ka la dawa na u Chief Secretary ba dei ban sospon mardor ia u Bah HM Shangpliang u director ka tnad Social Welfare, halor ka jingkynnoh ba u don bynta ban iaroh bad ai jingkren ha ka jingialang ka party Congress ha Lawbah dang shen, kaba hap ha Mawsynram konstitwensi.Ka kynhun jong ki nongialam ka BJYM hapoh ka jingialam u President u Bah Egenstar Kurkalang mynta ka sngi ki la iakynduh ia u Chief Secretary u YS Tsering ha kaba ki la ai jingthoh ba dei ban sospen mardor ia u Bah Shangpliang.Ha kajuh ka por, ka la dawa ruh ba dei ban aiti ban tohkit ha ka CBI pyrshah ia une u ophisar ka jylla uba la shah pynkiew IAS khnang ban lap ia kiba bun ki jyrsieh ba u lah ban don bynta ban leh shiliang ia ki skhim sorkar khamtam haba la paw ba u iadon bynta bad kane ka seng sain pyrthei kaba don ha ka bor ha kane ka jylla. U Bah Egenstar u la ai por shi taiew ba ka sorkar kan sa leh ia kine ki jingdawa jongki bad lada kam leh, kin sa shim da kiwei ki lad.Katkum ka jingiathuh u Bah Egenstar, u Chief Secretary u la pan jubab na u Bah Shangpliang halor kane ka kam bad ka dang ap ia ka jubab jongu shwa ban iaid shakhmat lada lap ba ka jingleh jongu, ka long kaba shisha.“Ngi dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban sospen shi syndon ia une u ophisar sorkar. Ka ain kam dei ban leh ia u kum u khun khadduh ban ai mon”, la ong u Bah Egenstar Kurkalang.U Bah Egenster u la ong ba ka jingleh jong u Bah Shangpliang ban iadon bynta bad kane ka seng sain pyrthei, ka la pynsuba sniew ba u lah ban leh shiliang ia ki skhim ne ki jingiarap ka sorkar sha ki paidbah.Lah ban kdew ba ka CSWO bad ka TUR ha kane ka sngi Palei ka la phah jingujor ruh sha u Principal secretary ka tnad Personal da kaba dawa ba dei ban thung jingtohkit pyrshah ia ka jingdonkti jong u Bah Shangpliang bad ka seng sain pyrthei haba u dang long kum u ophisar ka sorkar.
title: Hapoh 1taiew,sospon ia U bah HM Shangpliang: BJYM

content: Shillong, 11 Naitung:Ka tnad Legal Metrology kaba dei ban peit ia ka jingthew jingwoh ia ki mar ki mata jong ki nongkhaii, ki kompeni ka la treikam kum ka met kaba duna dkhot met bad ka daw ka long ba ka don hapdeng ka jingduna nongtrei bad kam lah ban treikam ha ka rukom kaba dei ban iarap ia ki paidbah.U Director kane ka tnad u Bah Israel W Ingty haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta, u la iathuh ba na ka liang jongu, u la ong ba ka tnad ka shem jingeh namar ba ka duna ki nongtrei.“Ngi duna nongtrei naduh ki kyrdan Inspector, kali, bad kiwei ki jingdonkam nalor ka sorkar ka mang pisa duna bha ia kane ka tnad kaba long tang ban siew tulop”, la ong u director.U la ong ba ia mynta la don tang uwei u Inspector ha ka district bad la thoh sha ka sorkar ba kan ai nongtrei khambun ha kane ka tnad. Ka sorkar pdeng ha ka 11th bad 12th Plan ka la ai pisa T.6 klur ia kane ka tnad hynrei iaka pisa la pynlut ban shna ia ki laboratory.Ha ka jingshisha, kane ka tnad ka long kaba donkam bha namar ba ka peit ia ka jingeh jong u luk u lak uba lah ban shah ban bein ha ka thew ka woh ha ki mahajon bad ki kompeni haba ki thied jingthied hynrei ka jingbym don ka jingtip bad ka jingshai ka la pynlong ia ki briew ban shem jingeh ban leit ujor shano bad kumno.Katkum ka jingong u Director kane ka tnad, ki don 495175 ngut ki nongkhaii kiba pynkhein ia ka jingthew bad kiba la shah pynshitom hapoh kine ki san snem kata naduh u 2011-2016.“Ka tnad ka la ioh dain kuna T. 1492100 na ki 49517 ngut ki nongkhaii ha ka jylla hapoh kine ki san snem (2011-17)”, la ong u Bah Ingty.U la iathuh ruh ba watla ka tnad ka don hapdeng ka jingduna nongtrei hynrei lah ban pynlong ia ka jingleit jurip kynsan 5961 sien hapoh kine ki san snem ha baroh kawei ka jylla.U Director u la iathuh ba ki don ar tylli kii Zone ba la phiah ia kane ka tnad, kawei ka East Zone kaba kdup ia ka Khasi Hills bad kawei ka West Zone kaba kynthup ia ka Garo Hills.Ka jingeh kane ka tnad ban leh ia ki kam ka long ka jingduna ka jingmang pisa ka sorkar julla ha kaba mynta u snem ka jingmang pisa ka long tang kumba 6 klur kaba long beit tang ban siew ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei hynrei kam don pisa ban pynlong ia ki jingialap paidbah ne kino kino ki jingpynshai paidbah.U la ong ba ka long kaba donkam ba ki paidbah kin tip ia ka jingshisha haba ki thied ia ki mar ki mata ba ki dei ban long kiba biang ka jingthew bad ka dor ruh kam dei ban tam ia kaba la thoh ha ka dor die khutia ne MRP bad lada don ne lap ia kiba die tam ia ka dor bad kiba thew duna, ki nongthied ki dei ban ujor da ka jingthoh sha ka tnad ba kan leh ia kaba donkam pyrshah ia kiba pynkhein ia ka ain.U la ong ba katkum ka ain ki nongkhaii ki dei ban wah ia ki dor ki mur jong ki mar ba ki die ha dukan khnang ba ki paidbah kin tip bad iohi.
title: 5 snem, ioh kuna 14 lak, na 4 hajar ngut ba pynkhein jingthew

content: Shillong, 11 Naitung:Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) jong ki saw tylli ki shnong, Nonghyllam, Umsur, Nongjri bad Kulang kiba hap hapoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, kin pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah ha ka 14tarik Naitung 2017, kaba dei ruh ka sngi iew nongjri ban pyrshah ia ka jingshah rahbor jong u Bah Ricky Marwein ha ki Khar Bangladesh na ka shnong Umsur.U Bah Nassar Marwein Chairman jong ka JAC, u la ong ba ia kane ka jingiaid paidbah kan sdang na Nonghyllam ha ka por 10.00 baje mynstep bad kin pynkut ha shnong Nongjri kaba dei artad ka sngi iew ha katei ka sngi. Ha kane ka jingialang paidbah kin sa ia rai kumno ban leh na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka jingshong suk shong sain ha kane ka thain.Ka JAC ka kyntu ia ki riew rangbah bad ki paidbah ba kin ia poi khnang ha kane ka sngi ban ia shim bynta ha kane ka jingiaid paidbah, namar tang ha kine ki ar bnai kiba la leit ka jingshah rabor jong ki briew na katei ka thain ha ki briew na ka Ri Bangladesh ka la jia la ar sien. Ia u Bah Ricky Marwein la rah bor ha ka 8tarik Naitung 2017 na iing sah jong u ha Umsur.Dang ha ka 28tarik Iaiong 2017, ka KSU ka la pynlong ia kane ka jingiaid paidbah ha katei ka thain ban pyrshah ia ka jingshah rahbor jong u samla Dajied Syiemlieh ia kaba la rahbor da ki khar Bangladesh ha kaba la ioh ban pyllait ia u da ki shipai jong ka Bangladesh Border Guard na khappud Meghalaya bad ka Ri Bangladesh.
title: Ban pyrshah kam rahbor,  khot  jingiaid paidbah ha Nongjri

content: Shillong, 11 Naitung:U Commissioner ka tnad Transport ka jylla u Bah Israel W Ingty u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla kan pyrshang tyngeh ban pyndep ia ka jaka pdiang bad sangeh bus ne ka Bus terminal ha Mawiong, Shillong ha ka por ba la buh kata ha u snem 2018.Ia kane ka jaka pdiang bad sangeh bus la mang ai pisa da ka sorkar pdeng ha ka jinglut kaban long 48 klur bad ka dang ioh T.12 klur. “Kumba long haduh mynta ka jingiaid ki kam ki jam ka la poi sha ka 50 percent bad la khmih lynti ba ngin pyndep ha ka por ba la buh thong ha ka 2018”, u la ong.U Commissioner u la ong ba ka tnad ka la kyntu ia ka sorkar pdeng ba kan pynlait noh ia ka pisa kaba la dang sah sa T.36 klur ka bym pat pynlait bad nalor kane ka la pan shuh namar kam pat biang.U la ong ba hadien ba ka pyndep ia kane ka jaka sangeh bad pdiang bus, kan pynkham aram ia ka jingkhapngiah jong kane ka nongbah kaba iakynduh jingeh na ka jingsahkut kali kaba syllang bha.Kane ka jaka pdiang bad sangeh bos kan ngiam kumba 200 tylli ki bus ki trok ha katei ka jaka.
title: Ka jaka pdiang bad sangeh  bus ha Mawiong, ha U 2018

content: Nongpoh, 11 Naitung:Ki lai tylli ki kyn-hun sengbhalang hapoh ka Jylla kiba kynthup ia ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF), Ri Bhoi Youth Federation (RBYF) bad Federation of Khasi Jaintia & Garo People (FKJGP) ki la rai ban pynlong da ka jingialang paidbah ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai ha MUDA Complex Nongpoh.Haba pyntip sha ki nongthohkhubor, u Bah G.H Kharshanlor, President ka HNYF Sengkmie, u la ong ba ka daw kaba la pynlong ia kine ki lai seng ban pynlong syndon da kane ka jingialang paidbah ha Nongpoh, ka dei ruh halor ka nongrim jong ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban wanrah ia ka Lynti rel sha ka Jylla, hynrei khlem da lah pat ban pyntreikam ia ki kyndon ain ki ban tehpyrkhing ia ka jingioh laitlan jong ki mynder ban rung sha ka jylla.Kumta haba iadei bad katei ka jingialang paidbah, na ka liang u Bah G.H Kharshanlor, u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ha ka Distrik ba kin wan ban iashimbynta khang ba yn ioh ban iathir bha halor kane ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban wanrah Lynti Rel sha ka jylla.
title: 13tarik, ka jingialang paidbah ban pyrshah lynti rel ha Nongpoh

content: Shillong, 11 Naitung:U President ka KSU u Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar ula ong kat nang thwet ia ki dkhot, katta ka nang pyntyrha iaka seng ban iakhun bad ka jingïaleh kan dang jur nangne shakhmat bad wat ki dkhot kiba shah kem kila phah iaka kyrwoh ba ym dei ban dawa pyllait noh ia ki na phatok hynrei dei ban ieng ban dawa na ka bynta ka ishu jong ka jaidbynriew.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, ha ka jingialang pyrshah lynti rel ha ha iing dorbar ha Umrynjah, u President ka KSU u la ong ba ka KSU kala iaid nyngkong ha ka lynti kaba jai jai hynrei ka sorkar kala sdang ban hiar thma ia ki dkhot jong ka seng kan nym pyndem na ka bynta ka dawbah jong ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew.U la ong ba ka sorkar kala pynpaw ba kam treh ban iakren bad ka KSU namar ba kadei ka seng kaba leh ia ki kam be-ain, hynrei ka KSU ruh ka kwah ban kren shai ba kam shym la jied iaka lynti jong ka jingiaumsnam ne ban kieng atiar.Ula ong ba ka la mih ha ki lad pathai khubor ba ka HNLC kala tyrwa ban ai ia ki bom IED sha ki dkhot ka seng ban pyrshah lynti rel, na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ula ong ba dei ban phah tohkit ia kane ka kam, hynrei ka KSU kam sngew phylla shuh ia kum kine ki kyntien ba kin mih na ka sorkar namar ha ki snem kiba mynshwa ruh kila don teng kum kine ki jingpharep.Watla ki dkhot ki la shah kem ka KSU kam shym la sngap jar hynrei mynta kan leit ban pynlong iaki jingialang paidbah ha kylleng ki jaka long katba long ne jia katba jia bad ban pan ka jingkyrshan na ki paidbah ba ieng tylli kawei ban pyrshah jur iaka jingwan ka lynti rel katba ym pat lah pyntreikam ia ki ain kiban pyrkhing iaka jingwan ki bar jylla bad ki mynder ri.“Lada ka sorkar ka khot ne kam khot iakren, ka KSU kan nym sngeweiei, namar ka seng kam shym la pynlong jingïakhih ba ka kwah ban ïakynduh ne iakhublei kti bad u Dr Mukul, hynrei ka KSU kan iaid shakhmat beit ban dawa ban pynsangeh iaka lynti rel kaba long ka jingdawa kaba shong nongrim na ka bynta ban iada iaka jaidbynriew”, u la ong. Katba u General Secretary ka KSU u samla Donald V Thabah ula ong ba ka KSU kala pyrshah iaka lynti rel naduh ki por ba mynshwa haduh kane ka khyllipmat kaba mynta bad ka seng ka ieng rasong ban ieng pyrshah iaka lynti rel.Ula ong ba ka jaidbynriew kala shah ïuhroit la ka long ha ka khaii pateng, ka shongkha shongman, ka iohkam iohjam bad kumta ter ter.Kumjuh u u Secretary barim ka Mawsiatkhnam u bah KW Lyngrah ula ong ba ka tnad rel kala shu leh donbor ha kaban shna iaka lynti rel ha kaba kala wan ban sieh ia u pud u sam ha ka jaka jong ki nongshong shnong khlem da ioh jingbit shwa na ki trai jaka bad kala iaid lait ruh na ki bor shnong.Ha kane ka jingialang paidbah la iadonlang u Rangbah Shnong ka Umrynjah u Bah S Khongwir, u Secretary barim ka Mawsiatkhnam u bah KW Lyngrah, ki nongialam bad ki dkhot jong ka KSU na ki unit bad circle bapher bapher bad ki paidbah ka thain Umrynjah bad Mawsiatkhnam.
title: “Ka KSU ka iakhih, kam kwah  ia khublei kti bad u Mukul”

content: Nongpoh, 14 Naitung:Ha kawei ka jingjia pluhding kaba la jia mynta ka step ha ka shnong Baridua, Ri Bhoi District, ha kaba haduh 7 tylli ki dukan die jhur kiba don ha katei ka shnong ki la kylla dpei, hadien ba ka ding kaba shyrkhei ka la klang bad bam duh ia baroh ki tiar ki tar kiba don ha kitei ki dukan shnong.Katkum ka jingiathuh da u Bah Ioanis Narleng, Rangbah Shnong ka Baridua, la ong ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia mynta ka step ha ka por 1 baje ei mynstep bad ha kane ka jingpluh jong kitei ki dukan ar tylli napdeng kitei ki dukan ki dei jong ka Kong Mitilda Lyndem bad Kong Merilinda Majaw kiba dei ki nongshong shnong ka Baridua, katba kiba sah na kitei pat ki dei ki dukan jong ki bar jylla kiba wan ban sahwai ha Baridua.U la iathuh ruh ba ia daw jong ka jingpluh jong kitei ki dukan ym lah ban tip namar ka la jia ha ka por shiteng synnia, hynrei kane ka jingpluh jong kitei ki dukan ka la wanrah shisha ia ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ia ki trai dukan, namar baroh ki tiar ki tar bad ki jingdon jingem ha kitei ki dukan ki la kylla dpei lut.Da ka jingpoi kham kloi da ki kali pynlip ding na Assam, khyndiat la lah ban tehlakam noh ia katei ka ding kaba la klang bad sdang ruh ban pur sha kiwei pat ki dukan kiba don ha katei ka jaka, namar ha kane ka jaka ki don haduh 20 tylli ei ei ki dukan.Tang mar iatip halor kane ka jingjia, na ka liang ki Pulit ka Khanapara Police Station ha ryngkat ka ki pulit ka Assam ki la wan ban jurip bad ban tohkit bad ban wad ia ka daw kaba la pynlong ia kane ka jingpluh kitei ki dukan ha Baridua.
title: Bam shngiam ka ding, ia 7 tylli  ki dukan shnong ha Baridua

content: Shillong, 14 Naitung:U Lamphang ka Iing dorbar u AT Mondal mynta ka sngi, u la iathuh ba ka sorkar ka la mang pisa T. 95 klur na ka bynta ban shna ia ka Iingdorbar thawain kaba thymmai ha Mawdiangdiang ha ka jingheh kaba 80 akar.Ia kane ka iing dorbar thymmai yn sa ioh ban pynlong dorbar hadien ar snem shiteng ne 30 bnai kaba la buh por ban pyndep ia ka.U Lamphang u la iathuh ba ia ka jingthaw ne dro dur ia kane Iing dorbar la aiti ha ka kompeni Design Associate kaba dei na Noida, New Delhi.Katkum ka jingiathuh u Mondal, la buh thong ba ka jingpyndep ban shna ia ka dur ne design ia ka iing dorbar thymmai kan long ha u Nailur mynta u snem kata ar bnai bad hadien kane, yn sa sdang sa ka kam ban shna ia ka iing, kaban sa khot tender wut wut.Ka jingtei ia kane ka iing dorbar kaba thymmai kan long shwa ha ki ar bynta kata kynthup ia ka Iing ban pynlong dorbar , bad kawei pat ban shna ia ka Secretariat. Katba ia kiwei kum ka jaka sah u Lamphang, ki nongtrei, bad kiwei ki jingdonkam yn sa leh ha ka bynta kaba ar.“Ngi la buh por ban pyndep ban dro dur ha u bnai Nailur, bad hadien kane ngin sa khot tender ban shna ia ka iing kaban sdang noh mar ia dep ia ka jingdro dur”, la ong u Lamphang haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi.U Lamphang u la iathuh ba T.20 klur lah dep mang pisa ka sorkar jylla na ka bynta u snem bad ha ka dorbar ban wan kan sa mang pisa shuh na ka bynta kane ka kam.Katkum ka jingong u Mondal, ka jaka kaba pynlong ophis mynta ha Khyndai Lad, yn sa ai jingmut sha ka sorkar jylla ba kan shna noh kum ka Museum ban long ka jaka jngohkai jong ki briew hadien ba la dep ia ka iing thymmai ha Mawdiangdiang.Lah ban kdew ba ka iing dorbar ka Meghalaya ka la kylla dpei ha u snem 2011 bad naduh katei ka snem, ka jylla kam pat don iing dorbar la kajong ban shong dorbar hynrei la shu shim wai ia ka iing kaba don ha Rilbong.Ka High Power Committee ka iing dorbar kiba rim ki la jied bun tylli ki jaka hynrei la pynkylla biang ia ka rai na ka por sha ka por. Ha ka jingshisha, la dep buh mawnongrim ruh ban shna ia ka ha Upper Shillong ha jaka ka tnad ka rep ka riang da u Lat ka jylla hynrei kham hadien la pynkylla noh bad mynta ka sorkar ka la pynskhem ban tei beit ha Mawdiangdiang.
title: T.95 klur, yn shna Iing dorbar  thawain ha Mawdiangdiang

content: Nongpoh, 14 Naitung:Naduh ba ki dkhot ka Khasi Student Union ki la leit ban hiarthma nongtrei ka Lynti Rel da kaba pynjulor ruh ki mashin kiba dang pyntrei ha katei ka jaka, ha kaba naduh katei ka por ba la jia katei ka jingshah hiarthma bud sa ka jingshah kem ki dkhot ka KSU, la mih shibun ki huri hura hapoh ka Distrik kat haduh ba ka la ktah shisha ia ka shongsuk shongsain ha ka Distrik hi baroh kawei.Naduh ba la jia katei jingshah hiarthma, haba u Nongthohkhubor U Rupang ula ioh ban iakren bad ki katto katne ngut ki riew paidbah hapoh ka Distrik, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur, namar kat kane ka saw ka sian kaba la pynkhih phaloh ym tang ha ka Distrik, hynrei ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei, pynban wat tang uwei napdeng ki nongmihkhmat paidbah napoh ka Distrik, uba mih shakhmat ban iakren halor kane ka phang.Ka long shisha kaei kaei kaba sngewkhia ban iohi ia ka jinglong jong ki nongmihkhmat jongngi, ha kaba ki heh nia tang ha ka por ialap Ilekshon bad kaei kaba la pynlong ianga ban kren ia kane ka dei ruh hadien ba la lap ba ha ka por ba ki paidbah ki donkam shisha ia ka sur jingkyrshan na ki nongmihkhmat ban iakren halor kane ka mat, pynban ki jah klep bad ialeh ialade ban rieh khlem da pynpaw sur ei ei, ka dei ka jingkren kaba la iohsngew na kiba bun ngut ki riew paidbah.“Ngam lah shuh ban mutdur, kum ka Distrik kaba don haduh 5 tylli ki Konstitwensi bad 5 ngut ki nongmihkhmat paidbah, kiba kynthup ia u Dr. D.D Lapang na Nongpoh Constituency, u Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh na Umsning, u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar na Umroi, u Bah Lamboklang Mylliemngap na Jirang bad u Bah Julius K. Dorphang, uba dang don mynta ha phatok na Mawhati Constituency, ha kaba kat kine ki nongmihkhmat kiba ngi la don, kiba kum ki paidbah ki ap khmieh lynti ba kin iatai na ka bynta ki jingeh kaba la kynduh da ka Ri bad Jaidbynriew, hynrei haba poi kum kane ka por kim kren ei ei bad ka pynpaw pynban ba ki tieng wat tang ban ang ia ka shyntur hakhmat u Dr. Mukul Sangma” ong uwei na ki rangbah bym kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng.Lada ka long ha kane ka rukom, ka long shisha ka jinglehrain kaba khraw ia ki nongmihkhmat napoh ka dong Ri Bhoi jongngi bad haba kumne tharai kim lehrain ban wanmih sha ki paidbah ynda la poi ka por ba kin wan ban ialap Ilekshon, katba ha ka por ba ki paidbah ki donkam ki jah rngai bad ki kiar ban iatai bad ki paidbah halor ka jingeh kaba la iakynduh da ki paidbah.Toi ha ka jingiakren, lah ne ym lah lada iakren ia kano kano ka jingeh kaba la iakynduh da ki paidbah, hynrei ban iakren bad pynshai ka long kaba donkam haduh katta katta, hynrei ban shu sngapjar ha kane ka rukom te ka long pynban ka jinglehrain ban long nongmihkhmat, namarkata nga kyntu iaphi ki nongmihkhmat ban phin wan shakhmat haba ki paidbah ki donkam ka jingiarap, ym ban rieh sha kyndong bad mih pyrthei tang ha ka por ialap Ilekshon ban wan kular kai ia ki paidbah bapli, u la bynrap.
title: “Ym don uba nud ban kren Lynti Rel”

content: Shillong, 14 Naitung:U MLA ka Mawhati uba la shah kynnoh leit beijot ia ka khynnah rit, u la shah weng noh na ka jinglong dkhot ka Privilege Committee ka Iing dorbar thawain ka jylla bad kumjuh ruh na ka Committee on Subordinate Legislation ka Assembly.U Lamphang ka iing dorbar u AT Mondal u la iathuh mynta ka sngi, ba ia u Bah Julius K Dorphang la weng ruh naduh kham mynshwa na ka kam chairman ka Committee on Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe hadien ba u la shah pynngat mukotduma halor ki kam runar jongu.Katkum ka jingong u Lamphang, ka jingbuh dkhot ia u ha ka Privilege Committee bad ka Subrodinate Committee ka long hadien ba kumba ju long ki shu pynthymmai ia ki dkhot man ka snem ha u bnai Naitung bad ki klet ban weng ia ka kyrteng jongu bad hynnin ka sngi, ki la weng noh ia u na ka jinglong dkhot na baroh kine ki committee ka Assembly.Kane ka jingweng noh ia u na kine ki committee ka long ruh shi bynta hadien ba la mih pyrthei ha ki lad pathai khubor bad kumjuh hadien ba ar tylli ki seng bapher bapher kynthup ka CSWO, ka TUR, NGN, KHNAM bad kiwei ki la ki la aiti da ka dorkhas ba dei ban weng noh ia u Bah Dorphang na kine ki komiti namar ba u dang don ha ka jingbishar ka ain namar ki kam runar ba shyrkhei.Wat ka Chairperson ka Commission for Protection of Child Rights ka Kong Meena Kharkongor ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew kyndit halor ka jingpaw kyrteng u MLA ka Mawhati ha kine ki Committee haba u dang don uwei uba la shah pynngat ha ka ain POCSO Act.“Ngi la weng ia u na ka jinglong dkhot jong baroh ki Committee”, la ong u Lamphang u AT Mondal mynta ka sngi.Ia ka jingpynbna halor kane la pynmih hynnin ka sngi ka 13 tarik Naiung.U la ong ba ia ka jinglong chairman jong u ia ka Committee on Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe la weng naduh kham mynshwa.“Mynta um dei shuh u dkhot jong kano kano ka Committee”, la bynrap u Lamphang.
title: Shah weng U Bah Julius kum u dkhot  ka PC, Chairman ka SCST Committee

content: Shillong, 14 Naitung:Na ka liang jong ka Association for Democracy and Empowerement (ADE), kaba don ha Tura, ka kyrshan radbah, halor ka jing pyrshah lynti rel jong ka Khasi Students Union lem bad kiwei ki sengbhalang bad ka ADE, ka kren shai ba ka sorkar ka dei ban sngewthuh ia kaei ka jingsngew kaba shisha, kaba don ha lyndet jong katei ka jingiakhih.Ka ADE, ka kren shai ba ka mat, kaba don hangne, kam dei satia halor ka lynti rel, hynrei ka dei halor ka lad ban khang ia ka jingtuid ki bar Jylla, kaba ki la dawa ha ka nongrim jong ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) bad katei ka seng, ka ong ba ka jingiakren, ka laid halor ka phang la bunsien, kum ki khyrdop talasi bar Jylla, ka jing pynrung kyrteng ia ki nongshang pyrthei bad kiwei kiwei, hynrei katei kam treikam satia haduh ha kine ki sngi.Katei ka seng, ka ong ba ka sorkar, ka dei ban sangeh noh shisyndon ia kane ka phang bad kan dei ban wan rah, da ka mat kaba shai bha, da ka jing ia syllok bad ki kynhun seng bapher.Ka ADE, ka pynsngew ruh halor ka jingduh jingjulor ka thain Mendipathar, na ka daw jong ka jingpun lynti rel bad ka iathuh ba katei ka kad rel, kaba don ha Mendipathar, kaba don ha khappud jong ka Assam, kam don jingmut eiei ruh em, namar ka don tang kawei ka rel, kaba iaid na Mendipathar sha Guwahati bad u paidlang jong ka Garo Hills, um ioh jingmyntoi eiei satia na katei ka kad rel kaba don ha katei ka jaka bad ka seng, ka ong ruh ba la lap pynban tang ki kam tuh kam thiem, ki kam pyniap briew, ki kam shait kynthei kiba jia sha katei ka thain ba don kad rel.Ka ADE, ka dawa ia ka sorkar Jylla, ba kan iakren noh mardor bad ki sengbhalang, hynrei lada jia ba ka dang iai bteng ban leh mynthi, kumta katei ka seng, kan shim bynta lang ha ki jingiakhih pyrshah rel ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan, ki ban ktah ia ka Jylla baroh kawei, ong ka kyrwoh na U Dalseng Bira Ch. Momin, President, ADE.
title: Bun ki kam ia pyniap ki kam shait  kynthei sha kad rel, ong ka ADE

content: Shillong, 14 Naitung:Ka Congress ka lah ban rah suk ha ka elek-shon CEM ka GHADC ka ba long ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai. Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u kyrtong CEM ka Congress u Boston Marak u la ong ba kumhba ka long haduh mynta katei ka seng ka don haduh 16 ngut ki MDC kiba la pynthikna ba kin don ha ka liang jong u hynrei u la ong ba kin dang don sa kiwei pat ruh ki ban dang wan ia soh, “Nga la thikna ba ngin jop lypa ia ka shuki CEM” ong u Boston Marak haba ia kren bad u Rupang.La kylli na u Boston hato iano ka Congress kan pynieng kyrtong ban long u Chairman ka GHADC, haduh mynta u la ong ba kim pat shim rai satia bad kin dang hap ban pynbeit ha ka jingialang jong ki lashai ne la shingi, “Ngin dang hap rai ha ka jingialang iano ban pynlong Chairman hynrei ia ka shuki CEM te ngi la thikna ba ngin jop ma ngi” u la ong.U Rupang u la ioh ban ia kren ruh bad u MDC ka NPP uba dei u Dy.CEM barim ka GHADC u Augustine Sangma. Ha ka jingiakren bad u bah Augustine u la ong ba haduh mynta um pat thikna satia la un leit thep vote ne-em ha ka elekshon CEM, “Ka jingkam u Boston ba u don 16 ngut ka lah ban dei ka jingshisha, nga ialade ruh ngam thikna la ngan leit thep vote ne-em ha ka elekshon CEM” ong u Augustine uba la kren tlot lypa ia ka jingdon briew ka NPP. La kylli na u Augustine balei u kren artatien kumta hato u don jingmut pynban ne ban mih noh na ka seng NPP , “Haduh mynta nga dang dei hi u MDC ka NPP hynrei ia ka jingleit thep vote ngam sngewthikna ban leit” u la ong.U Rupang u la ioh ia kren ruh bad katto katne ngut ki MDC kiba don ha ka liang ka NPP hynrei kitei ruh ki la pynpaw kajuh ka sur kaba ki la kren lypa ialade bad ki la ong ba ka shuki CEM kan leit beit hi sha u Boston. Haba pyrshang ban wad ia ka daw katei ka jingkren tlot jong kila sngewthuh ba ka dawbah ka dei ba kim mon ia u kyrtong CEM ka NPP ba mynta u Sukharan K Sangma.
title: Lah ban rah suk ka Congress  ha ka elekshon CEM ka GHADC

content: Shillong, 14 Naitung:U President rangbah ka KSU u samla Lambokstar Marngar, u la ong ba ka KSU ka la ioh ia ka shithi mynta ka sngi ba ka sorkar ka khot ia kren ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai; hynrei haduh mynta ka KSU kam pat shim ia kano kano ka rai la kan leit ne em sha katei ka miej jingiakren bad ka sorkar.U samla Marngar u la ong ba ka mat ba ka sorkar ka la khot ban ia kren ka dei halor ka aiñ pyrkhing mynder kaba ka la ai kyrteng kum ka Comprehensive Mechanism bad kam don eiei ka mat kaba ia dei bad ka jingiakhih lynti Rel.“Haduh mynta ngim pat shim rai eiei la ngin leit ne-em sha katei ka jingiakren, ngim pat treh eie ban ong mynta la ngin leit ia kren ne-em” ong utei u President ka KSU haba ia kren bad u Rupang lyngba ka phone.Haba ia kren pat bad u President ka FKJGP u bah Welbirth Rani lyngba ka phone u la ong ba ki la ioh jingtip ia katei ka jingkhot ia kren ka sorkar bad ki la rai ban leit ia kren bad ka mat ba la khot ka dei halor ka Comprehensive Mechanism.U General Secretary ka HNYF u bah Sadon Blah ruh haba ia kren lyngba ka telephone u la ong ba la ioh jingtip bad la rai ban leit ia kren. Lah ban kdew ba katei ka jingkhot ia kren u myntri rangbah ka dei ia baroh ki 13 sengbhalang kiba la donlang ha kajuh ka kynhun ha ka por ia khih ILP. La sngewthuh ba ha katei ka jingiakren kan don ruh ka bynta ban ia kren na ka bynta ka lynti rel.Mynta ka jingialang lynti rel ka KSU ha SohraLashai ka sngi ka 15tarik u naitung ka KSU Sohra Circle kan pynlong ia ka jingialang ha iew Sohra ka ban sdang naduh ka por 12 baje shiteng sngi. Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u President ka KSU Sohra Circle u bah Shem Synrem, u la ong ba la pyntip lut ia baroh ki dkhot ka KSU ha ka thaiñ Sohra bad la pynlong khnang ia ka jingialang lashai ka sngi namarba ka dei ka sngi iew bad baroh ki shnogn na kyndong ka thain ka Sohra ki wan iew bad kin iohsngew lut ia ka jingpynshai ki nongialam ka KSU ki ban wan na ka Sengkmie kiba kynthup ia u samla Donald V Thabah General Secretary.
title: Ym pat lah rai ka KSU, la yn  leit ia kren ne em bad ka sorkar

content: Mairang, 16 Naitung:U syiem bad ki myntri ryngkat bad ka hima nongkhlaw baroh kawei kin rakhe ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba 182 jong u Syiem tirot Sing ha Mairang ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai ka ban sdang naduh ka por 10.30 mynstep. Ha kane ka jingrakhe la khot la wer ia ki khun ki hajar jong ka hima bad ia ki paid khasi khara ban ia snoh kti lang kum ka dak jong ka jingiatylli bad burom ia une u khla wait u ba la aiti lade na ka bynta ka Ri bad ka jaidbynriew, na ka liang u syiem bad ki myntri kila dep pynkhreh na dong sha dong ia ka jingrkahe ia kane ka sngi sah kynmaw.Ha katei ka sngi nalor ka jingleit buh syntiew ha u Mot Tirot, ka jingialang paidbah, kin don ruh ki prokam la riti, kiba ki khun samla ki don ban pyni sha ki paidbah ia ki jingriew spah ka riti ka dustur khun khasi khara jong ka hima nongkhlaw, kin don ruh ki jingrwai ba la tip kum ki sur na krem Tirot kiban pynkyndeh mynsiem na ki khynnah skul bad ki kaitor ba pawnam ka Ri, kum u Bah Banker Kharkongor, Anthony Jana, Bah Kulshan Rani, kong Adalyne Khonglam, kong Bateithymmai bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Hima ka la pynkhreh ruh ia ka iew tynrai kaba ki paidbah kin nym khuslai ia ka bam ka dih ha ba kin wan ban ia rakhe lang ia kane ka sngi kunmaw burom, yn sakhi lang ia katei ka sngi da ka jingiadon lang u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh Myntri ba dei peit ia ki riti dustur ka sorkar jylla,U Bah Kennedy Khyriem Parliamentary Secretary ka tnad jngohkai pyrthei, ki MLA, ki MDC ki ophisar sorkar, ki para Syiem bad ki Lyngdoh na kiwei pat ki hima.Halor kane ka jingrakhe, u Syiem bad ka dorkar, ki la rai ba ka jingrakhe kan nym long tang ban pyndep rukom, ne ban pynlong tang kum ka tamasa ia katei ka sngi ba khraw, na ka liang jong ka hima ka kwah ban ban iohi ba haduh katno ki khun ki hajar jong ka hima ki sngewthuh ia kane ka sngi bad ruh ki khynnah pule, lane ki long dien kin tip bniah sha phang une u syiem ba khraw u ba la rah la ka wait ka stieh ban ia khun pyrshah ia ki pahreng da ka thma ka shuwar.Ha kine ki khyndiat taiew kiba la dep u Syiem bad ki myntri ki la leit ban hiar sha ki khappud Assam ban ker ban da ia la u jong u pud u sam, ioh don kiba wan tam pud, lada don kiba wan tam pud na ki wei ki jylla, na ka liang jong ka hima Nongkhlaw kan nym ailad ba kan don ka jingwan tam pud, sha u pud u sam jong ka hima.U Syiem bad ki myntri jong ka hima ha kine ki sngi, ki la leit hiar da lade ban rung sha ki krem ki kroh kiba u Syiem Tirot Sing u la ia syllok jar jar bad la ki jong ki shipai ki swar kumno ban ia khun pyrshah ia ki ktang suloi jong ki phareng, namar kane ka jingiakhun ka long da ka buit ia khun thma ha ki khlaw ki btap bad ka hima ka la leit ban jngoh ia ka Krem Tirot kaba don ha Umthlu-khyrdop bad ki sawdong jong kane ka jaka.Ha kane ka jingleit jurip jong u Syiem bad ki myntri kila lap ia u wei u Mawbynna u ba don main rangbah u ba la pynieng kumba shipda maw ha khmat jong ka krem Tirot ha Umthlu, khyrdop ha shnong Nongkhla bad ki tymmen ki san jong kane ka shnong ki la iathuh ha kiba khraw jong ka Hima ba ia une u maw bynna la pynieng da u Tirot Sing ha lynti ha shuwa ba un leit sla lum Sohmylleng ban leit ia kren ia suk bad ki phareng hapoh ka jingialam jong u Kaptain English, hynrei u la shah shet pynban, ha ka jaka ba ki phareng kin ia kren ia suk kumba ki la phah ktien, ki la kem pynban ia u bad rak bak sha Dhaka ban set byndi hangta.Une u Mawbynna u ba jrong kumba 12 phut ei ei ka dei na ka daw jong u jumai ha u snem 1897 u la thiah kynriang, ha kane ka jingkhynniuh jumai bah ka la pynlong wat ia ka krem Tirot ruh bad ki kamra kiba u Tirot Sing u pyndonkam, ki la dam syndah noh. Na ka liang jong ka Hima, ki la shim ia ka rai ba u Syiem bad ki myntri kila rai ban dang wad shuh shuh sa ia kiwei kiwei ki dak ki shin ba la buh dak da u Syiem Tirot ha ka hima bad ki long dien kin tip sha phang une u syiem ba khraw, ong ka kyrwoh jong ka Tirot Sing Death anniversary Celebration Committee, Hima Nongkhlaw.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, na ka liang jong ka Dorbar ki Khlieh Nongsynshar ka Ri Hynniewtrep, ka pynsngew ba ka 17tarik Naitung 2017, ka dei ka sngi rakhe ia jingdap 182 snem ka sngi iap u Syiem Tirot Sing Syiem, Syiem Hima Nongkhlaw, uba la iap ha byndi ha Dhaka halor ka nongrim ban ioh ban pynneh bad ban pynsah ia ka jingsynshar Khasi kaba laitluid, bad katei ka thong ka jong u Syiem Tirot ka dang iai im haduh kine ki sngi.Katei ka dorbar, lyngba U bah John F Kharshiing, ka ong ba kine ki sngi ki dei ki por ka jingtynjuh kaba shyrkhei ha kaba ki sbai bun rong jong ka pyrthei ki pynmatlah, pynsakma bad pynbakla ia ki khun ki hajar ha ki kyrteng bad ki dur kiba bun rukom bad ka wan rah ia ka jingma ba ngi lah ban duh noh syndon ia ki hok tynrai jong ngi, khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka jinglong trai halor ka khyndew ka shiap, bad kiwei kiwei. “Ngi ngeit ba phi ia tip baroh ba ki don palat spah tylli ki ain ba la pynjari naduh ba kha ka Ri India, kiba ap ban pynmadan ia ngi lada ngim sngewthuh bha kumno ban iada ialade da ki ain kiba skhem bad lada ki hok jong ngi kim paw ha kaba shai ha ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India” ong U bah Kharshiing.“Ngi donkam ban kyndit bynriew ha shwa ban dier ka por, ngi dei ban im sngi ban ieng ha ka nongrim ki Riti Dustur jong ngi ia kaba ka history ka sakhi ba u Syiem Tirot Sing Syiem u la ieng ban ialeh ban pynneh ia ka jinglaitluid jong ka synshar u khasi ha kine ki lum ba thiang jong ngi, da kaba u rai ban iap ha byndi ha Dhaka ban ia kaba long u Syiem mraw” ong shuh ka kyrwoh.Katei ka kyrwoh, ka ong shuh shuh ba bunsien la juh shah kylli ha kiba bun, ia ka jingiapher ki nongrim jong u Syiem Tirot Sing Syiem, Syiem Hima Nongkhlaw 182 snem mynshwa bad ka nongrim u Syiem Wickliff Syiem, u Syiem Khynnah, Hima Nongstoin, ha u snem 1947-48 (64 snem) mynshwa bad ula ong ba ka dei ka pateng jong ka juk mynta ban shim khia ban wad bad ban ngam jylliew ban long kiba smat ban pule bad ban sngewthuh ia kitei ki nongrim jong kitei arngut ki riew khraw.“Haduh kine ki sngi ngi dang iai don ha ka jingialeh kaba shyrkhei, ym shuh da ka wait ka stieh hynrei ngi don mynta ha ka juk jong ka thma ki ain kiba mih na kibor Sorkar India kiba khreh ban nguid im ia ki ain jong ka Riti ki Dustur u Khasi” ong ka kyrwoh U bah Kharshiing.Ha ba kum kane ka por katno ka long kaba donkam bha ban ioh ki nongmihkhmat kiba sngewthuh kiba skhem jingmut ban iada ia ngi katkum ki nongrim synshar laitluid u Khasi kumba la kdew nuksa da u Syiem Tirot Sing Syiem, Syiem Hima Nongkhlaw bad u Syiem Wicklieff Syiem, Syiem Khynnah Hima Nongstoin, ong shuh ka kyrwoh khubor.
title: Hiar U Syiem Nongkhlaw, ban ker  ia u pud u sam sha khappud Assam

content: Shillong, 16 Naitung:Ka elekshon ban jied ia u President kan long lashai ka sngi ha kaba ki MLA bad ki MP ka ri kin iashim bynta ban jied napdeng ar ngut, kynthup u kyrtong ka NAD u Ram Nath Kovind bad ka kyrtong ka UPA ka Meira Kumar.Haba twad jingmut na ka UDP, la iathuh ba haduh mynta kam pat shim ia ka rai iano ban kyrshan hynrei la sngewthuh ba la aiti ha ka mon laitluid jong ki MLA iano ban jied napdeng kine ki ar ngut ki kyrtong.U general secretary ka UDP u Dr Jemino mawthoh haba kren mynta ka sngi, u la iathuh ba ka party kam pat iakren kumno bad iano ban jied hynrei la shu ai mon laitluid ha ka mon shimet jong ki MLA iano ki ibit ban jied.Hynrei ban leit thep vote, ka UDP kan iashong jingialang shwa lashai ka sngi por 11 baje mynstep bad ha kane ka jingialang lah ban shim ia ka rai iano ban kyrshan. “Ngi la iapynsngew kumto, ha kaba u President jong ka party ruh u la ong kumta hynrei ngi la ai laitluid ia ki MLA ban jied tangba ngin don ka jingialang lashai mynstep shwa ban leit thep vote”, la ong u Dr Jemino Mawthoh.Kham mynshwa, u President ka UDP u Dr Donkupar Roy u la ong ba ha u shimet, u kham lah ia u Kovind ban ia ka Meira tangba kan shong ha ka party iano kan rai.Katkum ba paw, ka UDP kam don kano kano ka jingmut kaba iatylli iano ban jied namar ba ki don ki bym sngew tynnad ia u kyrtong ka BJP bad don ruh ki bym sngew kwah ia ka kyrtong ka Congress. Ka HSPDP ka la pynbna kham mynshwa ba kan nym iashim bynta ha kane ka elekshon jied president namar ba ka pyrshah ia ki kyrtong jong baroh ar tylli kine ki party.Lada duna Vote ka Meira, yn don ki MLA Congress ki ban shah sosponKiwei ki lad khubor, ki iathuh ba ka seng Congress ha kane ka jylla ka la ioh lum bun ki jingtip bad ki jingujor ha kine ki sngi shaphang ka jingsdang ki MLA jong ka ban pyrshah seng bad ka jingai dak jong ki ban phet seng noh shuwa ka elekshon 2018. Katei ka seng haduh mynta ka dang sngap jar jar bad kam pat kynthoh eiei halor katei ka jingtip ba ka la ioh lum hynrei ki tyllong khubor ki la iathuh ba katei ka mynta ka la shim da kawei pat ka sienjam kaba jar jar da kaba buh pyrman ha kane ka elekshon President ka Ri ka ban long lashai ka sngi ka 17 tarik u naitung.Ki tyllong khubor ki la iathuh ba ka seng Congress ka la ioh jingtip ruh ba kin don ki MLA jong ka ki ban ym kyrshan ia ka Meira Kumar hynrei kin thep vote sha u kyrtong ka NDA u Ram Nath Kovind, kumta la ong ba katei ka seng kan peit bha dngong ha kane ka elekshon la ka vote ba ka Congress ka dei ban ioh na kane jylla kan ioh shisha ne-em kumba ka la dep kheiñ lypa. La iathuh ba ki la don katto katne ngut ki MLA kiba katei ka seng ka la suba jur ba ki lah ban dei kiba pyrshah seng bad la ong ruh ba lada jia ba ka vote ba ka Meira Kumar kan ioh na kane ka jylla kan ym ia hap jingkheiñ satia katei ka seng ka la pynkhreh ban pynshitom ia ki katto katne ngut ki MLA kiba ka la buh kyrteng hakhmat bad ka jingpynshitom la ong ba ka lah ban long kumba ka la leh ia u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem kata da kaba sospon. Shuh shuh la iathuh ba hadien ka elekshon President ka saiñpyrthei ha kane ka jylla kan khih phaloh bha bad la iathuh ba lada ka Meira kan ioh duna vote na kane ka jylla ba synshar ka Congress khlem pep ka thma pohing hapoh katei ka seng kan sa khluit bha.Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ha ka elekshon President kin sa don katto katne ngut ki MLA Congress kumjuh ki paralok MLA jong ka kiba don ha ka liang synshar ki ban ym kyrshan satia ia ka kyrtong jong katei ka seng ka Meira Kumar bad la ong ba kin kyrshan ia u kyrtong ka NDA u Ram Nath Kovind. Haba pyrshang ban kylli na kitei ki MLA kim shym la iathuh satia shano kin vote hynrei ki la ong ba ka jingthep vote kan long da ka Secret Ballot bad yn ym don ba lah ban tip shano kin kyrshan. Lah ban kdew ba ka seng UDP kaba don 8 ngut ki MLA ka la pynbna ba kan kyrshan ia u Ram Nath Kovind kyrtong ka NDA, ka HSPDP kaba don 4 ngut ki MLA kan ym ia shim bynta satia ha katei ka elekshon, nangta ki don sa kiwei pat ki seng kiba don ha ka Liang pyrshah ki ban kyrshan ia u Kovind. Katba ka Congress ka don 30 ngut tam ki MLA ha ka sorkar MUA.
title: Mynta jied President, ai mon ka UDP ha ki MLA iano ban jied

content: Jowai, 19 Naitung:Ka lehniam Behdeinkhlam jong ka Sein Raij Jowai kaba la sdang naduh ka Palei ka la kut noh mynta kane ka sngi U Blei hapdeng ka jingshongshit bad ka jingiphuh iphieng.Nalor ki hajar ki paidbah kiba la wan sakhi ia katei ka lehniam, mynta ka sngi u Lat ka jylla u Banwarilal Purohit u la ong u kongsan ha ka jingdonlang u Justice Ved Prakash Vaish, u nongbishar ka Meghalaya High Court nalor u Myntri ka sorkar uba dei peit ia ka tnad C&RD Block u ma Sniawbhalang Dhar nalor kiwei kiwei ki sahep sorkar na ki tnad bapher bapher.Ka lehniam Behdeinkhlam ha ki saw sngi yn pyndep ia ki lehniam bapher bapher na ka bynta ban beh krat ia ka Khlam kaba lah ban wan ha ka dur ka pang ka shitom, ka jingbishni, pihuin, ka jingap thngan, ka jingsniew ba har rukom ha ka imlang ka sahlang bad ha ka kamai ka kajih bad ka bor mariang.Ha kane ka sngi, la pyndep ia ka niam ka rukom bapher bapher da u Dolloi, u Langdoh, ki Wasan ki Myntri naduh ka Bam Tyngkong, ka Shoh Thyndai bad kiwei kiwei.Hadien la pynhiar ia ka Deinkhlam ka Beipun Doh bad ka Beipun Bon bud pat sha ka Synbud Khnong bad hadien katta pat ki khon ka Niamtre Niamtynrai na ki dong bapher bapher ka Nongbah Jowai ki la wanrah ia ki rot ba la shna itynnad ha ki dur ki dur.Haduh 13 tylli ki rot la wanrah sha Aitnar mynta ka sngi, Kitei ki rot ki wanrah ruh ia ka khubor sha ki nongsakhi naduh ka khubor ban kren pyrshah ia ka jingshah banbein ki kynthei ki longkmie haduh ka jingpyniap pathar ia ki mrad ki mreng bad ka jingpynjot ia ka mariang.Kawei na ki rot ba la wanrah da ka Panaliar ka kren pyrshah iaka jingsniew ka jingdih duma (Sikret).Ka Datlawakor kaba dei kawei pat ka bynta ka lehniam Behdeinkhlam bala pyndep ha Pohsawiar. Ka Datlawakor kadei ka jingialehkai kaba syriem ia ka jingialeh kai phutbol ha kaba ki ar kynhun, ka kynhun u Sangot Paswet bad ka kynhun u Langdoh.Ha kane ka kynti ka kynhun jong u Langdoh na ka Pynthorwah, u la jop ia u Sangot Paswet bad katkum ka jingngeit, ka rep ka riang, u khaw u kba un kham bha sha ka pynthor wah.
title: Ha ka jing iphuh, kut ka  Behdeinkhlam ka Sein Raij Jowai

content: Shillong, 16 Naitung:Hynnin ka miet, uwei u pulit langrut u la mynsaw jur haba uwei u havildar u la synreit kuli da ka pistol na khlieh jongu hadien ba la mih ka jingiakajia hapdeng jongki ha Mawiong.Katkum ka jingiathuh u SP (Crimes) u Bah Vivek Syiem, uba mynsaw la tip kyrteng kum u Sumarto Snaitang uba dei u pulit Langrut katba u Havildar uba synreit kuli la tip kyrteng kum u Randhir Kr Singh.Kat kum u SP, kane ka la jia ha ka kali jongki kaba dang iaid hajan MLP Mawiong katba ki dang wan phai na ka kam na ka Guwahati, ha ka por kumba 10:40 eiei mynmiet da ka kali ML01-5879.Donbok ba ki kuli ki shu syllud na ka bynta ka khlieh, ha kaba une u pulit langrut u la mynsaw bad la pynrah wut wut sha jaka sumar ha Shillong Civil hospital.Ia une u havildar la kem noh bad ia ka suloi bad ka kali la kurup da ki pulit. La rah ruh sha ka Kashari mynta ka sngi ia une u havildar bad ka jingtohkit kaba kham bniah, ka dang iaid.
title: Ba ia kajia, synreit u Havildar  ar kuli na khlieh u langrut

content: Nongstoiñ, 16 Naitung:Hadien ba la kut noh ka jingai por ba shi bnai jong ka seng West Khasi Students Union (WKSU) ia ka karkhana sain nar ha Rwiang, ba kan pynbiang lut ia ki jingdonkam ha katei ka karkhana katkum ka aiñ ne kita ki Rules and Regulation jong ka Factory Act; na ka liang jong ka seng hynnin ka sngi, ka la hiar biang sha katei ka karkhana ban jurip biang khnang ban lap hato katei ka karkhana ka la pyntreikam ne em ia ki jingdawa jong ka seng.Ha katei ka jingleit jurip biang jong ka seng ia katei ka karkhana na ka liang jong ka seng ka la lap ruh ba katei ka karkhana, ka la sdang ban leh bad ban pyn kohnguh ia ki mat jingdawa ia kaba ka seng kala dep ban dawa shi bnai mynshwa ha kaba ka seng ka la lap da la ki jong ki khmat ba katei ka karkhana ka la pynbiang ia ki lad jingiada ia ki nongtrei kiba kynthup naduh ki jingtap khlieh (Helmet), jingphong kti (Gloves) bad ki juti but (Boots).Ym tang katta, katei ka karkhana ka la sdang ruh ban shna ia ki nala kiba pyntuid ia ki jakhlia kiba mih na katei ka karkhana ha ryngkat ki jingjar (filter) ban pynkhuid ia ki jakhlia khnang ban pyntikna ba shwa ba ka um jakhlia kaba min na katei ka karkhana kan poi sha ka Wah Riwiang, ka la dei ban long kaba khuid bad ka bym long bih shuh khnang ba ki jingthaw kiba im ha katei ka wah kin nym don ha ka jingma.Wat la katei ka karkhana, ka la ialeh ban pynbiang ia ki jingdawa jong ka seng hynrei na ka liang jong ka seng kim pat hun satia ia ki jingtrei jong katei ka karkhana, khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkhuid jingsuba jong ka mariang ka dang long tang kumba shi pawa na ka jingdawa jong ka seng bad ka kynroh kaba iada ia u dewiong ba la dep thang (fly ash) ka dang long kaba lyngkot haduh katta katta bad ka dang don ruh ka jinglait tuh jong ka um jakhlia kaba long bih na katei ka jaka pynlang ia u fly ash kaba tuid bad poi beit beit sha ka Wah Riwiang.Hadien katei ka jingjurip na ka liang jong ka seng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah M.Syiemlieh Vice President, Bah D.Sun General Secretary bad kiwei kiwei de ki dkhot jong ka, ki la iakren markhmat ruh bad u Abhijit Gupta uba dei u Vice President jong katei ka karkhana, kaba la tip ruh kum ka Shakhambari ferro alloy Pvt Ltd bad ha katei ka jingiakren na ka liang jong u tei u Abhijit Gupta u la ong ba ka jingbym pat lah ban pynbit pynbiang ia ki mat jingdawa jong ka seng ka dei namar ka jingduna briew kum ki nongtrei bad khamtam ba mynta ka dang dei ka aiom slam ka shem shitom ia katei ka karkhana ba kan pyndep lut ia kiei kiei tang hapoh ka 1 bnai.Kumta na ka liang jong u tei u Vice President katei ka karkhana u la pan por biang ia ka seng sa kumba 2 bnai tam ei ei ban pyndep ia ki jingtrei kiba sah khamtam ia ka kynroh ban ker ia ka jaka pynlang dpei dewiong bad ia kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam bad u la ong ruh ba ha kaba iadei pat bad ki jingkular jong ka katei ka karkhana kumba ka la dep ban kular ha ka sngi ba pynlong ia ka jingiakren paidbah bad katkum ka soskular ba la ong ba yn ai kam ïa ki briew jong ka jylla haduh 70% na ka liang jong ka karkhana shen kan sa pynmih ia ki jingpyntip ha ki lad pathai khubor ia kiba bun ki kam ba ki samla jong ka Jylla kin lah ban trei ha katei ka karkhana bad kumjuh ha kaba iadei bad ki jingtrei ka karkhana kan sa khot tender ruh ia kiba kwah ban trei ia ki jingtrei ha katei ka karkhana.Hadien katei ka jingiakren na ka liang jong ka seng WKSU hadien ba kala lap bad iohi ia ki katto katne ki dak ki shin kiba katei ka karkhana ka la kohnguh bad pyntreikam ia ki mat jingdawa jong ka seng kumta na ka liang jong ka seng kala rai ban ap ia katei ka por ba la pan da u Vice President jong katei ka karkhana bad kala maham ruh ba na ka liang jong ka seng kan iai buddien biang bad lada ka seng ka dang lap ba katei ka karkhana kam pat lah ban pynbiang lut ia baroh ki jingdonkam na ka liang jong ka seng kam banse ban hap shim noh da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti kiba kham tyngeh na ka bynta ban ai jingsneng ia katei ka karkhana.
title: Hadien shi bnai, jurip biang ka  WKSU ia ka karkhana ha Riwiang

content: Shillong, 16 Naitung:Ka jingdheng kali ha ki bynta jong ka Upper Shillong, ka la jubor haduh katta katta ha ki ar sngi ba ladep, kata ha ka Sngi Thohdieng bad ka Sngi Saitjain, ha kaba ka leit ka wan na 4,5 mer sha Iew, ka shim por kumba shi kynta shiteng haduh ar kynta, kaba dei ban iaid tang 15 minit.Ha ka sngi thohdieng, ka daw jong ka jingdheng kali, ka dei shwa na ka jingkdiah u dieng ha surok bah Laimer, ha ka por 8baje mynstep, ha kaba ki kali, ki la ia phrung ruma sha Lummawbah bad nangta sa kiba sah kut ha surok bah bad mar kumta hi ka bteng ka jingdheng kali baroh shisngi, ha kaba ki briew, ki shimpor ban iaid na 3mer sha Iew, kumba shi kynta tam.Ka Kong Belbora Wankhar, kawei na ki nongtrei sengbhalang, kaba sah ialade ha Nongkseh, haba iakren bad u Rupang, ka iathuh ba ki kali na Assam, ki la khapngiah shaba palat haduh katta katta, ha kaba ka iathuh ba ha Khlieh mawiong, kaba dei ka jaka peitkai pyngngad, ki la khapngiah da ki kali Assam suda, namar ba ka dei ruh ka jaka bym don ba shim pisa eiei ruh.Ka kong Bell, ka iathuh ba ki kali kiba wan shangkai pyrthei, mar ia poi ha Shillong, ki wan beh beit sha Upper Shillong bad katei ka longkmie, ka kren lyngngoh “Haba nga leit ialam kai ia ki paralok kiba na Agra sha Lum Shyllong, hynrei tang ban rung kali ruh ym don jaka shuh bad nangta, ynda leit sha Kshaid Hati ruh, tang ka jaka ieng ruh ym don jaka shuh bad hangta ngi la hap ban wan phai noh”.Ka Kong Bell, ka kren bynniaw bha, halor ka jing ia knieh iaid ki kali ha surok bah, nangta sa ka jingbun ki kali jong ki riew shimet ha surok, ha kaba mynta wat ki taksi ruh ki la shem shitom shibun eh ban kamai.Ka Kong Bell, ka iathuh ba ha kane ka taiew ba ladep, kawei ka longkmie, kaba die jhur khutia ha Iewduh, ka la wan phai noh, namar ba haduh 11.30 mynstep ruh, ym poi jhur, namar ba ka jubor palat ka jingdheng kali ha surok bah.U bah Disparsing Rani, uwei na ki nongniah Taksi, uba sah ha 3mer, Upper Shillong, u iathuh ba ka jingdheng kali, ka jubor bha ha ka sngi iew, namar ka dei ka sngi leit siew leit tda ki nongkyndong sha sor bad nangta, kaba dei ruh ka sngi leit kai ki nongwan kai pyrthei sha Sohra.
