Kawei pat ka jingeh, kaba U Bah Rani, u iathuh ka long ba ka jingdheng kali hi, ka dei bunsien na jaka ieng pulit ha Anjalee, namar ba ki kali, kiba leit sha Iewduh, ki sahkut ha katei ka jaka bad utei u rangbah, u iathuh ba ki kali, kiba leit sha Iewduh, kim don jaka ieng shuh satia bad kumta tang shu sahkut kali ha Anjalee, kumta ki kali ki la sahkut lut sbak, naduh kiba leit sha Upper Shillong, namar kiba rung sha Iew ruh kim lait bad kiba mih ruh kim lait satia.U Bah Rani, u kren artatien ruh ia kata ka surok kaba saw kali, ba kan trei kam noh kham kloi sha Upper Shillong bad ula bteng shuh shuh, ba ka jingkiew jong ki nongshang pyrthei, ka dei naduh ba u leit shondur U Narendra Modi ha Kshaid hati, ha kaba ki briew ki shim, ba tang ban leit shondur, hangtei, ka long ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw shi katdei.U Bah Rani, u pynkynmaw ia ka jingleit dawa jong U bah Nit Shabong, MLA barim ha u snem 1984, ba u leit dawa ba ka khlieh Iewduh, dei ban aiti noh sha ka sorkar Jylla bad u la pynsngew ba ka donkam ban don ka jingbuddien jong ka sorkar Jylla bad ban pynkut, u iathuh ia ka jingdheng kali hynnin ka sngi, ha kaba ula ong “Na neng hynniew mer, nangta ba ki buh dewiong, ha 3mer, ka shimpor haduh 45 minit”.Hynnin ka sngi saitjain, ka jingdheng kali, ka jubor palat, ha kaba ka la bteng naduh ka por mynsngi bad ka kut haduh ka por 9baje janmiet bad kiba wan phai na Iew, ki kham stet, katba kiba leit sha Iew, na 7mer, ki shimpor haduh ar kynta tam eiei, ong ka khubor, ha kaba la sngewthuh ba ka jingdheng kali, ka la sdang naduh na ki thain Baniun haduh ha Umshyrpi.
title: Ar sngi kynthih, trei ka dheng kali,  syrtok ki paidbah Upper Shillong

content: Shillong, 16 Naitung:Ki 13 tylli ki sengbhalang, ki la thoh mynta ka sngi sha U Mukul Sangma, ha kaba ki la buh ia ki mat kiba shai, na bynta ka jingiakren, ha ka 19tarik Naitung 2017 bad na ka liang jong kitei ki seng, ki pynsngew ba kata ka mat Comprehensive Mechanism, ka la poi sha ka jingthaw ia ki ar tylli ki ain, ka Benami Transaction Prohibition Act (Amended) 2016 bad ka Residents Safety and Security Act; hynrei kitei ki 13 seng, ki ong ba kitei ki ain, kim don ia ki mat treikam jongki bad kumta, ki 13 seng, ki dawa ba ka sorkar kan wan ha ka 19tarik Naitung 2017 lem bad ki mat treikam jong kitei ki ain, ba ka jingtreikam kan long kaba shai bad kaba iaid shakhmat.Ki 13 seng, ki ong shuh ba ka jing ia thoh kot, ka la bun bha, ha ka jingiadei bad ka phang jong ki jaka rung jaka mih, hynrei kitei ki seng, ki lyngngoh ba ka jingtreikam ha madan kam shym la iaid satia haei haei ruh bad kumta ka jingiakren, ha ka 19tarik mynta u bnai, kan long kaba shai ba ka sorkar kan pyni ba ki kam kiba la trei bad kiba la nang pyniaid shakhmat.Ki 13 seng, ki ong shuh shuh ba ka jingiakren, ha ka 19tarik, kan nym long shuh, kaba shu iai pynkynmaw ia kaei ka jingiakren lane kaba ki ong ban shu iai pynneh status quo, hynrei ba ki kam kin iaid stet shakhmat bad ki la pynsngew ba kane ka shithi, kaba ki phah mynta ka long ba long ba ka jingiakren, kan dei kaba don bad kitei ki phang, ong ka kyrwoh ba la soi da U Bah Lamborstarwell Marngar, President KSU, Bah Wellbirth Ranee, President FKGJP bad U bah Sadon Blah, Secretery HNYF.
title: 19tarik, ym ban shu iakren  pynkynmaw, pyni da ki kam

content: Shillong, 16 Naitung:Lashai kan dei ka sngi ban jied ia U President jong ka Ri India bad ha Shillong, ki MLA kin thep vote, ha ka kamra, kaba don ha syndah jong ka iing dorbar Jylla, kaba sdang naduh ka por 10baje haduh 5baje nohsngi.Na ka liang jong ki dkhot jong ka HSPDP, kiba don 4ngut, la sngewthuh ba kin nym leit shim bynta satia, ha katei ka jingjied President, wat la ka ophis jong ka dorbar Jylla, kam shym la ioh jingtip eiei satia, ong U bah Andrew Simon, uba dei ruh U Asst Returning Officer jong katei ka elekshon President. Hynrei la sngewthuh ba U Martin Danggo, uba dei u myntri ka tnat PWD, un nym lah satia ban thep vote lashai ka sngi, namar ba u don ha ka jingshah sumar mynta ha Apollo Hospital, ha New Delhi bad da ka jingpep thep vote U Dangngo, la sngewthuh ba kin don 5ngut ki ban nym jied President lashai ka sngi.Ki MP kiba don 3ngut, kiba kynthup ia U Conrad Sangma, U Ma Vincent Pala bad ka kong Wansuk Syiem, kin thep vote lashai ka sngi ha Parliament ha New Delhi, namar kim shym la pan jingbit satia, na ka tnat elekshon ban thep vote ha Shillong.U bah Simon, u iathuh shuh shuh ba ki vote, kin don lashai ka sngi ha ka kamra ba kyrpang ha Shillong bad ha ka Sngi Hat Majai dang step, yn leit rah sha New Delhi.Ka khubor na U SP News Agency, ka iathuh ba ki khulom bad kyrpang ki ban pyndon kam ki MLA ban thoh iano ki kwah ban jied ban long President jong ka Ri India, ka ban long lashai ka sngi, ki la poi ha ka kamra ba kyrpang ha Ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District bad ka synduk ban thep ia ki ballot Paper ruh ruh kala poi ha Shillong.Kane ka long ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ha ka Ri India ba ka Election Commission jong ka Ri India, ka la pynkhreh kyrpang na ka bynta ki MLA bad ki MP ba kin pyndon kam da u khulom u ba la pynbiang kyrpang da ka Election Commission jong ka Ri India ha kaba kin thoh ia ka kyrteng jong u ne ka kyrtong u ne kaba ki mon ban jied kum u ne ka president jong ka Ri.Haba phai sha ka jylla Meghalaya ka vote jong u wei u MLA jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka kit 17 vote bad ki MP ki long ryngkat bad kiwei ki kot 706 vote. Ka jylla Meghalaya ka don 60 ngut ki MLA bad ki MP ki don tang lai ngut, ar ngut ha Lok Sabha bad kawei hapoh Rajya Sabha.
title: Mynta ka elekshon President,  yn pep 4 ki HSPDP & 1 Congress

content: Nongstoiñ, 18 Naitung:U DG (Prison), u RP Agarwal mynta ka sngi u la hiar kyndit kyndit sha Nongstoiñ, na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka jingleit jurip ia ka Nongstoiñ District Jail kaba don ha Phodkynthei bad ha katei ka jingleit jurip nalor u DG (Prison) la iadon lang ruh u bah KK Mawa SE ka tnad PWD (Building) Shillong.Haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor hadien katei ka jingleitjurip na ka liang jong u R.P. Agarwal DG (Prison) u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong katei ka jingleit jurip ka long ban peit bad khmih bniah ia ki jingdonkam baroh khnang ba ka tnad PWD kan ioh ban shna noh da kawei ka jingkhein, na ka bynta ban ioh phah noh sha ka sorkar khang ba ka jingpyntrei ia katei ka District Jail kan iaid beit noh shait shait hadien bun bun snem jong ka jingshah ieh khong reng.Shuh shuh u R.P. Agarwal u la ong ruh ba daw jong ka jingslem ban pyndep ia katei ka phatok, ka dei namar ka jingbym lah jong ka sorkar ban ai ia ka revised estimate kaba thymmai bad u la ong ruh ba lada ka sorkar kan sanction noh kham kloi ia ka revised estimate kaba thymmai na ka liang jong ka tnad Phatok hi kala pyntikna ba ka jingpyntrei ia katei ka District Jail yn sa lah ban pyndep noh kham kloi bad u la ong ruh ba ka jingwan lang jong u bah K.K Marwa ka long ban peit bad khmih bha ia ka jinglong jingman jong ki jingtei kiba la don lypa jong katei ka District Jail khang ba yn lah ban pynshong nongrim ha shwa ban shna ia ka revised estimate.Haba pyrshang ban kylli ba hato kala don ne em kano kane ka jingpyntrei kam kaba thymmai ha katei ka Jail hadien ka jingwan jurip jong u DG (Prison) barim mynshwa bad na ka liang jong u Agarwal u la ong ba kam pat don kano kano ka jingpyntrei namar ym shym pat la ioh ia ka sanction na ka sorkar bad ha kaba iadei pat bad ka jingiaid jong ka jingtrei ha katei ka Jail naduh mynshwa na ka liang jong u Agarwal u la ong ba um shym la lah ban ai jingkhein namar ba ki jingtei kiba la don lypa, ki la bun ba synjor bad sniew noh.“Ia mynta hi ka tnad Jail ka don ia ar tylli ki thong kiba ha khmat eh na ka bynta ban pyntrei noh ha ka Nongstoiñ District Jail kiba kynthup ia ka Security Wall bad ia ka Boundary wall” ong biang u Agarwal da kaba u la bynrap shuh shuh da kaba ong ba ha kaba iadei bad ka jaka (site) kam shymla don ei ei ka jingiakren na ka bynta ban pynkynriah hynrei kan long beit ha katei kajuh ka jaka ha Phodkynthei namar ba kiba bun ki jingtrei bad jingtei ha katei ka jaka kila don lypa.Haba pyrshang pat ban kylli ba haduh katno snem yn shimpor ban pyndep ia ki jingtrei baroh na ka liang jong u bah K.K. Mawa SE ka tnad PWD (Building) Shillong u la ong kan shong eh ha ka sorkar lano kan sanction ia ka revised estimate kaba thymmai bad na ka liang jong ka tnad PWD mynta hi u snem kan pynkhreh bad phah noh ia ka revised estimate kaba thymmai na ka bynta katei ka Nongstoiñ District Jail sha ka sorkar.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ia ka Nongstoiñ District Jail la sdang ban pyntrei naduh u snem 2005 ia kaba ka sorkar kala mang ha kajuh kapor bad ka District Jail kaba don ha Nongpoh ia kaba haduh mynta ia ka Nongpoh la lah ban pyndep hynrei kaba sngew lyngngoh ka long ba ia ka Nongstoiñ District Jail kat haduh mynta ym shym pat la lah satia ban pyndep bad ka la shu sah khong reng ha katei ka jaka kaba don ha Phodkynthei Nongstoiñ West Khasi Hills District.
title: Hiar jurip kyndit ki heh sorkar,  ia ka patok ha Phodkynthei

content: Jowai, 19 Naitung:Ka borshnong Pamrakmai ha East Jaintia Hills kala bynniaw shi katdei eh halor ka jingsahdien ka shnong khamtam ha ka liang ka lynti ka syngkieng nalor kiwei kiwei ki kam pynroi shnong.Ha kaba iadei bad u Surok, ngi la leit ban ud hakhmat u Engineer ka NEC, Khliehriat bad kumjuh ruh ha khmat u MLA ka thain, hynrei ngi dap da ka jinglyngngoh ba u MLA jong ngi u la ong ia ngi ba ‘Ym don Skim satia na ka bynta ban maramot Surok”, la ong u Rangbah Shnong ka Pamrakmai, u ma Lucas Shylla ha u kyrwoh khubor bala phah sha ki kot khubor.Utei u rangbah shnong u la iathuh ba ki surok pohshnong la siang rong naduh u snem ba jop u ma Nehlang Lyngdoh kaba mut 15 snem ha ka por jong u kum u MLA bad mynta pat san snem ha ka por jong u ma Justine Dkhar.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingsniew palat u surok, na ka liang ka bor shnong kam banse ban pynlong iaka jingiamih paidbah ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ba ladep ban maramot hi da ka bor shnong ia baroh ki surok shnong.Da ki spah ngut ki nongshongshnong naduh ki longkmie ki longkpa bad ki samla kynthei shynrang wat ki khynnah ruh ki la mih shongshit ban maramot surok bad ban pynkhuid shnong.“Man la u snem ngi ju pynlong iaka jingpynkhuid shnong ar sien shisnem ha ka por Christmas bad ha ka por Behdeinkhlam ka Sein Raij Tuber. Mynta ka la Behdeinkhlam kala jan ngi la pynkhuid ia ka shnong baroh kawei bad ngin sa pynkhuid biang ha u bnai December ha ka por Christmas”, la ong u Rangbah shnong“Ngi ngeit ba ka jingpynkhuid ia ka shnong ka thaw kan iarap ia ngi ban wanrah ia ka khuid ka suba ban lait na ka pang ka shitom ba har rukom bad ban pynlong iaka shnong kaba itynnad ha baroh ki samoi”, la bynrap u Secretary katei ka shnong,Na ka liang ka bor shnong ka la kyntu ia ka tnad PWD bad ia u MLA ka thain ban peitkhmat lem sha katei ka shnong khnang ba kan iarap ia ki paidbah nongshongshnong ban pynlong iaka shnong kaba roi kaba par hapoh ka thain,Ha kajuh ka por na ka liang ka Dorbar Shnong ka la ai khublei Behdeinkhlam basuk bakmen ia ki paid hynniewtrep ha kane ka Behdeinkhlam kaba heh tam ka Jaintia Hills kaban sa sdang bad kut noh naduh ka 21 tarik haduh 24 tarik une u bnai.
title: 20 snem khlem maramot  ia u Surok ha Pamra

content: Nongstoiñ, 18 Naitung:Kawei ka longkmie kaba na ka shnong Mawlangsu West Khasi Hills District, ka la leit ban ujor sha ki pulit ka Nongstoiñ Police Station, ia u wei u briew u ba la tip kyrteng kum u Thwen Lyngkhoi halor ka jingdon kti ka jong u ban leh kynshlein bad pynmynsaw ia ka khun ka jong ka kaba dang 13 snem ka arta.Kat kum ka tyllong khubor, ba la ioh lum da u nongthoh khubor la ong ba katei ka jingjia, ka la jia ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba u tei u briew u la leh ia katei ka kam runar hapoh ka iing sah jong katei ka khynnah rit kaba don ha Mawlangsu.Shuh shuh ka khubor kaba iajan bad katei ka jingjia ka iathuh ruh ba u tei u runar u dei u briew u ba dang don ka jingiadei shi iing shi sem bad ka long iing jong katei ka hep rit 13 snem bad u tei u runar hadien ba u la leh kynshlein u la ktah kti ruh ia katei ka hep rit haduh ba kan da mynsaw bad ia katei ka hep rit la pynkit noh sha Ganesh Das Hospital Shillong na ka bynta ban ioh ia ka jingsumar.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka jingjia na ka liang jong ki pulit ka Nongstoiñ, ki la register case pyrshah ia u tei u runar katkum ka case number 91(7)17 U/S 9(n)/10/11(i)/12 jong ka Pocso act, bad ka jingtohkit halor katei ka jingjia ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: Mynsaw ka hep 13 snem, ba  kynshlein & ktah kti u runar

content: Shillong, 18 Naitung:Ki la don bun ngut ki kyrtong ki ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 na ki konstitwensi bapher bapher kiba u nongthohkhubor u la pyrshang ban ia kren bad ki hynrei kitei kim pat nud ban ang shi kyntien bad ki la ai daw ba ki dang don ha ka kam sorkar bad kin sa ia kren pat hadien ba ki la dep risaiñ na ka kam jong ki. Wat la kim pat shym la pynbna paidbah ba kin ia khun elekshon hynrei na ka sur u paidbah la sngewthuh ba ki la bunkam bha ban iaid sharum shaneng ban leit rung ïng briew bad ban pynithuh ialade kum u kyrtong ha ka elekshon 2018. Don napdeng kitei ki kyrtong ki ban ia khun kum ki kyrtong shimet bad don ruh napdeng jong ki, ki ban ia khun na ki seng saiñpyrthei.Ki pyrman ka saiñpyrthei ki la ong ba kim lah shuh ban sngewthuh ia ka jingmut kitei ki briew balei kim nud ban mih beit shakhmat ban pynbna ialade kum u kyrtong bad ban kren ia ka ishu kaba ki don ban kren ha kane ka por ba ka lyer elekshon ka la sdang ban beh bha, ka aiñ kam shah ia ki ban leh politik haba ki don ha ka kam sorkar ka jingkylli kaba mih mynta ka long balei haba ki la don jingmut ban ia leh elekshon ki dang shong sah ha ka shuki kam sorkar jong ki, balei ki dang bang ban kjit tulop sorkar?.
title: Bun ki kyrtong 2018, kim nud ang  ba dang bang ka kjit tulop sorkar

content: Shillong, 18 Naitung:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Mukul Sangma, haba kubur ba ka jaitbynriew rit paid kum ki Khasi, bad Garo ki don jingma na ka jingwan tuid beain ki briew nabar, u la ong ruh ba dei ki Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo hi kiba ju long ejen ban leh benami ia kiwei ki jaitbynriew.Haba kren mynta ka sngi ha ka jingplie ia ka Mawpat Block, ha Mawpat, u Mukul u la ong ba namar ba ka sorkar ka iohi ia kane ka jingma na ka jingwan rung beain jong ki briew nabar, ka sorkar ka la shim khia ban thaw ia ka ain kaba la tip kum ka Residents and Safety Act 2016 nalor ka jingpynkylla ia ka ain khaii banami ka Benami Transactions (Prohibition) Act, 1988 ban pynthikna ba kiwei ki jaitbynriew kin nym ioh lad ban leh kam beain bad ban khand lad ruh ia ki trai shnong ban ialeh benami.“Dei ki trai shnong Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo kiba leh benami ban ailad ia ki nongwei”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla. Katkum ka jingong u Myntri Rangbah ka jingioh lad ki briew ba nabar ban pyniaid ia ki kam khaii pateng bad kiwei ki kam, ka dei namar ba ailad ki trai shnong kiba long pynban kum ki ejen jongki.“Ka jingjyllei ki briew ba wan rung beain sha ka jylla ka long kaba sngew khia jur ia ka sorkar bad ka donkam ban khang lad ia kane”, la ong u Mukul.U la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la pynkhreh ban pyndep noh ia ka rule jong ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Act, 2016 bad shen kan sa treikam noh.“Ka jingthmu ba kongsan ka sorkar ban pyntreikam ia kane ka ain ka long ban peit bad bishar bniah ia ki briew ba wan sah ha ki iing kiba nabar bad ka dei ka kamram jong ki nongshong shnong ban pynlong ia ka kaba larkam”, la ong u Mukul. Kane ka jingkren jong u Myntri Rangbah ka long ha kane ka por ha kaba ka KSU ka dang don hapdeng ka jingiakhih ban pyrshah ia ka lynti rel namar ka jingsyier na ka jingwan tyllep ki briew nabar.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la kam ruh ba kiwei ki ri Europe kum ka United Kingdom ki iakynduh kum kane ka jingeh na ka jingwan rung beain ki briew bad ka la pyrkhing bha ban ai visa, bad kiwei ki lad hynrei ka shem jingeh. “Mynta ka ain ba ka United Kingdom ka thmu ban shna, ka dei kaba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la dep shna”, la kam u Dr Mukul.“Ngi la iohi ba ki jaitbynriew trai shnong ha Tripura ki la kylla rit paid ha la ka jylla lajong jongki”, la ong u Dr Mukul. U la ong ba ka jingioh rung ki briew nabar sha ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei namar ba ka don khappud bad ka Bangladesh bad ka Assam ruh ha kaba ki briew ki rung ki mih laitlan lada ym don ka ain kaba biang ban tehlakam ia kane.
title: Ki Khasi, Garo, ki ejen benami  jong kiwei, ong U Mukul

content: Shillong, 18 Naitung:Ki 13 tylli ki sengbhalang kin leit ban ia kren lashai ka sngi ka 19 tarik u naitung bad ka sorkar kaba ialam da u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma bad ka jingialang kan long ha ka por 3 baje nohphai sngi.U President ka FKJGP u bah Willbirth Rani, u la ong ba baroh ki 13 seng ki la pynthikna ba kin ia leit ryntih sha katei ka jingialang bad la ong ba kin leit tang ki nongialam kaba 2 ne 3 ngut na kawei ka seng. Ha katei ka jingiakren u bah Rani u la ong ba ki sengbhalang kin pynpaw ruh sha ka sorkar ba ki ieng pyrshah ia ka lynti rel.Na ka liang jong U President ka KSU, U Bah Lambokstar Marngar, ula kren shai, ba lada ka sorkar kam mynjur ban weng noh ia ka jingtrei ia ka lynti rel sha Byrnihat, ki nongialam jong katei ka seng, kin mih noh na ka jingialang.
title: Mynta yn iakren lynti rel, ong ki  13 seng; ha ka jingleit Secreteriat

content: Shillong, 18 Naitung:Ki khubor ki la saphriang sted ha kine ki sngi ba u bah Leston Wanswett u kyrtong na Shella konstitwensi un ia khun ia ka elekshon MLA 2018 na ka seng Congress. KI la don ruh ki khubor kiba la iathuh ba ka jingiakren hapdeng utei u rangbah bad ka seng Congress ka la biang nadong shadong bad kaba sah ka long sa tang ban pynbna paidbah ia ka kyrteng jong u mynta u bnai naitung.Ban pynthikna ia kane u Rupang mynta ka sngi u la ioh ban ia kren bad u bah Leston lyngba ka phone, ha ka jingiakren u bah Les u la ong ba um pat kyrkieh ban shim rai bad ia ka rai ban ia khun na kano kano ka seng u lah ban shim 4 ne 5 bnai shuwa ka elekshon ruh kam don jingpher, “Sa 4/5 bnai shuwa ka elekshon ruh ka dang long hi ban shim ia ka rai” ong u ba hLeston ha ka jingiakren bad u Rupang.La kylli hato ka long ne-em kaba shisha ba un ia khun na ka seng Congress u bah Les u la ong ba ka jingiakren bad ka seng Congress ka dang iaid haduh mynta ruh hynrei um pat shim rai satia, “Ngin ym kyrkieh ban shim rai” u la ong. Lah ban kdew ba u bah Leston u dei uba ju shah rem salit ha ki elekshon ba la dep ha u MLA ka Shella konstitwensi u Dr.Donkupar Roy. Ha ka elekshon MLA 2008 u Dr.Don u la tam ia u bah Leston tang 939 vote kata u Dr.Don u ioh 4238 vote katba u bah Leston pat u ioh 3299 vote, ha u snem 2013 u Dr.Don u la ioh 5940 vote katba u bah Leston pat u ioh 5585 vote bad u shah rem tang da 355 vote.Lah ruh ban kdew ba kumba ka long haduh mynta ki la don 4 ngut ki kyrtong kiba la pynkhreh ban ia khun na Shella konstitweni ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 bad kitei ki long u Dr.Donkupar Roy ka UDP, u bah Jropsing Nongkhlaw ka BJP, u bah Wellborn Bynnud kyrtong shimet bad u ba hLeston Wanswett hynrei lada jia ba u bah Leston um ia khun na ka seng Congress la sngewthuh ba katei ka seng ruh kan pynieng kyrtong.
title: “Sa 4 bnai shuwa ka elekshon  ruh dang long ban shim rai”

content: Nongpoh, 19 Naitung:Shi bynta ban pynsngewthuh paidbah bad khamtam eh ia ki khynnah pule ba kin sngewthuh ia la ka jong ka hok longbriew manbriew, mynta ka sngi ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ha ka jingiatreilang bad ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner, Ri Bhoi, ki la pynlong ia ka prokram ba shisngi halor ka Human Rights Literacy na ka bynta ki khynnah skul bad kolej ha Ri Bhoi College Nongpoh.Ha kane ka prokram ban ai jinghikai sha ki khynnah pule, la wan ruh ban iashimbynta da u Dr. Justice Aftab Hussain Saikia, Chairperson ka MHRC, ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u C.P Gotmare, DC ka Ri Bhoi District, u R.Singh, SP Ri Bhoi, u Bah A. Mawlong Secretary ka MHRC, u N.A Khan, District & Sesssion Judge, u Bah R.Kharbihkhiew, BDO ka Umling C&RD Block, ka Kong D. Phawa ADC Ri Bhoi lem bad kiwei kiwei kiba kynthup naduh ki heh Pulit, ki Nongiasaid Ain, ki Nonghikai bad samla pule na ki skul kiba don ha ka thain Nongpoh.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi, u Dr Saikia u la batai ia ka jingthmu, ka rukom treikam bad ka jingmyntoi kaba ki paidbah ki ioh na ka Human Rights, namar kumba ka long hi ba bun ki paidbah nongshong shnong ha ki jaka bapher bapher, kim tip wat ia la ka jong ka hok longbriew manbriew kaba ki don.U la ong ruh, ba ka jingthmu jong ka MHRC ka long ban pynsngewthuh ba baroh ki nongshong shnong ki ialong ryngkat bad ha kajuh ruh ka por u la ong ruh ba ki don shibun ki kyndon kiba kum ki nongshong shnong ki dei ban ialong ryngkat bad kata ka long naduh ha ka Civil Rights, Political Rights, Economic Rights, Social Rights, Cultural Rights lem bad kiwei kiwei.Watla ka hok longbriew manbriew ka don ha manla u nongshong shnong, hynrei ka long pat kaei kaei kaba sngewkhia ha kine ki sngi, namar ba ki briew kim ia burom shuh iwei ia iwei pat, ha kaba la I pynban ba kim tieng shuh wat ia ka ain bad kumta u kyntu ia kiba don ha katei ka jingialang, ba ki dei ban long ka nuksa ia kiwei da kaba pyni ia ka jingiaieid bad burom iwei ia iwei pat, khnang ban wanrah ia ka bha ka miat bad ka shongsuk shongsain ha ka imlang sahlang, la bynrap u Dr Saikia.
title: Sngewkhia u heh ka MHRC, ba  hiar ka jingiaburom para briew

content: Shillong 19 Naitung:U Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la kam ba ka saw tynrai ka jingkhyllem ka Executive Committee ba ialam ka NPP ha Garo Hills Autonomous District Council ka dei namar ba ki MDCs ki iaknieh pisa.Haba jubab halor ka jingjop ka Congress ha ka jingiatynjuh bor hynnin ka sngi, u Mukul u la ong ba ka pisa ka dei ka thymmei jong baroh ki ksuid, kaba la wanrah ia ka huri hura ha GHADC hadien ba ki la ioh ia ka pisa na ka tnad sorkar pdeng kum ka Special Assistance T.100.71 klur.“Ha ka por ba ngi ioh result ha ka MDC elekshon, nga la ong ia baroh ki MDC ka Congress ban nym kwah thaw ia ka EC namar ba ngi dei ban burom ia ka rai jong u paidbah bad ailad ia kiwei ban thaw”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba hynrei ba ka pisa ka dei ka thymmei jong baroh ki jingsniew bad na kane ka daw, ka EC ba ialam da ka NPP ba la synrop lang ka BJP, GNC bad kiwei ki la iathaw ia a EC.“Ngi kwah ban iathuh sha ka pyrthei ba ngim don bynta bad ka BJP”, la ong u Dr Mukul.Katum ka jingong jong u Dr Mukul ka jingiakhih jong ki MDC ka la mih hadien ba ki la ioh pisa na ka sorkar pdeng ha kaba ki la iaknieh pisa haduh ba ka EC jongki, ka la khyllem syndon.Hynnin ka sngi, u Boston Marak u MDC ba phet na ka NPP sha ka Congress u la jop ia ka jingiatynjuh bor da kaba ioh 17 ngut ki MDC bad ka kynhun ba ialam ka NPP ka la ioh tang 11 ngut. San ngut ki MDC kiba dei na ka NPP, GNC bad ki MDC shimet kiba ju don ha ka EC ba ialam ka NPP ki la leit kyrshan sha ka liang ka Congress.
title: Ba iaknieh pisa,  khyllem ka EC ka NPP

content: Shillong, 19 Naitung:Ki la pyrshang ha ka dorbar ba dang shu dep bad kim shym la lah hynrei haduh mynta la ioh jingtip ba ki seng riewlum ki dang khih dang ksar bad ki dang thaw bun ki lad ki lynti kumno ban pynhap ia u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem na ka shuki CEM. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba haduh mynta ki seng riewlum kim pat shongthait bad ki dang iai wad paralok bad la ong ba ki lah ban wanrah jingbym shaniah biang ha ka dorbar ka ban sa wan ka ban long ha u risaw. Lah ban kdew ba ha ka dorbar ba la dep ka jingthmu ki seng riewlum ban pynhap shuki CEM ha KHADC ka la pulom noh namar ka jingjah rngai u MDC ka HSPDP na Mawthadraishan u bah Blanding Warjri bad kumjuh ruh ka jingjah dorbar jong u MDC ka UDP na Mairang u bah Equator Nongrang kumjuh u MDC ka KHNAM u bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka sngi ia tynjuh bor.Lah ruh ban kdew ba ki seng riewlum ha katei ka sien pyrshang pynhap shuki kaba la dep ki la ioh jingkyrshan na ka seng Congress kiba don 6 ngut ki MDC. Shuh shuh la ioh jingtip ba ym tang ki seng riewlum kiba kwah ban pynhap shuki ia u CEM ka KHADC, hynrei la ong ba ka Congress ruh ka la pyrshang kat lah kat iai ban leh kumba ka la leh ha GHADC.
title: Dang iai ksaid ki seng riewlum ban  pynhap shuki ia u bah P.N Syiem

content: Shillong, 19 Naitung:U bah Hamlet Dohling u kyrtong uba la pynkhreh bha ialade ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 na Mylliem konstitwensi na ka seng UDP u la shaiong ngaiñ ban ioh jingtip ba ka jingialang jong ka Party HSPDP bad UDP ki la rai ba ia ka Mylliem konstitwensi yn ai sha ka HSPDP. Ha ka jingiakren bad u Rupang u bah Hamlet u la ong ba um tip eiei ba ka don ka jingialang jong ki 2 seng mynta ka sngi, “Ym don ba pyntip eiei ia nga” u la ong.La kylli biang hato la iathuh ne-em ha u ba la shim ia katei ka rai ban ai ha ka HSPDP ia ka Mylliem konstitwensi u bah Hamlet u la ong “Ka UDP dei ka Um Dum Party, nga shu sah umdum”. La kylli biang hato un mih noh ne-em na katei ka seng “Nga kham ieit ia ki paidbah ka Mylliem ban ia ka Party” u la jubab. U bah Hamlet u la ong ba shen un sa shong pyrkhat bad ki nongkyrshan jong u ia kaei ka lynti ban iaid shakhmat bad na kaei ka seng kaba un ia khun.
title: “Um Dum Party, nga kham ieit ia ki  paidbah ka Mylliem ban ia ka Party”

content: Shillong, 19 Naitung:Mynta ka step ha ka por 8:15 baje eiei uwei u diengbah u la khyllem bad ka dei ruh ha ka por ba u lapbah u dang ther bha ha nongbah Shillong. Katei ka jingjia ka la jia hajan ka St.Mary’s College ha ka lynti ban leit na Don Bosco Square sha Shillong College. Ha katei ka jingjia utei u diengbah u la khyllem ha uwei u post ilektrik katba utei u post ilektrik pat u la khyllem ha kawei ka bos sawkhmut bad khyndiat ha kawei ka kali rit kaba dei jong ki riew shimet.Ym shym la don kano kano ka jingmynsaw briew lait noh tang uwei u briew uba khet ia utei u dieng u bym shym la ioh kyrteng satia, naba u la mynsaw jur bad la pynkit noh ia u mar-mar sha jaka sumar.Ki briew na ka tnad khlaw ki la wan poi sha katei ka jaka hynrei ki la shem jingeh ban weng ia utei u dieng naba ki hap ban ap ia ki briew jong ka MeECL ban weng ia utei u post ilektrik.Ka la don ka jingdheng kali ha katei ka jaka kaba la neh kumba 3 kynta bad dei tad haduh ka por 11 baje tam eiei ba la lah ban weng ia u dieng bad u post ilektrik.
title: Khyllem u dieng bah ha  St. Mary’s, mynsaw uwei

content: Shillong, 19 Naitung:Ka sorkar ka la kular ha ki nongialam jong ki 13 sengbhalang ba kan pyntreikam noh ia ka ain shongwai ne ka Resident Safety and Security Act ha ka 15 tarik Nailar, kaba dei ka sngi rakhe laitluid ka ri India, katba ia ka Ain Prohibition and Detection of Benami Transaction 1958, yn sa pyntreikam hadien u Nailar bad la rai ruh ban sangeh shwa shipor ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka lynti rel haduh ban da lah ban pyntreikam ia ki lad pyrkhing.Hadien ba la wai ka jingialang kaba shi kynta tam ha Secretariat bad ki sengbhalang mynta ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ia ki ain jong ka Resident Safety and Security Act la dep pynkhreh nadong shadong bad kaba sah ka long sa ba ka sorkar kan pynbna ba kan treikam noh.“Ngin pynbna ia ki Rule jong ka Resident Safety and Security Act ha ka 15 tarik Nailar kaba dei ka sngi rakhe laitluid ka ri”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah bad bynrap, ba ia ka jingshna ia ka lynti rel la rai ban pynsangeh noh shwa shipor, haduh ban lah ban pyndep ia ki lad pyrkhing ia ka jingrung bad ka jingmih ki briew.Ka jingrai ka sorkar ban pynsangeh shwa shipor ia ka lynti rel, ka dei hadien ba ka KSU ka la pynlong ia ka jingiakhih kaba jur ban pyrshah ia ka haduh ba 26 ngut ki dkhot ka seng ki la shah kem haduh mynta. Kiwei ki sengbhalang ruh kum ka FKJGP, HNYF, RBYF bad ka CORP ki la kyrshan ia ka jingpyrshah ka KSU ia ka lynti rel khlem pat don ki lad pyrkhing kiba biang ban tehlakam ia ka jingrung ka jingmih ki briew sha kane ka jylla.U Myntri Rangbah ula iathuh ruh ba ia ki ain jong ka ain Prohibition and Detection of Benami Transaction 1958, yn sa pynbna kham hadien, namar ba ki dang don ki kyndon kiba hap ban bishar bniah shwa.U la ong ba hadien ba la pyntreikam ia kane ka ain, wat kiwei ki jylla jong ka dong mihngi bad ki ri ka pyrthei kin bud nuksa ia ka ain jong ka Meghalaya.Katkum ka jingong u myntri rangbah hadien ba la pynbna ia ki rule ka ain shongwai, ki bor pyniaid shnong ruh kin iadon bynta ban pynthikna ba ain kan long kaba larkam.Ha kajuh ka por, u la ong ba ka jingshim jaka na ka bynta ban shna ia ki jaka mih bad jaka rung jong ki briew ka la iaid shaid shaid ha kaba kila don ki jaka kiba la jan dep ban shim jaka bad shen yn sdang noh ia ka jingshna.U la ong ba ka jingslem ban shim jaka ban shna ia ki jaka mih jaka rung ka dei namar ba ka sorkar ka hap ban iaid katkum ki kyndon kiba jrong bha hynrei watla katta ka kam ka la iaid.Halor ka lynti rel, u la ong ba ka sorkar kan thoh ruh sha ka North East Frontier Railway ba kan buh jaka ha ki jaka sangeh rel khnang ban lah ban shna ia ki jaka peit briew ne ki Facilitation Centre kaba dei ka bynta ka lad pyrkhing ia ki briew ba nabar.U la ong ba ka sorkar kam shong kli kti ban pyntreikam ia ki lad pyrkhing ia ki briew bad ka la pas ruh ia ar tylli ki ain (Resident Safety and Security Act bad ka Prohibition and Detection of Benami Transaction 1958).U la ong ba shisien ba la pynbna ia ka ain shongwai, ka District Task Force kan long ka nongpyntreikam ia ka ain ha kaba ki bor shnong ruh kin iadon bynta lang ban pynthikna ba kan long kaba treikam.Ai ksai U Mukul ban ia kren lynti rel ha ka jingialang ki sengbhalangAiu kaba la jia ha ka jingkren ki 13 senghalang bad u Mukul Sangma mynta ka sngi ha ka kamra kaba ki nongthohkhubor kim shym la ioh ban shong lang.U Rupang u la buddien ia kaei ka jingiakren hapdeng jong kitei ki ar liang, ka sorkar bad ki sengbhalang.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh lum na ki tyllong khubor la iathuh ba marsien sdang ka jingialang ka jingiakren ka dei beit katkum ka sobjek ba la khot da ka sorkar kata ban ia kren ia ka jaka rung jaka mih lem bad kiwei pat ki aiñ ba ka sorkar ka la kdew.La ong ba kam shym la don kano kano ka jingwanrah ia ka mat ia kren lynti rel bad dei u myntri rangbah hi u Mukul Sangma uba la ai ksai da kaba ong ba lada yn pyntreikam ia kitei ki aiñ kin lah ruh ban teh-lakam lada wan ka lynti rel.Dei hangtei ba la ai ksai da u myntri rangbah la ong ba ki sengbhalang ki la synrop lang noh ban ia kren lynti rel bad la ong ba ka jingiakren ka la long tang tuk tak bad ka shu kut noh.
title: 15 Nailar, kular U Mukul ban ai  sngew bha da ka ain shongwai

content: Shillong, 19 Naitung:Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la ong ba kan nym pat rai ban sangeh noh ia ka jingiakhih pyrshah ia ka lynti rel watla ka sorkar ka la rai ban sangeh shwa shipor haduh ban lah ban pyntreikam ia ki lad pyrkhing ia ka jingmih jingrung ki briew sha kane ka jylla.Haba kren mynta ka sngi sha ki nongthoh khubor u President ka KSU u Bah Lambok-starwell Marngar u la ong ba ka seng kam pat weng ia ka jingiakhih pyrshah lynti rel watla ka sorkar ka la rai ban sangeh shwa shipor ia ka lynti rel.“Ngin sa shong jingialang da ka Executive Council ka seng, ban iakren bad ban shim ia ka rai”, la ong u Bah Marngar.U la ong ba ha ka jingialang na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma u la iai pyrshang ban pynbor ia ka seng ba kan pdiang ia ka lynti rel hynrei na ka liang ka seng ka la kren shai ba da lei lei ruh kan nym lah ban pdiang ia ka lynti rel bad dei hadien ba ka la pyneh ba u Dr Mukul u la pyndem ban pynsangeh noh shwa ia ka lynti rel haduh ban lah ban pyntreikam ia ki lad pyrkhing.“Ka KSU kam lah ban pdiang ia ka lynti rel khlem ki ain kiba khlain”, la ong u President ka KSU bad bynrap ba ka jingdawa ka KSU wat ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ka dang im lada kine ki lad pyrkhing ka sorkar kim long kiba khlain ban iada ia ka jingmih jingrung ki briew sha kane ka jylla.Haba kylli la ka seng ka dawa ne em ban pynlait ia ki dkhot ba shah kem, u President ka KSU u la ong ba ka KSU kam leit ban iakren ia ka sorkar ban pynlait ia ki dkhot ka seng kiba shah kem hynrei ka leit ban iakren ban pynlongkam ia ki mat jong ka jaitbynriew.Ha kawei ka liang, u Bah Sadon K Blah ka HNYF u la ong ba ka jingkynnoh jong kiwei ki seng ba ka ain shongwai ka sorkar Resident Safety and Security Act bad ka Prohibition and Detection of Benami Transaction 1958 kam ler ym pat lah ban ngeit namar ba kim pat treikam.“Hadien ba la treikam, ngin sa iohi la ki biang ne em bad lada kim biang, ngi lah ban kren eiei bad ban wat ban dawa da ka Inner Line Permit”, la ong u Bah Blah.Katba u Bah Daniel Khyriem u President barim ka KSU, u la ong ba ha ka jingiakren mynta ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma u la kular ba ka sorkar kan pyntreikam noh wut wut ia ka ain shongwai bad kumjuh ia ka ain Banami khnang ban tehlakam ia ki briew ba nabar.“U Myntri Rangbah u la kular ban pynbna noh ia ki Rules ka ain shongwai Resident Safety and Security Act ha ka 15 tarik Nailar katba ia ka Ain Prohibition and Detection of Benami Transaction 1958 yn sa pynbna hadien u Nailar”, la ong u Bah Khyriem.U la ong ba ki sengbhalang ki la ong ruh ha u Myntri Rangbah ba ka sorkar kam dei ban shu pyni ba ka la pynkhreh ia ki jingdonkam ban shna ia ki jaka mih bad jaka rung hynrei ka dei ban pyni noh ia ki kam.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Khyriem, ka jingshim jaka ban shna ia ki jaka rung bad jaka mih ka la iaid shaid shaid bad ka don tang kawei ka jaka ha 13th Mile namar ba ka don ka jingthut.
title: Ym pat weng iakhih ka KSU, wat  la sangeh shipor ia ka lynti rel

content: Shillong, 19 Naitung:Ka UDP bad ka HSPDP mynta ka sngi ka la shim ia ka rai khadduh jong ka ha ka jingiasam konstitwensi na ka bynta ka elekshon MLA 2018. Ia katei ka rai la shim ha ka jingialang jong ka Co-ordination Committee jong kitei ki 2 seng kaba la long mynta ka sngi. Katei ka jingiapynbeit ka long tang ha ki 36 tylli ki konstitwensi ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hill. Ha katei ka jingiapynbeit ka UDP ka la shim 17 tylli ki konstitwensi katba ka HSPDP pat ka shim 10 tylli, 9 tylli kiba lait la khein ba ki dei ki konstitwensi kiba long laitluid ban ia khun baroh ar tylli ki party (Open Seat).Ki 17 tylli ki konstitwensi ba ka UDP ka la shim ki long na Jaintia Hills ka Khliehriat, Amlarem, Jowai, Raliang bad Nartiang.Na East Khasi Hills ka la shim ia ka Mawsynram, ka Shella, ka Pynursla, ka Nongthymmai, ka East Shillong, ka West Shillong bad ka Mawlai. Na Ri-Bhoi ka la shim ia ka Umsning, Mawhati bad Nongpoh. Na West Khasi Hills ka la shim ia ka Ranikor bad Mairang.Ki 10 tylli ki konstitwensi kiba ka HSPDP ka la shim ki long na Jaintia Hills ka Sutnga-Saipung . Na East Khasi Hills na Nongkrem, Mylliem, Mawphlang, South Shillong bad ka Pynthor.Na Ri-Bhoi ka la shim ia ka Jirang katba na West Khasi Hills pat ka la shim ia ka Nongstoiñ, Rambrai bad Mawkyrwat. Ki konstitwensi kiba kitei ki 2 seng ki la shim kum ki konstitwensi kiba lah ban ia leh laitluid lane ba kitei ki 2 party ki lah ban ia khun ki long ka Mookaiaw, North Shillong,Mawthadraishan, Mawshynrut, Mawryng-kneng, Sohiong, Umroi, Sohra bad Mawkynrew.Lah ban kdew ba na ki 17 tylli kiba ka UDP ka la jied, 5 tylli ki dei kiba ka la don lypa ki MLA kata ka Mawlai, ka Nongthymmai , ka West Shillong Shella bad ka Mairang. Kiwei pat ki konstitwensi ba katei ka seng kala don lypa ki MLA ki long ka Sohra, ka Mawthadraishan bad ka Mawkynrew bad ia kitei ki 3 konstitwensi la ai laitluid ban ia khun baroh 2 seng. Na ki 10 tylli kiba ka HSPDP ka la jied 3 tylli ki dei kiba ka la don lypa ki MLA bad kitei ki long ka Nongkrem, ka Nongstoiñ bad ka Rambrai hynrei ia ka Mawshynrut pat ka la ailad ban ia khun laitluid.
title: 17 ia ka UDP, 10 ia ka HSPDP,  9 tylli ki madan ialeh paralok

content: Nongpoh, 21 Naitung:Ka jingangnud da ki paidbah jong kiba bun tylli ki shnong ha ka thain Umsawnongbri, Ri Bhoi, ban ioh ia ka jaka sumar kaba kham biang ia ki nongpang ka la wan ban urlong ha ka jingim jong ki bad kane ka la jia ruh mynta ka sngi, ha kaba u Dr DD Lapang, Chief Adviser ka sorkar jylla, ha ryngkat bad ka Kong Roshan Warjri, myntri ba dei peit ia ka koit ka khiah, ki la wan ban plie paidbah ia u Mawnongrim, na ka bynta ban tei ia ka Umsawnongbri PHC ha Madan Raid Nongbri.Khyndiat kum ban shu pynpaw hangne, ia katei ka jaka ka ban sa tei ia katei ka PHC ka don ia ka jingheh kaba 8 Akar tam, ia kaba la ai sngewbha da ka Dorbar Raid Nongbri, ha kajuh ruh ka por katei ka PHC kan sa ai ruh ia ka jingshakri ia ki palat 21 tylli ki shnong ha katei ka thain bad kaba don ia palat 1300 ngut ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Ha kaba plie ia une u Mawnongrim, nalor ka jingdon jong kitei ki heh sorkar, la sakhi ruh da ka jingdonlang, ka Kong Rona Khymdeit, MDC ka Nongpoh Constituency, u C.P Gotmare, DC ka Ri Bhoi, u R.O Budnah, Director of Health Services, u Bah R. Kharbihkhiew, BDO ka Umling C&RD Block, u Bah Stickshon Syiem, Syiem ka Raid Nongbri, u Dr B. Pohchen, DH&MO ka Ri Bhoi, ki doktor, ki ophisar sorkar, rangbah shnong, ki nonghikai, ki khynnah skul lem bad da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah na ki shnong ba marjan jong katei ka thain.Ka Ri Bhoi ka dei ka jaka kaba bun na ki paidbah ki shah the mraw ha ki jingpang kiba ha rukom ha ki por ba mynshwa, ha kaba ka la ioh ruh ia ka ka man kum ka jaka kaba bun eh ki nongpang Malaria, hynrei katba nangmih ki sngi da ka jingshimkhia ka sorkar lyngba ka tnat ka koit ka khiah, ha ryngkat ka jingtrei shitom da ki nongtrei ha ki jaka sumar, la lah ban tehlakam nohh ia kane ka jingpang, la ong u Dr. D.D Lapang.Namarkata, ka jingioh jongphi ia kane ka PHC kan da long shisha ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw bad ka por ka sa poi ba baroh ki nongshong shnong ha kane ka thain, kin sa long kiba shait ba khiah krat lyngba ka jingiarap da kane ka jaka sumar, u la bynrap.Katba na ka liang ka Kong Roshan Warjri, kum ka Myntri ba dep peit ia ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar jylla, ka la kyntu ia kiba pyntrei ia kane ka jaka sumar ba kin pyntrei hok ia ka bad ba kin pyndep ha ka por kaba la buh.La ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na ka Kong Rona Khymdeit lem bad kiwei kiwei, kiba la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen halor ka jingioh ban plie ia utei u Mawnongrim.
title: Buh mawnongrim ia ka  Umsawnongbri PHC, ba T.8 klur

content: Nongstoiñ, 21 Naitung:Ka Higher Secondary Section jong ka skul KJP Synod Sepngi Higher Secondary School Nongstoin ka la kynjoh sha u mawmer ba 10 jong ka jingiaid lynti ka jong katei ka Higher Secondary naduh bala sdang ban seng ia ka ha u snem 2007, ha kaba ki bor pyniaid jong katei ka skul mynta ka sngi, ki la ioh ruh ban rakhe ia katei ka sngi ba kyrpang jong ka HS Section ia kaba la pynlong hapoh phyllaw jong katei ka skul.Ha katei jingrakhe ia ka lyngkhuh snem kaba 10 jong ka jingiaid lynti jong ka Secondary Section jong katei ka skul, u bah PN Syiem CEM ka KHADC u la long kum u kongsan ha katei ka sngi ha ryngkat ka jingiadon lang ruh u bah LG Nongsiej Chairman ka KHADC u ba dei ruh u MDC ka Nongstoin ryngkat u bah Morning Mawsor MDC ka Mawshynrut kiba la long ruh kum ki symbud kongsan.U bah PN Syiem CEM ka KHADC ha shwa ba un shim ia ka bynta ban ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi kum u kongsan u la ioh shwa ban plie paidbah noh ia u Mawnongrim jong katei ka KJP Synod Sepngi Higher Secondary Section bad haba shim pat ia ka bynta ban ai jingkren u kongsan u la ong ba shiphew snem ka jingiaid lynti kam long kaba suk ia ki nongpyniaid jong ka skul hynrei kita kiba shaniah ha u Trai kin skhem bad iai neh junom bad u la ong ruh ba kane ka por kaba mynta ka dei ka por bad ka juk kaba ki briew ki im ha ka jingeh bad ka jingduh jingkyrmen hynrei ngi dei ban shaniah ha u Trai nongbuh nongthaw.“Kane ka Jylla ka jong ngi lada ym dei ka jingnoh synniang jong ki Balang bapher bapher khamtam ha ka pule puthi ngam tharai ba kan long kumne kumba ka long mynta namar ba ha ka Jylla jong ngi ngim don ia ka Educational Policy, ka Employment Policy bad kiwei kiwei de ki policy treikam” ong u CEM bad kum ka dak ban ia don bynta lang bad ka Synod halor ka jingthmu ka jong ka ban nang kyntiew shuh shuh ia ka pule puthina ka Higher Secondary sa sha ka College na ka liang jong u CEM u la pynbna ban noh ka jingiarap kaba 15 lak tyngka na ka skhim KHADC 2015-16 kaba la don lypa bad u la ong ruh ba ha kaba iadei pat bad ka skhim ka ban sa wan na ka liang jong u ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad u MDC ka Nongstoin bad Mawshynrut kin sa nang ia peit ia ki jingdonkam.Nalor ki kongsan kiwei kiwei kiba la ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi ki kynthup ia u Tbn C. L. Wanshong dkhot ka MC, u Chairman ka New Nongstoin District, u Moderator ka nongstoin Presbytery u Sordar ka shnong Tiehsaw, u Syiem ka Hima nongstoin u Paiem E.P. Syiem, u Rev. S.I. Iawphniaw President barim bad kiwei kiwei, ha katei ka sngi ban pyniphuh iphieng shuh shuh ia katei ka sngi ba kyrpang la ioh ruh ia ki jingrwai jingshad bad ki jingialehkai drama bala iashim bynta shit rhem da ki khynnah pule jong katei ka skul.
title: Buh mawnongrim U CEM, ia ka Higher Secondary KJP Synod

content: Shillong, 21 Naitung:Ka kynhun myntri ka la mynjur ia ka jingthaw ia ka Meghalaya Road Maintenance Policy (MRMP) na ka bynta ban peit bad moramot ia ki surok kiba jot kiba sniew ha ka jylla. Haba pyntip ia kane hadien ba la wai ka jingialang mynta ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka jingmoramot ia ki surok ka long kaba donkam tam hadien ba la shna ia ka surok .Hadien ba ka sorkar ka la iohi bad ka la mad ia ki jingud jong ki paidbah ka jylla na ka jingsniew jong ki surok, ka la shim ia ka rai ban thaw noh da kane ka met na ka bynta ban pynbha ia ki surok kynthup ki jingdonkam ba kyrkieh kaba mih kum na ka jingjia na ka bor jong ka mariang bad kumjuh ban moramot man ka por iaki surok.U la ong ba ia kane ka ain yn sa pyntreikam da ka tnad PWD ha kaba kan don ruh ka jingiasynrap lang na kiwei ki tnad ban pynbha ia ki surok.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka sorkar kan peitngor ruh ba ki rukom shna jong ki kontraktor ban pynthikna ba kin bud ia ka jingbthah katkum ba dei haba ki siang rong ia ki surok. Katkum ka jingong u Myntri Rangbah ki don ki tiar kane ka juk stad kiba lah ban test ia ka jingshna ia ka surok ban tip la ki biang ne em ki jingshna.Katkum ka jingong u Myntri Rangbah ha kane ka policy kan don ruh ka Monitoring and Evaluation Management ha kaba kin peit ia ka jingshna jong ki kontraktor ia ka surok. Kane ka policy kan peit ym tang ia ki surok ka sorkar jylla hynrei wat ia ki surok ba la bei pisa ka sorkar India kum ka PMGSY.Halor ka jingkylli ba don ki kontraktor ki bym lah ban pyntreikam ia ka PMGSY, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ki don ki kontraktor ki bym kor bor ban shim ban pyntreikam ia kane ka skhim namar ba haba ka sorkar ka khot tender ba kin pyntreikam ar ne lai tylli ki surok, ka bor jongki, ka long tang kawei bad ha kum kane, ki la shah kyntait. “Ngin don ki tiar ban peit ban tes ba ka jingshna ia ki surok kin long katkum ka jingbthah, bad kine ki tiar stad teknoloji ki dei ki bym lah ban leh thok”, la bynrap u Myntri rangbah.
title: Thaw ka sorkar da ka MRMP, ban  maramot ia ki surok ha ka jylla

content: Shillong, 21 Naitung:3 ngut ki briew ki la mynsaw hadien ba kawei ka Taxi Maruti 800 ka la tyngkhuh bad kawei ka trok ha ka shnong Kynshi, West Khasi Hills. Katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 7:10 baje mynstep. Ha katei ka jingjia la iathuh ba katei ka trok ka dei thmu ban leit sha Nongstoiñ katba katei ka Taxi pat ka wan na mar pyrshah na Lad Myriaw. Ki 3 ngut kiba la mynsaw ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Senister Kharshandi 26 snem karta, u Kwik Marngar 17 snem bad u Pynbhalang Kharshandi , 19 snem baroh ki dei na ka shnong Rambrai. Ka 108 kaba don ha Markasa ka la pynkit ia kitei baroh 3 ngut sha Civil Hospital, Mairang bad kham hadien la pynkynriah sha Bethany Hospital, Shillong.
title: Aksiden ka Taxi bad  ka trok mynsaw 3 ngut

content: Shillong, 21 Naitung:Ka Khrang Presbyterian Jubille Secondary School mynta ka sngi ka la pynkup burom ia ki samla pule jong katei ka skul kiba la pass bha ha kane ka eksamin matrik kaba dang shu dep. Ia katei ka jingialang la pyniaid da u Rev. D.L Syiemlieh ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u Headmaster u bah K.Khongngaiñ. U bah Donevan Kharwanlang MDC ka Sohra konstitwensi u la long u kongsan ha katei ka sngi. Haba kitbok kitrwiang ia katei ka skul kumjuh ki samla pule jong ka kiba la wanrah ia ka nam ka burom jong katei kaba don ha kyndong jong ka thaiñ Sohra u bah Donevan u la ai sngewbha 3 tylli ki kor komputor sha katei ka skul ba kan nang lah ban ai ka jingshakri ba kham bha ia ki khynnah katkum ka jingdonkam jong ka juk mynta.Halor ki jingkyrpad ki bor pyniaid skul ban iarap kumno ban pynioh jingithuh ia ka skul ha ka sorkar bad kumjuh ruh ban pynioh ia ka building jong ka skul, u bah Donevan u la ong ba un sa buh skhim na ka MDC na bynta ka building bad ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingithuh na ka sorkar u la ong ba un iaid shakhmat ban ia kren bad ki bor sorkar halor kane ka bynta. Katei ka skul kadei kaba la seng naduh u snem 1975.
title: Pynkup burom ia ki samla pule 12 shnong

content: Jowai, 21 Naitung:U Ma Arbor Hima Darnei, u lamphang jong ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC), ula kynran dien ban shimti ïa ka shuki Chief Executive Member (CEM), wat hadien ba u ma Thombor Shiwat, u CEM JHADC, ula rai ban hiar shuki, lada ki para MDC jong ka Kongress kim don jingshaniah shuh ha u, ong ka khubor kaba la mih ha ka website jong U Riluk mynta ka sngi.Ka khubor ka ïathuh, ba katto katne ngut ki MDC ka Kongress, ki la ujor sha ki nongialam ka MPCC bad dawa ban pynkylla nongialam hapoh ka konsil da kaba kynnoh ba u Thombor, ula leh pyrshah seng, sam shiliang ia ka skim sorkar kmie hapdeng ki MDC bad thungkam beaiñ hapoh ka konsil.Ki heh nongïalam ka MPCC ba kynthup ia u Dr. DD Lapang bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, Dr. Mukul Sangma, ki la khot iakren bad bishar bin bin ia ka jingkynnoh pyrshah ia u CEM JHADC bad kim lah ban pynshisha ba u CEM u iaid lait ia ka riti treikam ka seng Congress. Wat la katta ruh u ma Thombor, ula rai ban hiar shuki lada ki para MDC kim hun shuh shuh ba un long nongialam. La sngewthuh ba lada U Ma Shiwat, un dei ban hiar shuki, yn lah ban shimti ia katei ka kam, da U Ma Arbor Hima, uba dei mynta u lamphang ka JHADC.Hynrei la sngewthuh ba U Ma Arbor Hima, ula kynran dien ban shim ia katei ka shuki CEM, hadien ba u Ma Andrew ula mih shakhmat ban pan ia knieh ia ka shuki CEM jong ka JHADC da ka jingkyrshan u Madonbai Rymbai, hynrei ka jingbishar ba stad ki heh ka MPCC, ki la shim iaka rai ban pynneh shuwa ia u ma Thombor Shiwat.Ki heh MPCC bad u Myntri Rangbah ki la kyntu ia ki MDC Congress ka JHADC ban pynduh iaka jingiapher jingmut bad ban iatreilang bad ban nang pynkhlain ia ka seng, namar ba ka elekshon ruh ka la hajan.
title: Kynran dien u lamphang JHADC,  ban shim ia ka shuki CEM

content: Shillong, 21 Naitung:U Myntri ka tnad ka Arts and Culture u Bah Ronie V Lyngdoh mynta ka sngi u la plie ia ka Rynsan ne ka Amphitheater ha Mawlai Nongkwar ba la shna ha ka jinglut kaba T.1.96 klur.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi u Bah Ronnie u la kyntu ia ki samla ka jaitbynriew ban pule tyngeh ha ka jingpule namar ba mynta ki don ki bor kiba thmu ban pynduh noh ia ka bhah kyrpang kaba ki jaitbynriew kum Scheduled Tribes, Scheduled Cast ba ki ju ioh.“Ki don ki bor kiba pyrshang ban thom ban pynduh ia ka bhah kyrpan kaba ju ioh ha ka jingpule ha ka ioh kam ioh jam”, la ong u Bah Ronnie.U la ong, “U Blei um shym la pyniapher ia ngi hynrei shu sahdien namar ba ka jingsdang ka pule puthi ha kane ka ri kam pat da slem. Ka jingwan ka pule puthi ha kane ka ri jong ngi ka long tang ha ka lai ne saw pateng eiei”.U la kyntu ia ki samla ba kin dei shuh ban ap ia ka jingioh bhah kyrpang hynrei ki dei ban durut tyngeh namar ba ym lah ban thikna ba ka bhah kyrpang kaba ju ioh ha ka pule pule, ha ka kam ka jam, ka lah ban shah pynduh noh namar ki don ki bor kiba pyrshang pynduh noh ia ki.Kane ka rynsan ka dei kaba nyngkong tam ha ka jylla kaba la pyndep bad sa ar tylli kum kane ka juh yn shna ha Jowai bad ha Tura.U Bah Ronnie u la ong ba ka jingdon jong kane ka Rynsan kan long ka lad ia ki samla ba kin lah ban pyndonkam ha ki sap jongki.U la kyntu ia ki samla ba kin shim kabu na kane ka jingdon kane ka Rynsan ban pyntbit ia ki sap jongki ha ki sngi ban wan.Katba u MLA ka thain u Bah Embhahlang u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ba ka Mawlai kan ioh pdiang sa ia kane ka Rynsan hadien ba ka la dep ban ioh ia ka Block kaba la plie hynnin ka sngi ha Mawtwar.U la kyntu ia ki samla, ki kmie ki kpa ban pynneh ia ka jinglong ka jaitbynriew kaba kyrpang ha ka riam ka beit, ka rwai ka siaw bad ka shad ka kmen.La ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na u Bah P T Sawkmie, MDC, Bah Kynsai M Lyngdoh u Vice President, Mawlai Town Dorbar.
title: Ioh ka Mawlai sa ka Rynsan ba T.1.96 klur Don ki bor ba thmu ban thom  ia ki rit paid, ong u Bah Ronnie

content: Sohra, 21 Naitung:Mynta ka sngi thohdieng ki samla pule jong ka Sohra Goverment College ki la iaid naduh katei ka jaka pule haduh Sohra Civil Sub-Division bad ki la wan ban pynkut biang ia katei ka jingiaid ha katei hi ka kolej. Ka daw kaba la pynlong ia ki samla pule jong katei ka kolej ban mih paidbah ha surok ka dei namar ka jingkuman ka sorkar halor ki jingdawa kiba bun kiba ki samla pule lyngba ka Sohra Goverment College Student Union ki la dawa na ka sorkar. Ha katei ka jing ialang paidbah, la wan ban ia shim bynta shitrhem da baroh ki samla pule katei ka kolej kiba don haduh 922 ngut.Haba ia kren bad u nongthohkhubor u President katei ka Union u samla Ethylberth Khongrymmai ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u Secretary jong katei ka Union u Vickychell Kharmih ki la ong ba naduh ka 18 tarik u nailar, 2016 ki la leit ban phah ia ki mat jingdawa sha ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad DHTE bad ha ka 23 tarik u nailur, 2016 ki la leit ban pynkynmaw biang ia katei ka jingdawa hynrei la shu sngap man man khadduh dei ha ka 9 tarik u nohprah, 2016 ba kitei ki samla ki la leit pynkynmaw biang hynrei haduh mynta ka sorkar ka leh kumba set kyllut bad dei halor katei ka nongrim ba ki la shim ia ka rai ban mih paidbah ha surok ban pyni sha ki bor sorkar ba ki samla pule jong ka Sohra College ki pyrshah jur ia katei ka jingieh noh khunswet bad ka jingleh shilliang khmat jong ka sorkar ia katei ka kolej kaba dei tang ma ka hi ka kolej sorkar hapoh East Khasi Hills District.Kitei ki nongialam ka Student Union ki la pynkynmaw ba ki mat ba ki la dawa na ka sorkar ka long ba kan sorkar kan mynjur ia ka riti synshar (Constitution) jong katei ka Union, ban pyndap noh ia ki kam nonghikai kiba la shu thylli la bun snem namarba kumba ka long mynta ym nonghikai satia ha ka Education Department. Ki la iathuh ba kumba ka long mynta ki don haduh 922 ngut ki samla pule na kylleng ka thaiñ Sohra kiba wan pule hangtei hynrei ka jingdon pat ki nonghikai ka duna palat. Shuh shuh ki la pynpaw ba ki kwah ba ka sorkar kan wanrah sa ia ka Science Stream bad ka Commerce Stream naba haduh mynta ka dang don tang ka Arts Stream, “Tang kane kaba la don lypa ruh kam pat biang, ngi kwah ba ka sorkar kan pynjanai shuwa ia kane ka shlem jingnang jingstad kaba ai jingshakri na bynta ki longing kiba duk ki bym kot bor ban kiew sha sor Shillong” ong u samla Khongrymmai haba ia kren bad u nongthohkhubor haba dawa ruh ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynbiang lem kumhba ka la leh ia kiwei pat ki kolej.Katkum ka jingiathuh kitei ki nongialam ka Union ki la ong ba ki don haduh 241 ngut ki samla pule jong ka Education Department bad kitei ki dei tang ki 1st Semester hynrei ki nonghikai pat ki don tang 2 ngut. Haba kylli ia ka jingdon ki nonghikai ki la ong ba ha ka Khasi Dept ki don 6 ngut, Economics Dept ki don 5 ngut, English ki don 5 ngut, Political Science ki don 5 ngut bad Environment ki don tang marwei hynrei na kitei don pat uwei u nonghikai uba la hikai la kumba 12 snem eiei hynre ihaduh mynta u dang dei tang u nonghikai Adhoc. Nangta la iathuh ba ha ka 10+2 ki don tang 2 ngut ki nonghikai kata tang ha ka sobjek English bad Philosphy katba ha ka sobjek Political Sciense, Khasi bad History ym don nonghikai satia bad ia kitei ki sobjek hap ban beh da ki nonghikai kolej.Ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingieh khun swet ka sorkar ia katei ka kolej kitei ki samla ki la iaid paidbah bad ki la thmu ban pynlong ia ka jingialang ba lyngkot hakhmat ka Sohra Civil Sub-Division hynrei ki bor Sub-Division kim shym la ailad ia ki ban pynlong jingialang bad kumta ki hap ban wan phai biang sha kolej. Kitei ki samla pule ka Sohra College ki la ai por ar taiew ia ka sorkar ban pynurlong ia kitei ki jingdawa jong ki lym kumta ki la byrngem ba kin ym shongthait satia ban dawa ia ka hok kaba ki dei ban ioh kumba ioh lem kiwei pat ki kolej sorkar.( Ia kiwei pat ki mat ba ki samla ka Sohra Goverment kolej ka ia khih, sngewbha pule ha ka sngi kaba bud).
title: Iaid paidbah ki samla pule ka Sohra  College, 2 taiew ai por ia ka sorkar;Ym ailad ban pynlong jingialang ha khmat Civil Sub-Division

content: Shillong, 21 Naitung:Ki shipai BSF, ki la ioh kurup ia 27tylli ki masi na Nayabazar (Hat Thymmai) ha East Khasi, kiba shongdor T.4.9lak, ong ka khubor ba la pyllait mynta ka sngi. Ha kawei pat ka jingjia, la iathuh ba ki BSF, kiba don ha Ganganagar, West Khasi Hills, ki la ioh kurup ia 20 tylli ki masi, kiba shongdor T.3.2 lak, kiba dang mut ban pynrung sha Bangladesh.
title: Kurup masi ki BSF na Hat Thymmai

content: Nongstoiñ, 21 Naitung:U bah D. Jyndiang MLA jong ka Nongstoiñ Konstitwensi hynne ka sngi u la hiar sha ka shnong Nongpyndeng kaba don ha Nongstoiñ, na ka bynta ban leit jngoh kyrpang ia ki 56 ngut ki khun swet khynthei bad shynrang kiba sah ha ka Rev. S. Wollington Children’s Home kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka KJP Synod Sepngi.Ha katei ka jingleit jngoh u MLA ia ki khun swet la ioh ruh ban pynlong ia ka jingialang kaba lyngkot hapoh ka ophis treikam jong katei ka jaka ri khun swet kaba don ha nongpyndeng bad ia ka jingïalang, la pynïaid da u Pastor A.C Lymba u ba la pynpaw ba kumba long mynta ki don 32 ngut ki khynnah shynrang bad 24 ngut ki khynnah kynthei kiba don ha kane ka jaka sumar.Nalor u MLA ha katei ka sngi la iadon ryngkat lang ruh ki riew pawkhmat jong ka Balang ba kynthup ïa u Pastor A.C Lymba u ba long ruh u Chairman jong ka Managing Committee, Pastor S.C Diengngan Director SELD jong ka Synod, u Tymmen basan P.S Mawlieh dkhot Managing Committee, Pastor T.T Diengdoh ba dei peit ïa ka Balang Presbyterian Nongpyndeng, lem bad kiwei kiwei de ki rangbah bad ki nongsumar nongpeit ïa ki khunswet.Ha shwa ba kin pynlong ruh ia ka jingleit jngoh ia ka jaka ba pyntrei ïa ka iing jong ka Children’s Home la ioh ruh ban pynlong ia ka jingduwai ba kyrpang na u Pastor T.T Diengdoh bad la bud pat sa ka jingkren lyngkot na u Pastor S.C Diengngan, u ba la pynpaw halor ki kam, ki jingdonkam bad ki jingthmu ba bha jong ka Balang haba buh ïa katei ka Children’s Home na ka bynta kito ki khunlung khynnah bad ki khunswet kiba donkam ïa ki jingïarap.“Ka jingangnud ban ïoh pyndep ïa la ka jong ka building ka dei kawei ka mat ba hakhmat eh, namar kumba long mynta la shu shong wai haduh lai tylli ki ïing, kawei na ka bynta ki khynnah kynthei, kawei na ka bynta ki khynnah shynrang bad kane ka ophis treikam jong ka Children’s Home bad ka bai wai ïing ha ka shi snem ha baroh lai tylli ka la kot sha ka saw lak tam”, ïathuh u Pastor.Katba na ka liang jong u bah D. Jyndiang MLA ka nongstoin haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang kaba lyngkot u la pynpaw ia ki kyntien ai khublei kyrpang sha ki nongpynïaid jong ka Balang bad khamtam eh sha ki nongpeit nongjngoh jong katei ka jaka ri khunswet, namar ka jingtrei shitom jong ki bad ka jingaiti jong ki ban shakri ïa ka kam lyngba katei ka project leh isynei.Kumta khnang ban pynurlong ia ka jingangnud ban lah pyndep noh kham kloi ïa ka building jong katei ka Rev Wollington Children’s Home na ka liang jong u Jyndiang u la ai ïa ka work order ba T. 2 lak, kaba dei ka MLA skhim bad u la ïathuh ruh ba katei ka skhim ba ar lak tyngka, ka dei ka bhah jong u (L) Maieit Hoping Stone Lyngdoh, u ba la angnud ban ïarap ïa katei ka jaka ri khunswet la kham slem.
title: T.2 lak ai U MLA,  ka skhim Bah Hoping

content: Shillong, 21 Naitung:Ka SBUK (Seng Biria U Khasi) ka pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih kaba khraw ban tip khubor ba U Bah Krieshon Rapthap, iba long uwei na ki nongthohkot Khasi baradbah jong ka ri Khasi-Jaiñtia u la khlad noh mynta ka sngi, ka 21 tarik u ‘Naitung. Ka jingkhlad jong u ka long ka jingduh kaba khraw ym tang ïa ka ïing ka sem, hynrei ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei ha ka liang ka thoh ka tar, ka pule ka puthi, bad kumjuh ruh ha ka imlang ka sahlang.“Ngi sngewsarong ban kynmaw ba i Bah Krieshon Rapthap i la long uwei na ki nongseng jong ka Khasi Authors’ Society ha ka snem 1979, ryngkat bad i (L) Babu H.W.Sten; (L) Babu B.C.Jyrwa; (L) Bah Hughlet Warjri; (L) Bah L.Gilbert Shullai; (L) Bah Donbok T.Laloo; i Bah H.Mylliemngap, Bah Kitbor W.Nongrum, Bah E. Weston Dkhar bad lyngba ki jingtrei shitom jong kine ki rangbah, ryngkat bad ka jingkyrshan bad jingïasnohkti lang jong kiwei ki paralok nongthohkot bad kiwei de ki seng ha ki snem kiba hadien, la lah ban kyntiew ïa ka ktien bad ka thoh ka pule Khasi shaduh ka kyrdan ba ka don mynta. To ngin sngewnguh ïa kine baroh junom” ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Wan Kharkrang, President jong ka SBUK, ha kaba ula phah ruh ïa ka jingsngewlem jong ka sha baroh ki bahaïing hasem jong U Bah Krieshon Rapthap, ryngkat bad ki jingduwai ba une u rangbah un ïoh Ïa ka jingjahthait bymjukut.
title: Sngewlem ka SBUK ia u nongthoh

content: Shillong, 21 Naitung:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Mukul Sangma um shym la kren shai halor kumno ka sorkar kan leh ia u ophisar u Bah HM Shangpliang uba shah ujor ba iadon bynta bad ka seng sain pyrthei ka Congress ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Lawbah dang shen. U Bah Shangpliang u dang bat mynta kum u director ka tnad Social Welfare bad kiwei ki tnad sorkar.Haba kylli ki nongthoh khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang kynhun myntri mynta ka sngi, halor kane, u Dr Mukul u la ong ba kano kano kaba la poi sha ka jingtip ka sorkar kan sa wad ia ka jingshisha katkum ka ain.U Myntri Rangbah u bym shym la treh ban kren bun halor kane, u shong ong, “Kano kano kaba wanrah sha ka jingtip ka sorkar, kan sa wad la ka long kaba shisha ne em”.Hynrei na ka liang ka myntri ka Social Welfare ka Deborah Marak ka la ong ka sorkar ka la pan jubab na u ophisar (bah Shangpliang) ban wad ia ka jingshisha haduh katno ka long kaba shisha ka jingshah kynnoh jongu.“Haduh katno ka long kaba shisha ka jingkynnoh namar ba ha kato ka sngi ka don ka prokram sorkar’, la ong ka Marak, kaba mut ba u Bah Shangpliang u leit sha ka jingialang ka sorkar.La paw ha ki lad khubor ba u dei uwei na ki ophisar uba lah ban iakhun ha ka elekshon MLA ban wan na Mawsynram na ka party Congress.Lah ban kdew ba ka CSWO bad ka TUR ka la ujor sha u Principal Secretary ba peit ia ka tnad Personal dang shen halor ka jingkynnoh ba u Bah Shangpliang u la leit ban iadon bynta bad ka jingialang ka party Congress na Mawsynram uba la iaroh ruh ia kane ka party watla u dang dei kum u ophisar sorkar bad kane ka long pyrshah ia ka ain.Kine ki ar seng ki la kam ruh ba ki la don ki sakhi kum ka video halor kane ka jingkren iaroh jong u Bah Shangpliang ia ka party bad ki nongialam ka Congress bad ki la dawa ba dei ban pynshitom ia u da kaba sospen bad ban pynduh lut ia baroh kiba u dei ban ioh lada lap ba ka long kaba shisha ka jingleh jongu lyngba ka jingtohkit ba laitluid ka sorkar.Kumjuh ka BJYM ruh ka la dawa ba dei ban sospen noh ia une u ophisar sorkar namar ba u don kti bad ka seng sain pyrthei kaba long pyrshah ia ka ain sorkar All India Service (Conduct) Rules, 1968.
title: Ym kren shai U MR, ia  U Bah Shangpliang

content: Jowai, 24 Naitung:Ka lehniam Behdeinkhlam ka Seinraij Tuber mynta ka kynti ka la phah ia ka khubor halor ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingthombor ia ki kynthei ki khynnah bad ia ki longkmie bad ka jingpynjot ia ka mariang nalor ka jingmaham ban ia shongkha kulmar namar ka jingpang HIV AIDS.Ka MP Rajya Sabha ka kong Wansuk Syiem ka la long ka kongsan bad haba kren ha katei ka lehniam,ka la ong ba nga la wan hangne ban kyrkhu kyrdoh ia phi ha kane ka lehkmen behdeinkhlam. “Ngam don eiei ban ong hynrei U Blei un kyrkhu kyrdoh ia phi ba phin ioh ia ka met kaba koit kaba khiah ban bha ruh ka kamai kajih jong phi baroh”, ka la ong.Ka Biar lane ka pung kyntang ha Tuber Kmai Shnong kumba long mynta ka la kylla dur namar ka la don ka Kalary, ki Painkhana khamtam eh ia ka VIP Kalari nalor kiwei kiwei ki jingtei ban pynitynnad ia katei ka jaka.Haduh kumba 64 tylli ki Rot kiba la wanrah da ki khun Niamtre jong ka Seinraij Tuber na ki shnong bapher bapher. Kila wanrah iaka khubor ban pynbha pynmiat ia ka imlang sahlang ban iada iaka jaidbynriew bad ka kolshor bad ruh ban ialeh pyrshah iaki jingdih pynbuaid kiba wanrah iaki jingpang khlam bapher bapher haka imlang.Ka lehniam Behdeinkhlam ka Seiñraij Tuber, kaba dei ruh ka Behdeinkhlam kaba heh tam ha Jaintia Hills kala poi noh sha kaba kut hynne ka sngi ha kaba la wan sakhi da ki phew hajar ngut ki paidbah na kylleng ka District bad kiba na bar ka Jylla.Ki kynrem ki lyndang kiba la wan sakhi ia kane ka lehniam Behdeinkhlam ki kynthup (nalor ka MP Rajya Sabha ka kong Wansuk Syiem) ia u local MLA, ma Justine Dkhar, u MLA ka Sutnga, ma Hopeful Bamon, ki Local MDC na Khliehtyrshi, Wapung bad na kiwei kiwei ki jaka nalor kata, ki heh District ka East Jaintia Hills, naduh u SP bad u DC.Kumba long ha ka Behdeinkhlam ka Seinraij Jowai- ka Behdeinkhlam ka Sein Raij Tuber ha Tuberkmai Shnong ruh ka la sdang naduh u bnai Lber -Iaiong da ki jingknia bad ka suit ka shor bad mynta u snem ka shad niam Behdeiñkhlam kala sdang naduh ka 18 tarik une u bnai. Ha aitnar hashuwa ba hiar ki rong ki rup (Rot) ki Wasan kiba kynthup ia u Langdoh, ki Sangot, ki Maji, ki Kitkhoh bad kiwei kiwei kila ai Pyrnah (kiad kaba don ha u klong) ia ki shnong bapher bapher kiba tip kum ki khun ba shong bri hapoh ka Seinraij Tuber. Hadien ba dep katei ka jingai Pyrnah ki khun ka Sein Raij Tuber ba kynthup ia palat 26 tylli ki shnong heh bad shnong rit kiba dang bat ia ka Niam uba rim- ka Niamtre Niam-tynrai kila wanrah haduh 64 tylli ki Rot ha katei ka pung aitnar mynta ka kynti Hashuwa ban bret pat ia kitei ki rong ki rup la pynkut ia katei ka jinglehniam ha katei ka pung la don sa ka Iatan Bhang ha kaba ka Phang Nein kala jop pyrshah iaka Phangwah. Lyngba ka jingjop ka Phang Nein la ngeit ba ka kamai kajih kan biang, u khaw u kba un bha bad kin ioh ka jingkoit jingkhia ha kaba kan ym jia kano kano ka nemsniew.
title: Tuid ki hajar sha ka  Behdeinkhlam ha Tuber

content: Shillong, 24 Naitung:U bah Jamphrang Nongkhlaw uba la shah weng noh ia ka jinglong myntri Kur Nongkhlaw ha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u la ong ba u dei hok ma u, u ban hiar pateng kum u myntri ka kur Nongkhlaw bad ia kane u la kdew da kaba ieng katkum ka Gazette jong ka Meghalaya kaba la pynmih ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai. Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u bah Jamphrang u la ong ki la don haduh 41 tylli ki kyntien kiba la kum thoh bakla ha ka aiñ jong ka Hima Mylliem ( Mylliem Act) hynrei ia kitei ki jingthoh la pynbeit noh bad la pynmhi ha ka Gazette kaba thymmai ha ka 13 tarik u naitung mynta u snem.U la ong ba ha katei ka aiñ ia ka kam myntri la shu thoh beit tang Nongkhlaw hynrei la dep ban pynbeit ia ka jingbakla bad la thoh Nongkhlaw Rngi, “Ka district Council ka la weng ia nga namar ba kam don ka kyntien Rngi ha katei ka aiñ Hima Mylliem, hynrei haba ngam jylliew ia ki jingthoh kiba rim ba jah ngi shem ba ka don ka kyntien Rngi bad ia katei ka pynbeit thymmai noh” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ong ba u la shah jied kum u myntri ka Hima Nongkhlaw da ka dorbar Kur jong ka Nongkhlaw Rngi katkum ka riti dustur bad katkum ka aiñ ka hima Mylliem hynrei da ka jingbakla thoh ia ki ktien ha ka aiñ ka la wanrah pynmih pynban ia ka jingkulmar jingmut. U la kyntu ia ka District Council bad ia u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ba kin bud ryntih noh katkum katei ka aiñ ba la dep pynbeit thymmai khnang ban lah ban weng noh ia baroh ki jingkulmar jingmut.Lah ban kdew ba ka la don ka jingiakul jingmut hapoh ka kur Nongkhlaw ha kine ki khyndiat ba la dep namar ka kam myntri ha kaba ka la don ka kynhun kaba kwah ba ia ka kam myntri dei ban ailad ban bat da uno uno u briew uba dei na ka kur Nongkhlaw uba lah ban jop ha ka elekshon jied myntri. Dei na katei ka jingdawa jong ka kynhun kaba na ka kur nongkhlaw hi ba la weng noh ia u bah Jamphrang na ka jinglong myntri jong u.
title: 41 tylli ki kyntien bakla,  ha ka Aiñ Hima Mylliem

content: Nongpoh, 24 Naitung:Wat la ka tnat Meghalaya Electricity Corporation Limited (MECL) ka la ialeh shitom ban pynbiang ia ki Cheque na ka bynta ban siew ia ka bai lutksan jong ki nongrep kiba la shah ktah na ka jingtei ia ka Umtru Hydroelectric Project, hynrei kitei ki nongrep kiba la shah ktah ha katei ka jaka kim treh satia ban pdiang ia katei ka pisa lyngba ka Cheque ka MECL.Haba sngapthuh ia ki nongrim kaba la pynlong ia kitei ki nongrep ba kin kyntait ia katei ka jingtyrwa jong ka MEECL, ha kaba ka daw hi ka dei namar ba ki Lai tylli ki mat jingdawa, kiba kynthup ia ka jingsiew halor ka jingjulor ki jingthung jingtep, ban thungkam pura noh ia ki 20 ngut ki nongrep ha katei ka jaka bad ban kyntiew ia ka jingsiew haba iadei bad ka bai lutksan jong ki jaka, namar kumba ka long hi na ka liang ka MECL ka la buh ia ka dor kaba T.30 shi Square Meter, ha kaba kum ki nongrep kim sngew iahap shuh ia katei ka dor.Ha ka jingialang kaba la khot pynlong da ka MECL mynta ka sngi ha IB ha Byrnihat, jan baroh na kitei ki nongrep kiba la shah ktah ki la wan poi bad ha kane ka sngi, ki la kyntait ban pdiang ia ka jingtyrwa da ka MECL ban pdiang ia kitei ki Cheque kaba ki la pynbiang, ban siew ia ka bailutksan jong ka jaka jongki.Haba kren sha ki nongrep ha kane ka sngi, u Bah Demijit Sawkmie, Joint Secretary ka MECL, u la pynshai halor kitei ki jingdawa na ki nongrep, ha kaba u la ong ba halor jong ka jingdawa ban thungkam pura ia ki nongtrei Casual, u la pynshai ba ia kaba mynta hi ym pat lah ban leh ei namar katei ka Project ruh kam pat da iaid bha, hynrei u la kular ba halor kane un sa iakren bad ki bor ba kham halor.Haba halor ka jingdawa jongki ban siew ia ka jingjulor jong ki jingthung jingtep bad kumjuh ruh haba iadei bad ban kyntiew ia ka jingsiew ia ka bai jaka, u Bah Sawkmie, u la ong ia katei ka jingkhein halor ka jingjulor ki jingthung jingtep la leh da ka tnat Horticulture bad Forest bad la ioh jingtip ruh ba ki la mang haduh T.1.29 Klur halor ka jingjulor ki jingthung jingtep, hynrei haba iadei bad ka jingdawa ban kyntiew ia ka bai lutksan jong ki jaka, u la pynshai ba ka tnat hi kam lah ban leh ei ei, namar ia kane ka jingkhein la leh da ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner, ha kaba ka MECL hi ka hap ban siew ia kaei kaba la buh da ka ophis u DC.U la pynshai ruh ia ki nongrep, ba lada kim hun ia katei ka dor ka mur kaba la buh ha ka dor kaba T.30 shi Square Meter, u la kyntu ia kitei ki nongrep ba kin leit ban iakren ia u DC ka Ri Bhoi.Haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, kitei ki nongrep kiba la shah ktah, ki la ong ba kim pyrshah ei ei halor ka jingwan jong katei ka Project ha katei ka jaka, hynrei kaei kaba la pyndiaw ia ki ka long ba kat haduh mynta kim pat ia ka jingsiew wat tang Shityngka, naduh ba la pyntrei ia katei ka Project ha katei ka jaka, ha kaba ka la wanrah jingeh shikatdei ia ki namar ba kim ioh shuh ban trei shawei.Ki la pynpaw ruh ba lada kane ka jingdawa jong ki kam poi shano shano, kum ki nongrep ngim banse ban iaid da kiwei pat ki lynti kiba kham tyngeh, ki la bynrap.
title: Kyntait ki nongrep ban pdiang  ia ka pisa na ka MeECL

content: Shillong, 24 Naitung:Kumba 100 ngut eiei ki jugali kiba la pyndep ia ka eksamin thungkam ryngkat ka jingkyrshan ka KHNAM Youth Wing ki la pynlong ia ka jingiakhih da kaba shong kyrain bad ki lama hajan katei ka ophis kaba don ha Lumjingshai, Shillong. Hynrei kine ki Jugali kim ioh lad ban leit haduh khyrdop ka MeECL namar ba la shah khang noh ha ki pulit bad ki la shu shong kham pajih.Namar kane ka jingiakhih jong ki, ka la pynlong ia u Chairman Cum Managing Director ka Meghalaya Energy Cooperation Limited (MeECL) u Bah P S Thangkhiew ban khot ia ki nongialam ban ia kren bad ki.Katkum ka jingong u President ka KHNAM Youth Wing, u Bah Thomas Passah, u CMD u la ong ba lada um lah ban thung kam lut ia kine baroh ki Jugali hapoh lai bnai, yn hiar shuki noh ialade.U President ka KHNAM Youth Wing, uba ialam ia ki Jugali, u la iathuh ba CMD, watla um shym la kren shai lano yn thung kam lut noh ia kine ki 466 ngut kiba dang sah, hynrei la iathuh ba ka MeECL kan sa pynjlan shuh ia kane ka jingtreikam ka result sa lai bnai hadien ba kan kut noh ha ka 2 tarik Nailar jong u bnai ban wan.U la iathuh ba u CMD ula ai ka jingkular kaba skhem ba hadien ba yn sa pynjlan sa lai bnai un ialeh shitom ba baroh kine ki 466 ngut kiba dang sah ban thung lut ia ki.Namar ka jingbym lah ban kular kaba thikna, na ka liang ki Jugali ki la rai ban bteng beit ia ka jingiakhih haduh ba kin da ioh ia ka jingthoh ban pynthikna ban thungkam ia ki.U Bah Passah u la ong ba u CMD u la pynthikna ba kito kiba pas ia ka eksamin yn sa pyniar biang ia ka jingtreikam ka resol haduh lai bnai bad 233 ngut ki jugali yn sa ai shithi thungkam noh ha ka Phase II bad 233 ngut ha ka Phase III.“Hynrei ngim nym sangeh ia ka jingiakhih bad yn bteng beit haduh ba ngin ioh pdiang da ka jingthoh ha kti”, la ong u Bah Passah.U la Bah Passah u la ong ba namar ba ka elekshon ka la jan, ki myntri sorkar ki leh mynleh ban pynslem khnang ban ioh thung kam da ki briewq lajong.Ka KHNAM ka la byrngem ruh ban nym iashim bynta ha ka elekshon ia ka Congress ha ka elekshon ban wan lada kim pynurlong ia ki jingdawa.
title: Byrngem sa U CMD,  ka MeECL ban hiar shuki

content: Shillong, 24 Naitung:U Abdul Kalam, u la ai ka jingujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka step 23 tarik mynta u bnai hapdeng shi baje bad ar baje mynstep ki briew kiba um lah ban ithuh kila rahbor ia u ha kawei ka kali, ha kane ka jingrah bor kila knieh ia ka pisa T.15,000/- tyngka.Nalor kane ka pisa kaba kila knieh, ha kane ka jingujor la ong ba kine ki briew ki la shim ia ka cheque na u bad ki sa pynlait pat ia u ha ka por kumba 4.00 baje ei ei mynstep.Kine ki runar ki la dawa ruh na u san lak tyngka. Haba ia dei bad kane ka jingjia ki pulit ki la kem ia u bah Celrence Jason Rajee.
title: Shah rahbor uwei na Umsohsun

content: Shillong,24 Naitung:Ki samla pule jong ka Sohra Goverment College, mynta ka sngi ki la leit ia kynduh ia ka myntri ba peit ba ia tnad Higher and Technical Education ka kong Roshan Warjri ha kamra treikam jong ka ha Secretariat ban pynpaw ia kiba bun ki jingeh ba katei ka kolej sorkar kaba don ha Saitsohpen, Sohra ka ia kynduh. La synran lang ia kitei ki samla da u MDC ka Sohra konstitwensi u bah Donevan Kharwanlang.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor hadien katei ka jingiakynduh myntri, u President jong ka Sohra Goverment College Student’s Union u samla Ethylberth Khongrymmai u la ong ba la pynpaw sha ka myntri ia ka jingduna nonghikai na bynta ka sobjek Education ( Education department) bad ka myntri ka la kular ba shen yn sa phah noh 2 ngut ki nonghikai kiba dang don mynta ha Williamnagar. Ki la iathuh ba ar tylli ki kam nonghikai ha ka sobjek Education ka la thylli naduh u snem 2015 bad 2016 naba ha u 2015 uwei u nonghikai u la risaiñ noh na ka kam katba ha u 2016 uwei pat u nonghikai u la shongthait noh.Ki la ia kren ruh ia ka jingdonkam ban buh sa uwei u Additional Lecturer bad ia katei ruh ka myntri ka la bthah ia u Principal katei ka kolej ban buh jingthoh sha ka khnang ban ioh leh ia kaba donkam.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingdawa ban pynheh ia ki kamra klas namar kumba ka long mynta ka la khapngiah palat na ka jingbun ki samla pule, ki nongialam katei ka Union ki la ong ba la pyntip sha ki ba ka la don ka skhim kaba la mang T.1.40 klur tyngka (Shi klur saw phew lak tyngka) na ka Rashtriya Uchchatar Shiksha Abhiyan ( RUSA) ha kaba yn pyntreikam noh shen.U MDC ka Sohra u bah Donevan Kharwanlang haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u la ong ba naduh ba la khang ia u dewiong , u mawshun ka kamai kajih ha ka thaiñ Sohra, ka la hiar shaba palat ha kaba ki kmie ki kpa kim lah shuh ban phah pule ia ki khun jong ki sha Shillong ne shabar bad kumta ki hap ban phah ia ki khun jong ki sha katei ka kolej kaba don hajan jong ki.Na katei ka daw ka la don ka jingia tyngngian kaba jubor ha katei ka kolej mynta bad ka jingkhapngiah ka long kaba la palat kaba ki samla pule ki hap ban shong haduh 5 ne 6 ngut ha kawei ka ben ruh. U la ong ba kum u MDC um shym la lah ban leh lut ia kitei kiei kiei kiba donkam ia katei ka kolej watla u la don eh ka mon bad ka mynsiem ban iarap, u la pynkynmaw ba u la dep ban ai skhim na ka MDC Scheme jong u na ka bynta ban shna pynheh ia ki kamra klas.Shuwa ba kin leit ia kynduh ia ka myntri sorkar ki samla pule ka Sohra College ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia Director ka tnad DHTE ban ai ia ka jingthoh kiba dei ki mat jingdawa jong ki; hynrei kham hadien u Director bad u Joint Director ki la wan lang sha katei ka jingiakren kaba long ha kamra jong ka myntri sorkar.
title: Kular ka myntri ban pynurlong,  ia ki jingdawa ha Sohra College

content: Ampati, 24 Naitung:U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma mynta ka sngi u la sam symbai masi sha ki nongrep bad ki san tylli ki Self Help Groups kiba hap ha Betasing C&RD Block ha South West Garo Hills.Ia kine ki symbai masi la sam na ka skhim Livestock Mission ka sorkar kaba dang shu pynlait paidbah dang shen ha ka jingialang kaba long ha Ampati.Ia kane ka prokram la pynlong da ka tnad ri ka AH & Veterinary ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Basin Development Unit, South West Garo Hills bad la don lang ka Chairperson, Meghalaya Resources & Employment Generation Council, ka Dikkanchi D. Shira, Chairperson, State Development Reforms Commission, Bluebell R. Sangma, CEM, GHADC Boston Marak, Deputy Commissioner u Bah C.V.D.Diengdoh bad kiwei.U Myntri rangbah u la ong ba kine ki masi kin lah ban pynmih dud haduh 40 liter shi sngi bad kan pynmih pisa ia ki nongrepT.16,000 shi bnai lada sumar bha ia ki masi khem dud.Katkum ka jingkhein ka sorkar, kumba 10,000 tylli ki longiing ha ka jylla kynthup 5000 tylli ha Garo Hills bad 5000 tylli ha Khasi-Jaintia Hills, kin ioh jingmyntoi na kane ka skhim ri sniang, ri masi, ri syiar, ri blang, ri muid bad kiwei. Ka sorkar kan sam da ki symbai masi na phareng ne ki Holstein Friesian (HF) sha ki nongrep..Haba kren ha kane ka sngi u myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la shim khia bha ban kyntiew ia ka kam ri jingri ha kane ka jylla ban ai jingim ia ki paidbah nongkyndong lyngba ka skhim Livestock Mission kaba pyntrei da ka Veterinary bad ka Integrated Basin Development bad ka Livelihood Promotion Programme (IBDLP).“Ngi kwah ban hikai ia ki samla bad ki nongrep ban pynmih jingbam chocolate, khi bad kiwei ki jingbam na ka dud khamtam ha Garo Hills”, u la ong.
title: Ki masi ba ai dud 40litar shi  sngi, ai U MR ia ka Ampati

content: Shillong, 24 Naitung:Hadien 2 taiew ba u la shah rahbor ha ki runar u Ricky Marweiñ, na ka shnong Umsur, South West Khasi Hills u la wan poi ïng mynhynnin ka sngi u blei. U Ricky u la shah rahbor ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai na ïngsah jong u kaba don ha ka shnong Umsur, hynrei ha ka sngi thohdieng jong ka taiew ki shipai khappud ka Bangladesh ki la ioh bat ia u, ryngkat ki runar kiba la rahbor ia u na khappud bad ha ka sngi saitjaiñ la aiti sha ki shipai BSF kiba don ha Baghmara bad ha katei hi ka sngi la aiti sha kiba haing hasem ha ka por 2 baje nohphai sngi bad ki la wan poi ha nongbah Shillong ha ka por baje ha ka sngi u blei.La leit shaw ia u da 4 ngut ki bahaing hasem kiba dei ki hynmen bad kynum.U Rupang u la ngam jylliew halor katei ka jingshah rahbor u Ricky kumno ka jia bad kumno la ioh ban pyllait pait ia u. Haba ia kren bad u kynum jong u Ricky u bah Sanjay Kharsati u la ong ba la rahbor ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 12:30 baje shiteng miet, ha katei ka por ki runar ki la wan kyndang na ing bad pynap da ki tiar , ki teh ia ka kti jong u bad ha katei ka por ki bahaing hasem ki donlang hynrei kim lah ban leh eiei.Hadien katei u la ong ba katkum ka jingiathuh u Ricky la ialam sha khappud bad pynryngkang na u pud India sha u pud u sam ka Bangladesh bad la aiti sa ha kiwei pat ki briew bad nangtei ruh la ialam sa sha kiwei pat ki jaka kiba um shym la ithuh satia bad hangtei ruh la aiti sa ha kiwei pat ki briew, u la ong ba kitei ki runar ki don bun kynhun bad ki dei kiba kieng atiar hynrei ym shym la lah pat ban pynthikna la ki dei ki lehnoh ne dei ki dakaid naba um sngewthuh ia ka ktien ba ki ia kren.Ha ka por ba u don ha kti ki runar u la iathuh ba u Ricky u ong ba kim shoh kim pynmynsaw satia ia u, ka ba mruh ki pynbiang , la iathuh ba u shait u khlaiñ hynrei ka don hi ka jingring tlot. Ha ka por ba u la shah rah bor na ing la ong ba u phong tang da ka patlun lyngkot (patlun phutbol) namarba ka shit bha ha Umsur hynrei ha ka por ba u la wan phai u la phong da kiwei pat ki jaiñ kiba kiba haing kim pat kylli bha na u la ki dei ki jaiñ ba ai ki nongrah bor ne ki dei ki jaiñ ba ai ki pulit Bangladesh.Dei ha ka sngi thohdieng jong ka taiew ba kitei ki runar ki la thmu ban wanrah biang noh ia u Ricky shapoh u pud u sam ka India hynrei ha ka por ba ki dang thmu ban ryngkang na shiliang sha shilliang ki shipai Bangladesh ki la ioh bat noh bad hadien kata ki la aiti sha ki pulit Bangladesh bad kham hadien ki sa ia kren bad ki shipai India. Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ la ia thoh ia tar ia soi ia saiñbad la pyndep ia ki jingdonkam baroh katkum ki kyndon bad la aiti noh sha kiba haing hasem.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, nalor u Ricky u dang don sa uwei pat u samla uba la shah rahbor ha ki runar na ka shnong Nongjri kaba don marjan bad ka shnong Umsur. Utei u dei u samla Dajied Kynsai Syiemlieh na ka shnong Bynther-Mairang. Utei u samla u la shah rahbor ha ka 27 tarik u iaiong, ki pulit Bangladesh ki la ioh bat ha ka 15 tarik u jymmang hynrei hadh mynta ym pat shym la aiti ha ki bahaing hasem.U Rupang u la ioh ia kren bad u jong u Dajied u bah Rijoy sing Basaiawmoit ha kaba u la ong ba u lyngngoh balei ym pat shym la lah ban wanrah ia u haduh mynta ruh, “Dang myn ha ka sngi saitjaiñ nga la phone ia u SP, u la iathuh ba u la ioh ia kren bad ki pulit ka Bangladesh bad u la ong ba ki dang pyndep ia kaba ki donkam ban leh” ong u bah Rijoy. U bah Rijoy u la iathuh ba katkum ka jingiakren jong u bad u SP u sngewthuh ba u khun jong u, u shait u khlaiñ; hynrei u la pynpaw pat ka jinglyngngoh balei ba haduh katta ruh ym pat pyllait ia u, “La iathuh ia nga ba u SP ka sherpur District ka Bangladesh u la pyntip sha ki pulit ka Meghalaya ba kaba sah mynta ka long sa tang ban aiti ha ki shipai khappud ka Bangladesh ban wanrah ia u Dajied” ong biang u bah Rijoy.
title: U Ricky u la wan phai ïng, u Dajied;  dang ha kti ki pulit Bangladesh

content: Shillong,25 Naitung:Ka Kynhun ki Khun Ki Hajar ka Hima Mawsynram ki la dawa na u CEM ka KHADC ba u dei ban weng noh ia u Syiem ka Hima Mawsynram u Pa’iem A.M Syiem Malngiang da kaba kdew bun tylli ki mat kiba la kynnoh pyrshah ai u Syiem.Ia katei ka kynhun la ialam da u Banshai Marbaniang President FKJGP Mawsynram Circle, ryngkat ka HYC, HANM bad HNYF Mawsynram.Katei ka jingiakynduh ka la long hapdeng katei ka kynhun bad u CEM bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem ryngkat u EM ba peit ia ka Elaka u bah Latiplang Kharkongor.Kawei na ki mat ba la kynnoh ka long ba naduh ba u Pa’iem Amossingstar Malngiang u shimti kum u Syiem ha u snem 2010 um ju lum dorbar pyllun kaba la pynkylla long ia ki khun ki hajar ban sah ha ka umdum.La kynnoh ba u la pyndonkam bakla ia ki jaka puta hapoh Hima bad la kynnoh ba u pyrshang ban lilam ia ki jaka sha kiwei pat ki briew ki bym don hok ban long trai.La kynnoh ba la mih ka jingiasngewsih hapdeng ki khun ki hajar namar ka jingbym lah u Syiem ban ai jingshai ia ki jaka puta ka Hima.La kynnoh ba um lah ba nai jingkheiñ ia ka ioh ka kot bad ka jinglut jingsep jong ka Hima bad la ong ba u la pynlong kam shimet pynban.
