U CEM bad EM ki la kular ha katei ka jingiakynduh ba kin shim ia ki lad ki lynti kumno ban pynbeit ia katei ka kam khnang ba u khun u hajar un ym mad jingeh bad kin sa shim ia ka rai kaba dei ban leh.
title: Dawa ki khun ki hajar ban  weng ia u Syiem Mawsynram

content: Shillong, 27 Naitung:Ka kynhun kynthup u Conrad Sangma u MP ka Tura, u Bah Vincent H Pala u MP ka Shillong, u Bah A L Hek u MLA, bad ki dkhot ka Joint action committee (JAC) jong ka ophis ka Customs & Central Excise Service Association ki la iakynduh ia u myntri pla pisa ka sorkar India u Arun Jaitley bad ki la aiti ka dorkhas ban pynneh ia ka ophis u Chief Commissioners ha Shillong. Ia kane ka dorkhas la soi ruh da ki MP jong kane ka dong mihngi baroh kiba dei na ki seng sain pyrthei bapher bapher.Ka kynhun ka la pynsngew ha u Jaitley ba ka ophis jong u Chief commissioner ka la don ha Shillong la palat 15 snem bad ka la dep thied ruh ia ka jaka kaba heh 15 akar ha Shillong ban shna ia ka ophis. Ki la ong ruh ba ka ophis jong u Chief commissioner ka dei tang ka ophis ban treikam ki ophisar bad kam don kano kano ka jingiadei bad ki paidbah namar ba bad ki paidbah la leh da ka ophis u Commissioner. Ka ophis jong u Commisioner ka la don ha Guwahati, Shillong bad ha baroh ki jylla ka dong mihngi.Namar kata ka jingthmu ban rah ia kane ka ophis Chief commissioner kan ktah ia ki nongtrei khamtam ki Khasi kiba la shim jait na ka kmie kiba hap ban peit ia ka iing ka sem.Ha kane ka jingiakynduh, na ka liang u Jaitley u la sngap bad u la pynthikna ba un peit ia kane ka kam, kloi katba lah.
title: Kynduh U Conrad, Bah Vincent,  Bah Hek ia u Jaitley

content: Shillong, 25 Naitung:Ki paidbah ka Raid Marwet, Ri-Bhoi kim hun ia ka jingpep jong u Syiem Mylliem u Paiem Ricky Nelson Syiem ha ka jingbuh sngi hi jongu, ban pynlong ia ka jingsngap ia ka jingujor pyrshah ia ka jingtih maw ha syndah ka Law kyntang. Ha ka jingshisha, u Syiem Mylliem u la buh sngi ban hiar hi ban leit sngap bad jurip ia katei ka Lawkyntang ha Patgang ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai hynrei u shu phah pynban tang ia ki myntri.“Ki paidbah ka Raid Marwet kim hun satia ia ka jingwan mih jong ki myntri u Syiem khlem don lang u Syiem ha katei ka sngi namar ba ki la ap khmih lynti ban wan hi Syiem dalade’, la ong ki riew rangbah haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor.Ki la ong ba ha ka jingshisha u Syiem ha ka jingkhot jongu kaba long ha ka 17 tarik ha Shillong, u la kular ba un hiar hi dalade sha katei ka jaka ban peit ia ka jinglong jingman hynrei u khlem poi satia bad kane ka la pynsngewsih ia ki paidbah kiba la ap kmong ia u.Ha katei ka sngi, la wan jurip tang ki myntri bad u Syiem ka Raid,u Rangbah Shnong u Bah Ioanis Narleng,ki nongrep ba ju rep ha katei ka law kyntang, ki longkmie ka raid bad kiwei kiwei, ki la lap ia ka jingshisha namar ha ka jaka ba la tih ka dei ka ba hap ha ka law kyntang. Haba pyrshang ban iakren bad uwei na ki myntri, u la ong ba ha ka por ba wan jurip nyngkong kim shym la iohi ia ka parmaw,hynrei mynta ki la lap da la ki khmat,bad ong ba ka dei kaba hap ha u pud u sam ka Raid bad law kyntang bad lada dang iai bteng ban tih kan sa ap jingma ia katei ka law kyntang. Ki myntri ki la batai ba kim lah ban shim rai bad ia kane kin sa rah sha ka dorbar bad ia ka rai kin sa pyntip ha ka wei ka sngi.
title: Ym hun ki paidbah Raid Marwet,  ba pep jurip u Syiem ia ka parmaw

content: Shillong, 27 Naitung:Ka Jaintia Coal Miners and Dealers Association, ka la leit ban shim bynta ha ka jingshong bishar, kaba mynta ka sngi, ba la pynlong da ka National Green Tribunal (NGT) ha Delhi bad haba iakren halor ka jingtih dewiong, na ka liang ka sorkar Jylla, ka la pan por biang, namar ba kam pat lah ban pyndep ia ka ain kaba iadei bad ka jingtih mar poh khyndew haduh mynta.Na ka liang jong ka State Co-ordination Committee of Coal Owners’s Miners and Dealers Forum, ki dawa namarkata na ka sorkar jylla, ba kan pynphai noh ia ka pisa, kaba ka la shim tam na ki nongkhaii dewiong bad halor katei ka phang, ka NGT, ka ai por shiphew sngi, ia ka sorkar Jylla, ba kan ai, ia ka jubab kaba shai halor katei ka jinglum pisa tam jongka, na ki nongkhaii dewiong, ong ka kyrwoh ba la phah da U Ma Balious Swer President jong ka Jaintia Coal Miners and Dealers Association.Ha ka jingiakren bad U Ma Balious Swer, ula iathuh ba ka jingbym lah jong ka sorkar Jylla, ban pyndep ia ka ain mar poh khyndew, ka dei beit beit, ka mon sain pyrthei bad u ong ruh “Ka shong ha u myntri rangbah, u bat ma u, ia ka tnat DMR” lane ka tnat mar poh khyndew. La ong biang utei u rangbah “Lada u treh, tang shi bnai lah dep” bad u iathuh shuh shuh ba ki seng dewiong, ki la dep ai ia ka ain jongki la shisnem tam, hynrei, namar ba ka sorkar Jylla, ka dei kawei na ki nongdon bynta, kumta ka NGT, kam lah satia ban shim ia ka rai. La ong biang U Ma Swer “Ha Goa tang 11 bnai ki khang” bad ka dei ka long namar ba ka sorkar Jylla, ka pyndep stet ia ka ain mar poh khyndew.U nongthoh, ula kylli, haba kumta, la ka sorkar Jylla, ka la dep aiti ne em, ia ka ain sha ka NGT bad utei u rangbah, ula jubab ba ki la dep leh, tangba kam biang satia, namar ba kim khlem leh home work bha. U Ma Balious, u kren diaw ruh, halor ka jingtyrwa jong U Mukul Sangma, ban aiti noh sha ka MMDC ban tih dewiong bad katei ka thew, ba u kwah ban leh beit katba u mon, ym shuh, katba u mon u paidbah.Halor ka jingsiew tam jong ki nongkhaii dewiong sha ka tnat mar poh khyndew, U Ma Balious, u shim ba ka pisa, kaba ki siew tam kan poi sha ka T.10 haduh T.15klur ha baroh kawei ka Jylla bad ka daw, ka long namar ba ka por ba ki nongkhaii ki kam ia ka jingdonkam ka long palat na kaei kaba u mar, u don shisha ha par bad kumta ka jingkhein ka kham heh, ia ka jingdon ka mar bad kumta ka khajna, ka bun kaba tam bad kaba don ha kti ka sorkar Jylla.Haba kylli, la ka don ne em ka lynti ban pyllait dewiong, ha kane ka sorkar, kaba mynta, U Ma Balious, u ong “Ban plie ia u dewiong, ha kane ka sorkar, ym don lad shuh” bad kaba u ong, ka long ba ioh lehse, kin lah ban pynbiang tang ka ain, ha kine ki khyndiat bnai bad lada ka long kumta ruh, katba kan mynjur ka tnat Coal, Environment, Climate Change kan shim por ar, lai bnai bad ban pyntreikam ia ka plan kan shim por 3,4 bnai bad U Ma Swer, u kren pynkut, da kaba ong “Ha kane ka sorkar, ym don lad shuh bad kan wan ha ka sorkar thymmai”.Ki nong ia said na ka liang jong ki trai par dewiong, ki long U Nalin Kohli, uwei na ki riewsaid ba paw jong ka Supreme Court bad U P Yoobin, uwei na ki riewsaid na ka Jylla.
title: T.15klur, shah ram ki trai dewiong  sha ka sorkar Jylla, ujor ha NGT

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:Ka Confederation of Ri Bhoi People (CoRP) ka la ong ba ki paidbah ka Ri Bhoi ki dei ban husiar na ki riew shim kabu kiba la leit tyrwa phom ban ioh skhim ri khniang T.1.50 lak, kawei ka longiing lada ki lah ban pynbiang ia ki kot ki sla.U General Secretary ka CoRP u Bah Friday Jalong lem bad ki dkhot ka seng ki la iakynduh ia ka District Sericulture Officer, Ri Bhoi ka kong L Lyngwa ban ioh ia ka jingtip ba bniah hynrei kaba lyngngoh ha katei ka jingiakynduh ka DSO, Sericulture ka la iathuh ba kam don jingtip eiei halor ka jingsam ia ki phom ban ai shkim ri khniang ia ki paidbah bad ka la shu ioh jingtip narum naneng ba don kiba ai ia kitei phom ha Ri Bhoi District.“Ngim shym la sam phom ban ai skhim ri khniang ia ki paidbah ha Ri Bhoi”, la ong ka kong Lyngwa.Ka la ong ba ka ophis kam don jingtip eiei bad ka la pyrshang ban wad jingtip bniah na ophis ha Shillong bad ki para ophisar na kiwei ki district hynrei ki ruh kim tip eiei.“Nga la pyrshang ban peit ia ka website hynrei kam don bynta bad ka tnad na jylla ban pyntrei haka phom la thoh Rural Livelihood Planing Council (Sericulture Application Form) bad sha trai la thoh kum ka adress ka long, ka Rural Livelihood Planing Council, {CIN-U7499DL2016NPL306999} 1021st Floor,SagarPalza, Dsitrcit Centre Nirman Vihar ( Behiand V35 Mali) Delhi 110092. Phne. 91-11-43086677 email. info@rural council.in. bad website www.ruralcouncil.cin (Sericulture Application Form).Kane ka la pynkulmar jingmut ia ki nongtrei katei ka ophis, nalor kiba wan kylli phom don ruh kiba wan ban thep, ka kong Lyngwa ka laong ba kim tip mano ba la sam ia kitei ki phom ha Ri Bhoi District, katba ha kiwei ki district ka jylla ym don eiei.Ka la ioh jingtip ba don kiba die ia kitei ki phom ha ka dor T.150 kawei kumta ban leh eiei kam sngew nang ioh lehse don ki ejen kiba wanrah hynrei ka sorkar ka dei ban tip mano ba pyntrei bad la sah ha umdum haba ki paidbah ki wan ban wad jingtip bad lada ka ong ka dei ka kam thok ruh ioh ki paidbah ki duhnong ia ka shkim ba T.1,50,000/-.Halor kane ka CoRP ka kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin long husiar bha ban ym shah pynbiej ioh kin shah shet ha ki briew ba kwah bam ei na ki nongrep, namar na ka liang ka seng ruh ka pyrshang ban wad jintip ba bniah hynrei kam shym ioh satia mano ba sam ia ki phom sha ki paidbah.
title: Tyrwa phom ri khniang  T. 1.50 lak ha Bhoi

content: Nongpoh, 28 Naitung:Ki nongialam RBYF, Nongpoh Circle, ia kaba la ialam da u Adviser u Bah J. Syngkli, ha ryngkat ka jingsynranlang u Bah Y. Nongrum, President ka Nongpoh Circle, ki dkhot ka seng lem bad ki nongkitkam jong ki Sports Club na katei ka thain, mynta ka sngi ki la leit ban jurip ia ka Madan ialehkai ka Raid Nonglyngdoh kaba don ha shnong Pahambir, Ri Bhoi.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne ia katei ka Madan ka Raid Nonglyngdoh, la thmu ban shna bha bad kaba la ioh ruh ia ka jingmang tyngka haduh T.40 Lak tam, lyngba ka Directorate of Sports & Youth Affairs jong ka sorkar jylla, hynrei ka long pat kaei kaei kaba lyngoh ba kat haduh kine ki sngi katei ka madan ka shu sah khongreng khlem da lah satia ban pyntrei.Ha ka kyrwoh kaba la phah da ki nongialam ka RBYF, Nongpoh Circle, la ong ba ka seng ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor kane ka jingbymshim khia da ka sorkar lyngba ki contractor ban pyndep ia ki jingthmu ban pynbna ia katei ka madan, namar kane ka jingbymlah ka sorkar ban pyndep ia katei ka madan, ka wanrah ia ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ia ki khun samla kiba don ia ka sap ha ki jingialehkai bapher bapher, tang namar ka jingbymdon ki jaka kilan kiba biang.Ki la iathuh ruh ba katkum ka jingtip kaba la ioh da ka seng, la ong ba ia katei ka madan la thmu ban shna bha ha kiba bun ki liang, kata naduh ki Rataining Wall, Vip Gallery lem bad kiwei kiwei, hynrei ia kine baroh ym shem la leh satia bad haba la tip ia ka daw ka dei namar ka jingbym don pisa ka sorkar.Kumta haba iadei bad kane na ka liang ka RBYF, ka la dawa ia ka sorkar bad Kontraktor ba ka dei ban sdang noh ia ka jingpyntrei ia katei ka madan hapoh shibnai, lym kumta ka seng kam banse ban shim da ki lad ki lynti kiba kham tyngeh, pynkut ka kyrwoh.
title: Sngewkhia ka RBYF ba sahteng  ka Madan ka Raid Nonglyngdoh

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:U President ka BJP u Amit Shah, un iakynduh ia ki MLA ha kane ka jylla ha ka por ba un wan iuhkjat ha u bnai ban wan kiba lah ban iasoh bad kane ka party. Katkum ka jingong u President ka BJP Meghalaya u Bah Shibun u Amit Shah un wan hapdeng ki 15 tarik shaneng jong u bnai ban wan.U Bah Shibun u la ong ba ha kane ka jingwan jongu president rangbah, un iakynduh ia ki MLA kiba thmu ban pyniasoh bad ka seng, kynthup wat na ka Congress.Mynta ka sngi, u national coordinator ka BJP u Arvind Menon u la wan sha ka nongbah ha kaba u la iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka party ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon bad ban pynkhlain ia ka party ha kane ka jylla.Watla u Bah Shibun u la ai dak ba ka jingrung jong kiwei ki MLA sha ka BJP shwa ka elekshon kan long kaba thikna, hynrei um treh ban iathuh ia ki kyrteng jong ki.U la ong ba u general secretary ba peit ia ka elekshon u Bhupendra Yadav un sa wan sha ka jylla ha u bnai ban wan ban plie ia ka ophis ka seng.
title: Yn kynduh U Shah ia ki  MLA, ha u bnai ban wan

content: Jowai, 28 Naitung:Kawei ka longkmie ka la duh ei ia la ka jingim, ha ryngkat I khun ba ka dang pun hadien ba ka kali kaba la pynieng ha phyllaw ka la tyllun bad tynrah ia ka. Katei ka longkmie ka la khlad ha Dr. Norman Tunnel Hospital, Jowai.Kane ka la jia ha ka shnong Ummulong mynta ka sngi ha ka por kumba 12 baje eiei. Katei ka longkmie kadei kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Banisha Dkhar kaba dei na ka shnong Khongsaro bad kaba sahwai ha Ummulong.Mynta ka sngi, u lok jong ka, u ma Helpin Saitwai, u la shim da ka kali pick up u paralok ban kit tiar na Ummulong ban leit sah noh sha shnong, namar ba ka dei ka por kha.Ha phyllaw iing sahwai la pynieng ia katei ka kali ha jaka ba kham sharing bad katei ka longkmie ka la hiar ban kah da u maw khnang ba katei ka kali kan nym tyllun, hynrei namar barit palat u maw, katei ka kali ka la sdang tyllun bad u lok ruh u la hiar ban wad da uba khamheh. Ha kaba por ba ki dang don ha khmat katei ka kali ban kad maw ia ki shaka jong ka, katei ka kali ka la tyllun kynsan bad tynrah ia ki baroh ar ngut.Katei ka longkmie ka la mynsaw jur bad la kit mar mar ia ka sha Hospital hynrei tang shipor ka la khlad noh.
title: Ba tyllun ka kali ba  pynieng ha phyllaw Khlad ka longkmie armet

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:Ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 1:45 mynstep, ki la don 5 ngut ki khynnah kiba la shah kem na ka daw ba ki la tuh ia ki suloi jong ki pulit Home Guard na Guard House kaba don ha MeCOFED Marketing Board, Mawiong. Kitei ki khynnah ki la tuh ia kawei ka .303 rifle bad 40 tylli ki kuli jong katei ka rifle. La aiti ia ki sha ka Juvenile Justice Board.
title: Shah kem ki khynnah ba tuh suloi pulit

content: Nongpoh, 28 Naitung:Shisngi hadien ba ki pulit ka Nongbah Shillong, ki la ioh ban kurup haduh 39 tylli ki Petrol bom na kawei ka khlaw na ki thain Mawtawar, Thabalieh, mynta pat ki Pulit ka Nongpoh Police Station, ki la ioh ban kurup haduh 50 tylli ei ei ki Petrol bom na kawei ka Lawbniap kaba don harud jong ka surokbah NH-6 kaba hap hapoh ka shnong Umryngksai shwa ban poi Pahamrioh, Ri Bhoi District.Kane ka jingioh kurup Petrol bom ki Pulit ka Nongpoh PS, ka la jia mynta ka janmiet ha ka por 7:30 ei ei, ha kaba ki Pulit ka Nongpoh PS hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip na ki riew paidbah halor ka jingdon jong ki Petrol bom ha katei ka jaka, kumta ki la hiar mar mar ban leit shim noh ia kitei ki Petrol bom.Ia kine ki Petrol bom ia kaba la ioh ban kurup da ki Pulit ka Nongpoh PS, la suba ba ki dei kiba la buhrieh kham slem da ki runar, namar ki don napdeng kitei ki Petrol bom kiba la sop sahpailen bad don ruh kiba la lut ka Petrol.Hadien kane ka jingioh kurup, ki Pulit ka Nongpoh PS ki la rah noh sha thanad na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit.
title: 50 tylli ioh kurup Petrol bom  ki pulit, ha jan Pahamrioh

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:Kum kiba la buddien ia ka MHIS Phase -1 bad Phase -II, bad mynta ka Phase -III, ka Dorbar Ki Khlieh Nongsynshar Ka Ri Hynniewtrep, ka kyntu jur ia ki Dorbar Shnong, Dorbar Raid, ki Dorbar Kur, bad ki paidbah ba kin shim khia ban pynrung ia ka kyrteng da kaba siew tyngka 50, lane ban pynthymmai ia ka kyrteng hapoh ka Scheme MHIS-III (Meghalaya Health Insurance Scheme) kaba dei ka Card jingiada na ka bynta baroh ki long iing na ka bynta shi snem, ha kaba iadei bad ka koit ka khiah, kane ka scheme ka long ka jingkyrkhu bad ka lad jingiada ia baroh namar ka long “universal” baroh ki paidbah ki lah ban ioh ia katei ka jingiada kaba haduh tyngka 2,80,000 bad ia ki riew tymmen ka long sa tyngka 30,000 na ka bynta ki longiing.Katei ka MHIS Card lah ban pyndonkam bad jied ia ka Hospital kaba ki kwah ban leit phah sumar katkum ka kyrteng hospital private bad Sorkar kaba la buh hapoh jylla Meghalaya bad shabar jylla.Ka Dorbar Ki Khlieh Nongsynshar ka kyntu jur ia baroh ki balang ki seng niam ban shim khia halor ka MHIS -III. “Ngi kyntu jur ia baroh ki 3363 KUR (katkum ka census 1980) bad khamtam ia ki nongmihkhmat KUR ba kin sngewbha ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban wad bad ban pynrung ia la ki para kur hapoh katei ka jingpynrung kyrteng kaba lai ka MHIS -III” ong ka khubor bad la ong shuh shuh, ba lada don ki bym sngewthuh ia katei ka scheme kin sngewbha ban pyntip phone ha u numbor 9436102663 ban ioh ai jingshai halor katei ka scheme.
title: Kyntu ia ki Dorbar ban pynrung MHIS -III

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:Wat la ka KHNAM, ka pynpaw ba kan long kaba bha, lada ki seng riewlum ha ka jylla kin iatreilang, hynrei ka la ap pat ban ioh ia ka kyrwoh na ka UDP kaba dei ka seng kaba la prat lynti ia kane ka jingthmu.Ha ka jingiakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u President ka KHNAM u Bah Pyndapbor Sairbon ula ong ba u la ioh pdiang ia ka phun shisien na ka UDP ban iakren halor kane ka jingiatreilang jong ki seng riewlum hynrei ka la shu jah noh kumto khlem ioh khubor eiei shuh.“Nga la ioh iakren da ka phun shisien kham mynshwa na ka UDP bad tang kata hi kam don shuh kano kano ka jingiakren”, la ong u Bah Pyndap.U la ong ba ka KHNAM ka dang ap ban ioh ia ka jingkhot na ka UDP halor kane ka kam, namar ba ka kwah ban don ka jingiatreilang jong ki seng riewlum.Kham mynshwa, ka UDP ka la thung ia u general secretary u Dr Jemino Mawtoh ban khroh lang ia ka KHNAM ha ka jing iateh paralok, jong baroh ki seng riewlum ha kane ka jylla.Ka jingialang ka Special Committee ka UDP ka la rai ban iawer lang ia ka KHNAM kawei na ki seng riewlum ban iadon lang ha ka kynhun synrop ne alliance shwa ban leit sha ka elekshon ha kane ka jylla.U Dr Mawthoh u la ong ba ka UDP kam kwah ban long khim jingmut bad ka kwah ba baroh ki seng riewlum kiba don ha kane ka jylla kin don lang ha kajuh ka rynsan na ka bynta kajuh ka kam bad ka jingthmu ia ka jaitbynriew.Hynrei na ka bynta ka People Democratic Front (PDF) ym pat don ka jingiakren ia mynta namar ba ka long kaba dang thymmai.Lah ban kdew ba ka UDP ka la iatreilang bad ka HSPDP ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hills bad ka Garo National Council (GNC) ha Garo Hills ha kane ka elekshon MLA ban wan.
title: Bha lada iatreilang baroh ki seng  riewlum, ong u President KHNAM

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:U Chief Justice ka Meghalaya High Court, U Justice Dinesh Maheshwari, ula ong ba ka don ka jingbhabriew kaba khraw ha Meghalaya, namar ba ka don ka jingbishar, kaba don naduh hyndai hynthai, kaba la wan rah ia ka jing phylla kaba khraw halor ka bishar khadar ha kane ka Jylla bad u kren iaroh ruh ba ki don ki kashari shnong, ki kashari district council, kiba don lang ha ryngkat bad ki kashari jong ka sorkar, kiba trei ia ki kam bapher jongki.Ka don kawei ka nongbah, ha ka Ri India baroh kawei bad katei ka dei ka Shillong, ha kaba ka kyrteng jongka, ka don ha ka Section 1 jong ka Code of Criminal Procedure, ha kaba ka code kam trei kam satia ha ki katto katne ki jaka bad kumjuh wat ka CrPC, kam trei kam lut ha baroh ki bynta jong ka Meghalaya, namar ba ka don ka Sixth Schedule.U Chief Justice, u kren ha ka jingialang ban plie ia ka jingialang, kaba 40 kynta ha ka kamra jong ka High Court, ha kaba ki nongbishar jong ka Jylla, kin shim bynta ban sngewthuh ia ki phang bapher, ha kaba bishar ia ki mukotduma ha ka Jylla hi baroh kawei.U Chief Justice, u ong shuh shuh, ba ialade ruh, ula shim bynta ha katei ka jing ia thir nia jong ka 40 kynta, ha ka por ba u dang long u nongbishar jong ka Rajasthan High Court, ha u snem 2011 bad u ong ba kane ka prokram, ka long kaba iarap ban iakren ia ki sap ban pynbeit ia ki jing ia pher jingmut.Katei ka jingshah hikai, ka dei kaba la pynlong da ka High Court Mediation Committee, High Court jong ka Meghalaya, ha ryngkat bad ka Meghalaya State Legal Services bad ba la pyniaid da ka Mediation and Conciliation and Project Committee(MCPC), Supreme Court of India, ha kaba ki don saw ngut ki nonghikai, kiba kynthup ia U Arun Kumar Arya, U Manmohan Sharma, ka Reeta Kohli bad U Dr Gopal Arora na Delhi bad Punjab, kiba dei ki riew shemphang bad ki nong ai jinghikai.Katei ka jinghikai kan dei ha ka 28 haduh ka 30tarik Naitung 2017 bad nangta ha ka 18 haduh 20tarik Nailar 2017.
title: Ki ain CrPC, kim trei kam lut ha  Meghalaya, na ka 6th Schedule: CJ

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:Ka Raid Nongkhlieng, ka la khang ban die ia ka jaka Ri raid hapoh jong ka khyndew ka Raid Nongkhlieng. La buh jingmaham ruh ba kino kino ki briew kiba die ia ka jaka Ri Raid ha ka khyndew ka Raid Nongkhlieng kin hap hapoh ka jingpynshitom kat kum ki kyndon bad ka Raid jong ka Dorbar pyllun. Kumta la kuntu ia kiba nabar Raid kim dei ban ngeit biej ban thied jaka ha ka khyndew jong ka Ri Raid Nongkhlieng. Ka jingiadie iathied barieh ia ka khyndew Ri Raid na ka liang ka Ophis jong ka Raid kam don ka jingkit khlieh.La ong shuh shuh ba u Sordar jong ka Raid Nongkhlieng u la dep phah ia ka jingthoh ban pyntip sha ka ophis u syiem Khyrim, ka ophhis ka District Council (KHADC) bad ka ophis u DC East Khasi Hills District ym lah shuh ban register ia ka khyndew jong ka Ri Raid khlem ka jing mynjur na u sordar, ong ka kyrwoh khubor ba la pyllait da u bah Phonis Khongstid Sordar Raid Nongkhlieng Khyrim Syiemship.
title: Khang ban die jaka ri Raid Nongkhlieng

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:U President ka Indian National Trade Union Congress (INTUC) u la kynnoh ba ka sorkar NDA ba ialam da u Narendra Modi ba kam khein snep ia ki nongbylla ha ka ri.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor, u Dinesh Sharma u la ong ba da ki spah ngut ki nongbylla, ki nongrep bad ki briew kiba duk ki la pyniap hi, namar ba ka sorkar pdeng kam salia ia ka jingeh jongki.U la kynnoh ruh ba ka sorkar pdeng ka siew 27000 klur sha ki nongrep ha ka ri, hadien ba la shah thalain da ki paidbah.U la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban siew buria T.10 lak ia ki nongbylla kiba pang bad dei ruh ban rejister ia baroh ki nongbylla ha ka ophis u Labour Commissioner.U la ther ia ka sorkar NDA halor ka jingbym iarap eiei ia ki briew ba shah ktah ha ka jingshlei um ha Assam. Katba u General Secretary ka Union, u Mehboob Hussain u la ong ba kin trei ban pynkhlain ia ka Congress ha ka ri khnang ba kan wan biang ha ka bor ha u snem 2019.Kane ka kynhun kaba wan jngoh sha kane ka thain kan leit iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka Congress ha kane ka thain.
title: Kynthah U President ka INTUC ia u Modi

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:Ki shipai BSF, ki la ioh kurup ia 53 tylli ki masi, kiba shongdor T.10lak, ha shwa ban die tuh sha Bangladesh, na ki bynta jong ka Nayabazar/Lyngkhat, ong ka kyrwoh ba la phah da katei ki shipai khappud.
title: Kurup masi 53 tylli

content: Nongstoiñ, 28 Naitung:Hadien shi bnai tam ba la pynwai noh ia ka seng samla jong ka HSPDP Nongstoiñ Area Unit, mynta ka sngi, kitei ki nongialam, ki la shim ia ka rai ban nym ai jingkyrshan shuh ia ka seng HSPDP, na ka bynta ka election MLA ka ban sa long shen.Haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u Samla K. Marngar Joint Secretary ka HSPDP Youth Wing, ba la shah pynduh noh u la ong ba nalor ka jingleh donbor jong ki nongialam ka HSPDP, sa kawei pat ka daw ba ka Youth Wing kam kwah shu ban kyrshan ia ka seng HSPDP ha ka jingialam jong u MLA ba mynta ka long ba haba kum ki samla ki peit ia ka rukom trei kam ha ka por ba u Maieit Hoping bam kwai ha duwar u Blei ka la ia pher bak ly bak bad kane ka rukom pyniaid kam ki nongialam ba mynta bad kumba paw ka don sa tang ka jingbeh seng hynrei kam don pat ban pynrung seng.Shuh shuh u samla K. Marngar um shym pat la kren shai ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthmu ban leit pyniasoh bad ai jingkyrshan noh ia kiwei pat ki seng, khamtam ha kane ka election ka ban wan namar kum ki samla kin hap ban da ia shong pyrkhat bha shwa da baroh ki samla jong ka kynhun samla, hapoh ka Konstitwensi hi baroh ka wei.Wat la kitei ki Samla jong ka HSPDP Youth Wing kiba la shah pynwai kim shym pat la kren shai ei ei ruh em ba shano kin leit ban pyniasoh lane iano kin leit ai jingkyrshan ha ka election 2018, hynrei katkum ka tyllong khubor ba la ioh lum da u nongthoh khubor la sngewthuh ruh ba kitei ki samla hadien ba ki la kyntait noh ban kyrshan ia ka HSPDP ki lah ruh ban leit pyniasoh noh bad ka PDF kaba dei kawei na ki seng sain pyrthei kaba dang thymmai bad ka tyllong khubor ka ong ruh ba kitei ki samla ki lah ruh ban leit ai jingkyrshan ia u kyrtong katei ka seng, ha kane ka election ka ban sa long shen.
title: Ki samla HSPDP, kin iasoh PDF  Ha Nongstoiñ

content: Nongstoiñ, 28 Naitung:Mynta ka step jong ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew ha ka por kumba 8:30 AM, ka la don kawei ka jingjia aksiden kali ha ka wei na ki jaka kaba dang hap hapoh ka shnong Umjei West Khasi Hills ha ka surok bah NH44E Nongstoin – Shillong.Ha katei ka jingjia u wei u heprit u ba dang 9 snem, na shnong Umjei u ba la tip kyrteng ruh kum u Evanjohn Nonglait u la khlad noh ha shen hadien ba ka wei ka kali kamai (local taxi) kaba don ia u No ML- 05H0631 ka la kum leit tynrah noh ia u tei u hep rit.Katkum ka tyllong khubor ba la ioh lum da u nongthoh khubor la ong ba katei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih ka la jia katba u tei u heprit u dang thmu ban mareh sha shiliang jong katei ka surok bah hynrei ha katei ka por kynsan kynsan katei ka taxi kamai, ka la wan poi bad kala ioh ban tynrah noh ia u tei u hep rit haduh ba un da khlad noh ha shen.Ka tyllong khubor ka iathuh ruh ba ia katei ka taxi kamai la niah da u bah Thwindingles Nongrum 36 snem u ba dang wan na ki thain Kynshi, ha ryngkat ka jingthmu ban hiar sha Nongstoiñ.
title: Khlad u hep rit ha shen,  ba tynrah ka Taksi

content: Jowai, 29 Naitung:Ki Pulit ka West Jaintia Hills kiba don ha Muktapur hynnin ka sngi Saitjain ki la ioh ban kurup 5 tylli ki masi kiba la thmu ban shalan tuh sha Bangladesh. Kitei ki san tylli ki masi la pynshong dor da ki pulit bad Custom haduh 1 lak tyngka.Katkum ka khubor pulit, la iathuh ba hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip ba ki don ki briew kiba thmu ban wan shallan tuh ia ki masi sha Bangladesh lyngba ka Muktapur, ki la pynlong ia ka jingpahara bad ynda ki la poi ha Pdeinshakap, ki la iohi ba ki don ar ngut ki briew kiba dang beh ia kitei ki masi.Kitei ki arngut kiba dei ki nongkhaii tuh ia ki masi, mar syniohi ia ki pulit ki la phet krah noh sha khlaw bad ieh ia ki masi ha surok. Ki pulit ki la kurup noh ia kitei ki masi bad la aiti ia ki sha ka tnad Custom ha Dawki.
title: Naba thmu shalan tuh,  kurup ki pulit 5 ki masi

content: Shillong,30 Naitung:Ha ka step sngi saitjaiñ ha ka por 7:30 baje eiei kawei ka kali Wagon R kaba don ia u nombar ML-05G 0051 ka la tynrah ia saw ngut ki briew ha Nongthymmai, ia katei ka kali la niah da u Nilakshi Thakur na Lumiablot, Nongthymmai. Ha katei ka jingjia kawei ka longkmie kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Ralbinoda Ramsiej, 38 snem karta na ka shnong Nongthymmai ka la iap hashen katba kiba mynsaw pat ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum ka Bijola Suiam-56 snem, ka Rebina Suiam-36 snem baroh 2 ngut na Nongthymmai Khyriem bad u Albert Kharbuli-19 snem na Mawlai Nongkwar, kitei baroh 3 ngut ki don hapoh Hospital.Katei ka jingjia aksiden ka dei kaba la jia ha National High Way (NH -44) , katei ka kali ka wan na Nongthymmai ban leit sha Jingkieng hynrei ha mar ba poi ha United Bank of India hajan Vespa Show room u nongniah um lah shuh ban teh lakam ia katei ka kali bad ka la tynrah beit beti sha kitei ki 4 ngut. Ki pulit ki la kem ia utei u nongniah bad la rejistar case ia u, ia katei ka kali la kurup noh da ki pulit. Ha katei ka jingjia kitei ki 4 ngut ki dang iaid ha lynti iaid kjat hynrei kynsan kynsan katei ka kali ka la tynrah ia ki bad ka met ka la poi shaduh sha ingsah jong ka Wansila Kharkongor, ki kynroh nar, ki kali kiba don marjan ki la julor ha katei ka jingjia.
title: Tynrah kali ha Nong- thymmai, Iap 1 mynsaw 3

content: Shillong, 30 Naitung:Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council ( HYC) ka la khot ia tai nia ia ki MLA ka Liang synshar ha Khasi National Dorbar Hall halor ki 14 tylli ki mat kiba ka dawa kynthup ka Inner Line Permit ( ILP) hynrei kitei ki MLA kim shym la wan satia sha ka jingiatai. Kumta katei ka seng ka la pynbna ba kan pynlong ia ka jingiakhih kaba khlem pud ha ki konstitwensi jong ki MLA ka seng Congress bad ia katei ka jingiakhih yn tip kum ka mishon ‘ïeng iada ia ka bri u Hynniewtrep’. Ka HYC ka la ong ruh ba kan sdang noh ban pyntreikam ia ka ILP ha baroh 6 tylli ki District ka Ri-Lum Khasi -Jaintia ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki dorbar shnong. Ia katei ka rai, ki nongialam ka HYC ki la pynbna mynta ka sngi ha Khasi National Dorbar Hall.U President rangbah katei ka seng u bah Peter J Lawai u la ong ba katei ka mishon ban ieng iada ia ka bri u hynniewtrep na ka jingwan tur kyrthep ki mynder ri ka dei ka mishon jong u paidbah ia u paidbah. U bah Peter u la ong ba ia katei ka mishon yn lam khmat da ki dkhot ka HYC ha kylleng ki Circle bad Unit ha ki konstitwensi ki MLA Congress ha Ri Khasi bad Jaintia.“Ngi la aiti ha ka Organising Committee jong ka CEC ban leh ia kaba donkam nalor ka jingpynlong jingialang paidbah ha kylleng ki district” u la ong. U la byrngem ruh ba katei ka seng kan sa shim ia ki rai jong ka lada ka sorkar kam kren eiei ia kitei ki mat jong ka ha ka dorbar ka ban long ha u bnai nailur. “Kan pynbor ia ngi ban pynlong ia ki jingiakhih ba kyndit pyrshah ia ki myntri sorkar bad ki MLA liang synshar ha ka por ba ki pynlong kano kano ka jingialang paidbah” u la ong.Lah ban kdew ba ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la dep ka HYC ka la dep pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah, ka jingrah lama iong, ka jingshong kyraiñ, tar dur myntri sorkar, halor kitei ki 14 mat ba ki dawa. Lah ruh ban kdew ba ki don haduh 16 tylli ki konstitwensi ba mihkhmat ka Congress ha ri Lum Khasi bad Jaintia.
title: Da ka mishon iada ia ka Bri  Hynniewtrep, thaw ka HYC

content: Shillong, 30 Naitung:Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la ong ba kan sa shong jingialang noh shen bad ka Hills State People Democratic Party (HSPDP) ban shim rai ban leit khot lang ia ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM), ha ka kynhun ban iakhun ha kane ka elekshon ban wan ha ka jylla.Haba iakren bad u General secretary ka UDP u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la kubur ba ka la don teng ka jingiakren lyngba ka phun bad ki nongialam ka KHNAM kham mynshwa tangba kam pat phah da ka jingthoh ban don ka jingiakynduh.Katkum ka jingong, u Dr Mawthoh, ka jingpynslem ka dei namar ba ka UDP ka hap ban iashong jingialang shwa bad ka HSPDP kum ki paralok ba la dep iateh ban iatreilang ha kane ka elekshon. “Ngin sa shong jingialang noh bad ka HSPDP bad ngin sa soi lang baroh ar party ban khot ia ka KHNAM sha ka jingiakren ban don lang ha kajuh ka rynsan shwa ban leit sha ka elekshon”, la ong u Dr Mawthoh.U Dr Mawthoh u la ong ba ka Coordination Committee jong kine ki ar tylli ki party ki la don ka jingkwah ban iadon lang kumba kwah u paidbah ha kawei ka shatri ki seng riewlum ha ka jylla.“Lada u paidbah u kwah ia kajngkylla, ngi kum ki nongialam dei ban burom ia ka sur ia ki paidbah”, u la ong.Hynrei ha ka liang, ka KHNAM ha ka jingialang hynnin ka sngi, ka la kyntai ban don lang ha ka rynsan bad ka UDP-HSPDP da kaba ai daw ba ki la dep pynbna kyrtong lut ha baroh ki jaka ha Khasi bad Jaintia. Katkum ka jingong u general secretary ka KHNAM u Bah Batkupar Wahlang, kumno ka jingiatreilang ka lah ban long haba baroh ki la dep pynbna ia ki kyrtong ha baroh konstitwensi.“Kumno ngin pdiang ia ka jingkhot iatreilang ka UDP haba ma ki bad ka HSPDP, ki la dep pynbna ia ki kyrtong”, u la ong bad bynrap, ba ka eh than ia ka KHNAM ba kan pdiang wat lada kin khot sha ka jingiakren ban iatreilang.Hynnin ka sngi ruh ka KHNAM, ka la pynbna ia u Dr Moses uban long u kyrtong ka party na Mawryngkneng uban iakhun ha kane ka elekson MLA ban wan. Ka party ka la iaid shaid shaid ruh ban pyniakhun na Mawlai, na North Shillong bad na ki katto katne ki jaka kum na Mawhati ruh.Kham mynshwa, ka UDP bad ka HSPDP ki la iabynta ban iakhun ha ki konsitwensi ba hap ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hills. Ka UDP ka ioh 17 tylli katba ka HSPDP ka ioh 10 tylli bad 9 tylli kin don ka jingiakhun paralok.
title: Yn rai lang ka UDP, HSPDP  ban khot lang ia ka KHNAM

content: Shillong, 30 Naitung:Ka jing ia kynduh ki riew Rangbah ka shnong Shella kaba la long ha ka 24tarik Naitung 2017, ka la pynrem jur ia U Acting Wahadadar barim jong ka Shella Confederacy Shella, U Wallamphrang Lyngdoh Mawphlang halor ki kam thombor bad ia ka jingthmu jong u ban pynduh pyndam iaki riti dustur ka shnong Shella, kiba la don naduh mynshuwa, da kaba sospon, ia ka Dorbar shnong Shella baroh kawei, ia ki nongkitkam jong ka bad ia u Secretary ka dorbar ha ka 28tarik Nailur 2012, ha kaba u la thung bad thaw bujli ia ka Acting Dorbar bad ia u Acting Secretary u Shri B.Ora jong ka shnong Shella bad ia ki nongkitkam bad la kynnoh, ba kane ka long ka jingpynkhein bad jingpynduh pyndam ia ki riti dustur jong ka shnong Shella da utei u Acting Wahadadar barim.Ka iingbishar (kashari) badon burom, kat kum ka hukum kaba 27tarik Lber 2017, ka la pynksan ia U Secretary ka Dorbar shnong Shella, u Tobias Tiewdop bad ha katei kajuh ka hukum, ka kashari ka la pynneh pynsah, ia ki riti dustur jong ka shnong Shella kiba la ju don naduh hyndai hynthai (mynshuwa) kiba la la buh la thaw ki longshuwa ki manshuwa jong ka shnong Shella.Namarkata kane ka jingialang, ha ka 24tarik Naitung 2017, ka la iahap mynjur bad ia mynjur lang baroh ha katei ka Committee, ka la kyntu bad aibor ia U Tobias Tiewdop ban khot noh ia ka Dorbar shnong Shella, na ka bynta ban shong pyrkhat ban pynthymmai bad jied thymmai noh iaki nongkitkam ka Dorbar shnong Shella katkum ki riti dustur jong ka shnong Shella kiba la ju don naduh hyndai hynthai, ong ka kyrwoh na U Bah Dondor Sarubai, President ka Komiti.
title: Thombor U Wahadadar  barim, ong ka Dorbar Shella

content: Shillong, 30 Naitung:“Balei ka elekshon 2018, ka dang pjah sam sam haduh ha kine ki sngi” katei ka dei ka jingkylli, kaba mih ha u paidlang jong ka Ri Khasi Jaintia; haba ha ki sien ialeh elekshon ba ladep, ka ju don ka jing shongshit jong ki paidbah nongthep vote, naduh shi snem tam ne duna shwa ka elekshon.Na ka bynta ka elekshon 2013, ka lyer elekshon ha kylleng ka Jylla, kumjuh ha Jaintia Hills, ka la sdang shongshit naduh u snem 2012, ha kaba la iohsngew ia ki jingialang ba pynlong ha kylleng ki Constituency, ki jing iarap pisa, ki jingiarap ia kiba pang ba shitom, ki jingtih madan bad kumta ter ter bad katei kam shym la pher satia, hynrei ka jia hi kumta, ha shwa ka elekshon 2008 ruh.U Rupang, ula pyrshan ban wad jingtip bad uwei na ki riew rangbah na Jaintia Hills, u ban ialeh ia kane ka elekshon 2018, u Ma Balious Swer, ula ong “Ki paidbah, ki dang shong pyrkhat jylliew jingmut ha kine ki sngi. Wat ki kandidet ruh, kim nud ban rai, la kin dang ialeh ne em, na ka seng, kaba ki don bad mynta ki dang shong pyrkhat, shaei ba kin leit ha ka elekshon ka ban wan”. U nongthoh ula kylli biang na utei u rangbah, ioh lehse, ka dei na ka daw jong ka jingkhang dewiong, kaba pyn dait thah ia ka elekshon ha Jaintia Hills, utei u rangbah, ula ong “Sha ngi, yn nai iakren shuh, ki dukan die dawai, kiba ju die mynshwa T.10-15,000 shi sngi, mynta ki die tang T.500 lane T.1,000” ula ong biang.U bah Starfing Pdahkasiej, uba dei u trai jong ka SP News Agency, u ong ba ka daw, kaba nyngkong, ka long ba ki nongialeh elekshon kim don pisa, ha kaba u ong ba baroh shi katta, ka pisa elekshon, ka dei hi ka pisa dewiong, ha kaba 60 percent, ki nongialeh elekshon, dei ki heh spah, kiba mih na ka kam khaii dewiong. Sa kawei pat ka phang, u ong ba ka jingwan ka sorkar BJP ha Delhi, ka pyn pyrkhat ia kiba bun ki briew bad ula ong shuh shuh “Ha ki sien kiba mynshwa, lada ka Congress ka wan ha Delhi, kumta ka lah kylla lypa, kumta mynta ruh, haba ka BJP ka wan ha Delhi, kumta ki Jylla ba shatei jong ka dong shatei lam Mihngi, ka la kylla lut sha katei ka seng”. U bah Pdahkasiej, u ong shuh shuh, ba ki briew mynta, ki la sdang sngewthuh ruh ia ki hok jongki ha ka sain hima sima bad mynta ka mih sa kawei ka jingeh, ka long ba ka sorkar Jylla, kam lah shuh ban teh lakam, ha ka ioh kam ioh jam ia ki kontraktor, namar ba ka sorkar India, ka la iaid da ka e tendering bad haduh mynta, ki don 12, 13 tylli ki tnat sorkar, kiba la iaid sha e tendering ha ka Jylla.U Bah SS Syiem, uwei na ki nongthoh khubor, ba la rangbah bha, ula ong ba ki paidbah, ha kine ki sngi, ki don ha ka jing kulmar jingmut bad u ong shuh shuh “Kam dei tang ki paidbah, wat ki kandidet ruh ki kulmar jingmut, la kin ialeh na kaei ka seng ha ka elekshon 2018”.U Bah Syiem, u la ong ba ki dak ki shin, kin kham shai haduh U Nohprah 2017. Kiwei pat ki daw, kiba la pyni da utei u rangbah, ki long ba ka jingwan jong ka ain Goods and Service Tax (GST), ka dei sa kawei pat ka phang, kaba pynkulmar jingmut shuh shuh ia ki paidbah bad la pynkut da utei u rangbah, ha kaba u ong “Ia mynta hi ka Congress, UDP, kim don pisa satia, lait noh tang ka BJP”.
title: Balei ka elekshon 2018, ka  dang kynjah slam slam?

content: Nongstoiñ, 31 Naitung:Ka shnong New Nongstoiñ ka dei kawei na ki shnong hapoh ka Nongstoiñ Konstitwensi kaba la ioh lang ia ka jingmyntoi lyngba ka skhim MDC, bad katei ka shnong mynta ka kynti ka la ioh ia ka jingmyntoi lyngba katei ka skhim kaba la kot shaduh ka T. 21 lak 30 hajar.U MDC ka Nongstoiñ, u la dep ruh ban leit sam ia ki jingtrei sha ki skul, ki dong, ki balang bapher bapher bad kiwei kiwei kiba don ha katei ka shnong naduh kine ki bnai bala dep bad dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la lah na ka liang jong u tei u MDC u la ioh ruh ban leit sam ia ka jingtrei kaba T.2 lak ia ka Nongstoiñ Public Sec School, khang ba katei ka skul kan ioh ban pyndap ia ki jingduna kiba dang donkam.Ha katei ka jingleit sam jingtrei, nalor u MDC la iadon lang ruh u Paiem R.K. Syiem u Syiem Khynnah jong ka Hima Nongstoiñ u ba dei ruh u Chairman jong ka Managing Committee jong ka skul, ki dkhot jong ka Committee, ki nonghikai skul baroh bad kiwei kiwei.Shuh shuh hadien nangtei u MDC u la hiar sa sha ka dong Mawpun Tieh Jyrsieh New Nongstoiñ na ka bynta ban sam ia ka jingtrei kaba T.2 lak ia katei ka dong na ka bynta ban shna ia ki lynti iaid kjat.U bah LG u la leit ruh ban sam ia ki jingtrei sha ka ophis jong ka Nondeiñ Presbyterian T.2 lak bad kumjuh ia ka Balang Presbyterian Nondeiñ T.1 lak 50 hajar.
title: T.21 lak 30 hajar, ioh ka New  Nongstoiñ, na ka skhim MDC

content: Shillong, 31 Naitung:U sordar barim ka Raid Mawshun u bah James Joy Khongmawloh, u la dawa ia ka District Council ba kan pynlong biang da kawei pat ka elekshon ha katei ka Raid bad u la byrngem ruh ban kiew ïng lieh ïng saw lada ym pynlong biang ia ka elekshon ha kaba u la kynnoh ba ka don shibun ka jingiaid lait ia ki kyndon bad ka jingpynkheiñ aiñ ha ka elekshon kaba la dep ban pynlong dang shen. Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor mynta ka sngi, u bah Joy ula ong ba u chairman ka Election Committee u bah Hilarious Pyngrope u la pynkheiñ ia ka KHAD Administration and Election of Sordar of Saw Raid, Khyrim Syiemship Act 1997 ha ka por ba pynlong ia katei ka elekshon ha ka 5 tarik u naitung.U bah Khongmawloh uba bat teng ia ka kam sordar la 13 snem ha katei ka Raid u dei uwei na ki kyrtong kiba la iakhun ha katei ka elekshon bad kiwei pat ki kyrtong nalor jong u ki long u Lamiki Khongdkhar bad u bah Dapkupar Tariang. Ia katei ka elekshon la pynlong ha Pomshutia da ka jingthep vote bad ia ka resol la pynbna ha katei ka juh hi ka sngi ha kaba la pynbna ba u ba Lamiki u dei u nongjop. U bah Khongmawloh u la ong ba ka la don ka jingleh shilliang khmat jong u Chairman ka Election Committee kumno ban pynjop jubor ia u bah Lamiki ha katei ka elekshon. U la kynnoh ruh ba ka dawbah ba ka mih ka jingiaknieh sordar ha katei ka Raid ka dei namar ba ka don ka pisa ba ka sorkar ka mang na bynta ka Raid ha ka jingpynheh surok naduh Umshyrpi sha Tamabil.U Counting Agent jong u bah Khongmawloh u bah Junestwelve Syngkrem u la ong ba u Chairman um shym la lah ban pynshisha ia ka jingjah rngai ki 30 tylli ki vote na ki 463 tylli na Lapalang Polling Station. U la ong ba haba la kylli ia ka slip ki nongthep vote u Chairman u ong ba u la bret bad haba la phah pyni ia ka jaka ba u la bret um shym treh satia, ong u bah Junes. Shuh shuh ki la kynnoh ba u bah Lamiki uba dei ruh u Rangbah Shnong ka Mawshun u la pynioh thep vote jubor ia ki khynnah rit ruh kiba ym pat kot ka rta ban thep vote ha ka elekshon bad kitei ki khynnah rit ki don kumba 195 ngut eiei na ka shnong Mawshun bad katei u la ong ba ka dei ka jingpynkheiñ aiñ naba ka aiñ ka la kdew shai ba tang kiba la kot sha ka 18 snem karta kiba lah ban thep vote. U la pyni ruh ia kawei ka sertiphiket sngi kha jong uwei na ki nongthep vote bad ha katei ka sertiphiket la pyni ba la kha ha u snem 2000 hynrei utei u la ioh thep vote elekshon sordar. U la kynnoh ruh ba ki la don haduh 7 ngut ki bym dei na ka Raid Mawshun kiba la wan thep vote.Halor kitei kiba bun ki jingkynnoh u bah Junes u la ong ba la leit ban ujor sha ka District Council bad la siew ruh ia ka bai ujor kaba T.250 tyngka ( Dispute Fees) hynrei khlem da khot bishar eiei ruh em ka District Council ka la bthah ia u Syiem Khyrim ban ai sanad ia u bah Lamiki Dkhar. Sa shisien biang katei ka kynhun jong u bah Joy Khongmawloh ka la kyrpad ia ka KHADC ba kan pyrkhat biang ia katei ka jingleh jong ka lym kumta ki la ong ba kan pynbor ia ki ban kiew ing lieh ing saw ban ioh ban pynlong ia ka elekshon kaba khuid ba suba.
title: Dawa pynlong elekshon biang ha Raid  Mawshun, byrngem kiew Kashari

content: Shillong, 31 Naitung:Ha ka 25tarik Naitung 2017, ka Mandal jong ka seng BJP, ha 57-Dalu Constituency, ha kaba ki don 2hajar ngut ki dkhot, ki la pyniasoh sha ka seng NCP, ha kaba u don lang U Saleng A. Sangma, MLA, u ban sa pyniasoh shen ialade sha ka seng NCP lem bad U Torang R. Marak, President ka Nationalist Youth Congress (NYC) Garo Hills, Meghalaya.U President jong ka Mandal, U Utpal Marak lem bad 26ngut ki nongkitkam bad ha ryngkat jong kitei ki nongialam, ka President jong ka BJP Mahila Morcha, ka Shasiti Sarkar ha ryngkat bad 1,000 ngut ki dkhot, ki la pyniasoh sha ka NCP, ong ka khubor, ba la phah da U Vijay Raj Vice President jong ka Seng.
title: 3hajar ngut na ka BJP  sha ka NCP ha Dalu

content: Nongpoh, 31 Naitung:Ka jingdon jong ki trai dukan kiba mlien ban die ia ki jingbam kiba la palat por ha ki dukan jongki, da shisha ka wanrah jingma kaba khraw ia ki riew paidbah kiba leit ban thied bad bam ia kiba kum kitei ki jait jingbam bad ia kane la sakhi ruh hadien ba uwei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Pholin Lyngdoh na ka shnong Nongtyrlaw, u la ioh da u jingbam uba la jan phuh tit na kawei ka dukan die jingbam kaba la tip kum ka Meghalaya Bakery kaba don ha Nongpoh.Kat kum ka jingiathuh da utei u Rangbah, la ong ba ia utei u jingbam uba long kum ki kynja ‘Poratha’ la thied hynnin ka sngi u Blei na katei ka dukan kaba la dei trai da u bar jylla uba la tip kyrteng kum u M.D Hanif, ha kaba da ka jingkhuid mynsiem bad khlem da pyrkhat sniew ei ei, u la shu thied beit bad rah sha iing na ka bynta ban ai ia ki khun ki kti, hynrei ynda la poi ha iing ban ai ia ki khun la lap pynban ba utei u jingbam u la jan phuh tit bad um I long shuh ban bam.Ka long shisha kaei kaei kaba ngam lah ban mutdur, ba kumno ki trai dukan ki nud ban die wat ia kiba kum kine ki jait jingbam kiba la sniew bad ngim lah ban tip kaei ka ban jia lada ki paidbah ki kum bam ia kum kine ki jingbam ba la sniew, ha kaba ka jingshim kabu da kiba kum kine ki trai dukan kan wanrah jingma shikatdei eh ia ki paidbah.Namarkata, haba iadei bad ka jingdon jong kiba kum kine ki jait dukan kiba die ia ki jingbam ba la sniew, nga kyntu ia ki bor ba deipeit ba kin leh ia kaba donkam, khang ban tehlakam ia ka jingdon jong kiba kum kitei ki dukan kiba die ia ki jingbam ba la sniew bad khnang ban lait na kino kino ki jingjia kiba sngewsih.
title: U jingbam ba phuh tit,  die ka dukan ha Nongpoh

content: Shillong, 31 Naitung:Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council- CEC lyngba u Samla Roy Kupar Synrem, Education Secretary, CEC ka la leit buh ia ka dorkhas ha khmat u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU, Shillong mynta ka sngi, ban dawa na u ba dei ban ailad shwa ia ki trai ri trai muluk na ka Jaidbynriew Hynniewtrep bad Garo kiba lah biang ka kyrdan pule bad kiwei ki jingdonkam ban ioh ia ki kam hikai hapoh kane ka skul bah.Ka seng hadien ba ka la ioh jingtip ba kane ka skul bah ka lah khot aplikeshon, naduh u snem 2016 na ka bynta ki spah tylli ki kam Professor, Associate Professor bad Assistant Professor ha ki Department bapher bapher bad ruh ba yn sa khot interview na ka bynta kine ki kam ha kine ki sngi.Ka seng, ka lah phah ia kane ka jingthoh ha une u khlieh jong kane ka skul bah ban pynpaw ha u, ba ki trai ri, ki don ia ka hok ban ioh kam lada ki biang ia ka kyrdan pule, kat kum ka jingkwah jong kane ka skul bah. Ka seng ka pynpaw ruh ba ha kaba iadei bad ki kam Guest Lecturers ha ki Department kum ka Physics, Geography, Linguistics bad Journalism& Mass Communications, kiba lah khot applications ha kine ki taiew ba lahdep dei ban thung da ki Trai ri kiba lah ban hikai ia kitei ki sobjek ba lah kdew haneng.Ka seng ka pynkynmaw ruh ia u VC ba ia ka NEHU, la seng ne pynlong katkum ka ain jong ka Sorkar India, ha kaba ka jingthmu jong ka, ka long ban iarap ia ki Nongshongshnong ka thain Shatei lam mihngi ban ioh ia ka jinghikai ha ka liang ka jingnang jingstad kaba pura lem bad ki jingwad jingtip bad ruh ban iarap kyrpang ia kine ki Nongshongshnong ha ka liang ka imlang sahlang, ka ioh ka kot bad ka bha ka miat jong ki briew ka thain Lam mihngi.Ha kaba sdang u pud treikam jong ka NEHU, u long ha ki saw tylli ki Jylla, kiba kynthup ia ka Meghalaya, Nagaland, Arunachal Pradesh bad Mizoram. Hynrei kine ki lai tylli mynta ki lahdon ia la ki jong ki Skul bah kumta ka NEHU kam iadei ei ei shuh ha kine ki jylla. Ia mynta hi u pud treikam jong ka u dei tang ha ka jylla Meghalaya.Kumta ka seng ka khmih lynti ba kane ka Skul bah, kan ailad shwa ia ki Trai Ri trai muluk, kiba lah ban trei ia kitei ki kam khamtam ia ki kam hikai, ong ka kyrwoh na U Bah Roy Kupar Synrem, Education Secretary, HYC-CEC.
title: Thung kam hikai, da ki trai shnong  ha NEHU, dawa ka HYC na U VC

content: Shillong, 31 Naitung:U MLA uba long ruh u Parliamentary secretary ha kane ka sorkar MUA-II , u Limison Sangma u la kam ba ka Congress kan sa jop ym duna ia ka 15 ngut ha ka elekshon MLA ban wan tang na Garo Hills bad kata kan urlong namar ka jingialam ba tbit jong u Muklul Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah.Haba kren mynta ka sngi sha u nongthoh khubor,u Limison uba pynpaw ia ka jingkyrshan radbah ia u Mukul, u la ong ba ka daw kaba kongsan ba ka Congress kan pynliem kput ia ka NPP ha Garo Hills, ka dei namar ba ka iateh lok bad ka BJP.Katkum ka jingkam u Limison, ka NPP ha kane ka kynti kan sa jah kyrteng syndon ha Garo Hills namar ba ka la leit ban iatreilang bad ka BJP kaba dei ka seng kaba pyrshah bha ia ki Khristan bad kaba iakhun tyngeh ban khang bam doh masi nalor ka jingshah synshar ha ki kynhun shit niam kum ka RSS, Bajrang Dal bad ka VHP.“Ka jingpynduh pisa jong u Narendra Modi, ka jingiadon bynta bad ki kynhun shit niam kum ka RSS, Bajrang Dal bad ka VHP, kin dei ki daw ba ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya kin kyntait ia ka BJP bad kumjuh ia ka NPP”, la kam u Limison.U la kynnoh ruh ba ka sorkar NDA hapoh ka jingialam u Modi, ka shah pyniaid ha kine ki seng shit niam kum ka RSS, ka Bajrang Dal bad ka VHP ban thombor ia ki rit paid khamtam ia ki Khristan bad ia kum kane ym lah satia ban pdiang da ki paidbah kane ka jylla.“Ka NPP kan sa jah kyrteng ha Garo Hills namar ka jingiatreilang bad ka BJP namar ba ki paidbah ka jylla ki isih bad pyrshah jur ia ka BJP kaba thombor ia ki rit paid”, la ong u Limison bad u la bynrap, hapoh ka jingialam jong u Mukul Sangma ka NPP kan sa shah pynliem kput.U la kam ruh ba ka Congress kan sa thaw biang ia ka sorkar ha kane ka jylla hadien ka elekshon namar ba nalor ba kan ioh ym duna ia ka 15 ngut ki MLA na Garo Hills, kan sa ioh ruh bun ngut na Khasi bad Jaintia Hills.Ha kawei ka liang, u Limison u la iathuh ba u Dr Mukul un iakhun na ki ar tylli ki konstitwensi ha kane ka elekshon ban wan kata na Ampati kaba u mihkhmat mynta bad na Songsak ba la mihkhmat da u MLA ka NPP u Nihim D Shira.“U Dr Mukul un iakhun ar tylli ki konstitwensi, na Songsak bad na Ampati”, la ong u Limison.Katkum ka jingong u Limison, la thikna bha ba u Mukul un iakhun na kine ki konstitwensi ha kane ka elekshon ban wan bad ka lok jongu ruh, ka Dikkanchi Shira kan sa jop suk na Mahandraganj ha kane ka kynti ruh.
title: “Yn jop ka Congress 15-18 tylli  na Garo ha ka elekshon ban wan”

content: Nongpoh, 31 Naitung:Da ka jinghusiar halor ka jingiai jia ba khah ka jingprong ia ki iing ki sem, ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Umdihar, Ri Bhoi District, mynta ka step ha ka por 5 baje ei ei, ki la ioh ban kem ia u Bah David Lyngdoh Marshilong ia kaba la tip paidbah kum u ‘Bah Jyllud’ hynrei kane ka jingioh ban kem da ki paidbah ka shnong Umdihar ka la shu sepei, namar utei u Bah Jyllud u la lait phet noh na kti ki pulit, hadien ba ki paidbah ki la leit ban aiti noh sha ki pulit ka Nongpoh Police Station.Katkum ka khubor ia kaba la ioh ban lum da ki nongthohkhubor, la ong ba utei u Bah Jyllud, u la ioh ban phet na kti ki pulit ha ka por ba ki dang mut ban leh ia ka eksmin ha Emergency Ward ka Nongpoh Civil Hospital, namar ha katei ka por u Bah Jyllud u la lait phet lyngba ka jingkhang iit jong katei ka Hospital.La ioh jingtip ruh ba ki pulit tang mar ia tip ba u Bah Jyllud u la lait phet na katei ka Hospital, ki pulit ki la kthong mar mar, hynrei kat kat haduh ban da thoh ia kane ka khubor, kim pat la iohkem satia.Shuh shuh la ioh jingtip ruh, tang hadien ba u Bah Jyllud u la lait phet na katei ka Hospital, ki la don ki katto katne ki nongshong shnong ka thain Nongpoh kiba la iohi, hynrei kim poi pyrkhat pat ba un dei uta u Bah Jyllud.Haba iadei bad kane ka jinglait phet u Bah Jyllud, haba iakren bad u Bah C.L Lamare, Rangbah Shnong ka Umdihar, u la ong ba ki paidbah tang mar iatip halor katei ka jinglait phet u Bah Jyllud, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingbymshimkhia da ki pulit, namar kane ka jinglait phet jong utei u runar, ka la wanrah shisha ia ki paidbah ha ka jingbym shngain.
title: Syier mynsiem ki paidbah ba  laitphet u ‘Bah Jyllud’ na kti ki Pulit

content: Shillong, 02 Nailar:Ban pyntieng ia ki doktor ban wan trei sha ka jylla hadien ba la pyndep ia ka jingpule jongki, ka sorkar ka la pynkiew noh sha ka T. 30 lak ka jingiateh soskular bad kino kino ki samla kiba leit ban pule doktor na ka bhah ka sorkar jylla.Ia kane la pynkiew hadien ba bun bah ki samla kiba la leit ban pule na ka bhah ka sorkar jylla ynda ki la pyndep ia ka jingpule kim ju wan phai pat sha ka jylla ban shakri bad ki la leit ban trei sha kiwei ki jaka.Kham mynshwa ka sorkar ka la buh T.10 lak bad kham hadien ka la pynkiew sha ka T.25 lak bad mynta ka la rai ban pynkiew noh sha ka T.30 lak ka jingiateh bad kiba pule na ka bhah ka sorkar jylla.“Naduh ka kynhun (batch) pule doktor kaba thymmai, ka sorkar ka la pynkiew ia ka jingbuh kyndon ban siew lada kim wan shakri ia ka jylla sha ka T. 30 lak”, la ong ki heh ka tnad ka koit ka khiah.Katkum ka jingtip, la iathuh ba ki don da ki spah ngut ki samla na kane ka jylla kiba la leit ban pule na ka bhah ka sorkar jylla hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba hadien ba ki la pyndep ia ka jingpule, kim shymla wan phai shuh sha kane ka jylla bad don kiba shu siew suk ia kane ka kuna namar ba ka rit palat.Lah ban kdew ba ha ka iing dorbar dang shen, ka myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka Kong Roshan Warjri ka la iathuh ba bun ki samla ba leit pule doktor MBBS ba bei pisa ka sokar kim shym la wan phai shuh hadien ba la dep pule ban shakri ha ka jylla bad kim burom ia ka jutang iateh bad ka sorkar.Naduh u snem 2000 haduh u 2010-11, ki don haduh 197 ngut kiba la pyndep ia ka jingpule doktor MBBA na ka bhah sorkar bad kiba la dep iasoi bad ka sorkar ban shakri ia ka jylla ynda la dep pule hynrei kim khein snep satia ia ka jingiateh bad ka sorkar ha kaba kim shym la wan phai ne siew ia ka kuna ba la buh ka sorkar hynrei ki la shu jah klep ban iaid ha ka mon lajong.Katkum ka rekod ka sorkar, ha u snem 2000-01, ki don 14 ngut, 2001-02 ki don 10 ngut, 2002-03 ki don 6 ngut, 2003-04 ki don 9 ngut, 2004-05 ki don 11 ngut, 2005-06 ki don 12 ngut, 2006-07 ki don 13 ngut, 2007-08 ki don 16 ngut, 2008-09 ki don 24 ngut, 2009-10 ki don 31 ngut.Lehse kane ka jingleh hati sawkuna ki doktor ba la pule na ka bhah ka sorkar jylla, ka dei namar ba ka sorkar jylla kam don ki ain ba satar ban pynngat ia ki hadien ba la pyndep ia ka jingpule.Katba ki bym pat pyndep ia ka jingpule naduh u snem 2010-11 ki don 50 ngut, 2011-12 ki don 57 ngut, 2012-13 ki don 57 ngut, 2013-14 ki don 57 ngut, 2013-14 ki don 56 ngut, 2014-15 ki don 58 ngut, bad 2015-16 ki don 57 ngut.
title: Pynkiew ka sorkar  T.30 lak ka  kuna, ia ki doktor bym wan phai

content: Shillong, 02 Nailar:Ka jingjia aksiden kali ha jylla, ka la jur bha khamtam wat ha ka nongbah Shillong. Ban tip khambha ki daw, u nongthoh khubor ula ioh iakren bad u Superintendent of Police (Traffic) u Bah NK Syiem uba la iathuh bun ki daw kaba la pynlong ia ka jingjia aksiden.Ka jingdih kyiad por ba niah kali, ka jingleh sarong khlem da pynleit jingmut bha khamtam kiba dang samla rta, ka jingbym tip bha ia ki kyndon niah kali, nalor ka jinglong ka surok, ki dei ki daw ba kham kongsan ba u SP u la ong.“Bun ki samla kiba niah bad ki kali ar shaka ki kham ngat bha ha ka jingjia aksiden”, la ong u Bah Syiem bad bynrap ba ka jingsngew shlur ia ka bym dei ruh ka dei kawei ka daw kaba la wanrah pynban ia ka jingsngewsih ha ka kam niah kali.U SP u sngew ruh ba ka jingbun ki kali ka lah ban dei ka daw kaba la wanrah ia ka jingkhapngiah ki surok ha sor.Ula iathuh ba ka tnad pulit, ka la ju pynlong ia ka jingtes ia ki nongniah Kali man ka sngi Saitjain ban lap la ki dih kyiad ne em haba ki niah Kali. “Lada lap ba ki dih kyiad ngi shain kuna bad ujor ejahar iaki”, u la ong.Katkum ka jingong u SP, la pynlong ia ka jingap thap ha ki jaka kum ha 7mer ha thain Upper Shillong bad ha kiwei ki jaka.”Ka jingap thap ka long beit kaba shu leh kyndit khlem da pyntip lypa khnang ban lap ia kiba pynkhein ia ka ain”, u la ong.La bun ba ki pulit ki lap ia kiba pyndonkam kyiad ha ka por ba niah bad ki la pynngat kyndon ain nalor ka kuna khnang ban pynkyndit ia ki ba ki dei ban sngewthuh ba ka jingleh jongki ka wanrah iaka jingma ym tang ia ki hynrei ia ki paidbah khamtam ki nongshong kali.Nalor kine ki lad ban pynthngad bad pynlong ia ki nongniah Kali, nongniah bike, ka tnad ka la ju pynlong ruh ka jingialap pynshai bunsien ha ki jaka bapher bapher ka nongbah.
title: “Ka kyiad,ka jingleh shongshit  ka ialam sha ka jingjia aksiden”

content: Shillong, 2 Nailar:U khar tyrwa tiar uba ot kti ot shkor ia ka longkmie ha ka shnong Umlynghong kawei na ki kyntoit jong ka shnong Smit um don shuh mynta ha Shillong, iathuh ki pulit haba ia kren bad u Rupang. Ka khubor na ki pulit ka la iathuh ba ki la tip ia ka kyrteng jong utei u runar ruh bad ki la ioh jingtip ba thikna ba um don ha Shillong bad la sngewthuh ba u la poi sha ka jylla West Bengal bad ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ki pulit Meghalaya bad West Bengal ka dang iaid shakhmat ban ioh kem ia utei u runar.
title: U ba ot kti ha Smit um  don shuh ha Shillong

content: Shillong, 2 Nailar:U bah Rijoy Basaiawmoit u kpa jong u bah Dajied Kynsai Syiemlieh, (u samla uba la shah rahbor ha ki runar ha Bangladesh) haba ia kren bad u Rupang u la ong ba dang ha ka sngi u blei ka la poi phone sha u ban pyntip ba baroh ki kot ki sla ki la biang lut na ka bynta ban phah noh ia u khun jong u sha India. “Ki la phah ia ka jingthoh da ka Whatapp, ki la ong ba la dep pynbiang lut ki kot ki sla bad kaba sah ka long sa tang ban aiti noh ha ki shipai iada pud jong ka ri Bangladesh ( BGB)” ong u bah Rijoy uba la iathuh ba u khun jong u mynta u dang don ha kti jong ki pulit ka Sherpur District.U samla Dajied u dei na ka shnong Bynther-Mairang u la shah rahbor na jaka bylla jong u na Nongjri ha ka 27 tarik u iaiong mynta u snem bad la ioh bat pat ha Bangladesh ha ka 15 tarik u jymmang bad mynta 4 bnai tam u la don ha Bangladesh.
title: 4bnai tam, U Dajied  dang ha Bangladesh

content: Shillong, 2 Nailar:Ka Khasi Students Union Mawkynrew Circle, ha ka 2tarik Nailar 2017, ka la ai daka jingthoh ujor sha u Labour Inspector ka Mawkynrew C & RD Block pyrshah ia ka jing pyntrei jong ki briew da ki bar jylla ki bym don iaka work permit haki jaka jong ka thaiñ. Ka seng ka pynpaw ka jing pyrshah kaba jur halor kane ka bynta bad kan nym ailad ia kino kino kiba shim kabu ban wan rah nongtrei daki nongwei bar jylla sha ka thaiñ. Kane ka jingleh jong ki katto katne ngut ki briew ka pynduh iaki lad kamai ja kpoh ki samla ka thaiñ bad kane ruh kan pynshlur iaka jing wan rung kyrthep jong ki bar jylla sha kane ka jaka baieid jong ngi. Halor kane ka bynta ka seng ka kyntu ia baroh ki nong ialam shnong ba kin ia snoh kti lang khnang ba ki nong wei barjylla kim nym iohlad ban bshuh khlieh sha ka thain jong ngi.
title: Ujor bar Jylla ka KSU Mawkynrew

content: Shillong, 2 Nailar:Ka jingialang ka kynhun ki myntri sorkar ka la mynjur mynta ka sngi ban wanrah kyndon ha ka rukom ting khun ia ki nongtrei sorkar. U Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ki nongtrei sorkar ki lah ban ting khun, hynrei kin don pat ki kyndon kiba kin hap ban pyndep katkum ka Adoption of Children 2015. U la ong ba kitei ki kyndon kiba don hangtei kin long kiba shai bha kaba yn ym buh jingeh ia kito ki khynnah kiba shah ting.Kawei pat ka mat ba ka sorkar ka la rai ka long ba baroh ki tnad sorkar kin don noh la ka jong ka jong ka bhah na bynta ki Grant ym shuh ban ia khleh jaktung hajuh bad kane ka long ban pyniaid beit iaid ryntih ia ka pisa tyngka jong ka jylla. Kawei pat ka mat ba la ia kren ka long ban pyntreikam ia ka Protection of Interest of Depositors Bill bad ia katei ka bill yn wanrah ha ing dorbar ka jylla ban pan jingmynjur. Nangta ka kynhun myntri sorkar ka la mynjur ruh ban pynbeit thymmai noh ia ka Meghalaya Nursing Council Act, 1992.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpyntreikam ia ka 5th Pay Commission u Dr.Mukul Sangma u la ong ba la aiti ha ka tnad pla tyngka jong ka sorkar ba kan peit bniah ia kane ka kam bad la ai por kylluid ia ki ban pyndep ia baroh ki jingdonkam, hynrei la ong ba ka sorkar ka kwah ban pyntreikam noh kham kloi.
title: Yn pyntreikam kloi noh ia ka  5th Pay Commission, ong U MR

content: Shillong, 2 Nailar:Ka jingialang jong ka kynhun ki myntri sorkar mynta ka sngi, ka la shim ia ka rai ban pyntreikam noh ia ka rukom thungkam thung-jam kaba thymmai da kaba wanrah bun ki kyndon ha la ki jong ki bynta. Kawei na ki kyndon ba ka sorkar ka la wanrah ka long ban thungkam sorkar ia kito ki trai jaka kiba ai sngewbha ia ka jaka jong ki ha ka sorkar ban tei ia kiba bun ki jingtei na bynta ki kam pynroi bapher bapher ne ki ophis sorkar.Haba ia kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Mukul Sangma u la ong ba bun ki riew sbun mynsiem kiba la ai sngewbha ia ka jaka jong ki sha ka sorkar na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi ha ki shnong ki thaw bad ki dong ki thaiñ jong ki bad na bynta katei ka jingsbun mynsiem jong ki ka sorkar ruh ka sngewdei ban iarap mar kylliang da kaba thungkam sorkar ia ki.Lada ka dei ka jaka shimet u Mukul u ong ba ki trai jaka ki hap ban phah ia ka kyrteng u nongioh kam, bad lada ka dei ka jaka Kur ruh -ka kur ka hap ban phah ia ka kyrteng bad lada ka dei pat ka jaka Raid ne jaka shnong ka shnong ka hap ban phah ia ka kyrteng jong kita kiba dei ban ioh ia ka kam. Ka kam ba ka sorkar kan ai sha ki kan dei beit ka kam ha ka Grade III bad IV. U Mukul u la pyntip ba dang shen ka sorkar ka la thungkam haduh 16 ngut ki briew kiba la ai jaka na ka bynta ban pyntyllun ia ka Greater Shillong Water Supply.Kawei pat ka bynta ba ka kynhun myntri sorkar ka la shim rai ka long ban kyntiew ia ka bhah ioh kam ioh jam jong kito kiba don jingduna dkhot met ne kiba anna na ka 3% sha ka 4%. Ha kane ka kynti ba mynta ka la rai ruh ban buh bhah kyrpang na ka bynta kito ki nongialehkai Sports kiba ju wanrah nam wanrah burom ia ka jylla bad ka bhah thungkam ia ki ka long 2%. U Dr.Mukul u la ong ba kito kiba dei ban ioh ia katei ka bhah kin dei beit tang ki nongialehkai na ka jylla kiba mihkhmat ia ka jylla sha ka jingialehkai ha ri India bad shabar Ri.Ha kaba ia dei bad kiba bun ki jingpynslem ka sorkar ban thungkam ia kito ki samla kiba la pass ha ka jingiakhun kam bapher bapher u Dr.Mukul u la ong ba ka daw ka dei namar ka jingslem ban ioh ia ka jingpynshisha na ki pulit (Police Verification) hynrei mynta u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la shim ia ka rai ba kito ki samla kiba la pass ha ka eksamin bad kiba la dei hok ban ioh kam kim donkam shuh ban dang ap ia ka jingpynshisha pulit, hynrei yn thungkam noh ia ki shipor (Interim Appointment) bad kin hap ban wanrah pat ia ka jingpynshisha pulit hadien, ia baroh ki kot ki sla ba donkam ban pyni ki hap ban pynshisha dalade hi. Ka sorkar ka la wanra hjingpynbeit thymmai rh ia ka Service Rules kaba ia dei bad ka rukom thungkam, ka rukom pynkynriah kam khnang ba kan long kaba shai.
title: Yn ai kam ka sorkar ia ki trai  jaka, ba ai jaka tei kam pynroi

content: Shillong, 08 Nailar:U nongialam ka BJP uba dei ruh u nongpeit ia ka jylla Meghalaya u Nahlin Kohli u la khot ia ka jingialang bad baroh ki nongialam niam ha kane ka jylla ha kane ka sngi Saitiain ban iakren bad ba kin pynsngew ia ki jingeh bad ki jinglongg artatien ia ka BJP hadien ba ka la shah kynnoh bad shah kynthoh ba ka dei kaba shitniam.Haba pynthikna ia kane mynta ka sngi, u Kohli uba la don ha ka nongbah ban iashim bynta ha ka jingialang ka Core Committee ka BJP, u la pynthikna ia kane ha ki nongthoh ba u la dep pyntip sha ki nongialam niam baroh ha ka jingialang kaban long ha ka por 3 baje janmiet ha Shillong.“Nga la khot ia baroh ki nongialam niam ha kane ka sngi Saitjain por 3 baje”, la ong u Kohli.Kham mynshwa, u Kohli u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingkhot jongu ia ki nongialam niam bad balang ha kane ka jylla ka long ban pynshai halor ka jingshah kynnoh ka BJP ha kiwei ki party khamtam ka Congress ba ka dei kaba shit niam bad kaba isih ia ki Khristan.“Nga khot ia ki nongialam baroh ba kin lah ban iathuh ia ki jingeh ba ki iakynduh bad ka jingsngew pyrshah jongki ruh ia ka BJP, ha kaba ngan lah ban pynshai ia ki”, la ong u nongialam ka BJP.U Nongaiktien ka BJP u la ong ba ka Congress khamtam ha kane ka jylla ka la pynshit da kaba pynsaphriang ba ka BJP ka dei kaba isih Khristan bad kane ka dei ka khubor lamler ban shu pynbiej ia ki paidbah.“Nga la dep ong ha ki nongialam ka party kham mynshwa ba haba ngan wan ban jngoh biang ia ka jylla ngan leit iakynduh hi markhmat ba ki nongialam Balang baroh namar ba ha ki jylla kum ha Goa ngi don ki dkhot kiba dei ki Katholik bad ngi don ruh ha kiwei ki bynta ka ri ha kaba ki Katholik bad ki Muslim ki dei ki dkhot jong ka seng. Ki lah ban ujor ia kano kano ka ajenda ka ba ka BJP ka pyrshah ia ki”, la ong u Kohli.U la ong ba ki briew ki pyrshang ban pynsaphriang ia ki khubor sniew ia ka BJP namar ba ki tieng ba ka BJP ka la leh shibun ki kam ban kyntiew ia ka ri bad ia ka ioh ka kot bad u kyrmen ba ki paidbah kin kham lah ka politik kaba wanrah ia ka roi ka par ban ia ka politik bamsap ka Congress.“Ka la don ka jingpyrshang ban pynsniew dur ia ka BJP ba ka dei kaba isih Khristan. Hynrei ki paidbah jong ka ri ki pyrkhat da kumwei pat. Ki la don ruh ki jingpyrshang ban pynsaphriang da ki khubor lamler pyrshah ia ka BJP kum ka party kaba isih Khristan, kaba khang bam doh masi. Hynrei u Myntri Rangbah ka ri u Narendra Modi u la dep kren shai ba kiba pyrshang ban pyndik ia ki para briew ha ka kyrteng ka masi, ki dei ban shah pynshitom da kaba tyngeh ha ka ain bad ki sorkar jylla ki dei ban shim khia ia kane”, la ong u Kohli.U la bynrap biang ba ka BJP ka ngeit ha ka roi ka par ia baroh ne ka Sabka Saath-Sabka Vikas khlem pyniapher hapdeng u Hindu Muslim, Khristan Christian, Buddhist, Parsi, Jew bad kano kano ka jaitbynriew.
title: La sngi Saitjain, yn kynduh  u Kohli ia ki nongialam Balang

content: Shillong, 06 Nailar:Ka khubor sain pyrthei ka la khih bha mynta ha kane ka jylla hadien ba ar ngut ki MLA ka Congress ki la shah pynhap shuki namar ba ki thmu ban leit rung ha kiwei ki party. Ha ka jingtwad jingmut na ki nongialam ka BJP ha kane ka jylla, ki la kubur ba ki la don bun ki MLA na ki party na kane ka jylla kiba la leit iakynduh hi ia ki nongialam ka BJP sha Delhi ban iakren ia ka sain pyrthei ha kane ka jylla.Katkum ka jingong u President ka BJP Meghalaya u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh, ki MLA na ki seng bapher bapher ki la leit iakynduh hi ia ki nongialam ka BJP sha Delhi bad na ka liang ka BJP na kane ka jylla kan ap ia ka khubor na Delhi ban leh ia kaba donkam.“Ki MLA ki leit iakynduh hi sha Delhi bad ki nongialam ka BJP hynrei ki bym dei MLA ki lah ban wan iakynduh bad ki nongialam ha ka jylla”, la ong u Bah Shibun.Wat la u Bah Shibun u la ong ba um lah ban kren eiei ne iathuh ia kiba leit iakynduh hi sha Delhi hynrei kata ka shong beit ha ki nongialam ba kin leh ia kaba donkam bad ki.U Bah Shibun u la kyntait ban ong eiei ruh halor ka jingmih khubor ba u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar bad u Bah Prestone Tynsong kiba la shah pynhap shuki ha u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma, ba ki don ka jingthmu ban iasoh bad ka BJP.Hynrei ha kawei ka khubor la ioh jingtip ba kine ki MLA ba shah pynhap shuki, ki la don ka jingiakynduh bad u nongialam ka BJP ba peit ia kane ka thain u Himan Biswa Sarma ha Guwahati ha kine ki sngi. Wat la ym pat tip ia ka jingiakren, hynrei la sngewthuh ba ka la don ka jingiakren ba ki lah ban wan rung sha ka BJP shwa ka elekshon.Katkum ka jingtip, u Bah Prestone, u Bah Sniawbhalang bad u Bah Ngaitlang Dhar ki la don ha ka jingthmu ban phet noh na ka Congress, wat la ki la kyntait ia kane ka khubor haba iakren bad ki nongthoh wat hadien ba ki la shah pynhiar shuki ruh bad ki la kam ba ki dang don ha Congress bad kin iai don bad kane ka seng.Ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ruh, la ioh khubor ba u Bah Prestone u la lum ia ki nongialam na ka thain Pynursla ban iakren ia ka kam sain hima khamtam ban jied na kano ka party ba u dei ban iakhun ha kane ka elekshon namar ba u la don ka jingiajngai bad u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma hadien ba u la shah pynhap shuki noh. Watla ym pat ioh ia ka khubor kaba thikna sha kano ka party ki la iarai hynrei la sngewthuh ba ka BJP lane ka NPP ka dei ka lynti ba ki lah ban jied ha kane ka elekshon ban wan.Ha kawei ka liang, u Bah Shibun u la iathuh ba u Amit Shah uba la pynbeit ban wan sha nongbah Shillong ha ka 12 bad 13 tarik mynta u bnai, u la pynsangeh noh shwa namar ba u dang don bun ha kane ka elekshon Vice President kaba dang shu bna hynnin ha kaba u kyrtong ka BJP u Venkaiah Naidu u la jop.“Ka National Executive Council jong ka party kaba la buh ban long ruh ha Hyderabad la pynsangeh noh shwa”, la ong u Bah Shibun.U la ong ba watla ym pat thikna, hynrei na ka liang u Amit Shah un sa wan la kumno kumno ha ka taiew ba kut une u bnai ne ha ka taiew ba nyngkong jong u Nailur. Ha ka jingwan jongu, un plie ruh ia ka ophis ka BJP ha ka nongbah.“Namar ka jingbym pat lait por u Amit Shah, yn sa wan jngoh shwa u Organising secretary u Ram Lalji ha ka 8-10 tarik, la ong u Bah Shibun.U President ka BJP Meghalaya u la iathuh ruh ba kiba bun ki MLA na ki party bapher bapher kynthup na ka Congress kiba la phah khubor sha u ba ki kwah ban iakynduh ia u Amit Shah ha ka jingwan jongu sha nongbah Shillong.“Ka jingkwah iakynduh jongki ia u Amit Shah kam mut ba kin rung sha ka BJP hynrei ki kwah ban ai khublei bad ban iakren ia kiwei ki kam”, la ong u Bah Shibun bad bynra, ka jingrung sha ka party ka shong ha ki.
title: Bun ki MLA ki leit kren hi bad  ki nongialam sha Delhi:Shibun

content: Shillong, 2 Nailar:Ki khubor ki la pur sted ba U Mukul Sangma, myntri rangbah ka jylla, u don jingthmu ban pynhap shuki ia 2 ngut ki myntri sorkar bad kitei ki kynthup ia U Bah Prestone Tynsong bad u Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar. Kiwei pat ki khubor, ki iathuh ba ka mih ruh ka kyrteng u Clement Marak ha katei ka thup shah pynhap shuki, hynrei u myntri rangbah un pynhap shuki tang 2 ngut kata 2 ngut napdeng kitei ki 3 ngut.Hadien ba la wai ka jingialang ka kynhun ki myntri sorkar mynta ka miet, ki nongthohkhubor ki la kylli na u Mukul, hato la katei ka khubor ka dei ne-em kaba shisha.U Mukul um shym la ai ka jubab kaba shai, hynrei u la ong ba ka jingkylliang myntri sorkar ka dei kaba ju leh baroh shi katta ruh, “Ka dei kaba ngi ju leh, don ka por ba ngi leh, don pat ka por ba ngim leh” ong u Mukul haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor bad u la bynrap ruh da kaba ong ba ia katei ka kam, yn sa ia peit.Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ki la pur ruh ki khubor ba kin don bun ki MLA Congress ki ban phet noh na katei ka seng shuwa ka elekshon MLA 2018. La kylli na u Dr.Mukul hato u don jingtip eiei ne-em shaphang kata, “Mano ban mih, mano ban rung, ngin sa ia peit da la dei ka por” u la ong. U kam ba kumba ka long mynta hi, ki don bun ki riewkhmat ki ban wan ia soh sha ka seng Congress, “Don ruh ki MLA kiba mynta ki ban wan ia soh sha ka Congress, ki nongialam ha ki kyndong kynshrot bun kiba la wan ia soh” u la ong.Ki la pur ruh ki khubor ba u Mukul un ia khun ar tylli ki konstitwensi ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 kata na Ampati kaba u mihkhmat mynta bad na Songsak konstitwensi kaba u ju leit ban jngoh khah khah ha kine ki sngi. La kylli biang na u Dr.Mukul hato la katei ka khubor ka long ne-em kaba shisha, “Phi lah ban thoh ia kata, hynrei ngam ong eiei, ngin ia peit ia ka por” u la jubab.
title: Ym kren shai U Mukul ban  pynhap shuki ia ki myntri sorkar

content: Shillong, 8 Nailar:Ka Supreme Court of India, ha ka 2tarik mynta u bnai, ka la shim bishar, halor ka ka jingshim jaka bad siew pisa, na ka bynta ka jingpynheh ia ka kad liengsuin ha Umroi, kaba la plie naduh u snem 1960 bad katei ka dei halor ka mukotduma jong ka Kong Billinda Lapang pyrshah ia ka sorkar Meghalaya.Ka kashari, ka iakren, halor ka jingshim jaka kaba 224.16 acre ha u snem 2009 bad na katei la iathuh ba la aiti ia 192.26 acre sha ka Airport of Authority, katba sa 32 acre, ka jaka ka dang sah kut ban aiti, namar ba ka dei ruh ka jaka jong ki shipai.Ka Supreme Court, ka iakren halor ka rai jong ka High Court, ba ka kam kaba donkam ia u paidbah, ka shu sahkut namar ba ym lah ban nang pynheh ia katei ka kad liengsuin bad la ong shuh shuh ba ka sorkar Meghalaya, ka la siew ia ka pisa kaba T.25,70,80,258/- kaba dei haduh 80% na ka pisa kaba dei ban siew sha ki trai jaka, ha ka dor kaba T.115 shi square phut, nalor kiwei pat ki jingsiew sha ka kong Patricia Nongsiej.Ki nong ujor, ki la ujor ruh ba ma ki, ki bat ia katei ka jaka, kum ki nongshim wai bad kumta ba ym shym la siew satia ia ka bai khyndew, na ka bynta jongki, kum ki nongshim wai bad la iathuh ba ia katei ka jaka, la long trai da ka kong Stied Dkhar bad ia ka jingsoi kyrteng jongka, la shu thaw thok. La ujor shuh shuh ba ia ka jingsiew kaba rem duh, la siew sha ka Particia Nongsiej, ka bym dei satia ka trai jaka bad la iathuh ba ha ka por ba ka tyrwa ban die ia katei ka jaka, ka kong Nongsiej, kam don kot khyndew satia halade.Ha ka jingiakren, u nong iasaid jong ka kong Stied Dkhar, u mynjur ba katei ka longkmie, ka la ioh pisa T.2.40 crore ha ka account jongka, ha U Iaiong 2016, katba u nong iasaid na bynta jong ka kong ParticiaNongseij, u iathuh ba la siew T.7 crore sha ka kong Stied Dkhar bad u nongiasaid,um lah ban iathuh la ka pisa, kaba la siew, ka dang don ne em ha account jong ka kong Stied Dkhar, katba u nong iasaid jong ka kong Particia Nongseij, u iathuh ba ka pisa kaba T.10 haduh 12 klur, ka don ha kti jongka, lane hapoh Bank bad ia ka pisa, ka bym don ha account, yn sa pynrung noh ha ki ar taiew ki ban wan.Ka Kashari, ka la rai ba ka jingpynheh ia ka liengsuin, ka long kaba donkam bad ba ka jaka, kaba la dep shim, ban aiti noh sha ka tnat pyniaid liengsuin khlem pynslem shuh bad ban aiti noh ruh ia ka jaka, kaba dei ban ai sha ki shipai ruh kumjuh.Ka kashari, kam shym la kren eiei halor ka jingiadei bad ka jingsiew bai wai bad kumjuh ruh halor ka jingkam trai jong ka kong Stied Dkhar ia katei ka jaka, ha kaba ka ong ruh ba la die ia ka jaka, khlem ka jingmynjur jongka.Ka Supreme Court, ka bthah ba haduh ban da pynbeit da kumwei pat, ba ka pisa, kaba don ha account jong ka kong Stied Dkhar, ka dei ban neh beit kumba ka long bad kumjuh ruh ha ka accout jong ka kong Nongsiej.La bthah ruh ia U Chief Justice ka High Court, ba un jied da U District Judge, ba un rai halor katei ka kam bad ban pynbeit hapoh lai bnai, naduh ba u ioh ia katei ka hukum jong ka Kashari.
title: Aiti noh ia ka jaka ban pynheh  liengsuin Umroi, ong ka SC

content: Shillong, 08 Nailar:Ka Joint Action Committee Hima Jirang (JAC-HJ) ka kyntu jur ia ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) lyngba u Executive Member I/c Elaka, Bah Latiplang Khar-kongor ba kan leh eiei noh ia u Syiem ka Hima Jirang, Pa’iem RH Wahlang, namar um burom ia ka hukum ka KHADC kaba la btah ban pynlong ia ka Peace Committee hapoh 15 sngi, bad kane ka pawshai ba u Syiem um burom ia ki bor ba halor jong ka KHADC.Katkum ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u President JAC, bah O Thangkhiew bad Secretary bah M Sangkli ki la iathuh ba ka KHADC katkum ka shithi kaba Dated Shillong, 18 th July 2017 No-DC-XXVII/Genl/PF53/20178/a/270 ka la btah ia u Syiem ban pynlong noh ia ka Peace Committee hapoh ka 15 sngi, kata naduh ka 18 tarik Naitung haduh ka 2 tarik Nailar,2017 hynrei u Syiem um shym la lah ban pynlong ia katei ka Committee bad ka jingai por jong ka KHADC 15 sngi ka la kut mynta.Kumta, na ka liang ka JAC ryngkat ki Kur Wahlang phra kpoh ki kyrpad jur ia ka KHADC ban leh eiei noh mardor ia u Syiem namar ula pynkhein ia ka hukum bad um shym burom shuh ia ka jingbtah ka KHADC, kumta ka la dei ban weng noh na ka khet ban pynkut ia ki kynrum kynram hapoh ka Hima. Khnang ba ka synshar khadar bad ka imlang ka sahlang ki khun ki hajar hapoh ka Hima kan long kaba iaid beit iaid ryntih.Lada ki bor ka KHADC kim lah ban leh eiei mynta ka kynti, ka la paw shai ba ka don kaei re kaei sha lyndet kaba la pynlong ba kan iai buh teng shi buhteng ia katei ka kam la palat shisnem mynta, ki la bynrap.Ki nongialam ka JAC ki la byrngem ruh ban pynlong da ki jingiakhih paidbah ban rah lama ha phyllaw ophis ka KHADC ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingleh mynthi ki bor ka KHADC.
title: Leh eiei noh ia u Syiem ka  Hima Jirang,dawa ka JAC

content: Shillong, 8 Nailar:Ka Confederation of Ri-Bhoi People (CoRP) Eastern Zone ka la kynnoh ba u MLA ka Umroi konstitwensi u bah Ngaitlang Dhar u la pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa paidbah kaba dei na ka bynta ka MLA Scheme. Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u President jong katei ka seng u bah Garlandforth Kharsyntiew u la ong ba ka CoRP ka la lap lyngba ka RTI halor ka jingpyntreikam u MLA ia ka MLA Schemes naduh u 2013-2014 bad u 2015-2016.Katkum katei ka RTI u bah Garland u la ong ba na ka SRWP Scheme la pyni ba u MLA u la ai jingiarap sha u Banrilang Pyngrope na ka shnong Nongrah kaba hap hapoh ka Raid Mawbuh hynrei ia katei ka pisa la sei hi da u MLA.Katkum ka RTI la paw ba katei ka pisa ka dei ka jingiarap na bynta ka jingshah shohphria ha katei ka shnong bad la paw ba la ai jingiarap haduh T.3.40,500 ( Lai lak saw phew hajar san spah tyngka). Katei ka seng ka la kynnoh ba katei ka pynthor kaba la iarap pisa kam dei satia ka jong u Banrilang hynrei ka dei ka pynthor kba jong u MLA u bah Ngaitlang.Shuh shuh la kynnoh ba ha shuwa ka elekshon u bah Ngaitlang u la leit ban sam blanket bad sam jeysey phutbol sha kylleng ki jaka bad ha ka por ba u sam u la ong ba ka dei ka jingiarap kaba u ai sngewbha nap la lajong hynrei katei ka seng ka la kyndit ban iohi mynta ba kitei ki jingiarap kiba u la sam shuwa ka elekshon ki la paw ha ka MLA scheme hadien ba u la jop elekshon. “Ka la paw ba u la sam 200 tylli ki blanket kiba shongdor T.1050 tyngka kawei bad 30 set ki jeysey kiba shongdor T.5000 tyngka shi set” ong u bah Garland da kaba ong ba ka blanket bad ka jeysey ba u MLA u la sam kam ia hap dor eiei bad ka dor kaba u pyni ha ka jingpynlut.Nangta la kynnoh ruh ba u MLA u la sam ia ka tin soping kaba .25m sha ki paidbah hynrei katkum ka RTI ka la pyni ba u la aida kaba .45mm, katei ka tin ka dei kaba u la pyni ba u thied T.600 tyngka kawei bad u la sam mar 27 tylli sha ki 370 tylli ki longing ha katei ka shnong.Kiba bun na ka pisa ba la sei na ka MLA scheme ka CoRP ka la ong ba dei kaba la sei da ka seng kaba la tip kum ka 12th Development Organisation, “Ngim pat ju iohsngew ia katei ka seng mynno mynno ruh, ngin hap ban pa jingshai na u MLA ka seng aiu ka dei bad ngin leit ruh ban pynshai sha ki paidbah halor kitei ki jinglap jong ngi ia ka rukom pyntreikam u MLA ia ka hok ki paidbah” ong u President ka CORP.
title: Kynnoh ka CoRP ba pyndonkam bakla  u MLA ka Umroi ia ka pisa paidbah

content: Shillong, 8 Nailar:Ki bor District ka East Khasi Hills ki la pynjari 144 CrPC ha kaba yn ym shah ia kino kino ki briew ne kino kino ki kynhun ban ia rah lama iong lane ban thang tyngshop khlem da ioh jingbit. Ia kane la ong ba la pynjari hadien ba la ioh jingtip ba kin don ki kynhun ki ban rah lama iong kaba lah ban poi sha ka jinghuri hura hapoh ka District. La khang pyrshah ruh ban pynwit ia ka iaid ka ieng ki kali ha ki jaka ba don ki briew kiba kongsan lane ki VVIP, ha kaba ym shah ban rah ia kino kino ki tiar pynmynsaw lane kino kino ki tiar kiba lah ban pynmynsaw iano iano ha baroh kawei ka nongbah. Katei ka hukum kan ym treikam ia ki bor pahara kiba don ha ka kam, katei ka hukum kan treikam noh mynta hi haduh ban da pynkylla da kumwei pat.Katei ka jingpynjari 144CrPC kaba kyndit jong ki bor District ka la pynlyngngoh ia kiba bun ki nongthohkhubor bad haba pyrshang ban wad jingtip, ki tyllong khubor ki la iathuh ba ka dei na ka daw ka jingleit jong u myntri rangbah ka jylla lashai ka sngi ka 9 tarik u nailar sha Mawkhar-Shillong ban plie ia ka Multipurpose Hall.Ki tyllong khubor ki la iathuh ba la pynjari ia ka 144CrPC namarba ha kine ki sngi ba la dep u myntri rangbah u la sha pynlehraiñ naba don ki kynhun kiba rah lama iong, kiba rah pla kad bad pyrta pynrem ia u ha ka por ba u leit ban long kum u kongsan sha ka jingialang.Lah ban kdew ba dang shen ha ka jingplie ia ka Mawlai C&RD Blcok ki dkhot ka HYC ki la pdiang sngewbha ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla da kaba rah pla kad ryngkat ki jingthoh pynrem ia u bad kumjuh ruh ka jingdawa ILP, ki la pyrta ruh ba ki kwah ILP bad ki la tah ia ki pla kad ha ki kynroh kiba don ha ki dukan ha Mawlai-Mawtawar.Katei ka jingleh ka HYC ka dei kaba ka la leh kyndit kyndit kaba ki bor pahara ruh kim ioh jingtip satia. Lah ruh ban kdew ba ha ka por ba plie ia ka Civil Sub-Division Pynursla ka la don ka kynhun rah pla kad kaba la tur sha ka jaka kaba u Mukul un plie u maw nongrim, hynrei ha katei ka por kim pat shym la ioh ban pyni hakhmat u Mukul naba ki bor pahara ki la khanglad ia ki.
title: Na ki jingrah plakad, lama  iong ha ki jaka leit u Mukul

content: Shillong, 9 Nailar:U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Mukul Sangma u la hukum ban tohkit da ka tnad Crime Investigation Department (CID) halor ka jingshah kynnoh bamsap jong ki ophisar ka tnad DMR bad Taxation Department kaba ialam sha ka jingduhnong ia ka sorkar. Ha ka kyrwoh khubor u Director ka Achik Indigenous Justice Initiative Forum (AIJIF) u Alex K Sangma u la ong ba u myntri rangbah u la hukum ban tohkit da ka tnad CID hadien ba katei ka kynhun ka la phah ia ka mat dawa sha ka sorkar ha u bnai lber.“Ngi pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen halor kane ka jingshimkhia u myntri rangbah ban phah tohkit CID ia ka bamsap ha ka tnad DMR bad Taxation ha Dainadubi check Gate kaba don ha north Garo Hills kaba naduh u snem 2006 haduh 2015 kaba la lap ba haduh T.27 klur tyngka ka pisa sorkar ka la jah klep” u la ong.
