content: Shillong, 25 Nailar:U President ka Ri-Bhoi Block Congress committee (RBCC) u Dr Celestine Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka daw ka jingpynwai noh ia ka Umroi Block Congress hapoh ka jingialam u MLA u Bah Ngaitlang Dhar ka dei halor ka nongrim ba u la kren bad ialap sha ki nongkyrshan ban nym iadon shuh bad ka party bad dei ban ia leit noh sha kawei pat.“Ki daw ki don shibun bah hynrei kaba kongsan ka dei namar ba u MLA u la ialap ia ki nongkyrshan jongu ba kin nym iai neh shuh bad ka Congress bad ki dei ban ia leit noh sha kawei ka pat”, la ong u Dr Lyngdoh haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi.U Dr Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka party ka la thung noh mynta da u Bah George Lyngdoh kum u President ka Umroi Block Congress.U President ka Ri-bhoi Congress u la kyntait ruh ba ka jingpynwai noh ia ka Congress hapoh Umroi ha ka jingialam u bah Ngaitlang kan don jingktah ia ka party da kaba kam ba ka Congress kam dei ka party kaba duna ki nongialam bad ka don shibun da kiwei pat.“Kam nym don kano kano ka jingktah ia ka party namar ba ngi don da kiwei pat ki nongialam kiba lah ban ialam ia ka party bad ki paidbah”, la ong u Dr Lyngdoh.Katkum ka jingong u Dr Lyngdoh, u MLA ka Umroi u Bah Ngaitlang u dei u nongkynshoit ia ki nongkyrshan ban phet noh na ka party ban nym iai neh bad dei ban phet noh sha kawei pat ka party.La kynnoh ba u Bah Ngaitlang lem bad u para jongu, u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar bad u Bah Prestone Tynsong ki la pyrshang ban iamih noh na ka Congress da kaba phet sha kawei pat ka party shwa kane ka elekshon MLA ban wan.sWatla ki ju len ba kim don kum kata ka jingthmu hynrei ka khubor ka la her ba ki la lah ban leit noh sha ka NPP ne ka BJP.U Bah Tynsong bad u Bah Dhar ki la shah pynhap shuki dang shen ha u Myntri Rangbah u Mukul Sangma halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki thmu ban pynpait ia ka party.
title: Weng ia U Ma Ngait na Block  Umroi, jied ia U bah George

content: Shillong, 25 Nailar:Baroh kiba la shah khot sngewbha ha ka jingialang bah kaba la lum da ka Synjuk Ki Nongsynshar Shnong Upper Shillong, ki la pynthikna ba kin poi sha katei ka jingialang lait noh u MLA ka Mylliem u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh uba dei ruh u myntri ka tnad pynroi sor, iathuh u General Secretary katei ka Synjuk u bah Gilbert Laloo. Ka jingialang ba la lum da ka Synjuk Ki nongsynshar Shnong Upper Shillong kan long lashai ka sngi ka 26 tarik u nailar ha madan phutbol Umlyngka bad ka dei ka jingialang pynshai paidbah halor ka jingkyntur pud ka MUDA. U bah Gilbert u la ong ba baroh ki jingpynkhreh ki la iaid beit iaid ryntih na bynta katei ka jingialang.Kham mynshuwa haba ia kren bad u Rupang u bah Gilbert u la ong ba la khot ia u CEM ka KHADC u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem, kong Teilinia Thangkhiew MDC ka Mylliem, la khot ruh ia u Acting Syiem ka Hima Mylliem u Pa’iem Ricky Nelson Syiem nalor ki nongialam ka Synjuk Ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Bri u Hynniewtrep. Ki Rangbah shnong ka Upper Shillong ki la khot ruh ia u MLA ka Mylliem u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh ban ia donlang ha katei ka jingialang kum u MLA jong katei ka thaiñ ym kum u myntri sorkar, hynrei u bah Gilbert u la ong ba ym pat ioh ktien eiei la un wan ne em katba kiwei pat ki la pynthikna ba kin wan.La kylli na u bah Gilbert la ki Sengbhalang ruh kin ia wan lang ne-em sha katei ka jingialang, u la ong ba kin don ki Sengbhalang ruh ki ban wan kumjuh ki nongialam shnong bapher bapher kiba la shah khot sngewbha na ki shnong kiba la shah ktah ha ka jingkyntur pud ka MUDA. Ha katei ka jingialang u la ong ba la bthah ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingpyrshah ia kiwei pat ki mat, hynrei kan long beit thik tang ka mat jingkyntur pud ka MUDA. La sngewthuh na ka jingiakren ba kin don ki jingrah plakad ban pynrem bad ban pyrshah ia ka jingkyntur pud ka MUDA.
title: Baroh ki la pynthikna, u  bah Ronnie um pat ai ktien

content: Shillong, 25 Nailar:Hynnin ka janmiet, kawei ka briew ba kyrteng ka Nisha Rai ka la kha khyllung ba dang san bnai bad tang hadien shi kynta I la khlad noh ha Ganesh Das Hospital, Lawmali.Ynda la wan phai na hospital ki la leit tep ia I ha kawei ka jaka jong kiwei ki briew ha Umlyngka, ka dong Mawria bad ki khlem da tep bha bad ki shu khlong da kti bad tep ia I khyllung bad mynta ka step, I trai ka jaka, i la iohi ia khyndew ba don ba tih, I la leit peit bad I la lap bad iohi ia I khyllung ba sop jain lieh bad la pyntip sha ka shnong bad ka shnong ka la pyntip sha ki pulit bad ki pulit ki la ialam ia ka Rai sha civil hospital.Katkum ka jingtip na ka shnong, kine ki briew ki dei kiba dang shu wan na Assam dang shi bnai eiei mynta. Na ka liang u Rangbah shnong u Bah Thomas Mylliem Umlong, u la ong ba ka shnong kan hap ban bishar bha namar ba ka trai jong kane ka iing ba ai sah ia kitei ki dkhar kam shym la pyntip satia sha ka bor shnong.Na ka liang ki pulit, ka la ong ba kam dei ka jingjia ba ki pyniap ne kano kano kawei pat ka daw hynrei ka dei beit tang namar ba ki leit tep ha jaka ki briew shimet. Na ka liang ki pulit ki la aiti biang ia I khyllung hadien ba la dep leh post mortem ban tep bha ha ka jaka ba biang.
title: Ba tep khlem akor ia i  khyllung, sei biang ki pulit

content: Shillong, 25 Nailar:U myntri ka tnad pynroi sor ka jylla uba dei ruh u MLA jong ka Mylliem konstitwensi u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la ong ba dei tang ha ka miej jingiakren kaba lah ban weng ia baroh ki jingeh ym da kaba ia lum paidbah, “Dei tang ha ka miej jingiakren lah ban weng ia ki jingeh ym da kaba ia lum paidbah” ong u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh haba kynthoh halor ka jinglum jingialang paidbah ki Rangbah Shnong ka thaiñ Upper Shillong lashai ka sngi ka 26 tarik u nailar ha madan Umlyngka halor ka jingkyntur pud ka MUDA kaba ma u ruh u la shah khot sngewbha.Ha kaba ia dei bad katei ka jingialang kaba la lum da ki Rangbah Shnong ban shim rai la kin pdiang ne pyrshah ia ka MUDA Building Bye-Laws ha ki 12 tylli ki shnong ka Upper Shillong, u bah Ronnie u la ong ” Ka lynti kaba dei eh ka dei ban ia shong pyrkhat ha ka miej jingiakren, phin ym lah ban weng ia ka jingeh ha ka jingialum paidbah”.U la ong ba ka dei ia ki Rangbah Shnong ban lum paidbah haba ki kwah ban ioh ia ka sur u paidbah, “Hynrei ban weng pat ia ka jingeh ka dei tang ha ka jingiakren bad ki nongialam jong ki shnong kiba shah ktah bad hangta kan mih ka jubab” u la ong biang.Shuh shuh haba ia kren bad ki lad khubor u bah Ronnie u la ong “Ha kum katei ka jingialum kaba heh, kumno phin ioh ia ka jubab” u la ong. Halor ka jingkyntur pud ka MUDA sha ki thaiñ ka Upper Shillong u bah Ronnie u la ong ba kano kano ka aiñ ka dei kaba la shna ym ban pyndik ia u paidbah.U bah Ronnie u la ong biang “Ym don kiwei pat ki bynta ba ka MUDa ka pynwit ha ki thaiñ Upper Shillong lait noh tang ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Building Bye-Laws, ym don da kiwei pat ki bynta ba ka MUDA ne Municipal ka mushlia hynrei tang katei ka aiñ shna ïng hynrei lada ki paidbah kim kwah ngim pynbor ia ki” u la ong.
title: Ka MUDA kam mushlia ha kiwei, tang ka aiñ shna ïng: Ronnie

content: Shillong, 28 Nailar:Ka KHADC kam pat don rekod satia ia ki jait kam khaii ba ki dkhar hapoh u pud u sam jongka, hynrei ka don tang ka rekod katno ngut kiba la wan aplai license.Ia kane la iathuh da u General Secretary ka HYC u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin hadien ba la iakynduh ia u CEM u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem mynta ka sngi.U Bah Kharjahrin u la ong ba ka KHADC ka la kam ba ka don kumba 3700 ngut ki dkhar bad na ka liang ka seng ka la dawa ba ka KHADC ka dei ban shna ka rekod ne ka data ban lum jingkhein ia baroh ki bar jylla kiba leh ia ki kam khaii jongki.“Ngi la dawa ba dei ban bishar ia baroh kine bad tang kiba biang ki kot ki sla dei ban ai trading license bad lada don ki jait kam khaii ba la leh u Khasi, kim dei shuh ban ai ha u dkhar ia ka license”, la ong u Bah Kharjahrin.Ha kane ka jingiakren na liang jong u CEM u la ai ka jingkular ia ki dkhot jong ka HYC ba ka Council kan sa leh ia kaba don kam bad mynta ka KHADC ka dang pyrkhreh ia ki kyrteng jong baroh ki trading license kiba la dep ban ai sha ki bar jylla. Ia kane ka kaiphot yn sa rah hapoh ka iing dorbar ka ban long ha u bnai Risaw mynta u snem.Ha kane ka jingiakren na ka liang jong ka HYC kala dawa na u CEM ba ka KHADC ka dei ban buh ia briew jong ka Council kiba dei na ka liang jong ka Enforcement habaroh ki District kiba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka KHADC namar kumba ka long mynta kane ka tnad Enforcement ka don tang ha Shillong bad na Shillong la peit ia baroh ki District.Ha ka jingiakren ha kaba ia dei bad ka Labour License, na ka liang jong ka HYC kala ban jur ba ka KHADC ka dei ban pynkut noh ia ka jingaiwai sha ki riew shimet, haba ia dei bad kane na ka liangjong u CEM u la iathuh ia ki nongialam jong ka HYC ba ia kane ka bynta ka KHADC kan sa ia treilang bad ki shnong ki thaw ban khanglad ia ka jingwan tuid ki briew kiba na bar ban wan trei bylla.
title: Ym pat don rekod ka KHADC  ia ki jait kam khaii, ki bar jylla

content: Jowai, 28 Nailar:Ym duna ia ka 300 ngut ki paid nongshong shnong ka shnong Mutong ha East Jaintia Hills ki la ia mih paidbah ban pyntrei ia ka lynti iaid kjat, ban poi sha ka Kshaid Moopun (Mawpun) da ka mynsien ka jingthrang ban pynlong ia katei ka jaka kum kawei na ki jaka jngoh kai pyrthei.“Ka Kam jngohkai pyrthei ka dei kawei na ki karkhana kaba heh tam ha ka pyrthei bad kaba lah ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki nongshong shnong. Dei halor kane ka nongrim ba ngi kum ki nongshong shnong ngi la rai ban pynbha ia ka lynti ban poi sha katei ka kshaid ban pynsuk ia ki nongwan jngoh kai”, la ong u Rangbah Shnong ka shnong Mutong, u ma Helping Phawa uba dei ruh u MDC barim ka thain Tuber.Utei u Rangbah shnong u la ong, “Ha kane ka shnong Mutong bad ka thain San Shnong jong ngi, ym tang ka Kshaid Moopun, hynrei ngi don ka Twai Langdong, ka Sahksaw nalor ka Kshaid don nam ka ri Jaintia- kaba la tip kum ka Kshaid Rynji”, kaba la khring ia ki spah ngut ki nongwah jngoh kai pyrthei”.Ki Paidbah ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ki la ia mih paidbah ha ryngkat ki mohkhiew, ki lyngka kynthei bad shynrang ban trei ia ka footpath kaba jrong um duna ia ka 1 km.Ka Kshaid Moopun ka don ruh ka khana kaba sngewtynnad bad kadei ka jaka jngohkai kaba pynjah thait ia ki nongwan jngoh kai namar ka jingtynnad ki lum ki wah, ki khlaw ki bthap bad ki lah ban pynlut por ban shang kylleng haduh ban poi sha ka Kshaid Rynji kaba dei ruh ka kshaid kaba jrong tam ha Jaintia Hills.U Rangbah Shnong u la ong ba u Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaintia Hills, u ma Mahamsing Lhuid uba u ju tip lyngkot kum u ma MS Lhuid u la pynshlur ia ki halor kane ka kam ban pynbha ia katei ka jaka.“Na ka liang u DC u la kular ban iarap pisa ia ngi na ka skim jong ka District Rural Development Agency bad kumjuh na ka liang u BDO ruh u la pynshlur ia ngi ban trei ia kane ka kam lyngba ka skim MGNERGS”, la ong u Rangbah Shnong haba iakren bad une u nonglum khubor jong u Rupang.Kumba long mynta, ka jingtrei ka la sdang bad katkum ka rai ka Dorbar shnong ym plie paidbah ia ka ha ka 27 tarik da u DC jong ka East Jaintia Hills.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ka East Jaintia Hills ka la shah pynjot lut ki lum ki wah ha ka rukom tih dewiong kaba pathar, hynrei katei ka thain San shnong kaba kynthup ia ka Pynthorsale, Mukhaialong, Mutong, ChamCham bad Lumshyrmit ki dang lah ban pynneh pynsah ia ka mariang bad ka jinglong jingman ki lum ki wah ki dang long shisha kiba itynnad haduh katta katta.Na ka liang u Rangbah Shnong, u la khot la wer ia kito ki riew ieid mariang bad ia baroh ban wan jngohkai ia kine ki jaka itynnad kiba don ha katei ka thain khnang ba kin ioh ban sakhi da la ki jong ki khmat.
title: Mih ka shnong Mutong ban shna lynti sha Kshaid ‘Moopun’

content: Nongstoiñ, 28 Nailar:Ka JAC Nongstoiñ Tourist Association mynta ka sngi, ka la shong ia ka jingialang na ka bynta ban ia pyrkhat halor ka jingwan kyntur jong ki Bos sawkhmut, jong ka sorkar ha ka thain Nongstoiñ hi baroh kawei kaba la ktah ia ka kamai ka kajih jong ki nong kamai kali hapoh ka thain kiba kynthup lut ia baroh ki seng jong ki nongniah kali.Ha katei ka jingialang da kawei ka jingmut ka JAC, ka la shim ia ka rai ba ha ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai kan leit syndon ban ai da ka dorkhas ha khmat u DC ka West Khasi Hills, ban pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingwan kamai jong kitei ki Bos saw bad ban ai por ruh shi taiew bad lada ki bor ba dei peit kim lah ban leh ei ei na ka liang jong ka Synjuk kan sa pynbna da ki lad jingiakhih ban pynbor ia ki bor ba dei peit.Ka jingpyrshah jong ka JAC ia kitei ki Bos saw sorkar, ka dei namar ba kitei ki Bos saw ki shu wan kamai sahuh khlem ka jingsiew ia ka bai permit bad ia ka tax surok bad ym tang ba kitei ki Bos saw ki wan ban kamai na Nongstoiñ sha Shillong, hynrei ki la leit ruh ban rung sa sha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka thain kum ha Langpih, Chahlang, Rambrai bad kiwei kiwei.U bah Sun Secretary ka Nongstoiñ Tourist Maxi Cab Driver & Owner Association, u la pynpaw ruh ba kiba bun ki trai kali bad ki nongniah kali kamai hapoh ka thain, ki la ai ia ka jingshakri ia ki paidbah ka thain naduh 20 snem mynshwa, ha ka por ba ka surok ka dang long kaba sniew haduh katta katta bad kiba dang iai bteng ruh haduh mynta mynne, ba la wan ka surok bah ar lain kaba bha bad ka jingwan kamai jong kitei ki Bos sawkhmut, ka la pynduh mynsiem noh khamtam ia kito ki samla khlem kam khlem jam kiba pyrshang ban ieng ha la ki jong ki kjat da kaba shim ia ka ram na Bank ban sei ia ki kali kamai ki jong ki.“Lada ka sorkar ka shah ba ki kali kamai kin teh noh na ki plate lieh ML01 bad ban nym donkam siew permit bad siew tax shuh ngi ruh ngi lah ban ban shim ia ka dor ba shim ki Bos saw bad ai jingshakri ia ki paidbah katkum kitei ki Bos” ong u Bah Sun, da kaba u la bynrap ruh ba ha ka jingshisha katkum ka kyrteng ba la thoh ha kitei ki Bos saw kaba la thoh Shillong Public Transport Service (SPTS), la sngewthuh ba ki dei ki kali ki ban ai ka jingshakri tang ha ki thain jong ka sor Shillong bad balei pat ki wan ban kyntur shaduh ki kyndong kynshrot jong ka thain Nongstoiñ.“Ka jingwan jong ki bos saw sorkar ka la ktah jur ia ka kamai kajih jong ngi, namar ba kiba bun na ngi ki nongniah kali kamai ngi don la ki jong ki jong ki lain ha kaba ki paidbah ki ju wan ban shong kali na ki jaka ieng lain (Stand) hynrei naduh bala don ki nos saw ki paidbah kim wan shu sha ki jaka ieng kali jong ngi bad ngi la hap ban shi ieng ap briew baroh baroh shi sngi” ong u wei na ki nongniah kali ka thain Langpih.Khatduh eh na ka liang jong ki nongialam jong ka JAC ki la kyntu ruh ia ki para dkhot bad kumjuh ia ki Association bapher bapher hapoh ka lama jong ka Synjuk ba kim dei ban leh shong shit lane ban kren khor ia ki nongniah jong kitei ki bos, namar ba ka synjuk ka pyrshah da ka lynti kaba jai jai bad da ka lynti kaba dei.
title: Pyrshah ki kali kamai, ba rung  ki bos sawkhmut ha Nongstoiñ

content: Shillong, 28 Nailar:Ka seng Congress ha Shella konstitwensi haduh mynta ka kynjah jar jar bad kam pat ioh kyrtong ban pynieng ha u 2018. Kumba ka long haduh mynta ym pat don kyrtong na ka seng Congress ki ban iaid shakhmat ban ia kynduh paidbah kum ka jingpynkhreh elekshon 2018 bad haduh mynta kiba dang iaid ha katei ka konstitwensi ki long u MLA ba mynta u Dr.Donkupar Roy, u bah Jropsing Nongkhlaw na ka seng BJP, u kyrtong shimet bah Wellborn Bynnud bad ka don ruh ka jingpynsawa ia ka kyrteng u bah Leston Wanswett na ki nongkyrshan jong u, ym pat don ki kyrtong kiba paw kyrteng na ka seng Congress.Kham mynshuwa ka Congress ka la pynsawa ia ka kyrteng jong u bah Leston Wanswett, hynrei kham hadien la ioh jingtip ba u bah Leston u la leit ia kynduh ia ki nongialam ka BJP bad ka la don ruh ka jingpyrshang jong u ban rung seng lada pynthikna ia ka tiket. Ha kum kane ka por ba ka seng Congress kam ioh kyrtong na Shella konstitwensi u nongthohkhubor u la ioh ban ia kren bad uwei na ki nongialam katei ka seng u bah Pynthymmaibor Chyne uba ju ia khun ia ka elekshon MDC na Shella na ka seng Congress.Ha katei ka jingiakynduh bad u bah Pynthymmai la kylli na u hato la u don jingmut ne-em ban ia khun ha ka elekshon 2018 ne ka la don ne-em ka jingtyrwa na ka seng Congress ia ka kyrteng jong u. U bah Pynthymmai u la ong ba um don jingmut ban ia khun ha ka elekshon 2018 bad u la pynthikna ruh ba un ym ia khun sati aha u 2018 hynrei u la ong ruh ba kam mut pat ba u la shongthait na ka kam Politik, “Kam mut ba nga la shongthait noh na ka kam politik hynrei nga kren ia u 2018” u la ong.
title: Kynjah ka Congress ha Shella

content: Shillong, 28 Nailar:Hadien ka jingiamut dur bun bnai, mynta ka la paw ba shi dorjon ki MDC ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (PDF) kin sa leit iasoh bad ka seng sain pyrthei thymmai ka People Democratic Front (PDF) ha ka 30 tarik Nailar.U nongthoh khubor u la ioh ban iakren bad ki katto katne ki MDC, kiba dei ruh ki Executive Member ha kane ka PDF kaba synshar ha KHADC, ki la kubur ba ki 12 ngut ki MDC kiba don ha ka KHADC ba bat ia ka bor synshar mynta kin pynbna paidbah ia ka jingleit iasoh jongki bad kane ka seng sain pyrthei lashi sngi shi bynta ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon MLA kaban sa wan.La iathuh ba u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem uba long u CEM ka KHADC ba mynta un sa shimti ia kam kum u nongialam ha ki bnai ban wan hadien ba u la dep risain ia ka jinglong MLA.Katkum ka khubor, u Bah Pynshngain u lah ban risain noh ia ka kam MLA jongu, ha u bnai ban wan ban plie lad ia u ban shimti pat ia ka kam nongialam jong kane ka seng thymmai.U MDC ka Mawkynrew u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh haba iakren mynta ka sngi, u la kubur ba ki 12 ngut ki MDC kin rung sha ka PDF ha kane ka sngi Balang bad ka nongrim ka long ba ki paidbah ki la kwah ia ka jingkylla hadien ba ki la ngiah ia ki party kiba la shu heh tang ki nia khlem kano kano ka jinglerkam.“Ngi iohi ba ka PDF ka dei ka party kaba dang khuid dang thymmai bad ki paidbah ki dang don ka jingshaniah ba kan ialam ia ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew”, la ong u Bah Banteidor.U la ong ba kiba bun ki mat ba ka KHADC ka la shim ban iasaid na ka bynta u paidbah katba kiwei ki party kim patiaw eiei.Kumjuh u Bah Ban James Basaiawmoit u la ong ba ki bun ki seng ki la mih la jah, hynrei kata kam shong ha kano kano ka party namar ba kaba kongsan ka shong ha u briew kumno u ialam ia ka party. U la ong ba lada ki paidbah ki ailad ia ka PDF ba kan jop bun ngut ha iing dorbar kan sa lah ban wanrah ia ka jingangnud jong ki paidbah namar ba lada khlem ka kynhun ym lah ban leh eiei.Ki 12 ngut ki MDC kiba kyrshan ia ka People Democratic Forum (PDF) kiban rung noh sha ka People Democratic Front (PDF) ki kynthup ia u Bah H. S. Shylla na Nongkrem, Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh na Mawkynrew, Bah L. G. Nongsiej na Nongstoin, Bah Morningstar Mawsor na Mawshynrut, Bah James B Basaiawmoit na Mawkhar, Bah James Sylliang na Mawhati, Kong Grace Kharpuri na Nongshken, Bah Latiplang Kharkongor na Nongthymmai, Bah Hadrian Lyngdoh na Mawkyrwat, Bah Blanding Warjri na Mawthadraishan, Bah Albinus Lyngdoh na Umroi bad Bah Victor Rani na Jirang.
title: “Ki paidbah ki la jlep ia  kiwei, ki phai sha ka PDF”

content: Shillong, 1 Nailur:Ka seng Association of Democracy and Empowerment (ADE), ha ka kyrwoh khubor mynta ka sngi, ka kynnoh ba ki kolej pule doktor ka Assam, ki kyntait ban ai jaka pule ia ki samla kiba na ka Jylla Meghalaya, khlem kino kino ki daw kiba biang. Kitei ki dei ki samla, kiba la jied na ka bhah jong ka North Eastern Council (NEC), ong shuh ka khubor.Katei ka seng, ka iathuh ba ka sorkar Assam, ka la pynduh noh ia 13tylli ki bhah pule, kiba dei ban ai sha ka Meghalaya, lyngba ka jingjied jong ka NEC bad nangta sa ka bhah, kaba dei na ka sorkar India, kaba la pynhiar na ka 15 tylli sha ka hynriew tylli.Ka seng ADE, ka pyrshah jur ia katei ka jingleh niewbein jong ka sorkar Assam ia ki samla pule ka Jylla bad ka dawa na ka tnat ka koit ka khiah, ba kan pynbeit noh mar mar ia katei ka kam, namar ba ym don wat uwei u samla pule, uba la ai jaka pule ha kaei ka Jylla, ong ka kyrwoh na U Dalseng Bira Ch Momin, President ADE, Tura.
title: Kyntait ki kolej Assam, ban ai  pule doktor ia ki samla na Jylla

content: Nongstoiñ, 01 Nailur:Hadien 2 sngi jong ka jingiai buddien jong ka Dorbar shnong Tiehsaw ban wad ia ka kmie jong i khyllung i ba la shah bret ha kawei na ki jaka jong ka Dong Pengthlen; ki nongshong shnong jong ka Tiehsaw, mynta ka step ha ka por kumba 11 baje ei ei, ki la lap noh ia ka kmie kaba kha ia i tei I khyllung.Ka tyllong khubor na ki heh pulit jong ka District ka ong ruh ba ia katei ka kmie la tip kyrteng kum ka kong Shantidaris Khardewsaw 23 snem, kaba dei ruh na ka shnong Sohshynrut kaba don ha ka thain Rambrai West Khasi Hills District bad ia i khyllung la lah ban pynthikna ba I dei I khun kynthei.Shuh shuh ka tyllong khubor ka iathuh ruh ba katei ka longkmie ka dei kaba shu wan trei bylla ha kawei ka iing briew kiba na ka shong Tiehsaw bad hadien ba ki trai Iing ki la i pher ia ka rukom leh jong katei ka longkmie, ka la pynlong ruh ia ki ba kin suba jur bad pyrshang ruh ban tohkit bniah bad hadien pat kila pyntip noh sha ki bor pyniaid shnong jong ka shnong Tiehsaw.Na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong Tiehsaw hadien ba ka la pyndep ia ki ain shnong, ki la aiti noh ia katei ka longkmie sha ki pulit ka Nongstoiñ Police Station ban leh bad pyndep ka ki jingdonkam baroh ha kaba na ka liang jong ki pulit ki la dep ban register case ia katei ka longkmie katkum ka kyndon 318 IPC bad hadien bad hadien katto katne por ba la don ha kti jong ki pulit katei ka longkmie ka la lait jamin noh.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ia ka met jong i tei i khyllung la lap ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi Balang mynta ka taiew da ki nongshong shnong ka shnong Tiehsaw bad mynta na ka liang jong ki pulit ka Nongstoiñ Police Station ki dang pynlong ia ka jingthwet ia u shynrang khnang ban lap ia ki jingshisha baroh kaba wanrah ban poi shaduh u tei u pud.
title: Lap ia ka kmie, ba bret  khyllung ha shnong Tiehsaw

content: Shillong, 01 Nailur:Ym donkam eksa-min, ym donkam iathuh, tang shu peit da ki khmat, la ithuh bad tip ia ka jingpang bad kane ka la don ka sap kyrpang ha ka Kong Jngetsi Kharshandi kaba na shnong Kiem, kaba jngai kumba 5 km na Mawphlang, ka East Khasi Hills District.Ka Kong Jnget ka dei ka nongsumar Khasi kaba la ju sumar bad lah ban pynkoit bun ki nongpang ia ki jingpang ba bun jait.Ha ka jingiakynduh bad ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, ka la iathuh ba ka la ju sumar ia ki briew ba pang naduh ba kham khynnah bad ka la sdang ban mih shabar haba wan khot ki briew naduh u snem 2002.“Nga la ithuh bad tip ia ka jingpang tang shu peit da ka khmat. Ym donkam ban eksamin, ban iathuh”, la ong ka Kong Jnget.Haba kylli kum ka lah ban tip ia ki briew ba ki pang aiu tang da kaba shu peit da ka khmat, ka la ong ba kam tip hynrei ka don hi ka bor maian ha ka kaba lah ban tip bad ban ithuh ia ki briew ba ki don kano ka jait ki jingpang.“Ngam lah ban ong kumno nga tip bad ithuh ia ka jingpang jong u briew ne ka briew hynrei nga tip hi na ka jingtip ba nga lah bym sngew lah ban batai”, ka la ong.Ka la iathuh ba ka ai dawai Khasi bad ia ki dawai ruh la shu shna hi na ki kynbat ba la ioh na khlaw na btap bad ka shet bad sain ia ki.“Nga shet nga sain hi ia ki dawai ha iing da ki kynbat ba nga ioh na ka khlaw na btap’, ka la ong.Ka la ong ba ka jingsumar ia I khyllung ka long kaba donkam ia ka jingiatreilang ruh u longkpa. “U kpa ruh u dei ban wan shakhmat ban iashim bynta ha kaba sumar ia I khun”, ka la ong.Ka la buh jingkylli ruh la ka tnad Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS), ka la ju pynlong ne em ia ka jingjurip bad jingshim jingkheiñ ia ki khynnah ka jylla. .“Hato ka dei tang ka prokram na ka bynta ban sam jingbam, ban sam tiar lane ka don kano kano ka jingmih kaba bha ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshakri ia ka ICDS ia ki khyllung?”, ka la ong.Ka la kdew ba lada don ki jingduna, ka don em ka jingpynbeit ia kita bad ka tnad ka dei ban peit bha ia kane ka bynta ba kongsan khnang ban pynlong ia ka prokram kaba jop.
title: ‘Peit da ki khmat, lah tip ia  ka jingpang’, ong kong Jnget

content: Shillong, 01 Nailur:Ka jingmih ka seng sain pyrthei, People Democratic Party (PDF) ka la long tang ka jingpynpharia shuh shuh ia ki vote jong ki Khasi bad Jaintia bad kan nym pyntlot ia ki seng riewlum ha ka jylla.Ia kane la pynsngew da u nongialam ka KHNAM u Bah Batkupar Wahlang uba dei ruh u General Secretary ka seng, haba twad jingmut halor kumno u sngew, haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi.“Ka PDF ka dei ka seng ki la thaw da ki briew kiba phet seng na kiwei ki party bad ka jingmut ka PDF ruh ka mut ‘Phetwir Democratic Front”, la ong u Bah Batkupar.U la ong ba ki 12 ngut ki MDC bad u nongialam jongka, u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem ki dei kiba la phetwir na kiwei ki party kum na Congress, HSPDP, UDP bad na ka KHNAM.“Ka jingmih ka PDF kan ktah hi ia ki, ym ia kiwei ki party. U la buh jingkylli, shaei ka mat ka MUDA, VAB bad ki AD Rules ba ki la lah ban pyndep. Kine ki khlem poi shaei shaei ruh”, la ong u nongialam ka KHNAM.Katkum ka jingong u nongialam ka KHNAM, kine ki MDC kiba iathaw ia ka PDF ki dei ki riew shim kabu, namar ba ki phet na kawei ka seng sha kawei pat na ka bynta ka jingthmu jingmyntoi shimet.U la kynthah ruh ia u Bah James Ban Basaiawmoit uba jop na ka KHNAM bad u la phet ynda la jop, bad kane ka long thik kum ki khun jynrein.U Bah Batkupar u la ong ba ka la dei ka por ia baroh ki seng riewlum ba kin sngewbha ban iatylli noh tang hapoh kawei ka seng ha u 2022 ban pyniatylli ia ka jaitbynriew, namar ba lada ki dang iapait iapra, ka jingioh nong kan long ia kiwei pat ki party heh.”Ka jingmih bun ki seng riewlum ka pyntlot hi ia ki haba peit ia ka rekod naduh mynshwa”, la ong u Bah Wahlang.Lah ban kdew 12 ngut ki MDC kiba rung sha ka People Democratic Front (PDF) ki kynthup ia u Bah H. S. Shylla na Nongkrem, Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh na Mawkynrew, Bah L. G. Nongsiej na Nongstoin, Bah Morningstar Mawsor na Mawshynrut, Bah James B Basaiawmoit na Mawkhar, Bah James Sylliang na Mawhati, Kong Grace Kharpuri na Nongshken, Bah Latiplang Kharkongor na Nongthymmai, Bah Hadrian Lyngdoh na Mawkyrwat, Bah Blanding Warjri na Mawthadraishan, Bah Albinus Lyngdoh na Umroi bad Bah Victor Rani na Jirang ki la rung sha ka PDF ha kane ka sngi Balang ba la dep.
title: Ka PDF mut ka ‘Phetwir Demo- cratic Front’, ong ka KHNAM

content: Nongpoh, 01 Nailur:Ka jingiasoi kyrteng paidbah halor ka jingdawa ban pynkynriah kam noh ia u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi, u Ramesh Singh bad ia u Deputy Commissioner, u CP Gotmare, ka la iaid shaid shaid ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka Distrik, ha kaba da ki spah ngut ki briew kiba kynthup lang bad ki rangbah shnong ki la iasnohktilang ha kane ka jingiasoi paidbah ban dawa pynkynriah kam noh ia kitei ki arngut ki heh ka District.Lah ruh ban pynkynmaw hangne, dang shen ka la don ka jingialang paidbah ha Nongpoh bad ha katei ka jingialang la waniashimbynta ruh da arngut ki MDC kiba kynthup ia ka Kong Rona Khymdeit bad u Bah Donkupar Sumer, nalor kitei ki nongmihkhmat la wan iashnongkti lang ruh da ki nongialam sengbhalang kiba kynthup ia ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia & Garo People, Hynniewtrep Youth Council, Hynniewtrep National Youth Front, Ri Bhoi Students Union, Sumo Association, ki rangbah shnong lem bad ki longkmie longkpa na ka dong Ri Bhoi hi baroh kawei.Ha katei ka jingialang kaba la long ha Nongpoh, hapdeng ka jingiatai uwei hadien uwei pat haba iadei bad ka jinglong jingman ka shongsuk shongsain ha ka Distrik, hynrei ha kaba kut ki la shim ia ka rai ban dawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pynkynriah kam noh ia ki arngut ki heh ka Distrik bad kata ka long ia u DC bad SP.Haba iadei bad kane ka Signature Campaign, ka Kong Magret Rymbai, kaba dei ruh kawei na ki nongialam jong katei ka Komiti, ka la iathuh ba ia kane ka jing ia si kyrteng, la rai ban sdang naduh katei hi ka sngi kaba la pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah ha Nongpoh.Namarkata, hadien ba ngi la dep ban ioh lut ia baroh ka jingsoi na ki riew rangbah bad khamtam eh na ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba don ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jinglong jingman ha ka Distrik, kumta ia kane ngin sap hah sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Mukul Sangma, na ka bynta ban dawa weng mardor ia kine ki arngut ki khlieh ha ka Distrik.
title: Dawa pynkynriah ia u DC, SP  Ri Bhoi, da kaba soi kyrteng

content: Shillong,1 Nailur:Ka dak ka jingphet seng Congress u MLA ka Pynursla konstitwensi u bah Prestone Tynsong ka la nang paw pyrthei mynta bad katei ka dei lyngba ka jingleit kyrshan PDF u MDC ka Lyngkyrdem konstitwensi u bah Jansing Tynsong u MDC jong ka seng Congress. U bah Jansing u la leit ban kyrshan ia ka PDF mynta ka sngi.Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u bah Jansing u la ong ba katei ka jingleit kyrshan jong u ka dei ka jingsngewthuh shimet jong u hi, “Nga leit kyrshan da ka jingsngewthuh shimet jong nga hi, kam dei pat ba nga mih na ka Party, nga leit kyrshan ban wanrah ia ka EC kaba skhem ha KHADC” u la ong. U bah Jan u la ong ba haduh mynta u dang dei u MDC jong ka seng Congress. Katkum ki kyndon ba ka seng Congress ka ju leh ia kiba pyrshah seng, la sngewthuh ruh ba khlem pep ia u bah Jan katei ka seng kan pynshitom, haba kylli halor kane u la ong “Ka shong ha ka jingsngew dei ka Party aiu kan leh”.La kylli biang hato u la dep ia kren ne-em bad u MLA bah Prestone Tynsong halor katei ka jingpyrshah seng jong u, u ba hJan u la ong, “Nga khlem ia syllok ne khlem ia phylliew jingmut eiei hynrei nga shu pyntip ba nga leit kyrshan noh ia ka PDF, u MLA ruh u khlem ong eiei” ong biang u bah Jan. Da ka jingleit kyrshan u bah Jansing ka EC jong ka PDF ka la nangskhem shuh shuh mynta.
title: Leit kyrshan PDF, sa  uwei U MDC Congress

content: Shillong, 03 Nailur:Ki nonghikai hapoh ka lama ka Meghalaya SSA School Association (MSSASA) ki la kynnoh ba kane ka sorkar ka dei ka bym ler tam kaba thaw khana ha ka jylla namar ba kam don kawei ruh ba ka la jop khamtam ha ka pule puthi.Haba kren ia ka jingrakhe ia ka sngi ki nonghikai, kaban long ha ka 5 tarik, u President ka MSSASA, u Bah President Aristotle C. Rymbai u la ong ba kane ka sngi ka dei ka kabu ban burom ia ki kynthei bad ki shynrang kiba ai mynsiem ia ki khynnah ban sain dur ia ka lawei jongki.Haba pynlait khubor, u Bah Rymbai u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la ju niew tag ia ki kam jong ki nonghikai ha kum kane ka sngi hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ki nonghikai ha ki hap ban mih sha madan ban iakhun ia ki hok jongki.U la ong ba ka sorkar ka la dei ban kyndit bynriew noh ban peit ia ki jingeh jong ki nonghikai da kaba thaw ia ka Education policy kaba larkam.U la ong ba ka MSSASA ka la shim ia ka jingpyrta jongka ha kane ka sngi jong ki nonghikai, “Ieng ia ki nonghikai’ kaba mut ban kyrshan ia ki nonghikai ha ki kam jongki ban iada bad ban pynioh ia ki hok jongki.
title: Kane ka sorkar ka  bym ler tam, ong ki SSA

content: Shillong, 3 Nailur:U bah HDR Lyngdoh MLA ka Sohiong u la pyniasyriem ia ki nongkren pyrshah ia u kum ki ksew kiba wiar ia ki masi bam phlang, “Ki long kum kito ki ksew kiba wiar ia ki masi bam phlang, u ksew um ju bam phlang hynrei u dang bishni pat lada ki masi ki bam phlang” ong u bah HDr Lyngdoh ha ka jingialang pynkup burom ia ki samla pule kiba pass bha ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Them Rangshken ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew.U bah HDR u la ong ba ki don kiba leit pynshoi sha ki paidbah ba haba wan jingiarap ma u kim dei ban treh. “Nga lyngngoh balei ki peit khmat ia ki kam kiba kiwei ki trei haba ialade kim lah ban trei” u la ong biang.U bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba shuwa ba un long u nongmihkhmat jong ka Sohiong, katei ka konstitwensi ka long kum kato ka pynthor kaba sboh, hynrei kaba la shu ieh shrah khlem don nongrep khlem don nongsumar bad u la ong ba dei tad hadien ka jinglong MLA jong u ba ki kam pynroi ki la tuid sha katei ka konstitwensi, “Ym tang ha Sohiong ba nga la pynpoi ia ka roi ka par hynrei wat ha ka jylla ruh baroh kawei, ha ka por ba nga bat kum u myntri ka tnad PWD nga la wanrah ia ki By-Pass ha ka jylla kaba da ki klur tyngka” u la ong. Halor ka jingkwah ki seng riewlum ban pynrem ia u, u bah HDR u la ong “Ki briew ki kwah, ka rai pat ka shong ha u Blei, ngi ki Kristan ngi ngeit kumta, u paidbah u iohi hi ia ki kam kiba nga la leh, nga la aiti lut met bad mynsiem ban shakri ia ki paidbah” u la ong.Ha katei ka sngi, ka Congress Rangshken Area ka la ai khusnam ia ki samla pule jong katei ka thaiñ kiba la pass bha ha snem 2017 ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher naduh ka SSCL, HSSLC, Degree, Master Degree bad kiwei pat. Ha shuwa ba nsam khusnam u bah HDR u la plie ia ka ophis jong ka Congress ha Rangshken.Ha kane ka jingialang nalor u Bah HDR Lyngdoh la ia don lang da u MDC u Bah Lamphrang Blah, ki nongkitkam ka Sohiong Block Congress Committee ba kynthup ia u Bah Phrang Kharpran uba dei u President, u Bah A Sun uba dei u President ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong, u Bah S Mawlong uba dei u President ka Diengiei Dorbar Area, u Bah R Kharkrang, u Bah D Kharphuli, u Bah B Nongbri, u Bah K Kharphuli uba la pyniaid ia ka jingialang, u Bah P Langstieh uba dei u Secretary bad u Bah S Kharngi uba dei u President ka Rangshken Area Congress Circle ,ki nongkitkam ka Congress na ka liang ki longkmie, ki khynnah skul bad ki samla pule, ki paidbah na ki shnong ba marjan ka Rangshken bad kiwei kiwei.
title: U ksew um ju bam phlang, hynrei  u bishni ia ki masi bam phlang: HDR

content: Jowai, 3 Nailur:Hadien ba la mih ka kynrum kynram hapdeng ki paidbah nongshong shnong bad ki nongpyniaid ia ka skim bylla shispah sngi, na ka liang u Deputy Commissioner u la khot ban pynlong da ka public hearing ha katei ka shnong ha ka 6 tarik une u bnai ha iing Community hall ka dorbar shnong.Halor kane, ka FKJGP ka seng kaba la ujor sha u DC ha ryngkat ki katto katne ki paidbah nongshong shnong hadien ba ki la ioh ia ki jubab RTI na ophis ka BDO Thadlaskein, ka la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin poi sha katei ka public hearing khnang ba katei ka kynrum kynram kan shai paidbah.Ka kynrum kynram ka la mih ha katei ka shnong hadien ba la mih ka RTI report bad kumjuh ruh hadien ba ka kynhun ki nongshong shnong ki la ujor pyrshah ia ka jingbym ioh bainong bad kumjuh ka jingioh bainong ki katto katne palat ban ia kaba ki dei ban ioh.Kane ka la paw shai kdar lyngba kawei ka jobcard holder kaba la trei tang 28 sngi hynrei ka bai nong ka la rung pat sha ka bank Account jong ka palat 24 hajar tyngka.Na ka liang u Rangbah Shnong u ma SS Langi u la kyntait ba ka la don ka jingpyndonkam bakla bad leh shilliang ha kaba pyntrei ia katei skim hynrei kine kiei kiei baroh kin paw shai ha kane ka Public hearing.
title: Wer ka FKJGP, ban poi sha  ka jing pynsngew paidbah

content: Shillong, 03 Nailur:Ki nongialam na kane ka jylla Meghalaya kila shah khot ha ki nongialam ka BJP sha Delhi ban iakren ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon MLA kaban sa wan ha kane ka jylla.Kine ki dkhot jong ka State Core Committee BJP Meghalaya ki kynthup ia u President Bah Shibun Lyngdoh, u Vice President u Edmund Sangma, u General Secretary Bah Bashailang Khongwir, u Treasurer u Sarwan Jhunjhunwala bad ka Executive Member Ka Kong Bianca Kyndiah.Kine kin mih lashai ka sngi sha Delhi ban iakynduh ia u National President u Amit Shah, u National General Secretary u Ram Madhav, u Chairman ka NEDA u Himanta Biswa Sharma bad u Nalin Kohli ban iakren na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon ha kane ka jylla.
title: Her Delhi ki nongialam ka BJP,  ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon ’18

content: Shillong, 3 Nailur:Ki samla pule na ki kolej bapher bapher na kane ka jylla ki dang sahkut haduh mynta ha nongbah Delhi naba ym ioh Rel ban wan phai ïng. Kitei ki samla kiba don 12 ngut, 5 ngut shynrang bad 7 ngut kynthei bad kawei pat ka nongialam jong ki kaba dei ka nonghikai jong ka Kolej na Jowai ( ANO) ki la mih na Shillong naduh ka 4 tarik u nailar 2017 bad ki la leit sha Jammu and Kashmir. Na Jammu and Kashmir ki la leit sha nongbah Delhi bad hangtei ki la sah miet ha ka Republic Day Camp kaba la pynkhreh ia ki NCC. Katei ka jingleit jong ki ka dei kaba la pynbit pynbiang da ka National Integration Camp (NIC).Ka prokram jong ki la pynbeit ba kin mih na Delhi naduh ka 28 tarik u nailar hynrei la pynduh noh ia ka tiket Rel jong ki bad haduh mynta ki dang sahkut ha katei ka Republic Day Camp bad kim pat ioh jingtip satia lano kin ioh mih. Kitei ki samla ki dei na St.Anthony’s College, na St.Edmund’s College, na Shillong College bad na Sohra Government College. Kiba bun eh na kitei ki dei na Sohra Government College kiba don haduh 6 ngut 3 ngut kynthei bad 3 ngut shynrang.Haba ia kren bad u Rupang kitei ki samla ki la pynpaw ka jinglyngngoh ia katei ka jingsahkut sah jong ki ha nongbah Delhi naduh ba la wan phai na Jammu and Kashmir bad ki la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewsih namar ba ki la duh ban thoh ia ki Internal Eksam jong ki. Haba ia kren bad uwei na ki samla na Sohra Government College u la iathuh ba ka Eksam ka la sdang naduh ka 1 tarik u nailur bad haduh mynta 2 sobjek la dep iaid shakhmat bad lashai ka sngi ka 4 tarik u nailur kan don sa ka sobjek Economics. Kiwei pat ki samla na kitei kiwei pat ki Kolej ruh la iathuh ba ki la duh ban thoh ia ka Internal Eksam jong ki.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki-ki la ong ba ka Eksam jong baroh kan sdang naduh u bnai risaw bad baroh ki kolej ki hap ban pyndep lut ia ka Internal Eksam jong ki hapoh mynta u bnai. Kitei ki samla mynta ki don hapdeng ka jinglynga mynsiem bad ki la ong ba kim sngewthuh sngewthaw shuh lano kin ioh leit ïng naba shiphang ki ong lashai, shiphang ki ong la shisngi.
title: Sahkut ki khynnah NCC ha  Delhi, ym don Rel ban wan phai

content: Shillong, 05 Nailur:Ka Myntri ka tnad pule puthi ka jylla ka Deborah Ch Marak ka la ong ba kiba bun ki nonghikai ki bym pat pynbit ban long ki nonghikai ki dei ban pyndep noh ia ka jingpyntbit jongki bad ka sorkar ka la buh por khadduh haduh ka 31 tarik Lber 2019.Haba kren ha ka sngi burom ba 56 ia ki nonghkai ka ri, kaba long hynne ka sngi ha u Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong, ka Marak ka la ong ba don ki nonghikai kiba ong ba kane ka dei ka juk jong ka saian bad ka komputor hynrei katno ngut ki nonghikai kiba la biang ban hikai ia ka Smart Class, ia ka saian.“Ki nonghikai ki bym tbit, ki pynjot thiaw ia ka ri bad ka imlang sahlang”, la ong ka Marak bad ka la bynrap, “Haduh ka 31 tarik Lber 2019 baroh ki nonghikai ki dei ban pyndep ia ka jingpyntbit jongka ban long kiba bit ban long nonghikai bad kane ka dei ka kyndon ba la buh ka sorkar pdeng bad ka sorkar jylla”,.Ka la ong ba ka sorkar ka la kwah ban pynlong ia ki nonghikai bym pat ioh jingpyntbit ba kin long kiba tbit bad kiba biang ban long nonghikai bad ka la ailad khadduh ia kito ki bym pat pyndep ba ki dei ban pyndep ia kane shwa katei ka snem.Katkum ka jingpynmih jingpynbna ka sorkar, kito ki nonghikai kiba khlem kot sha ka 45 percent ka jingioh mark ha ka eksamin klas XII, ki dei ban ialeh ia ka eksamin biang ia ka eksamin bad ki dei ban kot ia ka 45 percent bad lada kim lah ban pyndep ia kane ka kyrdan, ki lah ban shah weng noh wat na ka kam.“Kane kan jingpynkhreh ba ki nonghikai ki dei ban pyntbit, ka la iaid shaid shaid”, la ong ka Marak bad bynrap, ‘ki nonghikai ki dei ban long kiba tbit kiba biang ban hikai ia kiwei namar ba lada ym ler ki nonghikai, ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew kam lah ban sei ia ki nongialam kiba tbit’.Ka la ong ba kane ka dei ka juk jong ka jingiakhun bad ka long kaba donkam ban pynrung ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat ia ki khynnah ba kin long kiba kloi ban iakhun bad kiwei ki jylla ba heh bad kiba la iaid shakhmat.“To ngin sa wanrah biang ia ka nam jong ka nongbah Shillong kum ka shlem jong ka jingnang jingstad kumba long ki por mynshuwa”, la ong ka myntri.Ka la ong ba wat tang ban pynlong ia ki nonghikai kiba tbit hynrei ka sorkar kan ialeh ruh ban pynbiang ia ka jingsiew kaba biang bad dang shen ka la pynkiew ruh ia ka tulop jongki wat hapdeng ka jinghiran pisa kaba jur.Kumjuh ka myntri ka la ong ba ka sorkar ka la ialeh shitom ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam ha ki skul bad ki rukom hikai naduh ka iing ka sem bad ki tiar ki tar.Ka la pynsngew ba ka kam nonghikai kam dei ka kam sngewbha hynrei ka dei ka kam kaba khia bad kaba dei ban kitkhia bha namar ba ka dei ka kamram ban saiñ dur ia ka lawei jong ki khynnah ban long ki rishot ba skhem ka ri.“Lymda ngi don ia ki nonghikai kiba la tbit bad aiti, kumno ngin lah ban sei ia ki khun dap shynrang ban long ki rishot ka ri”, la ong ka myntri.Ha kane ka sngi, ka myntri ka sam khusnam sha ki 13 ngut ki nonghikai ba ioh ia ka State Award, 3 ngut kiba ioh ia ka District Award bad 3 ngut kiba ioh ia ka khusnam Special Awards.
title: Bun ki nonghikai, ki bym  pat biang, ong ka Deborah

content: Shillong, 05 Nailur:Ka State Election Committee jong ka seng HSPDP, kaba la long mynta ka sngi kala pynbna sa ia ka thup kaba ar jong ka kyrteng ki kyrtong jong ka seng ki ban iakhun ha ka election MLA 2018.Ha kane ka thup kaba ar ka seng ka la pynbna sa ia lai ngut ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong.Na Mawryngkneng constituency la ioh da u Bah Blatsbor Kharpran, udei u riew rangbah na ka shnong Sohryngkham uba la shongthait na ka kam bank kum u Branch Manager jong ka Meghalaya Rural Bank.Na Mawkyrwat constituency ka leit sha u bah Bah Renikton L Tongkhar katba na Sohra constituency la ai ia u Bah Droistar Khongsti, udei u riew rangbah na katei ka constituency uba la trei ha PHE Mawphlang kum u Research Assistant tad haduh ka jingshongthait na ka kam.
title: U Bah Renik na Mawkyrwat, u  Bah Blatsbor na Mawryngkneng

content: Shillong, 5 Nailur:Ki tyllong khubor ki la iathuh ba mynta ki don kumba 6 ne 7 ngut ki MLA na kane ka jylla, kiba don ha nongbah Delhi ban ia kynduh ia ki nongialam jong ka BJP. La iathuh ba la synran ia kitei ki MLA da ki nongialam jong ka seng BJP nangne na nongbah Shillong. La iathuh ruh ba kitei ki MLA ki don kiba na ka seng Congress, ki MLA shimet bad na kiwei pat ki Party.Katei ka tyllong khubor kaba la ioh lum ka la iathuh ba haduh mynta ka miet ka jingiakren hapdeng ki nongialam ka BJP na Delhi kaba la donlang u Amit Shah ruh ka dang iaid shakhmat bad ym pat mih rai eiei. La ong ba katei ka jingialang kam dei shuh kaba nyngkong, hynrei shuwa kane ruh ka la don ka jingiakren hynrei kam pat poi sha kaba kut bad kitei ki MLA ryngkat ki nongialam ka BJP ki la don ha Delhi mynta la 4 sngi mynta.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ha ka 28 tarik u nailar mynta u snem u Vice President ka BJP na ka jylla Meghalaya u bah J.A Lyngdoh u la pyntip sha ki nongthohkhubor ba 2 ngut ki MLA na ri Lum Jaintia u ma Justine Dkhar bad u ma Robinus Syngkon ki la rung sha ka BJP, hynrei kitei ki 2 ngut ki la kyntait bad ki la ong ba ka jingiakren ka dang iaid hapdeng jong ki bad katei ka seng ha kaba ki la buh kyndon lada ka BJP ka lah ban leh ia ka jingdawa jong ki kin rung sha katei ka Party. Lah ruh ban pynkynmaw ba kitei 2 ngut ki la ia kynduh ia u President rangbah ka BJP u Amit Shah ha nongbah Delhi.
title: 6,7 ngut ki MLA ki ia kynduh ia U Amit Shah ha Delhi

content: Nongpoh, 6 Nailur:Shibnai tam hadien ba ki pulit ka Assam ki la leit ban pynsangeh jubor ia ka jingthmu ka shnong shnong Madang Umwang ban tei ia ka Iing Eri Silk, kaba la ioh jingiarap na ka tnat Sericulture ka sorkar Meghalaya, hynrei kat haduh kine ki sngi ia katei ka iing ri Khniang ym pat ym pat lah ban pyntrei, namarba kum ka shnong hi kam pat nud ban pyntrei namar ba ki tieng ioh shah kem ha ki Pulit ka Assam, lada pyntrei hadien katei ka jingpynsangeh.Haba pyntip sha ki Nongthohkhubor, u Bah Blikson Mukhim, Rangbah shnong ka Madan Umwang, u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingbymshimkhia da ki Bor Distrik ka Ri Bhoi, ban iakren lem bad kitei ki Pulit ka Assam, na ka bynta ban pyniaid beit noh ia ka jingpyntrei ia katei ka Iing ri Khniang.“Kum ka shnong hi ngim nud ban pyntrei jubor ia kane ka Iing ri Khniang khlem da ioh jingbit na ki Bor bahalor ka sorkar jylla, namar wat ha katei ka sngi kaba ki la wan pynsangeh ia kane ka jingthmu ban pyntrei ia kane ka Iing, ki Pulit ka Assam ki la byrngem ruh ban kem ianga lada ka shnong hi ka pyntrei hadien ba la pynsangeh” ong u Bah Blikson Mukhim.Nalor ba ngi dei ki nongshong ha ki thain khappud bad kaba kaba dang sahdien ha kiba bun ki liang, la ka long ha ka roi ka par bad ka jingnang jingstad ruh kumjuh, ha kajuh ruh ka por ka shem jingeh shisha iangi kiba sah ha kane ka thain, ba ngin leit ud leit nam manla ka por sha ki bor bahalor namar ba jynjar ka leit ka wan, pynban watla katta lada ka sorkar hi ka don ia ka mynsiem jingkitkhlieh, ka la dei ban wan jurip tang mar ia tip halor katei ka jingjia, hynrei sngewsih ba kat haduh kine ki sngi, ym pat don wat tang uwei ruh na ki briew sorkar kiba la wan ban jurip, la bynrap u Bah Blikson Mukhim.Namarkata, kane ka jingbym shimkhia da ka sorkar jylla haba don kino kino ki jingwan lehdonbor da ka Assam, ka la nang ai mynsiem pynban bad ha kaba kut hi, ngi ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba shong ba sah ha kane ka thain, ngin shu kylla long tang kum ki langknia hakhmat ki Pulit Assam bad ngi hap ban shu shah bad sngap kat ia kaba ki leh, u la bynrap.
title: 1 bnai la pynsangeh ki Pulit  Assam, ym pat jurip ka sorkar

content: Shillong, 06 Nailur:Ka BJP na Delhi ka la thung ia u myntri ka tnad sorkar pdeng ba peit ia ka tourism u Alphons Kannan Thanam, ba un peit ia ka kam elekshon ka party ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.U Thanam u dei u myntri ha kane ka sorkar u Narendra Modi uba long ruh u Khristan na jylla Goa. Kane ka jingaiti ka party ha une u Khristan ka long shi bynta lehse ba ka party kan khring ia ki paidbah Khristan ha kane ka jylla khamtam ba kane ka party ka la ther bha ha ki paidbah ba ka dei kaba shit niam.Haba pynlait khubor halor kane, u secretary ka BJP Meghalaya u Bah Bashailang Khongwir u la ong ba ka party ka la iakren ruh bad u president rangbah u Amit Shah ia ka jingpynkhreh ia ka elekshon ha kane ka jylla.“Ka party ka la iakren ia ka jingpynkhreh bad pynbeit pali ia ka jingwan jngoh u President Amit Shah ha nongbah ha ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai”, la ong u Bah Khongwir.Ha kajuh ka por, ki dkhot ka Core Committee ka BJP Meghalaya kynthup ia u President Bah Shibun Lyngdoh, Vice President u Edmund Sangma, u General Secretary Bah Bashailang Khongwir, u Treasurer u Sarwan Jhunjhunwala bad ka Executive Member ka Kong Bianca Kyndiah ki la iakynduh ia u Amit Shah, ba don lang u General Secretary u Ramlal, u Ram Madhav, u Himanta Biswa Sarma, Ajay Jamwal bad u Nalin Kohli.
title: Thung nongpeit ka BJP da u  myntri Khristan ha Meghalaya

content: Jowai, 6 Nailur:Wat lada u Rangbah shnong ka shnong Ummulong u la pyrshang kat lah kat iai ban buhrieh ia la ka pop, hynrei ka pop kam ju rieh bad ka la paw tyngkrein mynta ka sngi ha ka jingpynsngew paidbah, kaba la pynlong da ka bor district ha katei shnong ha kaba iadei bad ka rukom pyntreikam ia ka skim bylla 100 sngi lane ka MGNREGS.U ma SS Langi, uba dei u Rangbah shnong katei ka shnong u la pyrshang ban tep eitmiaw ia ki jingshisha kaba ki paid nongshong shnong ki la lap lyngba ka jingtip paidbah, da kaba pynshai sha ki kot khubor bapher bapher ban ialam bakla ia u paidbah hynrei kitei ki jingpyrshang jong u baroh ka la paw pyrthei mynta ka sngi.Ha ka jingsngew paidbah, kaba la pyniaid da u HH Mohrmen ha ryngkat ka jingiadonlang u ADC, DM Wallang bad ka BDO, Thadlaskein Block, u ma SS Langi u la hap ban kubur ba ka don ka jingbakla ha kaba iadei bad ka rukom siew bainong.“Ka dei ka jingleh u Secretary bad ki Sordar kiba peit ia ka jingtreikam ka skim na sha lyndet jong nga”, la thet kti utei u Rangbah shnong uba dei ruh u Chairman jong ka VEC.Ka VEC ha Ummulong, kam ju pyndap kyrteng ia ki jobcard holder haba ki wan trei, baroh ki Jobcard la shu set khop ha ophis treikam jong u Rangbah shnong, kam don ka register village Monitoring Committee, Minute Register, Gram Sabha Register, ka Bui siew bai nong ia ki nongbylla, nalor kiwei kiwei kiba dei bad don katkum ki kyndon jong ka MGNREGA.Ka jingsngew paidbah, ka la lap ba ka VEC ka la siew pisa sha bun ngut ki nong bylla, wat lada kim shym la trei bad bun ngut pat kiba wan trei minot kim shym la ioh ia ka bai nong. Ki Sordar bad u Secretary VEC ki la leit siew bai nong hi sha kito ki briew ki bym shym la wan trei.Kaba lyngngoh shuh shuh ka long ba ki don kiba wantrei tang katto katne sngi, ka pisa pat ka rung sha ka Bank Account jong ki da phew hajar bad hadien ba la dep sei ia kane ka pisa, la siew tang ia ka bai nong kaba tam pat la shim hi u ne ka Sordar bad VEC Secretary.Kawei ka longkmie, ka trei 28 sngi, ka pisa ka la rung haduh 24 hajar hapoh ka Account jong ka bad la sei noh hi tang shisngi hadien.“La siew ia nga tang 4000 hajar, 20 hajar pat la shim hi u Secretary”, la phla katei ka longkmie. Ia kane la pynshisha ruh lyngba ka jingtip paidbah, kaba la ioh na ophis jong ka BDO, Thadlaskein.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka kynrum kynram, na ka liang u ADC u bah Wallang, u la ai por shi taiew ia ka VEC ban pynbiang ia ki jingkhien jingdiah baroh bad ban ia pynbeit ia kane ka kynrum kynram.“Kane ka dei ka Act, ngim lah ban shu sngap ngin hap ban leh da kaba tyngeh ia kito kiba pyndonkam bakla ia kane ka skim”, la ong u bah Wallang.Na ka liang ka BDO ruh ka la ong ba kan pynlong ia ka jingialang ha ka Sngi Saitjain ha katei ka shnong ba kan bishar bad pynbeit ia baroh ki jobcard namar katkum ka RTI, la lap ruh ba kawei ka longing ki don haduh 3 -5 tylli ki jobcard.U Rangbah shnong ka shnong u la ujor, ia kito kiba ioh bai nong khlem wan trei bad ka jingkylli ka long balei ba um ai jing ujor, ia kito ki nongsiew bainong kiba dei ki nongkitkam ka VEC.Ka VEC ka la shu thep iaka pisa shapoh ka Account jong ki jobcard holder tang ban ioh ia bhah pat iaka pisa ynda la sei ia ka napoh Account.Na ka liang ka FKJGP kaba la trei borbah ban iarap ia ki paid nongshong shnong ka Ummulong, ka la pynpaw ba kam pat hun satia ia ka rai jong u ADC namar ki nonglehkam thok shukor ban bam klop ia ka hok u paidbah ki dei ban shah ia ka jingpynshitom jong ka ain.U President ka FKJGP-JHD Unit, u ma Tuesday Lytep u la ong ba ka seng kan sa bud dien shuh shuh sa kiwei pat ki jingtrei hapoh katei ka skim ha kane ka shnong namar ka don ruh ka jingsuba ba ka don ka jingpyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthied ia ki tiar ki tar bad kiwei kiwei ki mar kum u Mawria, u Shyiap.
title: Paw tyngkrein ka bamsap, na ka  skim MGNREGS ha Ummulong

content: Shillong, 06 Nailur:Ki samla na Meghalaya ba shah kyntait ban pule doktor MBBS ha ki jaka pule ha Assam, kila ong ba kin ap ia ka rai ka Supreme Court ka ban long ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai.Haba iakren bad uwei na ki samla ba iakynduh ia kane ka jingeh, la iathuh ba kim pat shim ia kano ka lynti ban iaid namar ba kin hap ban ap ia ka rai na ka Kashari.“Ngin ap ha ka 11 tarik ia ka rai ka Supreme Court bad ngin sa pyrkhat kumno ban leh”, la ong u samla Iaisanbha Synrem mynta ka sngi.Ki don 10 ngut ki samla ba shah kyntait ha ki medical college ha Assam halor ka jingkam ba ka sorkar Assam ka la pynduh ia ka bhah ka Meghalaya mynta u snem.Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la ujor sha ka Supreme Court halor Kane ka jingjia da kaba kam ba ka Assam ka la pynkhein ia ka jingiateh naduh mynshwa.Hynrei na ka liang, u Myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma ula kyntait ba ka don kum kata ka jingkyntait ia ki samla na Meghalaya bad ula kam ba ka sorkar Assam kam don jingtip satia.Katkum ka jingiathuh kine ki samla, ki bor pyniaid ka Assam kila pynduh ia ka bhah ka Meghalaya namar ba ka Assam ka pynbun ia ka bhah pule doktor ia ki OBC kiba don ha Assam.
title: Ap ki samla MBBS, ia ka Supreme Court

content: Shillong, 6 Nailur:U nongialam ba la rim bha ka seng HSPDP uba ju don ryngkat ha kti hakjat u bah Hopingstone Lyngdoh (Bam kwai ha dwar u blei) u bah Enbin K Raswai u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkyndit mar ia iohi ha ki kotkhubor ba ka seng HSPDP ka la ai tiket ha u bah Renikton Lyngdoh ban ia khun na katei ka seng ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 na Mawkyrwat konstitwensi. “Da kaei u bah Renik u pyntreikam, ngam tip satia, hynrei kam long shuh kaba ia hap ba ki heh spah kin shu ïuh roit ia ngi ki paidbah” ong u bah Enbin haba ia kren bad u Rupang lyngba ka phone.U bah Enbin u la ong ba ka HSPDP na Mawkyrwat ka la phah ia ka kyrteng jong u sha ka CEC ka HSPDP ban long u kyrtong MLA 2018 na Mawkyrwat konstitwensi, “Hynrei ngam tip ki leh kumno, ka aplikeshon jong u bah Renik kam don, tang ka Party ruh um pat rung, ha ka Primary Unit ruh um long dkhot, la shu pdiang burom ia u da u bah Ardent tang ha lyer” ong biang u bah Enbin.Utei u nongialam ka HSPDP u la kynnoh ba ka jingai tiket sha u bah Renik ka dei ka jingleh donbor marwei hi u President rangbah ka HSPDP u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit ha kaba u la ong “La pynkheiñ ia ka riti synshar jong ka seng kaba ju iaid beit iaid ryntih baroh shi katta, ia u kyrtong ngi ju shim ia ka rai na ki Primary Unit hadien ngi phah sha ka Area Unit, hadien sha ka CEC bad ka CEC sha ka Election Committee hynrei ym shym la iaid satia kumta, la shu rai donbor tang da u bah Ardent marwei, ka jingleh donbor u bah Ardent hapoh ka Party HSPDP kam shym dei tang ia nga marwei” u la ong.U bah Enbin u dei u MDC barim jong ka Mawkyrwat uba la don da ki phew snem hapoh ka seng HSPDP hapoh ka jingialam jong u bah Hoping bad haba kren ia ka jinglong doh longsnam jong u hapoh ka HSPDP u bah Enbin u la ong “Ia ka HSPDP ha Nongkrem ruh nga la leit thaw hi ma nga, nga burom bha ia u bah Ardent haduh katta katta, hynrei ia nga pat u la ïuh haba biang”. Haba la kylli kaei ka rai jong u nangne shakhmat u bah Enbin u la ong ba un hap ban ia shong pyrkhat bad ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong u hynrei u ong ba la sngewthuh lypa ba ki HSPDP na Mawkyrwat kim hun kim suk satia ia katei ka jingleh ki bor bahalor ka HSPDP.”Nga ieh beit ha ka rai u paidbah , lada u ong ban iaid shakhmat ngan iaid, baroh ki la lyngngoh u bah Ardent u khot ia kren tang ia ka kynhun u bah Renik ia nga pat um khot ia kren satia” ong bah Enbin. U bah Enbin u la ong ba mynta ruh u don hapdeng ka met ka bym khlaiñ “Imat ioh dei na kata ne u ibeiñ” u la pynkut.
title: “Da kaei u bah Renik u pyntrei  kam, ki heh spah ki shu ïuh roit”

content: Shillong, 6 Nailur:Hadien ba ka seng Congress ka la pynduh pyndam ia kiba bun ki Block jong ka, ba kynthup ia ka Pynursla, ka Umroi, ka Nartiang, ka Mawkyrwat bad kiwei mynta pat katei ka seng ka la beh seng ia u President jong ka Nongstoiñ Block Congress Committee u bah Albinus Kharbani.Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u bah Albinus Kharbani u la ong ba ka daw ka jingshah beh seng jong u, ka dei namar ba u kwah ban pan tiket ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018, “Hynrei u Gabriel Wahlang u la tieng lypa ia nga, u la beh seng ha ryngkat ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut bad u Mukul, u la ong ba ia ka kam President dei ban bat hi da u kyrtong, ngam pat ju iohsngew ba kan long kumta shawei” ong u bah Albinus.U bah Albinus u la ong ba katei ka jing beh seng ia u, ka dei la katto katne sngi mynshuwa. U la ong ba da katei ka jingbeh seng ia u, ka Congress ha Nongstoiñ ka la pra phum, “Nga la don hapoh ka seng Congress da ki phew snem, hynrei mynta ka Congress ha Nongstoiñ kan ym poi shano shano ruh” u la ong. Katkum ka jingong utei u rangbah u la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ka la don bha ka jingkyrmen ia ka seng Congress ha Nongstoiñ hadien ka jingmih u bah L.G Nongsiej bad u bah Diosstar Jyndiang kiba dei na kajuh ka seng hynrei da katei ka jingbeh seng ia u da ki hajar ki paid nongkyrshan ka Congress kiba ju ia don bad u kin mhi noh na katei ka seng.Shuh shuh u bah Albinus u la ong ba haduh mynta u dang ia shong ia pyrkhat bad kiba bun ki paralok jong u kiba ju ia don ryngkat hapoh ka seng Congress la un mih shakhmat ban ia khun ha u 2018 ne kin leit ban kyrshan noh ia uno uno u kyrtong u bym dei na ka seng Congress. “Haduh mynta ngam pat shim ia kano kano ka rai , nga hap ban ia rai lang bad ki paidbah kiba ju ia donlang bad ngi, la ngan ia khun ne yn leit ban kyrshan ia kino kino ki kyrtong” ong u bah Albinus Kharbani.
title: Twa ka Congress sa ha Nongstoin, beh seng ia U President Block

content: Shillong, 08 Nailur:U Lamphang ka iing dorbar u AT Mondal u la ong ba um pat ioh jingthoh eiei na ka sorkar jylla ba ka la donkam ban khot ia ka dorbar jong ka jylla.Haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u Mondal uba don sha Garo Hills, u la ong ba haduh mynta, kam pat don kano kano ka jingpyntip na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ba ka la donkam ban khot dorbar bad halor kane, u dang ap na ka sorkar shwa ban khot ia ka dorbar kaba lah ban long ka dorbar khadduh jong kae ka samoi treikam ka jinglong MLA ba mynta shwa ban leit ban pan biang ia ka bor na u paidbah.“Ngam pat ioh jingthoh eiei na ka sorkar jylla. Katkum ka rukom ka sorar jylla ka dei ban ai jingthoh sha u Lamphang ba un khot ia ka dorbar”, la ong u Mondal.Haba kylli ba katkum ka rukom,ka dorbar dei ban khot man ka hynriew bnai hynrei halor kane, u Lamphang u la ong ba ka la don ruh ka dorbar kyrpang ha u bnai ba hynriew. Ha u bnai Jylliew ba la dep, ka sorkar ka la donkam ban khot ia ka dorbar kyrpang ban pas ia ka Goods and Services Tax (GST). Ha kane ka dorbar ka la pdiang bad pas ia kane ka ain lum khajna thymmai kaba la treikam naduh ka 1 tarik Naitung ba la dep.Hynrei wat katta, u Lamphang u la ong ba un sa bishar ia kane ka kam ynda ula wan sha Shillong ha kane ka sngi nyngkong ban wan.
title: Ngam pat ioh jingthoh na ka sorkar  ban khot dorbar, ong u Lamphang

content: Shillong, 7 Nailur:Ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBOSE) ka la pynbna sha baroh ki skul, ki kolej kiba ia don bynta bad kaba baroh ki hap ban kot sha ka 50% ha ka jingiakhun ia ka eksamin jong ka Board bad lada kim lah ban kot sha katei ka Percentage yn ym ithuh shuh ia ki kum ki dkhot jong ka MBOSE. U Executive Chairman u Pravin Bakshi u la ong ba katkum ka MBOSE Regulation for Affiliation (Chapter iv.2i), baroh ki skul ne ki kolej kiba hap hapoh ka MBOSE kin hap ban ioh 50% ha ki eksamin jong katei ka board. U la ong ba ha kine ki 3 snem ba la dep kiba bun ki skul ki kolej kim shym kot ia katei ka 50% bad u la ong ba nangne shakhmat baroh ki skul ki dei ban pynioh ia katei ka percentage bad lada kim lah, ka board kan leh ia kaba donkam kaba lah ban weng noh ia ka jingithuh ia ki.
title: Yn ym ithuh shuh ka MBOSE, ia ki skul ba duna 50%

content: Nongstoiñ, 07 Nailur:“Ha ka por ba u bah Hoping u dang don, bun ki bym sngap ia ka jingkren ka jong u, hynrei ki ia rkhie bein ki leh phoi bad bun ruh wat kiba phet seng, hynrei ha kaba kut ha u 2015 ki sdang ban phai sha ki nongrim ki jong u, la ha ka khyndew ka shyiap, ki khlaw ki btap, ki um ki wah, ka rwai ka siaw ka riam ka beit bad mynta ki sdang ban iaroh biang ia u namar u don ia ka nongrim ba skhem” ong U Bah PN Syiem Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills District Council.U CEM, ula kren ia katei ha ka jingialang jong ka Rambrai Area Development Forum, ha kaba la pynlong ha phyllaw jong ka iing Dorbar, Khlieh Iew Rambrai.“Haba nga wan ha ki thain West Khasi Hills, nga hap ban sngew nguh bad ai jing iaroh ia u nongialam u ba la leit noh u bah Hopingstone Lyngdoh, ia ki nongrim kiba skhem ban ia da ia ka jing long kyrpang jong ngi ki trai shnong” ong u CEM haba kren ha kajingialang.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba baroh shi katta ha ka por ba u bah Hoping u dang don bun ki bym sngap ia ka jingkren ka jong u hynrei ki ia rkhie bein ki leh phoi bad bun ruh wat kiba phet seng, hynrei ha kaba kut ha u 2015 ki sdang ban phai sha ki nongrim ki jong u, la ha ka khyndew ka shyiap, ki khlaw ki btap, ki um ki wah, ka rwai ka siaw ka riam ka beit bad mynta ki sdang ban iaroh biang ia u namar u don ia ka nongrim ba skhem hynrei u la ong pat “Lada ngim lah ban bud thik ia ki nongrim u Maieid ym myntoi ban shu iaroh politiks”.U CEM u la iathuh ruh ba ha ka por ba ioh jinglaidluid ka Ri India ki Hima khasi ki ia kren shaphang kumno ban pynneh ia ka jinglong kyrpang ha ka Annex Agreement ba ki Hima Khasi, ki ia soi ka long ban pynneh ia ka jinglong kyrpang ba ki ain na ka sorkar India kin nym lah ban khniot ia ia ka District Council bad ia kitei ki dulir la thep noh ha ka 6th Schedule khnang ba kan long ha ka ain bad mynshuwa la sngewthuh shai ha ka por ba ki dang don ha Assam ka bor jong ka District council ka khlain bha ba tang u Governor u lah ban pyllait ia ki ain ba teh ba khum jong ka ri India, hynrei haba la ioh ia ka Jylla la khniot noh ia ka District Council da kaba wanrah ia ka 12A.“Kaba sngew tynnad ka long ba ngi la pyrshah katba lah ban pyndon kam ia ka bor jong ka KHADC ha ki ba bun ki jingialeh ha kine ki sngi, wat la ka sorkar ka pyrshang ban khniot da ka bor jong ka, hynrei kaba la buh ha ka constitution kin nym lah ban shu weng kumto” ong biang u CEM.Ha katei ka sngi nalor ki nongialam shnong bad ki nongialam ka RADF ba kynthup ia u bah BI Nongsiej kum U President, la donlang ruh u MDC ka Mawshynrut, MDC ka Mawkhar bah James Bansaiawmoit , ki riew rangbah bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Ha ka por U Bah Hoping, bun ki bym  sngap bad ki rkhie bein: Pynshngain

content: Shillong, 07 Nailur:Ka UDP ka la sngew iahap ia ka jingjer kyrteng ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ba ka PDF ka mut ‘Phetwir Democratic Front’, namar ba ki MDC kiba iasoh bad ka, ki dei kiba phet bad kylla tdong na kawei ka party.Haba kren sha ka ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi, u President ka UDP u Dr Donkupar Roy u la ong, “Nga sngew iahap kumba ong ka KHNAM ha ki lad pathai khubor ba ka dei ka Phetwir (PDF)”,.U President ka UDP, ula ong ba ka PDF ka la thied lut ia ki MDC da ka pisa ba ai ka sorkar pdeng sha ka District Council.“Ki thied ia ki MDC jong ngi da ka pisa ka sorkar pdeng kaba ki ioh T. 133 klur”, la ong u Dr Donkupar.U la bynrap, “Kito kiba kyrshan kiba iasoh bad ka, ki ai pisa ki ai skhim shibun katba ia kito ki bym kyrshan, ki pynduh skhim, ai malu mala”,.Ka UDP ka la ther ia ka PDF da kaba ong ba tang ia ka kam MDC ruh kim lah ban leh katkum ka bor ba la pynkup bor da u paidbah, kumno pat kin shakri ia u paidbah.“Ia ka bor ba la ai u paidbah kum ki MDC ruh kim pat lah ban leh, kumno kin shakri ia ki paidbah”, la ong u Dr Donkupar.Dang shen, 12 ngut ki MDC ka KHADC kiba phet na kiwei ki party ki la iasoh bad ka PDF kynthup ia u Bah H. S. Shylla na Nongkrem uba phet na UDP, Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh na Mawkynrew uba phet na Congress, Bah L. G. Nongsiej na Nongstoin na HSPDP, Bah Morningstar Mawsor na Mawshynrut na HSPDP, Bah James B Basaiawmoit na Mawkhar na KHNAM, Bah James Sylliang na Mawhati (Ind), Kong Grace Kharpuri na Nongshken na HSPDP, Bah Latiplang Kharkongor na Nongthymmai na KHNAM, Bah Hadrian Lyngdoh na Mawkyrwat na UDP, Bah Blanding Warjri na Mawthadraishan na HSPDP, Bah Albinus Lyngdoh na Umroi na Congress bad Bah Victor Rani na Jirang na Congress.
title: PDF, ka mut “Phetwir Democratic  Front” ong U President UDP

content: Shillong, 7 Nailur:Ka Shilliang Wahshala Local Taxi Driver and Owner Association ha ryngkat ka Shiliang Wahshala social Welfare Organisation lam bad ki Rangbah Shnong bad ki Rangbah Dong jong ka thain hi baroh ba kynthup ia ka Umsawli, Mawlong Saisiej, Mawkynring, Lumskeh, Lumdiengsai, ka FKJGP, KSU bad ki Seng Samla jong ka thain ki la mih paidbah ban maramot ia ka surok ka ba la jot rathai jong ka thain Shilliang Wahshala.Ka Organizing Committee jong ka Shilliang Wahshala Local Taxi Driver and Owner Association ka la lah ban pyniaid beit iaid ryntih ia kane ka prokram, ka sngew ban ai ka jingkhublei bad ka jing sngew ba kyrpang ruh ia ki hynniew Rangbah shnong jong kane ka thain hi baroh kiba lah long kloi ban ia tynrong lem ha ka ba iadei bad kane ka mat maramot surok kaba kum ki paidbah jong ka thain hi baroh ki la mad jingeh.U President ka Association u Samla Ashening Don Nongbri, u la ong ba ha ki snem ba la leit noh, kine ki hynriew Rangbah Shnong ki kynduh ia U Engineer PWD bad ka seng, ka pynher ia ka shithi shaduh u myntri ba dei peit ia ka tnad PWD Road.Kaba pyn lyngngoh shuh shuh, ka long ba ka jingmaramot ia ka surok ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ba ladep, ym shem la lah ban pyndep satia bad ka daw ba la ioh pdiang ka long na ka jingjur palat u slap kaba la ioh jingtip ba ia ka jing maramot, la phiah ha la ki jong ki jong ki contractor bad ka paw ba ka jingjulor palat mynta ka long na ka jingshimsting jong ki contractor ka PWD.
title: Mih paidbah ki nongniah Taxi,  Rangbah Shnong ban maramot surok

content: Shillong, 07 Nailur:Ka UDP ka la pynbna ia ki 28 ngut ki kyrtong mynta ka sngi kynthup 18 ha Khasi bad Jiantia Hills bad 10 ngut ha Garo Hills.Ki kyrteng kiba la mynjur da ka State Election Committee (SEC), kiba la pynbna ha kane ka thup ba nyngkong jong ka Khasi bad Jaintia Hills ki kynthup u Bah Moonlight Pariat na Jowai, Bah Kyrmen Shylla na Khliehriat, Kong Rona Kymdeit na Nongpoh, Donkupar Sumer na Umsning, Bah First Force Deki Ramsiej na Umroi, Embhahlang Syiemlieh na Mawlai, Bah Bindo M Lanong na East Shillong, Bah Joe Marwein na North Shillong, Bah Paul Lyngdoh na West Shillong, Dr Jemino Mawthoh na Nongthymmai, Bah Olan Suin na Mawsynram, Dr Donkupar Roy na Shella, Bah Titossterwell Chyne na Sohra, Bah Metbah Lyngdoh na Mairang, Bah Brolding Nongsiej na Mawthadraishan, Bah Remington Pyngrope na Mawkynrew, Bah Savio Iawphniaw na Mawshynrut, bad Bah Pius Marwein na Ranikor.Katba na Garo Hills ki long Kharkutta Luderburg Ch Momin, Arun N Marak na Songsak, Bartush R Marak na Rongjeng, Mahamsingh M Sangma na Williamnagar, Pillarson G Momin na Raksamgre, Kabul A Sangma na Selsella, Utpal Arengh na North Tura, Pallab D Arengh na South Tura, Nidhuram Hajong na Mahendraganj bad u Nimarson Momin na Salmanpara.Kine ki jaka ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hills ki don kiba ka UDP ka la iasei kyrtong lang bad ka HSPDP kum na Mawthadraishan, ka Sohra, ka Mawshynrut, ka Mawkynrew. Ka HSPDP ka la dep pynbna ia ka thup ki kyrtong kham mynshwa.Ia kiwei ki jaka ba dang sah yn sa pynbna kham hadien, la ong u president ka UDP u Dr Donkupar Roy.U Dr Donkupar u la ong ba ka Sub Committee ka UDP kan sa pyndep ia kane ka kam ban pynbna ia ki kyrtong ha kiwei ki jaka bym pat pynbna ha kine ki sngi ban wan.Haba kren halor ka jingialeh lang ha ki katto katne ki jaka hapdeng ka UDP bad ka HSPDP, u Dr Donkupar u la ong ba namar ki daw, la rai ban ia buh kyrtong lang ha ki katto katne ki jaka bad ka jingialeh lang kam dei ka jingiakhun paralok hynrei ka dei ka jingiakhun da ka buit.“Ka donkam ban don ka jinglen lade haba iatreilang na ka bynta ka jingjop”, la ong u Dr Donkupar.U la ong ba ka jingmih noh jong ki nongkitkam ka party kum ka Mylliem, ka long kaba sngewsih hynrei ka party ka hap ban ieng na ka bynta ki paidbah ba bun.“Ngi la don ka jingialang bad ki longkmie ka thain Mylliem bad ki pdiang arti arjat ia ka jingiateh paralok bad ka HSPDP”, la ong u Senior Working President ka UDP u Bah Bindo M Lanong.U Bah Lanong u la ong ba ha u snem 1984 ruh, ka la don ka jingiateh paralok hapdeng ka HSPDP bad ka APHLC bad ha katei ka por, ka jingiakhun paralok ruh ka don ha Mawkyrwat bad ha Ranikor, hynrei ka jingmih ka long ba ki seng riewlum ki jop bun bha ha utei u snem.
title: Baroh ki MLA UDP, ki ioh  tiket, ha ka thup ba 28 ngut

content: Shillong, 08 Nailur:Ka jingthmu ka KHADC kaba la dep rai kham mynshwa ban phah tang kawei ka dorkhas sha ka sorkar pdeng bad ka sorkar jylla halor ka jingpynkylla ia ka riti synsharka ri, kam shym la urlong ha kaba ka jingialang mynta ka sngi,ka la rai ban ailad ia kiwei ki kynhun seng ba kin phah hi ia ka dorkhas jongki ruh sha ka sorkar.Ka sorkar pdeng ka la pan jingmut halor ka jingthmu ban pynkylla ia ka Sixth Schedule (Amendment) Bill, 2012 bad ka Draft Constitutional (123 Amendment) Bill, 2015 ban pynkylla ia ka Article 280 ka riti synshar ka ri bad ka Sixth Schedule.Ka jingialang mynta ka sngi, ka la rai ban ailad ia ka Meghalaya Indigenous Tribal Constitutional Rights Movement (MITCRM) ba kan nang phah iaka dorkhas ha ka sorkar pdeng tangba ka dei ban ai kopi lang ia ki sha ki Autonomous district councils (ADCs) kiba don ha ka jylla.Ha ka jingshisha kaba long ha ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai, u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem u la ong ba la rai ban phah tang kawei ka dorkhas sha ka sorkar pdeng halor kane ka bynta da kaba shim ia ka jingai jingmut jong baroh ki kynhun.“Namar ba ka jingpynkhreh ia ka dorkhas da ka Meghalaya Indigenous Tribal Constitutional Rights Movement (MITCRM) ka la jan dep lut, ka lah ban nang aiti ia ka dorkhas sha ka sorkar pdeng tangba ki mat ki dei ban iahap bad ka dorkhas ban sa pynkhreh da ki district council”, la ong u Bah Pynshngain haba kren hadien ba lawai ka jingialang mynta ka sngi.U Bah Pynshngain u la ong ba ka dorkhas ka MITCRM kaban phah sha ka sorkar, dei ruh ban ai kopi lang sha ki ADCs khnang ba kin lah ban pynlum ia ki shwa ban phah pat sha ka sorkar pdeng bad ka sorkar jylla.“Ngin shim ia ki mat ba ba la pynkhreh da ka MITCRM bad kiwei ki kynhun ha ka dorkhas ban phah da ki ADCs”, u la ong.U la ong ba ki mat jingdawa ne dorkhas ban phah da ki district council bapher bapher ha ka jylla bad jong ki seng ne kynhun ki dei ban long kumjuh ym ban iapher na kawei ia kawei pat khnang ba ka sorkar kan iohi ba baroh ki jingdawa kin long kumjuh khlem kano kano ka jingiapher hapdeng ka dorkhas kiADCs bad ki kynhun seng.Ha kane ka jingialang, ka KHADC la don lang ki sengbhalang kum ka KSU, FKJGP, HYC, GSU, u Deputy CEM ka GHADC, ki ophisar na JHADC, ki nongialam ka Synjuk Ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Bri u Hynniewtrep (SNSBH) hynrei kam shym la khot ia ki seng sain pyrthei.Kham mynshwa u Bah Pynshngain u la ong ba ki kwah ban leit aiti ia ka sha sorkar pdeng tang kawei ka dorkhas bad ban ioh ia ka jingmut kaba biang ka donkam ia ki kynhun ban pule bha ia ki kyndon shwa ba kin ai ia ka jingmut jongki.U la ong ba ka donkam ban pule ia ka Annexed Agreement namar ba ka don jingiadei bad ka Sixth Schedule.
title: Khlem long ban phah rai,  tang kawei ka KHADC

content: Shillong, 7 Nailur:Ka ktem jong ka seng Congress na Mairang konstitwensi ka lah ban pra ha ki khyndiat sngi ki ban wan, naba la sngewthuh ba ka don ka jingiaknieh tiket kaba jur bha hapoh katei ka seng.Haduh mynta la iathuh ba ki don haduh kumba 4 ne 5 ngut ki rangbah kiba kwah tiket bad kitei ki kynthup ia ka Dr.Eureka Lyngdoh, u bah Councellor Wahlang, nangta u khun jong u bah Kitdor Syiem u bah Lawan Pynshngaiñ War, nangta la ong ba u don sa u bah Boldness Nongum kumjuh u kyrtong MDC uba la shah rem tang da 70 vote ha ka elekshon MDC shiteng samoi u bah Lambok Nongrang.Katkum ki khubor ba la ioh lum la sngewthuh ba ka seng Congress ha Mairang ka don arliang kawei ka dei ka kynhun jong ka Dr.Eureka bad u bah Counsellor, katba kawei pat ka dei ka kynhun jong u bah Boldness, Lambok, Lawan Pynshngaiñ bad la iathuh ba ha kane ka kynhun ki 3 ngut u donlang ruh u bah Lawrence Basaiawmoit.Katkum ki lad khubor la iathuh ba ka kynhun jong kitei ki 3 ngut kim kwah shuh ban ia pan tiket bun ngut, naba ki la ioh jingtip ba ka MPCC ka kham noh sha ka liang jong ka Dr.Eureka bad u bah Counsellor, hynrei la ong ba haduh mynta ki dang ia pynbeit para ma ki iano ban phah. Shuh shuh la iathuh ba ka kynhun jong kitei ki 3 ngut ki kwah ban phah ia u khun jong u bah Kitdor (MLA barim ka Mairang) u bah Lawan Pynshngaiñ War, hynrei la ong ba katei ka kam ka dang sah hapdeng ka jingiakren bad ka jingiapynbeit, hynrei la sngewthuh ba lada kam poi sha ka jingiabeit ka Congress ha Mairang kan pra phum.U Bah Rasor Rani President jong ka Mairang Block Congress Committee, haba iakren bad U Rupang, u iathuh ba haduh mynta, kim pat don ki kandidet kiba thep kyrteng sha u bad ula ong ruh, ba ka por ruh ka dang biang hi, namar ka tarik, kaba khadduh, kan dei ha ka 4tarik Risaw 2017. Haba la kylli, da une u nongthoh, la ula ioh khubor ne em, ba ki don bun, kiba kwah ban pan tiket na ka seng Congress, U bah Rasor, u ong “Nang bun nang biang” bad ula kren ban biang, ba um pat ioh jingtip bha, namar ba u dang shu shimti ia katei ka kam ruh, dang shitaiew mynta bad ula pynsngew ba un sa peit, ia ki kam ki jam ha ki khyndiat sngi ban sa wan.
title: Lah ban pra ka ktem Congress sa  na Mairang, bun kiba kwah tiket

content: Shillong, 8 Nailur:Uwei u koidi ( UTP) uba la tip kyrteng kum u Everlin Shadap Manner (40snem karta) u la khlad ha Civil Hospital, Shillong. Utei u koidi u dei uba la shah kem ha Jowai PS namar ka jingdonkti ha ka kam thmu pyniap briew bad la set ia u ha District Jail , Jowai. La pyndep ia baroh ki jingdonkam bad ki pulit ki dang tohkit.
title: Khlad u koidi ha Civil

content: Shillong, 8 Nailur:Kawei ka thuk thuk kaba don ia u nombar ML-05M 4358 ba la niah da u Obert Nadon (29 snem karta) bad kawei pat ka Scooty ba don ia u nombar ML 05K 4582 ba la niah da u Vicky Lamurong (31 snem karta) ka la kylla ha 7 Mer, Upper Shillong. Baroh 2 ngut ki nongniah bad uwei pat uba shong hadien ka thuk thuk ki la mynsaw bad la pynkit sha Civil Hospital, Shillong.
title: Kylla thuk thuk ha 7 Mer

content: Nongpoh, 08 Nailur:Halor ka jingkylla bih ka Wah Umtrew ha Byrnihat, kaba la pyniap ia ki phew hajar tylli ki dohkha dohpnat, hynrei ka long pat kaei kaei kaba lyngoh, ba ia ka daw tynrai jong ka jingkylla bih, katei ka wah ym pat ioh kaiphod kat haduh kine ki sngi.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ha u Bnai Iaiong mynta u snem katei ka Wah Umtrew kaba la iaid lyngba ia ka shnong Byrnihat, ka la kylla bih kynsan bad ha katei ka jingkylla Bih jong katei ka Wah, ka la wanrah ia ka jingiap eh da ki hajar tylli ki dohkha kiba don ha katei ka Wah.Ka long ruh ba jingshisha ba ha katei ka sngi, wat na ka liang ki Bor Distrik ka Ri Bhoi, ha ryngkat bad kiwei ki tnat sorkar kiba kynthup naduh ki Bor Pulit, ki briew na ka Fisheries, Forest lem bad ki nongialam ka FKJGP, ki la hiar mardor ban leit jurip ia katei ka Wah tang mar ia tip ba ka la kylla bih.Lah ruh ban pynkynmaw hangne, u C.P Gotmare, DC ka Ri Bhoi, haba kren sha ki Nongthohkhubor ha katei ka sngi, u la ong ba haba iadei bad katei ka jingkylla bih jong katei ka Wah, yn sa phah Eksamin bad ha katei ka Sngi, u la ong ruh ba u la dep ruh ban btah ia ka tnat Pollution Board ba ka hap ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah, ha kaba u la byrthen ruh da kaba ba kat kiba donkti ha katei ka kam kin sa ngat ha ki jingpynsajia kiba katkum ki kyndon Ain, la ka long ia ki Karkhana kiba pyntuid ia ki jaboh sha katei ka wah ne la ka dei da ka jingwieh dawai bih da ki runar.Haba u Nongthohkhubor, u la pyrshang ban wad jingtip lyngba ka Fisheries ha Ri Bhoi, ha kaba la ioh jingtip ba na ka liang ka tnat Fisheries hi, ka la dep ban phah lut ia baroh ki jingdonkam sha ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board na ka bynta ban Test halor katei ka jingkylla bih katei ka Wah, hynrei kat haduh kine ki sngi kam pat lah ban ai ia ka kaiphod bad ia ki daw tynrai kiba la pynlong ia ka jingiap jong kitei ki dohkha ha katei ka Wah.Namarkata, ka jingkylli kaba mih hangne ka long, hato ka dei namar ka jingbymshimkhia da ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board ban tohkit na ka bynta ban lap ia ka daw tynrai jong ka jingiap ki dohkha ha katei ka Wah.
title: Shiteng snem ym tip daw, ba kylla  bih ka Wah Umtrew ha Byrnihat

content: Nongstoiñ, 08 Nailur:Hadien ba ka Hima Myriaw Syiem Ship ka la dep ban tei ia u mot sah kynmaw halor jong u lum Raid Mawthadraishan na ka liang jong ka Hima mynta ka sngi kala ioh ban plie pyrda noh ia u tei u ia kaba la tei ruh ba un long kum uwei na ki jaka peit kai (View Point) halor u tei u lum u bala bna nam.Ia u tei u mot sah kynmaw bala tei da ka Hima Myriaw la wan ban plie da u CEM ka KHADC, u bah PN Syiem ha ryngkat ka jingiadon lang u bah L. G. Nongsiej Chairman ka KHADC, u bah B. B. Warjri MDC ka Mawthadraishan, u Paiem ka Hima Mawiang, u Acting Syiem ka Hima Myriaw u Aiborlang Singh Syiem, u bah B. L Nonglait Sordar ka shnong Lawdisai, ki mynrti ki lyngdoh ka Hima, ki khun ki hajar bad ki wei ki wei.Haba ai jingkren kum u kongsan u bah P. N Syiem u la ong ba ka jingthung ia u Aiborlang Singh Syiem kum u Acting Syiem ka Hima Myriaw kam shym long kaba lehnoh ei, namar ba la iohi ba ka Hima ka smat ban trei kam, namar lada ki hima kim long kiba smat kan wanrah ia ka jingbym beit ha ki rukom treikam namar ia ka Ri Khasi ka jong ngi la sain dur ha ka synshar ka khaddar ha ka iit ka Hima na ka Riad na ka Shnad na ka shnong ka thaw bad lada bakla ka Hima bakla ka shnong.“Kalong kaba shisha ba ka jingleh sting ka jong ngi ha ka jaka ban pynkhlian ia ka 6th Schedule kaba dei ka bor jong ki khun ki hajar ngi pyntlot bor lyngba ka jingwanrah ia ka 12 A-a hapoh ka 6thSechledule, namar ban pynneh pynsah ia ki riti ki dustur ia ka long trai muluk trai jaka ha ka khyndew ka shyiap ha ka bishar ka khaddar ha ki um ki wah ki khlaw ki btap dei lyngba ka 6th Schedule” ong u CEM.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba watla hapdeng kiba bun ki jingeh kiba ngi ia kynduh ngi dang don ka jingkyrmen namar katba ngi dang don ki shnong ki thaw dang don ki iit ki Hima hynrei tang ka wei kaba don kam ka long ban long ka jingiatylli hapoh ka Hima tylli ha ki shnong ki thaw ha ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew na ka bynta ban iada ia ka la shai jong ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew.Ha katei ka sngi la ioh ruh ban aiti ia ka dorkhas sha u CEM da u secretary ka HimaKwelshon Syiem, kiba la kdew ia ki ba bun ki bynta ban pyni tynnad ia u tei u lum khnang ban khring shuh shuh ia ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei bad ban pkie lad ruh ia ki khun ka Hima ban ioh lad kamai lyngba ki kam jngoh kai.La pynshit pynsngain ia katei ka prokram da ki jingrwai na ka skul UP School Lawdisai, la ioh ruh ia ka jingrwai na u bah Armstrong Thongni ia kaba ka jing rwai kala kdew ha kaba iadei bad ki syiem bad ki daloi bad kumjuh ruh kaba iadei bad ka 6th Schedule.
title: Plie ka Myriaw ia u mot sah kynmaw

content: Shillong, 8 Nailur:Ka jingthmu jong ka Khun Kynthei U Hynniewtrep Association ( KKUHA) ban khynra kyiad ha ïewduh ka la pulom noh namarba kiba bun ki dukan kiba ju die kyiad be-aiñ khamtam ki Restaurant ki la khang lypa shuwa ba kin poi bad don ruh kiba la lum la lang lut ia ki kyiad shuwa ba ki dkhot katei ka seng kin poi. Katei ka seng ka la sdang ia ka jingkhynra kyiad naduh ka por 5 baje janmiet bad ka la sdang shuwa na Splendid Restaurant hynrei hangtei kam shym lap eiei, bad nangtei ka la iaid ter ter sha iew sha ki dukan kyndong ba shong ki Khasi bad hangtei ki la ioh ban kurup kyiad tang khyndiat litar na ki ar tylli ki dukan bad katto katne ki biar bad kyiad phareng. Katei ka seng ka la iaid kylleng ka iew ban khynra ha ki Restaurant hynrei ka la lap ba ki Restaurant kiba ju shongshit hui hui hai hai ki la khang lut.Haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor ka President jong katei ka seng ka kong R.Jyrwa ka la ong “Ngi lyngngoh balei mynta ka sngi ki Restaurant ki khanglut, man ka sngi ki shongshit hui hui hai hai hynrei mynta ki khang, kiwei pat kiba plie ruh ngim lap eiei ki la buhrieh lut” ong ka kong Jyrwa. Ka la iathuh ba shuwa ban khynra katei ka seng ka la pan jingbit na u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills bad la ia pynbeit ruh ba kin leit ryngkat bad ki briew napoh ka tnad Excise, “Ngi la ap ia ki Excise naduh ka por 4 baje hynrei kim wan, haba ngi leit hi ngi lap ba ki dukan ki khang, nga suba ba dei beit ki Excise kiba ai jingtip lypa sha kitei ki dukan die kyiad be-aiñ, dei ka jingdonkti lang jong ki , imat ki ioh eiei” ong biang ka kong Jyrwa haba iathuh ba katei ka jingiapynbeit kam shym dei kaba la tip lypa mano manor uh hynrei tang ki nongialam katei ka seng bad ki Excise.Watla katei ka seng ka la ioh ban kurup kyiad na ki katto katne tylli ki dukan hynrei ka la ong ba katei ka jingleit khynra ka la pulom bad kam long kaba seisoh satia namar ka jingjah rngai ki briew na ka tnad Excise. “Ngin ym shongthait ngin dang iai khynra beit na ka por sha ka por bad nangne shakhmat ngin ym pyntip shuh ia ki Excise, ngi la duh jingshaniah, ngi hap ban iaid da kawei pat ka lynti” ka la ong.
