Katei ka longkmie ka la ong ba ka jingsangeh khynra mynta ka sngi ka dei namarba ki briew jong ka aiñ kim shym la donlang bad lada iaid tang da ka seng ka lah ban mih ruh ka huri hura, “Wat tang mynta ruh ki dkhot jong ngi ki la shah tim da ka sih da ka sang ha ki nongdie kyiad, shen ngin leit khynra biang” ong ka kong Jyrwa kaba la iathuh ba katei ka dei ka jingleit khynra kyiad kaba lai jong katei ka seng hadien ba la ioh bun ki jingujor na ki paidbah ba ka jingdon kitei ki dukan die kyiad be-aiñ ka wanrah ia ka jingbym itynnad bad ka jingsheptieng ia ki kynthei khyllung khynnah ban iaid ha iew.
title: Pulom khynra kyiad ha ïewduh, kynnoh ba pyntip ki Excise sha ki dukan kyiad

content: Shillong, 8nailur:Mynta ka sngi ki nongialam bad ki dkhot jong ka UDP Mylliem konstitwensi ki la khylliap lama noh ia katei ka seng bad ki la leit ban pyniasoh sha ka seng saiñpyrthei ba thymmai -ka PDF. Ka UDP na Mylliem ka la leit sha ka seng PDF ha ryngkat ka jingialam jong u nongialam jong ki u bah Hamlet Dohling u ban sa ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 na Mylliem konstitwensi na ka seng PDF.Ha katei ka jingialang u bah Hamlet ryngkat ki nongialam kiba don ha ka kynhun jong u bad kumjuh ruh ki nongialam ka PDF ki la ther tyngeh ia u MLA ka Mylliem u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh bad ia ka MDC jong katei ka konstitwensi ka kong Teilinia Thangkhiew halor ka jingwan kyntur pud ka MUDA sha ki thaiñ Upper Shillong naduh Lawsohtun. U bah Hamlet u la ong ba ha ka por ba u bah Ronnie um pat long myntri sorkar u la pyrshah bha ia ka jingwan kyntur pud ka MUDA bad u la kren sha ki kotkhubor ha u 2015 bad hadien ba u la long myntri sorkar u la ong ba lada ka MUDA kam sangeh ia ka jingkyntur pud sha ki thaiñ ka Upper Shillong un hiar shuki myntri bad un risaiñ ruh na ka kam MLA. “Hynrei kam shym la long kumta kumba u MLA u la kren, bah Ronnie kam lei lei phi la thok ia u paidbah, ha u 2018 u paidbah un pynhiar shuki noh ia phi” ong u bah Hamlet Dohling haba kren ha katei ka jingialang. U la kynnoh ruh ba ka jingpynpaw ka MDC ka Mylliem ba ka pyrshah ia ka jingwan kyntur pud ka MUDA ka dei tang ka buit shim kabu ba la jan ka elekshon.U bah Stephan Lyngdoh Nongbsap Adviser UDP uba long ruh u Rangbah Shnong ka Umlyngka haba kren halor katei ka phang u la ong dei na ka seng HSPDP ba ka MUDA ka la wan kyntur pud sha ki thaiñ Upper Shillong, “Ki mih na Madan Malki sha Secretariat ban pyrshah MUDA hynrei haba la poi Secretariat ki la shah pynbiej ha u Mukul ,tip ioh ki ioh pisa ruh ne, ka MDC ka ong ba ka pyrshah MUDA hynrei ngi tip ba ki kyrshan ia ka MUDA” ong u bah Stephan. U bah Airi Kharpuri dei ka seng HSPDP kaba lum jingialang ha madan Malki ban tur sha Secretariat hapoh ka jingialam u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit, Pyniaid Sing Syiem bad kong Teilinia Thangkhiew ba ka MUDA ka ioh wan tur sha Upper Shillong.Katba uwei pat u nongialam ka PDF u bah H.S Shylla u la ther tyngeh ia u MLA ka Nongkrem u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit bad kumjuh ruh ia u MLA ka Mylliem u ba hRonnie V Lyngdoh halor ka jingwan kyntur pud ka MUDA sha ki thaiñ Upper Shillong bad kumjuh ruh sha ki thaiñ ka Nongkrem konstitwensi. U la ong ba ka thong ba nyngkong eh jong ka PDF lada ka wan ha ka bor synshar ka long beit ban pynwai noh ia kane ka jingkyntur pud ka MUDA.
title: Da ka ishu MUDA ther ka PDF ia u MLA bad MDC ka Mylliem “Bah Ronnie phi la thok, u paidbah  un pynhiar shuki ia phi ha u 2018”

content: Shillong, 8 Nailur:U bah Hamlet Dohling u nongialam barim ka UDP uba dang shu dep risaiñ na katei ka seng u la ong ba ka UDP ka la pynbiej ia u thik kumba wan pynbiej ka UCIL ha ka por ia khih Uranium ha u 2007. U la ong ba ha katei ka por ia khih Uranium ka UCIL ka la wan thong da ki klur tyngka ia u (General Secretary KSU ha kato ka por) bad kumjuh ruh ia u President ha katei ka por u bah Samuel Jyrwa hynrei kim treh. “Hynrei ngim treh, ka UDP ka la pynbiej ia nga da kaba ong ba kan ai da ka kam Chairman hadien ba ka la wan ha ka bor synshar, ngam treh-lada ngan pyrkhat ialade shimet ka kam Chairman ka la biang ia nga hynrei shaei une u paidbah ba bun un leit, ngam kwah kam Chairman ngan kwah pisa” ong u bah Hamlet ha ka jingialang mynta ka sngi kaba la long ha Umlyngka ha kaba la khylliap lama noh ia ka seng UDP ha Mylliem konstitwensi.Haba kren ha katei ka jingialang kaba don da ki spah ngut ki dkhot ka UDP kiba la leit ban pyniasoh sha ka PDF u bah Hamlet u la ong ba marsien shongthait na ka kam nongialam ha ka KSU ha u 2012, u la leit rung sha ka seng UDP bad tang 8 bnai u la ioh por ban ialap elekshon na ka bynta ka elekshon MLA 2013, “Ha katei ka por nga la ioh 6067 vote ha ka elekshon MLA, ha ka MDC nga la ioh 7000 tam, naduh u 2012 haduh mynta ki paralok UDP kiba ia donlang bad nga ki ia don ;lang haduh mynta ruh, uwei ruh um khih” u la ong. U bah Hamlet u la ong biang ba nalor kitei ki nongkyrshan jong u kiba la don lypa la wan ruh ban pyniasoh sa ki katto katne ngut ki radbah na ka seng Congress bad HSPDP kiba um pat kwah ban pynpaw pyrthei ia ka kyrteng jong ki.Utei u nongialam barim ka UDP u ban sa kylla long u kyrtong jong ka seng PDF na Mylliem konstitwensi u la ong ba um ju poi pyrkhat ba un mih noh na ka seng UDP ha ka jingim jong u, “Naduh u 2012 nga da angnud bad nga thmu ban ia khun na ka seng UDP, ngam ju poi pyrkhat ba ngan mih noh na ka UDP hynrei ka jingkwah jong u briew ka ia pher na ka plan jong u blei, u briew u plan ban iaid sha kawei ka lynti u blei pat u ong iaid da ka lynti ban poi sha ka thong” u la ong biang. Ha katei ka jingialang ba la khylliap lama noh ia ka UDP ha Mylliem nalor ki nongialam ba hakhmat u bah Hamlet kiba don kumba 300 ngut tam, la don lang ruh ki nongialam ka PDF ba kynthup ia u President u bah Aibanlum Marbaniang, u General Secretary bad 2 ngut ki MDC u bah James Ban Basaiawmoit ka Mawkhar bad u bah H.S Shylla ka Nongkrem nalor kiwei pat ki nongialam.Ha katei ka jingialang u bah Stephan Lyngdoh Nongbsap Rangbah Shnong jong ka Umlyngka uba dei ruh u nongialam ba hakhmat jong ka kynhun u bah Hamlet Dohling uba ju bat ia ka kam Adviser hapoh ka seng UDP u la ong ba ka jingleh ka UDP ka sah ha ka dum ka lyngngoh namar khlem ia syllok khlem ia kren bad khlem da ia shai para seng la shu rai donbor beit ban ai ia ka Mylliem ha ka seng HSPDP. “U President u Dr.Donkupar Roy u la leh lyndet khlem jingiakren shai, u la iaid napoh napoh bad u la iaid arsap” ong u bah Stephan.
title: Pynbiej ka UDP da ka kam Chairman,  kumba tyrwa pisa ka UCIL: Hamlet  Khylliap lama ia ka seng UDP ha Mylliem konstitwensi

content: Shillong, 13 Nailur:Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) ka la khot hajir ia ki MDC jong ka seng Congress ha JHADC mynta ka miet ha nongbah Shillong. La iathuh ba katei ka hajir ka dei halor ka jingkwah ki MDC Congress ban pynhap noh ia u ma Thombor Shiwat na ka shuki CEM bad ha ka jaka jong u ban wanrah da u bah Arbor hima Darnei MDC ka Sutnga-Saipung uba bat ruh mynta ia ka kam Chairman ka JHADC. Haduh ba thoh ia kane ka khubor ym pat shym la ioh jingtip ia ka rai jong katei ka jingiakynduh ki MDC Congress bad ki heh MPCC.Hynrei ha shuwa ia kane ruh la iathuh ba ka la don ka jingkhot ka MPCC ia ki MDC Congress ban ia kren halor katei ka phang hynrei la ong ba kam poi shano shano ruh naba u ma Thombor u dang ioh ia ka jingbun paid na kiba bun ki MDC jong katei ka seng hynrei mynta la iathuh ba ka don ka jingkhih biang da kaba kynnoh ba u ma Thombor u ia sylla pohrieh ia ka seng Congress. Ia katei ka jingkhot hajir ia ki MDC Congress la iathuh ba dei lyngba ka ripod ba u MLA ka Jowai u Dr.R.C Laloo sha ka MPCC lyngba ki jingujor u President ka Jowai Block Congress Committee.La iathuh ba ka dawbah ba mih katei ka jingjia ka dei namarba ka la don ka jingkynnoh ba u Ma Thombor Shiwat u dei u briew jong u bah Sniawbhalang Dhar MLA ka Nartiang bad ha jowai konstitwensi pat la ong ba u ma Sniaw u la pynieng da u kynum lajong ha u 2018 ban ia khun pyrshah ia u R.C Laloo bad hangtei ka la mih ka jingkynrum kynram hapdeng ka Congress Jowai bad u ma Sniaw bad katei ka ktah lang sha u Ma Thombor Shiwat. La iathuh ruh ba shuwa ia kane ka la don ka jingiasylla ki MDC bym dei Congress ha JHADC ban pynhap noh ia ka seng Congress na ka bor synshar ha JHADC bad ban wanrah da kawei pat ka EC ba thymmai kaba ki la mir jingmut ban ialam hi da u ma Thombor Shiwat.
title: Khot hajir ka MPCC ia ki MDC Congress ka JHADC

content: Shillong, 13 Nailur:Ngi la thmu ban pyntreikam ban pyniaid kali da ka e-challan ban shain kuna ia kiba pynkhein ia ka ain niah kali.U SP ka East Khasi Hills u Davies NR Marak u la ong ba kane ka jingthmu jong ki pulit ban pyndonkam da ka e-challan ka long ban pynthikna ba bunsien ki paidbah ki shah kynnoh ba ki pulit ki bamsap da kaba shu shain kuna ia ki kali.“Ngi dang pan jingiarap na ki bank ha kaba yn pyndonkam da ka swiping card ban don jingiadei bad ka mobile”, la ong u SP.U la ong ba ia mynta kane ka kam ka dang don ha ka jingthmu bad ym pat lah ban ong lano ban pyntreikam namar ba dang ap ia ka khubor na ka bank ha kano ka dur ka lah ban shna ia kine ki swipe card bad hadien kane, yn sa shna ia ka software da ka National Informatic Centre (NIC).“Lada shain kuna iano iano, kiba niah pynkhein ia ki tnad pyniaid kali, yn sa rekod online”, u la ong.Katkum ka jingong u SP hadien ba la lah ban pyntreikam ia kane, yn sa lah ban peit bad peitngor ia ka jingioh kuna na ki kali man ka sngi na ki 7 tylli ki tnad pyniaid kali ba don ha ka nongbah Shillong.
title: Yn pyntreikam ka tnat pulit  Shillong da ka e-challan ia ki kali

content: Shillong, 13 Nailur:Ka Meghalaya Upper Primary School Teachers Association (MUPTSA) State Level, ka ai ka jing pynshai ia baroh ki para Nonghikai MUPSTA ha ka jylla baroh kawei haka ba ia dei bad ka class XII 45% marks bad ka D.EL.Ed prokram, kaba long kat kum ka National council of Teachers Education (NCTE) Norm bad ka Right to Education (RTE) Act 2009.Katei ka seng, ka pynshai, ba ki Nonghikai ba la thung ha shwa ka 3tarik Nailur 2001, kim don kam shuh ban dang ialeh ia ka D.El.Ed prokram, hynrei ki lah ruh ban ialeh lada ki dang sngew kwah bad ki nonghikai ba la thung hadien ka 3tarik Nailur 2001, kin hap ban ialeh beit ia ka D.El.Ed. ha kaba ki dei ban pass ia ka klas XII ha ka 45% marks (ST/SC) bad 50% (General).Ki Nonghikai ba la pyndep ia ka klas XII bad ki ba ioh duna ia ka 45% marks (ST/SC) bad 50% (General) ruh ki lah ban ialeh ha ka D.El.Ed prokram bad ha kajuh ka por ki dei ban ia leh biang ia ka klas Xii, ban ioh pat 45%(ST/SC) bad 50% (General), katba ki nonghikai ba la pyndep ia ka Graduation ne Master Degree ruh ki hap beit ban ialeh D.EL.Ed bad ki dei ban ioh pat 45%(ST/SC)bad 50% (General) ha ka klas Xii. Lada kim ioh ia ka tei ka percentage marks, ma ki ruh ki hap ban ia leh biang Ia ka klass Xii ban ioh ia kitei ki marks kiba donkam.Ki Nonghikai ba la pyndep ia ka jingleit pyntbit, kaba shi snem ne ar snem na Government Normal Training School (GNTS) Sohra /Tura bad na ki District Institute of Educational Training (DIET) ka jylla baroh kawei bad kum juh na kiwei kiwei pat ki Training Center /Institute, kim don kam shuh ban ia leh D.El.Ed bad lada kitei ki Nonghikai kim kot pat ia ka 45%(ST/SC) bad 50% (General) ha ka klas XII, ma ki ruh kin hap ban ia leh sa tang ia ka klas Xii ban kot ia kitei ki marks, kiba donkam.Ki Nonghikai bala pyndep tang ia ka matriculate ne SSLC, kin ym lah satia ban ialeh D.El.Ed bad kam don satia kano kano ka jing pynbeit na ka bynta jong ki, katba ki Nonghikai ba la pyndep ia ka B.Ed kim don kam shuh ban ia leh ne register D.El.Ed, hynrei ki hap ban ia leh pat ia ka special Training /Course (Bridge Course) ka ba tang hynriew bnai, ha ka Center/Institute ba la ithuh da da ka NCT,bad katei ka jingpule, kan sdang hadien ka 9tarik Risaw 2017.Ki Nonghikai kin hap ban pynrung kyrteng, ha ka NIOS portal bad ka tarik ba khadduh, kan long ha ka 15tarik Nailur 2017 bad ka bai rung, ka longT.4555na ka bynta ki (ST/SC)bad T.6000 na ka bynta ki General bad ki nonghikai ki bym don ia kitei ki kyrdan kat kum ki kyndon jong ka NCTE Norm bad RTE Act 2009, kin shah pynduh kam noh hadien ka 31tarik Lber 2019.
title: Kiba la pyndep ia ka Master  Degree, ki hap ialeh eksamin biang

content: Nongstoiñ, 13 Nailur:Mynta ka sngi, ha kapor kumba 4 baje ei ei mynstep, ka la don ka jingjia pluh iing kaba shyrkhei kaba la jia hapoh jong ka Iew Rambrai bad ha katei ka jingjia pluh iing haduh saw tylli ki Iing kiba don Rngi Lower Iew Rambrai, ki la ingkhong khait hadien ba ka ding, ka la ioh ban bam duh lut ia kitei ki iing bad ki jingdon jingem baroh.Kat kum ka tyllong khubor ka iathuh ruh ba ha katei ka jingjia pluh iing, ym shym la don kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih ne ka jingmynsaw jong ki mynsiem briew lait noh tang ka jingiing khong jong ki iing bad ki jingdon jingem ha kaba ka jingjulor la antad ba kala kot sha ki bun phew lak tyngka.Shuh shuh ka tyllong khubor bala ioh ban lum ka ong ruh ba katei ka jingpluh jong kitei ki iing ka la sdang na kawei na ki kamra jong jong kitei ki iing kiba don mar syndah ha kaba ki nongsah ha katei ka kamra, kim shym la don namar ki la leit shnong naduh ka jan miet jong ka sngi ba ar ka taiew hynrei ym shym la tip ha kano ka rukom ka pynlong ba kan kem ding.Kitei ki saw tylli ki Iing kiba la pluh bad ingkhong ki kynthup ia ka iing jong ka kong Jewistnorian Marbanniang ha kaba ka jingjulor kala kot sha ki 2 lakh 75 hajar, ka iing jong u Shripsing Wahlang ha kaba ka jingjulor kala kot sha ki 3 lak san phew san hajar kynthup ruh ia ki tiar iing tiar sem, ka iing jong u Lastar Lyngkhoi ia ka kaba la pyndon kam kum ka dukan shna jingshana (Furniture) ha kaba kajing julor kala kot sha ka 5 lak 70 hajar kynthup ia ki tiar ki tar bad ka iing jong u bah Maianlang Nongphud, ba la shong wai pat da ki ar ngut ki briew bad ka jingjulor kala kot sha ki 2 lakh 6 hajar tang ka iing katba ki tiar ki tar ki ba dei jong u nongsah wai u bah Dros Syiem ka jingjulor kala kot sha ka 48 hajar tyngka bad sa ka wei pat kumba 70 hajar kaba dei tang ki tiar iing tiar sem jong u bah Khainslep Lyngdoh u ba dei u nongsah wai ha kajuh katei ka iing.Hadien katei ka jingjia la ong ba ki paidbah kila pyntip noh mar mar sha ki pulit pynlip ding ka Nongstoiñ (Nongstoiñ Fire Service) ha kaba mar mar ki pulit, ki la hiar sha katei ka jaka ha kaba ki la lah ban iarap lem na ka bynta ban tem noh ia ka jingklang jong ki thyllieh ding kaba la pyllait ruh ia ki ba bun ki wei pat ki iing kiba don ha katei ka jaka na ka jingma.
title: Bam duh ka ding, 4 tylli ki Iing ha  Iew Rambrai julor bun phew lak

content: Shillong, 13 Nailur:U nongshna bad nongpynmih phlim Bollywood, u Karan Kashyap u la wan sha nongbah Shillong ban ring ia ka phlim jong u, kaba kyrteng ka Keh Do Na bad u kwah ba ia katei ka phlim, yn ak hi da ki briew na kane ka jylla bad ka jingring ia katei ka phlim jingieit ruh kan dei beit tang ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad khyndiat eh ha nongbah Mumbai. Utei u nongring phlim un sdang ban wad aktor aktress na kane ka jylla da kaba pynlong da ka jingjied, ka ban sdang naduh ka 27 tarik u risaw bad ia ka jaka yn sa pyntip. U Kashyap u la ong ba u aktor u ban lamkhmat ha katei ka phlim jong u, un dei na Mumbai katba ka actress pat kin wad na Meghalaya bad baroh ki nongak kin dei hi na Meghalaya.U Kashyap u dei uba la pynmih ia ka phlim Six Hour With Terrorist, ka Zindegi Jalebi, ka Twister bad kumjuh ka phlim Duniya khatam ho rahi Hai. U la ong ba ka jingkwah jong u ban ring ia ka phlim ha Meghalaya ka dei namar ba u kwah ban kyntiew ia ka put ka tem bad ka shad tynrai jong ki briew kane ka jylla. U la ong ba u donkam 3 kynhun ki nongrwai nangne. Na bynta ka Keh Do Na u Kashyap u la ia treilang ba u nongshna phlim na kane ka jylla u bah Kitbok Kharmalki uba la shna ia ka phlim Dak Bangla.
title: Wad aktress na Shillong ban  ak ha ka phlim Keh Do Naa

content: Shillong, 14 Nailur:“Kum u Myntri Rangbah nga tip ia kaei kaba jia bad nga tip ki leh ia kaei, kata ka dei ka jingkhlain ka party bad da kaba pynshong nongrim halor kane, ngi leh ia kaba donkam”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah u Mukul Sang-ma haba kylli shaphang ki MLA ka Congress, kiba thmu ban phet noh.U la ong ba ka seng, ka la tip bha ia kito ki MLA kiba la don ka jingmut sniew kumno ban pynsniew ia ka seng, da kaba phet sha kiwei pat ki seng.U la ong ba ka jingthmu jongki ban leit sha kawei pat ka party ka long ban ioh bam ia ki lyngkha ba kham jyrngam hynrei ki dei ban sngewthuh ba ki paidbah kin hap ban bishar ia ki.“Ki kwah ban leit sha ki lyngkha ba kham jyrngam ban pynjah sliang ia ka jingthngan jongki hynrei nga tip ki paidbah ki la ngiah ia kum kane ka jait jingleh jongki”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U Myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka seng, kam lah ban ailad ia kum kine ki briew kiba thmu ban pynsahkut ia ki kam pynroi da ka buit arsap jongki.“Ka dei ka kamram ban peit ia ki briew kiba don ka jingmut sniew ban phet sha kiwei ki party. Ha ka politik, ka ktien kaba nga ju ioh sngew barobor ha ka por ba nga dang long samla leit klas na ki politishian ka long ba ki politishian ki long kumba bujli sopti”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah haba kren mynta ka sngi halor kumno u sngew ia ka jingthmu phet ki MLA ka party shwa ka elekshon.Haba takrain ia kine ki MLA kum ki riew shim kabu ban pynthut ia ka roi ka par, u Dr Mukul u la ong ba kine ki MLA bujli sopti ki dei ki nongpynthut ia ka roi ka par ha ka jylla bad kane ka la paw ha ki snem ba la dep.“Hynrei nga tip ba ki paidbah ki la ngiah ia kum kine ki briew namar ba ki paidbah mynta ki la stad bad shemphang”, u la ong.U la ong ba ka jingdon jong ki MLA ba kwah ba bujli sopti na kawei ka party sha kawei pat, ka la wanrah ia ka jingsynjor ha ka synshar khadar kumba la paw ha ki snem ba la leit noh hynrei myta kan nym lah shuh ban jia kum kane namar ba ka party Congress kam lah ban ailad ia kum kane ka jingleh.“Kito ki briew kiba kwah bujli sopti bunsien ki la wanrah ia ka jingthut ha ka roi ka par jong ka jylla hynrei ka party kam lah ba ailad ia kum kane”, u la ong.Kane ka jingkren jong u Mukul ka thew ia ki MLA ka Congress kiba kwah ban phet noh sha kiwei ki seng. Katkum ka khubor, u MLA ka Pynursla u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u MLA ka Nartiang u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, u MLA ka Mawkyrwat u Bah Rowel Lyngdoh bad u MLA ka Umroi u Bah Ngaitlang Dhar ki lah ban mih noh na ka Congress shwa ka elekshon.Katkum ka jingtip, kine ki MLA kim shym la pan tiket satia na ka Congress haduh mynta watla ka dang sah sa tang shi sngi ka por.
title: “Ki kwah ban bam, na ka  lyngkha ba kham jyrngam”

content: Shillong, 14 Nailur:Ki Muslim kiba shong ba sah ha nongbah Shillong bad kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka jylla Meghalaya kin pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah lashai ka sngi naduh ka por 2 baje nohphai sngi na Mawbah ter ter shaduh sha IGP ha ka jaka sha ophis u Superitendent of Police, East Khasi Hills. Katei ka jingiaid paidbah jong ki Muslim ka long ban pynrem bad ban pyrshah halor ka jingshah thombor ki Muslim ha Rohingyas Myanmar.Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u nongialam ka Sengbhalang Islam, Shillong u bah Akhtar Shabong u la ong ba um pat ioh jingtip katno spah ne hajar ngut ki Muslim, ki ban poi sha katei ka jingialang.U la ong ba la pyntip bad la kyrpad ia baroh ki Muslim ba kin ia mih ryntih lashai ka sngi ka 15 tarik u nailur hynrei u la ong ba ym pat ioh jingkheiñ katno ngut ki ban poi namar ba ka don ka Organising Committee kaba pyniaid ia katei ka kam bad u ruh u shu ioh jingtip ba la pyntip sha u da ka komiti.
title: Mynta yn iaid paidbah ki  Muslim ba sah ha Shillong

content: Shillong, 15 Nailur:Ka iing bishar Supreme Court ka ri ka la kynriah sngi biang ban bishar ia ka mukotduma MBBS jong ki 10 ngut ki samla na kane ka jylla kiba shah kyntait pdiang admishon ha jaka pule doktor ha Assam.Hynne ka sngi, ki kmie ki kpa kine ki samla bad ki heh ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ki la iakynduh halor kane bad katkum ka jingtip, kin hap ban ap beit ia ka rai na ka iing bishar ba hakhlieh ruh ka ri.Ha ka jingshisha, ka Supreme Court ka la buh sngi ban shim bishar ha ka 11 tarik hynrei ka la rah sha ka 15 tarik hynrei mynta ka la rah biang sha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai.Halor kawei ka liang, halor ka khubor ba u myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah un iakynduh ia kine ki samla ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai, hynrei katkum ka jingiakren bad kine ki samla pule kiba la lynga bad sngew pisa mynsiem, ki la ong ba kim shym la ioh jingtip eiei ia kata bad la shu iohi ha ki lad pathai khubor.Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka leit ujor sha ka Supreme Court hadien ba kine ki 10 ngut ki samla ki la shah kyntait ha ki jaka pule doktor ha Assam ha kane ka taiew ba la dep, da kaba kynnoh ba ka Assam ka la pynkhein ia ka jingiateh.
title: 18 tarik, kynriah bishar biang ha ka Supreme Court ia ka MBBS

content: Nongpoh, 15 Nailur:San sngi hadien ba la phriang ki Dur bad Video ha ki Whatapps bad facebook halor ka jingshah pyniap uwei u Bsein iong, ha Ri Bhoi bad haba buddien halor katei ka jingshah pyniap utei u bsien, ki briew ka tnat Wildlife Nongpoh Range, mynta ki la ban pynthikna ia ka jaka kaba utei u Bsein Cobra u la shah pyniap ha ki briew bad kata ka dei ha ka shnong Pahammardoloi, Nongkhrah, Ri Bhoi District.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ha kine ki sngi ba la leit ki Dur bad Video kiba la pyni ia ka jingshah pyniap utei u Bsein Cobra, ki la saphriang stet bha bad ha kaba nyngkong ka la don ruh ka jingsuba ba katei ka jingpyniap ka la jia ha ka shnong Pahamrioh, namar ka jingiai buddien ki briew ka tnat Wildlife ka Nongpoh Range, kat haduh ba kin da lap ia ka jaka kaba ki briew ki la pyniap ia utei u bsein.Haba iakren bad u Bah P. Dunai, Range Forest Officer, Nongpoh wildlife Range, u la ong ba ki briew ka tnat Wildlife Nongpoh Range, tang mar iohi halor katei ka jingshah pyniap utei u bsein kim shem la shongkli kti, tad haduh ba kin da lap syndon ia ka jaka kaba la pyniap ia utei u bsein Cobra.Kumta hadien ba ki la lah ban pynthikna ia katei ka shnong, ki briew ka tnat Wildlife ki la pynlong da ka jingpynshai sha ki paidbah ha katei ka shnong ba kim dei ban pyniap bein ia kino ki mrad kynja ba-im, hynrei lada ki lap ia kino kino ki mrad bad khamtam ia ki bsein ki dei ban pyntip mar mar sha ki briew ka tnat Wildlife, khnang ba kin ioh ban leh ia kaba donkam, ha kajuh ruh ka por u la ong ba ki Bsein kum u sein iong kim ju puh madei, khamtam ia ki briew bad ym ju kham bna koit ba ki sein iong, kin puh briew.
title: Lap ha shnong Pahammardoloi  ba pyniap ia u ’sein iong

content: Shillong, 15 Nailur:Hadien ba la ioh jingtip na ki paidbah nongiew ba ki don ki bynta jong ka ïewduh kiba la kylla long kum ki ktem ba shyrkhei ha ka ia die bad ia dih drok, mynta ka nohphai sngi ki pulit jong ka Hima Mylliem hapoh ka jingialam u OC jong ki, u bah S.Nongkhlaw ki la leit ban khynra ha kitei ki jaka bad ki la lap ba ki don da ki phew ngut ki samla kiba ia lum khrui hynrei tang mar ia poi ki pulit ki la phet krad noh na katei ka jaka. Ki pulit Syiem ki la ioh bat tang uwei na ki nongdih drok bad u dei u samla uba dang 20 snem karta bad la set ia u hapoh phatok Syiem ha iewduh hynrei kham sa shiphang la pyllait noh namarba utei u samla u la kular ba un kylla ba mut noh bad un noh ia katei ka kam.Ka jaka ba kitei ki nongdih drok bad ki nongkhaïi drok ki pynkylla ka dei ha kawei ka lynti kaba don ha ki thaiñ Standjeep.Ki nongshongiew kiba don ha katei ka jaka ki la iathuh ba manla ka sngi da ki phew ngut ki samla shynrang ki ju ia lum naduh ka por 8 baje mynstep ha katei ka jaka bad kitei ki briew ki dei ki durkhmat thymmai suda ha katei ka jaka bad ki ju ia dih ia ki jingdoh ba kynsha bad dei namar kane ka la pynsuba ia ki nongiew ba ki lah ban dei ki nongdih drok, kumta ki la pyntip sha ki pulit bad marsien wad ki pulit kitei ki samla ki la phet krad noh.U nongthohkhubor u la ioh ban ia kren bad utei u samla uba la shah kem ha ki pulit Syiem bad ia ka kyrteng jong u la buhrieh noh. Utei u samla u dei uba shong ba sah ha Mawprem. U la iathuh ba u la ngop ha ka kam dih drok la 3 snem mynta bad u la shah kem teng ruh ha ki pulit shisien. U la ong ba u la ngop ha katei ka kam bad ki paralok. U la iathuh ba kitei ki samla kiba don ha katei ka jaka kaba u la shah kem ki don ki nongdie bad ki don ruh ki nongdih drok.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u-u la ong ba u ju thied drok T.200 tyngka shi song bad katei ka dei beit tang shisien dih, hynrei ha ka shisngi ka donkam ia u ban dih haduh 3 song bad shisngi u pynlut pisa T.600 tyngka ha ka bai drok. U la iathuh ba baroh ka pisa kaba u ioh bai bylla ka lut tang ha ka bai thied drok katba ka bam pat u shu bam ei na ïngkmie. Haba ym don jingbylla ruh u ong ba u shut uh na la ing hynrei um pat ju mlien pat ban tuh na ki briew. Haba la kylli u lah ne-em ban ieh ia katei ka jingkyrni dih drok jong u-utei u samla u la ong ba tang shu ym ioh drok ka met ka shu khih bad um nang ioh thiah ioh dem, um rung bam rung dih shuh. La buhrieh noh ia ka kyrteng utei u samla naba u la ong ba un kylla kaba mut noh bad un ym mlien shuh. U la iathuh ba ka kmie jong u ruh ka tip ba u dih drok hynrei ym don lynti ia ka ban leh kumno kumno ruh watla ka la pyrshang ban shim da ki dawai ban pynjah kwah drok ia u.Haba ia kren bad u bah S.Nongkhlaw u OC pulit Syiem u la maham tyngeh ia kiba kum kitei ki samla lada jia ba kin lap nangne shakhmat, ia kaba mynta u la ong ba la shu beh krad tangba kin ym leh ha ïewduh hynrei lada dang lap biang nangne shakhmat yn pynshitom da kaba tyngeh bad yn aiti sha ki bor ka aiñ.
title: Khynra ki pulit Syiem ia ka  ktem ki nongdih drok ha ïewduh

content: Shillong, 15 Nailur:Mynta ka sngi ka 15 tarik u nailur ka dei ka sngi ba ka Congress, ha kane ka jylla ka la pynkut noh ia ka jingdie phom sha ki kyrtong kiba kwah tiket na katei ka seng. Katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh lum na ka MPCC la iathuh ba ki la don palat spah tylli ki phom kiba la die. La iathuh ba ka duna bha ka jingiaknieh Congress mynta ka elekshon ha ri Lum Khasi-Jaintia hynrei ka jingiaknieh ka jur bha ha ri Lum Garo. Katkum ka jingioh jingtip la ong ba ha ri Lum Khasi-Jaintia ki don tang katto katne tylli ki konstitwensi kiba don 2 ngut ki nongpan tiket hynrei lait nangta jan baroh ki konstitwensi kiba pan tang da uwei u briew.Lah ban kdew ba katei ka Congress ka la buh por 15 sngi ban die phom kata naduh ka 31 tarik u nailar haduh ka 15 tarik u nailur, la iathuh ba ka bai phom ka long T.20 hajar tyngka bad haba kheiñ ia ka palat spah tylli ka phom ba la die la antad ba ka jingmih pisa ka Congress na ka bai phom ka la kot sha ka T.20 lak tam. Katkum ka jingiathuh ki nongialam Congress ki la ong ba la ai por ia ki kyrtong ba kin pynpoi ia ki phom jong ki sha ki Block hapoh ka 4 tarik u risaw hynrei kham hadien la pynjlan noh sha ka 31 tarik u risaw. La pyrshang ban wad jingtip na ki nongialam ka MPCC ia ka kyrteng ki kyrtong kiba la thied phom na kylleng ki konstitwensi hynrei haduh mynta ki nongialam ka MPCC kim pat kwah ban thad madan namar dang hap ban iaid sha ki nongialam ba hakhmat jong ki.Hynrei katkum ka jingiathuh ki tyllong khubor la ong ba ha East Khasi Hills ki konstitwensi ba don ka jingiaknieh tiket ki long ka Mawkynrew bad ka 19th Shillong South. Ha Mawkynrew ka don ka jingiaknieh tiket hapdeng u bah Lam Kharpuri (bah Khan) bad u Dr.Lynshiang, ha Laban pat ka don ka jingiaknieh tiket hapdeng u bah Moon (uba la weng kyrteng noh ialade ha ka elekshon MDC shiteng samoi) bad u President ka Youth Congress 19th Shillong South. Ha Nongthymmaila thied phom tang da u bah Charles Pyngrope, ha Nongkrem u bah John F Kharshiing, ha Laitumkhrah ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh(MLA), ha Pynthor u bah A.L Hek(MLA), ha Shillong West u bah Mohendro Rapsang, ha Mylliem u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh (MLA), ha Mawlai u bah Process T Sawkmie (MDC), ha North Shillong kong Roshan Warjri (MLA), ha Mawphlang u bah Kennedy Khyriem (MLA), ha Sohiong u bah HDR Lyngdoh (MLA) ha Sohra u bah Donevan Kharwanlang (MDC), ha Shella u bah Bantyngshaiñ Rynga, ha Pynursla u bah Shining Khongthohrem, hynrei u President ka Congress ha Pynursla pat u bah Hanbor Khongtani u la ong ba la thied phom da ka Block Congress ym uno uno u kyrtong.Ia ka Mawsynram bad ka Mawryngkneng ka Congress ka dang pynsangeh shuwa bad katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh lum la ong ba ka daw ba la pynsangeh ka dei namarba ha Mawryngkneng yn sa ia khun da u khun jongu bah Charles Pyngrope u bah David Nongrum (MLA jong katei ka konstitwensi) bad ym pat long ia u ban rung seng. Ha Mawsynram pat la ong ba la pynsangeh na ka daw ba u H.M Shangpliang u ban ia khun na katei ka seng um pat shongthait na ka kam sorkar.Ha South West Khasi Hills kiba la thied phom ki long na Ranikor konstitwensi u Martin M Dango (MLA) bad na Mawkyrwat konstitwensi u bah Carnes Sohshang. Ha West Khasi Hills , Mairang la thied phom tang ka Dr.Eureka Lyngdoh, ha Rambrai u Kimfa Sydney Marbaniang (MDC), ha Mawshynrut bad Mawthadraishan ym pat ioh kyrteng. Ha Ri-Bhoi pat na Nongpoh u ba D.D Lapang, na Umsning u Dr.Celestine Lyngdoh, ha Umroi u bah George Lyngdoh, ha Mawhati u bah Charles Marngar, ha Jirang ym pat ioh kyrteng. Na ri Lum Jaintia, na Sutnga-Saipung konstitwensi uba la thied phom tang u bah Shitlang Pale, na Nartiang u bah Jopthiaw Lyngdoh, na Jowai R.C Laloo, na Raliang konstitwensi u ma Comingone Ymbon, na Mookaiaw, Khliehriat, Amlarem ym pat ioh jingtip satia. Haduh mynta ym pat ioh jingtip satia ia ki kyrtong kiba thied phom na ri Lum Garo hynrei la iathuh ba ki MLA ba mynta baroh jong ka seng Congress ki la thied phom lut. Ym pat shym la ioh jingtip ru la u Dr.Mukul Sangma myntri rangbah u thied phom tang na Ampati ne na Songsak konstitwensi ruh.Ha katei ka jingthied phom Congress ki kyrtong la ioh jingtip ba ki MLA ba mynta ka Congress kim shym la thied phom satia kata u bah Prestone Tynsong na Pynursla, u bah Rowell Lyngdoh na Mawkyrwat, u bah Sniawbhalang Dhar na Nartiang, u bah Ngaitlang Dhar na Umroi bad u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem na Mawsynram.
title: Palat 100 ngut thied phom, duna  ia knieh tiket ha Khasi-Jaintia

content: Shillong, 15 Nailur:Kumba 500 ngut tam ki riewngeit Muslim kiba don ha nongbah Shillong ki la iaid paidbah mynta ka sngi, naduh na Mawbah haduh ban da poi sha IGP bad ki wan phai biang sha kajuh ka jaka, kum ka dak ka jingpynpaw ia ka jingpynrem bad ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingshah lehbeiñ bad jingshah pyniap beiñ ki Muslim Ronghiya ha Burma.Katei ka jingiaid paidbah ka la sdang naduh ka por 2:20 baje eiei nohphai sngi . Shuwa ban sdang katei ka jingiaid paidbah ka la don ka jingkren kyntu kynpham na uwei na ki nongialam jong kitei ki Muslim Shillong u Md. Dakaria ha kaba u la sneng la kraw shuwa ban mih na katei ka jaka ba baroh ki dei ban iaid beit jar jar khlem pynmih ia ki kyntien sniew ki ban pynmong iano iano bad kim dei ruh ban jrong kti iano iano kumba la hikai da ka niam Islam. U la ong ba katei ka jingiaid jar jar ka long ban pynrem halor ka jingshah pyniap beiñ ki Muslim Ronghiya ha Burma. Shuwa ban mih noh na ka jaka na Mawbah ki Muslim ki la duwai ha u blei Allah jong ki ba un don ryngkat bad ki ha katei ka jingiaid paidbah.Ka jingmih paidbah ki Muslim mynta ka sngi ka la poi palat ia ka 500 ngut hynrei ki nongialam jong ki, ki la ong ba ki dang poi tang khyndiat ngut, namar ba ki don kiba treikam sorkar kim ioh mih na ophis treikam jong ki, bad kiba bun ki dang don hapoh Masjid namar ba ka don ka jingduwai kyrpang jong ki. La iohi ruh ba ha katei ka jingiaid jar jar jong ki Muslim ki la don tang ki shynrang suda ym don kynthei satia.Ki Muslim ki la rah ia ki pla kad kiba don ki jingthoh bapher bapher ban pynrem ia ka jingshah pyniap dusmon ki riew lui lui ha Ronghiya, ki la thoh ha pla kad ba de ban sangeh noh ia ka jingpyniap dusmon ia ki lui lui ha Burma. Nangta ka la don ruh ka jingthoh pynrem kaba ong ba ka dei ka jinglehraiñ ia ka Myanmar ka shnong jong ka Aung San Suu Kyi ka nongioh ia ka Noble Peace Prize Winner. Uwei pat u nongialam jong ki Md. Zaki u la ong ba ka sorkar India kam dei ban beh ia ki Muslim Ronghiya kiba don sha kane ka ri kumba 40, 000 ngut eiei, kiba wan phet na Myanmar, namar ba lada ka sorkar India ka phah ia ki sha Myanmar kin shah pyniap beiñ, “Ngi dawa na ka sorkar India jong ngi ba ka dei ban sangeh noh ka beh ia ki Muslim Ronghiya” u la ong.
title: Na ki Rohingya, iaid paidbah  ki paid Muslim ha Shillong

content: Shillong, 15 Nailur:U MLA ka Congress ba mynta na Mawkyrwat u bah Rowell Lyngdoh, u khlem pan tiket, haduh mynta, wat la ka dei ka sngi ba khadduh ban thep phom ia kiba kwah ban iakhun na ka party.Haba iakren mynta ka sngi bad ki nongthoh khubor, u Bah Rowell u la ong ba um pat pan satia ia ka tiket namar ba un sa shong jingialang bad ki nongialam ka party bad ki paidbah kumno ban leh, la un iakhun ne em ha kane ka elekshon ban wan.“Ngam pat pan tiket na ka Congress, ngan sa shong jingialang shwa bad ki nongkyrshan”, la ong u Bah Rowell.Katkum ka jingong jongu, ka paw ba um shym la kwah ban pan tiket na ka party Congress, namar ba kam don jingmyntoi ban pan namar ba ka District Congress Committee ba khlieh da u Bah Mansturdy Nongrem bad kumjuh ka MPCC kin nym ai tiket shuh ia u.Kumba ka long haduh mynta, tang u Bah Carness Sohshang uba la pan tiket na ka Congress na Mawkyrwat katba ia kiwei, kim ai phom satia, la ong u Bah Rowell.“U samla Kynpham Kharlyngdoh ruh u la leit pan phom hynrei kim ai satia, hynrei ia u Bah Sohshang pat ki ai”, la ong u Bah Rowell.U la ong ba u Bah Mansturdy Nongrem uba dei u President ka South West Khasi Hills District Congress Committee, u la leit ialap kylleng ki jaka ha Mawkyrwat ba ka party kan nym ai tiket shuh ia u namar ba u la tymmen.“Na ka jingleh bad ka jingkren jongki, ka paw ba kim kwah shuh ia nga ban don ha ka Congress”, la ong u Bah Rowell uba dei uwei na ki nongialam ka party ban wanrah ia ka Congress ha ki snem 1988.U Bah Rowell u la jop nyngkong na ka HSPDP hynrei ha u snem 1988, u la iasoh noh bad ka Congress. U la jop MLA na ka Congress ha u snem 1993 bad rem ha u 1998, bad 2003 bad u la jop biang ha u 20008 bad 2014.Ha kawei ka liang, u Bah Mansturdy u la ong ba haduh mynta ka janmiet, u Bah Rowel um shym la pan tiket satia na ka party. “Um pat pan tiket na ka party”, la ong u Bah Nongrem.
title: Ngan shong jingialang bad ki  nongkyrshan ban iakhun ne em: Rowel

content: Jowai, 17 Nailur:Ki pulit ka West Jaintia Hills ki la suba jur ba ka Dalmia Cement lane ka Adhunik Cement ka la iatreilang bad ka Umtyr-a Weighbridge ban ai lad ia ki truk kit cement ban kit palat pud.Kane ka long pyrshah ia ka ain katkum ka MV Act bad kadei ruh ka jingpynkhein ia ka hukum jong ka Supreme Court.Kane ka jingkit palat pud la lap da ki pulit ka Ummulong ha kane ka sngi Thohdieng bad la dep.La iathuh ba ki pulit ki lalap ia kawei ka trok kaba sniew ha ka jaka kaba la tip kum ka Madan Khawang ha Ummulong. Katei ka trok (ML10-5774) kadei kaba la niah da u Bormon Lyngdoh.Haba ki pulit ki la jurip ia ki kot ki sla khamtam ia ki challan, la lap ba katei ka trok ka la kit 480 byrni ka dewbilat kaba mut 50 kg shi byrni bad lada 480 byrni, ka jingkit ka la poi haduh 24 ton kaba tam haduh 15 ton na kaba shah katkum ka ain tang 9 trok na ka bynta ka trok 6 shaka.Ki pulit ki la hap ban pynphai ia katei ka trok na Ummulong shaduh sha Hynniewmer Weighbridge na ka bynta ban pyntikna la katei ka trok ka kit palat pud.La lap ia ka jingshisha ba katei ka trok ka la kit tam haduh 15 ton bad kane ka la pynlyngngoh ia ki pulit ba kumno ka Adhunik Cement ka phah kit haduh 24 ton ia katei ka trok bad kumno ki nongtrei ka tnad Transport Deptt kiba don ha Um-Tyra Weighbridge ki la ai lad ia katei ka trok ban iaid kumto.Haba tohkit ia u driver da ki pulit, u la iathuh ba u la kit ia katei ka dewbilat na Dalmia (Adhunik) Cement Factory Thangskai, East Jaintia Hills bad u la thmu ban pynpoi sha Byrnihat Ribhoi District.U la phla ruh ba u la lait na Um-tyr-a Weighbridge da kaba siew pisa sha ki nongtrei (Enforcement) ka tnad Transport.“Imat katei ka Cement Company ka la leh khnang ban phah kit palat pud ia ki trok kit cement da ka jingiatreilang bad katei ka Weighbridge kaba don ha katei ka thain bad kane kan wanrah ia ka jingjot kloi u surok”, la ong u pulit uba ujor ejahar halor kane.Utei u pulit u la ong ba donkam ban leh da kaba tyngeh pyrshah ia katei ka kharkhana dewbilat kaba la ailad ban kit palat pud.
title: Sylla ka kompeni Dalmia bad  ki jaka thew ban kit palat pud

content: Jowai, 17 Nailur:Hadien ba ka jingiakhih ban bujli noh ia u ma Thombor Shiwat, kum nongialam ka JHADC, ka MPCC ka la khot biang ia baroh ki MDC ka Congress sha ka jingialang ka ban long mynta ka sngi Nyngkong ha Nongbah Shillong na ka bynta ban iakren ia katei ka kam hapdeng ki MDC ka Congress na ri lum Jaintia bad ki nongialam ka MPCC ha ryngkat ki ar ngut ki MLA congress na Jaintia Hill.Ka khubor ka la iathuh ba ha kane ka kynti, u ma A. Andrew Shullai uba bat mynta kum u Deputy CEM ka JHADC u lah ban shah jied kum u nongialam ba thymmai ka JHADC.Ha kine ki sngi ki bnai ba la dep, ka kyrteng jong u ma KM Lytan MDC na Shangpung bad kumjuh ka kyrteng u ma Arborhima ruh ka la paw hynrei ka khubor ka la iathuh ba ha kane ka kynti katei ka shuki ka lah ban poi noh sha u ma Shullai MDC ka Jowai Central.Ka tyllong khubor ka la iathuh ba wat lada ki don ki katto katne ki MDC ki ba sngew pyrshah ia kane hynrei ka MPCC kan iaid beit shakhmat ban pynbna ia u nongialam ba thymmai ka JHADC.Ka jingiakhih ban weng noh ia u ma Thombor Shiwat na ka shuki CEM ka la long hadien ba ka la mih ka jingkynrum kynram hapdeng u ma Sniawbhalang Dhar bad ka seng Congress haduh ba ka sorkar ba lam khmat da ka Congress ka la hap ban weng noh ia u na ka kam kum u Myntri ka tnad sam bording.U ma Thombor uba dei u MDC na Nartiang Constituency u lah ban shah sloit ia ka shuki CEM ha kane ka Sngi Monday, kumba la shah sloit u ma Sniawbhalang Dhar wat lada kam pat shym la paw ba u la leh ia ki kam pyrshah seng jong u.“Kane ka dei ka sien kaba lai ba la shong jingialang hapdeng ki ar ngut ki MLA na Jaintia Hills, ki heh ka MPCC bad ki MDC Congress na Jaintia Hills”, la ong uwei na ki MDC uba la iathuh ruh ba ka rai ba khadduh kalah ban mih ha kane ka sngi Nyngkong
title: Lah ban ioh u ma Andrew Shullai,  ia ka shuki CEM ka JHADC

content: Shillong, 17 Nailur:U Secretary ka HSPDP Mawkyrwat u bah D.Snaitang u la ong ba ka Party HSPDP na Mawkyrwat ka la shim ia ka rai ban ym kyrshan ia u kyrtong jong katei ka seng u bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar bad u la kynnoh ba ka jingai tiket ka HSPDP ia u bah Renik ka dei tang ka jingleh donbor khlem ka jingmynjur jong ka Area Unit. U bah Snaitang u la ong ba u bah Renik um pat dei satia u dkhot jong ka HSPDP bad um pat long dkhot hapoh ka Primary Unit watla ki nongialam katei ka seng ki la bthah ia u bad ia ki briew jong u ban pyndap phom ruh.Shuh shuh utei u Secretary jong ka HSPDP Mawkyrwat, u la ong ba u bah Nolipstar Lyngdoh um dei satia u President jong ka HSPDP Mawkyrwat kumba u la kam, hynrei u President u dei u bah M.G Marweiñ, bad ia ka kyrteng jong ki nongkitkam katei ka seng ka la ong ba ka la dep phah ruh sha u President rangbah jong ka Party.
title: Yn nym kyrshan Renik ka HSPDP Mawkyrwat

content: Shillong, 17 Nailur:Ka elekshon MLA 2013 ka dei ka elekshon kaba thnam bha ka iew ia knieh tiket hapoh ka seng Congress bad katei ka jingiaknieh tiket ka la long jan ha manla ka konstitwensi. Ha katei ka jingiaknieh tiket ki la don haduh 4 ngut ki MLA jong ka seng Congress kiba la shah pynduh tiket bad uwei pat u bym treh ia khun elekshon shuh. Ki 4 ngut ki MLA Congress kiba la sha pynduh tiket ha u 2013 ki long u Saleng A Sangma uba dei ruh ha kato ka por u myntri C&RD ka sorkar, nangta u Samuel Sangma, u Abdus Saleh bad u bah Stanlywiss Rymbai. Nalor kitei u bah Nehlang Lyngdoh um treh ia khun elekshon shuh.Hynrei mynta ka elekshon MLA 2018 ka iew tiket ka seng Congress ka la dait thah slam ha kaba jan ha manla ki konstitwensi kam don satia ka jingiaknieh tiket, lait noh tang katto katne tylli ba mih 2 ngut ki nongpan tiket bad don lei lei ki konstitwensi kiba ka seng Congress ka hap ban pynmih kyrtong jubor naba bun kiba kynran dien ban ia khun na katei ka seng.Kaba kham sngewlyngngoh shuh shuh mynta ka long ba ki la don haduh 5 ngut ki MLA jong katei ka seng ki bym treh tiket shuh na ka seng Congress ha ka elekshon MLA 2018.Kitei ki 5 ngut ki MLA ki dei ruh ki nongialam ba hakhmat jong katei ka seng ba kynthup ia u symbud myntri rangbah barim u bah Rowell Lyngdoh, ki myntri sorkar barim u bah Prestone Tynsong, u bah Sniawbhalang Dhar bad sa 2 ngut ki MLA u bah Ngaitlang Dhar bad u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem.
title: 2013, shah pynduh tiket  4 ngut ki MLA Congress

content: Jowai, 17 Nailur:Uwei u samla u la duh ei ia la ka jingim katba u dang lehkai sngewbha bad ia muja bad ki paralok mynta ka sngi ha Shnongpdeng, kaba dei kawei na ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei donnam ka rilum Jaintia.Utei u samla udei uba la wan shang jngoh-kai ia ka shnongpdeng ha ryngkat ki paralok jong u, u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Leonald Lyngdoh Syngriang, 23 snem ka rta bad udei uba shong basah ha Lum-Mawbah, Shillong.Ki pulit ki la iathuh ba ka kynhun jong utei u samla ki la wan poi kham sngi mynta ha Shnong-pdeng bad mar poi ki la wad jaka ban ia bamja step bad ynda ki la dep bam ki la leit shangkai bad jngi kai ha wah Umngot ha katei ka shnong.“Hooid, kim shym la jngi sha ka jaka kaba jylliew, hynrei katei ka jaka ka long kaba kham kyndong, ki la jngi ha ka jaka kaba ym dei kaba jylliew, hynrei utei u samla Leonald u bym nang jngi, u la kum btuit ha u maw ba u iuh bad u la hap sha wah bad ha katei ka por namar ba ka River Current ka khlain ka la patan ia u sha ka jaka kaba kham jylliew bad ngam jyllop” ong ka khubor pulit.Ki volunteer jong ka shnong kim shym la lah ban wan iarap biang por, namar ka jaka kaba jia kadei ka jaka kaba kham kyndong. Kim shym la kam shiliang da ka lieng, hynrei wat la katta ruh la tyrwa ba ki dei ban phong Life Jacket hynrei kim treh namar ki ong ba kin shu leit bamja kin nym leh eiei.Ki Volunteer ha katei ka shnong kim ju shah ban shong lieng khlem phong life jacket, hynrei ia katei ka kynhun ym shym la pynbor namar kim shym la shong lieng ne kam shiliang ia ka wah umngot.Ki pulit bad ki samla shnong ki la iarap ban sei ia ka met jong u bad na ka liang ki pulit ki la aiti ia ka met jong u sha kiba haiing ban pyndep ia ka lehniam ba khadduh.
title: Ngam jyllop u samla Lum-Mawbah  ha wah Umngot Shnongpdeng

content: Shillong, 20 Nailur:Ka Civil Society of Women Organisation (CSWO) bad ka Thma u Rangli (TUR), hapoh ka jingialam ka Kong Agnes Kharshiing bad ka Kong Angela Rngad, ki la dawa ba ka sorkar kam dei satia ban shu ai jem da ka Voluntary Retirement Scheme (VRS) ia u Bah Hima Shangpliang uba dei u ophisar sorkar (IAS shu sieh) hynrei ka dei ban pynshitom ia u da kaba sospen bad pynduh ia baroh ki jingmyntoi ba u dei ban ioh kum u shakri sorkar hadien ba la shem ba u la pynkheiñ ia ka ain lyngba ka jingtohkit.Ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha u Chief Secretary ka jylla mynta ka sngi, kine ki nongialam jong kine ki seng, ki la ong ba dei ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba laitluid bad bniah halor ki kam beaiñ ba u la leh ban pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa u paidbah lyngba ka jingsam skhim sha ki paidbah ka thaiñ Mawsynram tang na ka bynta ka jingthmu jongu ban iakhun elekshon ha u 2018.“U dei ban shah sospen katba u dang don ha ka jingtohkit katkum ka jingujor bad ban shim jingtohkit na kiba ujor pyrshah ia u bad na ki briew ka thaiñ Mawsynram”, la ong kine ki ar tylli ki seng bad ki la bynrap, “lada shem ba u la leh bakla, dei ban pynduh lut khait ia baroh ki jingmyntoi kiba u dei ban ioh kum u shakri sorkar”,.Ki la kynnoh ba u Bah Shangpliang uba bat ia ki tnad bapher bapher ka sorkar jylla, u la pyndonkam bakla ia ka kyrdan jongu da kaba pyrshang ban pynkiew skong ialade da ki skhim sorkar na ka bynta ban iakhun ia ka elekshon na Mawsynram konstitwensi.“Kaba sngew lyngngoh ka long ba ka sorkar kam shym la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba dei halor kane ka kam namar ba kam shym la pynlong jingtohkit na ki briew ba ujor pyrshah ia u bad kumjuh na ki paidbah ka thaiñ Mawsynram hynrei ka shu pan jubab na u”, la ong ka CSWO bad ka TUR.Kila kam ruh ba ka jingpan VRS jongu, ha kine ki sngi ba la dep, ka paw shai ba u la don shisha ka jingmut ban iakhun ia ka elekshon kumba u la ju sam skhim sha ki paidbah ka thaiñ Mawsynram da kaba pyndonkam bakla ia ka bor kum u ophisar sorkar.“Ia kine ki jingleh jongu ban pyndonkam bakla ia ka bor kum u skari sorkar, la dep paw ruh ha ki lad pathai khubor bunsien”, la ong kine ki ar tylli ki seng.Ha ka dorkhas sha u Chief Secretary, ki la suh lang ruh ia ki dur bad ki khubor ba la ju pynmih ha kaba u Bah Shangpliang u ju don bynta ban long kum u kongsan ha ki jingialang ha ki shnong ha thaiñ Mawsynram.Lah ban kdew ba u Bah Shangpliang u la shah ujor halor ka jingleit kren jongu ha kawei ka jingialang ka Congress ha kawei ka shnong ha thaiñ Mawsynram haduh ba ka sorkar ka la pan jubab na u halor kane.
title: Sospon ia u Bah Shangpliang, dawa ka CSWO & TUR

content: Shillong, 20 Nailur:Ka BJP kala kynnoh ba kane ka sorkar MUA-II kaba ialam da ka Congress ha kane ka jylla ka la dap sa tang ki kam bamsap bampong haduh niuhmat jongka bad ka la dei ka por ia ki paidbah ban kyntait mardor ha kane ka elekshon ban wan.U President ka BJP Meghalaya u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor ha ka jingwan iasnohkti lang ha ka jingialang pyrshah bamsap ba pynlong da ka BJYM mynta ka sngi, ha phyllaw ka Additional Secretariat, u la ong ba ka jingpynlong ia ka jingialang da ki samla ka long ban pyrshah ia ki kam bamsap.“Ngi kwah ba ka sorkar ka dei ban long ka sorkar jong u paidbah, ban ai ia ka jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah”, la ong u bah Shibun bad bynrap, ba “ki kam bamsap ha ka tnad pule puthi, ka tnad bording, ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, la shlei da ki kam bamsap da kane ka sorkar bym lah shuh ban niew tang”.U Bah Shibun u la ong ka jingkam jong u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma ba ka roi ka par ka don ha ka jylla, u dei ban pynshai ia ki paidbah kiba kum kiei kita ki jingroi.“Ngi kwah ban tip kiei kita ki kam pynroi, ki paidbah ki kwah ban tip”, la ong u Bah Shibun.ha kawei ka liang, u President ka BJYM Meghalaya, u Bah Egenstar Kurkalang, ka long ba ka jingpynlong ia ka jingialang ka long ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur ia ka jingkynrei palat ki kam bamsap, bad ka jingsynshar donbor da u Mukul Sangma ha ka jylla haduh ba u la kheiñ niut ia ki paidbah bad ia ki ophisar bad ki myntri sorkar jongu hi.“U la shu hukum ia ki myntri sorkar, ia ki ophisar ban leh katba u sngew bit ma u. Ki samla kiba wad kam wad jam kim don lad, kiba duk ki shah noin bad la knieh ia ka hok jongka”, la ong u Bah Egenstar.U la ong ba ki kam bamsap kane ka sorkar ka la paw tyngkrein ha kaba ia ka bai thang ding la pynkiew man u bnai, kaba la ktah ia u paidbah hynrei kam leh eiei ban weng ia ka jingkyrduh ding ha ka jylla kaba don kyrhai ka spah mariang ban pyndap.Ka BJYM ka la dawa naka sorkar ban sangeh ka jingpynkiew bai thang ding kaba long kum ka jing iuhroit iaki paidbah baduk,kumjuh ruh ban pynthikna ban sangeh ka jingpynlip ding.La dawa ruh iaka sorkar ban wanrah iaka education policy bad ban pynkhlian iaka jingtreikam haka tnad pule puthi,ka sorkar jylla kadei ban pynbiang noh ia kaba donkan ban pyllait lut noh iaka Scholarship ba sahteng shaki Samla pule ka jylla.bad ban pynkhlian iaka pule puthi haki thain nongkyndong.Kumjuh ruh ka BJYM kala dawa ia u Myntri Rangbah Dr.Mukul Sangma bad ka kynhun jong u ba ki LA pynlehrian iaka jylla bala dap da ki kam bamsap suda,ka BJYM kan ym shong kli kti ka khot ia ki paidbah ka jylla ban rat diengkhong iaki kam bamsap bad jingsynshar shiliang ka sorkar MUA-II.“Ka pule puthi ka la hiar shaba palat, da ki hajar ngut ki samla kim ioh admishon ha Jowai, Nongstoin, Shillong, ha Tura bad ha kiwei ki jaka”, u la ong.U President ka BJYM u la ong ba wat tang ban tei ia ka iing dorbar ruh kim leh eiei haduh mynta palat da ki phew snem.U la kynnoh ba namar ba ka sorkar kam shym la shim khia, ia ka bamsap sialieh ruh ka dang sah haduh mynta bad ka baibam jong ki samla pule ruh ka sahteng naduh 2014.“Ngim lah shah shuh ia ki bamsap kane ka sorkar bad ki kam thombor ia ki samla, ia ki nongkhaii, ia ki nongrep, bad ia kiba duk bad kumjuh ia ki nongkhaii”, u la ong.U la ong ba ka jylla kam donkam shuh ia ki nongialam bamsap bampong hynrei ka donkam ban ioh ki nongsynshar kiba khuid, kiba peit ia ki paidbah bad u Dr Mukul u la dei ban hiar shuki noh naduh mynta ka sngi bad ban ailad ban synshar kiwei pat ban synshar.
title: Kane ka sorkar ka bamsap haduh niuhmat: BJP

content: Shillong, 20 Nailur:Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) kynthup ka Seng Samla Saitsohpen, ka Synjuk Ki Kynthei Saitsohpen, Ki Paid Nongshongshnong jong ka Ilaka Saitsohpen ka la pyrshah ia ka jingpan license ka Jiva Resort ban buh pata kyiad ha Saitsohpen, Sohra bad ia kane, la pynsngew ha ka jingialang sngap paidbah kaba long ha kane ka sngi Hatmajai ha katei ka shnong.Ha kane ka jingsngap paidbah la donlang ryngkat jong ki Nongialam Shnong kaba la khot da u Inspector ka Excise bad Inquiry Officer, Sohra Civil Sub-Division halor ka jingpan License ban buh pata kyiad (bar) ha Jiva Resort.La pyniaid ia kane ka jingialang da u Inspector ka Excise da ka jingiadonlang ryngkat jong u trai jong ka Jiva Resort ban pynsngew paidbah ia ka jingthmu halor ka jingplie ia ka pata kyiadha katei Ka Resort kumjuh ruh ban kyrpad ia ki paidbah ban ailad ia kane ka Resort ban plie ia kane ka pata.La ailad ia ki paidbah ban pynpaw ia la ki jingsngew jong ki halor katei ka bynta.La ioh ia ka jingkren na ki Nongialam Shnong, ki nongialam jong Ka Seng Samla bad Seng Longkmie, kiba la pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah ban plie ia kane ka pata halor ka nongrim ba ka ktah palat ia ka jingsngew jong ki paid nongshong shnong kiba la trei shitom na ka bynta ban pynduh ia ka kyiad ha ki por ba mynshuwa bad ki da pynpaw ba dei na ka daw jong ka kyiad ba kum ka Shnong ki la mad ia ki jingeh kiba bun kum ka huri hura hapoh shnong pohthaw, ka jingiapait iing pait sem, ka jingjot jong ki khun samla, wat haduh u pud ba ki nongialam bad ki paidbah kin shah set along tang na ka daw ban pynduh ia ka kyiad.Nalor kitei ki mat, ka jingai laisen ia katei ka pata kan pynshlur ruh ia kiwei pat ki briew ki ban pan ia kijuh ki License ha ki Restaurant, Homestay, Inn kumjuh ruh ia ki dukan die kyiad ia kiba kum ka Shnong ka khang bad mana pyrshah ba kim dei ban don.Ka Shnong bad ka sur u paidbah kumba ki la pyrshah ha ka sien kaba nyngkong, ka rai kaba khatduh ruh ka long beit ‘Em’ ba ka pata kan don ha Jiva Resort.La ong ka kyrwoh na u Bah Pyndapbor Pyngrope u President Ka Seng Samla Saitsohpen,Sohra.
title: Pyrshah ka JAC Sohra, ban  buh pata kyiad ka Jiva Resort

content: Shillong, 20 Nailur:“Ngi la ioh jingtip ba don ki shnong hapoh ka Bri U Hynniewtrep, kiba la tait shnong ia la ki nongshong shnong, ki Balang la weng Balang ia la ki dkhot tang namar ba kim treh Aadhaar. Ki don ruh ki ophis sorkar kiba la byrngem ot bai bam tymmen (pension), ot tulop bad kumta ter ter ia kino kino ki bym treh Aadhaar. Ki don ruh ki bor sorkar kiba la pynmih hukum hana ba dei ba baroh man uwei-pa-kawei ba ki dei ban don bank account noh namar ba yn iaid noh da ka digital/ cashless transaction ha ka jaka ka pisa kot, ka pisa nar. Bad na ka bynta kane, dei ban don Aadhaar” ong ka kyrwoh ba la pyllait mynta ka sngi, da U Pastor PBM Basaiawmoit jong ka Meghalaya Peoples Committee on Aadhar.“Ngi pynkynmaw ba ka RAI ba shiteng por (interim order) ba la ai ha ka Kashari ba ha khlieh duh naduh u Nailur, 2013 ka dang ieng bad dang iai pynkynmaw na ka por sha ka por ba u aadhaar u long da ka mon sngewbha shimet ym da kaba pynbor (voluntary and not mandatory) bad ka rai kut halor ka kam Aadhaar, yn sa ai ha u Naiwieng mynta ka snem. Kumba ka long mynta, ki don palat 10 tylli ki dorkhast pyrshah ia ka jingpyntrei kam ia u Aadhaar, kynthup ia ka dorkhast pyrshah ia ka Aadhaar Act, 2016. Bad ia kine baroh, yn shim lang bad ai rai ha kajuh hi ka por, kata, ha u Naiwieng, 2017” ong shuh ka kyrwoh.Ha ka 24 tarik u Nailar, 2017, ka ben ba 9 ngut ki nongbishar jong ka Kashari ba ha khlieh duh, ka la ai ia ka rai ba shai, ba jrong (haduh 547 sla) ba ka Hok long marwei, ka Hok ba jar jar, ka Hok long kyrpang (Right to Privacy) ka dei ka Hok ba kat kum ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India (fundamental right) ia kaba la don ha ka Artkl 21 jong ka Riti Synshar kaba kren halor ka Hok ban Im bad ka hok jinglong laitluid ba shimet (Right to Life and personal liberty). Kane ka jingshim bishar ka mih namar ki dorkhast pyrshah Aadhaar namar la jan baroh ki kdew ba u Aadhaar u ktah ia ka hok long kyrpang. Bad kane ka RAI ka pyniap ia ki Rai ba la shim ha ka snem 1954 bad snem 1961 da ka Bench ba 8 bad ka Bench ba 6 ngut ki nongbishar jong ka Kashari ba ha khleih duh.Ka daw bah daw san jong ka jingkyntait ia u Aadhaar ka dei namar la pyntrei kam ia ka jingring dur (ym dei shon dur) ia ki artylli ki pyllew khmat bad ia 10 tylli ki shympriah kti jong uwei-uwei, kawei-kawei ia kaba la tip ha ka ktien phareng ba ka dei ka biometric data collection. Ka iapher bak-ly-bak na ka EPIC, credit card, SMART card bad kiwei namar kine ki shim tang ia kata ka demographic data katba ia u Aadhaar (ba wan na ka ktien Sanskrit bad ba mut ‘nongrim’ lane ‘base’ ha ka ktien phareng) donkam lang baroh ar, kata, demographic bad biometric (jingthew jong ka jingim: bio – jingim; metre – jingthew).Katei ka komiti, ka pyntip paidbah, ba kito kiba kwah ban lait noh na kino kino ki jaid jingpynshitom namar bym treh Aadhaar ba la leh da kano kano ka bor, kin sngewbha ai jingtip lyngba ka jingthoh lyngkot lane ka email sha U Rgh. Auguster Jyrwa, Rev. P. B. Syngkli, 9612164669, Rev. K Pyrtuh, Rev. Dr. P. B. M. Basaiawmoit ha ki email kyrsoi73 @gmail.com bad ecumove@gmail.com.
title: Na U Aadhar, don kiba shah tait shnong, shah weng balang, ong U Pastor

content: Nongpoh, 20 Nailur:Ha kawei ka jingjia ba sngewsih kaba la jia hynne ka sngi ha Umsning Umsohlang, ha kaba uwei u khunlung uba la tip kyrteng kum u Iamelahun-lang Shadap uba dang 3 snem tam na ka shnong Umsning Umsohlang, u la khlad noh hadien ba u la ngam ha kawei ka Wah barit kaba don hajan ka shnong Umsning Lumroman.Ka tyllong khubor ia kaba la ioh ban lum da ki Nongthohkhubor, la ong ba kane ka jingjia ka la jia mynta ka sngi ha ka por 1 baje duna ei ei, ha ka por ba dang shu dep rang u slap.La ioh jingtip ruh, ba ha ka jingshisha katei ka jaka Wah rit, kaba utei u khunlung u la shah rong bad ngam jyllop kam da dei ka Wah kaba heh bad kaba wanrah jingma, namar katei ka Wah rit ka heh tang ha ka por ba hap slap.
title: Ngam jyllop u khunlung ha Umsning

content: Shillong, 20 Nailur:Ha kine ki sngi, ka la mih ka jing ujor na ki paidbah, ba ki Bank, kim treh ban pdiang ia ki shiphew tyngka nar bad katei ka la pyn dukha mynsiem ia ki nongkhaii bad kumjuh ia ki nongbylla sngi, namar ba kim don jaka ban leit bujli ia kitei ki pisa khutia.Katei ka jingleh jong ki Bank, ka la pynlong, wat ia ki Petrol Pump, ki dukan bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka ia die ia thied, ba kin kyntait lem ban shim ia kitei ki shiphew tyngka nar bad katei ka la pynlong ia ki paidbah, ba kin shu ia buh kai ia kitei ki pisa ha la iing.U Rupang, ula iakren ia U Assitant General Manager (AGM) ka State Bank of India (SBI), Shillong u Surajit Tripathy, u la ong ba ki bank baroh kim lah ban kyntait ban pdiang ia ka pisa shiphew tyngka nar ha kano kano ka dur ruh.Haba iakren mynta ka sngi, u Tripathy u la ong ba ha ka jingshisha kam don kano kano ka jingujor kaba la poi sha u ba ki don ki bym treh ban pdiang ne shim ia ka pisa nar shiphew tyngka hynrei lada don kiba kyntait kata ka mut ba ki la pynkhein ia ka kyndon ka RBI.“Kumno ngin kyntait haba dei ma ngi ba sam ia ka pisa sha ki paidbah bad haba ki paidbah ki wan ai, kumno ngin kyntait”, la ong u Tripathy.U la ong ba kano kano ka pisa kaba la pynmih da ka RBI ka dei ka pisa ba la ithuh da ka ain bad ym don ba lah ban kyntait ia ki ha kaba iadie iathied iasiew ia tda.U AGM ha kajuh ka por, u la iathuh ba dang hynne ka sngi ruh, ka SBI ka la pynlait pisa shiphew nar haduh 15 hajar tyngka lyngba ki tnad bapher bapher jongka.Katkum ka jingiathuh u Tripathy, tang ban pyniaid na kawei ka bank sha kawei pat, ka don ka kyndon bym lah ban pdiang bad kata ka long tang hapdeng ki bank hi ym bad ki paidbah.U la ong lada don ki nongtrei bank ki bym pdiang ia ka pisa shiphew nar kam dei na kano kano ka daw hynrei ka lah ban dei tang namar ba ki thait ban niew ban khein haba wanrah shibun. “Lehse ki don ki nongtrei bank kiba thait ban niew haba wanrah shibun ka pisa nar hynrei kam don ka ain ban ong ba ka bank kam nym pdiang ia ki”, u la ong.Katkum ka jingong u AGM, lada don ki bank ki bym pdiang, lah ban pyntip sha ka bor ba dei peit ba kin leh ia kaba donkam.Ha kajuh ka por, u la iathuh ba ka RBI ka la sdang ban pynmih ia ka kot T. 50 bad T.100 kaba thymmai mynta tangba kam pat lah ban pyniaid ne sam paidbah namar ba ka dang shim por ban pynbiang ia ka jingdonkam jong ki paidbah.
title: Ki bank kim lah ban kyntait ia  ka 10 nar, ong u AGM ka SBI

content: Shillong, 21 Nailur:Na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka jingshngain ia ka jingrakhe lehniam Durga Puja, ki paidbah riew ngeit Hindu ha ka jylla, ki bor ba dei peit ki la pynkhreh ban buh da ki CCTV cameras ha kiba bun ki rynsan khamtam ha ka nongbah.Katkum ka jingkren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u president ka Central Puja Committee u Naba Bhattercharjee u la ong ba ha kane ka kynti ki don baroh 231 tylli ki rynsan ba la shna kynthup 62 tylli tang ha ka nongbah bad ki jaka ba marjan.Ka jingleh kmen Puja kan sdang naduh ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai. U Naba u la ong ba ha ka jingrakhe, kan don ruh ka jingialang baroh ki jait niam ha ka 23 tarik ha kaba u Myntri Rangbah u Mukul Sangma un long u kongsan.Kan don ruh ka jingiakop tem bom, ka ban tip kum ka Prasad Gupta Memorial Drum Beat Competition bad ruh ka SK Das Memorial Drum Beat ban long ha ka 28 bad 29 tarik..Na ka liang ki bor ka ain, kin pynlong ruh ia ka jingpahara baroh ar phew kynta na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka jingleh kmen kaba iaid beit iaid ryntih.
title: Ban wanrah jingshngain, da ki  CCTV yn buh ha ki rynsan puja

content: Shillong, 21 Nailur:Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ha ka dorbar ban wan ka liangpyrshah kaba don ha KHADC kan pyrshang ban pynkhih biang ia ka Executive Committee ka PDF kaba ialam da u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem kum u CEM. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba katei ka jingpyrshang jong ka liang pyrshah ban pynkhih shuki CEM ka dei hadien ba ki don katto katne ngut ki MDC kiba ju kyrshan ia ka PDF, ki la sdang ban kynran dien noh na ka liang synshar.Kumba ka long mynta ka People’s Democratic Forum ( PDF) ka don 12 ngut ki MDC kiba la ia soh bad ka People’s Democratic Front, ka don ia u bah Pynshngaiñ (MLA/MDC) ba shah sospon ha ka Congress, ka don ia u bah Antonio War MDC ka BJP bad ka don sa u bah Jansing Tynsong MDC, nalor kitei ka PDF ka ioh jingkyrshan sa na u MDC ka KHNAM u bah Adelbert Nongrum bad na u MDC ka NCP u bah Ricky Shullai, kaba mut ba kumba ka long mynta ka PDF ka don 17 ngut ki MDC.Ka Liang pyrshah ka 5 ngut ki MDC Congress, 4 ngut ki MDC ka UDP, 2 ngut ki MDC ka HSPDP bad uwei u MDC shimet u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kaba mut ka don 12 ngut. La iathuh ba kumba ka long mynta ka jingiakren bad ki MDC kiba don ha ka kynhun jong ka PDF ka dang iaid shakhmat bad la ong ba ki don 2 ngut kiba lah ban leit ia treilang noh bad ka Liang pyrshah. Ki lad khubor, ki la iathuh ruh ba ka la mih ka jingbym ia sngewthuh jingmut mynta hapoh ka kynhun jong ka liangsynshar ha KHADC khamtam hadien ka jingleit iasoh PDF ki 12 ngut ki MDC ha kaba la don ki Party kiba la shah ktah ha kaba ki la duh noh ia ki MDC jong ki.
title: Yn pynkhih shuki CEM biang  ka liangpyrshah ha KHADC

content: Shillong, 21 Nailur:Ban pynsuk ia ka leit ka wan, ha ki sngi rakhe Puja, ki bor pyniaid District, ki la khang ia ki trok ban rung sha ka nongbah Shillong, naduh ka 21tarik Nailur haduh ka 1tarik Risaw 2017.Ha kitei ki sngi, la khang ia ki trok, ba kin rung sha ka nongbah Shillong, naduh ka por 10baje mynstep, haduh 12baje shiteng synnia bad ki trok kiba wan ja Jaintia Hills bad kiba wan sha Shilong, kin sangeh ha Mawryngkneng bad kan nym don don ka jingkhanglad ia ki trokl kiba leit sha Ri Bhoi, lyngba ka Shillong Bye Pass.Yn nym shah ia ki trok, ba kin iaid na Shillong sha Umiam, ha ki por ba la buh bad ki trok kiba wan na West Khasi Hills, kin sangeh ha Mairang bad kiba wan na Mawsynram, Sohra bad Pynursla, kin sangeh ha 7mer bad kiba leit sha Jaintia Hills, kin iaid lyngba ka Bye Pass.
title: Khang rung trok sha Shillong

content: Shillong, 21 Nailur:Ka UDP Pynursla circle kan pynlong ia ka jingjied kyrtong ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai ha Pynursla. Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum, ka jingjied ia u kyrtong yn leh da kaba shu iathep vote ban iashim bynta ki president bad secretary jong ki unit baroh kiba don ha ka Pynursla constituency.Kumba ka paw, ki don ar ngut kiba pan tiket na ka UDP kynthup u MLA barim ka Nongshken u Bah Khan K Dkhar bad u Bah Nehru Suting uba long u Director ka tnad karkhana ka jylla.
title: 27 tarik yn jied kyrtong ka UDP Pynursla

content: Shna taiar kali, ka longkmieba 13ngut khun ha UmsningShillong, 21 Nailur:I longkmie i ba kyrteng i kong Sobinora Kyrsian 48 snem ka rta,i ba dei na ka shnong Umsning Patarim, thain Ribhoi, ila ktik shisha ia ka jingmut ban iohi ba ka kynthei briew kan rah tyrnem ban shna ia ki shaka ne taiar kali kiba rim bad kiba pei, kumba leh ki shynrang.Ine i longkmie i trei ia ka kam ka ba ym pat lah ban shem ha kylleng ki jaka,lehse lah ban ong tang ki rangbah ki ba ju mlien ban trei ia ka ne ka jait kam,ban shna ne pynbha ia ki taiar (Tyre) kali kiba sniew.I kong Sobinora ne Meirit ba ki ju khot ieid,i la iathuh ba i la trei ia kane ka kam mynta la palat 10 snem, kaba i la sdang naduh u snem 2008, da ka jingthmu ban iarap kyntiew lem ia ka kamai kajih ha la ing ha kane ka pyrthei kyrduh kam ym lah ban khmih lynti tang ka kam sorkar.Khlem ka jinglehrain I la sdang ia kane ka kam ban hikai hi da ka ba shu peit ia la u kurim ha ka por ba u trei ia kane ka jait kam shi bynta ban pynbiang ha ing.Da ka jingangnud jong i ban nang i la sdang ban ktah sa da lade wat hapdeng ki jingbakla ha ba trei, teng teng i mad ia ka jingmynsaw ruh, hynrei khlem duh mynsiem ban iai bteng ba haduh mynta, khlem ka jingiarap kiwei ruh i la lah ban trei hi kum ba trei ki shynrang.I meirit i don 13 ngut ki khun, 8 ngut ki kynthei bad 5ngut ki shynrang, 3 ngut na ki, ki la khlad noh, bad bun napdeng ki khun ki dei ba dang pule bad don ruh ki khun ki ba la sdang da ka jinghikai jong i ban trei ia kane ka kam, khnang ba kan ym kut noh hadien bym lah shuh ma i.Shwa ba in trei ia kane ka kam i la iathuh ruh ba i la trei bun ki jait kam kum ka puh lyngkha, trei ha kper slasha bad kiwei.Haba kylli kumno i sngew haba ianujor bad kiwei ki kam kaba ila trei, ila ong ba ka kam hi ka long kumjuh haba trei hok, ka ai jingmyntoi hynrei ka kam lajong ka pher shibun khamtam ha kane ka jingshna shaka kali, ka pynsngew tynnad shisha ia I namar ba im pat ju lap ia kiwei ki kynthei ban trei ia kane ka kam bad kan ai nuksa ia kiwei.Ila iathuh ruh ba don ba kylli, hato im lehrain ban trei ia kane bad u la jubab ba im shym la don kano kano ka jingsngew lehrain bad dem beit khop ha la ka kam.Bun ki rangbah ki shu ang haba ki iohi ia I, namar ba I lah ban pynbha ban shna ia ia ka shaka JCB, ki Trook, ki kali rit bad kiwei.Hynrei kaba pynduna kamai ia I, ka long ba naduh ba la khang ia ka jingtih dewiong ha ka jylla, ka kamai kajih ka la hiar shibun namar ki trok ki la duna ban wan ha ka dukan jong i.Ha ki por ba la dep, i iathuh ba ki ju kamai T.1500 haduh T.2000 shi sngi hynrei mynta ym palat ia ka T. 300 shi sngi ka jingioh.
title: Shna taiar kali, ka longkmie  ba 13ngut khun ha Umsning

content: Jowai, 21 Nailur:U Ma Thombor Shiwat, ula hiar shuki noh mynta ka sngi, kum U Chief Executive Member jong ka Jaintia Hills District Council bad katei ka dei shisngi shwa jong ka dorbar ban ia tynjuh bor jong ka Council, hapdeng ka kynhun jong U Ma Andrew Shullai, uba la shah jied ha ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Comittee (I), ba un shimti kum U CEM ba thymmai jong ka JHADC.Lyngba ka jinghiar shuki jong U Ma Thombor, kumta ka dorbar ba la buh ban pynlong lashai ka sngi, ka lah ban nym bunkam shuh, hynrei, u lamphang dorbar jong ka Council, U Ma Arbor Hima Darnei, un lah ban pynlong rukom tang shipor bad un sa pynwai noh, da kaba pynbeit ia kawei pat ka sngi, ban jied ia U CEM ba thymmai jong ka Council.Ka MPCC, la sngewthuh ba ka la rai ban bujli ia U Ma Andrew Shullai, ha ka jingialang, ha ka 18tarik Nailur, ha kaba la khlieh da U Bah DD Lapang, ha ka jing ia don ryngkat jong ki 19ngut ki MDC Congress, lait noh U Ma Thombor Shiwat, uba khlem leit satia sha katei ka jingialang.Ka jingweng noh jong ka MPCC, ia U Ma Thombor, ka dei namar ba ki shim, ba U Ma Shiwat, uba dei U MDC jong ka Nartiang Umladang, u dei uba don ka jingiadei kaba jan bha bad U Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, uba dang shah pynhap shuki myntri shen, halor ka jingshah kynnoh, ba u thmu ban leit pyn iasoh noh ialade sha ka seng Nationalist Peoples Party (NPP).
title: Hiar shuki U Ma Thombor  Shiwat, kum U CEM JHADC

content: Shillong, 22 Nailur:Ka sorkar ka mynjur ban thung 11 ngut ki doktor bym pule na bhah sorkar (non-bonded) ha ka tnad ka koit ka khiah bad ia kane la mynjur da ka jingialang ka kynhun Myntri.Na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ia kine ki doktor la thung da ka jingphah na ka tnad ka koit ka khiahKatkum ka jingthung kam ka sorkar ia kine ka long ban pyndap ia ka jingdonkam namar ba ka dang sahteng ha ka jingpyniaid ka MPSC.“Ka jingthungkam ka don ruh ia kiba pule na ka bhah sorkar (bonded) bad ngi dang pynkhreh ia ka”, u la ong.U Myntri Ranbah u la ong ba ka jingduna doktor ha ka jylla ka long ym duna ia ka 100 ngut bad kane ka jingeh kan nang iai bteng hynrei ka sorkar kan sa pyrshang ban weng ia ka.Ha kawei ka phang, ka sorkar ka la pynkylla ia ka Service Rule ka tnad khaw ka Meghala Service Rule 1985.Katkum kane ka rule, la bhah ban thungkam da ka jingkhein (ratio) 2:1 kata ka jingthungkam beit da kaba pynlong ia ka jingialeh ekamin la mang 2 bad 1 da kaba shu pynkiew kyrdan hynrei mynta la mang beit mar shiteng kata ia kiba iakhun da ka eksamin bad ia kiba dei ban shu pynkiew kyrdan.Kane ka long na ka bynta ka kam Assistant Conservator of Forest (ACF).
title: Thung ka sorkar 11 ngut ki doktor

content: Shillong, 22 Nailur:Mynta ka sngi ki pulit ka nongbah Shillong ki la kem ia u bah Michael Pakynteiñ uba dei uwei na ki nongialam jong u bah Mohendro Rapsang kyrtong ka seng Congress na West Shillong konstitwensi halor ka jingjia shah kawang Petrol bomb ka ïngsah jong u bah Paul Lyngdoh MLA jong katei ka konstitwensi. Haba ia kren bad u Superitendent of Police ( SP) ka East Khasi Hills u Davis NR Marak u la ong ba la kem ia u bah Michael Pakynteiñ mynta ka sngi hapoh Lumdiengjri Police Station. U la iathuh ba hadien ba la ioh ki jingujor na u bah Paul Lyngdoh MLA, la khot hajir ia u bah Michael ha Lumdiengjri PS bad ha ka por ba u wan hajir la kem artad ia u hangtei. Ia u bah Michael la rah sha ing kashari mynta ka sngi bad la ai por ia ki pulit 14 sngi ban tohkit ia u.U SP u la iathuh ba ki pulit ki la ioh jingujor na u bah Paul Lyngdoh ba ka ingsah jong u ka la shah kawang Petrol Bomb bad ha katei ka jingujor u bah Paul u la kdew ba dei beit u bah Michael Pakynteiñ, uba don kti ha katei ka jingjia. Shuh shuh u la ong ba u bah Paul u la phah sa kawei pat ka jingujor (Supplementary FIR) ba u bah Michael Pakynteiñ u la thoh ia ki jingthoh kiba tohmet ha Facebook pyrshah ia u, kiba u bah Paul u la suhlang ia katei ka jingthoh ha ka jingujor jong u sha ki pulit. Ha katei ka jingthoh Facebook u bah Michael Pakynteiñ u la thoh (Post) ‘ RIP PAUL.LYNGDOH. mis u bro’ bad harum katei ka jingthoh u la thoh biang (Comment) ‘My fren who xpired today’ ka jingthoh kaba pyni ba u bah Paul u la iap. Katei ka jingthoh ka dei kaba la thoh ha ka 2 tarik u nailur ha ka por 11:12 baje mynmiet.U SP u la iathuh ruh ba u la ioh sa kawei pat ka jingujor ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingshah pynpait pynpra ka CCTV jong ka ophis Congress ha Mawprem bad u la phah ia ka kynhun pulit ban leit sha katei ka jaka hynrei ka ophis Congress ka khang. “Ngi la phah ia ka kynhun jong ngi ban leit tohkit bha, hynrei ka ophis Congress ka khang” u la ong.Kham mynshuwa u bah Mohendro Rapsang u la ong ba ha ka jingleit ujor sha ki pulit, halor ka jingshah pynpait pynra ka CCTV u la suhlang ruh ia ka video jong ka CCTV kaba pyni ba ki don 3 ngut ki briew kiba leh ia katei ka kam hynrei u SP u la ong ba u khlem ioh satia ia kata ka video bad ym don ba-ai, hynrei u la ong pat ba mar ia ioh jingujor ki pulit ki la kurup noh ia ki video ban lap ia ki sabut. U la ong shen ki pulit kin sa kem ia ki briew kiba la suba ba ki donkti ha katei ka kam.”Ngam pat iohi ia kata ka video , ym shym la phah ruh sha ngi, ngi hap ban kurup ban lap ia ki jingshisha” u la ong.U Davis NR Marak u la ong ba ka jingjia ha West Shillong konstitwensi kam shym dei ka sien kaba nyngkong hynrei kaba la jia bunsien bad u suba ba ka lah ban dei na ka daw jong ka saiñpyrthei, kumta u la ong ba u la phah ia ki bor pulit ban pahara ha katei ka konstitwensi bad kumjuh ruh u la phah pulit ban pahara ia ka ingsah ubah Paul Lyngdoh, MLA. “Ngin pynthikna ba kan ym don shuh kaba kum katei ka huri hura kumba la jia ha kine ki sngi” u la ong.
title: Kem ki pulit ia U Michael Pakynteiñ, ba  kawang Petrol Bomb ha ïng u bah Paul

content: Nongstoiñ, 22 Nailur:Ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi Thohdieng, iwei i khyllung i ba dang 1 snem 11 bnai ei ei, i la khlad noh hashen hadien ba i la kum hap bad ngam jyllop noh ha kawei ka pung kaba don ha jan Iing jong i kaba don ha ka shnong Mawiawet West Khasi Hills District.Katkum ka tyllong khubor, la ong ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por kumba 1:00 nohsngi, ha ka por ba u kpa jong i tei i khyllung u dang wan na ka jaka bylla ban bam ja sngi bad ha katei ka por i tei i khyllung, i la mih na iing ban lehkai ha jan katei ka pung; hynrei hadien ba u kpa u la mih na iing bad namar ba katei ka pung ka don ha rud lynti u la iohi pynban ba i khun jong i la per ha sla um jong katei ka pung.Shuh shuh la ong ruh ba u kpa jong itei I khyllung da ka jingkyndit u la ryngkoh bad kynrup ia la i khun, hynrei la shem ba itei i khyllung i la dep khlad noh bad hadien katei ka jingjia u kpa bad kiba ha ïng ki la pyntip noh wut wut sha u sordar shnong ha kaba u sordar bad ki rangbah shnong ki la leit sha Nongstoiñ Police Station ban pyntip ïa katei ka jingjia.Ki pulit ruh mar shu ïohjingtip ki la leit bran bran sha katei ka jaka ban sorjamin bad ban pyndep ïa ki jingdon kam bad hadien ba ki pulit ki la pyndep ïa kijingdonkam baroh ki la register ïa ka mokutduma bad na ka liang kiba haïng, da ka jingïarap jong ki pulit ki la leit ban pan jngbit na Ïngbishar ban pyllait na ka postmortem.Hadien ba ka Ïngbishar ka la ai jngbit ki pulit ki la aiti noh ïa ka met ïap itei I khunlung ha kiba ha ïng ba kin pyndep ïa ki jingdon kam baroh bad ka jingtohkit na ka liang jong ki pulit halor katei ka jingjia ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: Khlad I khyllung ba 1 snem, ba  ngam jyllop ha pung Mawiawet

content: Shillong, 24 Nailur:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul M Sangma ha kane ka sngi Saitjain u la ong ba kumba ioh ia ka jylla Meghalaya khlem kano kano ka jingiaumsnam, ka dei ruh ka lynti ba baroh ki jait niam ban iashong suk khlem kano kano ka jingsngew pher.Haba kren ha ka jingdap 25 snem ka jingpynlong ia ka jingiakynduh lang baroh ki kynhun niam ba pynlong da ka Central Puja Committee (CPC) da ka Nepali Puja Committee ha Sri Aurobindo Institute of Indian Culture Auditorium, Shillong ha kane ka sngi Saitjai, u Mukul u la ong, ba ka sienjam ba ka CPC ka la leh na ka bynta ban iakynduh lang baroh ki jait niam shi bynta ban tei ia ka imlang sahlang.Ha kane ka sngi, la don lang ruh u P P Chaudhary, u myntri khynnah ba dei ia ki kompeni, bad ka main, u MP ka Shillong u Bah Vincent H Pala.“Kane ka dei kaba khampher ban bud nuksa ha kiwei ki bynta jong ka ri”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah.U la ong ba ia ka jylla Meghalaya la ioh da ka lynti kaba jai jai khlem kano kano ka jingiaumsnam.“Ngi dei ban buddien ia ki longshwa jong ngi kiba iakhun ban ioh ia ka jylla khlem kano kano ka jingiaumsnam”, u la ong.U la ong ba hynrei kane ka jinglong ka la kylla bad ka la donkam ban pynsaphriang sha kylleng ia ka jingsuk palat ia u pud u sam ka Meghalaya.Ha kane ka sngi, u Dr Mukul u la pynlait ruh ia ka kot sah kynmaw. Shwa ia kane, u Dr Subrata Das, u President, CPC, Meghalaya u la iathuh ba ia ka CPC la thaw ha u snem 1992 na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka jinglehkmen Puja kaba iaid beit ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka bor sorkar.Ha kane ka sngi la ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na ki nongialam niam bapher bapher ba wan sha kane ka jingiakynduh lang nalor u MP.La don lang hangne da ka myntri Kong M Ampareen Lyngdoh, Bah Paul Lyngdoh, Bah A L Hek, Bah Shanbor Shullai, u MDC Bah Adelbert Nongrum.
title: Kyntu U Mukul ban iashong  suk baroh ki jait niam

content: Shillong, 22 Nailur:Ki lad khubor ki iathuh ba ki Muslim ha nongbah Shillong, ki dang thawlad kumno ban iarap ia ki Rohingya Muslim kiba la phet wir mynta na Myanmar, sha kylleng ki jaka.Ha ka jingiakren bad uwei na ki nongialam Muslim, u iathuh ba ka jingiarap, ka dei ban ai bam ai dih ia ki, ban ai jain ai nep bad kumjuh ruh ban ai jaka shong jaka sah, ia kito kiba la wan poiwir sha ki bynta jong ka dong shatei lam mihngi.Dang shen ki Muslim kiba don ha nongbah Shillong ki la mih surok ban iaid paidbah jar jar kum ka dak ka jingpynrem halor ka jingshah pyniap beiñ jong ki Ronghiya Muslim ha Myanmar.Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ki Muslim ha nongbah Shillong ki thawlad kumno ban pynmih pisa bad kumno ban iarap na ka bynta kitei ki para Muslim jong ki kiba mad ia ka lanot na ka jingshah khynra ha ki shipai Myanmar.Lah ban kdew ba ha ka taiew ba la dep, ki la don kumba 700 ngut eiei ki Muslim ha Shillong kiba la mih paidbah ha surok ryngkat la ki pla kad ban iaid jar jar naduh na Mawbah shaduh sha IGP bad wan phai biang sha Mawbah. Katei ka jingiaid paidbah jong ki ka long ban pynrem halor katei ka jingshah thombor bad jingsha pyniap ki Rohingya Muslim ha Myanmar. Ha kine ki sngi da ki lak ngut ki Muslim na Myanmar ki la phet krad sha kylleng ki jaka kiba bun na ki, ki la poi sha ki jaka jong ka ri Bangladesh bd don ruh kiba la kiew sha ki pud ki sam jong ka ri India ban ioh jaka rieh.Katkum ka jingring video jong kawei na ki Channel TV jong ka ri India ka la pyni ba da ki lak ngut mynta ki la poi sha kawei ka iew ha Bangladesh kaba la tip kum ka Coxs Bazar bad hangtei la shna dara ia ki ba kin rieh tngen. Kat kum ka jingiakren kitei ki Muslim bad katei ka khubor TV ki la iathuh ba ki la phet krad na Myanmar na ka daw ba ki shipai Myanmar ki la pyniap beiñ ia kiba bun ngut ki longing longsem jong ki bad tang ban lait im ki la phet krad kat shaba ki poi.
title: Ki jaiñ ki nep, ki jaka shong  jaka sah, ia ki Rohingya

content: Shillong, 24 Nailur:Kum shi bynta na ka jingrakhe ban sa dap 25 snem; ka Synjuk ki Seng Samla Shnong SSSS ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Seng Samla Shnong Wahlyngkhat, ka la pynlong ia ka jing pynkhuid shnong bad pynkhuid ia ki Wahduid kylleng ka Shnong Wahlyngkhat ha ka 23 tarik Nailur, 2017. Kane ka jing pynkhuid ka long ruh kum ka jing iai bteng halor ka thong ka SSSS, ban Sumar bad pynkhuid ia ki Um ki Wah lyngba ka ‘Save Stream Sans Sully’ Campaign.Ha kane ka sngi shwa ban pynkhuid, la sdang shwa da ka jing iasyllok bad batai ia ka thong hapdeng ki nongialam ka SSSS kynthup ia u Chairman bah Van Shan Buhphang, Information Secretary bah Welfrank Thongni, Finance Secretary bah Evanzir Warjri, Assistant Secretary bah Herroi Nongrum, Social & Cultural Secretary bah Iashailang Kharbudon bad Health Secretary bah Bohstar Syiem, bad ki Nong shong shnong Wahlyngkhat kiba la mih khmat da ka Seng Samla Shnong, Seng Kynthei, Seng Treilang, Sport Club, ki Khynnah skul bad u Secretary ka Seng Samla Raid Nongblai bah Seibor Jaktung, ha kaba la don lang ruh u Sordar ka Raid Nongblai bah Batstarson Khongsni, uba la ai jing kyntu kynpham bad pynshlur ia ki khun samla hapoh ka Raid ban ianoh synniang ha baroh ki liang ba bha khamtam ha ka khuid ka suba. La ioh ruh ka jingkren sdang na u Rangbah Shnong Wahlyngkhat, bah Banteiskhem Nongrum uba la ban jur ban don ka jing kit khlieh ban iatreilang bad pynwandur thymmai kumno ban wanrah ka khuid ka suba ha shnong ha thaw.U Chairman ka SSSS bah VanShan Buhphang kum u nongialam, u la pyn kynmmaw ba ka Seng Samla Wahlyngkhat, ka la shim khia bad mait phang naduh u snem 1999, ia shibun bah ki kam ba iadei bad ka jing pynkhuid shnong, sumar bad maramot ia ki tyllong um bam um dih, ki lynti synkien, bad khamtam ban pynkhuid ia ki wah duid. Halor ka khuid ka suba ngi lah ban ong ba ngin la jan ioh ia ka thong, da ka jing shim khia lang ka Dorbar Shnong mynta ban pynkhuid man la u bnai.Ka Ophis Nehru Yuva Kenrda Sangathan, Shillong ruh ka la shimti lang ban pynlong ia ka Wahlyngkhat kum kawei na ki shnong kaba khuid ba suba da ka jing iatreilang bad ka Seng Samla Raid Nongblai lyngba ki prokram ba pher ba pher, hynrei ka jingeh ka long haba ki briew ki bret ia ki jaboh bad plastic jingbam na ki kali sha ki surok.Kumta, ka SSSS ka kyntu jur ia ki baroh kiba niah kali ba kin buh i pla thep niut hapoh kali jongki, khnang ba kiba shong kali kin nym bret shabar ne surok bad la ai jingmut ruh ba ka Sorkar jylla kan pynlong ain noh ba baroh ki kali kin buh la ki pla thep niut bad theh pat ha ki jaka bret theh niut ba la buh kyrpang.Hadien kane ka jingiasyllok, ki paidbah baroh ki la kular ban ai ka jing iatreilang kaba paka ban iada ia ka mei mariang nabynta ka lawei jong ki hi. Bad ki la iamih lang ryntih lang naduh ki khynnah haduh ki rangbah, ban pynkhuid ia ki lynti synkien ka shnong bad ki wah duid baroh kiba kynthup ia ka Wah Lynter, Wah Pynlang, Wah Pomdngiem bad ka Wah Jordan. Hadien ka jing pynkhuid lah ban iohi biang ia ka jing itynnad bad jing ithiang ki wahduid ha kylleng ka shnong Wahlyngkhat ha kane ka sngi.
title: Kwah ka SSSS, da ki  pla bret niut hapoh kali

content: Shillong, 24 Nailur:Hadien shiteng bnai eiei ba la sah ha ka jinglynga pisa, ki 10 ngut ki samla ka jylla ki la ioh ia ka rai na ka Supreme Court kala pynmih ïa ka hukum ba ka Sorkar Assam ba ka dei ban pdiang klas noh ïa ki ha ka MBBS kiba dei na Meghalaya.Kane ka kam, ka la hap ban tied jingkhang sha ka Kashari hadien ba kine ki samla na Megalaya ki la shah kyntait ban ïoh rung klas ha ki Medical College ha Assam kaba la jia naduh u bnai ba la dep.Ka Kashari Supreme Court kaba la mih ia ka rai ha ka jingshong bishar kaba long ha ka sngi Thohdieng hadien ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la ujor da ka mukotduma da ka Specïal Leave Petition ha ka 4 tarik Nailur pyrshah ia ka sorkar Assam halor ka jingkyntait ban pdiang ia kine ki samla ban pule doktor ha ki jaka pule doktor ha katei ka jylla.Ka Kashari ba kynthup ïa u Chief Justice AM Khanwilkat bad u Justice DY Chandrachud, ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ba la hukum ba ka Assam ka dei ban ai bhah pule Doktor ba 10 tylli na ka 27 tylli sha ki samla pule ka Meghalaya.
