Ka Kashari kala ong ba ka Jylla Assam kala ïoh haduh 17 tylli na ki 27 tylli.Ka Kashari kala bthah ruh ïa baroh artylli ki Jylla-ka Assam bad Meghalaya ba kin pynlong ïa ka jingïasyllok kaba iatei bad ba iahap khnang ba ki samla ba dei ban ïoh pule kin dei kiba la pyndep ïa ka NEET.Kane ka hukum ka dei tang ka jingpynbeit ba shipor hynrei ïa ki kynrum kynram bala kdew hapoh ka Special Leave Petition yn sa bishar biang ha ka taiew ba-ar jong u bnai Kyllalyngkot 2018.Ka Jylla Meghalaya, ka la ïoh ïa ka bhah pule MBBS ba 10 tylli naduh u snem 1976 bad ïa kane la leh kay kum ka soskular hapdeng ki ar tylli ki Jylla, ïa kaba la shu pynduh pyndam ha u snem bala lah.Ka Assam ka la ai ïa ka bhah pule ba 10 tylli ïa ki samla pule MBBS ka Jylla Meghalaya-saw tylli ha Assam Medical College, Guwahati Medical College bad artylli ha Silchar Medical College.
title: Hadien shiteng bnai, ioh pule  doktor 10 ngut ki samla sha Assam

content: Nongstoiñ, 24 Nailur:Uwei u rangbah, uba la tip kyrteng kum u Deoris Paliar 40 snem, u ba na Nonbah Lad Rambrai jong ka shnong New Nongstoiñ, u la mynsaw jur na ki bynta jong ka kti hadien ba u la shah lympat ha ka bor ding ilektrik.Kat kum ka tyllong khubor na ki heh pulit jong ka District, la ong ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka step jong ka sngi Saitjain jong ka taiew bala lah katba u tei u rangbah u dang leit sha ka jingiakob khwai dohkha, ha kawei ka pung kaba don ha Nongjyllieh West Khasi Hills kaba dei ruh ka shnong kaba don ha rud surok bah na Nongstoiñ sha Mawkyrwat.Shuh shuh la ong ruh ba katba u tei u rangbah u dang thmu ban kawang ia u khwai sha katei ka pung, hynrei kumno re kumno, u ryngwiang jong u tei u rangbah u la leit ban tyngkhuh bad u sainar ilektrik,u ba don ha jrong jong katei ka pung ha kaba u la shah lympat ruh ha ka ding bad ha katei ka por u wei u briew u ba don hajan u la mynsaw malu mala namar ba u la leit ban ktah ia u tei u rangbah.Ia u tei u rangbah u ba la mynsaw jur na ki bynta jong ka kti la pynkit noh mar mar sha Civil Hospital Nongstoiñ ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba kyrkieh.
title: Tyngkhuh u ryngwiang  khwai ia u sainar ilektrik

content: Shillong, 24 Nailur:U MLA shimet na Mawryngkneng, u Bah David Nongrum, u la ong ba haduh mynta um pat don kano kano ka jingthmu ban pan tiket na kano kano ka seng bad un sa peit pat kham hadien ia kane lada donkam.Haba iakren mynta ka sngi, u Bah David u la ong “Ngam pat don kano kano ka jingthmu ban pan tiket na kano kano ka party haduh mynta”,.Katkum ka jingong jongu, ia mynta um pat lah ban ong eiei halor ka jinglong jinggman ka sain pyrthei hynrei un sa shim ia ka rai haduh u Nohprah ban wan bad kata hadien ba ka jingiasyllok bad ki paidbah nongkyrshan.“Ngan sa shim ia ka rai haduh u Nohprah hynrei mynta ngam pat don kano kano ka jingpan tiket na kano kano ka party ne na ka Congress”, la ong u Bah David.Ha kine ki sngi, ka la mih ka jingiakren ba u MLA ka Mawryngkneng u lah ban pan tiket noh na ka Congress ha kane ka elekshon MLA ban wan hadien ba u kyrtong ba la iakhun u Bah Pynehborlang Mukhim uba long ruh u President ka Mawryngkneng Block Congress Committee (MBCC) la risain noh na kane ka party.Ka HSPDP ka la dep pynbna ia u Bah Blatsbor Kharpran, katba ka PDF ka la rai ban pynieng ia u Bah Highlander Kharmalki.
title: Ym pat rai u MLA ka Mawryngkneng, ban pan tiket na ka seng sain pyrthei

content: Shillong, 24 Nailur:Ka Jain Terapanth Mahila Mandal, ka la pynlong ia ka jingsumar khmat ei ha Goenka Cantonment Hospital ha ryngkat ka jingsnohkti lang ka Cantonment Board,Shillong bad ka jingiatreilang bad ka Bansara eye Hospital.La plie ia katei ka jingsumar khmat ei da u V.Kyndiah, CEO Cantonment Board, ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang U Manas Choudhury MLA barim jong ka Constituency, ki Jain bad kiwei pat ki kynhun.Ka Jain ka la ai khublei ia u CEO bad ka Dr.J.V Basaiawmoit Managing Director ka Bansara, namar ka jinglah ban pynurlong ia katei ka kam. Ha katei ka sngi ki la don 373 ngut ki nongpang khmat kiba la wan ban shah sumar ryngkat ka jingleh Check up.
title: 373 ngut ai jingsumar khmat ei ka Jain Mahila Mandal

content: Shillong, 24 Nailur:Ki samla ba iakhun ia ka eksamin kam Pulit SF-10 ha ka sngi Saitjain ki la ialum biang ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha madan student, Jaiaw.Ha kane ka jingialang la wan ban iashimbynta ruh da ki samla na kiwei pat ki jaka kynthup na Rilum Garo. Ha kane ka jingialang ki la rai ban mudui da ka Public Iinterest Litigation (PIL) ha ka taiew ban wan lyngba u Kishore Gautam u ban long u nongiasaid ain jong ki.Ki don palat 1000 ngut ki samla, kiba la poi shaduh ka personal interbiw na ka bynta ka kam pulit SF-10, hynrei ia ka result pat ki khlem ioh satia namar ka jingujor jong uwei u samla wad kam da kaba kam ba ka jingpyniaid ia ki examin kim long khuid.
title: Ha ka taïew ban wan, yn  mudui PIL ki samla SF-10

content: Shillong, 24 Nailur:Ka la don ka jingkynnoh na ki kynhun bapher ba u ophisar sorkar u ba hH.M Shangpliang u la pyndonkam bakla ia ka bor jong u kum u ophisar sorkar da kaba leit ban leh politik ha Mawsynram konstitwensi ha kaba la ong ruh ba un dei u kyrtong jong ka seng Congress ha ka elekshon MLA 2018. Dang shen ka CSWO bad ka TUR ka la dawa na ka sorkar ba kan sospon ia u bah H.M Shangpliang, ym ban ai VRS bad ban pynduh lut ia baroh ki jingmyntoi kiba ki nongtrei sorkar ki dei ban ioh.Haba ia kren bad u MLA ka Mawsynram u bah Pynshngain N Syiem u la ong ba ki ophisar sorkar kim dei satia ban khein sting, tang namar ba ki don jingiadei bajan bad ki bor ba halor namar ba ka sorkar ka leit bad ka wan. “Ki ophisar kim dei ban khein sting da kaba pyndonkam bakla ia ka bor bad ka kyrdan jong ki hynrei ki dei ban bud beit bud ryntih katkum ki kyndon bad ki ain kiba la teh ia ki, ka sorkar ka leit bad ka wan hynrei ki kyndon jong ka ain ki neh kumjuh” ong u bah Pynshngai.Ha kaba ia dei bad ki jingkynnoh ia u bah H.M Shangpliang u bah Pynshngain u la ong “Tang namar ba u bah Pynshngain u ia tyngkhuh bad u myntri rangbah, ym dei ban shu shim sting satia ban shu pyndonkam bakla katba mon ia ka bor, ka jingiadei jong nga bad u myntri rangbah, ka iaid la ka jong hynrei ki ophisar kim dei pat ban shim kabu, ki dei ban trei katkum ka kyrdan ba la pynkupbor ha ki” ong biang u bah Pynshngain. U la ong ba na ka liang jong u um don eiei ban leh pyrshah ia u bah H.M Shangpliang, u ban sa ia khun pyrshah ia u, “Ngam don eiei ban leh, nga shu ong ba ki ophisar ki dei ban trei kum ki ophisar bad ki dei ban kynmaw bha ruh ba ka sorkar ka lah ban leit bad ka lah ban wan” u la ong.Utei u MLA ka Mawsynram uba la shah sospon ha ka seng Congress uba dei ruh u Chief Executive Member ka KHADC u la ong ba ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ka la don ka jingpaw ha ki khubor ba u Chairman jong kato ka jingialang u dei u Chairman jong ka Mawsynram Block Congress Committee, “Naduh mynno u Chairman jong ka Mawsynram Block Congress, u la kylla long u Chairman jong ka MHIS, u Adviser jong ka Mawsynram Block Congress naduh mynno u la kylla long u Adviser jong ka MHIS , naduh mynno la pynkylla ia ka MHIS kum ka mishon 2018, mano u Darwin Lyngdoh, u Darwin Lyngdoh u dei Vice President jong ka Lawbah Congress Committee” u la ong.
title: Naduh mynno U Chairman ka Mawsynram  Block, ula long U Chairman ka MHIS

content: Shillong, 25 Nailur:U Nongialam liangpyrshah ha KHADC na ka Congress u Bah Mansturdy Nongrem, u la ong ba u Bah Jansing M Tynsong u la leit ban kyrshan ia ka People Democratic Forum (PDF) ba ialam da u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem, namar ba um lah shan ban shong ha ka liang pyrshah bad u hap ban leit sha ka liangsynshar.Haba iakren mynta ka sngi, u Bah Mansturdy u la iathuh ba hadien ba la ioh ia ka shithi na u Bah Jansing ba u leit kyrshan ia ka Executive Committee (EC), ka PDF, u la phun ia u ban kylli balei un leit kyrshan ia ka liangsynshar haba ka Congress ka don ha ka liangpyrshah.“Nga la iakren bad u, mar ia ioh ia ka shithi ba u leit kyrshan ia ka PDF ban kylli ia ka daw, bad u la jubab ba um lah shan ban don ha ka liangpyrshah bad u hap ban leit sha ka liangsynshar”, la ong u Bah Mansturdy.U Bah Mansturdy u la ong ba lada u leit kyrshan ia ka PDF, u Bah Jansing u dei ban risain shwa na ka party Congress lym kumta, um lah ban leit kyrshan haba ka party ka don ha ka liangpyrshah.“Nga la ong ia u ba lada u kyrshan ia ka PDF, u dei ban risain shwa na ka Congress hynrei um lah ban leit kyrshan sha ka PDF”, la ong u Bah Mansturdy.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Mansturdy, u Bah Jansing u la ong ba u shu leit kyrshan ia ka PDF hynrei u dang dei u MDC ka Congress, hynrei kane kam lah ban long.“Ngin iashong jingialang ka Parliamentary Party ban iakren ia kane bad ngin sa pyntip sha ka MPCC ba kan leh ia kaba donkam ia u Bah Jansing”, la ong u Bah Mansturdy.Haba kylli hato ka jingleit kyrshan jongu sha ka PDF, ka dei tang namar ba u shah hukum ha u MLA ka Pynursla hadien ba ka MPCC ka la pyndam ia ka Pynursla Block Congress kaba mihkhmat da u Bah Prestone Tynsong, uba dei u mama kur jong u Bah Jansing, u Bah Mansturdy u la ong ba ia kata, um pat ioh jingtip, hynrei ka jingleit kyrshan jong u sha ka PDF ka lah ban don eiei ka daw.Lah ban kdew ba u Bah Jansing u la leit ban kyrshan ia ka PDF ha KHADC hadien katto katne sngi ba ka MPCC ka la pyndam noh ia ka Block Pynursla Congress kaba thew pyrshah ia u MLA katei ka thain, uba la lah ban iakhun noh na kawei ka party ha kane ka elekshon ban wan.
title: U Bah Jan, u ong ym lah ban shong  liangpyrshah, ong u Bah Man

content: Shillong, 25 Nailur:Hadien 8 bnai ba ka la jah rngai, ki pulit ki la ioh ban pyllait im ia kawei ka samla kaba la shah rahbor ha ki runar na nongbah Guwahati. Katei ka samla kaba dang 24 snem karta ka dei na Jowai bad ka dei kaba pule nos ha GNRC Hospital, Guwahati. Katei ka samla ka la jah na jaka sah jong ka ha ka 2 tarik u rymphang, 2017.Ha ka 21 tarik u rymphang ka kmie jong ka, ka la ujor ha Dispur PS ba ka khun jong ka-ka la jah rngai bad kham hadien ka la ujor biang ba ha Lumdiengjri PS ha ka 26 tarik u rymphang. Tang mar ia ioh jingtip ki pulit ki la buddien ia katei ka kes bad khadduh ki la lap ia ka ha Khalpara-Siliguri, West Bengal.Halor katei ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ioh kem ia u Nur Muhammad na ka shnong Sonatary kaba hap hapoh ka Tarabari PS Barpeta. La iarap ia ki pulit ka East Khasi Hills, da ki pulit ka Assam na Boko PS. La ong ba u Nur u dei u briew uba katei ka samla ka ia kynduh khadduh bad la ong ba ki tiar ki tar jong katei ka samla ki don bad u, la antad ba u la ieh ia ka ha Hajo, hadien ba la ryngkang sha shiliang ka jingkieng Saraighat.Ki pulit ka Guwahati ki la rejistar kes vide Basistha PS Case No. 260(04)2017 u/s 366/376 IPC bad ki la kem ia utei u briew.Ki pulit ki dang tohkit bniah ia katei ka jingjia ban kem ia kiwei pat kiba donkti ban rahbor ia katei ka samla.
title: Hadien 8 bnai, lap ia ka  samla pule Nos na Siliguri

content: Mawkyrwat, 25 Nailur:Da ki spah ngut ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Lawblei South West Khasi Hills District, ki la leit ban pyniasoh noh ia lade sha ka seng HSPDP na ka bynta ban ai jingkyrshan kaba pura ia u bah Renikton Lyngdoh u ba dei u kyrtong jong ka Party HSPDP u ban iakhun ia ka election MLA na Mawkyrwat Konstitwensi.Katei ka pawshai ruh ha kawei na ki jingialang kaba la long ha ka sngi saitjain jong ka taiew ba la lah ha ka shnong Lawbei ha kaba ki spah ngut ki paidbah jong katei ka shnong kila ia tuid sah katei ka jingialang wat hapdeng jong ka jingdum jong ka miet bad ki la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingkyrmen ba u kytong jong ka party HSPDP un ioh ban rah ia ka jingjop ha katei ka election sha ka iing Dorbar thaw ain jong ka Jylla ka ban sa long shen.U bah Nolipstar Lyngdoh President ka HSPDP Area Unit SWKH District, ha ka kyrwoh khubor bala phah u la ong ba ka jingioh ticket jong u bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar naka party HSPDP kala long ka jingkyrmen ia ka party khamtam ha kane ka election ka ban sa long namar kumba ka ju long baroh shi katta ka party HSPDP ha katei ka shnong ka long kaba tlot bha hynrei mynta ka kynti kala pynkyndit ia ki nongkitkam jong ka party namar ba ki paidbah nongkyrshan na katei ka shnong la kumno kumno kila poi sha ka 70 na ka shi spah.Shuh shuh ha katei ka sngi la ioh ruh ban thaw bad pynskhem ia ki nongkitkam jong ka party ha katei ka Polling Station ba kynthup ia ki samla bad ki rangbah.
title: Da ki spah ngut pyniasoh HSPDP, ha  Lawblei ban kyrshan ia u bah Renikton

content: Shillong, 25 Nailur:Hynnin ka sngi shi kynhun ki MDC ka Congress, kiba kwah ban pynneh ia u Bah Thombor Shiwat kum u CEM ka JHADC, ki la iashong jingialang ha Pongtung Guest House kaba don harum Pynursla ban nym ailad ia u Bah Andrew Shullai ban jop ha ka jingiatynjuh bor ha ka dorbar, ka ban long ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai.Kat kum ka khubor, ba la iohlum la iathuh ba kine ki MDC kumba san ne hynriew ngut na Jaintia Hills, ki la iakynduh sop sop bad u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ban thaw lad kumno ban pynkhyllem ia u Bah Andrew Shullai ban pynneh ia u Bah Thombor Shiwat uba shah pynhiar shuki da ka hukum ka MPCC. La iathuh ba kine ki MDC, ki la don ha katei ka Guest House la ar sngi eiei.
title: Ha Pongtung, kynduh ki MDC JHADC  ia u Bah Prestone, Sniawbhalang

content: Shillong, 25 Nailur:Ka Civil Society of Women Organisation (CSWO), ka la pynrem jur ia ka jingshah khi lai nuid lai ngut ki samla kynthei ha ka Seng Kynthei Pynthor, tang namar ba ki iaid miet.Ha ka ejahar, ka President ka CSWO ka Kong Agnes Kharshiing, ka la ong ba ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 11:30 baje mynmiet, ki lai ngut ki kynthei (buhrieh kyrteng) ki la shah khi lai nuid bad shoh da u dieng kum u dieng tied hockey, ha khmat ki paidbah bad kane ka dei ka kam beain bad ka jingpynjah burom ia ki kum ki kynthei briew. Ka dei ruh ka jingpynkhein ia ka hok briew man briew, la ong ka CSWO.Halor kane, ka ain ka dei ban pynshitom ia kito ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam beain bad leh riew khlaw khlem jingmap.Ka CSWO ka la dawa ruh ba ka Women Commission, ka dei ban pynthikna ba kito ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam, ki dei ban tan ha ka ain, namar ba ka dei ka kam beain bym lah ban pdiang.Ha kawei ka liang, ha ka ejahar ba ai da kine ki lai ngut ki kynthei, ki la kam ba ha ka miet 14 tarik kumba ha ka 11:30 baje mynmiet, katba ki dang wan na thain Demsieniong da ka kali, ynda la poi ha Pynthor ka kynhun ki kynthei kiba pahara ia ka shnong ki la pynieng ia ka kali jongki bad phah hiar shabar bad mar kumta ki la patan ia ki bad tied da u kynja dieng kum u dieng tied hockey, haduh ba jngem lut ki bynta ba shah shoh.Katkum ka ejahar kine ki kynthei, ki la kynnoh ba kitei ki briew kiba don ha katei ka jaka bad u Rangbah Shnong ki la ong ia kita ki shynrang kiba wan lang bad ki, ba ki sniew bok ki iadon bad kine ki lai ngut ki kynthei, namar lada dei ba ki wan bad kiwei ki kynthei, kim nym jia eiei kumtei.Ha ka ejahar, ki la kynnoh ruh ba ki briew kiba don ha katei ka jaka, ki la thap ia ki, bad ki la patan ia ki shniuh jongki bad don kiba kynnoh ba ki dei kiba iaid awria bad dei ban khap ia ki shniuh jongki bad kumta hi ki la khap ia ki shniuh jongki.Katkum ka ejahar la kynnoh ruh ba don kiba mut ban khap ia ki shniuh ki shynrang ruh kiba wan lang bad ki, hynrei namar ba ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong, ki map noh. Ki la phun ia ki pulit ha ka por 2 baje, hynrei ynda la wan ki pulit kim lah ban leh eiei bad haduh ka por 5 baje mynstep la ialam sha Police station bad la phun ia kiba haiing hasem jongki, hynrei haduh 9:30 baje mynstep ruh kim wan mih satia kiba haiing jongki bad la phun ia kawei ka seng bhalang kaba wan iarap ia ki.Haduh mynta kine ki kynthei, ki la ong, ba ki don bad ka jingshah hikai bad kawei ka seng Lamjingshai Manbha Foundation Organisation.
title: Shah khi lai nuid 3 ngut ki kynthei  & jngem ka met ba shah shoh

content: Nongstoiñ, 26 Nailur:Kiba ha iing ha sem jong u Maieid Hoping Stone Lyngdoh Nonglait, ha ryngkat ka kur Lyngdoh Nonglait, ha ka jingrakhe ban kynmaw burom ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba ar jong u Maieid Hoping kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha ka shnong Mawkyllei, ki la ioh ban pynkup burom ia palat spah ngut ki volunteer kiba la iakhun ryngkat bad u Maieid Hoping ban iakhih paidbah na ka bynta ban dawa ia ka Hills State lane ka Jylla kaba pura.Ha katei ka sngi nalor ka jingpynkup burom ia ki volunteer, kiba la iakhun Hill State la ioh ruh ban pyni ruh ia ka phlim lyngkot shaphang ka jingim bad ka kam jong u Maieid Hoping bad hadien katei la ioh ruh ban pyllait paidbah sa ia ka thup jingrwai kaba la ai kyrteng “Ban sah pyrto” ia kaba la pyllait paidbah da u kongsan.Na ka liang jong U Rev. PBM Basaiawmoit haba ai jingkren kum u kongsan ha katei ka sngi, u la ong ba ia ka kyrteng jong u bah Hoping u la ioh sngew nyngkong eh ha ka snem 1970 shwa ba ka Prime Minister jong ka Ri India ka Indira Gandhi kan wan ban plie ia ka Autonomous Sate ha madan Kirkit ha Laban. Haba la pule ia kata ka jingplie ia kata ka Autonomous State, ka la ing ka mynsiem, ong U Pastor Basaiawmoit, da kaba u la ong ba u dang kynmaw tiak tiak ha ki snem 44 bad 45 mynba u dang khynnah ki nongiakhih Hill State ki la pyrta bad dawa “No Hill State No Rest” kaba la pynlyngngoh ia u ban ong ba ‘Kumno pynban da kata ka Autonomous State kaba 60% ia ka bor, katba 40% ka bat da ka Jylla Assam’.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba u la ioh sngew ba ki don ki nongpyrshah ia kata ka Autonomous State u la ong ba ka mynsiem ka jong u kala im bad haba pyrshang ban wad ia kita ki nongialam, la lap ba dei u bah Hoping kum u nongialam ba radbah ban iakhih da kaba rah lama iong ha ka por ba ka Indira Gandhi ka wan ban plie ia ka Autonomous State bad naduh katei ka por u la leit man kapor sha ka ophis jong ka HSPDP ban iakynduh ia ki nongtrei bad naduh katei kapor ka la sdang ka jingiadei ka jong u bad u Maieid Hoping lem bad ka seng HSPDP.“U bah Hoping ym dei tang ba u shah beh ha ka seng APHLC, hynrei wat ia ka jingim ka jong u ruh ki bun kiba thap ha kaba shiteng miet u hap ban wan phet noh na Tura, bad bun bah kiba kren bein ia u bah Hoping hynrei sngewtynnad pat ba wat la kitei ki jingeh baroh u bah Hoping um ju kynrandien satia, haduh ba u wei na ki Minister u hap ban pan map na u bah Hoping ha Parliament, tang na ka daw ba u tei u Minister u kren bein ia u bah Hoping da kaba u la ong ba haei ka don kata ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka jubab kaba u tei u Minister u ioh na u bah Hoping ka long ‘Lada mem tip ia ka Jylla Meghalaya ka bha ban mih noh na Parliament bad mih noh na ka Ri India’ bad uta u dei u bah Hoping Stone Lyngdoh” ong u Rev. PBM Basaiawmoit.Ym tang kata u Pastor u la kyntu ruh ia ki MDC jong ka KHADC, da kaba u la ong ban pyndonkam ia ka Para 12 A, katba dang lah ban pyndonkam bad rah ia ka resolution hapoh District Council ban ia ka Atomic Energy Act 1972 kan nym treikam hapoh ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council, bad yn sa ia peit ba ka Assembly kan mynjur ne em, u MP ka Lok Sabha un mynjur ne em ngin peit bad dei bam rah namar ka don ha ka para 12 A ba u President u lah ban weng ia kano kano ka ain, hynrei ka dei ban sdang shwa na District Council ban rah ia ka resolution bad ngin iabuddien lang bad ngi ki paidbah.“U bah Hoping u da sah nud eh ia ka ishu khappud ha kaba u da angnud ruh ban tei syndon da ki surok ha kylleng sawdong jong ki khappud ko MLA Border phi la ia shna mo kata ka border Road u Maieid Hoping” pynkut u Pastor Basaiawmoit.Kiwei kiwei ki nongkren ha katei ka sngi ki kynthup ia u CEM ka KHADC u bah P. N. Syiem, u bah Witting Mawsor MLA ka Mawshynrut, u bah K. P. Pangniang MLA ka Rambrai, u bah H. B. Nongsiej MLA ka Mawthadraishan, u bah LG Nongsiej MDC ka Nongstoiñ, u bah B. B Warjri MDC ka Mawthadraishan, u bah Morning Mawsor MDC ka Mawshynrut, u bah Pyniaid S Syiem MDC, ki MLA bad MDC barim ki ba ha iing ha sem bad kiwei kiwei.Ia kaba kum katei ka juh ka jingrakhe la ioh ruh ban pynlong ha Nongstoin ia kaba la pynlong ha madan Tiehsaw bad hashwa ban pynlong ia ka jingialang bad ki prokram bapher bapher, la pynlong shuwa ia ka jingiaid paidbah, kaba la ishim bynta da u MLA ka Nongstoin bah D. Jyndiang, kong Biolinda Lyngdoh Nonglait kaba dei ka kyrtong MLA na Mawthadraishan Konstitwensi, ki nongniah bike, ki nongshong kulai bad ki paidbah.
title: Ha ka jingim U Bah Hoping, bun kiba thap, u hap phet shiteng miet na Tura:PBM

content: Nongstoiñ, 26 Nailur:U CEM ka KHADC u bah PN Syiem ha ka jingialang rakhe ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba ar jong u Maieid Hoping Stone Lyngdoh, u la pynbna paidbah ba na ka liang jong ka District Council lyngba ka Arts and Culture, kan sa tei ia u Mot dur (Statue) jong u Maieid Hoping hapoh Nongstoiñ ha ka mang pisa kaba 6 lak tyngka.Ym tang kata nalor katei u bah Pynshngain u la pynbna ruh ba na ka liang jong ka District Council kan sa tei bad thoh ruh ia u maw tablet ban ong ba ia ka jaka ba la pyniieng bad tei ia ka ophis jong ka District Council ha Nongstoiñ, la ai sngewbha da u Maieid Hoping Stone Lyngdoh bad kumjuh ia ka khyndew kaba don hapoh Langumshing West Khasi Hills District, ia kaba u tei u rangbah u la ai sngewbha sha ka Distirct Council ha kaba ka District Council kan sa thoh ruh ia ka sign board ha katei ka jaka ha ka dur kaba I shong kun bad shong khia bha.Shuh shuh haba ai jingkren kum u CEM jong ka KHADC ha katei ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba ar jong u Maieid Hoping, u bah Pynshngain u la ong ba lyngba ki khana lyngkot la sngewthuh shai ba u tei u rangbah u la mad ia shibun bah ki jingeh ha ka jingialeh ka jong u, na ka bynta ban pynim ia ka Ri bad ka Jaitbynriew.“Ngi hap ban ai ka jingiaroh ia u Maieid Hoping, namar u don ia ka jingshlur u ba don ia ka nongrim jong ka jingshisha bad u ba khlem kylla long nongkhaii na ka kma sain Hima Sima kum ba long ki politishan mynta bad ngi ioh sngew ruh ia ki khana lyngkot kiba la iathuh ba tang na ka daw ba u leit ban pynpra ia ka khyrdop Monopoly jong u wei u Marwari ha ka thain Shiliang um ban pynim ia ki nongkhaii kiba rit ha kato ka thain u shah beh noh na ka seng APHLC ha kaba ha ka jingshisha la dei ban pynkiew kyrdan ia u ha ka APHLC ba u iada ia kiba rit ba ria, hynrei la beh noh ia u” ong u CEM.U CEM u la bynrap shuh shuh da kaba u ong ba ngin tip kan jia aiu ia ka Jylla ka jong ngi, lada ngim don ia u nongialam u ba stad bad u ba shlur kum U Maieid Hoping, u ba la long u nongialam naduh ban iakhih Hills state bad u la ong ruh ba ngi dang donbok pat ba ngi dang don ia u tei u nongialam u ba iohi jngai u ba khlem khein ia ka spah ia ka burom bad ia ka shuki bad tang na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew, hynrei kaba sngewsih pat ka long ba ia ki jingthmu ba bha jong u tei u riew rangbah la bun satang ki nongwoh kjat ha kaba kiba bun ki ishu u khlem lah ban pyndep namar ba ym don nong kyrshan bad kitei ki ishu ki kynthup ia ka khyndew ka shyiap ka ishu khappud ka 12 A bad kiwei kiwei.“Wat la u Maieid hoping u khlem lah shuh ban pyndep ia kiba bun ki ishu, hynrei ym lei lei ma ngi ki longdien ngin pyrshang ban pynurlong ia kitei ki ishu ba dang sah teng jong u tei u nongialam bad lada ma ngi ngim lah ban pyndep lut ki pateng ban dang wan kin sa pyndep” la ong biang u CEM.
title: Ba pynpra ka khyrdop, u marwari ha shiliang um, beh ia U Ma Hoping na ka APHLC

content: Shillong, 26 Nailur:Ka Meghalaya Commercial Vehicle’s Union ka la ia kynduh ia u Deputy Commissioner jong ka State Transport Authority Meghalaya, Shillong ban ia kren halor ki ar bynta kawei ka dei na ka jingjyllei ki trok ba nabar jylla kiba wan ban kamai laitluid bad knieh lut ia ka jingkamai jong ki trok trai muluk kum ka jingkit dewbilat, kit jhur, kit mawshun bad kiwei kiwei. Ki la pyntip ba kitei ki kali ba long trai da ki bar jylla kim don wat tang ka Regional Permit, Work ne Labour Permit ne ka Trading License. Kawei pat ka mat ka dei ban ioh jingtip halor ka bai kit bai bah ba la buh da ka sorkar.Ha katei ka jingiakynduh kaba la long ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai ka MCVU, ka la ong ba u DC ka STA bad u DTO Enforcement ki la kular ban shimkhia mardor ia katei ka kam bad ki la ai kopi ruh ia ka dor bai kit bai bah. Ka Union ka la lap ba ka sorkar ka la leh sting khlem da pynthymmai ia ka dor bai kit kaba la buh naduh u snem 2005. Katei ka union ka la dawa na ka sorkar ba kan kyntiew noh ia ka dor bai kit bai bah, ka la kyntu ia baroh ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat ba nangne shakhmat ka dor bai kit dewbilat kan long T.1.25 tyngka shi kwintal bad la ai por shi taiew ban pyntreikam ia katei ka dor. Katei ka kynhun ka la kyntu ia baroh ki bar jylla ba kim dei shuh ban kit ia ki mar khlem da ioh jingbit na ki bor ba dei peit ban lait na kino kino ki jingeh.
title: Ujor ka MCVU ba kamai laitluid ki trok bar jylla

content: Shillong, 26 Nailur:Ki dkhot ka Kur Nongkhlaw ki la ujor pyrshah ia u Bah Thres Kurwar Sadew uba kylla na ka jait Nongkhlaw hadien ba u la shah jied kum u myntri ka Hima Mylliem.Ki dkhot ka kur Nongkhlaw kiba iasoi ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti sha u Executive Member ka KHADC ba peit ia ka Elaka, u Bah Latiplang Kharkongor, ki la ong ka jingjied myntri ia u Bah Thres Kurwar Sadew, ym shym la jied da ka kur Nongkhlaw ka Sadew kumba ju leh, hynrei la shu jied tang 7 ngut kiba shu kylla kur Kurwar Sadew na ka kur Nongkhlaw lyngba ka affidavit.Ha ka dorkhas, kine ki dkhot ka kur ki la ong ba uno uno uba kha na ka kmie kur Nongkhlaw u dei na ka kur Nongkhlaw bad ym lah ban kylla kur kylla jait khlem ka tangjait katkum ka rukom u Khasi bad kata ruh ryngkat ka jingiamynjur lang ka kur.Ki la kynnoh ba dei u Syiem barim ka Hima u Paiem Latho Manik Syiem uba la kyntu ia ki katto katne ki dkhot ka longing ban kylla ia ka jait jongki na Nongkhlaw sha Kurwar sadew da ka affidavit.
title: Dawa weng myntri ka Kur Nongkhlaw

content: Shillong, 26 Nailur:Mynta ka sngi, ki pulit ki la kem 12 ngut ki kynthei kiba dei ki dkhot ka seng longkmie Pynthor halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki donkti ban khi lai nuid ia ki lai ngut ki samla kynthei haduh ba thoh ia kane ka khubor kim pat lait satia na police station.Katkum ka jingiakren bad u Rangbah Shnong u Bah Batskhem Sten u la iathuh ba 8 ngut ki longkmie ki la shah rah ha ki pulit ka Sardar Police station bad 4 ngut la shah rah ha ki pulit ka Pasteur Beat House.La iathuh ba ia kine ki kynthei, la rah sha police station ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia, hadien ba ka Seng CSWO ka la ujor ejahar pyrshah ia ki dkhot seng longkmie kiba donkti ban khi lai nuid ia kitei ki lai ngut ki kynthei halor ka jingsuba ba ki la leh ia ki kam pyrshah ka imlang sahlang.Ha kajuh ka por, ka Meghalaya State Women Commission (MSWC) hynne ka sngi ka la khot hajir ia ki kynthei ba shah khi lai nuid ban sngap na ki bad kumjuh na ka seng longkmie Pynthor.Ka Kong Theilin Phanbuh ka la ong ba ka komishon ka la khot hajir ia ki kynthei bad ki dkhot ka seng longkmie Pynthor ban sngap ia ka jingjia.Ka la iathuh ba ar ngut ki kynthei kim lah ban wan mih, namar ba ki shitom bad la wan tang kawei katba na ka liang ki dkhot ka seng longkmie ki la ai ia ka jingpynshai jongki.Ka Kong Theilin ka la ong ba ka Komishon kan sa khot biang ia ki ha kawei ka sngi bad kan sa iatreilang bad ka tnad pulit halor kane ka jingjia.Ka la iathuh ruh ba namar ba kane ka kam ka la don ha kti ka Kashari, ka Komishon kam lah ban tuklar bad hynrei kan leh ia ka kamram jongka ha kaba iadei bad kane ka kam.Lah ban kdew ba ki lai ngut ki kynthei, ki la kam ba ha ka miet 14 tarik kumba ha ka 11:30 baja mynmiet, katba ki dang wan na thain Demsieniong da ka kali, ynda la poi ha Pynthor ka kynhun ki kynthei kiba pahara ia ka shnong ki la pynieng ia ka kali jongki bad phah hiar shabar bad mar kumta ki la patan ia ki bad tied da u kynja dieng kum u dieng tied hockey haduh ba jngem lut ki bynta ba shah shoh.Katkum ka ejahar kine ki kynthei, kila kynnoh ba kitei ki briew kiba don ha katei ka jaka bad u Rangbah Shnong ki la ong ia kita ki shynrang kiba wan lang bad ki, ba ki siew bok ki iadon bad kine ki lai ngut ki kynthei namar lada dei ba ki wan bad kiwei ki kynthei, kim nym jia eiei kumtei.Ha ka ejahar, ki la kynnoh ruh ba ki briew kiba don ha katei ka jaka, ki la thap ia ki, bad kila patan ia ki shniuh jongki bad don kiba kynnoh ba ki dei kiba iaid awria bad dei ban khap ia ki shniuh jongki bad kumta hi ki la khap ia ki shniuh jongki.La kynnoh ruh ba don kiba mut ban khap ia ki shniuh ki shynrang ruh kiba wan lang bad ki, hynrei namar ba ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong, ki map noh. Ki la phun ia ki pulit ha ka por 2 baje hynrei ynda la wan ki pulit kim lah ban leh eiei bad haduh ka por 5 baje mynstep la ialam sha Police station bad la phun ia kiba haiing hasem jongki hynrei haduh 9:30 baje mynstep ruh kim wan mih satia kiba haiing jongki bad la phun ia kawei ka seng bhalang kaba wan iarap ia ki.Haduh mynta kine ki kynthei kila ong, ba ki don bad ka jingshah hikai bad kawei ka seng Lamjingshai Manbha Foundation Organisation.
title: Shah kem 12 ngut ki longkmie, ba  kynnoh khi lai nuid ha Pynthor

content: Nongpoh, 26 Nailur:Saw bnai hadien ba ki la shong ha Phatok hadien ba ki la shah kem namar ka jingleit hiarthma ia ka jingpyntrei ia ka surok Rel ha Byrnihat, hynrei mynta ka sngi ki 10 ngut ki nongialam ka KSU bad ki dkhot ki la lait jamin noh hadien ba ka iing bishar jong u District & Session Judge Nongpoh, u la pynlait jamin na ka jingbah jamin u nongsait ain jongki.Kitei ki 10 ngut ki nongialam ka KSU, ki kynthup ia u President ka KSU, North Khasi Hills District, u Samla Ferdynald Kharkani, u Assistant Secretary ka Sengkmie, u Samla Sonstar Nongkhlaw, u organizing Secretary ka Sengkmie, u samla Biangbor Paliar, katba ki dkhot pat ki kynthup ia u Jayan Sylliang, Sabathani Lyngdoh, Johny Nongrum, Augustine Nongbri, Oris Thabah, Bonifast Lyngkhoi bad u Reymond Jana.Hadien ba kitei ki nongialam ka KSU ki la lait na Patok, la pdiang burom ia ki ha ryngkat ka jingdon u Samla Donald Thabah, Secretary, u President barim, u Samla Daniel Thabah, ki nongialam ka sengkmie lem bad kiba haiing ha sem, ha kaba ki la pynlong ia ka jingpdiang burom bad lehkmen sngewbha hadien ba ki la lait na Phatok, ha kaba ki la pdiang burom lyngba ka jingai da ki syntiew ki skut bad pynkup da ki jain Ryndia.La ioh jingtip ruh ba ki nongialam ka KSU Sengkmie, ki la pynkhreh ruh ban pdiang burom paidbah ia ki nongialam ha Mawiong mynta ka janmiet, kaba dei shi bynta ka jingburom ia kine ki riewialeh ka seng, kiba la iakhun na ka bynta ka daw bah jong ka jaid bynriew.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne ia kitei ki nongialam KSU ba la shah kem, ki dei kiba la shah register case halor ki kyndon ain bapher bapher ba la register case ha Nongpoh Police Station, kiba kynthup ia ka Case number 113(5)17, 115(5f)17 bad 114(5)17 bad ki pulit ki la kem halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki la donkti ban wiang ding ha ki jaka bapher bapher ka Ri Bhoi halor ka jingpyrshah ia ka lynti rel.
title: Hadien 4 bnai ha phatok, lait jamin  ki nongialam bad dkhot KSU

content: Shillong, 26 Nailur:Hadien ka jingkhang khaii maw, kaba la shiphew bnai kynthih; la plie biang mynta ka sngi ia ka jingshalan maw na Bholaganj Land Custom.Ha ka sngi sdang, la pynrung ia 15 tylli ki trok mynta ka sngi, kiba leit rung sha Bangladesh, ha ryngkat ka jingdon ki dkhot jong ka Majai Exporter’s Association Bholaganj, ba kynthup ia U bah B Lyngdoh President lem bad kiwei de ki dkhot jong ka seng.U Bah B Lyngdoh, haba iakren bad U Rupang, u iathuh ba ka jingplie biang ia ka jingshalan maw, ka dei lyngba ka laisen bad mynta ki don 2ngut ki nongkhaii, kiba ioh laisen, na ki 150-200ngut ki nongkhaii maw, lyngba ka kad khaii Bholaganj. U Bah Lyngdoh, u kwah ba ka sorkar Jylla, kan ai laisen shuh shuh ia kiwei de ki nongkhaii maw, ba kin lah ban sdang ia la ka jong ka kam ha ki khyndiat sngi ban sa wan.La iathuh ba kane ka laisen, kaba mynta, ka long ba ki nongkhaii, ki lah ioh bor ban tih bad ban shalan maw bad kam dei shuh, ba kin die tang ia ka mar, kaba la dep pynlang lypa.Ha ka jingplie mynta ka sngi, la don lang ki briew sorkar, na ka tnat khlaw, tnat pulit bad BSF, kiba don ha katei ka kad khaii khappud.Ka seng, ka ai khublei ruh ia U Mukul Sangma myntri rangbah ka Jylla, namar ka jingleh shitom jongu ban pyllait ia ka mining license sha ki dkhot jong katei ka seng, ong ka kyrwoh na katei ka seng.
title: Hadien 10 bnai, sdang biang ka  jingshalan maw na Bholaganj

content: Shillong, 27 Nailur:Ka ophis jong ka ka PWD (Buildings), ka shah sngewbha ban pandal hapoh ka phyllaw (Campus) jong ka PWD kaba don hapoh Barik.U Bah Banshai Marbaniang, ha ka kyrwoh,u iathuh ba ula pan jingtip, lyngba ka ain wad jingtip 2005 bad u sngew lyngngoh shi katdei eh ba ka ophis treikam jong ka PWD, ka don la ki jong ki ophisar kiba sah hapoh ki jaka sah jong katei ka tnad bad shuh shuh katei ka tnad kam don jingtip eiei ruh em, ba ka ladon ka jingshna bad tei ia ki pandal da ki kynhun niam ha katei ka phyllaw jong ka PWD. La iathuh ruh ba ka don ka jingpyrshang wat ban dih kyaid bad ia khalai ha katei ka jaka jong katei ka ophis.U Bah Banshai, u iathuh shuh ba ula leit ban iakynduh ban buh da ka jingthoh sha u Chief Secretary jong ka Sorkar Jylla Y. Tsering, IAS kumjuh ruh ban ia kynduh ia u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District Bah P S Dkhar, IAS ban pynpaw bad dawa ia ka juh ka jingmut na ka bynta ban tohkit bniah halor katei ka mat khnang ba kan wanrah jingshai sha ki paidbah baroh.La ju iohi pyllein ba ka don kaba kum katei ka jingtei ba manla u snem ha katei ka jaka, kaba don mar shiliang jong ka Civil Hospital, Shillong.
title: Ym tip ka PWD, ba tei  pandal ha phyllaw lajong

content: Jowai, 27 Nailur:Mynta ka sngi ha ryngkat shi tyllup ka pyrthei, ka East Jaintia Hills District ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang ka bor Shnong Mutong, la rakhe ia ka sngi shang pyrthei, da ka tamasa kshaid Moopun ha ka shnong Mutong.U Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaintia Hills, u ma MS Lhuid kum u kongsan ha ryngkat ki heh ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher ki la wan ban sakhi ia ka jingplie paidbah ia ka Moopun Eco Park kaba don ha ka shnong Mutong.Ha kane ka sngi, da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah ki la wan tuid sha katei ka jaka ban sakhi da la ki khmat ia ka jingitynnad katei ka jaka kaba don ha katei ka shnong.Katei ka jaka la pynitynnad bad ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah kiba wan jngoh kai la shna iaka Footpath kaba jrong palat ia ka 1km da ka bor shnong lyngba ka skim bylla 100 sngi kaba kyrshan da ka ophis u BDO Khliehriat, ka Ophis u DC bad kumjuh naka Basin Development Unit, Khliehriat nalor ki Majistor kiba kynthup ia ka kong DV Lyngdoh bad bah S Marwein.Ka jinglut ka la kot sha ka 12 lakh tam eiei.Na ka liang u DC uba don ka jingthrang ban kyntiew ia kane ka kharkhana, u la ong ba kane ka karkhana kan iarap ia ki samla khlem kam khlem jam, ia ki paidbah nong shong shnong ban ioh ia ka lad ban kamai jakpoh.U la ong ba ka bor District ka la dep ithuh haduh saw tylli ki shnong, ka Mutong, Cham Cham, Tuberkmai Shnong bad ka Lumshnong ban pynlong ia ki kum ki jaka kiba lah ban khring ia ki nongwan jngohkai ym tang na ki jylla bapher bapher ka ri, hynrei wat na Shilliang Duriaw.U la kyntu ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ban ia snohkti lang bad ka bor shnong bor District khnang ba kane ka jingthmu kan long kaba jop bad kaba lah ban wanrah jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah.Ban pynshongshit shuh shuh ia katei ka sngi, ka dorbar shnong Mutong ka la pynlong ia ka jingiakop shondur, iakop jngi, iakop siat khnam bad kiwei kiwei kiba kynthup ia ki shad bad rwai tynrai.Ki don bun kiba la ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi bad baroh kiba la kren ki la iaroh ia ka jinglong ba ia tylli ki paidbah ka shnong Mutong kaba long ka nuksa ia kiwei pat ki shnong ba marjan.La wan ban ia shim bynta ruh da ki samla pule jong ka Jaintia Eastern College lyngba ka tnad NSS nalor ki khynnah skul ka Nongsyntoin Secondary School Mutong.Na ka liang u Rangbah Shnong, u ma Helping Phawa haba kren ha ka jingialang, u la khot la wer ia ki nongwan shangkai pyrthei na jan bad na jngai ban wan sakhi da lade ia ka jingitynnad ka Kshaid Moopun, Sahksaw, Kai Langdong bad ia ka Kshaid Rynji kiba don sawdong ka shnong Mutong.
title: Tamasa kshaid ha Moopun, rakhe  sngi shang pyrthei ka East Jaintia

content: Shillong, 27 Nailur:La pynlong ia ka jingleh burom ia ki riewshlur jong ka Ri India kiba kynthup naduh ki shipai bad ki pulit, kiba la trei shitom ban wanrah ia ka suk ka sain ha ka Jylla.Ha kane ka sngi u kongsan u long u Lieutenant General D.S. Ahuja, General Commanding 101 Area, uba la iaroh ia ka AMDA bad ki dkhot, kiba hikai ban ieit bad burom ia la ka jong ka Ri bad u la ai khublei ruh ia baroh ki shipai iada Ri kiba la trei shitom na ka bynta ban iada ia u pud u sam jong ka Ri bad kumjuh ruh ka Police Department kaba la trei shitom kumno ban khanglad ia ka jingsniew kaba kha roi ha ka Ri.La ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na u Bah Kitbok Thabah, President jong ka All Meghalaya Dancer’s Association, ha kaba u la iathuh ruh ba kane ka dei ka sien nyngkong kaba ka Seng ka pynlong ia kum kine ki jait prokram, kum shi bynta ban kynmaw burom ia ki riewkhraw jong ka Ri India kiba la ialeh ban wanrah ia ka jinglaitluid na ka kti ki shipai Phareng.Ha kane ka sngi u kongsan, U Lieutenant General DS Ahuja, General Commanding 101 Area, u la sam ia ki syrnot sha kiba haiing u (L) Keishing Clifford Nongrum uba dei napoh Indian Army bad sha kiba haiing jong u Lt. Major David Manlun napoh Indian Army uba dang shu dep khlad shen bad la sam ruh sha ki pulit, kiba la trei shitom ha kaba iadei bad ki kam pyniaid kali bad kitei ki long U Bah Ribar Singh Lyngdoh, Head constable Meghalaya Police, Bah Ebinson Kharakor, Armed Branch Constable/1612, Meheshwari Basumatary, Armed Branch Constable/1728, bah Bahshanlang Marbaniang, Armed Branch Constable/2761, bah Markdonald Kharkongor -Armed Branch Constable/2706, Asistn N. Arengh – Armed Branch Constable/1096.
title: Leh burom ka AMDA ia ki  shipai ba khlad & ki pulit

content: Nongstoin, 27 Nailur:Ka seng Congress na Mawthadraishan Konstitwensi, ka la pynthikna ba u bah Pios Kurbah un long kum u kyrtong jong ka seng u ban ia aireng ha ka election MLA, na katei ka Konstitwensi bad katei ka paw shai ruh ha ka jingialang jong ka Mawthadraishan Block Congress Committee (MBCC) kaba la pynlong ha ka 25 tarik mynta u bnai ha Markasa West Khasi Hills District.Ha katei ka jingialang la wan ruh ia shim bynta da ki nongkitkam na ki dong bapher bapher jong katei ka Konstitwensi lem bad ki spah ngut ki paitbah bad ha katei ka sngi da ka wei ka sur ka MBCC kala ioh ban pynithuh bad pynbna ruh ia ka kyrteng u bah Pios Kurbah kum u kyrtong ba ia monlang da u nongpeit pyrman jong ka DCC u bah J.T.S.Thongni.Na ka liang jong ka MBCC ha katei ka sngi kala ioh ruh ban pdiang sngewbha ia ki spah ngut ki nongkyrshan jong ki wei ki seng, kiba la leit ban pyniasoh noh bad ka party congress ha katei ka Konstitwensi da ka President jong ka Party ka kong Irene Lyngdoh.Ka President jong ka party ka kong Irene Lyngdoh, ka la pynpaw ruh ba kan ai ia ka jing kyrshan met bad mynsiem ia u bah Pios Kurbah kum u kyrtong ka party na Mawthadraishan bad ha katei ka sngi la iadon lang ruh u bah Manbhabok K. Raswai Youth President AYC, bah Nathaniel Marshiangbai General Secretary ka MBCC, bah JTS Thongni u pyrman jong ka seng na ka DCC bad ki wei kiwei kiba la ai ka jingkren.
title: U bah Pios Kurbah,u kyrtong MLA ka Congress na Mawthadraishan

content: Shillong, 27 Nailur:La katto katne sngi u bah D.D Lapang u la don hapoh Bethany Hospital, Shillong namar ka jingpang kaba ban ia u, hynrei mynta ka sngi la pynkit noh ia u sha International Hospital, Guwahati. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ka jingpang kam da dei kaba jur, hynrei kiba ha ing hasem ki kwah ba pynkynriah noh sha Guwahati ba un shongthait bha, naba ha Shillong la ong ba ki bun palat kiba wan peit bad um ioh lad ban pynjah thait ialade.
title: Sha International Hospital, leit sumar ia u bah DD Lapang

content: Nongstoiñ, 27 Nailur:Ka Peoples Democratic Front (PDF) Nongstoiñ Konstitwensi, ka la pynbna ba kajingialang paidbah (General meeting) jong ka party kan long ha ka 30 tarik mynta u bnai bad katei ka jingialang kan long hapoh Bishop Hall Nongstoiñ ha kapor 10:30 AM.Ka kyrwoh khubor lyngba u Dmikstar Lyngdoh Adhoc Joint secretary ka PDF Nongstoin u la ong ba kan don ruh ka jingpdiang sngewbha ia kiba wan ban pyniasoh sha ka seng PDF ha kaba yn wan ruh ban pdiang sngewbha da ki Nongialam PDF Central Body.Shuh shuh u bah Lyngdoh u la kyrpad ruh iaki ki paitbah ban shim ia kane kum ka kum ka lad jingpyntip ia ia baroh.
title: 30 tarik, ka PDF ha Nongstoiñ

content: Shillong, 27 Nailur:Ka Voluntary Health Association Of Meghalaya (VHAM), kan shah tohkit halor ki jingshah kynnoh ba ka la don ka jingpyndonkam bakla jong katei ka ia kiba bun ki pisa ba la bei da ka National Aids Control Society (NACO) lyngba ka Meghalaya Aids Control Society (MACS) ha ki 2 snem shiteng. VHAM IDU Targeted Intervention (TI) cum OST kaba don ha Jowai bad ka VHAM CC TI kaba don ha Ladrymbai ki la shah kynnoh ba ki la pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa kaba haduh T.15 lak naduh u 2015 haduh mynta.Ka khubor, kaba la mih ha ka website jong ka North East Today, la ong ba dang shen ka Fact Finding Team na ka Northeast Technical Support Unit (NETSU) ka la leit jngoh ia kitei ki ar tylli ki Centre kiba don ha Jowai bad Lad Rymbai hadien ba la ioh jingtip ba ka don ka jingbyn treikam bha ki IT bad OST. La kynnoh ba kitei ki Centre ki la pynrung kyrteng bun ngut ki briew ban pyni ba ki treikam bha bad ban ioh jingbei tyngka shuh shuh na ka MACS bad NACO hynrei la ong pat ba ha ka jingshisha ka jingdon ki kyrteng briew bad ka jingioh ia ki tiar iarap kam ia hap eiei ruh em.La kynnoh ruh ba katei ka Centre ka la pyndonkam bakla ia ka kyrteng ki Pharmacy kiba don ha Jowai ban pyni ba ka pynlut ha ka ban thied thyrnia injek bad kiwei pat ki tiar donkam. Kitei ki Pharmacy kiba la paw kyrteng ba ki dei kiba ju die tiar sha ka VHAM ki long ka Daloi Pharmacy, ka RB Pharmacy bad ka Passah Medicure kiba don ha Jowai. La kynnoh ruh ba ka VHAM ka la pyni da ki laisen jong ki Pharmacy ban pynksan ia ka jingthied tiar jong ki , kawei dei ka laisen u Ram Passah u trai jong ka M/s Remedy Pharmacy, Ialong kaba don ia u laisen nombar JH/395-396-397 bad kawei pat jong ka M/s K.Chyrmang 12 Daloi Pharmacy, KNB Road, Jowai (License no. JH/395-396-397.La iathuh ba ki bor ba dei ban tohkit ki dang ngam jylliew ia katei ka kam ban lap kumno ba ar tylli ki ki Pharmacy kiba dei trai da ki 2 ngut ki briew kin don ia kijuh ki laisen nombar. La iathuh ruh ba ki bor bahalor ki dang tohkit bha namarba kim sngew tikna ia ka rukom long trai ia kitei ki Pharmacy ruh ha kaba ka VHAM ka la pyni ba ia ka pisa la siew sha u Korder Chyrmang hynrei kim shym la lap satia ia ka Pharmacy kaba kyrteng ka M/s K.Chyrmang 12 Doloi Pharmacy kaba la ngeit ba long trai da utei u briew, ki la lap tang kawei ka Pharmacy kaba kyrteng ka 12 Doloi Pharmacy kaba don ha KNB Road Jowai hynrei la ong ba u trai jong katei ka Pharmacy u dei u bah N.Khonglah.Katkum ka ripod jong ka North East Today, katei ka lad pathai khubor ka la ioh ban ia kren bad u bah N.Khonglah uba dei trai hynrei u la ong ba kitei ki jingkam ka VHAM ki dei kiba thok bad um pat ju die thyrnia injek sha ka VHAM. “Nga kyndit ha ka por ba ki Fact Finding Team ki wan sha Pharmacy jong nga ban kylli jingkylli ia ka jingdie thyrnia injek sha ka VHAM” u la ong. Shuh shuh la ong ba ka VHAM ka la pyndonkam ia ka kyrteng jong ka RB Pharmacy ban pyni ba long trai da u Lucky Bareh hynrei haba la wad ia ka jingshisha la lap ba dei kaba long trai da ka kong R Swer bad kam don jingtip eiei shaphang ka jingdie dawai sha ka VHAM. La lap ruh ba ka Passah Medicure kam pat ju die tiar ne dawai sha ka VHAM kumba la kam ha ka jingthoh bad la pyni da ki jingthoh ba thok ba ka VHAM ka la thied tiar da ki hajar tyngka na katei ka Pharmacy.Shuh shuh ka VHAM ka la pyni ia ki jinglut pisa ba ka la pynlong ia ka jingsumar ei, hynrei la lap ba la shisnem mynta ym don kano kano ka Camp ba ka la pynlong ia ka jingsumar ei.Halor kitei kiei kiei baroh ka Meghalaya Aids Control Society (MACS) ka la pynthikna ba ka l aioh ia ka ripod na ka Fact Finding Team jong ka NETSU bad la ong ba ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat. “Ngi dang ia kren na ka por sha ka por halor kane ka bynta bad lada lap ba ki jingkynnoh ki long kiba shisha ngin pynshitom ia kiba donkti” ong u Acting Project Director ka MACS u Dr RE Donn uba la ong ba ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat halor katei ka bynta.Ka Project Director ka VHAM ka Eudora Wanda Warjri ka la ong ba kam pat shym la ioh ripod halor katei ka bynta, hynrei ka VHAM ruh kan pynlong jingtohkit nalade ruh ban lap ia ki jingshisha. Haduh mynta ka la ong ba ka kam kam pat poi sha kaba kut bad ym pat lah ban ong eiei. Ka la ong ba ym pat lap jongshisha satia haduh mynta hynrei ki dang dei tang ki jingkynnoh. Ka la ong ba ka lah ban don ka jingbakla ha ka rukom pyniaid kam hynrei kam da dei eh ka kam kaba heh bad kim kwah ban pynheh ioh ka ktah ia ki nongtrei bad ki nongpang ruh.
title: Kynnoh ba pyndonkam bakla  ka VHAM ia ka pisa ba kot T.15

content: Nongstoiñ, 27 Nailur:Ka seng Hyññiew-trep Youths’ Council (HYC) Lai Lyngdoh area Unit, ha ka sngi ba ar jong ka taiew, ka la leit ban iakynduh ia u JE ka Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL), Nongstoiñ halor ka jingbymbiang bad ba thut khah khah ka Network ha ka thain Byrki mynta la katto katne bnai.Katkum ka kyrwoh khubor na u Samla Fullbackstar Shangrit, nongialam ka HYC u la ong ba katei ka jingleit ia kynduh ia u JE ka BSNL kadei ruh hadien ba ka Seng, ka la ioh pdiang ia ka jingud jingnam jong ki paidbah halor ka jingthut jong ka network ha katei ka thain.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ha katei ka jingleit ia kynduh jong ka seng na ka liang jong u JE ruh u la kubur ba kadon shisha ka jingthut jong ka network ha katei ka thain bad ka daw kadei ruh namar ka jingshah ot noh ka bor ding ilektrik na u tower u ba don ha ka shnong Sangriang na ka daw ba ka ophis jong ka BSNL ha kitei ki khyndiat bnai kam shym pat la lah satia ban siew dep ka bai bording sha ka MeECL.Hynrei na ka liang jong u tei u Enjiniar u la ong ba ruh ba ia mynta na ka liang jong ka ophis BSNL kala dep ban leit siew ia ka bai bording jong u tei u tower sha ka ophis MeECL ia kaba ki dang hap ruh ban ap mynta tad haduh ba ka MeECL kan leit ban ai bor ding biang ha u tei u tower ha kaba u la kular ruh ba ha kine hi ki taiew ban wan un sa pynbiang noh ia ka network kumba ka ju long.
title: Ujor tnum BSNL sha Byrki

content: Shillong, 02 Risaw:Ia ka kynhun jong ki sengbhalang bapher bapher jong kane ka dong mihngi ka India, ka North East Indigineous People Forum (NEIPF) la suit la shor mynta ka sngi ha ka jingialang kaba long ha Orchid Lake Resort, Umiam.Ban pyniaid ia kane ka kam shakhmat, la jied ia u Chairman barim ka seng lehnoh u Anup Chetia kum u Chief Convener bad yn don ki convener man ki jylla jong kane ka thain hynniew tylli ki jylla.Ki seng kiba don ha kane ka kynhun ki kynthup ki dkhot barim ka ULFA , NSCN(IM), ANVC, DHD, ENPO , FKJGP bad kiwei ki seng .Ka jingialang kaba long mynta ka sngi, ka la shim ia ka rai ban pynbiang pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam jong kane ka kynhun kum ka riti synshar, ka logo, bad kiwei shwa ban jied pat ia ki nongkitkam ba pura.Haba kren hadien ba la wai ka jingialang, u nongaiktien kane ka kynhun, u M. Ibumgochoudibi na Manipur u la ong ba ka jingialang ka la iathir bha bad ka sngew khia jur ia ka jingwan buhai shnong ki briew nabar sha ki jylla kane ka dong mihngi kaba la pynkylla rit paid ia ki trai shnong.“Ngin pynkhreh ia ka lynti treikam nangne shakhmat, ngin don ki convener man ki jylla ban pynkhlain ia ka jingtreikam jong ngi ban iada ia ki trai jaka trai muluk”, la ong u M. Ibumgochoudibi.U M. Ibumgochoudibi u la ong ba ka mat ba kongsan ba ka NEIPF ka long ban iada ia ki trai shnong na ka jingwan buhai shnong beain ki briew na Bangladesh, Mynmar, Bhutan, Nepal.“Ngi don 5500 km ki khappud ha kane ka dong mihngi baroh kawei kynthup bad ka Nepal, Mynmar, Bhutan, Bangladesh bad ki khappud ha kine ki bynta ki dei kiba laitlan bha ban rung ban mih katba mon bad kane ka long ka jingma ia ngi ki trai shnong ban wan tyllep ki briew nabar”, la ong u M. Ibumgochoudibi.U la ong ba ka jingwan buhai shnong ki briew nabar ka dei kawei kaba kongsan tam ha ka thong jong ka NEIPF kaba ktah jur ia ki trai shnong ki jylla kane ka dong mihngi bad bun kiba la kylla rit paid.“Ka Furom kan peitngor ia ki jingeh jong ka thain bad ban iada ia ki hok jong ki trai shnong”, la ong u M. Ibumgochoudibi.U M. Ibumgochoudibi u la ong ba ka jingrai ai trai shnong ka Supreme Court ia ki Hajong bad ki Chakma ha Arunachal Pradesh ka la long kaba sngew khia jur namar ba kane kan ktah ia ka jinglong trai shnong tynrai jong ki trai shnong bad kumjuh ruh ka jingphet shnong ki Muslim na Ronghiya na Mynmar, ka la ktah jur ia ka dong mihngi kaba long kum ka thet nuit ia ki briew nabar.Ha kajuh ka por, u la ong ba ka kynhun kan pyrshah jur ia ka jingthmu ka sorkar pdeng ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla ia ka riti synshar nongshong shnong ne ka Citizenship Amendment Act namar ba kane kan ktah jur ia ki trai shnong jong ki jylla kane ka dong mihngi bad kan long pyrshah ia ka jingsngew jong ki briew kane ka dong mihngi.U la ai nuksa kum ka jylla Assam, ka Tripura kiba la iakynduh jingeh mynta ha kaba ki bar shnong ki long nongsynshar katba ki trai shnong ki kylla rit paid.
title: Yn iakhun tyngeh ka NEIPF,  na ka jingwan buhai kiba nabar

content: Jowai, 2 Risaw:U wei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Tam Biam, 56 snem u la shah kem ha ki pulit halor ka jingkynnoh ba u la pyniap ia uwei pat u briew uba kyrteng u Bringstone Pyrtuh (32) ha ka shnong KhanduloiKane ka la jia ha ka 30 tarik une u bnai ba la dep ha kaba ka hynmen jong utei u ba la shah pyniap ha ka jingujor sha ki pulit ka la iathuh ba utei u briew u la bom ia utei u para jong ka da u Nar Rod bad u la khlad noh hashen. Ki pulit kila ioh kurup ruh ia utei u nar
title: Shah kem uba pyniap briew

content: Jowai, 2 Risaw:Ki pulit ka Nartiang ki la ioh ban bat ia kawei ka trok 12 shaka ba la pynieng ha Lad Durga Temple, Nartiang bad hadien ba ki pulit ki la talasi ia katei ka trok la lap pynban ba ka kit da u dewiong kaba long pyrshah ia ka rai jong ka NGT.Ki pulit ki la bat ruh ia u driver katei ka trok (NL02L-6407) u Danga-hi Phawa bad ia u nongbud jong u, u Larmi Lamin.
title: Ioh kem ki pulit ia  ka trok kit dewiong

content: Shillong, 02 Risaw:Ka met iap jong uwei u samla Khasi la lap kaba thiah lyngktar ha lynti ha sor Bangalore mynta ka sngi.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum, une u khynnah la tip kyrteng kum u Savio Diengdoh uba dei na shnong Mairang, ka West Khasi Hills.La iathuh ba u dei uba dang pule ha Bangalore.La suba jur ba une u khynnah u la bthat noh ia la ka jingim lajong namar ka jingiahuri hura bad ka kam samla katkum ka shithi ba la paw. Na ka met jongu, la lap ia ka shithi khatduh kaba la soi hi da ma u.Kane ka dei ka shithi ba la ioh tam na ka jaka ba don ka met iap jong une u samla, kaba la thoh ha ka ktien Mairang hi.“Mei, pa, deng, thei thei, duh duh, bah, hep, heh, rit, duh, map ia nga nga long u khon u roit bitam sneng tam na iung, map ia nga map wat ju iasngewsih map ia nga…bad wat ju dih ong ye ye ia ka bru bi pynlong ia nga ba pynlong ia nga ban leh kumnoi namar dei nga bilei ym dei kati ka bru, map ia nga baroh map….map blei map ia ka pop ong nga, map baroh…from Savio DiengdohSorry I cant live in this earth full of sins.”Haba ia kren bad U Rupang lyngba ka phone u Secretary jong ka KSU Bangalore Unit u samla Amos John Syiemlieh uba don mynta ha Bangalore, u la iathuh ba u Savio u la jah na ingsah jong u naduh ka por 8:30 ne 9 duna mynmiet bad ym shym la wad ia u namar ba ki pyrkhat ba u leit kai sha ing ki paralok. U samla Amos u la ong ba dei haduh ka por 12 baje shiteng miet hadien ba um poi ing shuh lano lano ruh la phone sha ki paralok jong u ban kylli, hynrei kim tip.Kumta ki samla Khasi ryngkat bad kiwei pat ki paralok jong ki, ki la leit wad kylleng ki jaka bad namar ba ka ingsah jong u Savio ka ia jan bad ka lynti Rel ki la leit iaid ruh hajan lynti Rel bad kyndit ki la iohi ia kawei ka metiap kaba thiah lyngktar. “Ngim pat nud ban peit, ngim pat nud ktah, ngim tip la ka dei ne-em u Savio, mar mar ngi la pyntip pulit bad hadien ba la wan poi ki pulit ngi sa tip ba ka dei ka jong u Savio” ong u samla Amos.U samla Amos u la iathuh na ka kamra kaba sah u Savio hapoh Hostel, ki la lap ia ka jingthoh kaba u la thoh ha ka ktien shnong jong u ba u pan map na ki kmie ki kpa jong u kaba pyni ba ka jingpan map ka dei halor ka jingshim jong u ia la ka jingim bad ia ka mobile phone ruh u la ieh ha kamra bad ki don katto katne tylli ki mesej, kiba u shu pan map beit.Na katei ka jingthoh la sngewthuh ba u Savio u pan map na ki ba haing hasem jong u bad u ong ba ka jingleh jong u ka dei na ka daw jong u bad kim dei ban sngewsih.Utei u samla u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Savio Diengdoh na ka shnong Pynden Umiong-Mairang. U dei u samla uba dang pule ha ka 3rd Semester Diploma Civil ha R.R Institution, Bangalore.Ia ka metiap jong u la dep ban leh post mortem bad haduh mynta ka metiap ka dang don ha Bangalore bad la iathuh ba lashai ka sngi yn pynkit na Bangalore sha Mairang. Katkum ka jingbatai ki paralok jong u kiba lap ia ka metiap ki la iathuh ba mar shiteng ka met naduh ki bynta jong ka kpoh la tylliat da ka rel, hynrei ia ka dur ka dar dang ithuh.
title: Ngam lah im shuh ha  ka pyrthei kaba pop

content: Shillong,3 Risaw:Ka Mawlynnong ka shnong kaba don sharum Pynursla sa shisien biang ka la ioh ia ka khusnam kum ka shnong kaba khuid tam ha ka ri India baroh kawei. Ia katei ka khusnam la leit shimti da u bah Mathew Khongsar (uwei na ki rangbah uba la mihkhmat ia ka shnong) mynhynnin ka sngi na kti jong u Vice President ka ri India u Vankaiah Naidu. Ia katei ka khusnam la sam ha Lalit Hotel ha New Delhi. Katei ka khusnam ka dei kaba la tip kum ka ‘Safaigiri’ kaba la pyniaid da ka India Today Group. Shuwa ban ioh ia katei ka khusnam ka kynhun ka India Today ka la leit ban jurip ia ka shnong Mawlynnong bad ha ka sngi ba la sam khusnam la donlang ruh u Editor In Chief katei ka kot khubor u Aroon Purie.Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u bah Mathew Khongsar u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew sarong ba sa shisien biang la jied ia ka Mawlynnong kum ka shnong kaba khuid tam ha ri India hadien ba ka la ioh kumba 3 ne 4 tylli ki khusnam shuwa ia kane. U la ong ba ha katei ka jingialam sam khusnam ki kynrem ki lyndan ki la ai mynsiem ia ka Mawlynnong ba kan nang bteng ia ka jingleh khuid jong ka ba kan nanglah ban nang ioh bun tylli ki Award naba ka la dei lypa ka shnong kaba khuid tam ha ka dewbah Asia. U bah Mathew u la kyntu ia kiwei pat ki shnong ba kin bud ia ka nuksa jong ka Mawlynnong ba ki ruh kin ioh ia katei ka khusnam bad ba ka jylla hi baroh kawei kan long kaba khuid.Ka Mawlynnong ka shnong kaba don sha kyndong jong ka thaiñ Pynursla mynta ka la kylla long kawei na ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei kaba paw bha ha ka ri India ha kaba ym tang ki briew na ka ri India kiba ju wan sha katei ka shnong hynrei na kiwei pat ki ri ruh ki wan ban sakhi ia ka jingkhuid jong ka. U bah Mathew u la iathuh ba ka jingtuid ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei na kylleng ki jaka sha Mawlynnong ka la nangkiew nangkiew na kaba mynshuwa. U la ong ba manla ka sngi ki nongjngohkai pyrthei ki poi kumba 500 kali bad ka kham jur palat ha ki por shuti. Na kate ika jingtuid ki nongjngohkai pyrthei u la ong ba ka la kyntiew ia ka ioh ioh jam hapoh shnong ha kaba bun ki samla kim donkam shuh ban leit wad kam shabar hynrei ki la leh ban seng ia la ki dukan bad kiwei ki kam kiba ki lah ban ioh kamai.Katba nangiaid ki sngi katba nangbun ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei , u bah Mathew u la ong ba ki jingduna ruh ki nangiai mih bad hap ban pynbit pynbiang suki suki ia kitei baroh ki jingduna. Ki jingduna kiba hakhmat eh mynta u la ong ba dei ka surok hapoh shnong kaba la donkam palat ban pynbha bad donkam ruh sa kiwei pat ki surok ki ban pyniasoh sha kiwei pat ki jaka peitkai kiba itynnad ha katei ka shnong namarba ki nong wan kai, kim lah shuh ban iaid kjat ba ka la jngai.Nangta u la ong ba ki jingdonkam kiba kham hakhmat ki long ka jaka ieng kali hynrei ia ka jaka ieng kali u la ong ba la sdang ban shna lyngba ka jingiarap u MLA ka Pynursla u bah Prestone Tynsong uba la kular ruh ban pyndep noh hapoh une u snem hi mynta.
title: Ioh khusnam biang ka Mawlynnong,  kum ka shnong ba khuid tam

content: Shillong, 03 Risaw:U Lat ban mih na ka jylla u Banwarilal Purohit u la ong ba ki nongtrei ka Raj Bhavan baroh ki long kum shi iing shi sem bad lada ki pynjah burom ma ki, ma u ruh u jah burom lang.Haba kren ha ka jingialang kitbok ia u mynta ka sngi shwa ban leit shimti kum u Lat ka jylla Tamil Nadu, u Purohit u la ong ba ki nongtrei ka Raj Bhavan ki dei ban don ka jinglong kaba ryntih bad kaba don burom namar ba lada ma ki, ki long ki ioh burom ma u, ruh u ioh burom lang hynrei lada ki pynjah burom, ma u ruh u jah burom lang.Ha kawei ka liang, haba kren bad u nongthoh khubor, u Purohit uba dang shimti phra bnai kum u Lat ka jylla, u la iaroh ia ka jingriew spah ka jylla ha ka kam jngohkai pyrthei kham palat ban ia ka jylla Kashmir ruh hynrei ka sahdien ha kane ka long namar bym biang ka jingpynbna paidbah ban pyntip sha ka pyrthei.“Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka kham lah shibun ban ia ka jylla Kashmir ha kaba iadei bad ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ha India hynrei ka jingbym biang ka jingpynphriang khubor, ka la pynsahdien iaka Meghalaya”, la ong u Lat.Ha kajuh ka por, u Lat u la ong ba ka la dei ka por ba ki samla na kane ka jylla ki dei ban long kiba tbit hi ban pyniaid ia ka kam jngohkai pyrthei khlem da donkam ban khot ia kiwei pat kiba nabar.U la ai nuksa ba ha ki kam hotel bad kiwei ki kam, la bun ki briew ba wan trei nabar katba ki briew na kane ka jylla ki duna bha bad u la kyntu ba ki samla ki dei ban kyndit bynriew ia kane ban shim kabu ia ka jingdon ka spah ha la ri lajong.Haba kyntu ia ka sorkar jylla ba kan shim khia, halor ka kam jngohkai, u Lat u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban shim khia kham bun ban ia kaba ka la leh mynta ban kyntiew ia ka kam jngohkai pyrthei namar ba ki don shibun ki tnad bei pisa nabar lada ka kam jngohkai ka kiew.“Lada ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ka kiew, ki bun ki nongbei pisa nabar ban theh pisa ia ka jylla”, la ong u Lat.Ha kajuh ka por, u la ong ba watla um dei shuh u Lat ka Meghalaya hynrei un pynphriang ia ka khubor ia ka jingitynnad ka jylla Meghalaya.“Lada u Lat ba thymmai un long uba shemphang, u dei ban leh khambha shuh ban ia u ban kyntiew ia ka kam jngohkai ha kane ka jylla Meghalay”, la ong u Purohit.
title: “Khamlah ka Meghalaya, ia ka  Kashmir ha ka kam jngohkai”

content: Shillong, 03 Risaw:Ka UDP ka la pan jubab na u MDC ka Mairang u Bah Equator L Nongrang ba un ai ia ka jubab hapoh ka 5 tarik Risaw halor kano ka nongrim u kyrshan ia ka Executive Committee ka People Democratic Forum (PDF) ha KHADC.“U dei ban ai jubab hapoh 5 tarik Risaw bad lada kam iahap ka party kan sympat ia u”, la ong uwei u nongialam ka UDP.U MDC ka Mairang u la ai jingkyrshan ia ka PDF ba ialam da u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem wat ha ka jingshisha ka UDP ka don ha ka liangpyrshah ha KHADC.Watla kiwei ki MDC ki don kiba dang sah bun ka pisa bym pat pynlait da u CEM katba don kiba la del ioh lut bad don kiba sah sa khyndiat.U MDC ka Mairang ula jan ioh lut ia ka MDC skhim kaba T. 3 klur uba la ioh T.2.80 klur.Kham mynshwa u president ka UDP u Dr Donkupar Roy ula ong ba u Bah Pynshngain ula pyndonkam da ka pisa ba ioh na ka sorkar pdeng ban thied ia ki MDC ka UDP bad na kiwei ki party.
title: Jubab hapoh 5 tarik, ne  shah sympat, ong ka UDP

content: Shillong, 3 Risaw:Ka la pynkyndit ia ki nongthohkhubor ban tip na u President ka Synjuk Ki Nongsynshar Shnong Krang Pyllun u bah L.Step War, ba ha ka shnong Krang kaba don tang 700 tylli ki ïng briew ki don pat haduh 11 ngut ki Sordar. U bah Step War u la ong ba ka jingkheiñ sordar ha katei ka shnong kam dei satia kaba la kheiñ katkum ki kyntoit ne ki shnong, hynrei la shu kheiñ ïng briew, kaba mut ba kino kino ki longing kiba ia hap jingmut bad u sordar watla ki sah ha kawei pat ka shnong ruh ki leit ban iasoh ialade hapoh ka jingsynshar jong u.U la ong ba hapoh ka jingsynshar uwei u sordar ki don kumba 20 ne 25 tylli ki longing na ki kyntoit ba pher bapher jong ka shnong Krang kaba mut ba katto katne ing na kawei ka kyntoit bad katto katne ing na kawei pat ka kyntoit. U bah Step War u la ong ba katei ka rukom synshar shnong ha Krang ka la pynmih ia ka jingdkoh ha ka synshar khaddar bad ka jingbym ia sngewthuh jingmut para nongshong shnong ha kaba u la ong ba teng teng la i lehraiñ briew haba jia ka kam iap kam im, “Haba iap briew ngi sngew lehraiñ teng teng ban iathuh haba ki briew na bar shnong ki kylli ia ka jingbym ithuh ithaw ha ka rukom mih shnong” ong u bah L Step War haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor.U la iathuh ba haba iap briew ha ka ïng kaba hap ha ka jingsynshar jong uwei na ki 11 sordar ki hap mih paidbah tang kito ki tnum ing briew kiba hap ha ka jingsynshar jong uta u sordar , ym dei ba hap mih paidbah ka shnong, “Ngi sngew lehraiñ shisha” u la ong. U la kynnoh ba ka daw ba katei ka kynrum kynram bad ka jingbym bit bym biang ka mih ka dei beit na ka daw ka jingai Sanad pathar jong u Lyngdoh Sohiong, “Dei na ka jingleh u Lyngdoh Sohiong kat kiba wan pan Sanad kiba la kam ba ki don 20 ne 25 ing kiba hap ha ka jingsynshar jong ki u ai beit, ngim tip na kae ka daw u ai Sanad khlem kynjoh ktien ia ka Synjuk kiba la don lypa da ki phew snem, ngi shu ia mutdur ba lehse u Lyngdoh u dei uba don mynsiem sngew synei palat kat kiba wna pan Sanad u shu ai beit” ong u bah Step War.U la iathuh ba ka Synjuk Ki Nongsynshar Shnong Krang Pyllun ki la leit ban ujor sha District Council halor katei ka jingjia bad ka District Council ka la hukum ia u Lyndoh Sohiong ban pynbeit noh ia u pud u sam uba biang ban ym ia milai jaktung ka rukom synshar bad dei ha ka 11 tarik u nailur u la ong ba u Lyngdoh u la phah briew ban leit jurip bad hadien ka jingjurip ym pat mih soh eiei, kumta ki la leit ban pan jubab na u Lyngdoh halor ka jingjurip bad ki la ai por 15 sngi ba un pyntip hynrei haduh mynta um a ijingtip eiei ia ki. U la ong ba katei ka jingbym biang u pud u sam ha ka rukom synshar ka la ktah ruh ia ka skhim bylla 100 sngi ne ka MNREGA, u la iathuh ba ha katei ka shnong ki don 1600 ngut ki nongthep vote hapoh ka jingpeit kitei ki 11 sordar, “Ngim sngewthuh sngewthaw shuh ki mih ki Sordar la kum ki tit” u la ong.Utei u President ka Synjuk u la kyntait ia ka jingkynnoh ki 6 sordar ha katei ka shnong kiba la kam ba la thombor ia ki da ka jingthmu ban pynduh ia ka jinglong sordar jong ki. U la pynrem ruh ia ka HYC Krang Unit kaba la kynthoh pyrshah ia ki nongialam shnong jong katei ka shnong kaba ka la don ruh ka jingkynnoh bamsap.
title: 700 tylli ki ïng, 11 ngut ki  Sordar ba synshar ha Krang

content: Shillong, 04 Risaw:U Lat ba thymmai ban peit ia ka jylla Meghalaya, u Ganga Prasad u la wan poi mynta ka janmiet ha Raj Bhawan, Shillong bad lashai ka sngi yn sa pynsmai ia u kum u Lat ba pura jong ka jylla.Ha kane ka jingwan jong u la pdiang burom ruh da u Myntri ka sorkar jylla, u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh, u Chief Secretary ka jylla, u Y Tsering bad ki heh ophisar ka jylla haba u la poi ha ïingsah ha Shillong.U Prasad u dei u ba la shah jied kum u Member of the Legislative Council (MLC) ka Bihar ha u snem 1994. U la long u dkhot ka MLC la 18 snem lynter bad u la long ruh kum u nongïalam ka BJP ha katei ka Council.Ïa u Ganga Prasad la kha ha ka 8 tarik Naitung 1937 ha Patna, Bihar. U la pyndep ïa ka jingpule haduh ka B.Com bad u dei uwei na ki nongïalam ba la rim bha jong ka BJP bad u la long teng ruh u General Secretary ka BJP ha Bihar.U la long ruh u National Executive Member ka BJP hapoh ka jing ialam jong u Amit Shah kum u president.U la shimti kum u Lat ba thymmai hadien ba u Lat barim u V Shanmuganathan la risain noh phra bnai mynshwa hadien ba la mih ka huri hura shah kynnoh jrong kti kynthei.
title: Wan poi u Lat thymmai ha  Shillong, lashai un bam smai

content: Jowai, 3 Risaw:Mynta ka sngi ym duna ia ki 20 ngut ki paidbah kiba la ioh ia ka shithi hajir na u In charge ka Ummulong Police Beat house, ki la wan hajir ban shah tohkit ha ki pulit halor ka ejahar ba la ujor pyrshah ia ki da u Rangbah Shnong, Chairman Shnong bad Secretary Shnong.La synran ia kitei ki 20 ngut da ym duna ia ka 150 ngut ki ki paidbah nongshong shnong katei ka shnong.U Rangbah Shnong, u ma SS Langi, u Chairman Shnong u ma Briwon Pohshna bad u Secretary shnong u ma Pyrkhatbha Lamare ki la ujor pyrshah ia kitei ki 20 ngut da kaba kynnoh ba ki la rung jubor shapoh phyllaw iing bad ka shapoh iing jong ki bad ruh ban byrngem byrsit ia ki ha ka por ba kitei ki paidbah ki iaid paidbah ban pyni ia ka dak ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingkynnoh ba kitei ki nongialam shnong ki la lehdonbor bad synshar donbor ia ka shnong.Utei u Rangbah Shnong uba dei ruh u Chairman ka VEC u la shah kynnoh leh shilliang bad pyndonkam bakla ia ka hok u paidbah na ka skim bylla 100 sngi nalor ba u la synshar donbor khlem da khot jingialang lane Dorbar ha kine ki lai snem.Kitei kiba la wan hajir mynta ka sngi haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor ki la iathuh ba ki jingkynnoh kitei ki lai ngut ki nongialam shnong ba ki la rung jubor shapoh iing jong ki bad byrngem ia ki ka long ka bym ym don nongrim satia hynrei kadei tang ka jingujor ba shuthok.Ka kong Wanda Lamare ka la ong ba ha katei ka sngi 29 tarik une u bnai ba la dep, ngi la iaid paidbah ban pyrshah ia u rangbah shnong ba um shym la khot dorbar shnong shuh la lai snem. Katei ka rally kalong kaba ym don kano kano ka jinghuri hura lait noh ka jingpyrta ba “Ngi Kwah Dorbar Shnong”.“Ngi la iaid paidbah na u surok PWD bad ngi khlem ktah wat tang ia ka kyrdop ban rung sha iing jong ki. Ia kane la sakhi da ki nongthoh khubor bad wat ki pulit ka Ummulong bad da u Additional SP bad Deputy SP ka West Jaintia Hills”, la ong kawei pat ka longkmie, ka kong Mo Passah.Ki don ki samla ka shnong kiba la ioh ia kitei ki shithi shah khot hajir na ki pulit katkum ba la ai kyrteng da kitei ki rangbah shnong, hynrei kaba phylla pat ka long ba kitei ki samla ki kam ba kim shym la don ha ka shnong ha katei ka sngi.“Nga don sha Namdong ha katei ka sngi, nga lah ban wanrah bun ki sakhi halor kane, hynrei nga kyndit pat ban ioh ia kum kane ka shithi”, la ong u samla Ricky-o Shylla“Nga dei u nongtrei sorkar bad ngam shym la don ha katei ka rally, kitei ki rangbah nongialam shnong ki la shu pharep ruma pat ia nga”, la ong u H Lamare
title: Shah khot hajir ki paidbah ha Thanad Ummulong

content: Shillong, 04 Risaw:Ki paidbah ka Diengpasoh ki la kynnoh ba u sordar ka shnong u Bah Gordon Wahlang u la lilam hi marwei, ia ka jaka sha ka tnad pulit na ka bynta ban shna ia ka Police station ha katei ka shnong kaba heh kumba 2 akar eiei khlem kano kano ka jingsiew dor.Kine ki paidbah kiba la pyrshah jur ia kane ka jingleh jong u Sordar, ki la kynnoh mynta ka sngi, ba u sordar lem bad ka jingiarap lem u MDC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ki la aiti sop sop ia ka jaka jong ka shnong sha ka tnad pulit khlem kano kano ka jingiatip lang bad ka jingialum dorbar paidbah ban iakren ia kane.Ka Kong Sidramon Mukhim ka la ong ba ha ka shnong Diengpasoh wat tang ban leh ia kano kano ka kam iba rit ruh, dei ban ioh jingbit shwa na ka shnong, hynrei une u sordar kat haduh 2 akar ka jaka ka shnong, u la shu ai ei sha ka sorkar khlem kano kano ka jingsiew shi naia ruh bad na ka liang jongki, ki pyrshah jur ia kane.Ki la dawa ba u sordar u dei ban lum beit mardor ia ka dorbar pyllun jong ki paidbah ban iakren ia kane ka kam namar ba ki paidbah ki ieng beit ban nym ai ei ia ka jaka sha ka sorkar khlem da siew ia ka dor.Ka Kong Sidramon ka la ong ba u MDC ka Sohrymgkham u Bah Pyniaid, u la wan ban iarap ia u sordar katei ka shnong ban leit kdew ia ki jaka ban ai sha ka tnad pulit ban shna ia ka police station, bad kane ka jingleh jongu, ka long pyrshah ia ka mon jong ki paidbah namar ba kum u MDC ha jaka ban iarap ia ki paidbah u khnoit pynban ia ki paidbah.Ha kajuh ka por, la iathuh ba ka tnad pulit ka la shna ia ka iing ha ka 18 tarik u bnai ba la dep, hynrei hadien ba la mih pyrshah ki paidbah, la pynsangeh hynrei la shna biang tang hadien ar sngi.Ka la ong ba ki kwah ban pyndep noh ia ka namar ba u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Mukul Sangma u kwah ban plie noh ia ka ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai.Ki la ujor ia kane sha u CEM ka KHADC bad ruh sha u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills da kaba kyrpad ba ki dei ban tuklar ba dei ban sangeh ka jinglilam ei ia ka jaka ka shnong sha ka bor sorkar jylla da u sordar marwei khlem ka jingtip bad ka jingmynjur ka dorbar paidbah.“Lada um khot noh ia ka dorbar ban iakren ia kane, ngin sa pyrkhat ban leh da kiwei ki lynti”, la ong ka kong Sidramon.Ki la ong ba ha ka por ba long sordar u Bah Maswel Kharumnuid ka la don ka jinglum ia ka dorbar pyllun ban iakren ha ki snem ba la dep ha kaba u paidbah u la kyntait ban ai ei ia ka jaka khlem jingsiew hynrei dei ha ka jinglong sordar u Bah Gordon ba u la shu iaid lait ia ki paidbah bad ka dorbar da kaba shu leh marwei.
title: “Lilam hi U Sordar marwei ia ka  jaka ba 2 akar ha Diengpasoh”

content: Jowai, 4 Risaw:Uwei u riew tymmen uba la dap 101 snem ka rta uta udei u woh Shaimon Pyrbot u la ioh pdiang 10 hajar tyngka ka buskit bad ka syrnod kitbok kitrwiang ba un nang koit nangkhiah na kti jong u Deputy Chief Minister ka jylla, u Dr. RC Laloo mynta ka sngi ha ka jingialang rakhe pyndon burom ia ka sngi kyrpang ki riew tymmen lane ka World International Day of Older Persons.Ia kane ka jingrakhe la pynbit pynbiang da ka tnad District Social Welfare Department ha District Auditorium, Jowai mynta ka sngi.Ka District Social Welfare Officer, haba kren pdiang ia baroh ki riew tymmen kiba la wan poi sha katei ka jingialang, ka la iathuh ba ha ka jingshisha ka pyrthei ka rakhe ia kane ka sngi kyrpang ki riew tymmen ka long ha ka 1 tarik u Risaw man la u snem. Hynrei namar ba mynta ka kynti ka hap ha ka sngi U Blei la hap ban pynkynriah noh ia ka.Na ka liang u myntri rangbah ba-ar, haba kren ha ka jingialang u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ba u la ioh ka lad ban donlang ban rakhe ia kane ka sngi hangne ha Jowai.U la ai khulei ia baroh ki riew tymmen kiba la wan poi sha katei ka jingialang bad ruh sha baroh ki riew tymmen ka District bad ka jylla.“Nga ai khublei kyrpang ia phi namar ba phi la synniang shibun ki kam babha jong phi ha ka imlang ka sahlang”, la ong u Dr. Laloo uba la sam ruh ia ki jingaisngewbha sha baroh ki riew tymmen ba don ha ka jingialang.Ha katei ka sngi, la donlang u Deputy Commissioner, R Rapthap kum u symbud kongsan, u Dolloi ka Jowai Elaka, Puramon Kynjing, ki riew paw khmat ka Jowai kynthup ia u SK Lato bad u Dr. Bishar Plain uba la shongthait noh kum u Joint Director ka tnad Veterinary bad uba la pyniaid ruh ia ka jingialang.
title: Ka khusnam, sha u tymmen  ba 101 snem ha Jowai

content: Shillong, 04 Risaw:U Myntri ba peit ia ka um ka wah ka ri India u Arjun Ram Meghwal u la ong ba ki projek kiba sahteng bad ka pisa ka bym pat pynlait lut na ka tnad ba u peit ia ka Meghalaya yn sa pynlait noh shen khlem kano kano ka jingeh.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingplie paidbah ia ka prokram Sankalp se Siddhi (Ka India ba thymmai-Ngi rai ban pynlong ia ka) kaba long hynne ka sngi ha Shillong, u Meghwal u la kubur ba ki don ki projek jong ka Meghalaya kiba sahteng ha ka tnad water resources hynrei u la ong ba un sa pynlait noh ia ki ha kine ki khyndiat sngi hi bad ka pisa.“Don katto katne ki projek kiba sahteng kiba dei ia ka Meghalaya bad nga kular ba ngan pynlait noh ia ki shen shen ia ka pisa kaba sah baroh”, la ong u Meghwal.U la ong ba ka tnad kan pynlong ia ka jingialang kaba iadei bad ka um ka wah ha ka 9 tarik ha Delhi bad ha kane ka jingialang yn sa iakynduh ruh ia ki ophisar ban leit mihkhmat na Meghalaya.“Kano kano ka projek kaba sahteng, nga pynthikna ba ngin pyniaid bad pynlait noh wut wut”, u la ong.Ha kajuh ka por, u la ong ba ka jingpynlong ia kane ka prokram ka long ba ki paidbah ka ri ki dei ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban kular ban pynlong ia ka ri India kaba lait na ka bamsap, kaba lait na jingjaboh, kaba lait na ka jingsngewpher niam, bad ban pynlong kum ka ri kaba khlain bor ha ka pyrthei ha u snem 2022.U la iaroh bad nguh ia u Tirot Sing Syiem uwei na ki khlawait ka jaitbynriew Khasi uba la lenlade ban iakhun pyrshah ia ka sorkar phareng.“U Tirot Sing u dei uba khraw na ka jaitbynriew Khasi, u la noh synniang shibun bah sha ka jingiakhun laitluid ka ri India pyrshah ia ka jingsynshar donbor ka ri Bilat”, la ong u Meghwal.U la ong ba u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri Narendra Modi u la sngew khia bad shim khia bha na ka bynta ka dong mihngi bad u la phah ia ki myntri sorkar ban leit jngoh ha man ki jaka ha kane ka dong ban sngap ia ka jingeh bad ki jingdonkam jong ki paidbah khnang ba ka sorkar kan leh ia kaba donkam.“Dei namar ka jingbthah bad shim khia u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri, u Narendra Modi ba nga la don hangne mynta ruh ka sngi ban wan jngoh ia ka dong mihngi”, la ong u Meghwal.
title: Nguh U Arjun Ram Meghwal,  ia ka jinglen lade U Tirot Sing

content: Nongstoiñ, 4 Risaw:U wei u rangbah u ba tip kyrteng kum u Kynsaiborlang Wahlang 26 snem, na ka shnong Lumpyngngad West Khasi Hills, u la khlad noh hashen, hadien ba u la shah pom ha u pyrthat, katba kiwei ki ar ngut kiba la iadon lang kila mynsaw jur.Katkum ka tyllong khubor bala ioh lum la ong ba katei ka jingjia kala jia hynne ka janmiet ha kapor 1:30PM ha kawei ka jaka kaba la tip kum ka Mawbuit katba kitei ki lai ngut ki dang iaid kjat da ka jingthmu ban leit siat sim sha khlaw hynrei kynsan kynsan ynda la poi ha katei ka jaka u pyrthat u la pom kynsan kynsan.Kitei ki ar ngut kiba la mynsaw la tip kyrteng kum u Klaindingstar Wahlang 18 snem ka rta kiba dei na ka shnong Lumpyngngad, katba u wei pat la tip kyrteng kum u Jokendarful Syiem 24 snem ka rta na ka shnong Nongrangoi kaba don marjan bad ka shnong Lumpyngngad.Hadien katei ka jingjia ia kitei ki ar ngut la pynkit noh mar mar sha Civil Hospital Nongstoin naka bynta ka jingsumar kaba kyrkieh.
title: Katba dang leit siat sim sha  khlaw, iap ba shah pom pyrthat

content: Shillong, 5 Risaw:Da ki spah ngut ki paidbah ki la ia tuid sha ka jingialang jong u bah Nit Shabong MLA barim kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha madan Mawmaram. U bah Nit Shabong u la lum ia katei ka jingialang ym na ka bynta ban ialap elekshon, hynrei ban pynshai paidbah shaphang ka Assam Forest Regulation Act 1981 kaba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la pyrthuh bud ia katei ka aiñ da kaba ai kyrteng kum ka Meghalaya Forest Regulation Act kaba u bah Nit Shabong u pyrshah jur ia katei ka aiñ.Ha katei ka jingialang ki paidbah kim shym la iohsngew bha ia ka sur tynghung namarba ka rit palat ka sur bad ba ka don jingthud. Hapdeng ki paidbah ba bun ka la mih ka jingiakren namar bym iohsngew bha ia ka tynghung bad don kiba la ong ba imat u bah Nit u la duk palat um don pisa shuh tang ban thied tiar pynsawa ruh. Napdeng kiba bun don ka sur kaba la mih bad ai jingmut ban ia noh synñiang pisa noh ia u bah Nit ba un ioh thied tiar pynsawa bad tang mar kumta hi khrui ki paidbah ki la ia mih bad ki leit ban noh pisa ha ka miej kaba don hakhmat u bah Nit.Ki paidbah ki la ong ba katei ka pisa ka dei kaba ki la noh synei ia u bah Nit ba un thied tynghung pynsawa ba un leit pynshai kylleng ki jaka sha phang katei ka aiñ ka sorkar bad kumjuh ruh ban iarap bai umphniang khyndiat khynsoit ia u.
title: Sei pisa ki paidbah, ban  iakhih ain khlaw U bah Nit

content: Jowai, 5 Risaw:Ki lai ngut ki MDC ka JHADC kiba la jop kum ki kyrtong shi met ki la pyniasnoh ia lade sha ka seng Congress mynta ka sngi Palei.Kitei ki lai ngut ki MDC shimet ki dei u MDC na War West, u ma Het Pohthmi, u MDC ka Nongjngi, u ma Suklang Shylla bad u ma Skhemlang Suchiang u MDC na Muthlong-Sohkymphor.Ia u ma Pohthmi bad u ma Shylla la pdiang burom da u CEM ka JHADC uba dei ruh u Vice President ka District Congress Committee West Jaintia Hills ha ryngkat ka jingiadonlang kiwei pat ki MDC ka Congress katba ia u ma Suchiang pat yn pdiang burom ia u la shai ka sngi Thoh dieng na ka daw ba u hap ban leit Shillong na ki kam shimet jong u.Baroh lai ngut ki dei kiba dang jop kum ki MDC ha u snem 2014.“Ka rai jong kine ki paralok MDC jong nga ban rung sha ka party Congress ka long ka rai kaba dei bad ngi kmen ban ioh iatreilang ban pynkhlain ia ka party ha West Jaintia Hills”, la ong u ma Shullai.Na ka liang u ma Hetmi Pohthmi, u la ong ba naduh ba u la rung sha ka kam sain hima sima u la thrang ban rung sha ka seng Congress bad kane ka jingthrang jong u la la urlong mynta ka sngi.Ha ka Election MLA ba la dep, u ma Pohthmi u dei u nongkyrshan barad bah jong u MLA ka thain, u ma Stephanson Mukhim uba la jop kum u kyrtong shimet.
title: Rung Congress 3ngut ki  MDC shimet ka JHADC

content: Shillong, 5 Risaw:U MLA ba mynta ka Mawhati u bah Julius Dorphang uba dang don hapoh phatok un ia khun biang ia ka elekshon MLA 2018. Haba ia kren bad ki nongialam u bah Julius ki la pynthikna ba u bah Julius un ia khun ia ka elekshon 2018 napoh phatok kum u kyrtong shimet. Kitei ki nongialam ki la kob ruh ba ha u 2018 sa shisien biang u bah Julius un jop.Haba ia kren bad u Rupang lyngba ka telephone u bah A.Nongpoh uwei na ki nongialam u bah Julius u la pynthikna ba u bah Julius un dang ia khun kum u kuyrtong shimet. U bah Nongpoh u la ong ba haduh mynta ki nongkyrshan jong u bah Julius ki dang don hapoh ka kynhun jong u ka MCCC. U la iathuh ba hadien ka jingshong phatok u bah Ju ruh kam da don than ka jingktah ia ka vote jong u watla ki don khyndiat ngut kiba la kynriah noh shawei. Hynrei u la ong ba ka jingmih bun ngut ki kyrtong ha Mawhati konstitwensi ka la plie lad biang ia u bah Ju ban jop sa shisien pat.U bah Nongpoh u la iathuh ba kumba ka long mynta ka MLA Scheme hapoh Mawhati ka iaid beit iaid ryntih khlem jingdkoh, wat la u MLA u don shapoh phatok ruh bad ia kitei ki skhim la pyniaid da ki nongialam jong u bah Julius. Utei u nongbud ba hajan eh jong u bah Julius u la kob ba ha u 2018 u bah Ju, un dang jop biang na Mawhati konstitwensi. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ruh ba haduh mynta ki paidbah na Mawhati ki ju leit ban ia kynduh na ka por sha ka por ia u bah Julius hapoh phatok ban ia kren kam kren jam.Lah ban kdew ba u MLA ka Mawhati u bah Julius Dorphang u la shah kem ha ka miet 6 tarik u Kyllalyngkot , 2017 ha ka por 11 baje mynmiet na Inter State Bus Terminus kaba don ha Garchuk, Assam. U bah Julius u la shah kynnoh ba u la leh be-i-jot ia kawei ka khynnah samla ha Marvelynn Inn, Shillong. Lah ruh ban kdew ba kumba long haduh mynta ki kyrtong ki ban ia khun na Mawhati konstitwensi ki long u bah Julius Dorphang-MLA, bah James Sylliang-MDC, kong Eva Kharbani, u bah Dasakhiat (khun jong u bah Ngaitlang Dhar), u bah Donbok Khymdeit ka UDP.
title: Yn ia khun elekshon MLA, u bah Julius na Phatok

content: Nongpoh, 06 Risaw:“Kane ka sorkar MUA-II kaba la ialam khmat da u Mukul Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah, ka dei ka sorkar kaba don ia kata ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ka jingdonkam bad ka jingbit jingbiang jong u Paidbah nongshong shnong ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei” ong u Bah HDR Lyngdoh, ha ka sngi kaba la plie ia ka Umsohlait Police Station ba shipor bad buh ia u Mawnongrim na ka bynta ban tei ia ka Building, mynta ka sngi ha shnong Umsohlait, Ri Bhoi District.U la ong ruh, ba kane ka sorkar MUA-II, ka dei ka sorkar kaba pyndep ia kaei kaba ka la kular sha ki paidbah bad halor kane la sakhi ruh tang hapoh ki 5 snem ka sorkar ka la lah ban plie haduh 18 tylli ki Police Station, 4 tylli ki Distrik bad 7 Administrative Units ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka jylla.Haba kren pat halor katei ka Police Station ha Umsohlait, u Bah HDR lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingwan kane ka Police Station ha katei ka thain, ka la long shisha ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong
