Sohshang u la ong ba naduh ba sdang jong u snem 2016, katei ka longkmie ka la kyntait ban ai ia ka khanasamari, haba wan pan na ka liang jong ki ophis sorkar bad ha kiwei kiwei ruh ki bynta ba wan na ka sorkar bad dei haduh ka Dorbar shnong kaba la long ha ka 10 tarik u Jymmang 2016 ba ka Dorbar kala pan bad phah wanrah da ka jingthoh kaba shai na katei ka longkmie khnang ba ka dorbar shnong kan sngewthuh ia kino ki bynta ba kam treh shuh.“Hynrei katei ka longkmie ka la kyntait ban ai ia ka jingthoh bad da kaba shai la kren ha khmat katei ka Dorbar ba ki la ia rai lang da baroh shi ïing shi sem jong katei ka longkmie ba kin kyntait noh naduh ka EPIC, Job Card, Ration Card, Passbook, Tulop Nonghikai, Certificate wat haduh ka bor ding ilektrik,ka um kor ruh bad ia baroh ki jaitkam ne ki jingmyntoi kiba wan na ka sorkar bad na ka liang jong ka dorbar shnong kam lah ban ong da kumwei pat, namar da lade hi ka la mon ban rai bad kyntait” ong ka kyrwoh na ka dorbar shnong Mawroh.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshon ADHAR dang ha u bnai Nailar 2017, ka la don ka jingwan shon Adhar ha ki skul hapoh shnong, hynrei na ka liang jong ki rangbah jong ka shnong kila pynbna paidbah ruh da kaba ong ba jar kiba kwah bad sngewmon ban shon ia u Adhar, ym don kano kano ka jingkhang lane pynbor iano iano ruh hynrei kan shong ha ka mon kaba laitluid jong ki hi.Shuh shuh ka kyrwoh khubor ka iathuh ruh ba ha kaba iadei pat bad ka skul, ba la seng da katei ka longkmie na ka liang jong ka shnong kam don kano kano ka jingtuklar, hynrei tang kawei ka long ban a ka liang jong ka shnong kan nym shah ban rah noh shabar na ka area shnong, bad la ong ruh ban na ka liang jong ka shnong kan hap ban long kaba peitngor bha ha kum kitei ki jinglong jingman khnang ban nym wanrah kano kano ka jingklumar ha ka imlang ka sahlang bad ha ka shnong ka thaw hi baroh kawei.Ha kawei pat ka bynta na ka liang jong ka Balang Presbyterian Mawroh kaba la wan lyngba u Tbn F.M. Marngar, ka la pynshai da kaba ong ba “Ka Balang Presbyterian Mawroh da kaba bud ryntieh ia ka jingpyniaid jong ka Khasi Jaintia Presbyterian assembly kam khang iano iano ban shon Adhar bad la ong ruh ba ki dkhot jong ka Bslang ki lah ban shon bad nym shon ruh ka shong ha ka mon jong ki hi.Ym tang kata na ka liang jong ka Balang ka la ong ruh ba ka la weng noh ia I kong Phrim Sohshang na ka Balang, hadien bala sospon noh ia katei ka longkmie na ka Balang namar ka jingleh pyrshah ka jong ka ia ka rai jong ka Committee Balang kaba la mana ban wan ialam ia ki briew kiba na bar bad ban pynlong jingiaseng ha ka por miet khlem ka jingtip jong ka Balang, bad ka Balang ka la leit ban ia syllok bad katei ka longkmie, hynrei ka la ialeh pyrshah da kaba kala pynlong jingiaseng ha kapor ba don jingiaseng kyrpang hapoh la ka Balang.
title: “EPIC, Kor Um, ding ilektrik” kyntait lut  kiba ha iing ka kong Phrim Sohshang

content: Shillong, 30 Risaw:Ki don kumba 400 ngut ki paidbah kiba kwah ban weng kyrteng ialade na u Aadhaar nombar na kylleng ka ri Khasi bad Jaintia bad na ri Lu Garo ruh kumjuh, ong u Pastor PBM Basaiawmoit, hynrei napdeng kitei ki don haduh 226 ngut kiba la weng ialade katba kiwei pat ki dei kiba dang shu rah ia ki phom sha ïng ban wan phah biang sha ka Meghalaya People’s Committee on Aadhaar.Ia ka kyrteng kitei ki 226 ngut kiba kwah ban weng noh ialade, u Pastor u la ong ba yn phah noh sha ka UDAI bad kham hadien yn phah sha ka Supreme Court. U la ong ba na ka bynta kito kiba kwah ban dang weng kyrteng ialade, yn dang pdiang haduh ka 3 tarik mynta u bnai ha ophis jong ka KSU ha Jaiaw bad ha Mawkyrwat ha South West Khasi Hills naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep haduh 3 baje janmiet. U Pastor u la ong ba kiba bun na kiba kwah weng kyrteng ialade ki dei ki briew kiba na nongkyndong kiba shah pynbiej bad shah pynbor bad kiba bun na ki dei ki khynnah skul kiba la shah pynbiej ba kin ym ioh scholarship bad kiwei pat ki jingmyntoi.Katei ka komiti mynta ka sngi, ka la ioh jingkyrshan shuh shuh hadien ka jingwan ia soh jong u Rev. Goera M. Sangma na Tura, Pastor James K. Sangma na Tura, Pastor Armith Ch. Momin na Kherapara, Doni Ch. Marak na Garobadha bad kitei kin shim ia ki kyrteng jong kito kiba kwah weng Aadhaar na ri Lum Garo. U Pastor PBM u la ong ba katei ka jingkhot kam dei ba ka komiti ka pynbor, hynrei ka dei ka jingiarap ia kito kiba kwah. “Kam dei ka kam jong ngi-ngi shu leh lem ia kiba kwah” u la ong.Mynta pyndam Aadhar ha NongstoiñNa ka bynta kito kiba shong kiba sah ha West Khasi Hills bad kwah ban law noh na kaba don ia u Aadhaar, la pynbeit ba kin wan mih sha ophis ka KSU, Nongstoin naduh lashai ka 31tarik Risaw haduh ka 2tarik Naiwieng 2017, ban ioh jingiarap, ong ka kyrwoh na U Pastor PBM Basaiawmoit, uba dei u dkhot jong ka Meghalaya Peoples’ Committee on Aadhar.
title: Shisngi 226ngut, kiba wan ban  pyndam Aadhaar ha Shillong

content: Jowai, 31 Risaw:Hynnin ka meit, uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Madiar Tyngkan uba dei trai shnong na ka shnong Mushrot West Jaintia Hills u la shah dungiap hapoh kawei ka dukan kyiad kaba don ha Mookhep, East Jaintia Hills.Kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 8 baje eiei mynmiet. La iathuh ba utei u Tyngkan u la shongkha ha ka shnong Wapungskur bad u la leit dih kyiad sha Mookhep ha ryngkat ki paralok jong u.Hapoh katei ka dukan kyiad, la don uwei pat u rangbah uba la 58 snem uba la tip kyrteng kum u Tell Shyrmang uba na ka shnong Pamrapaithlu.Hadien ba u Tyngkan bad ki paralok jong u ki la shongshit, ki la kren dait bad kynjat ia utei u rangbah ha kaba utei u rangbah u la kiew don ban sei da ka tari ban tang shi tari na ka kpoh jong utei u Tyngkan haduh ba u la khlad noh shen.Ki pulit ki la kem noh ia utei u Tel Shyrmang da ka jingiarap ki VDP ka Mookhep.
title: Shah dung iap u rangbah,  ha dukan kyiad

content: Shillong, 31 Risaw:Ka National Green Tribunal (NGT), ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngew khia, ba ka Jowai Municipal Board, kam shym la thaw ia ki lad ki lynti ban thaw ia ki nala kiba biang ban pynlang ia ka jaboh jabain, ha ka sor bah Jowai, ha shwa ban pyntuid sha ka wah Myntdu.Ha ka jingshong bishar mynta ka sngi, ka NGT, ka la ioh jingtip ruh, ba ka Jowai Municipal Board, ka la phah jingthoh sha ka tnat pynroi sor, ha kaba ka kwah ban ioh pisa T.4lak, na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ia ka projek, na ka bynta ban pynkhuid ia ka sor bah Jowai, hynrei ka tnat pynroi sor, ka sngap man man ia katei ka jingpan pisa jong ka Jowai Municipal Board, ong U LD Choudhury, uba dei u nong iasiaid jong ka Jowai Municipal Board (JMU).La aiti namarkata ia katei ka kam ha U bah HS Thangkhiew Sr Advocate, ba un shimkhia, na ka bynta katei ka kam, ban iakren bad ka tnat pynroi sor, na ka bynta ba kin pynkhuid ia ka jaboh ha shwa, ban pyntuid sha Wah Myntdu. La bthah ruh ia ka Pollution Board, ba kan ai ia ka plan, kaba ka thmu, na ka bynta ban pynkhuid ia ka mariang ha sor Jowai, ha kaba ia katei ka jingtip, yn ai sha ka NGT, ha kawei pat ka jing shong bishar, ha ka 27tarik Naiwieng 2017.
title: T.4lak kwah projek thaw nala  ka Jowai Municipal Board

content: Shillong, 31 Risaw:U President ka HSPDP u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit u la ai ksai ba ka jingiatreilang ka HSPDP bad ka UDP ka lah ban nym kut noh tang ha ka jingiatreilang, hynrei ka lah ban ialam shaduh ka thong ban poi sha ka jingialong kawei lada ka jinglong jingman ka ialam kumta.Haba kren ha ka jingialang katei ka seng mynta ka sngi ha Shillong, u Bah Ardent u la ong ba,”Kam dei ka jingialeh paralok hynrei ka dei ka jingialeh lang kaba lah ban long ban poi sha ka jingiatylli lada biang ha ki sngi ban wan. Mynta ka dei tang ka jingiatreilang”, la ong u Bah Ardent.U la ong biang ba ka thong ba kongsan ka jingiateh paralok bad ka UDP ka long ban pynthikna ba ka Congress kam dei shuh ban bat ia ka bor synshar ha ka jylla ha kane ka elekshon MLA ban wan.“Ka jingiateh lok ka long ban pynthikna ba ka Congress kam dei ban wan ha ka bor, kaba la pynduk ia ka jylla”, la ong u Bah Ardent.U la ong ba ki paidbah kim kwah shuh ban synshar ka Congress bad BJP bad ki kwah ia ka synshar da ki Seng riewlum bad kane ka 2018 kan dei ka pali jong ki seng riewlum.Hynrei ha kajuh ka por, u President ka HSPDP u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ban long kiba husiar namar ba ha kine ki sngi la bun kiba dap da ka thok ka shukor tang ban ioh ia ka jingjop ki thok bad pynbiej lai phew jait ia ki paidbah.U la ong ba kiwei ki ongba ki kwah ia ka jingkylla hynrei kam long kaba shai katba ka HSPDP ka kwah ia ka jingkylla kaba lait na ka bamsap bampong, na ka jingduk jingkyrduh.“Ha u 2018, ngin wanrah ka jingkylla ha ka synshar paidbah ba lait na ka bamsap”, u la ong.Haba kyntait ban don kano kano ka jingktah na ka jingiakhun lang na ki katto katne ki jaka bad ka UDP, u Bah Ardent u la ong ba ka dei ka jingiakhun khlem ia brut shi paralok hynrei ban shu kynjat beit tang ia ka bol.“Haba ialeh paralok ka long beit ban kynjat ia ka bol khlem kynjat briew ne khlem leh brut kaba mut ban nym ailad ia kiwei ban thep kol”, la ong u Bah Ardent.U Bah Ardent u la don ki briew kiba thmu ban pyndonkam ia ka kyrteng jong u ma ieid Hoping (HS Lyngdoh) bam kwai ha duwar u Blei tang ban pynbeij ia ki paidbah.“Wat ailad ia ka jingsngew sarong, trei da ka jingsngew rit da ka jingieid ia ka party khnang ban poi sha ka thong bad lada don kano kano ka jingeh ka jingduna hapdeng ki nongialam, wat thad sha madan madiah hynrei iakren beit hapoh ka party”, u la ong.U la ong ba lada jop bun ka party khlem pep wat u Ma Ieid Hoping ruh un kmen najrong.Ha kajuh, ka por u Bah Ardent u la iathuh ba kan pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah ha ka taiew baar jong u Nohprah ha Shillong tangba ia ka jaka bad ka sngi yn sa pynbna ha kine ki sngi.Ha kawei ka liang, u la iathuh ba ka jingialang hynne ka sngi, la pynthymmai ruh ia ki katto katne ki nongkitkam kynthup ia ka kam General Secretary la pynkhamti noh ha u Bah Kara Chen ha jaka u Bah Witting Mawsor uba la pynkiew sha ka kyrdan Vice President katba ia ka kam Treasurer la aiti ha u Bah Renikton Tongkhar.
title: Ai ksai U President ka HSPDP,  ban iatylli ki seng riewlum

content: Nongstoiñ, 31 Risaw:Hadien ba ka la mih ka khubor kaba la ong ba ka Meghalaya Peoples Committee on Aaadhaar (MPCA), kan iarap ia ki paidbah kiba la don Aadhaar, ba kin mih noh na ka thup kyrteng Aadhaar, da kaba kin hap ban leit sha ka ophis jong ka KSU; ki katto katne ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka West Khasi Hills District, ki la ia khoh reh ban ia wad ia ka ophis jong ka KSU ha Nongstoiñ, na ka bynta ba kin ioh weng noh ia lade na ka thup thup kyrteng Aadhaar.Katkum ka jingioh jingtip u nongthoh khubor la ong ba ki katto katne ki briew, kiba la kwah ban weng noh ia lade na ka thup kyrteng u Aadhaar, mynta ka sngi, ki la ia klumar thlim ban ia wad ia ka ophis jong ka KSU ha Nongstoiñ ha kaba kim shym la lap satia.Ban shai bha halor katei jingklumar jingmut ki paidbah ka thain WKHD, u nongthoh khubor u la ioh lad ruh ban iakren bad u Vice President ka KSU Nongstoiñ Circle u samla Mixstarwell Samakha bad haba kylli ka don ne em kaba kum kata ka jingweng Aadhaar ha Nongstoiñ, u tei u samla u la jubab da kaba ong “Hoid ka don bad ka la sdang ruh naduh mynta ka sngi, hynrei ka jingklumar ki paidbah ka dei namar ba kim shym la lap ia ophis jong ka KSU namar ka don kham pajih na ka Iew Nongstoiñ”.Shuh shuh utei u Vice President ka KSU Nongstoiñ Circle, u la iathuh ba haduh mynta ym shym pat la don kiba wan ban shim phom bad lehse ka jingbympat don ba wan ka lah ban dei ba kim shym la lap ia ka ophis, kumta utei u nongialam u la pyntip ruh sha ki paidbah ka thaiñ ba kito kiba kwah ban weng noh ia lade na ka thup kyrteng u Aadhaar kin sngewbha ban wan shim ia ki phom na ka dukan Mixarts kaba don hajan ka Canara Bank ha lad Rambrai Nongstoiñ West Khasi Hills District lane ki lah ban shu phun ha kine ki Number 7422082065/8787413861/8259854556/8787323250.
title: Kulmar thlim ki paidbah ka thaiñ  Nongstoiñ ba kwah weng Aadhaar

content: Shillong, 31 Risaw:Ka Mawsynram Block Congress Committee ka la ioh pdiang ia ka kyrteng jong 2 ngut ki kyrtong kiba kwah bna ia khun na katei ka seng, kitei ki 2 ngut ki long u bah Silverstar Marweiñ bad u bah Himalaya Muktan Shangpliang. Ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Rit Mawsir, Mawsynram; u President jong ka MBCC u bah Khelor Kharnaior u la pynbna ba baroh ki 136 tylli ki Primari Unit ka MBCC ki la mynjur ia ka kyrteng jong u bah H.M Shangpliang bad nalor ki 136 tylli ki Unit la mynjur ruh da ka Block Congress, ka Mahila bad ka Youth Congress Mawsynram.Ka seng Congress na ka jylla ka la phah ia u bah Pynthymmaibor Chyne uba dei u Secretary jong ka District Congress Committee ban long kum u pyrman lane u Block Election Observer uba la don ryngkat ha katei ka jingialang. Ki nongialam jong ka MBCC ki la aiti ia baroh ki kot ki sla ba donkam sha utei u pyrman bad ki la pynsngew ru ia ka rai ba ki kwah ba ka tiket kan leit sha u bah Shangpliang.U bah Pynthymmai haba kren ha katei ka jingialang u la ong ba un leit pynsngew sha ka MPCC ia katei ka rai jong ka MBCC bad un leit rah ruh ia ka khubor kumba ki Primary Unit ki kwah da u ba Shangpliang. Haba kren shaphang ka politik u la ong ba ki seng kiba pyrshah ia ka Congress ki ju kren bunsien shuwa ka elekshon ba la dep ruh ba ka Congress kan ym wan ha ka bor synshar hynrei ka la ioh ban synshar tylli pynban marwei.U la ong ba wat ha ka por ba kiwei pat ki seng ki dang ia ioh doh kyndang lang bad ka Congress da kaba ia donlang bad ka sorkar ruh ki dang kawang ktieh katno lei mynta ba ka Congress ka synshar marwei, “Mynshuwa por ba ki dang ia ioh doh kshong, doh kyndang lang ruh ki dang ia kawang, ka dei hok ia ki mynta lei ban kwang ba ka Congress ka synshar marwei” u la ong.U President ka MBCC u bah Khelor u la ong ba mynshuwa ka Congress ka ju jop salit ha ki elekshon ha Mawsynram hynrei mynta ka kynti kan jop donburom bad kan tam kput ia kiwei pat ki kyrtong. U la ong ba ia u kyrtong jong ka Congress mynta ruh yn kyrshan lang da u MLA ka Mawsynram u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem naba haduh mynta ruh u dang dei u Congress uba dang shah sospon bad ka jingsngap jar jong u ka pyni ba u kyrshan ia ka seng Congress.
title: Jied ka Congress Mawsynram  ia u bah Shangpliang

content: Shillong, 31 Risaw:U bah D.D Lapang, President ka MPCC u la thung ia u Prof.R.C Laloo, Ronnie V Lyngdoh bad u Manbor S Warjri kum ki nongaiktien ka MPCC.
title: 3 ngut ki nongaiktien Congress

content: Shillong, 31 Risaw:U Dr RC Laloo, MLA ka Jowai, uba dei ruh u myntri rangbah ba ar, ka sorkar Meghalaya, ula pynbna ba un nym ialeh shuh ia ka elekshon MLA 2018.Ha ka jingialang jong ka Jowai Block Congress Committee (I), kaba long mynta ka sngi, kaba dei na ka bynta ban rai ia u kandidet ban ialeh ia ka elekshon MLA 2018, ki la mih ar ngut ki kyrteng, kawei ka jong U Ma RC Laloo bad kawei pat ka jong U Ma Andrew Shullai. Hynrei ha shwa ba ka jingialang, kan shim ia ka rai jong kitei ki arngut kiba thep kyrteng, U Ma RC Laloo, ula rai ba un weng noh ia ka kyrteng jongu bad ba un nym ialeh shuh ia ka elekshon MLA 2018.U Ma Roytre, u iathuh ruh ha ka jingialang, ba ula ai jingmut hi ma u, ia U Bah Andrew, ba un thep kyrteng bad ka daw, ka long namar ba u kwah ban ailad ia utei u samla, ba un mih bujli, ha ka jaka jongu, kum u nongmihkhmat jong katei ka Constituency.Ha ka jingialang, la iathuh ba kiba bun ki pynbor ia U Ma Roytre, ba un iakhun biang ha kane ka kynti, hynrei utei u rangbah, ula kyntait bad pyni ia ka daw jong ka jingnoh ka rta jongu bad kumta, ka jingialang, ka la rai ban phah noh, tang ia ka kyrteng jong U Ma Andrew Shullai, uba dei ruh U Chief Executive Member jong ka Jaintia District Council.Kham mynshwa, lah ban pynkynmaw, ba ka kong Roshan Warjri, kaba dei ka myntri jong ka sorkar Jylla, ka la rai ban nym ialeh elekshon shuh ha u snem 2018, ha kaba ka North Shillong Congress Block, ka la rai ban pyniakhun ia U Bah WHD Syngkon.
title: Yn nym ialeh MLA shuh U Ma RC Laloo

content: Nongstoiñ, 1 Naiwieng:Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Nongstoiñ Circle, mynta ka sngi, ka la ioh ban pdiang kumba 29 tylli ki phom weng Adhaar na ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba la wan na kylleng ki shnong kiba don hapoh ka thain Nongstoiñ.Haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, u samla Mixstarwell Samakha Vice President ka KSU Nongstoiñ Circle, u la iathuh ba napdeng ki tei ki 29 ngut kiba la wan ban shim ia ka phom weng na ka thup kyrteng Adhaar ki kynthup naduh ki nonghikai skul ki nongtrei sorkar bad ki riew paidbah.Shuh shuh u tei u nongialam ka KSU, u la iathuh ruh ba nalor kitei ki 29 ngut ki dang don shibun bah ki briew kiba kwah ban weng noh na ka thup kyrteng Adhaar kiba la wan mih sha ka ophis jong ka KSU, hynrei kim shym la wan rah pat ia ki card Aadhaar ia kaba kila dep ban ioh.“Kitei ki 29 ngut kiba la wan ban shim ia ka phom kidei kiba sah kum ha ka shnong Upper New Nongstoiñ, Tiehsaw, Mawthawniaw, Siejlieh, New Nongstoin, Porsohsynnam, Dom Mawlien Pyndengrei bad kiwei kiwei” ong u tei u nongiualam ka KSU.Na ka liang jong u nongthoh khubor u la ioh lad ruh ban iakren bad ki katto katne ki briew kiba la kwah ban weng noh ia lade na ka thup kyrteng u Aadhaar bad haba pyrshang ban kylli ba balei ki kwah ban weng noh na ka thup kyrteng Adhaar don kiba ong ba kila leh ia u Adhaar da ka jingkhmih lynti ba lada ym don Aadhaar, kan sa long ka jingkhang lad ia ki ha kiba bun ki liang phewse kumba ki lap pat kam shymla long kumta.Shuh shuh don ruh kiba la pynpaw da kaba ong ba ki sngewtieng bad don ruh kiba la babe jur, tang hadien ba kila ioh ia u Adhaar haduh ba kim treh wat tang ban plied bad kila thang bad tar noh shi syndon ia u Adhaar ia kaba ki la ioh bad tang namar ba kwah ban weng noh ia u Aadhaar wat ha pdeng ka jingshitom ruh kim shym la khein shuh, hynrei kila leit ban wad ia ki phom na ka ophis jong ka KSU.Na ka liang ki nongialam jong ka seng KSU Nongstoiñ Circle kala pyntip ruh sha ki paidbah kiba kwah ban wan shim ia ki phom weng Adhaar ba kin sngewbha ban wan sha ka ophis jong ka seng kaba don hajan ka Shipara Restaurant ha Nongstoiñ bad ruh ba kin sngewbha ban wanrah ruh artad ia ki Adhaar Card ki jong ki.
title: 29 ngut, wan pyndam kyrteng Adhaar ha Nongstoiñ

content: Shillong, 01 Naiwieng:U Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la kynnoh ba ki myntri ka sorkar BJP haba ki wan sha kane ka jylla ki pynlong jingialang sain pyrthei, da kaba pynlut da ka pisa paidbah bad ma u ruh kum u myntri rangbah ym ju ioh jingtip eiei.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, u Dr Mukul u la ong, “Ki myntri ka BJP ki wan sha Meghalaya kim ju pyntip eiei ia u myntri rangbah, katkum ka rukom bad ki pynlong jingialang ka party da kaba pynlut ia ka pisa ka sorkar kaba shim na u paidbah”,.U la ong ba katkum ka rukom, ki dei ban pyntip sha u Myntri Rangbah haba ki wan sha ka jylla bad ban pynbeit ia ka prokram, hynrei ka jingleh jongki, ka long ba ki la iaid lait ia ka rukom ka jingsynshar paidbah jong ka federalism ne ka jingiadei ka jylla bad ka sorkar pdeng.Kane ka jingkynthah jong u Dr Mukul, ka long hadien ba u myntri ka sorkar pdeng u Alphons, u la ther ia ka sorkar Congress ha kane ka jylla ba ka dei kaba bamsap bad ka bym leh eiei ia ki paidbah ha ka roi ka par.“Ki wan hangne ban shu pynjah burom ia ka sorkar jylla da kaba ther ia ki kam ba lai phew jait bad kane ka pyni ia ka jinglong jongki ba kim long kiba la ih ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat”, la ong u Dr Mukul.Ha kajuh ka por, u la kob ba ka BJP kan nym jop wat iwei ruh u MLA ha kane ka elekshon ha kane ka jylla bad kan iaid thylli beit bad u la kop iathong lada jop ka BJP.“Ngan iathong lada jop ka BJP ha kane ka elekshon, lada phi nud”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ruh ba ka jingpynduh pisa ka BJP kam myntoi eiei ia ka ri lait na kaba pynriew spah ia ki heh saipan ba don jingiadei bad ka.“Phi la lap ba ki la ioh biang ia ka pisa tuh?”, la buh jingkylli Dr Mukul bad bynrap, “ka jingpynduh pisa ka la wan tang ka jingkular bad ka jingpyndik ia ki paidbah ka ri haduh ba don kiba la khlad ruh’.
title: “To ngin ia thong” lada jop ka BJP,  wat tang iwei ha ka 2018: Mukul

content: Tura, 1 Naiwieng:Ka Association of Democracy and Empowerment (ADE), mynta ka sngi, ka la mih ban pyrshah halor ka jing pyndonkam ia u Aadhaar.“Ngi pyrshah jur ia u aadhar, na ka bynta u paidlang uba hap ha ki bynta jong ki jaka 6th Schedule jong ka Meghalaya bad ngi kyrshan ruh ia ka MPCA bad ngin ia trei lang ban khanglad ia kane ka jingleh pyrshah bad ka jingleh bym salia ia ki paidbah” ong ka kyrwoh na U Dalseng B Ch Momin, President jong katei ka seng.Katei ka seng, ka ong ba ki tnat sorkar, ki pyrshang mynta ban pyni, ia ka jingdonkam jong u aadhar, ha kaba ki kwah ban pyniasoh bad ka pan card, ki bank account, ki mobile bad kiwei kiwei. “Kat kane ka jinghiar ka pule puthi ha ka Jylla, kumta katei ka jingleh, kan pynbor ia ki, ba kin ia kynduh ia ki jingeh ha ka jingim jongki” ong ka kyrwoh.Ka kyrwoh, ka ong biang “Balei, ba ka da donkam ban tih bniah bad buddien, ia man kawei pa kawei ka jinglum pisa bad ioh kamai jong kiba pli ki nongshong shnong? Kane ka sorkar, imat kam shaniah shuh, ia la ki jong ki nongshong shnong?” Ka seng, ka lyngngoh ruh ba kumno ia ki khyllung ruh, la phah shon dur aadhar, haba kim pat tip ia ki kam lehnoh, ki kam bamsap bad kino kino ki kam sniew.
title: Ka sorkar India, kam shaniah  ia ki nongshong shnong: ADE

content: Nongstoiñ, 1 Naiwieng:Mynta ka sngi ki pulit ka Mairang Police Station, ki la ioh ban kem noh ia u briew u bala tip kyrteng kum u Probingshon L Nonglait 23 snem na ka shnong Kynshi Bangla kaba hap hapoh ka West Khasi Hills hadien ba u la batbor ia kawei ka hep rit kaba dang 11 snem ka arta.Katkum ka tyllong khubor la ong ba u tei u briew u dei ruh u knii jong katei ka hep rit bad u la leh ia katei ka kam bymman ia la ka jong ka khun pyrsa naduh ka 7/9/2017 haka por kumba 1 baje janmiet ha kaba u la byrngem byrsit ia katei ka khun pyrsa lada ka iathuh ia katei ka kam pohjait jong u.Hadien ba ki pulit kila ioh ban kem noh ia u Probingshon kila pynngat noh ia u hapoh ka ain POCSO.
title: Batbor u kni ia ka pyrsa ha Kynshi Bangla

content: Shillong, 1 Naiwieng:Ki khubor ki la saphriang ha ki Social Media ha ka Whatapp bad Facebook ba ha kine ki sngi ki bun bha ki Muslim kiba wan shim dawai bad ba wan thiah pang ha NEIGRHIMS. Don kiba la kynthoh ba ki suba ba ka jingbun kyrthep ki Muslim ba wan sha NEIGRHIMS ioh ki lah pynban ban dei kito ki phet wir Ronghiya. Don kiba la ia kynduh ia kiba kum kitei ki nongpang, ki la ong ba kim nang ban kren Hindi ruh bad bun kiba kren da ka ktien Bangla.U Rupang u la wad jingtip shaphang katei ka jingjia bad la iathuh ba ka jingbun ki Muslim ba wan shim dawai ka jur bha ha kine ki ar ne lai taiew mynta. Namar ka jingsaphriang khubor ha ki social Media la ong ba ka la pynlong ia ki tnad syntiat ruh ban wad jingtip shaphang kitei ki briew na ki bor pyniaid jong ka NEIGRHIMS.La iathuh ba hapoh 2 taiew ki don kumba 10 hajar ngut eiei ki nongpang kiba wan shah sumar ha NEIGRHIMS bad kitei ki kynthup ia kiba thiah pang bad kiba wan shim dawai bad napdeng kitei la ong ba jan kot hajar ngut dei ki Muslim.La iathuh ba katkum ka jingpeit ia ki jaka shong jaka sah bad ki kot ki sla kim shym don kiba wan rung be-aiñ, hynrei ki dei ki nong India kiba kham bun dei na ka jylla Assam bad ki thaiñ Silchar.La iathuh ruh ba napdeng kitei ki hajar ngut ki Muslim ki don kiba thiah pang, ki nongap pang, kiba wan shim dawai, kiba wan synran ia ki nongshim dawai. La ong ruh ba ki bun ki dei ki nongwan jngohkai ia katei ka jaka sumar.Hynrei la iathuh ba kitei ki nongwan jngohkai ruh kim dei satia kiba wan rung be-aiñ naba ka tnad syntiat ka la pynshisha ruh ia ki da kaba shim jingtip na ki Hotel bad ki ing basa ba ki sah.
title: Kyndit ki paidbah ba bun ki Muslim,  ba wad dawai na NEIGRHIMS

content: Nongstoiñ, 1 Naiwieng:Uwei u samla u ba la tip kyrteng kum u Hundarsing Wahlang 20 snem, na ka shnong Mawlangsu West Khasi Hills District, u la khlad noh ha shen, hadien ba u la shah bat ha ka bor ding ilektrik.Katkum ka tyllong khubor bala ioh lum la ong ba katei ka jingjia kala jia hynne ka step ha ka por kumba 10:00 baje mynstep bad la ong ruh ba katei ka jingjia, ka la jia ha kapor ba u tei u samla u dang shna pynbha ia ki sainar, jong ka ding ilektrik kiba don ha Mawlangsu.Shuh shuh hadien katei ka jingjia na ka liang jong u sordar ka shnong Mawlangsu u bah Baristar Marngar u la pyntip sha ki pulit bad na ka liang jong ki pulit ruh mar ia ioh jingtip halor katei ka jingjia, ki la her bran bran sha katei ka jaka ba jia ban pynlng ia ka jingtohkit.Hadien ba ki pulit ki la dep ban leh ia kiba donkam na ka liang ki ba ha iing ha sem jong u tei u samla ki la kyrpad ban pyllait na ka Post Mortem bad hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingbit na u Magistrate ki pulit kila aiti noh ia ka met jong u tei u samla sha ki ba ha iing ha sem na ka bynta ban pyndep ia kaba sah.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka jingjia na ka liang jong ki pulit ka Nongstoiñ Police Station kila dep ruh ban register ia ka case katkum ka case number 27/2017 U/S 174 CRPC bad ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor katei ka jingjia ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: Iap shah bat ilektrik ha Mawlangsu

content: Shillong, 01 Naiwieng:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma, um shym la kwah ban pynlong kompolsori ia u Aadhaar ha ka jylla bad ha kane ka dong mihngi ka India, namar ba ka dei kawei ka jaka kaba dang hap ban ia bishar bniah ia kiba dei trai shnong bad kiba shu wan buhai shnong.Haba twad jingmut mynta ka sngi shaphang u Aadhaar, u Dr Mukul u la ong, “Em, ngam pat leh Aadhaar” bad bynrap, “”Dei ban sangeh shwa ia u Aadhaar ia mynta shipor”,.“Ngim kwah ban pynlong kompolsori ia u Aadhaar bad nga bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u Sarbananda Sonowal ngi la dep pynher shithi sha ka sorkar pdeng ba kam dei ban pynlong kompolsori ia u Aadhaar ha ki jylla ka dong mihngi”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba wat tang ia ka National Population Registration ruh ym pat lah ban tip ia ki briew ba dei trai shnong bad kiba shu wan buhai shnong, kumno ka lah ban long ia u Aadhaar.“Kane ka thain mihngi ka dei kaba jyllei kiba wan buhai shnong bad ka jingwan rung ki briew nabar, bad na kata, ka donkam ban nym pynlong kompolsori ia u Aadhaar”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah.U la ther ia ka sorkar pdeng, ha kaba u la ong ba ka jingleh ka sorkar pdeng ka pyni ba ka khlem da bishar bniah shwa ia kane haduh ba ka la wanrah ka jingkular ia ki paidbah.U la ong ba kawei ka tnad sorkar ka la pynmih da kawei ka jingthoh ban pyniadei bad u Aadhaar ia ki paidbah bad kumjuh ruh ki kompeni mobile bad kane ka pyni ba kam don ka jinglong ryntih.
title: Nga ruh ngam  pat leh Aadhaar, ong U Mukul

content: Shillong, 2 Naiwieng:Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ka la pdiang sngewbha ia ka jingkob ia thong jong u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma ha ka elekshon MLA 2018. U Dr.Mukul u la kob ban ia thong bad u la ong ba ka BJP kan nym jop satia tang shi konstitwensi ruh ha ka elekshon MLA 2018. “Ngi pdiang sngewbha ia katei ka jingkob ia thong u Dr.Mukul ba ngin ym jop tang kawei ruh” ong u Vice President katei ka seng u bah JA Lyngdoh.U bah Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka Congress ha Meghalaya ka long kum kato ka lieng kaba ngam ha thwei, “Ki MLA jong ka kim treh pan tiket, don ruh ki bym nud ban ia khun shuh ka dei ka dak ba kin ym poi shano shano ha u 2018” u la ong. U la takraiñ kylla ia ka jingkynthoh u Dr.Mukul halor ka jingwan u Alphons Kannanthanam ha kane ka jylla ba u khlem pyntip sha ka sorkar jylla bad ba u shu pynlut kai ia ka pisa paidbah. “Ka jingwan u Alphons shane kam dei satia ka kam jong ka sorkar bad ban shu pyntip ia baroh ki kam, la shu kren duh ktien u Dr.Mukul” ong u bah JA Lyngdoh.
title: Pdiang ka BJP ban ia thong bad U Mukul

content: Shillong, 2naiwieng:Ka kmie jong uwei u rangbah na ka shnong Umroi Umdoh Byrthih ka kong Mary Nongsiej ka la kynnoh ba ka kong Christable Wanñiang ka la bom la tied ia u khun jong ka haduh ba u la mynsaw jur, ” Ka kong Christable ka la bom la tied ia u da u Siej, ki shyllang mat ki la pait, ka khlieh ka la at bad ki met ki phad ki jngem lut” ong ka kong Mary haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor. Ka kong Mary ka la ong ba katei ka jingjia ka la jai ha ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka shnong Umeit-ka shnong ba u khun jong ka uba la tip kyrteng kum u Moon Moon Nongsiej u la poi shongkha.“Ka kong Christable ka wan sha ïng jong ngi ka wan ia thuh ba ka la shoh bad ai pulit ia u khun jong nga, ka wan ia thuh khyllew ka ong ba ka dei ka sengbhalang bad President jong ka CSWO bad ka ong ba ka bom ka shoh beit ,ka daiñ kuna beit ia kiba leh kulmar, hato tang ba dei ka sengbhalang ne tangba dei kata ka CSWO long ban shim ia ka aiñ ha kti lajong, shu bom shu shoh kulmar kumto long shaei” ong biang ka kong Mary Nongsiej. Ka la iathuh ba katei ka jingjia ka la mih na ka daw ba u khun jong ka u Moon Moon u ia kulmar shi lok bad ka lok jong u ka phet noh sha ïng kur bad ka ieh ia ki khun bad u. “U la iathuh ba ka kong Christable ka wan ban knieh ia ki khun na u, u ong shano ngan lei tai kulmar ia ki khun ha ka briew ka bym ithuh satia ba kan shu wan shim, hangta u ong ba ka bom ka tied ia u ryngkat bad ka meiduh jong ka lok jong u” ka la ong.U hynmen jong u Moon Moon pat u Sonny Nongsiej u la ong ba hadien ba ka kong Christable ka la bom la shoh ka la leit rah sha u pulit bad ka ai FIR. “Ka la wan byrngem sha ïng ba ngim dei ban leit bah jamin, ngi leit peit ia u ha phatok ngi lap ba u la mynsaw jur, hadien ba iohi ba u la mynsaw jur ngi la ai FIR kylla ia ka kong Christable ha Khapmara Out Post hynrei ki pulit kim shym leh eiei, ngi leit ia kynduh ia u OC balei ba kim leh eiei , u ong pynban ba katkum ka ripod ba eksamin ki doktor u Moon u khlem mynsaw eiei hynrei u Moon u ia thuh ha ngi ba por ba leit eksamin ym don doktor la shu tang da ka dawai tah” ong u Sonny.Ka kong Mary pat ka la ong ba wat hadien ba la bom la tied bad la shoh ia u khun jong ka ruh ym don ba pyntip satia sha ki bahaing haduh ba un da poi phatok ruh bad dei hadien ba la wan ia thuh hi ka kong Christable ba ka la dep shoh bad ai pulit, “Ngi wad jingtip na u Rangbah Shnong ruh u ong bym don jingtip eiei bad u la ong ba lada dei ba pyntip sha u ruh u ong ba ia ka kam ia nia lok ym donkam than ban rah pulit, shu pynbeit hangto hi. U kpa jong u Moon u la pyrshang ban kren ia suk ban ia the kyndon noh tang ha thanad pulit lada ki dang ia shong ne ym ia shong shuh ruh hynrei um dei pat ban pynmih jingkulmar, ka kong Christable ka la byrngem pynban ia u” ong ka kong Mary.
title: ‘Pait ka shyllang, at ka khlieh,  jngem ki met u rangbah’

content: Shillong, 06 Naiwieng:U Working President ka UDP u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka sorkar thymmai kaban wan hadien ka elekshon ha kane ka jylla kan sa pyndep ia ka kam jyrsieh bamsap sialieh ban poi sha kaba kut ba kiba donkti ha kam, ki dei ban ngat sha u shabuk ka ain.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Paul u la ong ba ka UDP ka pdiang sngewbha ia ka rai jong ka Meghalaya High Court ha kaba iadei bad ka jyrsieh thungkam sialieh.“Ka jingpynmih rai ka High Court, ka long kaba pdiang shi katdei eh ban pynkhuid ia ki kam bymman ha ka tnad pule puthi ka jylla”, la ong u Bah Paul.U la ong ba ka tnad pule puthi ka la ring sdot bha ha ka jylla namar ba ka jur palat ka jingthung kam shiliang da kaba kyntait ia kiba biang bad ioh ki bym biang kumba ka paw ka jingtohkit ka CBI.“Ha ka jingshisha, ka Shillong bad ka jylla Meghalaya kaba ioh nam kum ka jaka pule kaba pawnam ha ka ri, kam dei ba duna ki nonghikai kiba tbit hynrei ka dei namar ka jingjur palat ka jingthungkam shiliang”, la ong u Bah Paul.U Bah Paul u la ong ba ka jyrsieh bamsap ka la pynjot ia ka tnad pule puthi ha ka jylla bad ka dei ka jingpyntieng ia ki runar nangne shakhmat. U la ong ruh ba katkum ka jingiathuh ka myntri ha ka iing dorbar dang shen, ki don palat shi lak ngut kiba pep skul shiteng por ha ka jylla bad kane ka la paw ba kumno ka jinglong ka pule puthi ha ka jylla ka la ktah jur ia ki khun samla ia ka lawei jongki.‘Ban pyndam sia lieh ka dei ka pop bah ba la leh sha ki spah bad hajar ngut ki samla bad ngi iaroh ia ka rai jong ka High Court halor kane”, la ong u Bah Paul.U la ong ba katkum ka jingtohkit ka CBI, la lap ba ka myntri ka dei nongshah kynnoh kaba hakhmat eh bad ka sorkar kaba thymmai ban sa ialam da ka UDP kan sa pynthikna ba kane ka kam kan poi sha kaba kut na ka bynta ka lawei ki samla bad ki khun ki kti.“Ka kam jong ka sorkar thymmai ka long ban pynthikna ban nym ailad shuh ia ki kam bymman ym tang ha ka tnad pule puthi hynrei ha baroh ki tnad sorkar. Ngin sa thaw thymmai ia ka jingtreikam ka MPSC ban long kaba khuid bad kaba shai”, la ong u Bah Paul.
title: Ka sorkar thymmai kan pyndep  ia ka jyrsieh sia lieh, ong u bah Paul

content: Shillong, 6 Naiwieng:Tang mar ia sdang nyngkong ia ka jingialap elekshon kum u kyrtong ka seng Congress u bah Himalaya Muktan Shangpliang u la jaw ummat jrup hakhmat ki spah ngut ki paidbah ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Pongkung-Saw Symper Area.Katei ka jingialang ka dei kaba nyngkong eh ha ka jingiaid lynti jong u bah Shangpliang ban ialap elekshon kum u kyrtong u ban ia aireng ha ka elekshon MLA 2018.Katei ka jingjaw ummat u bah Shangpliang ka dei hadien ba u bah Bhalang Kharbani Secretary ka Mawsynram Block Congress Committee, u la pynkynmaw ia ki jingjia, ba kawei ka khynnah kynthei kaba la ioh pang Cancer na ka shnong Pongkung ka la mad jingeh bad hapdeng katei ka jingiakynduh kaba ka hap ban shah puid la donkam ba ki kmie ki kpa jong ka kin siew T.1.50 lak tyngka ban ioh puid bad hapdeng ka kutlad ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia u MLA u bah Pynshngaiñ ban pan jingiarap bad u la kular ban iarap hynrei ha kaba khadduh u iarap tang T.2000 ( Ar hajar tyngka) ia ki, hynrei ha ka kutlad ki la leit mih sha u bah Shangpliang bad la ioh ban puid ia katei ka khynnah.Katei ka khynnah kaba la shait la khlaiñ bha mynta ka la wan ban ai khublei ia u bah Shangpliang ha katei ka jingialang bad u la jaw ummat rangbah hakhmat kiba bun bah ki paidbah, “Ngam pat ju ithuh ia kane ka khynnah hynrei nga la shu iarap bad nga sngewkmen ba nga iohi ba ka la shait la khlaiñ bha mynta ba ka wan ai khublei ia nga” u la ong. U bah Shangpliang ula iathuh khana ruh ia ka jingiakynduh jingeh jong uwei u khynnah 14 snem na ka shnong Balat-Dangar uba la khluit ding uba trei iarap kum u Mechanic ha kawei ka karkhana kaba haduh ba u hap ban pynlut da ki phew hajar tyngka haduh ba un da koit bha mynta.“Nga don ka jingphohsniew, ka thong ban iarap ia ki paidbah, ngam pat long eiei, hynrei nga la iarap ban pynioh surok na Pongkung sha Wahlyngkut , nga la iarap ban wanrah ia ka PHC Pongkung ka ban treikam noh mynta, nga la iarap ban wanrah ia ki Bank ha Pongkung, katne nga la leh katno lei da nga la don ha ka bor, nga la ju angnud naduh ba nga dang samla ba ngan ia leh elekshon ban shakri ia ki paidbah, dei haduh mynta ba ka la urlong” u la ong.U la ong ba kat shaba phai ha Mawsynram konstitwensi ki paidbah ki shu ud shu nam namar ka jingsahdien bad ka jingshah iehbeiñ, “Nga ong ia phi lada phi kwah jingkylla lada phi kwah ia ka roi ka kiew yn ka roi ka par ban roi mano ban par mano, jied ia u bah Shangpliang, ngan wanrah ia ka jingkylla kaba phi ruh phin ym phohsniew,ka koit ka khiah, ka surok ,ka pule puthi dei ki mat ba hakhmat eh jong nga” u la ong. U bah Shangpliang u la iathuh khana ruh ha katei ka jingialang ba da ki spah ngut ki riew shimet ki la wan sha u ban wad jingiarap ha la ki jingdonkam jong ki bad kitei ki sngewkmen ba mar ia wan sha u, tang shisien ia kren ki ioh ia kaba ki thmu. U la iathuh ba wat ka shnong Pongkung ka ju ud ju nam ba kam don ka Hall kaba paka ban pynlong jingialang bad u la pan ia ka Estimated Plan bad tang kumta hi ki la wanrah bad u la pynioh lyngba ka MP Rajya Sabha kong Wansuk Syiem kaba kot sha ka T.40 lak tyngka.Ha katei ka jingialang la don ki nongialam jong ka Mawsynram Block Congress Committee , u bah Sully Lyngdoh u kyrtong MLA 2013, kyrtong MDC 2014 uba wan ba-ar uba long ruh u rangbah shnong jong ka Pongkung, la don lang u bah Pynthymmaibor Chyne Secretary East Khasi Hills District Congress Committee, ka kong Jop Scott Shylla President Mahila, bah Khelor Kharnaior President MBCC bad kiwei pat.
title: Mar ia sdang ialap elekshon, jaw  ummat u bah H.M Shangpliang

content: Shillong, 6 Naiwieng:Ka seng ki samla pule ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) jong ka Langkynma Area ka pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur ha ka jing shongbishar, kaba la long ha shnong Nongjri, South West Khasi halor ka jingai jingmynjur, u Rangbah Shnong Nonghlam na ka bynta ban pynrung kyrteng ha ka EPIC. Haba ia kren bad u President jong ka KSU Langkynma Area u Samla Ioanis Hahshah u la ong u Rangbah Shnong ka shnong Nonghlam u Bah Justice Hahshah u la ai jingbit, ia palat shi spah ngut ki briew kiba dei ki bar jylla bad kumjuh ruh ki bar ri na ka bynta ban pynrung kyrteng ha ka EPIC.Kine ki briew kiba u Rangbah Shnong u ai jingmynjur, ki dei kiba don ha ka rta kaba 30, 40, 50 snem tam bad kane kala buh ia ki nongialam jong ka KSU ha ka jingar tatien ba lada kidei ki nong shnong shnong ba pura ka jylla shaei ki jah naduh ba ki dap 18 snem shaneng bad dei halor kane na ka liang jong ka KSU ka pyrshah jur. Shuh shuh na ka liang jong u Samla Ioanis u la iathuh ba kine ki briew kiba ioh ia ka NoC na u Rangbah Shnong kidei na ka Jaitbynriew Garo kiba dei na shilliang jong ka ri bad ia kane ngi kum ka seng ngi da pynrem jur ia u Rangbah Shnong uba la leh ia kane khlem ka jingtip jong ka shnong bad kumjuh ruh ki paidbah jong ka shnong.
title: Mynjur u Rangbah Shnong ban shon EPIC ki bar jylla

content: Shillong, 6 Naiwieng:U Hayithung Bill Lotha uwei na ki nongialam ka BJP na ka jylla Nagaland, u la ong ba u la wan khnang naduh ka jylla Mizoram, ban kren shai sha ki nongthohkhubor halor ka jingiakob tainia jong u bad u myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya u Dr.Mukul Sangma. Haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor mynta ka sngi u Lotha u la ong “Nga don ha Mizoram ban ialap elekshon, hynrei nga la wan beh khnang sha kane ka jylla Meghalaya ban kren halor ka jingiakob tai nia jong nga ia u myntri rangbah kane ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma” u la ong.“Ha kine ki sngi nga la ong ba u Dr.Mukul u dei u myntri rangbah ba bamsap tam ha ka ri India bad nga la kob ban ia tainia bad u, hynrei hapdeng kitei ki jingkob jong nga um nud bad u la phah ktien da u nongialam ka Congress u Rajaul Karim Laskar, utei ruh u la kren pynklet noh sha kawei ka bynta haba u kob ban ia tai nia, na ka jingbamsap u la kren pynklet pynban sha ka jingiakren ia ki rit paid jong kane ka Ri, hynrei watla katta ruh nga pdiang sngewbha ia katei ka jingkob jong u” ong u Lotha.U Lotha u la ong ba hadien ka jingkob jong u, ia ka jingiatai hakhmat ki paidbah, u Mukul u la phah da u Laskar, hynrei u la ong ba lada u Dr.Mukul u niewkor shisha ia ka jylla Meghalaya u dei ban pdiang ia katei ka jingiatai nia hakhmat ki paidbah, “Ki nongthohkhubor, ki nongialam niam, ki sengbhalang ki dei ka rynsan kaba paka ban pynbeit ia katei ka jingiakob tai nia jong ngi” ong u Lotha.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ki Congress ki kwah ban iatai 10 kynta halor katei ka mat ba ki la pynkylla na ka jingbamsap sha ka jingiakren jaitbynriew rit paid, “Nga lei nga ong balei tang 10 kynta, 2 sngi syndon ngin iatai hynrei pynthikna ruh ba ka jingiatai na ka bynta ka bamsap bad u myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya kan long tang kumba 5 kynta eiei, hynrei u kyntait, u Dr.Mukul u lehraiñ ban mih sha katei ka jingiatai, kum ki nongmihkhmat paidbah ngim dei ban lehraiñ ngi dei ban long kum u Sing uba kyrhuh ban ia khun na bynta ka bamsap kum ki nongialam” u la ong.“Nga iohsngew ba u Dr.Mukul mynta um ioh thiah ioh dem shuh la bun bun sngi, hynrei nga ong ia u shuwa ba phin thiah syndon noh jar, lane ba phin ym lait ang shuh artad phi dei ban wan sha ka jingiatai nia ba u paidbah un shai, ngi pdiang kyndon pa kyndon katba phi ong ban ia kren ia ki mat, ngi long kiba la khreh” ong u Lotha. Halor ka jingkren u Laskar ba u kwah ban iatai ia ka mat ki rit paid u Lotha u la ong ba ia ki rit paid dei ka seng BJP kaba la shimkhia da kaba thaw ia ka tnad Minitry of Tribal Affairs ha ka 13 tarik u risaw, 1999 ha ka por ba u Atal Bihari Vajpayee u long u myntri rangbah duh bad ia ka tnad DONER ha u Nailur, 2001.
title: Ba kwah ia tainia palat  than bad U Mukul

content: Shillong, 7 Naiwieng:U President jong ka Seng Samla Mawkneng kaba hap ha ki thaiñ Sohiong u bah Curtis Rani u la ujor sha u SP Crime Branch ka East Khasi Hills pyrshah ia ka tnad sam bording ka MeECL kaba dei peit ha katei ka thaiñ namar ka jingthur mur bad ka jingtorti palat ha ka riukom kheiñ ia ka bai thang ding. Haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor u bah Curtis u la ong ba um sngew donkam shuh ban leit sha ka Consumer Forum naba katei ka jingleh ka MeECL kam dei shuh ka jingbakla, hynrei ka dei ka jingthaw thok leh thok bad ka dei ka kam thok kam shukor ia ki paidbah, “Nga leit khnang sha ki pulit ba katei ka la dei ka kam pyntriem kaba shyrkhei kaba lute na ki paidbah ba kan MeECL kan pei shkor syndon, lada ki pulit ki shimkhia ia ki kes kam thok kiba ha ki Facebook bad kiwei nga ngeit kin kham shimkhia ia kane ka jingujor jong nga” ong u bah Curtis haba iathuh ba u la dep ujor ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai bad ki pulit ki la kular ha u ban shimkhia.Katkum ka jingiathuh u bah Curtis Rani u la ong ba ka MeECL ka shu mut dur ia ka bai thangding jong ki paidbah naba shong bad kam shym la leit ban peit ia ki mitar ne ki jingthew bad ka pynpoi ia ka bai thangding katba ka sngew mon, “Ngi la leit jurip ia ki mitar thangding ki paidbah ngi lap ba ki mitar kiba sniew ki bym treikam shuh ruh ka MeECL ka pyni ba ki dangbha bad kiba bha ka pyni ba ki la sniew ha ka jingkheiñ jong ki, katei ka jingkheiñ ka iaid manla u bnai ha uwei u bnai u mitar u bha ha uwei pat u bnai u mitar u sniew hynrei ki mitar ki long kumjuh uba bha u bha uba sniew u sniew, kumno kan lah long ba manla u bnai ki mitar ki sniew bad man u bnai ki bha, ki paidbah ba la dep siew ia ka bait hang ding ruh ki ioh ia ka Bill ba kim pat siew, kaei kane lada kam dei ka kam thok kam shukor, kam dei shuh ka jingbakla ban long man u bnai man u snem hynrei ka dei beit ka kam leh thok, kumta donkam ban ujor beit sha ki pulit ba kiba donkti kin shah kem” u la ong.U la ong ba ki la lap ruh ba ka rukom kheiñ baiding ka ia pher na ka bai ding kaba poi ha u mitar bad kane ka dei naba ym ju don ba leit peit mitar hynrei la shu mut dur tang naba shong. U la iathuh ba ia kane ka bynta ki nongmihkhmat ka Sohiong ba kynthup ia u MLA bad HDR Lyngdoh bad u MDC bah Samlin Malngiang ki la leit ban ujor bad pyntip sha u chief Engineer ka MeECL hynrei haduh mynta ruh kam don jingkylla satia.Katei ka jingjia u la ong ba ka la ktah ha ki spah tylli ki shnong ha Sohiong. U la iathuh ba ka daw ba u la mih shakhmat da katei ka bynta ka dei namarba ym tang ki wei ne ar ngut kiba mad jingeh hynrei ki paidbah salonsar ia ia kynduh ia kane ka jingeh. Haba phai lei sha bording u la ong ba mynta ka shi taiew tam ka shnong Mawkneng kam ioh bording bad la ong ba u duh u Transformer.
title: Sha U SP, ujor u samla  na Sohiong ia ka MeECL

content: Shillong, 7 Naiwieng:U bah Sounder Strong Cajee mynta ka sngi u la risaiñ noh na ka jinglong dkhot na ka seng BJP bad ia ka shithi risaiñ u la phah sha u President ka BJP kane ka jylla. U la kdew ha katei ka shithi ba ka jingrisaiñ jong u ki dei na ki daw bym lah kiar bad naduh mynta ka sngi ka 7 tarik u naiwieng un ym dei shuh u dkhot ka BJP. Lah ban pynkynmaw ba u bah Sounder u la rung sha ka BJP ha u jymmang mynta u snem kata 6 bnai mynshuwa ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Assam Club, Laban.
title: Tang hadien 6 bnai mih  u bah Sound na BJP

content: Shillong, 7 Naiwieng:Ki trai par dewiong ha Meghalaya, ki kyntait war, ba ki mut ban aiti ia ki par jongki, sha ka sorkar Jylla, ba kan ioh tih dewiong.Ha ka jingpynmih khubor, ka State Co-ordination Committee of Coal Owners, Miners & Dealers Forum (SCCCOMDF) ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngew pyrshah jongka, halor ka khubor ba ka sorkar jylla, ka kam ba kiba bun ki trai par dewiong, ki la mynjur ban aiti ia ki par dewiong jongki, ha ka Meghalaya Mineral Development Corporation (MMDC), ba kan tih dewiong na kitei ki par jongki.Ka seng, ka ong, ba katei ka khubor, ka la ialam bakla ia bun bah ki trai mar poh khyndew, namar ba kiba bun ki trai par dewiong, kim shym la mynjur satia ban ailad ia ka MMDC, ba kan tur sha ki jaka puta jongki bad na ka liang jong katei ka seng ruh, ka la ujor sha katei ka Tribunal, ba kam mynjur satia ia katei ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar Jylla.Ka jingshong bishar jong ka NGT, kan long ha ka 8tarik Naiwieng 2017 ha Delhi bad ki riewsaid jong ka seng, ki la pynkhreh ban pyrshah, halor katei ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar JyllaHa kawei pat ka liang, na ka liang jong ka SCCCOMDF, ka la dawa ruh ha ka Supreme Court, ha U Naitung 2017, na ka bynta ba kan ailad ban die noh ia u dewiong, uba dang sahteng ha ki par bad ka jingshong bishar, na ka bynta katei kan long ha ka 10tarik Naiwieng 2017, ong shuh ka khubor.
title: Kyntait ki trai par dewiong, ban aiti  sha ka sorkar Jylla, ia ki par dewiong

content: Shillong, 7 Naiwieng:Ka KHNAM State Youth Wing’s hapoh ka jingialam u President jong ka u bah Thomas Passah mynta ka sngi ka la leit ban ia kynduh ia ka Director jong ka tnad ba peit ia ka kam jngohkai pyrthei (Tourism Dept) ka kong R.C Sohkhlet. Ha katei ka jingiakynduh ka KHNAM ka la ia kren bad aida ka jingthoh ba ka tnad jngohkai pyrthei kan ym ailad satia ia ki kali Assam ba kin wan kamai sahuh ha kane ka jylla sha ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei bapher bapher. “Ngi la ai jingmut ba ka sorkar kan leh kumba leh ka jylla Sikkim ba ki kali ba wan nabar kin ym bit ban leit ialam ia ki nongjngohkai pyrthei sha ki jaka bapher jong katei ka jylla hynrei ka dei ban don ka jaka ban bat ia ki kali ba nabar bad na kata ka jaka pat dei ban ailad ia ki kali kamai jong ki trai muluk kiba don ia ka Registeration jong ka Meghalaya ba kin kit ia kitei ki nongjngohkai kylleng ki jaka ba kin im kamai” ong u bah Thomas Passah.U la ong ba kumba ka long mynta ka jingtuid ki nongjngohkai sha kane jylla ka la buh bha hynrei ki kali ki trai muluk kim ioh kamai satia bad kat shaba phai la dap tang da ki kali Assam suda. U la ong ba ka jingkiew ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ha kane ka jylla kam shym la wanrah jingmyntoi eiei ruh em ia ki nongshong shnong kane ka jylla namarba wat ka ja ban bam ruh ki briew ba nabar ki song lypa na Assam, “Kane ka dei kaba shisha namarba wat ka ja ban bam ruh ki song lypa, kim wan bret pisa eiei ruh em haba ki wan namarba la pynsngewthuh bakla ia ki da kito ki nongniah kali na Assam ba kam long ban bam kulmar shane, kaei kaba ngi iohi mynta ka long ba ki nongjngohkai kim wan bret pisa hynrei ki wan bret tang ki plastik ba ki song bam nabar sha kane ka jylla” ong u bah Thomas.Utei u nongialam samla ka KHNAM u la ong ba kane baroh ka dei na ka daw ka jingbym lerkam ka sorkar ba kam lah ban wanrah ia ki polisi kiba biang ha ka kam jngohkai pyrthei, “Ngim iohi eie iia ki polisi ba ka sorkar kan wanrah lait noh tang ki polisi tamasa, ha ka tamasa ki pynlut da ki klur tyngka ban ia bam ia dih sngewbha mano pat ba myntoi na katei ka jingiabam ia dih sngewbha, ki trai muluk jong ngi ki nongniah kali kim ioh jingmyntoi eiei ruh em hynrei ki shu peit jawdud ia ka jingioh kamai ki kali Assam” u la ong. Ia katei ka jingdawa ka KHNAM ka la ong ba kan leit pynsngew ruh sha u myntri ka tnad ba peit ia ka kam jngohkai pyrthei u Dr.Mukul Sangma kumjuh ruh sha u DTO ban leh ia kaba donkam. U la ong ba ka Director ruh ka la kular ba kan pyntip ia katei ka jingdawa sha ka tnad kaba dei peit.Katei ka seng ka la ong ba kan khot ruh ia ka Association ki trai bad ki nongniah Taxi ban ia phylliew jingmut ia katei ka kam.Ka KHNAM ka la ong ruh ba lada u trai muluk u ioh ban leit kamai u tip kham bha ia ka surok ban iaid ha kane ka jylla ban ia ki briew kiba wan nabar kiba iaid kumba iaid ha ki ri thor bad lada dei ba niah hi u trai jylla kan ym jia kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih kum ka jingaksiden lane u ioh ruh ban batai ia ki shaphang ka jingmut jong ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei bad kumjuh ruh ka bam ka dih u ioh ban batai bha ia ki jaka ban bam. U bah Thomas u la ong ba lada ka sorkar ka leh da katei ka buit ka ioh ka kot lyngba ka kam jngohkai pyrthei kan kiew ha ka jylla.
title: Wat shah kamai ia ki kali Assam, sha  ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei: KHNAM

content: Shillong, 7 Naiwieng:Ha ka por 3baje dang step phyrngap mynta ka step ka KHNAM, ka la leit sha NEIGRHIMS ban hadien ba ioh jingtip ba ki khar Muslim ki ju wan man ka sngi da ki bos, ha katei ka jaka sumar. Ha katei ka jingleit jurip ka KHNAM ka la lap ba ki don haduh 6 bos ki khar Muslim kiba la wan da ka Night Super sha katei ka jaka sumar ryngkat ki khun ki kti bad baroh shiing shisem ki ialam lut. Napdeng kiba katei ka seng ka la ioh ban peit ka la lap ba ki don kumba 20 ngut eiei ki bym don don sla satia kum ka EPIC ne kiwei pat ki kot ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki nong India kumta ka KHNAM ka la pyntip pulit bad aiti ia kitei ki briew sha ki pulit.Katkum ka jingiakren bad u President ka KHNAM State Youth Wing u bah Thomas Passah u la ong ba kiba bun na kitei ki 6 bos ba ka KHNAM ka la lap kiba bun dei kiba na Silchar. “Ngi lyngngoh shisha kumno ki briew kiba naduh Silchar ki wan ban shah sumar khnang shaduh Shillong, ki briew ruh ki bym i kop nongpang eiei, kiba shait ba khlaiñ, ngi suba ba ka lah ban don kaei re kaei halor ka jingwan kynsan kine ki briew kaba la jyllei bha mynta” ong u bah Thomas.Utei u nongialam ka KHNAM u la ong ba shuwa ia kane ka KHNAM ka la leit ban jurip bad kitei ki khar Muslim ki kren heh pynban haba la kylli la ki don EPIC ne-em. Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka L&T Company kaba peit ia ka projek ban pynheh ia ka NEIGRHIMS ruh ka la wanrah bun ki nongtrei kiba nabar bad haba leit kylli na u Project Manager la ki don Labour License ne-em um tip eiei shaphang ka Labour License bad haba kylli shaphang ka Work Permit ruh um don jingtip eiei.
title: 3 baje mynstep, ap ka KHNAM ha  NEIGRHIMS, “6 bos ki khar Muslim”

content: Shillong, 07 Naiwieng:U Myntri tnad sor u Bah Ronnie u la ong ba ka jingiasoi soskular ban aiti sha ki riew shimet ban pyniaid ia ki kali saw (STPS) ka dei kaba bakla naduh ba sdang bad ka paw mynta ba kine ki bos ki la shong ei sha lum sha khlaw khlem lerkam shuh.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, u Bah Ronnie u la ong ba ka long kaba pang met ban iohi ba ki bos sorkar, kiba la buh ban shakri ia u paidbah, ki long ha kane ka dur.“Ka jingiasoi soskular ban ai pyniaid ia ki kali (JNNURM) ka dei kaba bakla naduh ba sdang”, la ong u Bah Ronnie, bad bynrap, ba ka sorkar kan sa bishar biang ia kane.Ula ong ba ka sorkar kan sa bishar biang ia ka soskular ba iasoi bad kine ki riew shimet ne kynhun bym dei sorkar namar ba bun ki kali naduh kiba rit bad kiba heh ruh ki la bun kiba la jot rathai haba ka jingiaid jongka kam da dap wat tang san snem ruh.“Ha ka por ba ngi ai pyniaid ha ka Meghalaya Transport Corporation (MTC) ka jingpyniaid ka biang bha hynrei hadien lai snem ba la pynduh iaka jingaiti ha ka MTC, ka jingpyniaid ka la sniew bha”, la ong u Bah Ronnie.Katkum ka jingong u myntri, ka sorkar kam don jingeh mynta ban bishar biang ia ka jingiasoi soskular bad ki kynhun bym dei sorkar bad wat ban aiti biang ban pyniaid ha ka MTC, kawei na ka tnad pyniaid kali ka sorkar kaba la biang nadong shadong naduh ka jingdon ki jaka shna, ka rukom pyniaid.U myntri u la ong ba watla u shimti kum u myntri sa tang shi por ban kut noh ka jinglong MLA shwa ban leit biang sha ka elekshon hynrei un pyrshang ban pynthikna ba ka jingshakri jong ki bos kan long na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki paidbah.U la ong ba kumno ki bos saw ki lah ban iaid kamai da ka number ka sorkar haba kim siew khajna eiei bad kane ka dei kaba bakla shibun namar ba wat ka MTC kaba dei ka tnad ka sorkar kaba pyniaid ia ki bos, ka don la ujong u number bad ka siew khajna sha ka sorkar.Ban lap ia ka jinglong jingman ba shisha jong kine ki bos, u myntri u la ong ba un sa leit ban pynlong ia ka jingleit jngoh ia ki ha kylleng ki jaka ba buh ia ki.“Ngan sa leit ia ki ha ki jaka ba buh ha kylleng ki jaka”, la ong u Bah Ronnie.Katkum ka jingtip bun kine ki bos kila shu shong sha khlaw kum sha Mawlai, Mawblei, sha Mawiong ba la buh ha jaka bym shngain satia bad don kiba dang shu iaid shipor ruh kim don taiar shuh, ki la jot lut ki tiar ki tar.
title: Ka jingiasoi soskular ia ki bos saw,  ka bakla, ong u Bah Ronnie

content: Shillong, 7 Naiwieng:Ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Bri U Hynniewtrep (SNSBH), ki la phah dorkhas mynta ka sngi sha U Mukul Sangma, myntri rangbah ka Jylla, ha kaba ki dawa, ba u dei ban weng noh ia ia hukum jong ka sorkar Jylla, kaba la pyntreikam, ha ka 13tarik Kyllalyngkot 1989 bad katei ka jingdawa jong ka Synjuk, ka long katba kum ka jingiakren bad ka sorkar Jylla, ha ki ar sien ki jingialang, ha ka 10tarik Rymphang 2016 bad ka 31tarik Nailar 2016, ha kaba la iakren halor kitei ki ar tylli ki phang bad ba la dawa ruh ban bujli, da kiwei pat ki ain kiba thymmai.Katei ka ain jong u snem 1989, ka ong ba ka ain jong ka Meghalaya Urban Development Authority (MUDA), ka treikam ha baroh kawei ka Jylla bad katei ka dei ka ain, ka bym shym la leit satia ha ka iing dorbar Jylla bad kumta ka sah, tang ka jingpynbna jong ka sorkar.Ka Synjuk, ka ong shuh shuh ba wat la ia ka ain jong ka MUDA, kaba la pyntreikam ha ka 5tarik Nailar 2015, ka sorkar kam shym la pyntreikam satia, hynrei, lyngba ka hukum jong ka High Court, la pyntreikam biang, lyngba ka jingpynbna jong ka sorkar, kaba ha ka 16tarik Kyllalyngkot 2016.Ban lait na kitei ki jingkynrum kynram, ka Synjuk, ka dawa ia ka sorkar Jylla, ba kan weng noh, ia katei ka ain kaba la pyntreikam ha u snem 1989, na ka bynta ban wan rah ia ka jingsuk mynsiem ia u paidlang jong ka Jylla hi baroh kawei.Ha kawei pat ka shithi, ka SNSBH, lyngba U bah RL Blah General Secretery, ka la thoh sha U Chief Executive Member, Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council, Shillong bad katei ka dei halor ka rai jong ka High Court jong ka Meghalaya, ha ka 16tarik Rymphang 2017, halor ka mukotduma, da U Bah Tirot Sing Syiemlieh, kaba dei halor ka ain jong ka MUDA bad ka jingtreikam jongka, shabar jong ki jaka Municipal.Ka High Court, ka ong shuh shuh, ba wat la katei ka ain kan trei kam shabar jong ki jaka Municipal, ha kaba iadei bad ka jingtei iing tei sem, hynrei, ha kajuh ka por, ka kwah ruh ba kan don jingpeit biang ia katei ka ain, kaba dei lyngba ki kyndon kiba la ju hap ha ka jingpeit jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council.Ka Synjuk, ka ong ba ka High Court, ka la dep pynmih ia katei ka rai, la palat hynriew bai, hynrei ka KHADC, ka iai sngap jar haduh mynta bad katei ka pyni ba ka KHADC, kam shym la shim khia satia ia katei ka ain, kaba long ka ain kaba la pynjari da ka bor, jong ka tnat pynroi sor, halor ki kam thaw iing thaw sem, ha ki jaka kiba hap shabar Municipal. Ka Synjuk, ka dawa ia ka Council, ba kan leh stet ia katei ka kam, hapoh ar phew sngi, naduh ka la iohpdiang ia katei ka shithi, na ka bynta ban pynneh ia ki riti treikam jong ka Sixth Schedule bad kumjuh ban iada ia ka hok jong ki trai shnong jong ka Jylla
title: Mudui hapoh 20 sngi sha High  Court, halor ka ain MUDA

content: Shillong, 7 Naiwieng:Hadien jong ka HNLC, mynta ka la dei sa ka pali jong ka HYC, ba kan tuklar halor ka tah sia lieh bad katei ka seng ka dawa ia ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, ha ryngkat ki 14ngut kiwei pat ki MLA, ki myntri sorkar, ki heh sorkar, ba ki dei ban hiar shuki.Ka kyrwoh na ka HYC Central Executive Committee, lyngba ka Education Cell, ka pynrem jur ia baroh kito kiba donkti ha ka kam jyrsieh tah sia lieh ia ka jingthungkam nonghikai ha ki LP Schools ha ka Jylla ha u snem 2010.Kat kum ka kaiphod jong ka CBI, la shem ba haduh 15 ngut ki heh ki hain ba kynthup ia ki Ministers ha kito ki por, Ki MLA, MDC, Ex MLA bad kumjuh ruh ki heh sorkar ki ia don bynta lang ha kane ka kam shukor kam thok da kaba ki ai ia ki kyrteng jong ki briew jong ki ban thung kam wat lada kane ka long be ain bad pyrshah ia ka riti synshar jong ka Ri.Ka seng ka pynrem jur ia ka myntri pule puthi, ha kato ka por kaba lah aibor bad kyntu ia ki ophisar ka Education Department ban tah sia lieh ia ki jingai marks, khnang ba yn lah ban thung be ain ia ki briew jong kitei ki heh ki hain ne ki nongmihkhmat paidbah ba kup snieh langbrot.Ka Seng kam lah khlem da pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia ba ka Sorkar ka lah pynlut lehse da ki phew lak bad klur tyngka na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ki eksamin bad interview ban thungkam nonghikai ha u Snem 2010 kaba dei hi ka pisa paidbah lyngba ka jinglum khajna ka jong ka na ngi ki Nongshongshnong jong ka Jylla. Lah hap ruh ban pynlut da ki phew lak na ka bynta ban thung ia ka HLSC ja ba lah shong bad wad bniah halor kane ka jyrsieh. La pynsyrwa ia ka pisa paidbah ha ka ban ialeh mukotduma, halor kane ka bynta ha High Court bad Supreme Court.Kumta ka Seng ka dawa ba baroh kito kiba donkti ha kane ka jyrsieh tah sia lieh kiba lah paw kyrteng ha ka kaiphod CBI, kiba kynthup ia ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, RC Laloo, PL Tariang, Ronnie V Lyngdoh, Remington Pyngrope, Charles Pyngrope, Sanbor Shullai, Prestone Tynsong, AL Hek, Don Kupar Massar, F War, M. Pariat, JA Lyngdoh, Lambor Malngiang bad JD Sangma, ba ki dei ban siew bai lutksan da kaba ki sei na la ki jong ki pla ban pynlut ia ki jinglut jingsep ha ki kam bapher bapher ban jied thymmai biang ia ki Nonghikai LP Schools hapoh ka jylla. Ka Sorkar kam dei ban ktah ia ka pisa paidbah ban pynlut biang sa shisien ia kane ka kam.Ka Seng ka dawa ruh ba ki Minister bad MLA kiba lah paw kyrteng ha ka jing tohkit jong ka CBI, ki dei ban hiar shuki noh mardor kum ka dak ka jingsngewkhia halor kane ka jingleh jong ki.
title: 15ngut ki MLA bad ki heh sorkar  tah sia, ki dei ban risain:HYC

content: Jowai, 9 Naiwieng:Ka Dorbar Shnong Ladrymbai Dongwah, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingpynpyrshang ka In Charge jong ka Ladrymbai Police Outpost ia u Phillip Bamon, tang namar ba udei u lok jong ka halor ka jingdonkti jong u ban thaw kulmar bad ban byrngem byrsit bad maham rah bor bad pyniap ia u rangbah shnong barim, u ma Knightstar Amkhloo bad kiba ha iing ha sem jong u.Katkum ka jingujor u Secretary ka Ladrymbai DOngwah, la iathuh ba ha ka 6 tarik une u bnai ha ka por kumba 9 baje eiei utei u Phillip Bamon u la wan sha katei ka shnong da ka Gypsy rongsaw ML04A-0911 ad u la thombor ia ki khun ki kti jong utei u ma Amkhloo bad patan jubor ia ki shapoh kali ban rahbor ia ki ha ryngkat ka jingbyrngem ban pyniap ia u ma Amkhloo bad ia kiwei kiwei ki dkhot ka longing jong u.Kitei ki rangbah haba iakynduh ia une u Nongthoh Kkhubor mynta ka sngi, kila iathuh ba ka IC ba peit shipor ia ka Ladrymbai Police Outpost kaba dei ka lok jong utei u Phillip Bamon kam shym la shikhia ban leh eiei halor ka jingujor jong ka bor shnong bad kila kyntu ia u SP ka East Jaintia Hills ban leh eiei halor kane ka jingleh donbor utei u Phillip Bamon tang namar ba u dei u lok katei ka pulit.Shuh shuh, na ka liang ka VDP Shnong Dongwah ruh ka la pynrem jur ia katei ka jingleh utei u Phillip Bamon uba la nud ban thombor ia ki longkmie bad ia ki khynthei ki khynnah khlem da burom shuh ia ka bor shnong bad ia ka ain ka kanun jong ka ri,Na ka liang ka VDP Ladrymbai Dongwah ka la kyntu ia ki bor jong ka ain ban pynshitom ia utei u briew katkum ka ain.
title: Sngewkhia ka Dorbar, ba iada ki pulit ia u Phillip Bamon

content: Shillong, 7 Naiwieng:Ha ka 5 tarik u naiwieng ka Legal Right Observatory (LRO) lyngba u Convener jong ka u Vinay Joshi ka la thoh sha ka Majistor ka kong I Majaw-Inquiry Officer for NCPCR kaba dei ruh ka Additional District Magistrate, East Khasi Hills Meghalaya bad ha katei ka jingthoh kaba 3 sla ka LRO ka la dawa ia ki 8 tylli ki mat kiba ia dei bad ka jingjia kaba la jia ha ka sngi ba thang ia u bah Kulam Nongrum u President ka Sengbah Ki Nongshat Nongkheiñ ha ka 11 tarik u nailar, 2017 ha kaba ka la don ka jingmih madan bad rah pla kad jong ki khynnah skul ban pyrshah ia ka jinglehniam ban thang ia utei u rangbah. Ka LRO ka la thoh sha ka Majistor ba lada jia ba ki briew kiba donkti kin lait na ka jingshah pynshitom kan rah sha ki bor aiñ kiba kham shajrong.Ki 8 tylli ki mat ba ka Legal Right Observatory ka la dawa ki long ba mar mar dei ban ujor ia ki Headmaster bad ki bor pyniaid jong ki 2 tylli ki skul ka Hemont Zenith Secondary School, Mylliembad ka Sunny Hills Adventist Secondary School Mylliem naba ki pynbor ia ki khynnah skul jong ki ban shim bynta ha ki jingpyrshah ha ki jingiakhih pyrshah ha surok pyrshah ia ka jingleit on thang ia u bah Kulam Nongrum uba dei ha ka jingngeit niam Khasi. Ka la dawa ba dei ban pynngat ia ki ha ki kyndon aiñ jong ka Justice Juvinile Act. Kaba -ar ka la dawa ba dei ban ujor ruh sa kawei pat ka jing ujor pyrshah ia ki Headmaster bad bor pyniaid jong kitei ki skul ban pynngat hapoh ki kyndon aiñ jong ka IPC section 157A, 153 A(1), 295A, 505(1) bad 505 (1)(b) namar ka jingphah mih ia ki khynnah skul ha ka jingiakhih kaba pyrshah hapdeng ka jingngeit niam.Kaba lai ka dei ban tohkit ia ki ar tylli ki skul da ki bor tohkit ba laitluid jong ka sorkar jylla bad sorkar pdeng namar ka jingiadei ha ka niam bad ka politik bad namar ka jingpynsngewthuh ia ki khynnah skul ha ka liang ka jingiapher niam ha ka pule puthi jong ki. Ban tohkit namar ka jingleh kiar jong u District Inspector of School ban leh ia ka kamram jong u ha katei ka bynta bad de iban pynshitom ruh ia u District Inspector of Schools namar ka jingbym pynshitom jong u ia kitei ki skul hadien katei ka jingjia.Ka la dawa ba dei ban kyrpad sha u State Education Secretary bad Director of Schools Education ban pynmih ia ka jingmaham ia ki skul ba kim dei ban phah ia ki khynnah skul ha ki jingiakhih pyrshah niam ne politik. La dawa ba dei ban pynmih jingpynbna sha baroh ki skul Kristan ba kin dei ban pynmih kano kano ka jingiapher niam ha ki skul jong ki. Ka jingdawa kaba khadduh ka long ba dei ban ai jingshai da ki Awareness prokram sha ki bor pyniaid skul ne kolej shaphang ka Juvenile Justice Actban kiar na kum kitei ki jingjia. Ha katei ka jingthoh ka LRO ka la ong ba ka NCPCP bad ka sorkar Meghalaya ki dei ban lehnoh mar mar ia katei ka jingdawa ban lait na kum kitei ki jingjia hynrei lada kim leh ka ong ba ki don ki aiñ ba kham hajrong shuh shuh.Ha katei ka jingthoh ka LRO ka la batai ia ka jingjia ha ka 11 tarik u Nailar 2017, ha ka sngi thang ia u bah Kulam Nongrum bad ka la suhlang ruh da ka kot khubor u Rupang ban pyni ia ki khynnah skul ba ieng lain ryngkat ki pla kad bad kumjuh ruh ia ka jingsyrtap ki pulit ha katei ka jaka ha katei ka sngi.
title: Pynshitom ia 2 tylli ki skul ha Mylliem,  ne ngin iaid kham shajrong

content: Shillong, 09 Naiwieng:U Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la kyntait ba un pynhiar shuki ia ka myntri ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, wat hadien ba ka High Court Meghalaya, ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ban pyndam ia ka jingthung nonghikai skul LP, hadien ba ka la lap ba ka don ka jyrsieh kaba jur bha kaba la leh ha u snem 2009 ha ka por ba ka Kong Ampareen ka bat kum ka myntri ka tnad pule puthi ka jylla.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, u Dr Mukul u la ong ba ka sorkar kan hap ban bishar ban eksamin bha ia kane, halor ka nongrim jong ka lynti ka ain.Haba kylli la un pynhap shuki noh ia ka Kong Ampareen, u Dr Mukul u la ong, “Nga tip phin kylli ia kata, hynrei ka sorkar kan sa bishar ia ka kam khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ki myntri halor kane ka kam”.U la jubab biang, “Ngin ia ap shwa kaei ka jingmih namar ba ka jingmih ka hukum na ka iing kashari ka dei ka nongrim ba ka sorkar ka dei ban leh”.Lah ban kdew ba ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai, ka Meghalaya High Court, ka la rai ban aiti ha ka CBI ban tohkit ia ka jyrsieh thungkam nonghikai LP ha ki skul sorkar kaba la dep leh ha u snem 2008. Napdeng ki 365 ngut ki nonghikai kiba la thung, ka CBI ha ka jingtohkit ba nyngkong jong ka, ka la lap ba 268 ngut, ki dei kiba la thung da ka lynti bym dei.Nalor ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, kaba mynta ka long ka myntri jong ka tnad Labour, ka CBI ka la lap ruh ia kiba bun ki Nongmihkhmat paidbah, kynthup ia kiba mynta bad kiba rim, kiba la phah ia ki kyrteng jong ki briew la jong ban pynrungkam ha kane ka kam nonghikai da ka lynti ka bym dei. Kine ki long u Deputy Chief Minister ba mynta, U Ma RC Laloo, uba la ai kyrteng 37 ngut.U MLA ka Mawkynrew, u Bah Remington Pyngrope uba la phah bun eh 47 ngut, u MLA ka Nartiang Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar 37 ngut, u MLA ka Raksamkre, u Limison D. Sangma 34 ngut, u MLA Pynursla, Bah Prestone Tynsong 20, u Myntri ka tnad Urban bad MLa Mylliem, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh 15, u MLA Pynthorumkhrah Bah A.L. Hek 7, u MLA South Shillong Bah Sanbor Shullai 3, u MLA barim, ka War Jaintia, Bah R.L. Tariang 29, u MLA barim ka Nongspung bad Vice President ka BJP mynta, u Bah J.A. Lyngdoh 6, u Speaker barim, Bah Charles Pyngrope 3, MLA barim ka Nongshken, Bah Donkupar Massar 2, u MDC ka JHADC, Bah Moonlight Pariat 11, u MLA barim ka Nongkrem, u Bah Lambor Malngiang 4, Bah F.War, adviser jong u Bah, D.D. Lapang 3 ngut.Ka High Court ka la ai por hynriew bnai ia ka CBI ban pyndep ka jingtohkit bad ban pynshitom ia kiba donkti.
title: Kyntait U Mukul ban pynhap  shuki ia ka Kong Ampareen

content: Shillong, 09 Naiwieng:Ki nonghikai Meghalaya SSA School Teachers Association (MSSASTA) ki la rai ban nym ialeh shuh ia ka eksamin pyntbit D.El.Ed (Diploma in Elementary Education) hadien ba ki mark ki neh kumjuh, wat la ki la ialeh ia kajuh ka eksamin la lai bad saw sien ruh.Kine ki nonghikai ki la pynlong ia ka jingiashong kyrain bad rah plakad mynta ka sngi hakhmat ka Additional Secretariat, Shillong, ban dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynkut noh shi syndon ka jingiateh bad ka NIOS, namar ba ka la leh thurmur shaba palat ia ka rukom pyniaid ia ka eksamin haduh ba la wanrah jingkulmar ia ki nonghikai.“Ngi dawa ba ka sorkar kan sangeh ban bthah ia ka NIOS ban pyniaid ia ka eksamin pyntbit namar ba ngi la ngiah ia ka jingtreikam thurmur kane ka tnad ka sorkar India haduh ba ngi la iakynduh ia ki jingeh”, la ong u President ka seng u Bah Aristotle Rymbai mynta ka sngi.U la ong, “Ki don kumba 900 ngut ki nonghikai kiba ialeh ia kajuh ka eksamin la lai haduh saw sien hynrei ki mark ki neh kumjuh khlem kylla satia bad kane ka paw ba ka jingpyniaid ka long kaba thurmur bha”.Ka jingialang ka la ai por khadduh ia ka sorkar mynta ka sngi ba kan jubab ia ka jingdawa jongki ban pynkut noh bad ka NIOS bad lada kam jubab kin pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ba kham jur.U Bah Aristotle u la ong ba ka jingleh thurmur ia ka jingai mark ha ka praktikal lei ka jubor bha haduh bym sngewthuh sngewthaw shuh nalor ka jingbakla kyrteng, bad kiwei.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingsngew lyngngoh kumno ka sorkar jylla ka la iateh bad ka NIOS, u Bah Aristotle u la ong, “Kumno ka sorkar jylla ka iateh bad ka NIOS kaba treikam thurmur haduh katne”.U la ong ba ha jaka ba ki nonghikai kin pynleit jingmut ha ka kam hikai, hynrei ki la hap ban khuslai ialade ban mih sha madan khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba la jan ka eksamin ia ki khynnah.U Bah Aristotle u la ong ba ki nonghikai ki don 4835 ngut kiba la ialeh ha ka 1st batch jong ka eksam pyntbit ha u snem 2013-14 bad na kine ki don sa kumba 900 ngut kiba dang kulmar ka result, namar ka jingai mark thurmur ka NIOS katba kiwei kila don ba la pynbeit hadien ba ka Seng ka la iakhih bunsien.U la ong ba ha ka 2nd batch ki nonghikai ba ialeh ia ka eksam ki don 3437 bad ki la dep ia ka snem ba nyngkong bad sa shi snem dang sah, hynrei namar ka jingbym ler ka NIOS, ka eksam la shu sah kut khlem pat lah pyndep haduh mynta kaba dei ban pyndep ha u 2016. La iathuh ba bun ki jingbakla ba la leh da ka NIOS naduh ka rukom ai mark, kyrteng kmie kpa, jaka sah bad kiwei.
title: La ialeh saw sien ioh mark kumjuh,  ngiah ki nonghikai MSSASTA

content: Shillong, 9 Nawieng:La phah mynta ka sngi, ia ka jing ujor sha U Deputy Commissioner, ka East Khasi Hills Districtuba dei ruh u lamphang jong ka jing pynsngew paidbah halor ka jingring bording, kaba la ai kyrteng Mawphu HEP.Halor katei ka phang, la ong ba ka Shnong, ka don kumba 3hajar ngut ki nongshong shnong bad ka dei kaba don sharum jong ka jaka ban ring bor ding, kaba la ai kyrteng Mawphu 85 MW HEP bad la iathuh ba kawei ka shnat jong katei ka wah, kaba la kum ka Bakra Shella, ka dei kaba wan na ka Wah Umiam, kaba hap ha katei ka projek bor ding jong ka Mawphu bad ki nongshong shnong, ki shaniah ia ka umbam umdih jongki, na katei ka wah.Ym tang katta, katei ka wah, ka dei kaba pynbiang dohkha, ha kaba ki don kiba im na katei ka kam tong dohkha na katei ka wah bad la iathuh ba kumba mar shiteng ki nongshong shnong, ki im na kaba kamai, da kaba khwai dohkha, na katei ka wah Bakra bad lada la khang noh ia ka um, khlem pep, kan long ka jingktah kaba jur ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka Shella. La shim namarkata ba ka jingduna jong ka um ban poi sha katei ka shnong, kan long ka jingktah kaba jur shi kat dei eh, ong U Bah Roy Kupar Synrem Secretary, ka dorbar Shnong Shella.
title: Ka projek bording Mawphu,  kan pynrkhiang ia ka Wah Bakra

content: Shillong, 9 Naiwieng:Ka Campaign for Change, ka la pynbna ba kan sangeh noh shuwa shipor ia ka jingialap paidbah jong ka ban wanrah jingkylla bad kan bteng biang pat ia katei ka jingialap hadien ka elekshon MLA 2018. Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u Chairman ka CFC, u samla Elizer Chyne u la ong ba ka daw ba ki sangeh shuwa shipor ka dei namarba lada iaid shakhmat ki lah ban don ki seng saiñpyrthei ki ban shim kabu bad ki tieng ioh ba ki dkhot jong ka kin ia don bynta pynban bad ki seng saiñpyrthei. La kylli balei ki sangeh ha kum kane ka kabu elekshon lada kwah pynkylla ia ka jingmut u paidbah ki la ong ba ki kwah tang ban pynshai sha u paidbah hynrei kim kwah ban poi sha ka ejenda politik. Ki nongialam katei ka seng ki la ong ba kim khang pat ia u dkhot jong ki ban long dkhot ha kano kano ka seng saiñpyrthei.U samla Jona Khar-ir, u la pyntip ruh ba lashai ka sngi kan don ka prokram jong ka Campaign For Change ha Communitty Hall NEHU bad ia katei ka prokram la phiah ha ki 2 bynta, ka bynta kaba nyngkong dei ka jingiaphylliew jingmut halor ka phang ‘Ki aiñ bad ki rukom treikam ha kaba ia dei bad ka roi ka par ha ki liang baroh’ bad hadien katei kan don pat ka jingiatainia hapdeng ki samla pule kolej halor ka phang, ‘Ym don jingkyrmen ia ka lawei jong ki samla kumba long 45 snem mynta’. Kitei ki samla pule jong ka NEHU kiba ialam ia ka Campaign For Change ki la ong ba ka daw ba la seng ia katei ka kynhun trei mon sngewbha ka dei hadien ba ki iohi ba ha kane ka jylla ym don satia ki polisi treikam ban kyntiew ia ki paidbah ha ki liang baroh.“Haba ngi phai sha ka rep ka riang ym don polisi, ki bording ym don polisi lait noh tang ha Maharashtra bad Gujarat, ki khlaw ki btap bad ki sawdong sawkun ruh ym don polisi, Labour ym don polisi, Skill Development, Organic Farming ruh ym don polisi, ha ka jngohkai pyrthei lei ngi dang sahdien palat” ong u samla Khar-ir. Ki la iathuh ba ha ka Campaign for Change u Chief Campaigner ne u nongialap rangbah jong ki dei u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem, nalor jong u ki don ruh sa kiwei pat ki nongialap.Haba kren shaphang ka polisi ia ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ha kane ka jylla u samla Khar-ir u la ong ba ka kynhun jong ki ka la dep wad bniah ( Research) ia ka jinglong jingman ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ha Sohra bad ki la lap ba tang kumba 40% ki briew haba ki wan ki shong ki sah ha ki ing basa bapher kiba don ha kane ka jylla hynrei 60% ki sah ha ki Hotel bapher ha nongbah Guwahati. “60% ki tourist ki sah ha ki Hotel ha Assam, ki jingbam plastic ki wanrah na bar, ki um ruh kiba nabar, ka bam ki wanrah na bar, ki kali ruh ki wanrah na Assam, ki trai jylla kim iohnong eiei, iohnong pynban ka Assam, kane baroh ngi lap dei namar bym don ki polisi kiba biang” ong u samla Khar-ir.
title: 60% ki wan shangkai bad sah Hotel  ha Assam, ka bam, ki kali na Assam

content: Nongstoiñ, 9 Naiwieng:Hynnin ka sngi kawei ka longkmie ba la tip kyrteng ka kong Biolin Mawtyllup 35 snem napoh ka shnong Umsaw jong ka thain Myriaw ka la leit ban ujor da ka ehajar ha Nongstoiñ Police Station, pyrshah ia ki ar ngut ki kynthei kiba napoh ka shnong New Nongstoiñ halor ka jingsuba jur ba ki la don kti ban rahbor ia ka khun jong katei ka longkmie.Katkum ka ehjar bala ujor da katei ka longkmie la ong ba kitei ki ar ngut ki kynthei kiba la tip kyrteng kum ka kong Jasinta Nongkseh bad kong Tresina Lyngdoh Marshillong napoh ka shnong New Nongstoin, ki la rahbor ia ka khun jong ka kaba dang 14 snem kyrta ha ka janmiet jong ka 6tarik Naiwieng 2017 ha ka por 2:00baje nohsngi.Shuh shuh la ong ruh ba kitei ki ar ngut ki kynthei, ki la pynngop ia ka khun jong katei ka longkmie da ki jingdih pynbuaid bad rah ia ka sha ka thain Nongspung West Khasi Hills, hynrei ia katei ka khynnah la ioh ban pyllait noh da ki senglongkmie jong ka New Nongstoiñ, ha kaba kila lap ruh ia katei ka khynnah na katei ka shnong mynta ka sngi.Na ka liang ki pulit ki la pynlong ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor katei ka jingjia bad kila phah ruh ia katei ka khynnah ban leit leh eksamin sha ki Doctor bad katkum ka medical Report la lap ba katei ka khynnah 14 snem ka la shah pynngop ha kaba pynia shongkha jubor.Halor katei ka bynta ki pulit ka Nongstoiñ Police station kila register ia ka case kaba katkum ka Case No. Nongstoin Police Station case No. 113(11)17 U/S 120/120B/365 IPC R/W Sec. 3(a)/4 Pocso Act.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia ka kong Endalin Puwein 26 snem na ka shnong Pyndengbia ka la ujor ejehar pyrshah ia u lok jongka da kaba kynnoh ba ha ka 3 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 8.00baje janmiet, u lok jongka u ba kyrteng u Sharling Shyrkon uba la ia im bad sah ryngkat bad ka naduh u snem 2005 ryngkat saw ngut ki khun u la shoh ia ka wat haba ka dang don hapdeng ka jingarmet ha kaba ka la mynsaw bad pynkit ruh ia ka sha Civil Hospital na ka bynta ka jingsumar.Ka kong CR. Kharkongor, WPSI ka Nongstoin, ka la shim ia ka bynta ban tohkit halor katei ka kam bad la iathuh ba katei ka longkmie ka dang pun san bnai ia i khyllung hapoh kpoh jongka bad ki don ruh katto katne ki daw ba iadei bad ka pisa pilain bad ka jingiabam iadih jongka bad kiwei pat ki para kynthei kaba la wallam sha katei ka jingshah shoh ha la u lok.La register case halor katei kam kaba long katkum ka Nongstoin police Station case no. 114(11)17 U/S 498A IPC.
title: Shah rahbor bad shong tnga jubor,  ka samla lud najan Myriaw

content: Shillong, 9 Naiwieng:Ka Meghalaya High Court, ha ka hukum kaba mynta ka sngi, ka shim, ba ka jingthung ia ki Parliamentary Secretery ha Meghalaya, ka long kaba beain bad kaba sniew ha khmat jong ka ain.Mynta ka kashari, ka la ai bor ha U Lat ka Jylla, ba un shim ia ka rai bad ban leh ia kaba donkam, na ka bynta ban pynduh noh ia ka jinglong dkhot jong kito ki MLA, kiba la shah ujor ha ka mukotduma, namar ba ki bat ia ka ophis kamai pisa.U Bah Madal Sumer, uba la ujor ia katei ka mukotduma, un leit sha U Lat, ha ki khyndiat sngi ban sa wan, ha kaba yn dawa, ba un pynduh noh ia ka jinglong dkhot jong kitei ki MLA, kiba bat ia ka shuki kamai pisa bad ba yn dawa ruh ban pynhap noh ia kane ka sorkar, namar ba kam don shuh ka jingbiang briew ha iing dorbar Jylla, hadien ba yn pynduh ia ka jinglong dkhot jong kitei ki MLA.Ym tang katta, yn dawa ruh na ki MLA, kiba bat ia kitei ki kam bapher, ha ka kyrdan Parliamentary Secretery, ba kin pynphai ruh ia baroh ka pisa, kaba ki la ioh lum, naduh ka tulop, ka bai leit bai wan bad baroh ki jingioh kamai jongki, ha kine ki saw snem ba ladep. U Bah Sumer, ula ujor sha kashari, ia 17ngut ki MLA, kiba bat ia ki kam Parliamentary Secretery, ba ki dei ban shah weng noh, kum ki MLA jong ka dorbar Jylla.Kham mynshwa, ha ka 17tarik Risaw 2017, U Ma Ioannis Thamar, na Ladthalaboh, Jowai, ula ujor sha U Lat ka Jylla ia ki 17ngut ki MLA, kiba bat kum ki Parliamentary Secretery ha kane ka sorkar MUA, ha Meghalaya bad katei ka jing ujor jong utei u rangbah, ka long ba kitei ki 17ngut ki la pynkhein ia ka riti synshar, da kaba ki bat ia ka kam ban pyniohnong ia ki bad kumta, la bthah ia U Lat ka Jylla, ba un pyntreikam da ka article 192 bad ban mait noh ia ka jinglong dkhot jong kitei kiba bat ia ka ophis kamai pisa.Ki 17ngut ki MLA, kiba bat kum ki Parliamentary Secretery bad kitei ki kynthup ia U Ma Coming One Ymbon, Parliamentary Secretary, Mining and Geology, Soil and Water Conservation, U Samuel M. Sangma, Parliamentary Secretary of Home Guards and Civil Defence, Housing, U Limison D. Sangma, Parliamentary Secretary of Transport, Commerce and Industries, U Winnerson D. Sangma, Parliamentary Secretary of Home(Police), Education, U Kennedy Cornelius Khyriem, Parliamentary Secretary of Tourism, Arts and Culture, U Cherak W. Momin, Parliamentary Secretary of Public Works Department(Roads), U Brigady Marak, Parliamentary Secretary of Agriculture, Public Works Department(Buildings), U Sengnam Marak, Parliamentary Secretary of Health and Family Welfare, Fisheries, U Rophul S. Marak, Parliamentary Secretary i/c Community and Rural Development, Information and Public Relation, U Robinus Syngkon, Parliamentary Secretary, i/c Horticulture, Legal Metrology, U Micheal T. Sangma, Parliamentary Secretary i/c Excise, U Justine Dkhar, Parliamentary Secretary of Education, i/c Social Welfare, U Ashahel D. Shira, Parliamentary Secretary i/c of Water Resources, U Stephanson Mukhim, Parliamentary Secretary i/c Sports and Youth Affairs, Cooperation, U Celestine Lyngdoh, Parliamentary Secretary i Agriculture, Food, Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs, U Noverfield R. Marak, Parliamentary Secretary i/c Public Health Engineering Urban Affairs, U Marthon Sangma, Parliamentary Secretary of Forest and Environment, Information Technology.
title: Beaiñ ka shuki Parliamentary  Secretery ha Meghalaya: High Court

content: Da u Bah Philip marweinShillong, 9 Naiwieng:Ka Ranikor Constituency, kaba mynno mynno ka kham i phuhmut phuhmat ba dang ioh jingtrei bylla bad ki kam khaïi-pateng bad thnem bha ki dukan bad ka ïew ka hat bad kumjuh ki jingtrei jingktah, naduh Umpung ter ter shaduh Ranikor, Borsohra, Nonghykllam, Nongumsur, Nongjri, Kulang, Pormawdar, Khonjowai shaduh Moheskola, mynta ki la tyrkhong khait bad la i kumba ki dei ki shnong iapkhlam. Ka jingkyrduh ka la ban ia ki, bad ki briew jong kine ki thain ki shu im sangtsot bad kyrduh haduh katta katta.Bun ki long ïing ki la hab ban pynpep skul bad kolej noh ia la ki khun bad ki shu im kyndoi jakpoh, katba ioh ei. Ka jingkyrsoi spah na ka kam tih dewïong bad Mawshun, ka la shu ryngnget kynsan naduh kumba saw snem mynta. Bun ki la hab ban leitphai biang dsha ka rep ka riang da kaba rep shyrti ne shu rep madei mata tang ban shu ioh jakpoh malu mala.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki nongshongshnong jong ki thie ki thaiñ, kynthup ia ki bor pyniaid shnong, haba ki paidbah ki shem jynjar katne katne ruh, la kynnoh ba u MLA ka Ranikor Constituency um ju leit jngoh ia ki ha ki shnong ki thaw bapher, ban leit iakynduh bad ban sngewlem na ka bynta jong ki bad ban iaphylliew jingmut lang bad ki paidbah kiba la ngat ha kane ka apot kumno ban leh. Nalor kata ruh ki la kynnoh ia ka sorkar Congress ba kam salia na ka bynta kane ka jingjynjar bad ka hiran jong ki paidbah, kaba la ktah ym tang ia ka Ranikor Constituency hynrei ia ka jylla baroh kawei. Ki la kdew shynna ba tang ia kata ka Mining Policy bad ka Mining plan ruh ka sorkar Congress hapoh ka jingialam jong u Mukul Sangma, kam shym la lah ban leh ei ei bad dei na kane ka daw ba ka sorkar India, khamtam kaNGT kam treh ban weng ia ka jingkhang tih dewïong, Mawshun bad kiwei kiwe ki par khyndew. Ki la iathuh ba mynta ki paidbah ki la sat palat bad kim banse ban shim ia ka rai kaba khlain ha ba leit thep-vote ka ban sa long hadien lai bnai ei ei, naduh mynta ka sngi.
title: Kordit ki paidbah ka Ranikor,  ba khang tih dewiong bad mawshun
