content: Shillong, 9 Naiwieng:Ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei, 13tarik mynta u bnai, ki nongbuh trok, kiba kamai shnong, kin leit tur bad rah plakad lem bad ki lama iong sha ki karkhana dewbilat ha East Jaintia Hills.Katei ka dei ka rai jong ka jing ia kynduh jong ka Joint Action Committee (JAC), kaba long mynta ka sngi ha 7mer, ha kaba ki la rai ruh ban nym shah kit mar ia ki trok kiba kit dewbilat bad kiba kit ia ka eit dewbilat ruh, naduh ka 13tarik mynta u bnai, naduh ka por 1baje mynstep bad haduh ba ki kompeni dewbilat, kin pyntreikam ia ki jingdawa ba la buh da ka komiti.Ha katei ka sngi, yn pynlong ruh da ka jingrah plakad bad lama iong sha kitei ki karkhana dewbilat , kiba don ha East Jaintia. La pyntip ruh ba kan don ka jingialang jong ki trai trok, ha 7mer, ha ka por 10baje mynstep bad la ong ruh, ba kito ki bym poi sha katei ka jingialang, ka JAC, kan nym kitkhlieh, ha kano kano ka jingeh, kaba ki donkam nangne shakhmat.Kham mynshwa, lah ban pynkynmaw, ba ki nongbuh trok kamai, ki la buh por haduh ka 10tarik Naiwieng, ba kitei ki karkhana dewbilat, kin jubab halor ki jingdawa jongki, kiba kynthup ba ki trok, kiba nabar, kim lah ban kit mar, na ki karkhana dewbilat bad pynhap mar ha ki bynta jong ka Ri Khasi Jaintia, hynrei, ba ki hap ban kit mar beit shabar ka Jylla bad ba dei tang ki trok, kiba kamai hapoh ka Jylla bad kiba don ia kiba kum kitei ki laisen, ki lah ban kit bad pynhap mar ha ki bynta jong ka Ri Khasi Jaintia. Hynrei, haduh mynta kitei ki karkhana dewbilat, kim shym la shah shkor satia, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Handle Mukhim, uba dei u lamphang jong ka Joint Action Committee.
title: Yn leit tur ki nong kamai trok  sha ki karkhana dewbilat

content: Shillong, 9 Naiwieng:Ha ka thup pynbna kyrtong kaba nyngkong, mynta ka janmiet ka NPP ka la pynbna haduh 24 ngut ki kyrtong ki ban ia khun na ki 24 tylli ki konstitwensi. Na kitei ki 24 ngut, 11 ngut dei ha ki konstitwensi Khasi bad Jaintia katba 13 ngut pat dei ha ri Lum Garo. Ha katei ka thup kyrtong kaba nyngkong, la iohi ba ka NPP ka la pynbna ia ka kyrteng ki 2 ngut ki MLA kata u James K Sangma na Dadengre konstitwensi bad u Nihim D Shira na Songsak. Ka NPP kan pyniakhun ruh ia ka MP barim ka Lok Sabha ka Agatha Sangma na South Tura konstitwensi kaba dei ka konstitwensi kaba mihkhmat mynta da u John Leslee K Sangma uba la jop kum u kyrtong shimet ha ka elekshon 2013.Ha ri Lum Khasi-Jaintia ki kyrtong kiba ka NPP ka la pynbna mynta ka sngi, ki long u Wailadmiki Kyndiah (kynum jong u MLA ka Nartiang u bah Sniawbhalang Dhar), u bah Gilbert Sten na Mookaiaw, na Mawhati u bah Dasakhiatbha Lamare (khun jong u bah Ngaitlang Dhar-MLA ka Umroi). Na Nongpoh ka NPP ka pyniakhun da u bah Cleophas B Syiem, CEM barim ka KHADC, na Jirang u bah Sosthenes Sohtun, na Nongkrem u bah Hispreashingson Shylla (MDC ba mynta ka Nongkrem), na Mawsynram u Laplu M Sangma, na Shella u bah Saiñkupar Riahtam, na Mairang u bah Lawanpynshngaiñ K War (khun jong u bah Kitdor Syiem MLA barim ka Mairang), na Nongstoiñ u bah Macmillan Byrsat bad na Rambrai-Jyrngam u bah Alfred Kharbani.Ki kyrtong na ri Lum Garo pat ki long na Mendipathar u F.W Momin, na Resubelpara u T.D Sangma, Songsak u Nihim D Shira, na Williamnagar u Marcuise N Marak, na Raksamgre u Benedict Marak, na Phulbari u Manirul Islam Sarkar (MLA barim), na Rajabala u Dr.Mizanur Kazi, na Selsella ka FCA Sangma, na Dadengre u James K Sangma, na north Tura u Thomas A Sangma, na South Tura ka Agatha K Sangma (MP barim), na Salmanpara u Ian Botham Sangma bad na Siju u Rakkam Sangma. Ia kitei ki kyrtong la pynbna mynta ka sngi da u Chairman ka State Election Committee uba dei ruh u President jong ka NPP Meghalaya u Dr.W.R Kharlukhi.
title: 24 ngut ki kyrtong ka NPP;  11 na Khasi-Jaintia, 13 na Garo

content: Shillong, 09 Naiwieng:Mynta ka sngi, kumba 16 ngut ki Parliamentary Secretary jong kane ka sorkar Meghalaya United Alliance (MUA), ki la risain noh da kaba ai shithi ienoh kam ha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka janmiet, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ki MLA kiba bat kum ki Parliamentary Secretary, ki la wan iakynduh ia u bad hadien ba la iakren ki la aiti noh ia ka shithi risain.“Baroh ki Parliamentary Secretary, ki la aiti ia ka shithi risain ha nga mynta hi ka janmiet”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ha ka jingshisha, ka sorkar ka la thaw ia ka ain ban ailad ia ki Parliamentary Secretary, katkum ka riti synshar jong ka artikil 191 kaba ailad ia ka sorkar jylla ba kan shna ia ki ain ban iada ia ki parlieamentary secretaries na ka jingshah rai pynrem.“Ngin sa bishar bha ia kane ka kam shwa ba ngin pyrkhat kumno ban iaid shakhmat”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka sorkar kan sa bishar ruh la ka rai ka High Court kan poi shaduh ban shah pynduh jinglong MLA ne em namar ba ia ki Parliamentary Secretary, la thung katkum ka ain.Ha ka jingshisha, ka kynhun myntri ha u Iaiong mynshem snem, ka la pynkylla ia ka ain Meghalaya Parliamentary Secretaries (Appointment, Salaries, Allowances and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act, 2005 ban ailad ia ki MLA ba bat ia ka parliamentary secretaries.Ka kyndon 5 la weng noh namar ba la pyniaryngkat ia ki parliamentary secretary bad ki myntri sorkar bad ka la pynkylla noh ia ka kyndon Sections 6 bad 6 (a) ka Meghalaya parliamentary secretaries (appointment, salaries, allowances and miscellaneous provisions) ordinance, 2016.
title: Risaiñ 16ngut ki Parliamentary  Secretary, ka sorkar MUA

content: Shillong, 10 Naiwieng:U Bah Firstforce Deki Ramsiej bad u Bah Kior Sing Hinge ki la paw ar ngut kiba iaknieh tiket na ka UDP na ka bynta ka Umroi ha kane ka elekshon MLA ban wan.Hadien ba la paw ka kyrteng u Bah Deki mynta sa u Bah Kior u la thmu ban pan tiket lem na ka UDP ban pynkhreh iaka elekshon.Haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, u Bah Kior Sing Hinge u la kubur u don ka jingthmu lada ki paidbah ki kwah ia u.U Bah Kior u la kam ba bun na ki nongkyrshan ka UDP ki angnud ia u ban iakhun ia ka tiket MLA na Umroi na ka UDP bad lada ki dkhot ka UDP ki kyrshan u kloi ban mih madan ban pan tiket ban iakhun ha kane ka elekshon sha ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla ha u snem 2018 ban sa wan.Ha ka elekshon 2014 sha ka KHADC, u Bah Kior u la iakhun na ka UDP bad u la wan ba ar ha katei ka jingiakhun da kaba ioh 5 hajar vote tam katba u MDC ba mynta ka Umroi u la ioh 6 hajar tam.
title: Iaknieh tiket UDP 2 ngut na Umroi

content: Shillong, 10 Naiwieng:Kat shaba phai tawiar ka nongbah Shillong ki paidbah ki ud dheng dheng dheng shi dheng kali, katei ka jingdheng kali ka la long shisha kaba palat jan ha manla ki kyndong kynshrot jong ka nongbah ruh. Ka Upper Shillong ka dei kawei na ki surok kaba ju kham kylluid baroh shi katta hynrei ha kine ki sngi la iohi ba ka Upper Shillong ruh ka ju mad ia ki jingdheng kali kiba khah khah khamtam lei ha ki sngi shuti ba jur palat ka jingtuid ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei sha Sohra , sha Mawlynnong bad sha kiwei ki jaka. La iohi ba ha kine ki sngi wat ka Stand Bus Mawlai ka ba ju duna ka jingdheng kali mynta ka la sdang bad la iohi ba ki kali Assam ki la rung ruh ha kitei ki lynti khim bad la iohi ba ki kali Assam ki la tip lad bha mynta jan ha manla ki surok kyndong ka nongbah Shillong ban rung ban mih kaba ki ong ka lynti lyngkot.Balei haduh katne katne eh ka jingdheng kali sohsat ha nongbah Shillong, u Rupang u la ngam jylliew halor katei ka phang ban wad jingtip bad ban tih bniah ia ka daw na ki bor kiba dei peit hajrong. La ioh jingtip ba ki kali kiba Rejistar hapoh East Khasi Hills ki don kumba 1.5 lak (shilak shiteng) tylli bad kiba iaid manla ka sngi ki long 80 na ka shispah. Nalor kitei don pat sa ki kali kiba wan na kiwei pat ki district hynrei nalor kitei ruh ki don pat sa ki kali ki kali sorkar, kali pulit, kali ki shipai suiñ, ki shipai khyndew bad kiba bun ki tnad shipai kiba iaid ha nongbah Shillong. Katei ka lad jingtip kaba la ioh lum ka la iathuh ruh ba ha ka shisngi ka jingiaid ki kali kiba wan nabar ban shangkai pyrthei ha kane ka jylla ki long kumba 5000 tylli manla ka sngi bad ia katei la ioh jingkheiñ lyngba ka khyrdop kaba don ha Ri-Bhoi ( Toll Gate). 90 na ka shipah na kitei ki 5000 tylli ki kali ki dei kiba wan na Assam manla ka sngi. Hynrei la iathuh pat ba ha ka sngi shuti lei ki kali ba wan na bar ki poi sha ka 15 ne 20 hajar tylli ha ka shisngi.Shuh shuh la iathuh ba ha ka shisngi shisngi ka jingdon ki pulit pyniaid kali ha ki 90 tylli ki Police Point ka nongbah Shillong ki don 250 ngut, kitei ki don la ka jong ka bynta don kiba mynmiet bad mynsngi, nalor kitei ki don ruh sa 150 ngut ki pulit Home Guard kiba iarap lang hynrei watla katta ruh la ong ba ka eh than ia ki pulit ban tehlakam ia ka jingdheng kali namarba ka surok ruh kaba rit katba ka kali pat kaba bun. Katkum ka jingiakren bad katei ka lad khubor ka la ong ba ka eh than bad kaba long kaba jwat haduh katta katta ban ia khun ia ka jingdheng kali ha nongbah Shillong lada kam don ka lad ban pynthanda lane ban thaw da kiwei pat ki lynti ia ki kali ba wan nabar jylla.
title: Palat 5000 tylli ki kali Assam ha  ka shisngi ba wan sha Meghalaya

content: Shillong 10 Naiwieng:Ka HSPDP kala sdang pynkhih ia ki khlaw ka sor na North Shillong lyngba ka jingioh jongka ia u sing (kyrtong) u Bah Alestar Lyngdoh uba lah ban kyrhuh jam ha ki thliew ki ing paki dulan ka sor Shillong, ym na khlaw.Ka jingialang jong ka HSPDP North Shillong kaba long mynta ka sngi ha Mawkhar la sakhi bun ki samla, longkmie bad Rangbah.U president rangbah ka HSPDP u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit nalor u MLA ka Nongstoin Bah D Jyndiang, ki MDC kynthup ka Kong Teilinia Thangkhiew, bah Samlin Malngiang bad kiwei.Haba kren ha Kane ka jingialang, u Bah Ardent ula ong ba na ki dak ki shin ka paw ba ka jingiakhun na kane ka jaka ka long ym shuh ka BJP, Congress, KHNAM bad sa ka HSPDP.Ka thong ka HSPDP ka long ia ka roi ka par, ka ioh ka kot bad ban Iada ia ka jaitbynriew.”Ngim dei kiba pyrshah ia ka roi ka par kumba la kynnoh kiwei”, ula ong.“Lada ka jinglaitluid ka pynmih da ki dohiong ha jaka ki dohlieh, ngi Khan lah ki dohlieh”, la pynkynmaw u Bah Ardent ia ka jingkren u Macdonald Kongor ha u Myntri rangbahduh ka ri u JN Nehru ha u snem 1956 ha ka jingialang ha Khasi National Durbar Hall, Mawkhar.“Ngi dawa ia ka artikil 271 ka dei namar ba ngi kwah ban pynkhlain ia ka jaitbynriew”, la ong u Bah Ardent. Ula ong ba Kane ka jingdawa ka HSPDP ka dei ban pynduh ia ka district council hynrei Kane ka dei kaba bakla namar ba ha Mizoram ka don ka artikil 271 (G) hynrei ki don ki district council.Ka jingdawa ia kane ka artikil ka long ban pynkhlain ia ka jinglong trai ia ka khyndew ka shyiap.Ula ther ia ka BJP kaba thmu ban pynlong ia ka ri India kum ka ri ban noin ia kiwei jaitbynriew.“Pyndonkam da ka jingstad buh ia ka jingsngew sharud na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew namar ba don kiba jied nongmihkhmat tangba sngew ieid ne sngewjan ne ba wan sngewlem”, ula ong.U Bah Ardent ula ong ba lada ka Jammu & Kashmir ka la dawa bor shuh balei pat ym lah hangne ia ka jaitbynriew. “Lada ka sorkar ka burom ia ngi ki riewlum, ka dei ban ai ia kane ka artikil”, ula ong.Ula ong ba um ju pynsngap ia kiba bein namar ba u sing un kyrhuh beit. U president ka HSPDP ula ong ba haduh mynta ym don bor ka pisa kaba lah ban thied ia u ha ka jingim.”Ka pisa kam don bor ka pisa ban thied ia nga”, la ong u Bah Ardent.“Lada ailad u blei ba ngin wan ha ka bor, ngin pynkhuit ia ki bamsap khlem jingtieng”, ula ong.Ula bynrap ba ka jaitbynriew ka donkam ban phai sha u blei ba un ai jubab ban iada na ki jingma.Katba ka Kong Teilinia kala ong ba ka kwah ban rung sha ka politik namar ba ka kwah ban don ka thong na ka bynta ka lawei ba kham bha jong ki khun ki kti. “Ngi thep vote ia ki khun ki kti jong ngi”, kala ong.U Bah Samlin ula ong ba u dei u nongkyrshan ba radbah ka Congress ha Sohiong hynrei lah kylla ba mut dei na u Bah Ardent ha ka por ba u long CEM ha ka KHADC bad khamtam ka jingialap paidbah da ka Clean Politic Campaign.“Ka jingjop jong nga ruh ia ka MDC dei namar ka jingtrei jar jar”, la ong u Bah Samlin.La pynskhem ruh ia ki nongkitkam ka HSPDP North Shillong ban ialam u Dr Shemphang Syiem nalor ki Youth Wing, Women Wing da u Bah Ardent.U Bah Alestar uba dei u kyrtong ula ong ba u la rung 3000 ki tnum ing bad u lap ba bun kiba dang duk watla ka North Shillong ka la long ka jaka sah ki riew stad. “Kumba 40% kiba dang duk ha North Shillong”, ula ong. Ula ong ba ka artikil 271 ka dei kawei ka mat jong ka elekshon.
title: Lada wan ha ka bor yn mait naphang ia  ki kam bamsap khlem jingtieng: Ardent

content: Shillong, 10 Naiwieng:U Nalin Kohli, uba dei U General Secretery jong ka seng BJP, hynnin, ka sngi, ula leit jngoh ia ka Phulbari, ha kaba la pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah, kaba la don da shiphew hajar ngut kiba wan ban shah shkor ia ka jingialang, kaba la kren da utei u nongialam jong katei ka seng bad kaba la pynlong da U Binoy Kr. Ghosh. Ha ka jingialang, U Kohli, ula pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia jur jongu, halor ka jingsniew palat ka surok bad ka jinghiar ka roi ka par, shaba palat ha Garo Hills.Kawei pat ka jingialang, kaba la leit shim bynta da U Kohli, ka dei ka jing ia kynduh lang jong ki rit paid kiba kyrshan ia ka seng BJP bad ha katei ka jingialang, ki la wan poi 8hajar ngut ki paidbah, kiba shah shkor ia ka jingkren jong U Nalin Kohli. U Kohli, ha ka jingkren, u lyngngoh jur, ba ki dang don bun bah ki jingkieng dieng, kiba dei ki jingkieng iaid kali ha Garo Hills.
title: 18hajar ngut ha ki jingialang  paidbah U Kohli ha Garo Hills

content: Shillong, 10 Naiwieng:Ka la pynkmen haduh katta katta ia kiba bun ki longïng kiba duk hadien ba ki la mih kyrteng ban ioh jingmyntoi na ka skhim shna ïng ba duk ka sorkar pdeng kaba la tip kum ka Pradhan Mantri Awaas Yojana-Gramin. Katei ka skhim ka dei kaba la mang T.1,30,000 (Shi lak lai phew hajar tyngka) kawei ka ïng. Tang mar ia mih kyrteng kitei ki longïng ki la ioh ruh ia ka pisa kaba ki ong ka bhah pisa kaba nyngkong, kaba T.52 hajar bad ki la pynieng ia ka ïng jong ki hynrei kaba pynsngewsih ia ki mynta pat ka dei ba hadien katei kim shym la ioh pisa shuh ban dang bteng ia ka jingtrei ia ka ïng jong ki haduh ban da dep.Kawei na ki Block kaba u Rupang u la ioh ban leit jngoh ia katei ka jingud ki paidbah ka dei ha Mylliem C&RD Block. Mynta ka sngi u Rupang u la leit jngoh ia ki katto katne tylli ki longing ha ka shnong Mawklot kiba la ioh jingmyntoi na katei ka skhim bad la lap ba kitei ki ing ki dang sah khongreng katba ia ka kam pat la sangeh bym don pisa shuh, kawei ka longïng ka la dep ban pynpra ia ka ïng barim jong ki namar ka jingkhim palat ka jaka khnang ban ioh tei ia katei ka ïng thymmai. Ki la shna ing trep ha synrap katei ka ing jong ki ban sah malu mala katto katne bnai haduh ban da dep shna ka ing hynrei naduh u nailur haduh mynta ka jingshna ia ka ing ka dang sah kumjuh namarba kim ioh pisa shuh na Block, ki la iathuh ba namar ka jingkhim palat katei ka ing trei katto katne ngut ki leit sah shuwa bad ki bahaing.Ki la iathuh ba ki la ioh ia ka Work Order naduh ka 11 tarik u nailur, 2017, ka work order kaba T.1,30,000 tyngka bad tang hadien 3 sngi ki la leit sei ka mang pisa kaba nyngkong, kaba T.52 hajar tyngka, katei ka pisa, ka la lut hynrei haduh mynta kim pat ioh pisa na block ban shna pyndep. Katkum katei ka Work order la kren shai ba ia ka kam dei ban pyndep hapoh ka 60 sngi hynrei mynta la 60 sngi ka ing ka dang sah khongreng naduh ba la sdang pynieng. La iathuh ba shuwa ban ai ia ka pisa ki briew na block ki la wan jurip ia ka jaka bad mar ia pynieng paia ruh ki la wan jurip haduh ban da ker maw blok ruh ki wan jurip bad ka biang tiak pa tiak ka rukom shna katkum ka plan.Hynrei la ong ba haba ki leit sha Block pat ban leit wad pisa biang ban bteng ia ka kam, ka jubab ba ki ioh ka long ba ym don pisa ha block mynta. Ym tang ha ka shnong Mawklot hynrei la iathuh ba katei ka jingjia jingsah khongreng ka skhim ing ba duk ka la jia ha baroh kawei ka Mylliem konstitwensi. Katkum ka jingkheiñ ba la ioh lum la ong ba ha u bnai nailur mynta u snem u BDO ka Mylliem C&RD Block u la sam work order haduh 123 tylli ki ïng baduk bad baroh kitei mynta ki ia kynduh ia katei ka juh ka jingeh. Katei ka jingbym ioh pisa shuh haduh mynta ruh ka la pynsohsat ia kiba bun ki long kiba ap ia ka ar bnai ban pyndep bad mynta ki shah ia ka khriat da kaba shong basah ha ki ing dara malu mala namarba ki la pynpra ia ka ing kaba rim.Lah ban kdew ba ka PMAY-G ka dei ka skhim kaba ka sorkar pdeng ka la mang ban shna ing ia ki briew kiba duk bad ki khlem ing khlem sem ha baroh kawei ka ri India, la mang ba T.1,20,000 kan long ia ki briew kiba shong ha ri-thor bad ia katei ka pisa yn bei 60 da ka sorkar pdeng bad 40 da ki sorkar jylla katba ha ri lum pat kum ha ka thaiñ shatei Lam mihngi ka ing kan long kaba T.1,30,000 tyngka bad ia katei yn bei 90 na ka shispah da ka sorkar katba 10 na ka shispah da ka sorkar jylla. Ha Meghalaya ka sorkar pdeng ka la mang ba dei ban pynioh ing ba duk haduh 17030 ïng ha u snem 2016-2017.
title: Sohsat kiba ioh ïng baduk,  bym pyllait pisa shuh ka sorkar

content: Shillong, 10 Naiwieng:Ki paidbah ka shnong Tynring mynta ka sngi kiba la ap ban iashong dorbar haduh kynta ki la sah ha ka umdum hadien ba u Syiem ka Hima Khyrim u la pynsangeh kynsan ban pynlong ia ka dorbar, wat la u la dep pynbna ban long dorbar.Katkum ka jingiakren bad ki riew rangbah ka shnong Tynring, la iathuh ba u Syiem hadien ba la weng noh ia u sordar u Bah CA Lyngdoh na ka kam sorkar, u la aiti ha u Myntri u Bah Medister Warbah ban peit shipor bad ban khot pynlong ia ka dorbar jong ka Shnat Raid Tynring na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong u paidbah bad la buh ban pynlong dorbar mynta ka sngi ka 10 tarik u bnai Naiwieng 2017.Hadien ba kila ap haduh ar kynta ban iashong dorbar, hynrei ym don nongwan satia na ka liang ka ophis u Syiem kynthup u myntri bad haba ki la pyrshang ban shu phun da ka mobile, la pyntip pynban ba la pynsangeh noh ia ka dorbar.Ki dkhot ka shnong kynthup ka Seng Samla Shnong Tynring ki la sah ha ka lyngngoh halor kane ka jingpynsangeh kynsan ia ka dorbar.Da ka jingbitar ki paidbah ki la kiew ka jingdom ia kane hynrei la lah ban tem ia ka hadien ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong ki la shim khia ban wad ia ka daw balei u Syiem u pynsangeh.Lah ban kdew ba namar ki jingkynrum kynram jong ka kam shnong kam thaw jong ka Shnat Raid Tynring kaba la neh la 6 snem namar bym don shuh u nongsynshar shnong uba pura, ka ophis jong u Syiem ka Hima Khyrim Syiemship ka la ai jingbthah ia u Myntri u Medister Warbah Bakhraw ka Raid Nongkrem ban long u Sordar ba shipor (Acting) ka Shnat Tynring.Katkum ka shithi ba la bthah na ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ba la pynsangeh noh ia u bah C.A. Diengdoh kum u Sordar Shnat Raiid Tynring da ka Shithi No.KS.53/SN / 2014/2017/ 660 -663 ha ka 1.11.2017, la bynshet ha u Myntri Warbah ban shimti shipor ban pyniaid ia ka dorbar katkum katei ka shithi ba la bthah da ka District Council tad haduh da kumwei.Lyngba katei ka shithi la bthah da u Syiem ia u Bah C.A. Diengdoh katkum ka Section 9 (1) (h) ka United Khasi Autonomous District ( Appointment and Succession of Chief and Headman Act 1959) ba la weng mardor ia ka jinglong sordar bad ia ka Sanad la pynduh ha ka 29.1. 2016.
title: Lyngngoh ki paidbah, ba pynsangeh   U Syiem ia ka dorbar Tynring

content: Shillong, 10 Naiwieng:U MLA ka 19th Shillong South konstitwensi u bah Sanbor Shullai u la lum jingialang ia ki Rangbah Shnong ,ki ophisar heh jong ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher bad ha katei u la ialam ia kitei ki ophisar ban leit jngoh leit peit ia ki skhim ba la dep mang tyngka ban pyntrei. Katei ka jingialang ka la long ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ha Lumsohphoh-Lumparing, u la khot ia katei ka jingialang khnang ba kan don ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ki nongshong shnong ryngkat ki ophisar kumno ban pyntyllun ia k skhim bapher bapher kiba la kot sha ka T.10 klur tam kiba la mang kyrpang tang na ka bynta ka Greater Lumparing.Ki ophisar kiba la poi sha katei ka jingialang ki dei na ka tnad Tourism, Forest, PWD, Sports, PHE bad MePDCL. Ki skhim kiba la mang ban pyntrei ha Lumparing ki long T.33,70,000 tyngka ban shna lynti iaid kjat na Lumparing sha jaka peitkai sha Lum Shyllong kiba dei na ka tnad Tourism, na PWD pat kumba T.8 klur tam, na ka Sports T.1.49 klur tyngka, na ka PHE T.43 lak tyngka. Kitei baroh ki kot sha ka T.10,78,76,000 tyngka (Shi phew klur hynniewphew phra lak hynniew phew hynriew hajar tyngka).
title: Yn tei jaka iaid kjat na  Lumparing sha Lum Shyllong

content: Pynursla, 10 Naiwieng:Ka jingjied Sordar thymmai, ha ka Raid Shabong, kaba hap ha ka Hima Khyrim, kan long lashai ka sngi. Ki don 3ngut ki kandidet bad kitei ki kynthup ia U bah Kaleptor Khongdup, na Pynursla, uba ka shap jongu, ka dei ha u khlur, nangta sa U bah Biggeston Lyngdoh, na Pynter, uba ka shap jongu, ka long ha u mawbynna bad U bah JF Jeffrey Khonglam, uba na Pynter hi bad ka shong jongu, ka dei ka iing.U bah Hilarius Peter Pyngrope, uba dei U Chairman ka Election Committee ki Saw Raid, u iathuh ba ki don 4,024 ngut ki nongthep vote, kiba dei ki shynrang suda. Ki jaka thep vote, ki long ha Laitmynrieng, Pynursla, Urksew Wahpathaw, Mawpran, Pynter, Siatbakon. Ka jingthep vote, ka sdang naduh ka por 8baje mynstep bad kan kut ha ka por 4baje janmiet bad ka jingniew vote, kan long lashai hi ka janmiet, mar ia dep niew vote.
title: Mynta elekshon Sordar Raid Shabong

content: Shillong, 10 Naiwieng:Ha ka lah sngi u blei kin don ki MLA shimet ki ban risaiñ noh kum ki Parliamentary Secretary ka sorkar jylla bad ha kajuh ka por ruh kin risaiñ na ka jingiadon bynta lang bad ka Congress bad kin weng noh ruh ia ka jingkyrshan jong ki ia ka sorkar MUA-II ba ialam da ka seng Congress.Ki tyllong khubor ki la iathuh ba ha ka lah sngi u blei katto katne ngut ki MLA kum u ma Robinus Syngkon, u bah Stephan Mukhim bad u bah Justine Dkhar kin weng noh ialade na ka jingiadon bynta lang bad ka seng Congress.Kiwei pat ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba kitei ki MLA ki lah ban leit pyniasoh noh sha kawei pat ka seng saiñ pyrthei, hadien ka dorbar tlang jong ka ing dorbar thaw-aiñ jong ka jylla.Lah ban kdew ba ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai ka Meghalaya High Court ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ba ka jingthung ia ki Parliamentary Secretary ha ka sorkar jylla ka long kaba be-aiñ. Lah ban kdew ba ki don haduh 16 ngut ki Parliamentary Secretary ha ka sorkar MUA-II kiba hap ban risaiñ noh bad kitei ki dei ki MLA shimet bad kumjuh ruh ki MLA Congress.
title: La shisngi, yn weng ki MLA  shimet na ka sorkar MUA-II

content: Shillong, 15 Naiwieng:Ka MLA ka East Shillong ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pynpaw ba kam don eiei ban babe ia kaei kaba la shakri hok ha kine ki san snem ba la dep ia ki paidbah ka East Shillong bad ka shong ha ki ban bishar.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, ka Kong Ampareen ka la ong ka la pyrshang ban leh ia kaba bha tam na ka bynta ki paidbah bad ka shong ha ki ban bishar.“Ngam babe ha kine ki san snem ba la dep, bad lada ki paidbah ki shem ba nga bit ban shakri ia ki, ngan pdiang ia kata da ka khmat phuh sam tkhie hapdeng ki jingeh bad ki jingtynjuh” ka la ong.Ka Kong Ampareen ka la jop na Laitumkhrah konstitwensi ha u snem 2008 bad kumjuh ha u 2013 na East Shillong kaba la kylla kyrteng noh.Ha kajuh ka por, ka la ong ba ka party Congress ka dei kaba ryntih kaba pynleit jingmut na ka bynta ka roi ka par jong ki paidbah bad ka la kam ba ha ka liang ka koit ka khiah bad ha ka surok, ka jylla ka la kham biang mynta naduh ba la synshar ka Congress ba la ialam da u Dr Mukul Sangma.Ka la kam ruh ba ki MLA ka party kiba neh kin jop biang ha kane ka kynti, wat hadien ka jingkhih phaloh ka sain pyrthei.Ka la ong ba ka jingiaphet iamih ka dei ka bynta jong ka politik, ha kum kane ka por ba la jan ka elekshon bad kam don eiei ka jingktah ia ka jingthmu jong ki katto katne ban mih noh na ka party ruh.“Ka jingmih bad ka jingrung ka shong ha u briew bad ym lah ban leh eiei”, ka la ong.Ka la kam ba kiba phet sha kiwei ki party ka dei namar ba kim sngew lah iakop shuh ia ka rukom treikam jong u Dr Mukul Sangma bad kim nud ban shuh ban iakop bad u ban iaknieh ia ka kam Myntri Rangbah bad ki sa phet noh da kaba mut dur ban ioh shuki bad bunsien ha ka por elekshon, ki ju kren sniew ia kiwei bad kam ialade kum ki angel.
title: Ngam babe, nga la leh ia kaba  bha tam, ong ka Kong Ampareen

content: Shillong, 15 Naiwieng:U bah Nehru Suting u lah shong thait mynta ka sngi na ka kam kum u director ka Industries ban pynthikna ialade ban iakhun na ka UDP na Pynursla ha kane ka elekshon MLA ban wan.Katkum ka khubor na ka UDP, la iathuh ba u la pynthikna ban iakhun na ka UDP ha kane ka elekshon pyrshah ia u MLA ka Congress uban phet seng noh shen, u Bah Prestone Tynsong.Katkum ka thymmei khubor ba iajan bad ka party UDP, ia ka kyrteng jongu lah ban pynbna noh ha ka thup kyrtong kaba ar, ka ban long ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai da ka UDP.
title: Shong thait u Bah Nehru kum u Director, ban iakhun na UDP

content: Shillong, 15 Naiwieng:Ha kine ki sngi ki khubor ki la saphriang ba u MLA ka UDP na Mawkynrew konstitwensi u bah Remington Pyngrope un leit pyniasoh noh shen sha ka seng NPP bad ia katei ka jingthmu ia soh NPP jong u la iathuh ruh da u bah Prestone Tynsong haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor ha Sohryngkham. Hadien ba la mih katei ka sur u Rupang u la pyrshang ban twad jingmut na ki nongialam ka UDP ha Mawkynrew shaphang ka saiñpyrthei ha katei ka konstitwensi.Haba ia kren bad u General Secretary ka UDP Mawkynrew Circle (lyngba ka telephone) u bah Roland Nongrum. U ba Roland u la ong ba kumba ka long mynta ka la paw ha ki kotkhubor ba u bah Reming un mih noh na ka UDP, “Hynrei haduh mynta u dang dei u UDP bad ngi ruh ngi dang dei ki UDP, hynrei ia kaei ka ban sa mih hadien pat te ngim lah ban tip” ong u bah Roland.Utei u rangbah u la ong ba ka long kaba shisha ruh ba bun ki nongkyrshan kiba la pynjop ia u bah Reming kim sngewtynnad ba un dang ia khun biang na ka UDP, “Kumba ka long mynta bun ki bym da sngewtynnad shuh ha ka Level jong ka Circle, hynrei ngim pat ioh pat ia ka sur jong ki Primary Unit, kumta ngi la pynbeit ban pynlong jingialang paidbah ha ka jingialang ka ban long ha u bnai ban wan, ba ngin pyrkhat sani bha bad ban shim ia ka rai la yn mih seng yn yn ia don biang ha ka UDP” ong biang u bah Roland.U bah Roland u la ong ba ka daw ba ka mih ka jingbym sngewtynnad ha Mawkynrew konstitwensi ka dei namar ka jingiakhun paralok ka UDP bad HSPDP. U la ong ba ha Nongkrem konstitwensi kaba don u MLA na ka seng HSPDP la rai ban pyniakhun beit da u MLA katba ha Mawkynrew pat u MLA dei u UDP la rai ban pyniakhun paralok, “Ha Nongkrem lah ban leh kumta balei ha Mawkynrew ym long ban leh, ia kane ngi la ia kren ruh bad u President rangbah ka UDP u Dr.Don, u la ong ba un pyrshang ban leh eiei hynrei ki khlem leh eiei” pynkut u bah Roland Nongrum haba ia kren bad u Rupang.
title: “Haduh mynta ngi dei ki UDP,  kaei kaba hadien ngim tip”

content: Shillong, 15 Naiwieng:Hadien khyndiat por ba u la pynbna ban ia khun kum u kyrtong shimet ha ka elekshon MLA 2018, u bah Enbin Kharraswai u la shim ia ka rai ban leit pyniasoh noh ialade sha ka Party KHNAM. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba u bah Enbin un risaiñ noh shen kum u dkhot jong ka seng HSPDP bad shen un rung noh sha ka Party KHNAM.Haba ia kren bad ki lad khubor u bah Enbin u la ong ba ka nongrim kaba u ieng nadh ba sdang ha ka politik ka dei ban don ha ki seng riewlum. Ka rai jong u bah Enbin ban mih noh na ka HSPDP ka dei hadien ba ka HSPDP ka la ai tiket sha u bah Renikton Lyngdoh na Mawkyrwat konstitwensi.
title: U bah Enbin na ka KHNAM na Mawkyrwat

content: Shillong,15 Naiwieng:La 8 bnai mynta ym don doktor ha ka PHC kaba don ha Khrang (Khatarshnong )-Sohra konstitwensi bad dei na katei ka daw ka Khatar Shnong Youth Welfare Organisation (KYWO) hapoh ka jing ialam u President Iamang Stone Mawkhiew , u General Secretary Pyntngenlang Khongsit bad ki dkhot ki la leit kynduh ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai ia u Director of Health Service, Shillong ban ia kren ruh ia jingbym thungkam noh ha ka kam Lab Technician ha katei ka PHC kaba la plie naduh u snem 2013.Kham ha shuwa ia kane katei ka seng ka la leit buh shithi ha u DMHO ha ka 18 tarik u risaw bad la kular ban phah doktor bad kumjuh ia u Lab Technician ban trei hapoh katei ka PHC bad ki dang ap ia ka tarik ba kin wan ai ripod. Katei ka seng ka la ong ba ka jingbym don doktor ka dei na ka daw ba ki doktor bad ki nongtrei kim treh ban wan trei sha nongkyndong.
title: 8 bnai ym don doktor ha Khrang PHC

content: Shillong, 15 Naiwieng:Ki Sengbhalang ba kynthup ia ka AJSU bad ka FAJP Sengkmie ki leit khang ia ki nongtrei jong ka surok na Pasyih sha Pamluti-Pammanik bad ka daw, ka long namar ba ki lap ba ka don ka jingkhleh duna ia ka rong bad u mawship bad ba ka bun tang ka pump um suda.La iathuh ba U Secretary Shnong jong ka Pasyih, u Bah Kyrshanmiki Siangshai, ki la ujor sha u kontraktor, hynrei um sngap satia bad kumta ka shnong kam banse ban pyntip noh sha ki Sengbhalang ban leh kaba donkam.Ka seng ka la ia kren bad u Contractor ba shna ia ka surok u Bah Paia Suchiang ba un leh katkum u mawship u ba dei ban leh bad na ka liang u Contractor u la kular ruh ban kit da u Mawship ba bha.Ka Seng ka leit ia kynduh ruh ia u EE PWD Bah Dawhoi Langstang ba kin tuklar lem ba ki Contractor ki shna da ka ka Surok kaba biang.
title: Leit khang airong  surok sha Pasyih

content: Shillong, 16 Naiwieng:Ka JACIPER, kaba kynthup ia ki sengbhalang bapher, kaba dei ka kynhun jong ki nongbuh trok kamai lem bad kiwei de ki seng, ka la ia kynduh mynta ka sngi, ia U Bah T Dkhar, Commissioner and Secretery jong ka sorkar Meghalaya bad kumjuh ia U Commissioner ka tnat ka kit ka bah jong ka sorkar Jylla, ha kaba ki la iakren halor ka jingkwah jong katei ka seng, ban khang ia ki kali kiba nabar, ba kim bit ban kamai kit mar hapoh ka Jylla bad ba ki kompeni dewbilat, ki dei ban pyntreikam ia ka dor ba la buh da ka sorkar Jylla, kaba ha ka 22tarik Nailur 2005, ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkit mar ha ka Jylla.Kitei ki heh sorkar, ki la kular, ba kin pyntreikam ia kitei ki jingdawa jong katei ka komiti, ha une hi u bnai naiwieng, uba mynta.U Bah Handle Mukhim, Chairman jong ka komiti, u iathuh shuh shuh, ba kawei pat ka jingialang, kan long ha ka 18tarik mynta u bnai, ha Hyniewmer, na ka bynta ban iakren halor ki mat, ba la iakren bad ka sorkar bad kiwei de ki kam, kiba dang sah shakhmat.
title: Kynduh ka JACIPER bad ki heh Sorkar

content: Nongpoh, 16 Naiwieng:Ha kawei na ki jingjia pluhiing ba shyrkhei kaba la jia hynne ka sngi ha ka shnong 14 Mile, Sonapur, ka shnong kaba don ha khappud ka Meghalaya-Assam bad ha katei ka jingpluhding ka la wanrah ia ka jingshah bamduh jong ki 20 tylli ki iing ha katei ka shnong.Ka tyllong khubor ia kaba la ioh ban lum da ki Nongthohkhuborr, la iathuh ba katei ka jingjia pluhding ka la jia hynne ka sngi ha ka por 9 baje ei ei mynstep bad katei ka shnong kaba la jia katei ka jingpluhding kam dei shuh ha Meghalaya, hynrei ka la hap hapoh u pud u sam ka jylla ka Assam.La ioh jingtip ruh ba ka daw kaba la wanrah ia katei ka jingpluh kynsan ha katei ka shnong la lah ban dei na ka jingbthei ki tyndong lyer shet jingshet (Cylinder Gas) bad kaba la wanrah ia ka jingpluhding kaba shyrkhei bad ka jingduhnong ia ki iing ki sem kiba la shah bamduh ha katei ka ding.Shuh shuh, la ioh jingtip ruh ba ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi tang mar ia ioh jingtip halor katei ka jingjia, mar mar ki la hiar ha ryngkat ka Kali pynlip ding na ka bynta ban tehlakam ia katei ka jingpluhding. Ha kane ka jingpluhding ha katei ka shnong la iohjingtip ruh ba ki la don arngut kiba la mynsaw bad ia kitei kiba la mynsaw la pynkit noh sha ki jaka sumar.
title: Bam duh ka ding, ia 20tylli ki iing ha khappud Meghalaya-Assam

content: Shillong, 16 Naiwieng:Ki nongialam jong ka GSU, ka ADE bad ka Kingdom Gospel Ministries, ki la ia kynduh ia u myntri rangbah ka Jylla, ha ka 14tarik Naiwieng 2017, ha Shillong bad ha ka jingiakren u myntri rangbah, ula pynsngew ba ka ain aadhar, khlem pep, kan ktah ia ka jinglong jingim shimet jong u briew, ha kaba ki nongshong shnong, kin hap ban pyniasoh ia u aadhar number jongki, ha ka jingiadei bad ki bank account, ki mobile number bad kiwei kiwei de, ka ban ailad ia ki heh spah, ba kin lum jingtip shaphang ka jingdon jingim jong ki riew shimet bad ba kin tuh noh ia ka jingdon jingem jong ki briew shimet, kumba ki la ioh ban rung ha ki 300tylli ki aadhar number, ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep.Katei ka kynhun, ka la ia kynduh ruh ia U CEM, ka JHADC, ha kaba ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew pyrshah jongki ia u aadhar number bad U CEM, ula pynsngew ba un sa lum ia ka jingialang jong ka EC jongu, ban iakren halor katei ka sobjek aadhar. La phah ruh ia kajuh ka dorkhas sha U CEM ka KHADC bad U CEM, ka GHADC ruh kumjuh.Kitei ki seng, ki dawa ia ka sorkar Meghalaya, b akan nym shah ban tam pud ia ka jinglong jingim shimet jong u briew, lyngba ka jing pyntreikam ia ka ain aadhar, namar ba ka jing pynshisha, ka la treikam lypa, lyngba ka jingdon jong ka ID Card, ka reshon Card bad kiwei de.
title: Mynjur lang U MR bad ki Seng  Garo ban pyrshah Aadhar

content: Shillong, 16 Naiwieng:Ka jingkhaïi bad ka jingtih mawshun ha kane ka jylla ka la sangeh la kot da ki snem mynta bad bun kiba la shah ktah naduh ki trap par, ki nongkhaii, ki nongbylla sngi bad ka la ktah ruh sha ki dukan die jingdie, ki trai kali bad ka la ktah ruh ia ka bylla ka sngi ki nongniah kali.Ka lad ban plie biang ia ka jingiakhaïi mawshun ka dei sa tang lada ki nongkhaii mawshun lane ki trai par ki don ia la laisen kaba ki ioh na ka sorkar ban trei ia katei ka kam hynrei katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh lum la ong ba haduh mynta ym pat don ki nongkhaii mawshun lane ki trai par mawshun kiba la ioh ia ka laisen jong ki ban trei ia katei ka kam.Ki nongkhaïi mawshun ha kane ka jylla ki dang shem jingeh haduh mynta ruh ban khaïi mawshun sha Bangladesh bad ka daw ka dei namar ka jingbun jnit bun jnat palat ki lynti ba ki hap ban iaid shuwa ban ioh ia ka laisen. Haba ia kren bad u Rupang ka General Secretary jong ka Meghalaya International Exporters Chamber of Commerce ka kong Doly Khonglah ka la ong ba haduh mynta ym pat don ki nongkhaii mawshun na ki thaiñ Dawki kiba la ioh laisen.Ka kong Doly ka la ong ba ha Nongtalang kaba mut ha Dawki ym pat don ki nongkhaii maw kiba la ioh laisen bad kiba la don ha ka lynti ban ioh dei tang ma ka marwei naba ia ka Mining Plan jong ka la de omynjur hynrei kam pat lah pat ban treikam naba ki dang bun kiwei pat ki jnit ki jnat, “Lada ia kren bniah ia kita ki jnit ki jnat ka shim por ar taiew ban iathuh ha phi” ong ka kong Doly haba kylli kiba kumno kita ki jnit ki jnat. Hynrei ka la shu kdew lyngkot ba hap ban iaid lynti lyngba ki District Council ,nangta sha ki ophis ka sorkar jylla ban ioh ia ka Clearance.Ka la ong ba haduh mynta kiba ioh laisen dei tang kito kiba pyniaid ia u mawthup (Boulder) bad ym pat don kiba ioh laisen mawshun bad kane ka long katkum ka jingtip jong ka ha Jaintia Hills. Ki maw ba iaid mynta na Dawki sha Bangladesh ka la ong ba ki iaid da ka Challan Nongjri katei ruh dei ia u mawthup. Ka kong Doly ka la ong ba kat bym pat ioh ia ka laisen ym don lad ia ki nongkhaii maw ban trei maw. Katkum ka jingiathuh katei ka nongialam ki Exporter ka la ong ba ki nongkhaii ki hap ban pynbiang ia ka Mining Plan hadien kata ki hap ban pyndep ia kiba bun ki kot ki sla haduh ban da ioh Clearance.
title: Ym pat don nongkhaïi mawshun kiba  ioh laisen, bun palat ki jnit ki jnat

content: Shillong, 16 Naiwieng:Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ki la saphriang ki khubor ba u MDC ka Mawkynrew konstitwensi u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh u lah ban ia khun noh na ka seng UDP namar ka jingthmu leit ia soh NPP u MLA ka UDP u bah Remington Pyngrope.Hynrei haba ia kren bad u Rupang u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh uba ju khot ieit kum u bah Paidang u la kyntait ia katei ka khubor bad u la ong ba ka dei ka khubor ka bym shisha.“Ngan ia khun beit na ka PDF, ngam leit satia sha ka UDP, ki dei tang ki khubor ban pynkulmar jingmut ia u paidbah” ong u bah Banteidor.U la kyntait ruh ba kan don eiei ka jingiakren hapdeng jong u bad ka UDP bad u la ong ba kam don eiei ka jingthmu da kumwei pat naba u la rai kut ban ia khun beit na ka PDF.“Nga la kren kham mynshuwa ruh ba ngan ia khun beit na ka PDF, kam don eiei kum kata” u la ong.
title: Ngan ia khun beit na ka PDF: Banteidor

content: Shillong, 16 Naiwieng :Ka bor pyniaid ka NEIGHRIMS ka la pynshai ba kam don kano kano ka jingkhang bam die doh bam ha ki dukan die jingbam kane ka hospital, bad ka jingmih khubor ka long kaba bakla.Haba pynshai halor kane, u Dr. K. K. Pandita, Public Relations Officer, NEIGRIHMS u la ong ba ka bor pyniaid ka NEIGRIHMS ka kwah ban pynshai ba ki ar tylli ki dukan jingbam (canteen) ha kane ka jaka sumar, ki shet ia ki doh bad ki jhur ruh kumjuh sha ki nongpang bad ia ki nongap. Ym don mano mano ba khang na ka liang u Director lane da mano mano ban sangeh ban die doh bam.U Dr. K. K. Pandita u la ong ba ia ki jingbam la song kynthup ki jhur bad ki doh ruh kumjuh. U la ong ba la ai jingbam ar sien ha ka shi sngi ia ki nongpang katkum ka jingbthah ki doktor. Ka jingmih khubor ba ka la don ka jingbthah na ki bor ba dei peit ban nym ai doh bam ha ka hospital kam dei kaba shisha.Lah ban kdew ba dang shen, u MLA ka Nongkrem u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit u la ujor sha u myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka ri u Jagat Prakash Nadda pyrshah ia ka jingpynmih hukum u director ba thymmai ka NEIGHRIMS u Dr DM Thappa bym shah shuh ban die doh ha ki dukan die jingbam ha kane ka jaka sumar.Ha ka shithi sha u Nadda, u bah Ardent u la ong ba u la ioh jingujor na ki paidbah halor kane ka jingbym shah ban bam doh ha kane ka jaka sumar bad kane ka la wanrah ka jingsngew bitar ia ki paidbah.“Nga pynrem jur ia kane bad kyrpad iaphi ban bthah ia ka bor pyniaid ka NEIGHRIMS ban pynsangeh ia kane ka hukum shi syndon bad ban ailad biang ia ki dukan die jingbam ban die ia ki doh”, la ong Bah Ardent.
title: Ym don jingkhang ban ia bam doh,  ha ki dukan ha NEIGRIHMS

content: Shillong, 16 Naiwieng:Napdeng ki MLA shimet kiba kyrshan ia ka sorkar MUA-II ba ialam da ka Congress, dei tang u MLA ka Mookaiaw u Bah Robinus Syngkon uba la pyntip sha u Lamphang ka iing dorbar ba ula weng noh ia ka jingkyrshan jongu, katba kiwei pat kim pat ai jingthoh eiei.U Lamphang ka iing dorbar u AT Mondal u la iathuh mynta ka sngi, ba u la ioh pdiang ia ka shithi na u Bah Robinus Syngkon uba la pyntip ia ka jingbym treh shuh jongu ban kyrshan ia ka sorkar ba ialam da u Dr Mukul Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla.“Nga la ioh pdiang ia ka shithi na u Bah Robinus Syngkon ba la weng noh ia ka jingkyrshan na ka sorkar bad kum u MLA shimet, ym don jingkhang eiei ban leh kumta”, la ong u Lamphang ka iing dorbar.Ka Congress ka don 30 ngut ki MLA kynthup 11 ngut ki MLA shimet ba kyrshan nalor 2 ngut na ka NCP bad uwei na ka North East Social Democratic Party.Ki don 17 ngut ki MLA kiba la risain noh kum ki Parliamentary secretaries hadien ba ka kashari Meghalaya High Court ka la pyniap noh ia ka ain Meghalaya Parliamentary Secretaries (Appointment, Salaries, Allowances and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act, 2005 bad kaba la pynkylla ha u 2016.Ha kawei ka liang, u Lamphang ka iing dorbar u la ong ba ka dorbar tlang kaban dei ruh ka dor kut samoi jong ka jinglong MLA kaba mynta, ka dei ban long ha ne shwa ka 12 tarik Nohprah mynta u snem.Katkum ka rukom, ia ka dorbar dei ban long man ka hynriew bnai hynrei ha kane ka kynti ka sorkar kam shym la pynlong dorbar ha u Nailur namar ba ka la dep pynlong dorbar kyrpang ha u Naitung ban pas ia ka GST.“Ka dorbar tlang ka dei ban long hapoh ka 12 tarik u Nohprah”, la ong u Mondal.U la ong ba namar ba lait na kine ki taiew, la mih sa ki shuti bad ka elekshon ruh ka la jan ha kaba ka tnad election commission ka lah ban pynbna ia ka tarik thep vote ha u Nohprah.Bun ki MLA kiba thmu phet seng ki la ap mynta ban mih noh na ki party hadien ba la kut ka dorbar hynrei ka jingpynslem ban khot ia ka dorbar, ka dei ka buit jong u Myntri Rangbah ban khang lad ia ka jingshah pynkhyllem ka sorkar jongu. Ka dorbar tlang kaban long ha u Nohprah kan long tang ka rukom shwa ban leit biang sha ki paidbah.
title: Pyntip U Bah Robinus bym kyrshan  shuh ia ka sorkar U Mukul

content: Shillong, 16 Naiwieng:Ki nongshong shnong jong ka thain Dangar bad Balat, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew bitar jongki, halor ka jingduh ding kaba khah khah ha katei ka thain.La iathuh ba ka ding ilektrik, la lip naduh hynnin, ha ka por 4baje janmiet bad ka jinglip ding, ka la bteng baroh shimiet bad nangta, ka la meh biang mynta ka sngi, ha ka por 2baje nohsngi bad hadien kata, ka la lip biang, ha ka por 4baje nohsngi bad kat haduh ba thoh ia kane ka khubor ruh kam pat meh satia.Katei ka jinglip ding, ka la ktah ia ki phew tylli ki shnong, khamtam ha kine ki sngi, ba ka dei ka por ialeh eksamin phainal jong ki khynnah skul ha katei ka thain.
title: Duh ding sha thain Balat

content: Shillong, 16 Naiwieng:Ka jingshna ia ka iing dorbar thawain ka Meghalaya ka la long kumba hiar raibi biang ban pyntud na kawei ka por sha kawei. Mynta ka sngi ka jingialang ka High Power Committee (HPC) ka iing dorbar kaba khlieh da u Lamphang, ka la rai ban pyndam noh shwa ia ka jingkhot tender ba la khot da ka tnad PWD da kaba ai daw ba ka la heh palat ka jingoh dor jong ki kompeni kiba la shah jied ban shna ia ka.U Lamphang ka iing dorbar u AT Mondal haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang mynta ka sngi, u la ong ba ka HPC ka la rai ban pyndam noh shwa ia ka tender hadien ba ka dor ba la oh da ki kompeni ban shna ia ka iing, ka long kaba heh palat.Ha ka jingshisha ka HPC ha u bnai ba la dep aiti ha ka tnat PWD ban pyniaid ia ka jingkhot tender ia ki lai tylli ki kompeni ba lah shah jied ba kynthup ia ka Shapoorji Pallonji Co Ltd, ka Simplex Infrastructure Ltd bad ka Shri Gautam Construction Company Ltd.U Mondal u la ong ba ka jingpyndam noh ia kane ka tender ka long hadien ka jingbym sngewiahap ia ka dor ba kine ki kompeni ki la oh.U la ong ba ka Shapoorji Pallonji Co Ltd ka la pan dor haduh 29.92 persen, ka Simplex Infrastructure Ltd ka tam 23.91 persen katba ka Shri Gautam Construction Company Ltd ka pan dor 15.01 persen kaba mut ka jingtrei ba duna haduh T. 15. 84 klur.“Ngi la rai ban pyndam noh shwa ia ka jingkhot tender namar ba ki kompeni ba la shah jied ban pyntrei ki la pan da ka dor kaba heh”, la ong u Mondal.Ka Iing dorbar Meghalaya ka la pluh ha u snem 2001 bad na ka por sha ka por ka HPC ka la ju shong jingialang ban shna biang ia ka hynrei la pyntud biang.Ka sorkar ka la jied ban shna ia ka Iingdorbar thawain kaba thymmai ha Mawdiangdiang ha ka jingheh kaba 80 akar.Ia kane ka iing dorbar thymmai yn sa ioh ban pynlong dorbar hadien ar snem shiteng ne 30 bnai kaba la buh por ban pyndep ia ka bad ka jingthaw ne dro dur ia kane Iing dorbar la aiti ha ka kompeni Design Associate kaba dei na Noida, New Delhi.Ka High Power Committee ka iing dorbar kiba rim ki la jied bun tylli ki jaka hynrei la pynkylla biang ia ka rain a ka por sha ka por. Ha ka jingshisha, la dep buh mawnongrim ruh ban shna ia ka ha Upper Shillong ha jaka ka tnad ka rep ka riang da u Lat ka jylla hynrei kham hadien la pynkylla noh bad mynta ka sorkar ka la pynskhem ban tei beit ha Mawdiangdiang.
title: Pulom biang ka shna iing dorbar,  ba oh dor heh ki kompeni

content: Shillong, 17 Naiwieng:Wat hapdeng ka jinghiran pisa kaba jur, ka kynhun myntri mynta ka sngi ka la pynkiew ia ka tulop thymmai jong baroh ki nongtrei sorkar sha ka 268 percent bad ka arrear ba 40% ban ioh naduh u bnai ban wan. Kane ka khubor ka lah ban pynkmen ia ki nongtrei jylla namar ba kin ioh noh ia ka tulop thymmai naduh u bnai ban wan hi.Kane ka jingpyn-kiew tulop thymmai ka long naduh ka 1 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2017.U myntri rangbah ka jylla u la ong ba ka sorkar hadien ba la bishar ia ka jingai jingmut ka 5th Pay Commission bad hadien ba la bishar bniah biang sa ka Empower Committee ka pdiang ban pynkiew tulop thymmai ia baroh ki kyrdan nongtrei sorkar da kaba khein naduh 1 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2017 bad yn siew ruh ia ka arrear 40 percent.“Mynshwa ka basic jong ki nongtrei grade IV ka long 6500 tyngka bad mynta da ka jingpynkiew thymmai kan kiew sha ka 17500 tyngka shi bnai”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma. Ha ka shi bnai, ka jingioh tulop u peon ne grade IV kam duna ia ka 30,000 tyngka bad u Grade A ym duna ia ka 90,000 hajar ha ka shi bnai.Nalor ka basic, ka sorkar ka la pynkiew lut iwei ki jingai naduh ka bai iing la pynkiew sha ka 8000 tyngka ha sor, 6000 ha district bad 5000 ha kiwei ki jaka.Ka sorkar ka la pynkiew ia ka bai skul kaba 11000 tyngka, ka bai rneng sha ka 7000 tyngka, ka bai syaid ding tlang sha ka 600 tyngka, nalor ka bai leit bai wan bad ka bai sumar la pynkiew. Ia ka bai check-up shisien shi snem ia baroh ki nongtrei sorkar la ai 2000 shi snem. Katba ia ka TA/DA yn ai katkum ka jingbuh ka sorkar pdeng.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba na ka bynta kane ka jingpynkiew tulop, ka sorkar kan hap ban pynlut shuh haduh sa 929 klur na kaba ju pynlut.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ia ka Assured Career Progressive Scheme kaba ju ai ar sien hynrei mynta la pynkiew sha ka lai sien ia ki nongtrei sorkar.“Nga kyrmen ba lyngba ka jingpynkiew tulop thymmai, ki nongtrei sorkar kin ai ia ka jingshakri kaba paka ia ki paidbah bad ka jylla”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la iathuh ruh ba ia ka shuti ia ki longkmie ar met la pynkiew sha ka 260 sngi na kaba mynshwa 120 sngi bad ia u kpa la ai shuti 15 sngi.
title: 268 percent, pynkiew tulop ka  sorkar naduh u ’lyngkot 2017

content: Shillong, 17 Naiwieng:Ka sorkar jylla ka la rai ban ai shuti ha ka 22 tarik Jylliew man u snem kum ka sngi kyrpang ban rakhe ia u Rev Thomas Jone, uwei na ki nongwanrah ia ki dak thoh Khasi (alphabet).U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ia kane ka sngi la pdiang bad rai da ka sorkar ban kynmaw burom ia u Rev Thomas Jones bad kan dei ruh kum ka shuti ha ka jylla.Baroh ki shuti sorkar mynta u snem kan long 24 sngi kynthup 21 sngi ka sngi saitjain bad sngi u Blei bad 11 sngi ki shuti ba pyrkhing.
title: 22 tarik Jylliew, rai ka sorkar  ban ai shuti ia u Thomas Jones

content: Shillong, 17 Naiwieng:U MDC ka Lyng-kyrdem konstitwensi u bah Jansing Tynsong u la pyniasoh ialade sha ka seng NPP mynta ka sngi ha ophis jong katei ka seng kaba don ha Lachumiere. La pdiang burom ia u bah Jansing Tynsong da ki nongialam ka NPP ba kynthup ia u bah jied Kurbah President East Khasi Hills, u Dr.W.R Kharlukhi State President. La synran ia u bah Jansing da ki nongialam jong ka Block Committee jong ka NPP Pynursla bad la synranlang ruh da u MDC ka Sohryngkham u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u bah Jansing, u la ong ba hadien ba u la mih na ka Congress u la iohi ba ka NPP ka dei ka seng kaba suh thied bha ha kylleng ka jylla. U la iathuh ba ha ki bnai ba la dep ka Congress ka la pynduh pyndam noh ia ka Block Congress ha Pynursla bad hadien katei ki nongialam barim ka Congress ha Pynursla, ki la leit ia soh noh sha ka seng NPP bad ha katei ka por u la ong ba um shym la leit ia soh namar ba ki dang don ki kam kiba u hap ban pyndep.U la ong ba ka jingrung seng jong u hapoh ophis ka NPP, ka dei namar ba baroh ki nongialam na Block ki la dep ia soh ha ka jingialang paidbah kaba la long ha Pynursla bad um kwah shuh ban pynbun kam ban lum jingialang paidbah biang. Hynrei la sngewthuh pat ba ka NPP kan pynlong biang ia ka jingialang paidbah ha Pynursla ha ka por ba u bah Prestone Tynsong MLA ka Pynursla un rung sha katei ka seng.Hadien ka jingiasoh u bah Jansing kumba ka long mynta ki MDC kiba don ha ka seng NPP ki la don 3 ngut kata u bah H.S Shylla MDC ka Nongkrem, u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem MDC ka Sohryngkham bad u bah Jansing Tynsong. Ki tyllong khubor ki la iathuh ba shen u MDC ka Laban-Mawprem u bah Ricky Shullai un pyniasoh noh sha katei ka seng. Nalor kitei la iathuh ba ka jingiakren hapdeng katei ka seng bad kiwei pat ki MDC ba kynthup ia u bah Victor Rani MDC ka Jirang ka dang iaid shakhmat.Ha ki khyndiat sngi ba la dep haba ia kren bad u bah Victor u la ong ba ka jingiakren hapdeng jong u bad ki nongialam ka NPP ka dang iaid shakhmat bad u kwah ruh ban pan rai shuwa na ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong u shuwa ba un rung bad u la pynthikna ruh ialade ba un ym ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018. Haba phai sha u bah Ricky Shullai pat la iathuh ba kiba bun ki nongkyrshan bad ki nongialam ba hakhmat jong u hapoh Mylliem konstitwensi ki la rung NPP bad ki la thaw ruh ia ka Block Committee ba shipor (Adhoc) bad shen yn pynskhem pat da ki nongialam ka NPP ha ka por ba u bah Ricky un rung seng.
title: Rung NPP u MDC ka Lyngkyrdem

content: Shillong, 17 Naiwieng:Ki shipai BSF ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) ki la ioh bat ia kawei ka trok 10 shaka kaba don ia u nombar WB-41K2397 bad la bat ia katei ka trok hajan ka jaka ot doh kaba don ha Mawiong, Shillong. Ki la lap ba katei ka trok ka kit khaw bad hapoh khaw la thep ia ki synduk dawai phensedyl kiba don haduh 70 synduk.Ha kawei ka synduk ki don 300 bilor bad baroh ki phensedyl kiba la ioh kurup ki long 21 hajar bilor bad ki shong dor haduh T.26.7 lak tyngka. Ki BSF ki la ioh kem 2 ngut ki briew bad ki la kurup noh ia ki dawai bad kumjuh ia ka trok. Kitei kijba la shah kem ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ujagar Chowdhry (45 snem) uba dei u nongniah uba dei na ka jylla Bihar bad u Prasenjit Devnath (23snem) uba dei nongbud uba na ka jylla Tripura.Ki BSF ki la pyntip ba katkum ka jingiathuh jong kitei kiba shah kem ki la ong ba kitei ki mar ki dei ki jong u Shri Ram Trading Company bad la thep ia kitei ki mar ha Simaria, Barauni (Bihar) ha ka por ba u nongniah um don. Ia kitei ki mar la thmu ban pynpoi sha u Sankar Lal Roy, MG Bazar, Tripura West katkum ba paw ha ka Challan. Katkum katei ka Challan ki BSF ki la ong ba katei ka trok ka dei kaba la mang ban pynpoi 300 byrni u khaw hynrei ki la lap ba don tang 220 byrni u khaw bad kitei ki dawai phensedyl. Ka trok pat ka dei kaba dei trai da u Babul Kumar Chowdhary na ka jylla Bihar. KI BSF ki la iathuh ba ka jingthep ia ka Phensedyl ka dei da ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng u trai kompeni bad u tra itrok bad la thmu ban khaïi tuh sha Bangladesh.
title: 21 hajar bilor kurup phensedyl  na Mawiong, shong dor T.26.7 lak

content: Shillong, 17 Naiwieng:Ka sorkar jylla ka la weng noh ia ka kyndon ban nym shah buh dukan kyiad ha surokbah na ka jingjngai kaba 500 metre sha ka zero metre. Ka kynhun myntri mynta ka sngi, ka la shim ia kane ka rai ha kaba ki briew kiba kwah ban buh dukan kyiad ha ki surok bah ki lah ban leh kumta tangba kim dei ban thoh kyrteng, ne ban tah kano kano ka jingpyni ba ka dei ka dukan kyiad.U myntri ka tnad kyiad, u Zenith M Sangma haba kren hadien ba la wai ka jingialang ka kynhun myntri mynta ka sngi, ka sorkar ka la weng noh ia ka kyndon ka bym shah ban buh dukan kyiad ha ki surok na ka 500 metre sha zero metre kaba mut ba lah ban buh dukan kyiad harud surok lada ioh ia ka NOC na ki jaka ba dei peit.Katba ia ka kyndon ba iadei bad ka jingbuh dukan kyiad ha ki jaka ba don ki hospital, jaka pule, ki iingmane, kan sah kumjuh khlem jingkylla.Ha kajuh ka por, u myntri u la ong ba la pynbna ruh ia ki jaka bym shah ban die kyaid kynthiup 9 tylli ha sor Shillong bad 7 tylli ha sor Tura.
title: Ailad biang ka sorkar ban plie  dukan kyiad ha surok bah

content: Shillong, 17 Naiwieng:U Rejaul Karim Laskar, uba dei u pyrman jong ka All India Congress Committee, uba peit ia ki rit paid ha ka Jylla Meghalaya, Nagaland bad Mizoram, ula wan poi mynta ka sngi ha ka nongbah Shillong.U Laskar, ula ia kynduh ia U Rev L M Vanchhawng, jong ka Shillong Baptist Curch, ha kaba ka jing ia kynduh jongki, ka long kaba ia kynduh paralok.La iathuh ba U Laskar bad U Rev. Vanchhawng, ki la ia kren ia shibun ki mat kiba dei ia ka thain shatei mihngi bad U Laskar, u ong ruh ba ka thain shatei mihngi, ka dei kaba don ia ki jinglong ba kyrpang, ki jingngeit niam bapher bad kitei ki dei ki bynta jong ka jing itynnad jong kane ka thain shatei mihngi. U Laskar, u iaroh ia ka Balang Baptist, ha kaba pynkhlain ia ka jinglong jong ka imlang sahlang ha ka Jylla. ULaskar, u leit jngoh ruh ia ka Cathedral Mary Help of Christians ha Shillong.Ha shwa jong kata, ula ia kynduh ia U Mukul Sangma, myntri rangbah jong ka Jylla ha ka iing sah jongu.
title: U Pastor Balang Baptist bad U Laskar

content: Shillong, 20 Naiwieng:Ki nongshong iew na kylleng ki basa ka ïewduh ki la byrngem ia ki nongialam jong ka Nongiew Association (NIA) bad ki la ong ba kim ithuh satia ia kita ki briew kiba la kam ialade ba ki dei ki Association jong ki nongiew. Ki la dawa ba kitei ki briew kiba kam ialade kum ki nongialam jong ki Nongiew ba ki dei ban mih shakhmat bad ki la byrngem ruh ban pynshitom ia ki, naba ki shim kabu ha ka kyrteng jong ki nongshong iew ban kynthoh ha ki kotkhubor pyrshah ia ka Hima Mylliem.Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ka la don ka jingkynnoh na ki nongialam ka NIA ba ka la don ka jingkhrong pisa jubor ha iewduh na ka bynta ka jinglehniam ïewduh kaba shisien shisnem.Mynta ka sngi katto katne ngut ki nongthohkhubor ki la leit rung ha iewduh ban wad ia ka jingshisha na kiba bun ki nongshong iew ban tip hato la ka don shisha ne-em kata ka jingkhrong pisa jubor kumba la kynnoh da ka NIA hynrei kiba bun ki nongshong iew ki la kyntait ba ka don ka jingkhrong pisa jubor bad ki la ong ba shisien shisnem ka Hima Mylliem ka ju lum pisa bai synniang na ka bynta ka lehniam Iewduh bad katei ka jinglum pisa ka dei katkum ka jinglah ki nongshong iew ban ai sngewbha katba ki mon.Haba ia kren bad ka President jong ka Greater Iewduh Welfare Association ka kong Victoria Marweiñ kaba shong die syiar ka la ong “Kam shym la don ka jingkhrong pisa jubor da ka Hima Mylliem kumba la kynnoh hynrei ka dei ka jinglum synniang kaba shisien shisnem na bynta ka jingleh niam ïewduh , ym shym la oh dor haba wan lum pisa ruh, mano kita ki NIA ngim ithuh satia ia ki, naduh mynno ki thaw seng ha iewduh wat ngi ka seng jong ka Greater Iewduh ruh ngim don jingtip satia ba la mih seng thymmai ha iewduh” ong ka kong Victoria Marweiñ dakaba bynrap biang ba ha katei ka jinglum synniang ki nongiew ki ai katba lah bor don kiba ai 10 tyngka, don kiba ai 50 tyngka, don kiba ai 500 bad wat kiba ai 1000 ne 2000 ruh ka shong ha ka mon jong ki haba ki sngew lah die.Ka kong Phaitimai Kharbhih kaba shong die phan ha basa phan ka la ong ” Kumba long manla u snem ngi ju ai da kaba sbun mynsiem katba ngi lah ei na bynta ka synniang lehniam iewduh, don haba bha kamai ngi ai kham bun, haba ym long kamai pat ngi katkum ka burom, la shu kynnoh tang ban pynthohbria ia ka jingiadei jong ngi ki nongiew bad ka Hima Mylliem” ka la ong.Ka kong Diamond Sawkmie kaba shong die sying ka la ong “Ngi shu iohi ha ki kotkhubor bad ngi sngewkyndit ban mih kum katei ka jingkynnoh bym hok ba la khrong pisa jubor, ym shym la wan khrong jubor na ngi , ki myntri ki la wan ki kren da ka jingsngewtynnad ia bam kwai ia thuh khana kumba ju long , ngi ai sngewbha mynsiem ia katei ka synniang iewduh kumba ngi leh manla u snem, mano kita ki briew kiba kam nongiew ialade katne khrui ngi ia don hangne ong ia ki ban wan shakhmat ngin ia peit” ong ka kong Diamond Sawkmie. Ki paralok jong ka Sawkmie kiba ia donlang hajan ki la ong “Ngi sngewsih ban shu kynnoh ia ka Hima Mylliem, ngi im ja kpoh na iewduh, ngi buh skul khun na iewduh, ngi ioh baroh ki jingdonkam ha ing ba ka don ka iewduh balei yn shu kynnoh bym hok kumta, sei ai kita ki briew hangne ngin khang syndon ba kin wan ha iewduh”.Ban pynshisha shuh shuh ia katei ka jingkynnoh ki nongthohkhubor ki la leit ban ia kren bad kawei ka tymmen briew kaba shong die ktung ha basa ktung ka kong Sngewbha Kharbudon katei ka tymmen ka la kyntait ba ka shah khrong pisa jubor ne kaba shah oh dor bad ka la ong, “Em bah bah kam shym long kumta kumhba don ba kynnoh , hangne ngi aid a ka mon sngewbha lajong katba ngi sngewlah, ka don ka paralok jong nga ruh kaba shong iew ha Laban ka de ikaba dang bat niam Tynrai hynrei haba don jinglehniam ha iewduh ka ju noh synniang lang bad ka ong ha nga lada don ba lum pisa na bynta ka lehniam Iewduh sa pyn ai lem, ngi la shong hangne bun snem kam ju don bah bah kum kata ka jingoh dor” ong ka kong Sngewbha Kharbudon.
title: “Ngim ithuh ia kita ki briew”  byrngem ki nongshongiew ia ka NIA

content: Jowai, 20 Naiwieng:Ha ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Parish Priest jong ka Parish Barato bad u Pastoral Parish Council, U Rev. Phadar John Michel Myrboh bad ma Rossario Dkhar, la ong ba ïa ka ïingmane bathymmai jong ka Parish Barato kaba la ainam ha u Khrist u Syiem yn wan plie da u ma Vincent H Pala M.P kum u Kongsan, ma Robinus Syngkon MLA ka thainñ u Symbud Kongsan bad yn kyrkhu da ka Umkhuid Umkyntang da u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh D.D. Bishop ka Jylla niam Jowai, ha kane ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai.La ong ruh yn don ka Knia ka Khriam (Mass bakhuid) ha ka por 10 baje mynstep ka ban lamkhmat da u Bishop Victor Lyngdoh ha ryngkat ki Lyngdohsohblei na ki shnat niam bapher bapher jong ka Jylla niam Jowai kum ka dak ka jingsngewnguh bad ainguh ïa u Blei uba la ïarap lyngba ki nonglehbha haduh ba la lah ban tei bad pyndep ïa kane ka ïingmane kaba heh bad kaba itynnat.Na ka liang ka Parish Pastoral Council jong ka Parish Barato ka la kyntu ïa ki Riewngeit na ki Parish bapher bapher jong ka Jylla niam Jowai bad nabar ba kin ïa wan shim bynta ha kane ka sngi kum ka dak ka jingïakmen lang bad ainguh ïa u Blei ha kane ka sngi ba kyrkhu bad ainam ïa kane ka ïingmane ha ka kyrteng bad ka nam jong u Nongpynim, u Jisu Khrist, u Khrist u Syiem.La ong ruh ban poi sha Barato na ka bynta ki riewngeit kiba na ki Parish ka East Jaiñtia Hills ka suk bad ka jan ba kin wan na u surok PWD Raliang Laskeiñ Barato kumjuh ïa ki riewngeit na ka Parish Jowai bad Amlarem katba ïa ki Parish na Ummulong, Mynsngat Namdong bad ïa ki riewngeit kiba wan na ka Archdiocese Shillong na u surok PWD Ummulong-Nartiang Nongjngi Barato pynkut ka kyrwoh.
title: Yn plie iingmane thymmai ha Barato

content: Shillong, 20 Naiwieng:Halor ka jing ujor jong U Madal Sumer na Jowai, U Lat, ula pynshai mynta ka sngi, ba u dang iakren bad ka tnat elek-shon jong ka sorkar India, halor katei ka phang.U Lat u iathuh ba U Ma Sumer, ula ia kynduh ia u, ha ka 16tarik Naiwieng 2017, ha kaba ula dawa ruh, ba dei ban pynduh noh ia ka jinglong dkhot jong ki 17ngut ki MLA, kiba la shah rai pynrem ha ka Kashari.La iathuh da ka kyrwoh na U Lat ka Jylla, ba ula iakren ia katei ka kam bad ka Election Commission of India, na ka bynta ban pyntreikam katba kum ka Article 192 (2) jong ka riti synshar Ri, ha kaba ula phah ha katei hi kajuh ka sngi bad katei ka kam, kam shym la sahkut satia ha ka miej jong U Lat, ong shuh shuh ka kyrwoh.
title: “Ban mait ia 17ngut ki MLA,  yn rai ka Election Commission”

content: Nongstoiñ, 20 Naiwieng:Kawei ka kali Tata Spacio kaba don ia u number AS01 AC 7760, ka la ing khong khait hadien ba la suba jur ba la thang dusmon ia ka da ki runar kiba ym shym pat la lah satia ban tip kidei ki ei.Katkum ka tyllong khubor bala ioh lum la ong ba katei ka kali ka dei jong u wei u rangbah u bala tip kum u Naresh S Marak na ka shnong Nongrisan khappud bad ka jylla Assam kaba don sha ka thain Aradonnga West Khasi Hills.Shuh shuh la ong ruh ba katei ka jingjia kala jia ha ka miet jong ka sngi u Blei ha kapor kumba 10:30 mynmiet ha Tengabari ka jaka ba kynjah kaba don hapdeng jong ka shnong Aradongnga bad Tynghor ia kaba la set miet ruh ia katei ka kali ha katei ka jaka.Na ka liang jong ki pulit ki dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah khnang ban lap ia ki jingshisha.
title: Ingkhong ka kali, ha ka  jaka ieng ha Tengabari

content: Shillong, 20 Naiwieng:Ka Seng Khasi ka pynbna ba kan rakhie ïa ka Lyngkhuh Snem ba 118 ha ka 23 tarik Naiwieng 2017 – Ka Sngi Seng Kut Snem – ha Lympung Weiking, Jaïaw, Shillong.Ha kane ka sngi bakhraw ka jaitbynriew Hynñiewtrep, yn don ruh ka jing duwai mynstep ha ka por 8:00 baje ha Ïng Seng Khasi, Mawkhar, Shillong bad ka jing ïa Ïaid Pyni Riti ha ka por 9:00 baje mynstep na Madan Iewrynghep, Laitumkhrah sha Lympung Weiking, Jaïaw.Yn don ruh ka jingïalang paidbah ha ka por 1:00 baje nohphai sngi ha Lympung Weiking ban sa bud da ka cultural prokram.Kumta ka Seng ka ïawer ïa ki parakur parakha, para riew Seng Khasi Sein Raij na ki tnat baroh bad ki paralok parajor ba kin ïapoi khnang khnang ban pyniphuh pyniphieng ïa katei ka Sngi bakhraw jong u khun Khasi Khara. Ki tnat Seng kiba kwah ban ai ha ki program pyni riti bad kiba kwah ban shim bynta ha ka Ïaid Pyni Riti kin sngewbha ban pynpoi ïa ka jing pyntip hapoh ka 15 tarik u Naiwieng 2017 sha u General Secretary ka Seng Khasi Seng (Kmie).
title: Ka seng kut snem kaba 118

content: Shillong, 20 Naiwieng:U President ka MPCC u Bah DD Lapang u la ong ba ki paidbah ka jylla ki dei ban nym ar tatien ban jied ia ka Congress ha ka elekshon ban wan, khnang ba kin nym babe hadien.Haba kren mynta ka sngi ha ka jingrakhe ia ka jingdap ka sngi kha ba shispah snem ka Indira Gandhi ka myntri rangbahduh barim ka ri, u bah Lapang u la ong ba ka Congress kan nym troin, hynrei kan sa khie im biang bad kan sa pynshisha sha ka pyrthei hadien ka elekshon.“Ka Congress kan khie im biang hadien ka elekshon bad kan pynshisha sha ka pyrthei hadien ka elekshon ba ki paidbah kin nym baba lada kin jied ia ka Congress”, la ong u bah Lapang.U Bah Lapang u la ong ba ong ba ka Indira ka dei ka nongialam kaba tbit naduh ba ka dang khynnah bad ka pynshisha hadien ba ka la long ka myntri rangbahduh ka ri ia ka jingtbit bad ka jingshemphang jongka.“Ka Indira Gandhi naduh dang khynnah ka dei ka politishian kaba tbit”, la ong u Bah Lapang.Ha kawei ka liang halor ka jingdon ki MLA ban phet seng ha kane ka jylla, u Bah Lapang u la ong ba ka seng, kan bishar ia kane bad kan leh ia kaba donkam.“Ka Disciplinary Committee kan sa shim ia ka rai ban leh ia kaba donkam”, u la ong.Kane ka jingong u bah Lapang ka long hadien ba ki don ki MLA ka party kiba la kren pyrshah ia ka seng bad ia ki nongialam ha ka jingialang paidbah watla ki dang don ha ka party.Lah ban kdew ba u Bah Prestone Tynsong u MLA ka Congress na Pynursla, u la kren pyrshah ia u nongialam ka party u Dr Mukul Sangma ha ka jingialang ka NPP kaba long ha Mawryngkneng dang shen bad u la kam ruh ba un risain noh ia ka kam MLA shwa ban long dorbar tlang khnang ba un ialeh noh na ka NPP ha kane ka elekshon ban wan na katei ka party thymmai.
title: Jied ia ka Congress ba phin nym  babe hadien, ong u bah Lapang

content: Shillong, 20 Naiwieng:Ka Join Action Committee (JAC) jong ki shnong ka thain ba hap ha ka projek ka Mawphu Hydro Electric Project (MHEP) Stage II (85 MW) kynthup ka shnong Mawphu, Thieddieng, Umblai, Nongsteng ka la kam ba ka jingmih khubor ha kine ki sngi ba don ki briew ba pyrshah kam da long kaba shisha, namar ba kiba bun ki pdiang bad ki don katto katne ngut kiba pyrshah ia kane ka projek.“Ha ka kam paidbah, ki ju don hi katto katne ngut kiba pyrshah, ym lah ban pynhun lut hynrei kiba bun ki paidlang ki kyrshan ia ka projek”, la ong u James Neng uba dei u chairman ka JAC haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi.U la ong ba ka jingmih ha kawei ka lad pathai khubor ba ka jingsngap paidbah ba long ha ka 9 tarik Naiwieng, ha Dainthlen, kiba bun ki pyrshah ia kane ka projek, ka long kaba bakla bad ka bym shisha bad ka long kumba shah shiliang.“Ngi kwah ban pynshai ba haduh mynta, ki paidbah ka thain ki pdiang sngewbha, hynrei kumba ju long ha kano kano ka kam, ki don hi katto katne ngut kiba pyrshah ia kano kano ka kam”, u la ong.U la ong ba ha ka jingsngap paidbah ba long ha ka 9 tarik Naiwieng, ki don ki trai shnong kiba pyrshah hynrei ym pat lah ban ong ba ki jaka jongki kin hap ha kane ka projek namar ba ka sorkar kam pat wan thew.“Katkum ka jingpynkhreh ka NEEPCO, ka shnong Thieddieng kaba shah 93 hektar yn ktah ia ka shnong Thieddieng”, la ong.U bah Neng u la ong ba kaba sngew khia ka long ba ka jingpyrshah ka bym don nongrim namar ba lada ki dei ba shong nongrim ma ki ruh kin kyrshan lang.“Ki ong ba ka um kan tap ia ka shnong Thieddieng hynrei kam dei kumta namar ba ka dam ba shna ka dei kaban shu tuid beit (running dam), u la ong bad bynrap ba ka jingong la tih ia ka tunnel, hynrei kumno ka lah ban long haba tang ban sdang ruh ym pat sdang ia ka kam, bad kane ka dei tang ka jingialam bakla.
title: Tang katto katne, kiba pyrshah ia  ka bording Mawphu, kam ka JAC

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:Ka Supreme Court, ka la shah ban kit dewiong, na ka bynta saw bnai kynthih, lyngba ka hukum jong katei ka kashari heh duh, kaba long mynta ka sngi.Ha ka jing pyllait khubor, ka State Co-ordination Committee of Coal Owners, Miners & Dealers Forum, (Forum) ka pynpaw ia ka jing sngewsting bad kmen halor ka hukum bala pynmih da ka Iing Bishar Badonburom jong ka Supreme Court mynta ka sngi ka 21 U Naiwieng 2017 ban ai lad ia ka jingkit ia U mar poh khyndew bala dep tih U dewiong na ka bynta saw bnai.Ka Forum kum kawei na ki kynhun kaba la leit ban pyniasoh ia ka mukotduma saw bnai mynshwa ban kyrpad ia ka iing bishar ban shah ban die ia U dewiong bala dep sei, ka sngewnguh ia ka jingsngap ia ka jingkyrpad jong ka da ka iing bishar ba ha khlieh duh jong ka Ri.Ka Forum halor kane ka phang ka pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewnguh halor ka jingtrei shitom jong ki nongiasaid ain kiba la mih khmat ia ka Forum, U nongiasaid ba pawkhmat jong ka Supreme Court U Nalin S Kohli, ha ryngkat ka kynhun jong U kaba kynthup ia U P.Yobin, U Saurabh Sharma, U Jogender Handoo bad U Prabhas Bajaj.Ha ka jing iakren bad U Ma Balius Swer, uba dei u nong aiktien jong ka Co-ordination Committee bad uba dei ruh U President ka Jaintia Coal Miners Association, Jowai, u iathuh ba u dewiong uba la pyllait ha u snem ba ladep, u long 23lak ton, ha kaba la ai bor da ka Supreme Court, ba la pyllait naduh U Nailar 2016 haduh U Rymphang 2017 bad mynta ia uba sah sa 7lak ton, yn pynlut ha ki saw bnai ban sa wan, ka ban long naduh U Nohprah 2017 bad la iathuh da U Ma Balius, ba ka dor jong une u dewiong, uba sah kan long T.472klur.
title: Sdang khaii dewiong: 4 bnai, ai  bor ka Supreme Court ban die dewiong

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:Ka BJYM Meghala-ya ka la rai ban pynlong ia ka rally pyrshah bamsap ha nongbah Shillong, Jowai bad ha Garo Hills shi bynta ban thad madan ia ki kam bamsap kane ka sorkar Congress ba la ialam da u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma.Ha ka kyrwoh ba la pynlait mynta ka sngi, u president ka BJYM Meghalaya u Bah Egenstar Kurkalang u la ong ba ia kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingialang jong ka seng kaba long mynta ka sngi hadien ba la iathir bha bun ki mat.Ha ka jingialang la don u Satyendra Tripathi u Co-In charge ka BJP Meghalaya bad la la shim ia ka rai ban pynlong da ka jingialang bad rally ha Shillong, Jaintia Hills bad Garo Hills ban pyrshah iaka jingbamsap bad jingkuman jong ka sorkar jylla ban ai iaka hok ki paidbah ka jylla, la ong u Bah Egenstar.Ka rally kan sdang ha u Nohprah ha Nongbah Shillong da ka Bike Rally, u la ong.U la ong ba ka BJYM ka lah pynrem jur ruh ia u Dr.Mukul Sangma uba u ai jingiada pynban ia ki myntri jong u kiba donkti ha ka kam tah sia lieh ha ka jingthep kam nonghikai wat la ka High Court ba don burom ka jylla Meghalaya ka lah dep pynmih ia ka hukum ban pynshitom ia kiba donkti.Halor kane ka BJYM ka dawa ia u myntri rangbah ban pynshitom bad pynhiar shuki mardor iaka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba dei ka myntri ha kato ka por kumjuh ban kem ban pynshitom ruh ia baroh ki myntri, MLA, MDC bad ki heh sorkar ba don kti ha kane ka kam.U la ong ba ka BJYM ka dawa ba dei ban pynduh noh iaka jinglong nongmihkhmat jongki namar kine ki kam beain ba ki leh bad lada u Myntri Rangbah um lah ban pynshitom iaki, u dei ban hiar noh ialade.
title: Ka rally pyrshah bamsap ka BJYM

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:Kum shi bynta ban pynneh ia ka ktien tynrai jong ki jaka,ka HNLC ka kyntu iaki Sengbhalang khamtam iaki Samla ka jaidbynriew ba lada kaSorkar kam lah ban pyndonkam ia ka bor u khulom bad ka sia,ka lah dei ka por, ba kin pyndonkam da ka bor u brut bad ki rong, ne ki lah ban phah tang ka kyrteng bad ka jaka sah ba tikna ki heh Sorkar kum ki SDO; te ka HNLC kan sa leh ia kaba donkam, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Sainkupar Nongtraw, uba dei u nong aiktien jong ka seng HNLC. “Ka kyrteng dkhar ha ki jaka jongngi, kata ka mut ba katkum ki hok, kihok salonsar ki jaka jongngi kim dei shuh ki nongkynti jongngi, hynrei kin kylla long tang kum ki ‘colony’ ki kynrad(Slave-masters)” ong shuh ka khubor na katei ka seng.
title: Phah kyrteng ia ki SDO bad ka seng  kan leh ia kaba donkam: HNLC

content: Shillong, 24 Naiwieng:U president ka NPP Mawlai uba la risain noh u bah Sylvester Kurbah uba khot u Bah Best u la kynnoh ba ka NPP ka dei ka party kaba long thik kum ka kyiad rim ba shu bujli ha u bilor thymmai, kaba mut ba ka dei ka party kaba pdiang ia kijuh ki briew na kiwei ki party bad kyntait ia kiba thymmai.“Ka NPP ka dei ka party kum ka kyiad rim ba shu bujli ha u bilor thymmai”, la ong u bah Sylvester haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi lem bad ki nongkyrshan jongu.Kane ka jingkynthah u Bah Sylvester ka long hadien ba ki nongialam ka NPP ka la kren shai ha ka jingiakren bad u mynta ka sngi ba kan nym pynieng kyrtong na Mawlai hynrei la shu bthah ia u ban trei ia ka party.U la ong ba ki nongialam ka party kynthup u President u Dr. Wanwei u la shu pyntip ba ka party kan nym pyniakhun ia ka elekshon na Mawlai khlem da ai ia ki daw. “Ki khot iakren ha ophis mynta mynstep bad ki la shu pyntip ia ngi ba ka party kan nym pyniakhun kyrtong na Mawlai khlem ai daw eiei”, la ong u Bah Sylvester,U la ong ba naduh mynshem snem u la iasoh bad ka NPP hadien ba ki nongialam ki la dak ba un iaid shakhmat ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon bad namar kane ka daw, u la risain noh ia ka kam kum u Superintendent ka tnad Mines & Mineral ka KHADC da ka Voluntary Retirement Scheme (VRS). Ia mynta u dang bat kum u Rangbah Shnong ka Mawlai Phudmuri.“Nga la rai ban iakhun noh kum u kyrtong shimet ha kane ka elekshon lyngba ka jingai jingmut ki nongkyrshan”, la ong u Bah Sylvester bad bynrap, “Ka jingrai ka NPP ka long kum ka jingtheh umpjah bad ki paidbah ki la ong ban mih noh na ka party bad ban iakhun kum u kyrtong shimet”.U la ong ba ka party kam da don jingktah ha ka elekshon namar ba kaba kongsan ha ki paidbah ka long ban peit bad bishar ia u briew.Ula ong ba lada ki Paidbah kin jied, u don ka thong ban btin lynti ban ha ka seng kam seng jam, khamtam ha kane ka juk kyrduh kam nalor kiwei pat ki mat.
title: Ka NPP kum ka kyiad rim ha  u bilor thymmai, ong u Bah Best

content: Jowai, 24 Naiwieng:Ki pulit ka Amlarem mynta ka meit ha ka por kumba 10:30 pm eiei ki la ioh kem ia 3 tylli ki trok kiba kit dewiong be-ain bad kiba thmu ban shallan tuh ia u dewiong na Skhentalang sha Assam.Kitei ki lai tylli ki trok kim don satia ia ki Challan lane ki kot ki sla kiba pyni ba ka jingshallan dewiong kam long satia kaba be-ain khamtam haba la khang pyrshah da ka iing bishar badon burom ka National Green Court.Kitei ki trok kidei kiba don ia u Nombar ML04 A 6665, ML04 A 3024 bad ML04 A 8668.Ki suba donkti kiba dei ki trai bad ki nongniah ia kitei ki trok ki la hap ban wan hajiar namar ki pulit ki la dep sam notice ia ki hapoh ka kyndon Section 41A.Kitei ki ba la shah suba donkti ki kynthup ia u trai dewiong, u Sper Ryngkhlem bad u driver jong u u Shnalad Dkhar (ML04 A 8668), u Obet Nanglein (owner) bad u Driver jong u u Kitlang Ryngkhlem (ML04 A 3024) bad ka kong and Meriful Ryngkhlem (owner) bad u driver jong ka u bah Salandoo Pakyntein ( ML04 A 6665).Kadei ka jingshisha ba u Dewiong um don shuh ha rilum Jaintia hynrei tang namar ba ki la pyni bun palat ha ka por ba ki briew ka NGT lane ka sorkar ki la wan ban leh ia ka Assesment, u dewiong u dang sah haduh mynta katkum ki kot ki sla, katba ha ka jingshisha pat ka jingtih tuh ia u dewiong ka dangiaid shait shait tang ban pyni ba ki shu shallan ia uba la don lypa.Ka jingtrei dewiong ka dang iaid shait shait ha thain bapher bapher ka rilum Jaintia.
title: Kem ki pulit 3 ki trok kit dewiong

content: Shillong, 24 Naiwieng:Ka HNLC, mynta ka sngi, ka la sei madan ia ka jingthoh, kaba ka la ioh pdiang na U bah M Kharkrang Superintendent of Police bad katei ka seng, ka dawa ia ka sorkar Jylla, ba kan kem ia U bah Kharkrang ruh, kumba ka la kem ia ki arngut ki dkhot jong ka Arts of Living, na Dawki ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep.Ka shithi jong U bah Sainkupar Nongtraw, kaba la phah sha ki kotkhubor, ka pyni ia kaba u thoh sha U DGP, Meghalaya Police, kaba ha ka 13tarik Nailar (ka bym thoh snem, wat la lehse, ka lah ban dei kaba mynta hi u snem) bad kaba ula phah lyngba U Bah M Kharkrang SP East Khasi Hills (barim), ha kaba U bah Sain, ula ai burom ia ki pulit, ba ki leh donburom ia kiba ha iing jong U bah Nongtraw, haba ki leit sha Sohra, ha kitei ki sngi. La ong U bah Sainkupar, ba ha u snem 2003, ha ka por ba u kpa jongu, u shitom eh, hynrei ki pulit ki pyndik ia kiba ha iing ha sem jongu, da kaba ki leit wad ia U bah Sainkupar Nongtraw.La ong shuh shuh U bah Nongtraw, ba ha u snem 2014, ki la don ka jingthmu ban poi sha ka jing iasuk bad ban iakren bad ka sorkar jylla, kumba la tyrwa da U Lat ka Jylla bad u myntri rangbah, U Mukul Sangma. Halor katei ka shithi, la pyni shuh shuh, ba U bah Nongtraw, ula ioh jubab na U bah M Khakrang Spl SP Special Branch, ha ka 18tarik Nailar, ha kaba ula ai ruh ia u number jongu, ba un kren da ka mobile.Nangta ha ka 21tarik Naiwieng, U Bah Nongtraw, ula ioh pdiang biang ia ka email, na U bah Kharkrang, ha kaba u ong “Bah Sain Kyrmen ba phi la ioh ia ki emails jong nga ba nga phah myn ha kane tangba nga khlem pat ioh jubab ei ei na phi. Sngew bha sa phone ne sa thoh sha nga kumno phi pyrkhat namar nga lah iapynbeit bad u DGP bad ngi la kloi ban pdiang ia phi ba phin wan phai noh sha la iing ban iashem bad ki bahaiing bahasem baroh. Sngewbha sa phone ne sa jubab . ngan nang iai khmih lynti ia ka jubab jong phi”.Hadien katei ka shithi, U Bah Sainkupar Nongtraw, ula thoh sha U bah Kharkrang, ha ka 22tarik Naiwieng, ha kaba ula ong “Khublei Bah…Nga sngewnguh iaka jingtyrwa jongphi,tangba phin rah shimet ianga kan nym don jingmyntoi lada phim lah ban rah iaka seng kum ka kynhun baroh kawei sha ka miej jingiakren bad ka Sorkar. Phi iohi wat hadien ba u Bah Julius Dorphang u lah pyndem ka jingialeh ka HNLC kam pat kut hi haduh mynta”.Haba iakren bad U bah MH Khakrang, u mynjur ba ka don ka jing ia thoh email bad U bah Sainkupar, tangba ka jingmut jongka, ka long ba un wan pyndem noh ialade bad kam dei ba kan don ka jingiakren iasuk bad ka sorkar bad u mynjur ruh, ba ka jingphah email, kaba khatduh jongu, ka long ha ka 21tarik Naiwieng 2017.
title: Tyrwa ki pulit Meghalaya ban pdiang  ia U bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw

content: Shillong, 26 Naiwieng:Ka NPP 17- North Shillong, ka ioh jingtip, ba U bah Don War, uba na Mission Compound, u pynpaw pyrthei bha ialade ha kine ki sngi, ba un ialeh ia ka elekshon MLA 2018, na ka seng NPP. Ka kyrwoh na katei ka seng, ka ong ba utei u briew, um shym la leit satia sha ka Constituency Committee ban pynrung kyrteng bad kumta, la ong, ba u briew, uba iaid lait ia ki rukom treikam jong ka seng, yn nym lah satia ban pdiang.Ka NPP jong ka 17-North Shillong, ka ong shuh shuh, ba u dei tang U bah Erwin K Syiem Sutnga, uba la pan tiket ban ialeh na katei ka seng bad ka seng, ka dang ap ia ka rai jong ka elekshon komiti jong ka Jylla, ba kan rai ia ka tiket jong U bah Erwin Sutnga, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Gordon Kharchandy, President, bad U bah Shaphar Rani Chairman, Organising Committee NPP 17 North Shillong Constituency Committee.
title: Ngim ithuh ia U bah Don  War, ong ka NPP NS

content: Shillong, 26 Naiwieng:Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew ki shipai BSF ki la ioh kurup Ganja 31 kilo kiba shongdor T.3,10,000 tyngka bad ha katei ka jingjia ki la ioh kem 3 ngut ki briew kiba donkti ban khaïi tuh.Kitei ki 3 ngut ba la shah kem la tip kyrteng kum u Majibur Rahman na Guwahati (Assam), u Shekhaful Islam na Silchar (Assam) bad u Niranjan Das na Silchar (Assam). Ki shipai BSF ki la ioh kurup ruh ia ka Tata Pick up kaba don ia u nombar AS-01-GC 5115.
title: 31 kilo, kurup Ganja ki BSF

content: Shillong, 26 Naiwieng:U Chief Adviser jong ka HSPDP Mawkyr-tung Unit -Rambrai konstitwensi u bah Rock Marweiñ ryngkat ki nongbud jong u kumba 50 ngut eiei ki la mih noh na ka seng HSPDP bad ki la leit ia soh sha ka seng BJP ha ka 16 tarik u naiwieng. La thung ia u kum u President jong ka BJP Mawkyrtung Unit bad u Bony Lyngdoh kum u Secretary. U bah Rock u la ong ba ka jingmih noh jong u na ka seng HSPDP ka dei namarba la 40 snem mynta ym don ka roi ka par kumba ki la kular bad ki la shu thok lynter.U bah Rock bad kiwei ki nongkren ha katei ka sngi ki la ong ba ka BJP ka don ka jingkyrmen ban jop namar u kyrtong un dei u Garo u Sumis Marak uba tang marwei na ka jaitbynriew Garo. Ki la ong ba ki Vote Garo ki don 12 hajar tang uwei u kyrtong katba ka vote Khasi ka don 20 hajar 4 ngut ki kyrtong. Ki ong ba ki Garo ki ia tylli bad ki kwah ban ioh ia ka vote Khasi tang kumba 2000 tam ban pyntikna ia ka jingjop.
title: Phet seng ki HSPDP  Rambrai sha BJP

content: Shillong, 26 Naiwieng:Ka thain Nongrah kan sa ioh um noh shen sha ki thliew iing sha ki shnong hadien ba ka tnad PHE ka sorkar jylla ka la pyntreikam ia kane ka skhim lyngba ka Nongrah Water Supply Scheme Phase I.Ia kane ka skhim sam um ba la shu tan napoh khyndew, la urlong lyngba ka jingiasaid u MLA ka thain u Dr Jemino Mawthoh ha kine ki sngi haduh ba kan urlong syndon.Ha kane ka sngi Saitjain, ka mashin tan um ka la sdang ia ka kam jongka, da kaba ksam ia ka um na jaka ba don ha shnong Nongrah ba la wan ban sakhi u MLA bad ki nongkitkam shnong bad kiwei.Ia kane ka skhim la mang ha ka jinglut kaba T.5.92 klur na ka skhim MNP ban sam um sha ki shnong ba kynthup ia ka Marboh, Nonglum, Nongrah, Nongpdeng,Pohtoin kiba don baroh 12021 ngut ki nongshong shnong.“Kane ka shnong Nongrah mynta lah bun bun snem ki briew kila ia ud lah nam namar ba ym don um ban sam sha ki iing briew bad sha ki dong ki shnong bapher bapher”, la ong u MLA u Dr Jemino bad bynrap ba da ka jingpyntreikam ia kane ka skhim, ka jingkyrduh um kan duna nangne shakhmat.U la ong ba ha Nongrah ki don kumba 5 tylli ki dong bad kawei kawei ka dong kumba 4 tylli ki block bad don ki dong ba don 5 tylli ki block bad ka shnong ka lah heh bha bad kumba long mynta ha Nongthymmai constituency lah ban ong ba ka shnong Nongrah ka long ka shnong ka long ba heh tam eh.“Ha kane ka shnong ngim duna shuh ia ka 10 hajar tam namar lada ngi shim na ka electoral roll haba iadei bad ki nongthep vote ruh ki lah don lupa kumba 4700 tam”, u la ong.U la ong ba ha Nongthymmai constituency ki ba bun ki shnong ki hap hapoh ka Greater Shillong Water Supply Scheme phase III, hynrei ka Nongrah bad ka Lapalang kim don hapoh kane ka scheme.U la ong ba kaba sngewsih ka long kane haba ka Greater Shillong Water Supply Scheme kaba lah sdang naduh lehse 2009 ia ka sor shillong ruh ym pat lah ban pyndap ia ka um bam um dih.“Kumba T.17 klur ngi lah shah ot na ka Greater Shillong Water Supply scheme namar ka sorkar jylla ka khlem iaid katkum ki kyndon ba la buh da ka sorkar pdeng ka lah buh ban wanrah ha ka sor Shillong”,ula ong.U la on ba u la buh jingkylli hapoh iing dorbar lano ka Nongrah kan ioh um ka jubab ka long ba ka Nongrah kan wan ha ka phase IV.“Lada ha ka phase III ruh mynta lah bun bun snem ba lah sdang naduh 2008-09 kim pat lah ban pyndep ban pynbiang ia ka um bam um dih ia ka sor Shillong hi baroh kawei, te ka Nongrah lei da ki ong ban pynrung ha ka phase IV tate ngim tip shuh ha u snem aiu ngin ioh”,ula ong.U la ong mynta u snem na ka jingtrei shitom u Chief Engineer Bah Manbha Allya bad kumjuh ki
