Engineer ka tnad PHE kiba dei peit ka thain shane bad kumjuh ka EC ka shnong Nongrah bad na ka jingai sngew bha ki lai ngut ki trai jaka ba kynthup ia ka Kong Doris Pongrope, Kong Civil Pongrope bad Kong Their Kharmon bad la lah lah ban wan rah iakne ka skhim ba kot sha ka T. 5, 92,73000.“Ia ka jingmynjur ka sorkar la ioh ha ka 31 tarik u bnai Lber 2017, Ngi lah ksam um ia kane ka tyllong um bad mynta ka lah kot sha ka 800 phut ka jingjylliew bad ngi khmih ba ka jing pynmih um na kane ka tyllong tang ha ka shi kynta ruh leh se ka lah ban poi sha ka 5000 liter”, la ong u Dr Jemino.Katkum kane ka skhim Nongrah Water Supply Scheme Phase-I ka jingdon briew mynta ka long 12,021 tylli ki longiiing bad ka jingsam um kan long 70 LPCD, bad ka jingdonkam um ka long 753626 liter ha ka shi sngi bad ka jingioh um ha ka Phase- I kan long 527537 liter ha ka shi sgiU la ong ba la khmih lynti ban pynndep ia kane a kam hapoh shi snem bad hadein kane kan sa wan sa ka phase II, III ter ter.
title: Na ka skhim ba T. 5 klur, yn sam  um ia ki paidbah ka Nongrah

content: Jowai, 26 Naiwieng:U Rangbah ba paw khmat tam na ri lum Jaintia haka kam sain hima sima, u ma Obil Kyndiat uba la jop haduh 5 sien kynthih kum u MDC bad shisien kum u MLA bad uba la ju bat bun sien kum u CEM ka JHADC bad ruh kum u Chairman ha u snem 2009-14 un iakhun biang ia kane ka Election MLA, 2018 pyrshah ia u Sitting MLA, u ma Justine Dkhar bad ar ngut kiwei pat, u ma Kyrmen Shylla bad ka MDC kynthei ba marwei, ka kong Violet Lyngdoh.Ka tyllong khubor la iathuh ba u ma Obil Kyndait un ia khun ia kane ka election kum u kyrtong ka PDF kaba lam khmat da u bah PN Syiem, CEM ka KHADC.Na ka liang ka PDF kan pynlong ia ka Dorbar ha ka 1 tarik u Nohprah ha iew Wapungskur na ka bynta ban pynsngew ia ka nongrim treikam jong ka bad ruh ban tyrwa ia u kyrtong jong ka sha ki paidbah.U ma Obil Kyndait udei uba la iaw tam ha ka Sain Hima Sima ha ri lum Jaintia ha kaba u la jop kum u MLA u snem 1978 na Rymbai Constituency, mynta kum ka Khliehriat.
title: U Ma Obil Kyndait, u kyrtong Khliehriat

content: Nongpoh, 26 Naiwieng:Ki pulit Assam, ki la pynkhreh ban thaw ktem thymmai ha ka shnong Umru, kaba hap ha Ri Bhoi District.Halor katei ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar Assam, hynnin ka sngi Saitjain ki nongialam ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council, Ri Bhoi District, ha ryngkat ka jingsynranlang ki nongialam shnong ka Umru, ki la leit ban jurip ia katei ka jaka kaba ki Pulit ka Assam, ki la thmu ban buh ia ka ktem pulit thymmai.Ha katei ka jingjurip, nalor ka jingdon ki nongialam ka HYC, kiba kynthup ia u Bah Herculus Suting, General Secretary ka HYC, Ri Bhoi, u Bah Rhemborji Saibon, Asstn General Secretary ka HYC, Sengkmie, u Bah Miwell Shadap, Syiem ka Raid Nongtung, ki nongialam CSWO, Sabuda Circle lem bad kiwei kiwei ki riew paidbah jong katei ka thain.Hadien katei ka jingjurip, u Bah Herculus Suting, haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor, u la ong, ba ka nongrim hi kaba la pynlong ia ka seng ha ryngkat bad ki nongialam shnong ban leit jurip ia katei ka jaka kaba la thmu buh Police Outpost da ka sorkar Assam, ka long ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor katei ka jingshim kabu da ka sorkar Assam, ha kaba katba nangmih ki sngi ka la ialeh ban nangiai kyntur ia u pud u sam sha ki shnong kiba dang hap hapoh Meghalaya.U la iathuh ruh, ba ha katei ka jingjurip, wat na ka liang u Syiem ka Raid Nongtung, u Bah M. Shadap, u la kubur ba katei ka jaka kaba la thmu buh Police Outpost da ka Sorkar Assam, ka dang dei hi hapoh u pud u sam ka Raid Nongtung ha ryngkat bad ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad kaba pynshisha ruh ba katei ka jaka ka dang dei ha Meghalaya.“Haba iadei bad kane ka jingthmu ka sorkar Assam ban buh Police Outpost ha katei ka jaka, kum ka seng ka ieng rangbah ban pyrshah, namar lada ngin ailad katei ka jaka kan sa long kum ha Sabuda” ong u Bah Hercules Suting.Kane ka jingthmu buh Police Outpost da ka sorkar Assam ha katei ka jaka, ha ka jingshisha hi kam don jingmut, namar kane ka jaka kam pat jngai na Sabuda, hynrei kane ka jingthmu buh Police Outpost ha katei ka jaka, ka long tang ban kyntur ia u pud u sam ka Meghalaya, bynrap u Bah Hercules Suting.Namarkata, na ka bynta ban nangpynkhlain ia ka jingpyrshah halor katei ka jingthmu buh ktem pulit ka sorkar Assam ha katei ka jaka, nga kyntu ruh ia ki para sengbhalang kiba don ha ka Distrik bad Jylla ba kin wan ban iasnohktilang, na ka bynta ban buh ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor katei ka jingthmu buh ktem Pulit ha katei ka jaka kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam ka Meghalaya., u la bynrap.
title: POI KI PULIT ASSAM HA UMRU:  Ha u pud u sam ka Raid Nongtung

content: Shillong, 26 Naiwieng:Namar ka jingjur palat ka jingshah tuh jong ki dukan shna ksiar ha kylleng ka jylla, ki pulit ki la pynap shrip ban ioh kem ia ki nongtuh bad dei mynta ka sngi ba ki la ioh kem 3 ngut ki nongtuh na Khyndailad. Kitei ki 3 ngut kiba la shah kem ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Md Rafik Sheikh, u Badus Sheikhn bad u Bisan Mondal , baroh ki dei na Sahebganj, Jharkhand. La kem ia ki ha ka por ba ki rieh ha painkhana. Kitei ki 3 ngut ki la ioh rung hapoh painkhana jong katei ka dukan, naduh dang step phyrngab, da ka jingthmu ban tuh na ka dukan shna ksiar jong u Shyam Jewelleries kaba don ha Khyndailad. Hynrei ki nongiaid lynti, haba ki ipher ia katei ka jingiaid jong kitei ki nongtuh, ki la pyntip sha ki pulit bad ki pulit, ki la leit mar mar sha katei ka jaka bad mar ia wan u trai dukan, ki shu shim suk ia kitei ki nongtuh napoh painkhana.Haba tohkit ki pulit ki la lap ba kitei ki briew ki la sah ha Shillong ha kawei ka ing basa la ar sngi mynta bad kitei ki la iaid swait bha ia katei ka dukan ha kine ki sngi. Kitei ki ju pyndonkam da i jingkieng iba rit ban kiew sha tnum bad ki ju pajait ia ki CCTV jong ka dukan ksiar. Ki pulit ki la suba ba ki lah ban dei kitei ki kynhun kiba tuh ha ki dukan ksiar ha Khyndailad, Jowai bad ha Guwahati bad ha kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka ri. Kitei kin shah tohkit 5 sngi ha ki pulit, ki pulit ki la kyrpad na ki paidbah ba lada ki iohi ia kino kino ki briew kiba don jingsuba ka iaid ka ieng ki dei ban pyntip mar mar sha ki pulit.
title: WAN TUH KHNANG NA  JHARKHAND SHA 9LAD

content: (Da u nong ai khubor kyrpang)Lai tylli ki maw byrsiew jong ka Congress, ki la twa kyndit noh ha kane ka kynti jong ka elekshon MLA 2018.U dieng bilat jong ka Ri Bhoi, ula rai ban im jar jar noh nangne shakhmat, hadien ba ula don ha ka sain pyrthei, la kumba 40snem eiei bad ba ula dei ruh uwei na ki rangbah, uba la iai neh bad ka seng Congress. Ka jingduh jong u paidlang ka Ri Bhoi, ia U bah DD Lapang, ka la dei ban long kham khraw, ban ia kaba ka duh ka seng Congress, namar ba utei u dei u nongialam uba jrong tam jong ka thain, uba la ialam ia ka Ri Khasi bad ka Jylla, ha la ka jong ka bor jongu.Lyngba ka jing shongthait noh jong U Bah Lapang, kumta ka Ri Bhoi, ha kane ka kynti, kan don sa tang ia U Dr Celestine Lyngdoh, MLA ka Umsning, uba dei u trai shnong jong ka Ri Bhoi District, U bah Julius Dorphang, MLA ka Mawhati, na ki san tylli ki Constituency jong katei ka District, ba kynthup ia ka Jirang bad ka Umroi ruh.Kane ka elekshon 2018, kan dei ruh ka elekshon, kaba sniewbok shibun ia ka Congress, namar ka duh ia ka Kong RoshanWarjri, ka longkmie, kaba la neh slem ha ka sain pyrthei, wat la mynshwa, ka dei kaba ju don bad ka seng trai ri UDP. Ka jingduh jong ka Congress, ia ka kong Kei, ka dei ka jingduh kaba jur, namar ka dei ka dur ka dar jong katei ka seng, ha ka nongbah Shillong, kaba pyniasoh ruh ia ka seng Congress bad ki bar Jylla.Ym tang katta, sa ka jingduh ia U Ma RC Laloo, myntri rangbah ba ar, ka dei ka jingduh kaba khraw, namar ba u dei u nongialam, uba jrong rynieng tam na ka seng Congress, ha ki ar tylli ki District ka East bad ka West Jaintia Hills bad dei lyngba jong utei u rangbah, lehse, ba ki paidbah, ki dang ithuh bad kynmaw tyngkhat ia ka seng Congress. Hadien ka jingshongthait noh jongu, ngim tip, la kin dang don ne em, kiwei pat ki ban phrung ha ki juti jongu bad kaba itieng, ka long ba ha ka elekshon 2018, kumba ka Congress, kan lah ban iaid thylli na ki ar tylli ki District ka Jaintia Hills.Kam kut tang katta, ka Congress, ka hap kynmaw, ba ka don ia u trai shnong jong ki maram (kumba ki ju ong), U Bah Rowell Lyngdoh, uba ka rynieng jongu, kam da iapher than satia ia U bah HS Lyngdoh, u nongialam ba la khlad noh jong ka West Khasi Hills bad ka jingmih noh jong U Bah Rowell, kan dei sa kawei pat ka dak jong ka jinghiar jong ka Congress, ha kaba mynta katei ka seng, kan hap ban peit ia ki khmat jongka, sha ka liang jong U MLA Garo na Ranikor, U Martin Danggo bad lait nangta kam don da kiwei pat.Khlem pat da iakren ia ka buit elekshon, kaba ka Congress, ka don, hynrei katei ka seng, ka la dei ban niew burom shi kat dei ia kitei ki saw ngut ki nongialam ba rim duh jongka; hynrei kaba sniewbok, ka long ba katei ka seng, kam lah shuh ban teh lakam ia U bah Rowell, ha kaba ha ka jinglong tymmen, un hap ban wad iing thymmai noh.
title: Twa kynsan, lai tylli ki maw  byrsiew jong ka Congress

content: Shillong, 26 Naiwieng:U MLA ka Mawlai u Bah Embhahlang Syiem-lieh u la ong ba kum u nongmihkhmat ka kam-ram jongu kam dei ban thad sha ki lad pathai khubor ba la sam shatri, sam kombor, sam patlun.Haba kren ha ka jingialang ba la pynskhem ia ki nongkitkam jong ka UDP Women Wing ka Mawlai ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ha Mawdatbaki ba la wan poi kumba 500 ngut eiei ki longkmie, u Bah Embhahlang u la ong, “Ia u bahdeng Embhah phin nym ioh sngew ban ai patlun, ban ai kombor, ban sam shakri, ngam dei u MLA ban sam shatri, sam patlun hynrei ban iasaid ia ki jingeh jong phi ki paidbah”,.U la kynthah ia u MDC ka Mawlai u Bah Process T Sawkmie uba ju kynthah ia u ba um pat long uba shemphang kum u MLA. “Ngam kwah ban kynthah ia u MDC uba long teng u MLA bad u myntri sorkar, hynrei nga kwah ban ong ba lada u ong ba ngam pat long shemphang nga kubur halor kawei ka kyndon bad kata ka long, ngam long uba shemphang kum u MLA ha ki kam bamsap”.U la ong biang, “Ngam don iing sha Polo, ngam don jaka sha Mawsiatkhnam, sha Mawlai, nga shong bad I mei”.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingbym sngew iahap ban shu sam tiar khlem iasaid ia ki jingeh ba shisha jong ki paidbah, u Bah Embhahlang u la ong, “Lada nga long MLA tang ban sam sopti uniphom, ngan sam man ka sngi hynrei ngam kwah ban put turoi ia ka jingai namar ba nga ngeit ha ka jingong haba nga ai da ka kti ka mon wat ai ka kti ka diang kan tip”.U la ong ba kum u nongmihkhmat paidbah ula sam ia ki jingdonkam jong ki paidbah naduh kiba iadei bad ki samla haduh ki longkmie katba u lah kum u shakri paidbah hynrei um ju kwah ban put turoi than kumba leh kiwei.“Nga la plie ia ki madan phutbol, ki lynti syngkieng hynrei ngam ju pynpaw pyrthei namar ba nga trei jar jar bad u blei u tip ia kiba trei jar jar”, u la ong.U la ong ba un sa ai jingkhein ruh ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka MLA skhim shen sha ki paidbah.U la kam ruh ba ki don ki briew kiba la wan tyrwa pisa ha kine ki sngi ban iakhun na kiwei ki party hynrei u la ai da ka jubab kylla ia ki da kaba ong, “kham lah ka shi kham ka khyndew ka jaitbynriew ban ia ka tyngka pliang jong phi”.Ha kane ka sngi, la pynskhem ruh ia ki nongkitkam ka Wome Wing ba la bynshet ha ka Kong Santimai Muthiang kum ka President, Kong Isabela Lyngdoh bad S Pathaw kum ki vice president, general secretary Kong M Lyngdoh, bad kiwei.
title: Ngam dei u MLA sam shatri, sam patlun: Embhah

content: Jowai, 27 Naiwieng:Hadien ka jingiakhih pyrshah ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Ummulong ban dawa ban bujli Rangbah shnong ha katei ka shnong bad hadien ba ka JHADC ka la dep ban bishar na baroh ki liang, ka Executive Committee ka JHADC ka la shim ia ka rai ban weng noh ia u Rangbah Shnong ka Ummulong, u ma Shellsing Langi na ka kam Rangbah shnong.Kane ka jingweng Rangbah shnong ia u ma Langi, la leh katkum ka kyndon jong ka The Jaintia Hills Autonomous District (Establishment of Elaka and Village and Election, Appointment Powers and Function and Jurisdiction of Dolloi, Sirdar and Waheh Shnong Act 2015 katkum ka hukum ba la pynmih ha ka 24 tarik une u bnai bad ha ka mynta ka sngi pat la pynmih sa kawei ka hukum ban thung ia u ma Leo Laloo kum u Rangbah Shnong shipor jong katei ka Shnong.Kum shu pynkynaw, ka jingpyrshah ia u ma Langi da ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka la sdang hadien ba ki paidbah ki la lap ba ka don ka kynrum kynram ha kaba pyniaid ia ka skim bylla shispah sngi ha kaba haduh mynta ka Ophis u Deputy Commissioner kam pat lah ban pynmih ia ka report halor jong ka Public Hearing kaba la pynlong ha u bnai September une u snem.Hadien pat bud sa ka jingdawa ban weng noh shisyndon ia utei u Rangbah shnong uba la bat ia ka kam la kumba 10 snem kynthih.Ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Ummulong ki la hap ban ia mih paidbah sha surok ban dawa weng ia u na ka kam Rangbah Shnong.Kumba long mynta ki paidbah katei ka shnong ki la dap da ka jingkmen halor kane ka jingjop jong ka jingialeh jong ki.
title: Shah weng u RS ka Ummulong

content: Shillong, 27 Naiwieng:Ka la mih ka jing ia knieh burom halor ka kam pyllait dewiong jong ka Supreme Court,hapdeng ar tylli ki seng jong ki nongkhaii.Na ka liang jong ka State Co-ordination Committee of Coal Owners, Miners & Dealers Forum (SCCCOMDF), ka sngew lyngngoh, halor ka jingshah kynthoh ba ki shim kabu ban kam ba ka jingpynlait ia U mar dewiong, ba la dep sei da ka iing bishar ba ha khlieh duh, ka Supreme Court ka dei ba leh shitom da kiwei ki seng, katba ka SCCCOMDF, ka shu kam tang ban ioh burom.Ka SCCCOMDF, ka pynshai halor ka jingthoh na U A.L.Syiem jong ka Hima Nongstoin Land Owner, Coal Traders and Producer Association (HNLOCTPA) bad ka ong shuh shuh, ba ka sngewsih ia kum kine ki jingjia, namar baroh ar Seng, ki iadon bynta lang ha ka mukotduma jong ka kam dewiong ha Supreme Court.La ong shuh shuh ba ka Forum ka pynshai paidbah ba kam ju put turoi ba dei tang ma ka kaba la leh shitom ban pynioh ia ka jingpyllait kit ia U dewiong ba la dep sei na ka bynta ki saw bnai, hynrei ka shu pynmih khubor ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia ka jingleh isynei ne pyrkhat lem jong ka Supreme Court bad ai khublei ruh ia ki nongiasaid jong ka Forum kiba la ia shim bynta ha ka mukotduma kaba la long ha ka 21tarik Naiwieng 2017, ha Supreme Court, New Delhi.Ka Forum ka sngew bynniaw ruh ba la shu thad madan ia ka kyrteng jong U nongiasaid ain ba pawnam jong ka Forum, U Nalin Kohli, tang namar ba U khlem poi ne don ha ka sngi ia said bad kane ka jingleh ka thmu beit tang ban pynjah burom ia ka kyrteng jongu. Nangta la ong shuh shuh, ba ki nongiasaid ain jong ka HNLOCTPA kiba na nongbah Sor Shillong, ki khlem leit sha ka nongbah New Delhi ban iadon bynta ha ka 21tarik Naiwieng 2017 ha Supreme Court, hynrei kim kwah ban pynlong ishu ne ban khleh politik ia ka jingbym don ne poi jong ki, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Bah Sonny L Khyriem Chairman, SCCCOMDF, Shillong.
title: PUT TUROI: Mih ka ia kawang  ktieh, halor ka rai pyllait dewiong

content: Shillong, 27 Naiwieng:Ka Presidet ka Civil Society of Women Organisation (CSWO) ka Kong Agnes Kharshiing ka la ujor ejahar ia ka jingkynnoh pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa kaba la kot sha ka T. 39 lak da ka Voluntary Health Association of Meghalaya, (VHAM) ha kaba iade bad ka jingpyntreikam ia ka projek ia ki briew kiba ngop ha ki kam dih drok ha ki ar tylli ki jaka kynthup ha Jowai bad ha Lad Rymbai ha Jaintia Hills.Ha ka jingujor ejahar mynta ka sngi ha Laitumkhrah Police station, ka Kong Agnes ka la kam ba katkum ka jingtip, ka bank Statement ka Voluntary Health Association of Meghalaya, (VHAM,) ha Corporation Bank, Kesamon Building, Laitumkhrah la pyni ba la siew sha u K. Chyrmang bad u Lucky Bareh, kum ka jing thied ia ki thyrnia da ka VHAM naduh ka 26/04/2010 haduh 12/09/2011 bad naduh 10/01/2012 haduh 15/05/2017.Ka la ong ba katkum ka jingwad jingtip, T. 39, 91,655/- la siew sha u K Chyrmang bad u Lucky Bareh naduh kitei ki bnai. Hynrei kaba lyngngoh ka long ba u K Chyrmang um don wat tang ka dukan die dawai, hynrei la shu pyndonkam da ka cash memo ba shu thok uba don Licence Number JH/395-396-397 kaba dei jong u N Khonglah.Ka Bank Statement ka la pyni ruh ba T. 30,92,985/- la siew sha u Kordor Chyrmang bad T. 8,98,770 la siew sha u Lucky Bareh kiba ai da ka bill shu thok, la ong ka Kong Agnes ha ka ejahar.Ka la ong ba katkum ka kaiphod, la kdew ba u Project Manager ka VHAM Jowai, u la ai da ki licence jong u Ram Passah, u trai ka M/S R. T Remedy Pharmacy, Ialong, West Jaintia Hills (Licence No JH/395-396-397) ha ka 2 tarik Jylliew 2017 bad M/S K. C. 12 Dolloi Pharmacy , KNB Road, Jowai, Jaintia Hills, (Licence No JH/395-396-397) ha ka tarik Rymphang 2012 ban thied thyrnia na kane ka dukan hynrei baroh ka jingsiew la leh sha u Kordor Chyrmang bad kane ka dukan dawai ruh ka bym don satia.Ka la ong ba ha kaiphod jong ka 30 tarik Nailar 2017 bad ha ka 1 tarik Nailur 2017, ka kynhun ba la ialam da u Wilson Dohling, (ADTI) Meghalaya SACS, Wallamtihun Hujon, Accountant- Meghalaya SACS bad u Glen Pyrtuh, Stores Officer- Meghalaya SACS, ki la lap ba ka la don ka jingpyndonkam bakla khamtam ban shu ai jingkhein pynheh ia ka jingdon jong ki briew ba dih drok.Kila lap ba kala don ka jingsam wat ia ki thyrnia ba la kut por sha ki IDUs (Injecting Drug users) kaba la buh jingma ia ki kiba hap ha ka jingpeit ha Jowai bad Lad Rymbai centre.Ka la ong ba ka kaiphod kaba la leit ban jurip ka la lap ka bill ba shu thok jong u Lucky Bareh bad ka la ai jingmut ban sospen ia u Rini W Pakma u Project Manager bad u Dakapaia Bareh, Counsellor.Namar kane ka jingjia,ka lah ban don ka jingiasylla jong kiba bun ki briew ba pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa bad dei ban leh da ka ain pyrshah ia ki, la ong ka kong Agnes ha ka ejahar.Lah ban kdew ba ka Meghalaya AIDS Control Society (MACS) ka la pynkut noh ia ka jingtreikam jong ki ar tylli ki centre ba pyniaid da ka Voluntary Health Association Of Meghalaya (VHAM) kaba don ha Jowai bad ha Lad Rymbai hadien ba ka Fact Finding Team ka la lap ia ka jingpyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa kaba la kot sha ka T.39 lak tam hapoh kine ki ar snem shiteng.Ka jingpynkut ia kine ki centre kan long naduh ka 1 tarik u Nohprah ban wan bad ha jaka ka VHAM, ka MACS kala aiti noh shwa ha ka Mihmyntdu Community Social Welfare Association (MCSWA) na ka bynta ban ai ka jingshakri ia ki briew kiba la ngop ha ki kam dih drok.Ka Project Director ka MACS, ka Dr (Mrs) L Lyngdoh haba pynthikna ia kane mynta ka sngi, ka la ong ba hadien ba la ioh ia ka kaiphod na ka Fact Finding Team, bad ka Enquiry Committee jongki, la rai ban pynkut noh ia ka jingshakri jong ki ar tylli ki centre jong kaVHAM ha Jowai bad ha Lad Rymbai.
title: Ujor ka Kong Agnes, ba  pyndonkam bakla ka VHAM

content: Nongstoiñ, 27 Naiwieng:Mynta ka janmiet ha ka por kumba 1:00 nohsngi, ki pulit ka Shahlang, ki la lap ia kawei ka metiap jong u bar Jylla kaba la sdien phasi ha kawei na ki Iing jah kaba don ha ka shnong Dassar jong ka thain Shahlang West Khasi Hills District.Ka khubor na ki heh pulit jong ka District, ka iathuh ba ia katei ka jingjia la wan ban pyntip sha ki pulit da u wei u rangbah u ba na katei hi ka shnong ha kaba ki pulit ruh mar ia ioh jingtip kila her bran bran sha katei ka jaka ha kaba kila lap shisha ba ka met jong u wei u bar Jylla la sdien phasi ha katei ka Iing jah.Shuh shuh ka tyllong khubor na ki pulit ka iathuh ruh ba ia katei ka metiap la lah ban ithuh bad kadei jong u Sorat Rabha 25 snem, u ba na ka shnong Gobindapur kaba hap hapoh ka Goalpara, Police Station Assam.Hadien ba ki pulit ki la lah ban pyndep lut ia baroh ki jingdonkam, ki la aiti noh ia katei ka metiap sha u wei na ki shipara jong u tei u ba la iap ban pyndep ia kaba sah.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta ki la register case bad na ka liang jong ki pulit ki dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah khnang ban lap ia ki jingshisha la u tei u bar Jylla u la dkhat jubor ia la ka jingim ne u shah pyniap dusmon hano re hano.
title: Sdien ka met iap u bar Jylla,  ha iing jah hajan Shahlang

content: Shillong, 26 Naiwieng:“Ai un shongthait noh uba pli” ong U Bah Constantine Lyngdoh, MLA barim ka Nongpoh, ha ka jingiakren bad U Rupang mynta ka janmiet. La ong biang U bah Constantine “Ka biang kein, ba un shongthait, balei yn pynkit ia ka lyngkor, kaba um lah kit shuh, haba ula tymmen, ai noh ia kiwei”.U Bah Constantine Lyngdoh, u dei U MLA barim jong ka Nongpoh, uba la pynliem ia U bah DD Lapang, ha ka elekshon 1993, ha kaba ula iakhun na ka tiket jong ka seng HSPDP, hynrei, ula jop tang shisien ia katei ka elekshon, katba ha ka sien ialeh ha u 1998, U bah Lapang, ula wan phai biang kum U MLA jong ka Nongpoh Constituency, haduh ha kine ki sngi.Ha ka jingiakren ha ki katto katne ki kotkhubor, U Bah DD Lapang, uba la rai ban nym ialeh elekshon shuh ha ka sien ialeh 2018, ula iathuh ba ha u snem 1993,wat la u shah rem elekshon, hynrei ki kam jongu, ha kitei ki snem, ki kham khlain bor shibun, ban ia U MLA, uba don ha katei ka por ha katei ka Constituency.U Bah Constantine, u ong shuh shuh, ba U bah Lapang, u ai daw, ba ula tymmen bad katei ka dei hi ka jingshisha, hynrei, ha kajuh ka por, u sngewthuh ba um jop shuh, lada un dang ialeh biang bad ha kajuh ka por, ba lada u jop ruh, ba ka seng Congress, kan nym wan shuh ha ka bor. U Bah Constantine, u kyntait ruh, ba ka jingtreikam jong U Bah Lapang, ka khlain bha ha u snem 1993, wat la u dei tang U Chairman jong ka State Planning Board, namar ba u ong “Wat ki MLA skhim ruh ki briew ki tip ha kato ka por lyngba jongnga”.Na ka jingkren pynkut jong U Bah Constantine, u iohi, ba lada U bah Lapang, um ialeh shuh, kumta ka jingjop, ha kane ka kynti, kan leit sha u kandidet jong ka seng NPP, U bah CB Syiem, uba dei ruh U CEM barim ka KHADC.
title: Ai un shongthait noh uba pli,  ong U bah Constantine Lyngdoh

content: Shillong, 26 Naiwieng:“Ngam don kano kano ka jingthmu ban leit pyniasnoh bad kiwei pat ki Seng Sain-pyrthei kumba la paw ha ki kot khubor bad lada jia ba ka long kumta kan long da ka rai jong u paidbah ym ma nga marwei ban rai”, la ong u Bah Kennedy C Khyriem haba pynshai ia ki jingkynnoh kiba la mih ha ki kot khubor halor ka jingthmu pyniasnoh jong u bad ka NPP ha ka jingialang pynskhem nongkitkam jong ki Primary Unit ka Mawphlang Block Congress Committee ha Club Mawngap ha ka 25 tarik u Naiwieng.U la ong ba un dang ïakhun na ka party Congress ia kaba u paidbah u dang kyrshan namar ym dei ba jop hi kum u MLA hynrei ka bor ka shong ha ki bad dei ma kiba jied bad pynjop.U la ong ba ka mang tyngka na ka sorkar kaba la wan haba khein kyllum ka la poi sha ka 100 klur kiba kynthup ia ka Science & Commerce College ha Mawphlang kaba long 36 klur tyngka, ki surok, ki Water Supply Scheme, ka bhah ban kyntiew ia ki kam jngoh kai pyrthei, ki skul bad kiwei kiwei .“Nga don ka jing-angnud ba ngan dang ioh ban leh bha shuh shuh namar ka Mawphlang Constituency ka dang donkam shuh shuh ban kyntiew ha kaba bun ki liang”, la ong u Bah Kennedy uba la pynpaw ba ma u bad ki paidbah don daw ia ka Congress bad kane ka jingialang ka pyni ba ki nongkitkam ki dang shaniah ia ka party.U la kynthoh ruh ba ka jingiakhun ha ka Election ban wan ka dei Congress pyrshah ia ka BJP. “Ka Party BJP ka rieh tngen ha ki syrngiew jong ki Party Riewlum bad ka jingkynnoh ba u Dr Mukul u rah lut ia ki skhim sha Garo Hills, hynrei u khlem rah ia ka bhah ba dei jong phi ki nong Mawphlang”, la ong u Bah Kennedy uba la ong ba u Dr Mukul u rah ia ki skhim kiba ki MLA ki sngap bad kim don ia ka iktiar ban ia tan ia ki skhim.
title: Ngam don jingthmu ban leit pyniasoh  NPP, ong U MLA Mawphlang

content: Shillong, 27 Naiwieng:Ki nongtrei bylla ne Casual ka MeECL hapoh ka lama ka MeECL Progressive Workers Union (MPWU) ki la rai ban sangeh trei khlem buh por naduh ka 12 tarik u Nohprah ban wan ban pyrshah ia ka jingleh kuman bad leh mynthi ka bor pyniaid ka MeECL ban pynrulong ia ki jingdawa jongki.Kine ki nongtrei bylla ka MeECL ki la ialum mynta ka sngi ha phyllaw ka MeECL bad ki la shim ia ka rai ban pynjur ia ka jingiakhih da kaba pynlong noh da ka jingsangeh trei khlem buh por ia ka jingleh mynthi kane ka tnad ia ki jingdawa jongki.U President ka MPWU u bah Bah Mantiphrang Lyngdoh Kiri u la ong ba ki jingdawa kiba bun ba la buh hynrei kiba kham kongsan ki long ban pynlong nongtrei ba pura na ka kam nongtrei bylla namar ba kiba bun ki la trei palat da ka phew snem bad kawei ka dei ban ai ka jingsiew kaba biang kumba ioh kiba trei pura haba ki trei ia kajuh ka kam.U Bah Mantiphrang u la ong ba ki la ap slem bha, naduh ka 3 tarik naduh ba u Commissioner & Secretary u la bthah ia ka bor ka MeECL ban khot iakren bad ki ban iapynbeit ia ki jingeh hynrei kam shym la khot satia haduh kine ki sngi bad kim banse ban shim noh da kane ka sien jam kaba kham tyngeh.“Hadien ba ka MeECL kam shym la ai jubab eiei, ngi la rai ban pynlong da ka jingiakhih da kaba sangeh treikam khlem buh por naduh ka 12 tarik u Nohprah ban wan”, la ong u bah Bah Mantiphrang.Katba ka Kong Angela Rngad na ka TUR kaba la kyrshan ia kine ki nongtrei ka MeECL ka la ong ba ia mynta kin iakhih shwa ha madan ban dawa ia ki hok jongki katkum ka ain bad lada donkam kin kiew ruh wat sha iing kashari.“Ngin ialeh shwa ha madan bad lada donkam ngin leit sha Kashari. Ngi dei ban ioh ia u soh ka jingdawa jong ngi”, la ong ka Kong Angela.Ka la ong ba katba dang ap ban ai ia ka regularization ne thungkam pura, ka MeECL ka dei ban ai shwa da ka equal pay for equal pay ne siew bainong kaba iaryngkat kaba mut khlem pyniapher ia ka jingsiew hapdeng u peon casual bad regular kumba la bthah da ka Supreme Court ka ri.Ka la ong ba ka dei ruh ban siew ia ka arrear kaba la lum na ki nongtrei kaba dei ka jongki nalor ka dor bylla ba thymmai hynrei haduh mynta khlem pat long kam.“Sa katno snem ngin ia ap ban pynpei shkor ia ki riew mynthi ka MeECL. Ngi dawa katkum ka ain ym ba dawa beain”, ka la ong.Lah ban kdew ba ki nongtrei ka MPWU ki la pyrshah ia ka jingphah soi soskular ne contract agreement ka MeECL khlem iasyllok shwa bad ki ha ki bnai ba la dep bad ki la pynlong ruh iaka jingiakhih bunsien halor kane da kaba dawa ba dei ban pyndam noh bad dei ban thung nongtrei pura namar ba ki nongtrei ki dei kiba la palat phew snem suda.
title: Naduh 12 tarik yn sangeh trei,  ki nongtrei bylla ka MeECL

content: Jowai, 27 Naiwieng:Ka Dorbar Shnong ka Ladrymbai Dongwah da ka jingbthah u Dolloi uba dei u nongsynshar ia ki rangbah shnong hapoh ka Elaka Rymbai, ka la khot ban pynlong ia ka dorbar na ka bynta ban iajied ia ki dkhot shnong ba thymmai, hynrei ha kane ka dorbar ka la mih pynban ka huri ka hura tad haduh ba ki rangbah bad ki samla ki la kyndong ia ki kti sopti, jacket bad ban ia jrong kti iwei ia iwei hapdeng kiba pyrshah bad kiba mynjur ia katei ka dorbar.“Na ka daw kane ka huri hura, katei ka dorbar ka la pulom noh khlem soh khlem sla bad ka shnong ha u Dolloi ka Elaka, u ma Elios Swer bad ka bor JHADC ban peit ban bishar bniah ia kitei ki jingjia khamtam eh namar ba ka ladei ka por election, ka lah ban long ruh ka daw jong ka jing donkti jong ka kam sain hima sima na sha lyndet”, la ong uwei u rangbah na Ladrymbai.“Ha ka jingshisha, la dep ban pynlong ia ka Election jied Rangbah shnong da ka Secret ballot ha ka 23 tarik u September 2017 bad u ma Shanbor Suja u la jop ha katei ka Election”, la ong u Dolloi.Hadien ba utei u Rangbah shnong u la jop, u la hap ban khot ia ka dorbar shnong ban thung ia ka EC ba pura, hynrei haba u la khot ia ka Dorbar shnong, ki don ki paidbah nongshnong shnong hapoh ka jingialam u ma Marshall Biam, kim ai lad satia ban thung ia ki dkhot ka EC namar ba ki dawa ba utei u Rangbah shnong u dei ban pynbiang shwa ia ka report halor ka jinglut jingsep bad ka jingioh baroh.“Ka Pisa ka pynkulmar bad kadei maka kaba pynkulmar ia ki haduh katne”, la kynthoh u rangbah uba na Ladrymbai hi, hynrei u bym hap ha Ladrymbai Dongwah.“Utei u ma Suja u la bat haduh 1 snem 11 bnai kum u Rangbah shnong, hynrei namar ba la jur palat ka bamsap um lah ban ai jingkhien bad na kata ka daw ba ka dorbar kam lah ban ai lad ia u ban thaw ia ka EC ka dorbar shnong khlem da lah ban pynbiang ia ki jingkhien jingdiah”, la ong u Rangbah Shnong barim, u ma Knightstar Amkhloo“Ngi kum ki nongshnong shnong ngi dawa ba utei u rangbah shnong un ai shwa ia ka jingkhein kaba biang. Lada u lah ban pynbiang ia ki jingkhien jingdiah ngin ai lad ia u ban thung ia ka EC jong u, hynrei ten gin dawa ba dei ban weng noh ia u bad ban pynlong biang ia ka Election sa shisien”, la ong shuh shuh utei u RS barim katei ka shnong.U ma Suja udei u nongkyrshan u ma Justine Dkhar bad mangi te ngim don liang nano nano bad ngim lah ban ong ba ioh lehse kadei ka jingshisha bad kane ka lah ban dei u soh ka sain hima sima, la ong u ma Amkhloo.
title: Mih ka ia kyndong kti, ha ka  dorbar Ladrymbai Dongwah

content: Nongpoh, 27 Naiwieng:Ha kaba plie ia ka ophis treikam ba thymmai ka National People’s Party (NPP) Ri Bhoi District ha Nongpoh, ki heh Nongialam ka NPP haba kren ha kane ka sngi ki la ther tyngeh ia kane ka sorkar Congress ka la ialam khmat da u Dr. Mukul Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah, halor ki kam bamsap, ki kam lehdonbor bad ka jingsynshar marwei da u Mukul Sangma, kaba la pynkulmar ia ki paidbah ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Ha kane ka sngi kaba la plie ia katei ka ophis jong ka NPP, kaba la sakhi da ka jingdon u Conrad Sangma, President ka NPP uba la long ruh kum u Kongsan, u Vivek Raj Wangkhem, General Secretary ka NPP, u Dr. S. Kharlukhi, President ka NPP ha ka Jylla, u James K. Sangma, MLA ka Dadenggre (ST) Constituency, u Bah C.B Syiem Kyrtong ka NPP na Nongpoh, u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, Kyrtong na Jirang, u Bah H.S Shylla kyrtong na Nongkrem, ki heh Nongialam ka NPP ha ka jylla, Distrik lem bad da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah kiba la wan ban sakhi ha kane jingplie ia katei a Ophis treikam ka NPP.Napdeng kiba la ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi, kiba kynthup naduh u Bah C.B Syiem, u Bah H.S Shylla, u James K. Sangma lem bad kiwei kiwei, haba ki ai jingkren nyngkong eh ki la ai ia ka jingkhublei kaba kyrpang ia u Dr. D.D Lapang, ha kaba ki la ong “Ngi ieid bad burom eh ia u Bah Lapang, uba la long uwei na ki nongprat lynti bad u riewkhraw, ym tang ba ka Distrik kan burom ia u, hynrei ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei ka dei ban burom bad ia kaba ngim dei ban kren ei ei kaba pyrshah ia u, namar ba u dei u briew uba stad bad uba shemphang”.Pynban kine ki kyrtong bad ki heh nongialam ka NPP, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ki kam lehdonbor da u Mukul Sangma hapoh ka jylla, ha kaba kane ka jingleh donbor da u Mukul Sangma ka la pynkthang ym tang ia ki paidbah paidkar ha ka jylla, hynrei ka la pynkthang ruh at ia ki para MLA na ka Party Congress bad halor kane la sakhi ruh halor ka jingmih seng da kiba bun ngut ki MLA ka Congress.La mih ruh ka sur na ki nongialam ka NPP, kiba la ong ba lada ka NPP kan wan ha ka bor, hadien ka Ilekshon 2018, u Dr Mukul Sangma un sa long u Myntri Rangbah ba nyngkong u ban sa shah kem bad shong patok namar ki kam bamsap jong u hapoh ka jylla.Ki heh nongialam ka NPP, ki la pynpaw paidbah ruh ba katba nangmih ki sngi, wat kito kiba dei ki nongkyrshan ka Party Congress, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingngiah jongki ia kane ka Party Congress kaba la ialam khmat da u Mukul Sangma, namar ki la iohi ba kane ka Party Congress katba nangmih ki sngi ka la nanghiar nanghiar, khamtam eh halor ka jingphet seng ki Nongialam ba radbah, kum u Bah Rowell Lyngdoh, u Bah Prestone Tyngsong, u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar bad katno tam halor ka jingpynbna sangeh iakhun da u Dr. D. D Lapang, u Ma R.C Laloo bad ka Kong Roshan Warjri.Namarkata, ha kaba kum kane ka por kiba bun na ki paidbah ki la sdang ban phaikhmat sha ka Party NPP, namarba ki iohi ba kadei ka Party kaba don jingkyrmen, na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka roi ka par khlem da iashah shilliang la ka long ha ka District ne ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Ha kane ka sngi la ioh ruh ia ka jingkren kaba kyrpang na u Conrad Sangma, uba long u Nongialam bahakhlieh duh ka NPP bad ha kane ka jingkren jong u nyngkong eh u la ai ia ka jingiaroh bad ka jingburom ia u Dr. D.D Lapang, uba la pynbna ialade ban shongthait noh ha kane ka Ilekshon 2018.“Nga ngeit wat u Dr. D.D Lapang ruh un don beit ka jingsngewrem halor kiba bun ki kam lehdonbor da u Mukul Sangma hapoh ka jylla, ha kaba tang namar jongu kiba bun na ki MLA ka Congress ki la hap ban mih noh ialade bad leit pyniasohnoh sha kiwei pat ki Party, haba kumta wat u President ka MPCC ula sngewthuh ialade ba ka Congress kam don jingkyrmen shuh hapoh ka jylla, sa katno tam ia ki paidbah bad ki riew madan” ong u Conrad Sangma.Haba pynshai paidbah halor ka jingkynnoh da kiwei pat ki Party kiba la ong ba ka NPP ka iatreilang bad ka BJP, u Conrad Sangma u la ong, ba kum ka Party hi kam don kano kano ka jingiatreilang bad ka BJP, hynrei kum ka Party hi kan hap ban iatreilang bad ki Party kiba synshar ha ka Sorkar Pdeng, namar kane kan wanrah ia ka jingmyntoi sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong hapoh ka jylla.Namarkata, kum u MP nga la ialeh bad iasaid ruh hapoh ka Parliament, na ka bynta ka jingdonkam ki paidbah ha ka jylla bad kaei ka nongrim kaba ka NPP ka ieng bad kata ka long ban ai ia ka jingshakri kaba kyrpang tam ia ki paid riewlum, u la bynrap.La pynkut ia kane ka jingplie ophis thymmai ka NPP, da ka jingpdiang burom ia ki nongialam jong kiwei pat ki Party kiba kynthup na ka BJP, UDP, Congress bad HSPDP na ki thain bapher bapher jong ka Nongpoh Constituency, ha kaba ia kine kiba la wan ban pyniasoh la pdiang bad pynkup burom da u Conrad Sangma.
title: “Lada wan ka NPP ha ka bor,  U Mukul, un sa shong patok”

content: Shillong, 27 Naiwieng:3 ngut ki longkmie na 19th Shillong South konstitwensi, ki la kynnoh ba u MLA katei ka konstitwensi u bah Sanbor Shullai, u la thungkam ia la ki jong ki khun ki pyrsa ha Assembly kiba don haduh 5 ngut bad na kitei ki 5 ngut 3 ngut ki dei ki khun bad 2 ngut ki dei ki pyrsa kur. Katkum katei ka jingtip paidbah, ba la wad da ka ong Agnes Kharshiing, kitei ki longkmie ki la ong ba ki 5 ngut kiba u bah Sanbor u la thungkam ki long u bah M Rabon uba trei kum u Jr. Watch and Ward, ka kong Venessa Rabon kaba trei kum ka PA to Dy.Speaker, kong Wansalan Shullai kaba trei kum ka Asst.Librarian, ka kong Evangeline Rabon kaba trei kum ka Reviser bad u bah Ricky Shullai u MDC ka Laban Mawprem uba trei kum u Peon ha Asembly.Ki 3 ngut ki longkmie kiba la tip kyrteng kum u ka Victorian Marbaniang, kong Disiona Passah bad ka Anita Lyngdoh ki la ong ba ia katei ka jingtip, ki la ioh jubab ha u bnai nailar mynta u snem bad ka jingtip la pan ar bnai shuwa kata. Ki la kynthoh jur ba u MLA u la thungkam tang ia ki khun ki pyrsa lajong, wat la u don ka spah kyrhai kaba u don haduh 4 tylli ki ing ha Lawsohtun bad Lumparing bad u ioh T.2 lak shibnai ka tulop MLA.
title: “U MDC ka Laban u dang  trei kum u Peon ka Assembly”

content: Shillong, 27 Naiwieng:Ki paidbah ka thain riwar Jaintia khappud bad ka Bangladesh ki la ki la iakynduh jingeh na ka jingsniew bad ka jingkhim palat ka surok naduh Wahkdait shaduh Dawki haduh ba la bun ki khep ba ki lait salit na ki jingjia ba sngewsih.Ha ka sngi saitjain jong ka taiew ba la dep ki lad pathai khubor, ula ioh ban leit jurip ia katei ka thain ryngkat ki nongialam shnong bad ruh ki nongialam ka War Jaintia Youth Council bad la lap ba ka jingsniew ka surok ka long kaba jubor bha nalor ka jingkhim.Ha ka jingshisha ka surok la dep pynheh naduh Pynursla ter ter tang haduh Wahkdait bad nangne shaduh Dawki la shu sah kumto kaba la wanrah shibun ka jingeh bad ka jingma ia ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan khamtam ba katei ka jaka ka dei ka jaka ba ju leit ju wan ki nongjngohkai pyrthei.Ki nongialam ka War Jaintia Youth Council kynthup u Bah Daniel Khongsit, u sordar ka Raid Mukertila u bah P Kongwang ki la pynpaw ba ka jingkhim kane ka surok ka la wanrah ka jingsahkut kali man ka sngi namar ka jingiaid ki trok bad bunsien ka la buh jingeh ia ki paidbah ha ka pang ka shitom bad haba beh kam kyrkieh. U la ong ba na ka por sha ka por, ki la ju leit ud leit nam bad buh jingkyrpad na ka tnad PWD hynrei ka khlem long kam satia haduh kine.Ki la pynpaw ba ka jingkieng dawki kaba la shna naduh u snem 1931 ka la don hapdeng ka jingma namar ba ka sorkar kam shym la moramot ia ka ha ka rukom kaba dei. Ki la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban leh eiei mardor khamtam ha kane ka aiom ba bun bha ki briew ba wan kai sha kane ka thain. Ki la ong ba haba shu peit ia ka jinglong jingman bad ki kam pynroi, ka jinglong ka thain kam pat iahap ban ong ba ki la im ha ka spah snem kaba 21.Ki la dawa ba u MLA ka Amlarem bad Pynursa ki dei ban shim khia ban pynthikna ban pynheh ia ka surok. Ki la kynthoh ruh ba kidon ki surok ba la shna da ka Dhar company kiba la sniew noh tang ha poh lai bnai. Ki la ong ba lada ka sorkar kam sngap ia ka jingdawa, kin leit wad jingtip da ka RTI ban tip iaka jingshisha baroh halor ka jingshna ia ka surok namar ba kane ka surok ka dei u budlum jong ka roi ka par ha ka thain khappud ka India.
title: Pynlut 18 klur; tang 3 bnai  sniewlut ka surok ba shna ki Dhar

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:U ma Jermon Sayoo, u President jong ka UDP Mowkaiaw Circle jong ka 4-Mowkaiaw Constituency u la iehnoh ia kane ka kam ryngkat bad ki nongbud nongkyrshan ka UDP kumba 1500ngut tam eiei. La shim ia katei ka rai ha ka jingialang, kaba la long ha iing Dorbar Shnong Mowkaiaw, ha ka 25tarik mynta u bnai. Ka daw ba ki la iehnoh ia kane ka kam ka long ba kim don shuh ka jingshaniah ia ki nongialam ka party UDP la ha District ne ha ka Jylla. Baroh kine kiba la iehnoh ia kane ka Party UDP ki la rai ban ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ia u ma Heipormi Laloo na Mowkaiaw, u kandidet, u ban iakhun na kane ka constituency lada u ioh na kano kano ka seng ruh.
title: Mih noh u heh  UDP na Mookaiaw

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Kawei ka Sumo ka la kylla mynta ka janmiet ha ka por 3:30 baje ha Quinine -Ri bhoi district. Katei ka Sumo kaba kit briew shi kali ka dang kiew na Guwahati ban leit sha Shillong. Ha katei ka jingjia 3 ngut ki briew ki la mynsaw jur bad kiwei pat ki mynsaw malu mala. Ki 3 ngut ba la mynsaw jur la tip kyrteng kum ka Mercy Hmar 58 snem, u Rohu Mali 47 snem bad u Robihul Hussain 58 snem. Ka 108 kaba don ha Nongpoh ka la pynkit ia ki sha Umsning CHC bad hadien la pynkit sha Shillong.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia aksiden 2 ngut ki briew ki la mynsaw hadien ba ka kali ba ki shong ka la ia tyngkhuh bad kawei ka kali kit umphniang. Katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 3:30 baje janmiet ha Mookyndur, West Jaintia Hills ha kaba kawei ka Alto 800 kaba mut ban leit sha Jowai ka la shah tynrah ha katei ka kali kit umphniang. Kiba la mynsaw la tip kyrteng kum u Wanrapmi Pyrtuh, 31 snem bad ka Risuk Shylla, 25 snem. Ka 108 kaba don ha Jowai ka la pynkit sha Civil Hospital, Jowai.
title: Mynsaw 5 ngut  ha ki jingjia Aksiden

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Ki nongialam jong ka Khasi Jaintia Presbyterian Assembly mynta ka sngi kila leit ban ia kynduh ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma ha ophis treikam jong u ban ai khublei ia u halor ka jingithuh jong ka sorkar ia ki kam ba radbah jong u Rev Thomas Jones.Ka jingithuh jong ka sorkar ia ki kam ba radbah jong u Rev Thomas Jones ka long halor ka jingpynioh ka jong u ia ki dak thoh ha ka ktien khasi namar dei lyngba jong u ba ia ki dak thoh ha ka ktien khasi u la sain dur kumba ka long mynta.U Rev Thomas Jones u la wan sha kine ki lum khasi ban ialap ia ka ktien u blei ha u snem 1810-1849. Ha kine ki snem kiba u la don ha kine ki lum khasi u la trei bor bah ban wanrah ia ki dak thoh khasi bad kum ka jingburom ia u ne u riew rangbah ka sorkar kala rai ba ka 22 tarik bnai jylliew kan long ka sngi shuti ha ka jylla man u snem. (SP News Agency).
title: Leit khublei ka KJP ia u Dr. Mukul

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Ha ka jingiakynduh jong u General Secretary jong ka AMPSTA u bah F.C Shullai ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma halor ka jingbym hap ki nonghikai skul Deficit ha ka Fifth Pay Revision bad ka kyrwoh na utei u nongialam ka seng ki nonghikai u la ong ba u myntri rangbah u la kular ba ki nonghikai ruh ki dei ban ioh ia kajuh ka tulop thymmai kumba long ki nongtrei sorkar bad shen yn pynmhi noh ia ka jingpynbna.U bah Shullai u la ong biang ba u la ia kynduh sa ia u ba D.P Wahlang Commissioner Secretary ka tnad pule puthi bad utei u heh sorkar ruh u la kular ban pyntreikam ia kajuh ka tulop kumba ioh lem kiwei ki nongtrei sorkar. Ka kyrwoh ka la ong ruh ba ka jingialang jong ka APSTA kaba la long ha ka 25 tarik ka la rai ba kin ap ia ka jingpynbna haduh ka 25 tarik u kyllalyngkot bad lada ka sorkar kam pynmih jingpynbna, kin ia khih.
title: Byrngem ia khih ki nonghikai,  ba kwah tulop thymmai

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:U Chief Executive Member ka KHADC u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem u la khot ia kren mynta ka sngi ia ka Synjuk Ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Bri u Hynniewtrep ban ia kren halor ka MUDA bad VAB. Ha katei ka jingiakren katei ka jingiakynduh jong ki ka la rai ba ka KHADC kan thoh sha U Lat ka Jylla ban pan jingpynshai halor ki nongrim kiba la pynlong ia ka ophis U Lat ban phah ia ka Village Administration Bill sha ka Ministry of Home Affairs, jong ka Sorkar India. La rai ba donkam ban ia kynduh lang hapdeng ka Sorkar, ka KHADC bad ka SNSBH ban iakren halor ki mat kiba ktah ia ka jaidbynriew bad la khmih lynti ba ka sorkar kan khot ia ka jingialang bad ha kaba ia dei pat bad ka MUDA ki la rai ban dang ia kynduh biang.
title: Khot ia kren VAB, MUDA  u CEM ia ki Nongsynshar Shnong

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Ka tnat Geological Survey of India (GSI), ka la thung kam sop sop ia ki nongniah kali, ha katei ka kali bad la lap ba la thep, da ki briew kiba na shabar Jylla.Halor katei ka jingtip, kumta ka FJKGP Nongthymmai Circle hapoh ka jingialam U President u Bah Wankmenlang Tariang, ka la leit ban ia kynduh hynnin ka sngi, ia u director ka engineering wing jong ka Geological Survey of India (GSI) ha ka ophis jongu, kaba don ha Nongrim Hills. Ka jingleit iakynduh ka seng ia une u director ka long hadien bala ioh jingujor na kiba bun balang ba ka don ka jing ia thep kam sop sop haba iadei bad ki post driver bad khamtam eh ba ka don ka jingsuba ba bun na kitei ki kam kiba lait la pyndap da ki briew kiba na sha bar ka jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad une u director ula kubur ba ki don ki kam niah kali, kiba lait hynrei kine kim dei kita ki kam kiba shirta, hynrei ki dei tang ki kam kiba shipor, ki ban kut noh tang hapoh 3 ne 4 bnai hadien ba la kut ki project jong ka ophis bad haba iadei bad ki kam, kiba la lait la thep ruh tang ia ki trai jylla. Hynrei na ka liang ka seng kam shim la hun ia ka jubab jong utei u ophisar bad na ka liang ka seng, ka la pan syndon di kyrteng ba pura jong kitei kiba bat ia ki kam niah kali, khnang ba ka seng kan lah ban jurib bniah lada don shisha ne em ki briew kiba na shabar ka jylla kiba ioh ban rung kam ha katei ka ophis.Haba iadei bad kane na ka liang u director ula pan por na ka seng bad na ka liang ka seng ruh ka la ai por shitaiew ia ka ophis, ba kan pynshai sha ka seng ia kane ka kam.
title: NONGNIAH KALI: Thungkam  sop sop ka GSI, da ki bar Jylla suda

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Ka KSU Nongstoiñ Circle hapoh ka jingialam jong u General Secretary jong ka u bah F.Syiemiong mynta ka sngi ka la leit ban ia kynduh ia u EM ka tnad Labour ka KHADC ban ia kren halor ka jingbun ki nongbylla bar jylla ha Nongstoiñ ki bym don ki kot ki sla ba biang bad kumjuh ruh kim don ia ka Labour License.Hynrei ki nongialam katei ka seng ki la kyndit ban ioh jingtip na u EM katei ka tnad u bah Blanding Warjri ba ha baroh kawei ka West Khasi Hills ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba ka District Council ka la ai laisen ki don tang 94 ngut. Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u bah Syiemiong u la ong ba tang ha Nongstoiñ ki don palat 500 ngut ki bar jylla kiba trei bylla bad kham bun ki dei ha Industrial Estate kaba don ha Siejliej bad kumuh ha kiwei pat ki jaka hynrei ka District Council ka la ai jingkheiñ pynban ba ha baroh kawei ka WKH ki don tang 94 ngut.“Ngin a ka seng lada ngin khynra ruh ngim don pat ka bor ban pynshitom ia ki bym don laisen ne ki bym don kot don sla , dei na kata ka daw ngi wan ban ia kynduh bad u EM ba peit ia kane ka tnad. Ngi dawa ba ka District Council ka dei ban leit khynra bad ban pyrkhing ruh ia ka jingai laisen ia ki bar jylla” ong u bah Syiemiong. Utei u nongialam ka KSU Nongstoiñ Circle u la ong ba ka jingbun ki bar jylla ka la ktah ia ka kamai kajih ki trai muluk naba bun ki kontraktor ki ju khot bylla da ki bar jylla.
title: Tang ha Nongstoiñ, palat  500 ngut ki nongbylla bar jylla

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Ka khynnah kynthei kaba dang pule ha ka klas VI ha kawei ka skul ha Laitumkhrah ka la bthah noh ia la ka jongim da kaba sdien phasi ialade.Katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka miet sngi nyngkong. Katei ka jingjia ka la jai ha New Colony Laitumkhrah bad la iohi ia katei ka jingjia da ki marjan. Ki pulit ki dang tohkit bad ki dang ap ia ka ripod Post Mortem.
title: Phasi ka khynnah skul

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Ka shnong Lower Bakur ka la mad ia ka jingduh ding kaba la ar bnai kynthih mynta namar ka jingsniew jong u transformer ha ka treikam treijam khamtam kiba buh Xerox, kiba pule kot bad ki jingdonkam ba har rukom.Halor kane, ka HNYC Southen Riwar Circle, Dawki ka la ia aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u Chief Engineer ka Distribution ha kane ka sngi Nyngkong ba dei ban pynpoi biang ia ka ding ha katei ka shnong kaba la suhsat na ka jingduh ha kine ki ar bnai eiei mynta.U Bah Nikson Lamin bad u Bah Keepmewell Lamin ki president bad secretary ka seng ki la ong ba ka jingduh ding ka la ktah ia ka pule puthi jong ki khynnah skul bad kumjuh khamtam ha kine ki sngi ban wan sa ka aiom Khrismas bad snem thymmaia ha kaba ki paidbah ki ju pynthaba ia ki iing ki sem jongki hynrei kane ka la pynsngew sih kthang ia ki.“Ngi kyrpad jur ba ka MeECL kan pynbha noh ia u transformer kloi wut wut khnang ba ki paidbah kin ioh biang ia ka jingshai’, ki la ong.
title: Duh ding ka Lower Bakur  ba sniew u transformer

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Ki nongialam ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) hapoh ka jingialam u General Secretary jong katei ka seng u samla Donald V Thabah mynta ka sngi ki la leit ia kynduh ia u Chief Electoral Officer ( CEO) ka jylla u bah Frederick Roy Kharkongor ha kamra treikam jong u ha Addl. Secretariat ban ia kren halor ka jingpynrung kyrteng thep vote ha kane ka jylla.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor, hadien katei ka jingiakynduh u General Secretary, ka KSU, u la ong ba ka jingiakynduh jong katei ka seng ka long ban ia kren halor ka jingpynrung kyrteng thep vote ha kane ka jylla naba ka KSU ka tieng ioh ba yn shu pynrung pathar ia ki bar jylla ne ki mynder kiba shu wan poi ha kane ka jylla tang shipor ar por. U samla Donald u la ong ba kawei pat ka mat ba ka KSU ka la leit pan jingshai ka dei hadien ba u CEO u ka kren sha ki kotkhubor ba la buh thong kumba 1 lak ngut tam ban pynrung kyrteng ha kane ka jylla shuwa ka elekshon MLA 2018.Ha katei ka jingiakren u samla Donald u la ong ba ka KSU ka la kren shai ha u CEO ba katei ka seng kan pyrshah beit lada yn pynrung kyrteng thep vote da kaba kheiñ ia ka Census 2011, “Ngi la ong ha u CEO ba ngin pyrshah lada pynrung kyrteng thep vote katkum ka Census 2011, namarba ha katei ka Census la pynrung kyrteng lut ia ki mynder kiba wan shong be-aiñ ha ki ing thap dap ha kane ka jylla bad ba la pynrung kyrteng ruh ia kito ki bar jylla kiba wan trei ha kane ka jyllana ka daw ka jingpynkynriah kam” ong u samla Donald V Thabah haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor.Kawei pat ka bynta ba ka KSU ka la pan jingshai na u CEO ka long hato la ki seng saiñpyrthei ki don bor ne-em ban pynrung kyrteng ia ki briew, u samla Donald u la ong ba la jubab ba ki seng saiñpyrthei kim don bor satia ban tynruh kumno ban pynrung kyrteng ia ki briew ha ka thup kyrteng thep vote. U la ong ba u CEO u la jubab ia ki ba ki seng saiñpyrthei ki lah tang ban shu batai lem ia ki briew ia ki lynti ba ki dei ban iaid ban ioh rung kyrteng, “U la ong ba hap ban peit katkum ki lynti bad ki kyndon kiba dei ban iaid naduh ki kot ki sla bad kumta ter ter bad yn ym pynrung kyrteng pathar” ong utei u nongialam ka KSU.Ha katei ka jingleit pan jingshai u samla Donald u la ong ba u CEO u la pynshai ruh ba la shu buh thong 1 lak tam ban pynrung hynrei lada kam poi ruh kam lei lei satia naba katei ka jingthmu pynrung kyrteng thep vote ka long ban pynrung kyrteng ia ki samla khamtam sha nongkyndong kiba dang shu kynjoh ia ka 18 snem karta. U la iathuh ba ka KSU ka la pan jingshai ruh balei ba ki briew kiba la tymmen kiba la poi sha ka 60 ne 70 snem mynta ki mih kynsan ha kine ki por jan elekshon ban pynrung kyrteng thep vote bad shaei ki jah baroh shi katta.“Ia kane ruh u la ong ba kin peit bniah bha ia ki kot ki sla bad tang kiba dei hok ban ioh yn pynrung kyrteng ia ki, u la ong ruh ba ka ophis ka la don ia ka Software kaba lah ban lap lada don ki briew kiba don kyrteng thep vote ar jaka” u la ong. Ha kaba ia dei bad u Aadhaar ruh ka KSU ka la buh jingkylli hato na ka jingdon u aadhaar lah ne-em ban pynrugn kyrteng thep vote bad ia kane u samla Donald u la ong ba u CEO u la jubab ba ha Meghalaya ym pat pdiang ia u Aadhaar.
title: Yn pyrshah ka KSU, lada pynrung  thep vote, na ka Census 2011

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Ki nonghikai skul SSA ki la byrnem ban mih sha surok lada ka sorkar jylla kam pynlait ia ka tulop ba la sah pongding wat hadien ba la pynlait da ka tnad Human Resources Development (HRD) ka sorkar India.Ha ka jingpynlait kyrwoh mynta ka sngi u president ka Meghalaya SSA School Association (MSSASA) u Bah Aristotle Rymbai u la ong ba ki nonghikai ki la long kiba la pynkhreh ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih lada ka sorkar jylla kam pynlait noh ia ka tulop jongki shwa u Nohprah mynta u snem.Ka MSSASA ka la aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u State Project Director SEMAM-SSA u Ambrose Ch. Marak bad kyrpad ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynlait noh ia ka tulop jongki kiba don 12481 ngut kiba la pyndep ia ka jinghikai bad kynthup ia kito ki bym pat pyndep ia ka jingpyntbit. Ka jingdawa ka long ruh ban pynlait ia ka arrear ba phra bnai jong ka snem mang tyngka 2016-17 kaba sdang naduh ka 1 tarik Naitung 2016 haduh ka 28 tarik Rymphang 2017 bad saw bnai ka tulop naduh u Nailar haduh u Naiwieng mynta u snem.Ka jingsahkut ka tulop ka la pynktha khlieh ia ki nonghikai ban siew bai skul khun, ban siew bai ing, ban siew bai thang ding, bai dawai bad kiwei ki jingdonkam ha iing ha sem.U Bah Aristotle u la ong ba ka MHRD ka la bthah ia ka sorkar jylla ba kan pynbiang ka jingsiew tulop ia ki nonghikai na ka mang tyngka ka jylla hynrei ka sorkar jylla kam shym la shah skhor haduh mynta.U la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ki ophisar na ka tnad pule puthi ki la phah bunsien sha ka sorkar jylla hynrei khlem ai jubab eiei halor kane.“Lada ka sorkar jylla kam pynlait shwa ia ka tulop shwa ka 8 tarik Nohprah kin sa pynlong ia ka jingiakhih”, u la ong u bah Aristotle.Ka seng ka la ai ruh ia ka dorkhas ha u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma halor kane.
title: Byrngem mih madan ki nonghikai  SSA, lada ym pynlait tulop

content: Shillong, 29 Naiwieng:U myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul M Sangma mynta ka sngi u la leit jurip ia ka jaka ba la pynkhreh ban pynlong ia ka jingiaseng KJP Synod Mihngi ha Lum Swai, ha Tynring kaban long ha u Lber 2018.Hadien ba la jurip, u myntri rangbah u la pynlong ia ka jingialang ha Tynring Presbyterian Higher Secondary School, ha kaba u la pynpaw ia ka jinghun mynsiem ba la ioh ban jurip ia kane ka jaka kaban pdiang ia ka jingseng bah kaban long ha u Lber ban wan.U la pynpaw ba ki ophisar na ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher ki la trei sted ban pynlong ia kane ka jaka ha ka rukom kaba biang.U la ong ba ka jaka ka long kaba itynnad bha khamtam ban pdiang ia kum kane ka jingiaseng bah. “Ka Shillong ka la hapngiah bha bad kam don jaka ban pdiang ia ka jingialum kaba heh bad ka shnong Tynring ka lah ban thaw dur ban don ki jingdonkam kaban pynlah ban pynlong ia ki jingialang ba heh kum kane ha ki snem ban wan”, u la ong bad bynrap ba ka sorkar kan ai ia ka jingiarap.Shwa ia kane, ki ophisar na ka tnad PHE, PWD (Roads) bad MeECL ki la batai ia ka jingiaid ki kam na ka bynta kane ka kam.Ha kane ka sngi la don lang u MLA ka thain u Bah David Nongrum, u DC ka East Khasi Hills, Shillong u Bah Peter S Dkhar, ki Pastor na ka KJP Synod Mihngni, Laithumkhrah Presbytery bad ki dkhot ka Dorbar Shnong, Tynring.
title: Jurip jaka pynlong jingiaseng  Synod, U Mukul ha Tynring

content: Shillong, 28 Naiwieng:Hadien ka jingthad madan jong ki 3 ngut ki longkmie ia ka jingioh jingtip jong ki lyngba ka ain wad jingtip, ba u bah Sanbor Shullai MLA ka 19th Shillong konstitwensi u la thungkam ia ki khun bad ki pyrsa lajong kaba paw ba u MDC ka Laban u bah Ricky Shullai ruh u dang trei mynta kum u Peon jong ka Legislative Assembly, mynta ka sngi u bah Ricky Shullai bad u bah Sanbor Shullai ki la wan ia kynduh ia ki nongthohkhubor ban pynshai halor katei ka bynta.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u bah Ricky Shullai u la ong ba u kyndit ban iohi ha ki kotkhubor ba ka kyrteng jong u ka paw ba u trei kum u Peon jong ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly, u bah Ricky u la sei ia ki kot ki sla ban pyni ba u la dep risaiñ na katei ka kam naduh ka 8 tarik u naiwieng, 2016 bad ia ka shithi risaiñ kaba la pyni ba ka Assembly ka la ioh pdiang la phah sha u Secretary jong ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly ha katei hi ka sngi. “Nga lyngngoh ban iohi ba paw ha ki kotkhubor ba nga bat ar kam MDC bad Peon, nga la dep risaiñ naduh ka 8 tarik u naiwieng, 2016, kine ki kot ki sla ki don bad nga, ngan pyrkhat aiu ngan leh halor kane ka bynta ia ki ophisar ka Assembly la nga dei ban iaid sha ka aiñ ruh ngan dang pyrkhat” ong u bah Ricky Shullai uba la bynrap ba katei ka la pynsniew dur ia u khamtam ha kane ka por elekshon.U kñi jong u pat uba dei u MLA jong ka 19th Shillong South u bah Sanbor Shullai u la ong ba un leit ia kynduh ia u Lamphang ka ïng dorbar u A.T Mondal ban ia kren halor katei ka bynta ba kat ka Assembly ka bakla haduh katne da kaba pyni ha ka RTI ia u briew uba la risaiñ kum u nongtrei jong ka.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpaw ha ki kotkhubor ba u MDC ka Laban-Mawprem u trei tang kum u Peon , u bah Sanbor u la ong “Ha kine ki sngi nga dang iohi ha ki kotkhubor ba u bah D.D Lapang ruh uba la long myntri rangbah bad MLA la bun snem nyngkong u dei u nongdie sha, u myntri rangbah duh ka ri ruh u Narendra Modi nyngkong u dei u nongdie sha, u President barim ka Ri u APJ Abdul Kalam u dei u nongdie kotkhubor, kam pher la phi u shakri uba rit tam hynrei phi don pat ia ka mynsiem ban trei na ka bynta u paidbah, dei na katei ka daw ba u bah Sanbor ruh um ju rem elekshon” u la ong.Halor ka jingkynnoh ba u thung kam tang ia kiba haing lajong u bah Sanbor u la ong “Naduh u snem 1985 ba nga dang long tang u nongtrei mon sngewbha , ngam pat long politishian nga la shakri ia ki paidbah, da ki hajar nga la iarap ban pynioh kam ngam don rikod shuh, ngi la tur ryngkat bad ki sha manla ki ophis mynta ki la trei la ki jong ki jong ki kam, ki bym lah pynioh kam sorkar ngi la pyrshang ban ia khun da ki skhim seng kam lajong, kitei ruh mynta ki la biang, ngam don bor ban thung kam hynrei dei ka ophis nga don pat ka hok ban kyrpad. Lada ki khun ne ki pyra jong nga kileit apolai kam, ki lah ia ka interbiw ki ioh, ngan ong shuh kumno, balei kita ki briew kim tynruh sha ka sorkar ba kan thaw ia ka aiñ ba ki khun ki kti, ki hynmen para ne ki bahaing hasem jong ki MLA ne MDC kim bit shuh ban aplai kam sorkar, kata te kan shai seh” ong u bah Sanbor.Kham hadien ka la wan poi ka jingthoh na ka ophis jong u Public Information Officer ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly kaba la pyntip sha ki kotkhubor ba u bah Ricky Shullai u la dep risaiñ na ka kam Peon ba u trei naduh ka 8 tarik u naiwieng, 2016 bad la pdiang ia kane naduh katei ka sngi kumta ka ophis kam shym la siew eiei shuh ia u.
title: YM DEI SHUH U PEON, ong  U Bah Ricky, la risain naduh 2016

content: Shillong, 29 Naiwieng:Ki nongshong shnong ka Ummulong kynthup ki Executive Member ki la thoh sha u CEM ka JHADC ba un weng noh ia ka hukum pyrshah ia u Rangbah Shnong ka Ummulong uba la shah sloit na ka bor jong u. Ha katei ka jingthoh kaba la don haduh 561 ngut ki ba la soi kyrteng kynthup ia u Secretary bad Chairman ka shnogn Ummulong.Ha katei ka jingthoh ki la kdew ba katkum ka section 28(2) jong ka Establishment of Elaka and Village Election Powers and Function and Jurisdiction of Daloi, Sordar and Waheh Chnong Act 2015 u Doloi u la pynkheiñ ia katei ka aiñ da kaba sngap ia ki katto katne ngut kijba don tang 139 ngut hynrei um sngap ia ka sur kiba bun balang bad ba um lah ban pynshisha ia ki jingsoi kyrteng. Ha katei ka jingthoh la kyrpad ban pynsangeh noh ia ka jingtreikam jong u Acting Chnong hynrei ban wanrah biang ia uba Waheh Chnong barim namarba ka samoi treikam jong u ka sah sa tang shibnai shiteng.
title: Ai bor biang ia u RS  barim ka Ummulong

content: Mawryngkneng, 29 Naiwieng:Ka Khasi Students’ Union Mawryngkneng hadien ba la dep phah dorkhas ha ka 31tarik Risaw 2017, sha ka Sorkar MUA II bad sha lai ngut ki MLA bah David Nong-rum MLA Mawryngkneng Constituency, bah Remington Pyngrope MLA Mawkynrew Constituency, bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit MLA Nongkrem Constituency. Hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar ka sdang sngap mynthi ha kaba iadei naka bynta ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ia ka Mawryngkneng C&RD Block sha ka Civil Sub division, ha kaba ka jingdon jong ki shnong ka la kot haduh 64 tylli ki shnong bad ka jing don ki briew (Population) katkum ka census 2011, ka la kot haduh 67,291, kata 33,396 ki shynrang bad 33,895 ki kynthei; hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar ka dang sngap mynthi bad kumjuh kitei ki 3 ngut ki MLA ki khlem kren ne ang wat tang shikyntien ruh ha kaba iadei bad katei kakam kaba u paidbah u donkam.Naka liang ka seng ka ai por ia ka sorkar ha shwa ka Dorbar tlang dei ban pynioh Civil Sub division ba pura ha Mawryngkneng lym kumta ka Seng bad u paidbah kin pynlong jing iakhih pyrshah iaka Sorkar bad yn sdang iakhih shwa da kaba jai jai na 3 tylli ki Constituency kata na Mawryngkneng, Mawkynrew bad Nongkrem Constituency.
title: Byrngem iakhih ka KSU, na ka Civil Sub Division Mawryngkneng

content: Shillong, 29 Naiwieng:Ka ophis u District Medical and Health Officer , Ri-Bhoi District, Nongpoh lyngba ka ophis jong u District Malaria Officer, Ri-Bhoi ki la lap ba ki don haduh 6 tylli ki kes ba ki briew ki ioh ia ka jingpang khie shoh Dengue. Katei ka long katkum ka ripod jong ka ELISA Test kaba la leh ha ki jaka Test kiba bun kiba don ha ka jylla Assam. Na kitei ki 6 tylli 5 tylli ki kes ki dei kiba jia ha Khanapara kaba hap hapoh Byrnihat PHC bad kawei pat ka dei ha Amjok kaba hap hapoh Byrnihat PHC.Nalor kitei ki kes ki don pat sa 9 tylli na ka shnong Borbhuin kaba don hajan ka shnong Amjok bad ia kitei la leh ia ka Test da ka RDT hynrei la ong ba ka Test kaba leh da ka RDT ym lah satia ban pynthikna la ka long kaba dei shisha ne-em. Ia kitei ki kes la lap ba ki jia ha u bnai nailur, risaw bad naiwieng mynta u snem. Dei halor katei ka jinglap ia ka jingsdang pur kitei ki jait jingpang ka ophis u DMHO ka la phah ar tylli ki kynhun ban lei tai jingpynshai sha kylleng ki shnong kiba hap ha Ri-Bhoi District.Ia ka Test ELISA ha kane ka jylla ka don tang ha NEIGRHIMS bad ha Civil Hospital, Shillong-Sentinel Lab. Ha Nongpoh pat ki dang shna ia ka Sentinel Surveillance Hospital, ha Bethany Outreach Hospital Nongpoh ruh lah ban leh tang ia ka Rapid Test hynrei ia katei ruh ym shym satia ban pynthikna la ka long kaba dei ne-em.Haba ia kren bad u DMHO ka Ri-Bhoi u la ong ba kitei ki jait jingpang ki dei kiba wanrah da ki jingdait jong ki skaiñ pyrjong kum u AEDES. Ka daw ka jingsaphriang katei ka jait jingpang u la ong ba ka dei namar ka jingdait u pyrjong ia uwei u briew bad u leit biang sha uwei pat u briew. U la ong ba ki paidbah ki dei ban iada lypa na kitei ki jait jingpang ban ia kaba dih dawai hadien ba la ioh pang namarba ka lah ban neh taiew bad ka jingshit ka kiew ka hiar.Kitei ki jait ‘kaiñ pyrjong u DMHO u la ong ba ki kha roi bha namar ka jingpynlang ia ki um jaboh sharud shakiar bad u la ong ba ia ki um jaboh dei ban pyllait ba kin tuid, kawei pat ka jaka ba utei u kain pyrjong u ju kha pylleng ka dei ha ki jaka pynlang um kum ha u khiew phiang bad ki ju kha pylleng hangtei bad dei na katei ka daw u ong ba hap ban tap bha ia ki khiew um ban ym ioh lad kitei ki jait skain ban kha pylleng.Haba kylli kaei ka daw ba katei ka jait jingpang Dengue ka kynrei ha Ri-Bhoi u DMHO u la ong ba ka daw hi ka dei namarba la jan palat bad ka Assam bad ha Assam kiba ioh ia kitei ki jait jingpang ki dei kito kiba nongbylla kiba wan ha katei ka jylla. Ha ka jingshisha u la ong ba katei ka jingpang ka dei ban kynrei bha ha ka por lyiur hynrei ka jia ruh por tlang namarba ki don ki jaka ba lang um harud ha kiar. Kiba bun kiba ioh pang u ong ba ki leit sumar sha Assam ba ia kito ki briew kiba sah ha ki thaiñ Byrnihat, Jorabad ka la jan palat ka Assam ia ki naba ha Nongpoh ym don jaka sumar.
title: Sar ka khieshoh Dengue ha  Byrnihat, 6ngut kiba thikna

content: Nongstoiñ, 29 Naiwieng:Ar ngut ki pulit jong ka 4th MLP Batallion, ki la mynsaw jur hadien ba ka trok pulit kaba ki shong ka la kylla bad leit tyngkhuh ia u nar kynroh jong ka surok bah Nongstoiñ By Pass kaba don ha Umkyllain.Ka khubor na ki heh pulit jong ka District ka iathuh ba katei ka jingjia, ka la jia mynta ka step ha ka por kumba 8:15 mynstep, katba katei ka trok kaba don ia u Number ML 02 2009 ka dang thmu ban leit sha Siju ban leit ai bam, ia ki pulit Batallion ba don ha Siju.Shuh shuh ka khubor ka iathuh ruh ba ha katei ka trok, ki don haduh 5 ngut ki pulit bad mar ia poi ha Umkyllain kynsan kynsan, ka la iakynduh ia kawei ka Bolero Camper kaba don ia u Number ML 06 8749 kaba wan na ka thain Nongstoiñ bad mar iapoi ha lad jong katei ka surok bah Nongstoiñ-Riangdo, ka la ieng kynsan hapdeng jong katei ka surok bah bad u nongniah jong katei ka trok pulit, ban lait na ka jingiatyngkhuh u la ialeh ban iuh brake, hynrei kumno re kumno katei ka truk ka la kylla bad leit tyngkhuh ia u nar ker jong katei ka surok bah.Ia kitei ki ar ngut ki pulit kiba la mynsaw jur la tip kyrteng kum u Kingston N Sangma bad u Rocketson Kharjarin bad la pynkit noh ia ki sha Civil Hospital Nongstoiñ ban ioh ia ka jingsumar, katba ia kitei baroh ar tylli ki kali la rah noh sha Thanad Nongstoiñ ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit.
title: Mynsaw jur ar ngut ki pulit,  kylla ka trok ha Umkyllain

content: Shillong, 29 Naiwieng:“Ka jing kyllain jelbi palat u nongialeh na ka UDP, ka pynlong ia ki paidbah, ban ngiah bad artatien” ong ka kyrwoh na U bah W Kharmawlong President UDP Iewduh bad U Bah P Mawrie, President UDP Mawlieh Lyngkyrdem, kaba la phah sha U Rupang mynta ka sngi.Katei ka kyrwoh, ka ong shuh shuh, ba ki la rai ban ai jingkyrshan noh ha kane ka kynti, ia ka kong Grace Mary Kharpuri, kaba don ka jingkyrmen ban poi sha ka thong bad kaba ialeh na ka seng PDF.“Kum ka seng riewlum, ngi la shah rem laisien lai wat, na ka daw, ba ngi ia pra bad mih bun tylli ki seng riewlum. Te ban wan rah sa shisien pat ia ka jingjop ba donburom, da kawei ka sur, ngi la rai ban kyrshan tyngeh ia ka PDF, namar ki nongrim ba skhem bad shongnia jong katei ka seng, na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew” ong shuh ka kyrwoh.Kitei ki ar ngut ki phah ruh ia ka jingkyntu ia ki paidbah jong ka Mawsynram, ba kin ym biej bad kin ym sngap ia u briew, uba dwai bad ha kajuh ka por, uba buaid spah. “Ia u dieng, uba sei soh bha baroh ki kwah ban kawang ia u” pynkynmaw kitei ki rangbah ia ki jingkren jong U bah BB Lyngdoh, bam kwah ha dwar U Blei.
title: JELBI POLITIKS: Mih ki nongialam  UDP, Lyngkyrdem ban iasoh PDF

content: Jowai, 29 Naiwieng:U bah PN Syiem uba dei u CEM ka KHADC ha ryngkat kiwei pat ki paralok jong u na Shillong kin wan hiar sha Wapungskur, East Jaintia Hills; na ka bynta ban pynshai paidbah halor ka hok ka kynti longtrai ia ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ruh halor ka kam tih dewiong kaba dang shah khang haduh mynta ha ka National Green Court.Katei ka dorbar kan long ha ka 1 tarik u Nohprah bad kan sdang naduh ka por 11 baje ha Madan ialehkai ka Wapungskur. Kane ka long katkum ka jingpyllait khubor u Convener katei ka Dorbar, u ma T. Dkhar.
title: U CEM ka KHADC sha Wapungskur

content: Shillong, 29 Naiwieng:U General Secretary ka KSU u samla Donald V Thabah u la ong ba ka KSU mynta ka dang tih naduh tyllong ban lap ia ka jingshisha halor ka jingwan poi ki bar jylla kaba da ki 3 ne 4 bos manla ka sngi ha NEIGRHIMS.Haba ia kren bad u nongthoh khubor u samla Donald u la ong ba ka dei ka kam kaba eh bha namarba ki briew ki kam ba ki wan phah sumar. U la ong ba ka KSU ka la pyrshang ban tih bniah hynrei ka eh namarba ki wan ha ka kyrteng ban phah sumar bad kam don jingkhang iano iano ban wan phah sumar ha kano kano ka jylla.U la ong ba la ioh jingtip ruh ba haba ki wan 100 ngut ha ka por wan phai ki leit phai tang 60 ngut, ngi wad shano ki 40 ngut pat ki jah hynrei la ioh jubab ba ki shah bat ha jaka sumar ban thiah pang shuwa. “Dei na kata ka daw haduh mynta ngi dang tih bniah bha naduh tyllong ban lap ia ki jingshisha baroh” ong u samla Donald.Lah ban kdew ba khyndiat sngi mynshuwa ka KHNAM ka la leit khynra ha ka por dang step phyrngap ha NEIGRHIMS la arsien kynthih bad ha ka sien kaba nyngkong ka la lap 6 bos night Super ki bar jylla bad ha ka sien kaba -ar pat ka lap 3 bos bad ki nongialam ka KHNAM ki la iathuh ba katei ka jingwan ki bos ban wan buh briew ka long manla ka sngi.
title: JAH NAPOH BOS: Wad ka KSU ba jah  40ngut shi bos, ki nongpang NEIGHRIMS

content: Shillong, 29 Naiwieng:Ka dorbar Jylla, kan sdang naduh ka 8tarik Nohprah 2017 bad ka jingshong dorbar, kan dei na ka bynta lai sngi.Kat kum ka rai jong ka Business Advisory Committee, la pynbeit, ba ha ka 8tarik bad 14tarik, kin don ki bill jong ka sorkar, ban leit rah ha iing dorbar, katba ha ka 13tarik, yn ailad ia ki mat ban leit rah da ki dkhot ka iing dorbar.
title: 3sngi, yn ia kynduh ka dorbar Jylla

content: Shillong, 29 Naiwieng:U MLA ka Pynthor Umkhrah u bah A.L Hek u la ong ba ka long lehnohei ban don ia ka sorkar lada ka sorkar kam lah ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam u paidbah, “Kan long lehnohei ban don iaka sorkar lada kam lah ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam bad kam myntoi ban long nongialam lada ym lah pat ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam jong ki paidbah” ong u bah Hek haba pyllait paidbah ia ka phlim Bakla mynta ka sngi ha Hawkers Free Zone Market, Golflink.U bah Hek u la ong ba ba u kyrmen ba lada long ka mon u blei ha u 2018 kan wan noh da ka sorkar thymmai ka ban lah ban pynbiang ia ki jingkwah u paidbah. U la ong ba ka kam ak phlim kam dei tang ba ka kyntiew ia ka jylla hynrei kan iarap ruh ban aikam ia jam ia kijba bun ki samla. Ha katei ka sngi la donlang u MDC ka Laitumkhrah ubah Neil Antonio War.
title: BAKLA: Kwah pynbeit u  bah Hek ha ka sorkar 2018

content: Jowai, 29 Naiwieng:San ngut ki briew kynthup ia ar ngut ki longkmie iwei i heprit bad ar ki rangbah ki la duh ei ia ka jingim, ha ka jingjia tyngkhuh kali mynta ka sngi ha Um Tyr-a, harum Weighbride, East Jaintia Hills.Kane ka la jia mynta ka step ha ka por kumba 10 duna eiei, katba ka Maruti 800 kaba ki shnong ban leit sha Khliehriat na thain Lumshnong ka la ia tynrah bad kawei ka trok kaba dang thmu leit sha Assam.Ka jingiatynrah ka la long kaba jur bha haba 4 ngut ki la khlad hashen, katba iwei pat ha lynti sha Hospital.Katei ka Maruti 800 ruh ka la julor bun.Kitei ki lanot ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum ka Dingi Nampui, U Lalshansuk Hmar (11) snem, U R Hmar (50) baroh na ka shnong Khongoi thain Lumshnong East Jaintia Hills bad u Shinemeki Lamare(17) na Chiehruphi katba iwei pat i long ym pat tip ia ka kyrteng bad ia ka shnong.Ia ki met jong ki baroh la rah sha Khliehriat CHC ban pyndep i ka post mortem.Napdeng kitei ki san ngut kiba la khlad noh, u nongniah, uba dei na ka jait Bareh ha ryngkat ar ngut kiwei pat ki la mynsaw jur bha bad la iathuh ba baroh ki don hapoh ICU ha ki jaka ai jingsumar.La iathuh ba katei ka trok ka tur beit beit sha ka liang jong katei ka Maruti bad kiba sakhi ia katei ka jingjia ki la iathuh ba la lap u ia u bhang (Ganja) bad ka kyiad napoh katei ka trok kaba kit Chips.
title: BUAID BHANG: Tynrah ka trok,  ia ka Maruti, iap 5ngut ha Um Tyra

content: Shillong, 30 Naiwieng:U Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma u la ong, ba wat la u bah D.D Lapang MLA ka Nongpoh un shongthait noh ha ka elekshon 2018, hynrei kam dei satia ba u shongthait na ka politik hynrei un dang iai bteng ban long kum u President katei ka seng ha kane ka jylla. “U la ong ia nga ba u la kynjoh 85 snem mynta bad sa 5 snem un dap 90 snem” ong u Dr.Mukul.U Dr.Mukul u la ong ruh ba u bah Lapang u la pynthikna ha u ba ka Party Congress kan jop beit ha ka elekshon 2018 na Nongpoh bad dei na katei ka daw u kwah ban shongthait noh. “Mynta un lah ban pynleit jingmut bha kum u President naba u la lait met” ong biang u Dr.Mukul.U Dr.Mukul u la ong ruh ba dei ban pdiang ia ka rai ki nongialam ban ym ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 hynrei ki la kut jingmut pat ban trei radbah na ka bynta ka Party. U la ong ba ha u snem 2023 lei kin nangbun ki nongialam ki ban shongthait noh bad kane kan ym dei tang na ka Party Congress.
title: “U bah Lapang un  bteng kum u President”

content: Shillong, 30 Naiwieng:U MLA barim ka Siju u Augustine Marak u MDC ka Congress na Rongram u la ther ia u Rophul Marak uba la weng na ka sorkar hadien ba u la kdang baroh san snem u la bein ha I khyllip mat ban leit biang sha ka elekshon.“Ka mut aiu ba un (Rophul) un weng na ka sorkar haba u la kdang ha ki san snem ha ka shuki sorkar, ka dei kam biria”, la ong u Agutsine.U la bynrap ba lada u sngew ba ka sorkar kam leh eiei balei un da ap haduh kane ka khyllipmat ban weng ia ka jingkyrshan na ka sorkar bad balei um weng naduh kham mynshwa.U la ong ba ka jingiam jong u Rophul ha ka khyllipmat ba khadduh kan nym treikam satia namar ba kan long kum ka um mat kuratia.
title: “Ynda la kdang u weng  jingkyrshan na ka sorkar”

content: Shillong, 30 Naiwieng:10ngut ki khar Nepali, ki la ioh kyrteng thep vote thymmai bad kitei ki dei kiba la ioh jingmynjur na ka shnong Mihmyntdu.Halor kane, na ka liang ka Seng Hynniew-trep Youths’ Council (HYC), Jaintia Hills Circle, ka la leit ia kynduh ia U Bah B Kharshandi, Officer Incharge Election Commission West Jaintia Hills District, Jowai bad na ka liang U President ka Seng, U Samla Damanleki Lathong, u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia sngew bynniaw halor kane ka jingioh rung kyrthep ki bar jylla, namar ba kine kiba la iohlad leh ia kane ka kam kim dei wat tang ki nong India. Katkum ba paw kine ki Khar nepali ki la ioh syrnot kum ki nongshong shnong, na ka shnong Mihmyntdu.Ha ka jingiakynduh ka seng ia U Secretaty ka Shnong Mihmyntdu, U Ma Kmen Shylla u la kular ban khot ia ka Executive Committee jong ka shnong ban iakren halor kane ka mat. Ka Seng ka la kyntu ia baroh ki Waheh shnong ba kim dei ban ai pathar ia ki syrnot nongshong shnong, khamtam sha ki bar jylla.Na ka liang u Bah Kharshandi u la kular ban peit bad shimkhia ia kane ka kam bad u la ong ba nangne sha khmat kin peit bha ia ki kot ki sla la ki biang ne em khamtam ia ki bar jylla. Ki kyrteng ki bar jylla kiba la ioh ban pynrung kyrteng ialade hapoh ka electoral roll, ki long U Roshan Sunar, U Kaljit Singh, U Suresh Chetri, ka Maia Devi Chetri, ka Sita Chetri, U Santosh Chetri, ka Gita Chetri, ka Rekha Chetri, U Babu Chetri bad U Ramu Chetri.
title: KYRTENG THEP VOTE: Mynjur  ka Mihmyntdu ia 10ngut ki Nepali

content: Shillong, 30 Naiwieng:U Pappu Das, u khun jong U Heminder Das, ula kylla long u trai shnong jong ka Shnong Pommura bad ula ioh ia ka jing pyn ithuh na U Sordar Shnong, ha kaba ula ioh ia ka EPIC bad U Aadhar number ruh.Halor kitei ki jingshisha, kumta ka KSU Mawryngkneng Circle, ha ka Jing ialam u President Samla Reallystar Nongspung, General Secretary u samla Shiningstar Kharbihkhiew, ki la leit ia kynduh ia u Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills district bad ia u Block Development Officer ka Mawryngkneng C&RD Block, hadien ba la lap ba ki briew ba nabar, ki la sdang ban ioh pynrung kyrteng thep vote bad ADHAR Card bad ia katei ka seng ka la lap ba uwei u briew uba kyrteng u Pappu Das 31 snem rta,(RZN0129312),(Sl.no 305) bad (Part no-46) (House no-68),u dei u khun jong ka Heminder Das, ula ioh pynrung kyrteng ha ka EPIC & ADHAR ha shnong Pommura, wat la ka Dorbar shnong kamdon jingtip bad jing ithuh ia utei u briew . Hadien ba la dep wad bniah ka seng ka la lap badei lyngba ka jing ai Syrnod(Certificate) pathar u Sordar jong katei ka shnong ia u Pappu Das ba pynshisha ba u dei u ba lakha bad udei u trai shnong ba pura jong katei ka shnong bad katei ka jingleh jong u Sordar ka shnong kalong ka bymdon nongrim bad kaba buh jingma iaka shnong ka thaw bad iaka jaidbynriew rit paid.Halor katei ka nongrim ka seng ka la dawa na ki bor ba dei peit ba ki dei ban weng mardor ia utei u briew naka EPIC &ADHAR registration bad ka seng kala ujor katkum ki kyndon bala buh na ki bor badei peit.Ka seng ka kyntu iaki Sordar /Rangbah shnong ba kim bit ban ai syrnod pathar sha ki briew ba nabar, namar kalong ka jing pynshlur iaki mynder ban wan buhai shnong bad ban dawa ia ka hok longtrai shnong ka jongki. Ha kajuh kapor ka seng ka maham tyngeh ia ki katto katne ngut ki Sordar/Rangbah shnong bad ki Mynnong ki Seng Sain pyrthei (Political Agent) ba suba donkti iarap iaki briew ba nabar ban pynbiang kot pynbiang sla bad ban pynrung ia ki briew ba nabar haka EPIC tang naka bynta ban ioh jingmyntoi shimet, khlem da pyrkhat iaka lawei jong ka pateng jaidbynriew.
title: MYNJUR U SORDAR, long  nong Pommura U Pappu Das

content: Shillong, 30 Naiwieng:Ka Seng Khasi Kmie Mawkhar kala kyntait ban leit iashim bynta ha ka tamasa jingsuk ne ka festival of peace ba la khot pynlong da ka KJP Synod ban long ha Mawphlang ha ka 2 tarik Nohprah ban wan.Haba iakren bad u secretary ka Seng Khasi Kmie u Bah Arwan Tariang mynta ka sngi, u la ong ba ka daw ka jingbym treh leit iashim bynta jongki ka dei namar ba ki sngew ba ka dei tang ka tamasa khlem da ioh bynta eiei ban iakren bad ka jinglong kawei ka ri.“Ka dei tang ka tamasa, ki khot ia ngi ban leit pyni ia ka jingshad”, la ong u bah Arwan.U la ong biang, “ka jingkhot jongki tang ban shad, kam don ka khubor kaba ngi lah ban pynsngew ha ka shong suk ka sain bad ka jinglong kawei ka ri”. Katkum ka jingong u Bah Arwan kam da don jingmut than ban shu leit iashad.“Ki shu khot ban leit shad, kam don jingmut ban shu leit shad, kam sngew jingmyntoi. Ngi kwah ban ai jingngew ban wanrah ia ka jingsngew shngain ka ri”, u la ong.Kawei pat ka daw kaba u Bah Arwan u la ong ba ka dei namar ba ha kane ka por, bun ki khynnah ba dang ialeh eksamin bad kan pynthut ia ki ha ka jingkhreh kot.Lah ban kdew ba ka KJP Synod Sepngi ka la ong ba ka Festival of Peace kaban long ha Mawphlang kam pynkhie im ia ka jaitbynriew baroh kawqei.Ia kane ka tamasa jingsuk yn pynlong da ka Social and Economic Life Department (SELDD), KJP Synod Sepngi.Katkum ka jingong ki pastor kham mynshwa, ki Balang ban iashim bynta ki long na ka Seng Khasi, Seng Khihlang, Seng Raij, Balang Roman Catholic, Jingiaseng Samla KJP Synod Sepngi, KJP Synod Mihngi, Ri Bhoi Synod bad kiwei kiwei.
title: TAMASA JINGSUK: Kyntait  iashim bynta ka Seng Khasi

content: Nongstoiñ, 30 Naiwieng:Hynnin ka janmiet jong ka sngi Blang jong ka taiew ki pulit jong ka Mawshynrut Police Station, ki la lap ia kawei ka metiap jong kawei ka longkmie kaba la sdien phasi ha ka iing jong ka hi kaba don ha ka shnong Sienduli-I West Khasi Hills District.Kat kum ka tyllong khubor bala ioh lum na ki pulit la ong ruh ba ia katei ka longkmie la tip kyrteng kum ka kong Diliancy Nongphud, kaba dei na katei hi ka shnong bad ia katei ka jingjia la lap nyngkong eh da u kurim jong katei ka longkmie lem bad u para jong u katba ki dang wan na jaka trei.Shuh shuh la iathuh ruh hadien katei ka jingjia na ka liang jong ki ba ha iing jong katei ka longkmie kila pyntip noh mar mar sha ki pulit ka Mawshynrut bad na ka liang jong ki pulit ruh kila leit sha katei ka shnong ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit bad kila lap ruh ia katei ka jingjia.Katkum ka jingpeit bad jingtohkit bniah na ka liang jong ki pulit kila suba jur ruh ba katei ka longkmie kala bthat jubor iala ka jong ka jingim bad hadien ki pulit kila pynkit noh ia ka metiap jong katei ka longkmie sha Civil Hospital Nongstoin ban pyndep ia ka post mortem.Haduh bala thoh ia kane ka khubor ym shym pat la lah satia ban tip kaei ka daw ia kaba kala pynlong ia katei ka longkmie ba kan hap ban shim noh ia la ka jong kajing im da kaba phasi ialade.
title: Sdien phasi ka longkmie ha Seinduli-1

content: Shillong, 30naiwieng:U Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills u la khot mynta ka sngi ia ki sordar jong ka thaiñ khappud naduh na Mawshun sha Nongjri ban ia kren halor ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban pynieng Post Ilektrik shuwa ban ker sainar shiah. Ha katei ka jingiakynduh DC la don u Sordar ka Raid Mukertila, u sordar ka Raid Mawshun, Raid Lyting, Raid Lyngkhat, u sordar barim ka Nongjri bah Phelin Rynjah bad u Matabor ka Umñiuh -Tmar. La synranlang da ki nongialam ka CCIB u bah Sukjai Myrchiang chairman bad bah Kmen Myrchiang Secretary hynrei ym shym la kynthup lang ia ki ha katei ka jingiakren namarba la khot tang ia ki sordar.Haba ia kren bad uwei na ki sordar u la ong ba ka jingkhot u DC ka long ban sngewthuh aiu ki sordar ki don ban ong halor katei ka jingthmu pynieng Post ilektrik shuwa ban sdang ia ka jingker sainar shiah. Hynrei ki sordar ki la ong ba ki hap ban ia kynduh shuwa ia ki trai jaka shuwa ban sdang ia katei ka kam bad yn ai jingtip pat hadien ba la dep pynbeit. U sordar ka Raid Lyting u la pyrshah ia ka jingker sainar shiah namarba um pat tip ia ka jaka ban sdang ker hynrei u DC u la ong ba ia katei hap ban ia pynbeit bha shuwa.Ki sordar ki la ong ruh ia u DC ba shuwa ba kan don kano kano ka jinghiar ban jurip na bynta katei ka kam ka ophis ka dei ban pyntip shuwa sha ki sordar ba kin ioh pyntip ia ki paidbah ne ki trai jaka bad u DC u la kular ban leh kumta, iathuh utei u sordar. Hadien katei ka la don ruh ka jingiakynduh jong ki bad u CEM ka KHADC ha kaba u la kular ban thoh sha ka sorkar bad ban ia treilang bad ki sordar.
title: Khot u DC ia ki Sordar shuwa ban  pynieng Post ilektrik sainar shiah

content: Shillong, 30 Naiwieng:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka jabieng jongu kam lei lei satia na ka jingbyrngem pynkhyllem sorkar jong ki liangpyrshah ha ka dorbar tlang ban sa shong shen.Ka dorbar tlang ka jylla kan sa long lai sngi ha ka 8, 13 bad 14 tarik u Nohprah kan dei ruh ka dorbar khadduh jong kane ka jinglong MLA.Da ka jingweng jingkyrshan ki katto katne ngut ki MLA na ka sorkar bad ka jingthmu ki katto katne ki MLA ka Congress, ki dkhot liangpyrshah, ki la don ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia ka jingbym shaniah shuh ia ka sorkar.“Naduh u snem 2013, ki la pyrshang bunsien ban pynkhyllem ia nga bad ia ka sorkar”, la ong u Dr Mukul Sangma hynne ka sngi hadien ba la wai ka jingialang ka kynhun myntri.U la bynrap biang, “Ngam ktha khlieh eiei, ka jabieng jong nga ka treikam bha. Ngi tip kumno ban leh haba don kum kane”.Halor ka jingweng ki nongkyrshan khamtam ki MLA shimet, u Dr Mukul ula ong, “Mano ba lah ban khang lada ki kwah ban risain?”.U la ong kob biang, “Ha ka jingshisha ka jingpynlong dorbar slem ka long ban peit don katno ngut kiba nud shisha ban risain na ka ka kam MLA”.Halor ka jingkylli kumno u sngew ia kito ki MLA kiba thmu ban phet seng bad kiba u ju ong kum ki bujli sopti, u Dr Mukul u la ong “phi dei ban ieh ha ki bad ap kumno kin leh. Ngam nym iadon bynta ha ka jingmutdur.”Halor ka jingrisain ki ar ngut ki MLA shimet, u la ong ba ka thma sain pyrthei ka la sdang. “Haba la sdang ka thma, ngin sa peit kumno ki MLA ki leh ialade.
