N Syiem bad ka Executive Committee jong u, namar lada ym dei na ka jingshim khia jong ka KHADC ban ai da ka Mukotduma ha ka Supreme Court jong ka Ri India; ki ba bun ki Dorbar Shnong (khamtam kiba hap hapoh ka KHADC) kin ym jin da la ioh bor satia ban bteng biang ia ki kam kumba long mynta. Ka Synjuk ka ai khublei ruh ia ka KHADC, namar ba ka iai buddien ia kiwei kiwei de ki kam kiba ka jaitbynriew ka ia kynduh jingeh.Kaba ai mynsiem eh ia ka Synjuk ka dei ka jingjia kaba la jia ha ka 14tarik Nohprah 2017 mynba ka la don ka jingialang hapdeng ka Sorkar, ka KHADC bad Ka Synjuk. Ha katei ka jingialang ki MDC kiba la poi sha ka jingialang kim dei satia tang na ka liang synshar, hynrei la ia don ryngkat ruh kiba na ka liang pyrshah. Katei ka jingleh jong ki ka la pynpaw ia ka mynsiem shim khia kaba ki don na ka bynta ka jait bynriew khlem khein ia ka jingiapher jong ki party sain hima kiba ki don.Ka Synjuk ka ai khublei ruh ia ka JHADC kaba da ka jingshim khia jong ka, ki Dorbar Shnong bad ki para doh para snam ka Ri Jaintia ki la lait na ka jingeh bad ki jingiatakhuh bad ka ain.Kumta ka Synjuk da ka jingkmen kaba khraw ka ai Khublei Khrismas basuk bad Snem Thymmai bakmen ia U Myntri Rangbah bad ka Cabinet jong u, u CEM bad ki dkhot ka EC jong u bad ki MDC baroh jong ka KHADC khamtam eh ia ki para ri ka Bri u Hynniew trep bad ia baroh ki nongshong Shnong ka Jylla Meghalaya.
title: KI KSIANG U MUKUL, PYNSHNGAIN:  Pyn iakynduh ki Rangbah Shnong ia ki arngut

content: Shillong, 19 Nohprah:Ka kynhun jong ka Election Commission (EC), ban ialam da U AK Joti, Chief Election Commissioner bad ki Election Commissioner, ba kynthup ia U Om Prakash Rawat bad U Sunil Arora, kin wan poi ha Shillong, ha ka 22tarik Nohprah 2017, na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon MLA 2018.Kitei ki heh elekshon, kin don arsngi ha Shillong bad kin da la leit phai sha Shillong, kin sa pynbna ia ka tarik elekshon ha ka Jylla, kaba lah ban long ha U Kyllalyngkot 2018.Ha u snem 2013, lah ban pynkynmaw, ba la pynbna ia ka elekshon ha ka taiew ba nyngkong jong u kyllalyngkot 2013 bad la pynlong ia ka elekshon ha ka 23tarik Rymphang 2013.Ha katei ka jingwan jong ki heh elekshon, kin ia kynduh ia U Chief Electoral Officer, Bah Frederick Kharkongor, ki heh jong ki bor District kum ki Deputy Commissioner, ki Superintendent of Police bad kin ia kynduh ruh ia U Chief Secretery bad U Director General of Police.Ka por treikam jong kane ka dorbar, kan kut ha ka 6tarik Lber 2018. Ha katei ka jingwan jong ki heh elekshon, kan don ruh ka jingiakren ia ki mashin evm, namar ba ki don kiba ujor bad ki bym kwah ban pyndonkam da kitei, namar ba ki kwah ban shon da ki kot, kum ha ki por mynshwa.Ha ka jing ia kynduh ha ki khyndiat taiew ba ladep, la iathuh ba ki seng sain pyrthei bapher, ki ai jingmut ia ki bor pyniaid elekshon, ba kin pynlong ia ka elekshon ha ka taiew ba nyngkong jong U Rymphang, kaba mut ha shwa, ba kin sdang plie ki skul ha ka Jylla.
title: ELEKSHON 2018: Ha ka taiew  ba nyngkong U Rymphang?

content: Shillong, 19 Nohprah:U State President ka NPP u Dr.W.Kharlukhi u la ong ba kane ka elekshon 2018 kan long thik kum ka elekshon ha u snem 1998. U Dr.Kharlukhi u la ong ba ha u 1998 ka jur bha ka lyer isih Congress bad mynta ka elekshon ruh ka lyer isih Congress ka jur bha ha kane ka jylla. U la pynkynmaw ba ha u 1998 u don bad ka seng UDP ha kaba u la shah pynduh tiket, hynrei namar ka jingjur palat jong ka jingisih Congress ha katei ka por u la kyrshan ia u kyrtong ba ka UDP ka la pynieng bad u la ong ba ha utei u snem ka la don ka jingiashad ia kyrdem paidbah bad ka jingiarah lama ha kaba ka Congress ka la brut artad na ri Lum Jaintia.U la pynkynmaw ba ka dawbah jong ka jingshah rem ka seng Congress ha u 1998, ka dei na ka daw ka jingkhang pom dieng bad mynta pat ki nangbun shuh shuh ki ishu ba ki paidbah ki isih Congress ha kaba ka ishu khang dewiong ka dei kawei na ki mat kaba ktah eh ia ki paidbah ha baroh kawei ka jylla. “Ka elekshon 2018 kan long thik kum ka elekshon 1998, ka Congress kan brut na ri Lum Jaintia ha kane ka sien ba mynta” ong u Dr.W.Kharlukhi. Utei u nongialam ka NPP u la pynkynmaw ia kiba bun ki jingjia ha ka elekshon 1998 bad ka lyer pynrem Congress ka jur bha tang katto katne taiew shuwa ka elekshon ym da ki bnai bad u la ong ba ha kane ka sien ba mynta ruh ka Congress ka lah ban kob ba kan dang jop bun hynrei tang katto katne taiew shuwa ka elekshon bun kiei kiei ki jingphylla kin sa jia khamtam hadien ka jingwan ia soh ki MLA.U Dr.Kharlukhi u la ong ba katkum ka jinglong jingman ka politik mynta kat kaba u lah ban shemphang u iohi ba ka NPP kan dei kawei na ki seng ki ban jop bun ki MLA bad kan dei ruh ka seng ka ban jop bun ngut tam ki MLA. U la ong ba kumba ka long mynta ka NPP kan jop kumba 20 na ki 24 tylli ki konstitwensi ha ri Lum Garo hynrei ia katei u la ong ba yn ym lah ba nkhein sting namar ka jingbun ki nongiaknieh tiket bad lada jia ba uba duh tiket un kyrshan ia uba ioh ka mut da kaba suk 20 hynrei lada ka don ka jingiakhun pyrshah kan ym duna pat ia ka 10 ngut.Utei u nongialam NPP u la ong ba ha ka elekshon MP shiteng samoi na Tura konstitwensi ka NPP ka la pynliem 7000 vote ia ka lok jong u Dr.Mukul na Ampati konstitwensi bad mynta kan dei sa ka pali u Dr.Mukul ban rem, “Ia ka lok ngi lah pynliem 7000 vote mynta sa ia u Lok” ong u Dr.Kharlukhi.
title: Ka elekshon 2018 kan long kum  ka elekshon 1998: Dr.Kharlukhi

content: Shillong, 19 Nohprah:U Bah LG Nongsiej uba dei uwei na ki MDC ba la pynbna tiket da ka People Democratic Front (PDF) ban iakhun na Nongstoin u khlem wan sha ka jingialang pdiang ia u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem mynta ka sngi ha madan Polo.Na ka liang u nongthoh khubor uba pyrshang ban iakren bad u Bah LG Nongsiej, u la iathuh ba ka jingbym lah jongu ban wan sha ka jingialang ka dei namar ba u don sha Vellore ban leit ia ka khun ba pang.“Ngam dei ba pep khnang sha ka jingialang hynrei nga don sha Vellore ba hap peit ia ka khun ba pang”, la ong u Bah LG Nongsiej haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor.U la ong ba u la dep pyntip sha u Bah Pynshngain ba um lah ban wan namar kane ka daw.
title: Jah U Bah LG Nongsiej ha ka jinglang

content: Shillong, 20 Nohprah:La ioh jingtip ba u Dr. Jelington Ryndong u la leit thied phom tiket Congress ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 na Pynursla konstitwensi bad ki khubor ki la sawa bha ha ki thaiñ Pynursla ba u Dr.Ryndong un dei ruh u kyrtong jong ka seng Congress ha u 2018 na Pynursla. Haba ia kren pat bad u President jong ka Pynursla Block Congress Committee u bah Han Khongtani u la ong ba haduh mynta kam pat don satia ka jingiapynbeit, hynrei kan don pat ka jingialang ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai ban shim rai na ka bynta u kyrtong.La ia kren bad ki nongialam jong ka District Congress Committee (East Khasi Hills) bad na ka jingiakren bad ki la sngewthuh ba ia ka tiket na Pynursla konstitwenis kam don shuh ka jingiakren hapoh District hynrei ka long beit bad ka MPCC. Lah ban kdew ba shuwa ia kane ka khubor ki la don ki jingsawa ka kyrteng jong ki katto katne ngut ki briew ki ba ka Congress ka kwah pyniakhun na Pynursla hynrei kumba ka long pat mynta la ong ba un dei u Dr.Ryndong watla ym pat shym la lah ban pynthikna.
title: 22 tarik yn rai  kyrtong ka  Congress Pynursla

content: U Sordar ka Raid Shabong u Bah Biggestson Lyngdoh u la ioh ia ka sanad na u Syiem ka Hima Khyrim myn ha ka 20 tarik ha ka ophis treikam jong ka Hima Khyrim ha Nongkrem ha ka jingia don ryngkat lang u Chairman ka Election Committee ka 4 Raid u bah Hilarius Peter Pyngrope ryngkat lang bad ki riew Rangbah napoh ka Raid Shabong
title: Ioh sanad u Sordar ka Raid Shabong

content: Shillong, 20 Nohprah:U bah Sounder Stong Cajee la leit pyn iasoh ialade mynta sha ka seng NPP bad la pdiang burom ia u da u State President ka NPP u Dr.W.R Kharlukhi. U bah Sounder un ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 na 19th Shillong South konstitwensi na ka seng NPP. Lah ban kdew ba u bah Sounder u dei u President barim jong ka seng FKJGP bad hadien ba la iehnoh ia katei ka seng u la thaw ia ka seng saiñ pyrthei kaba la tip kum ka People Democratic Movement ( PDM) bad ha katei ka por katei ka seng ka la jop 3 ngut ki MLA bad ialade pat u la jop MDC na Mylliem konstitwensi. Hadien ba la khylliap noh ia ka PDM u bah Sound u la ia soh sha ka seng Congress bad hadien ka seng Congress sha ka seng BJP bad tang hadien khyndiat por pat u la leit ia soh sha ka NPP.
title: Rung NPP  U bah Sounder Cajee

content: Shillong, 22 Nohprah:Ka sorkar ka la sdang ban pyntyllun ia ka jingsam Tin Aluminium jong ka skhim Chief minister Housing Assistance Programme (CMHAP), ka la sdang mynhynnin ka sngi na Mylliem C&RD Block bud pat mynta sa ka Mawsynram C&RD Block. Ki don haduh 410 tylli ki longing ba duk na Mawsynram konstitwensi kiba la ioh mar 3 ban ka tin lyngba katei ka skhim bad ia kitei ki tin la sam da u BDO u bah R.K Marbaniang ryngkat u bah Suly Lyngdoh Chairman jong ka block Selection Committee.Haba kren ha katei ka jingialang sam Tin u bah Suly Lyngdoh, u la ong ka jingsted katei ka skhim ban poi sha Mawsynram konstitwensi ka dei lyngba ka jingshimkhia jong u bah Himalaya Muktan Shangpliang u kyrtong ka seng Congress na Mawsynram ha u 2018. U la ong ba u bah Shangpliang u la tynruh ia ka sorkar ban pynpoi noh sha ka Mawsynram khnang ba kan long kum ka jingai sngewbha Kristmas ia ki paidbah. U la ong ba u bah Shangpliang u la leit ban ia kynduh ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma kumjuh ruh ia u myntri ba peit ia katei ka tnad Housing u Zenith Sangma ban pynkloi ia katei ka kam.
title: Mar 3 ban ioh tin ki  410 ïng ha Mawsynram

content: Shillong, 20 Nohprah:U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba ha manla ki elekshon ki dei ban peit bha ia ki Manifesto lane ki mat treikam ba ki seng saiñpyrthei bapher bapher ki kular ia u paidbah. “Phin ym iohi ia kawei ruh ba kin leh” u la ong.U Dr.Mukul u la ong ba dei tang kane ka sorkar kaba u ialam na ka seng Congress kaba pyndep ia ki kular kiba la khlei ha ki paidbah ha ka por elekshon, “Ngi la pyndep ia ki kular ba ngi la khlei ia u paidbah, kata ka dei ka synshar paidbah, ngi la pyndep ia ka Manifesto jong ka seng Congress” u la ong haba kdew ia kiba bun ki kam pynroi kiba ka sorkar hapoh ka jingialam jong u ka la leh kum ka jingplie Civil –Sub-Division, jingplie C&RD block, Police Station, ki surok, ki jingkieng, ki jaka sumar bad kiwei pat.Haba kren shaphang ka jingthaw lad ka sorkar ban wanrah ia ka roi ka par ha kane ka jylla u la kdew ia ka jingioh pisa na ka Asian Development Bank (ADB) ha kaba u la ong ba katei ka projek kam dei satia kaba la thmu na ka bynta ki tnad puthi hynrei u la lah ban pynrung ia ka pule puthi ha katei ka projek bad la lah ban shna ia ki ign skul bad kiwei pat. U la ong ba ka pisa ka wan na ADB 125 Million Dollar bad 100 Million Dollar ka ai ka ADB katba 25 pat na ka jylla bad ia kane ka sorkar pdeng ka hap siew 90% katba ka sorkar jylla pat 10%.
title: “Man ki elekshon, peit ia ki mat ilekshon ki seng saiñ pyrthei”

content: Nongpoh, 21 Nohprah: Kumba ka long haduh mynta na ki 5 tylli ki Konstitwensi kiba don hapoh ka District, kata kaba kynthup naduh ia ka Umroi, Mawhati, Umsning bad Nongpoh Constituency, ka Party Congress ka la dep ban pynbna ia ki Kyrtong, hynrei kaba sah pat ka long sa tang ha Jirang Constituency, ha kaba ki paidbah nongkyrshan ka Party na katei ka Konstitwensi ki la pynpaw ia ka jinglynga, namar ka jingpynslem ban pynbna noh ia u Kyrtong u ban ieng iakhun na katei ka Konstitwensi.Halor ka jingpyn slem ki heh nongialam ka Congress ha ka Distrik bad jylla ban pynbna noh ia ka Tiket na katei ka Konsti twensi, kiba bun na ki riew rangbah bad kiba dei ruh ki nongkyrshan ba radbah ka Congress, ki la pynpaw lem ia ka jing lynga halor kane ka jingpynslem ka Party ban bynshet ia u Kyrtong na ka bynta ban aireng na katei ka Konstitwensi.Ka jingtip kaba la ioh ban lum da u Nongthohkhubor, la ong ba na katei ka Konstitwensi ki la don kumba lai ngut ki kyrtong kiba la iaid paidbah na ka bynta ban ialap Ilekshon ha katei ka Konstitwensi bad kita ki kynthup ia u Bah Witness Sancly na ka shnong Sohkyrbam Domphlang, u Bah Badhok Nongmalieh na Mawtnum bad ka Kong Sarita Laitphlang na Shillong, hynrei napdeng kitei ki Lai ngut kat haduh mynta ka Congress hi kam pat pynbna la iano ka ibit ban pynlong kum u kyrtong na katei ka Konstitwensi.Haba iadei bad kane ka jingpynslem ka Party Congress ban pynbna noh ia ka Tiket na katei ka Konstitwensi, u Nongthohkhubor u la ioh ban iakren bad u Bah D. Ranee, Rangbah Shnong ka Jirang Centre Village, ha kaba katkum ka jingiathuh da une u rangbah la ong bun na ki nongkyrshan ba radbah ka Congress na katei ka Konstitweisi, ki la pynpaw ia ka jinglynga namar ka jingpynslem palat da ka Party ban pynbna noh ia ka Tiket.Namarkata, nalor ba ka jingjied ia ki nongmihkhmat kam da slem shuh bad ha kajuh ruh ka por na ka bynta ban aimynsiem ia ki nongkyrshan ka Party Congress ha ka Konstitwensi, ka la dei ka por ia ki heh nongialam ka Party ba ki dei ban pynbna noh ia ka Tiket, khnang ba kan ym wanrah ia ka jingkulmar ia ki paidbah nongkyrshan, u la bynrap.
title: Napdeng ki 3 ngut, ym pat lah rai  ka Congress ha Jirang Constituency

content: Shillong, 20 Nohprah:U myntri ka tnad pynroi sor ka jylla u bah R.V Lyngdoh u la ong ba mynshuwa ki la mih ki kynhun ban kynnoh pyrshah ia u ban ong ba dei ma u, uba la pynrung ia ki shnong bapher ka Upper Shillong hapoh ka MUDA bad ki la kynnoh ruh ba u ai jaka ma u ia ka jaka ka Veterinary sha ki shipai Air Force. “Ka mat MUDA ka dei naduh u snem 2011, ngam pat long myntri sorkar hynrei ki ong beit ba dei u bah Ronnie, u myntri rangbah u iohi ba ki myntri sorkar ba na sor kim lah treikam ia kane, u la ai ha nga ia ka shuki myntri pynroi sor” ong u bah R.V Lyngdoh.Shuh shuh u la ong ba la pynphriang ia kitei ki jingkynnoh ban pynduh jingshaniah ia u paidbah hynrei mynta u la ong ba pynkut noh ia katei ka ishu MUDA ha kaba ka sorkar ka la aiti beit ha ki district Council ba kin peit ia ka rukom shna ing shna sem ba kin long kiba skhem, “La aiti ha ki District Council ba kin ai jingbit ban shna ing, ka shong sa ha ki” ong biang u bah Ronnie.U la ong ruh ba kane ka bynta ka dei kaba ka sorkar ka la dep pynkut bad lada jia ba wan ki kynhun ban pynsngewthuh bakla ban dang pyntieng MUDA dei ban kynnoh ia ki kum ki nongshukor ia u paidbah, “Lada dang wan ki ban pyntieng ia phi ban ong ba phi hap MUDA, ong ia ki phi la shukor khie leit noh” ong u bah Ronnie ha ka jingialang plie skul kaba la long ha Pomlum Secondary School mynta ka sngi.
title: La aiti ha ki District Council ban  ai jingbit shna ïng, ka shong ha ki

content: Jowai, 20 Nohprah:Duna lai hajar ngut ki paidbah na ka thain Nartiang khamtam eh na ka thain Par umkhen bad na ka thain Khanduli border West Jaintia bad Karbi-Anglong Assam ki la wantuid sha ka jingialang paidbah jong ka seng PDF ha Ummulong ia kaba la pynkreh kyrpang da ka PDF Nartiang Zonal Committee.Ha katei ka jing ialang la pynshai paidbah ia ka nongrim jong ka PDF da u General Secretary ka Seng u bah Auspicious Lyngdoh Mawphlang ha kaba u la ong ba ka tynrai jong ka jingsah dien ka jaitbynriew kadei ka jingbymbiang ka kamai kajih bad ka ioh kam ioh jam.“Kan myntoi aiu ban don ka iing shnong kaba bha, ki surok kiba jyllih bad ki scheme bapher bapher jong ka sorkar lada ka longing longsem jong ngi ka long kaba duk tasam”, la ong utei u nongialam ka seng PDF.“Lada ngi kwah ban roi ban par,ngi donkam nyngkong ban biang ia ka kam ka jam na la rymbei, dei hangta ba ngin sa lah ban rat dyngkong ia ka jingduk bad jingkyrduh”, u la bynrap.Ha kane ka sngi, la ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na u kyrtong ka PDF, u bah Judah Wahlang u kyrtong ka Sohiong, utei u kyrtong ka PDF u la kren bun kiei kiei kiba lah shisha ban tei ia ka imlang ka sahlang naduh ka jingkhang tih dewiong ka NGT, ka jingkhang tih maw bad tih shyiap jong katei ka juh ka tnad sorkar ba donbor kaba ryngkat kyrdang bad ka iing bishar Supreme Court.“Ka PDF ka don ka thong ban rat dyngkhong ia ka jingduk naduh na tynrai. Ngin rat na tynrai khnang ba kine ki jingeh kim nymlah shuh ban suh thied ha ka imlang ka sahlang”, la ong u bah Wahlang.Utei u kyrtong ka seng na Sohiong u la ong ruh ba ka spah kam lah ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla. “Ki Election kiba ladep ka pher na kane ka Elction ban wan namar ha kane ka Eletion ngin ia kren ia ki lai tylli ki mat kiba kongsan- kiba kynthup ia ka , ban kyntiew ia ka rep ka riang, ban thaw ia ki ain kiba iahap bad ka dustur ka riti jong ka Jaitbynriew bad ka lawei ki khun rit bad kito ki ban dang kha.U bah Pynshngain N Syiem haba kren ha katei ka jingialang u la ong, “Lada phim don ka iing shnong (Iing Dorbar kaba biang, wat khuslai, lada phim don ki kam ki jam wat khuslai hynrei ka kortam kadei ka jingim kaba bha lyngba ki jingkylla nadong sha dong.“Ngi la shah tyngdung ha ki bun ki liang, kam pher lada ngim don ia u surok uba biang, ka um kaba biang, ka rep ka riang kaba biang hynrei kaba kongsan tam ka dei lada ngi duh nong ia ka jaitbynriew rit paid, la ong utei u nongialam.Ha ka juh ka por, ki surok kiba jyllih, ki phutpath bad ka spah kam lah ban wanrah ia ki jingkylla hynrei tang da ka bor jingstad ym da ka bor ka jingshympaang.Ka jingialeh jong ngi kam shong ha ka por, hynrei ha ka buit, kito kiba kwah ban hiar thma iwei ia iwei pat ki dei kiba khuid shisha ban iati ia kaei kaba ki la lap.
title: Tuid duna 3 hajar, kiba kyrshan ia  u kyrtong ka PDF ha Ummulong

content: Shillong,20 Nohprah: Hadien ka jingkren jong u CEM ka KHADC ha madan Polo u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem kaba u la ong ba ki paidbah ki ia kynduh jingeh namar bym lah shna aiñ ki nong mihkhmat, ka KHNAM State Youth Wing lyngba ka kyrwoh khubor ka la kylli kylla na u bah P.N Syiem bad na ki MDC ka PDF ha KHADC, hato ka aiñ aiu ki la shna ha District Council.“Kaei ka ain kaba phi la shna ha district council ki ban myntoi ia ka jaitbynriew?” ong ka kyrwoh na ka KHNAM kaba la kylli biang balei ba ka PDF kam lah ban shna aiñ ban pynthikna  ba tang ki trai ri trai muluk kin lah ban thep vote sha ka elekshon MDC ia kiba ka KHNAM ka la buh jingthoh bad kala dawa na ka EC jong ka PDF naduh u 2015.“U juh u briew u ba la long MLA ha ka party congress la ar samoi (10 snem) u dang tip bad kyndit bynriew mynta shwa ka elekshon 2018 ,  ba ia kynduh jingeh ki paidbah bym lah shna ain ki nongmih khmat.  U paidbah u don hok ban kylli kaei ka ain kaba phi la shna lade pyrshang ban wanrah ha ka assembly ha ki 10 snem ka jinglong  nongmih khmat jong phi,  lane ki MDC ka PDF ki la shna ain mo ha district council” ong katei ka kyrwoh khubor.
title: “Kaei ka aiñ  phi lah shna ha  District Council”

content: Nongpoh, 22 Nohprah:Ki ar-tylli ki kynhun sengbhalang na Ri Bhoi kiba kynthup ia ka Ri Bhoi People Movement (RBPM) bad ka Ri Bhoi Youth Welfare Organisation (RBYWO), ki la pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor ka result jong ki Staff Nurse kaba ka DHS, ka la pynmih ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha ka kyrwoh ia kaba la phah da u Bah John Mawphniang, Secretary ka RBPM bad u Bah D.Shadap, Vice-President ka RBPYWO, la ong ba ka daw hi kaba la pynlong ia ki ba kin pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah, ka dei halor ka nongrim ba na ki 240 ki samla Khasi Jaintia Category, hynrei ki don tang 10 ki samla na Ri Bhoi kiba la shah thungkam bad dei namar kane ka daw kaba la pynlong ia kitei ki ar seng ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngewrem, namar kane ka jingshah niew shiliang khmat ki samla na Ri Bhoi kam dei tang ha katei ka tnat, hynrei ha kiwei kiwei pat ki tnat sorkar bapher bapher.Shuh shuh, kitei ki ar-seng ki la iathuh, ba katkum ka jingioh jingtip jong ki, la iathuh ba bun na ki samla ka Dong Ri Bhoi, ki la leit ban ujor sha ki da kaba ba ki lah bha ha ki Exam bad kiba la don Experience bun snem ha ka kam hynrei kim pass, katba la ioh pynban da kito kiba dang shu pass shen bad kiba dang long junior.Kitei ki nongialam, ki la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingbym shanniah ia ka Personal Interview, khlem ki Video Recording, namar ka jingdon jong ka Personal Interview, ka long kum ka jingplie lad ia kito kiba don ka jingiadei bad ki heh ki hain bad kaba khniot pat ia kito ki nongkyndong, kiba duk bad ki bym don ka jingiarap naei naei ruh.Namarkata, na ka liang ki nongialam jong kitei ki ar-seng, ki la dawa na ka ophis u DHS ba kin thung shuh shuh ia ki Staff Nurse kiba dei na Ri Bhoi, khnang ba kan ialong ryngkat kumba long lem kiwei pat ki Distrik, lem da kumta kitei ki nongialam ki la byrngem ruh ba kin shim da ki lynti kiba kham tyngeh, pynkut ka kyrwoh.
title: ONG KI ARSENG:  Personal Interview

content: Shillong, 20 Nohprah:U MLA ka Sohiong u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ioh jingmynsiem biang hadien ba ki briew jongu, kiba la leit ban kyrshan sha u kyrtong ka HSPDP ha ka elekshon MDC bad kumjuh ki nongialam ka UDP ki la wan ban iasoh sha ka Congress ban ai ka jingkyrshan ba radbah ia u ha kane ka elekshon MLA ban wan.Mynta ka sngi, ka Congress Sohiong ka la pdiang sngewbha ia u Working President ka UDP Sohiong circle u Bah Charles Thabah, bad u Bah Alester Sun jong ka Rangshken UDP circle nalor kiwei pat kiba dei na ka UDP.Ia kine ki dkhot ka UDP la pdiang sngewbha sha ka sem Congress ha ka jingialang kaba long ha Sohiong mynta ka sngi ba la don lang u Bah HDR Lyngdoh, u Working President ka MPCC u Bah James Lyngdoh bad kiwei.Haba kren ha kane ka jingialang, u Bah HDR u la ong ba mynshwa ki ju iashrut bad iadait, hynrei mynta ki la iakdup lang bad kane ka pyni ia ka dak ka jingkyrmen na ka bynta ka elekshon ban wan.“Mynshwa ngi iashrut mynta ngi iakdup. Kane ka khubor ka long ban phah sha ki paidbah ba ka UDP bad Congress ki iatreilang. Kiba iatreilang bad ngi, kim nym iakynduh jingbabe. Shisien ba la rung bad ngi,  ym don jingthut shuh ba phin mih namar ba ngi trei bait ia ki paidbah”, la ong u Bah HDR.U la ong ba kum u nongmihkhmat paidbah ym ju don por wat tang ban thiah ban dem ruh namar ba u angnud ban pyndep bad ban peit ia ki jingeh jongki.“Nga ngeit ba mynta phin ai biang ka jingshaniah ia nga namar ba ngam don sngi ym don por ban pyrkhat ialade hynrei nga pyrkhat beit tang ia phi ki paidbah”, u la ong.U la ong ba teng teng tang ban thiah ruh ym ju ioh ba iakynduh briew bad u  thiah tang 2-3 kynta.Ha kajuh ka por, u Bah HDR u la ther ia ki seng riewlum kiba iadon bynta bad ka BJP da kaba ong ba ki dei kum ki nongwanrah ia ka BJP sha kane ka jylla.“Ym don ba pdiang ia ka BJP ha kane ka ri jong ngi. Ki Seng riewlum ki long kumba ialam ia ka BJP namar ki ong ban nym iatreilang bad ka Congress kin iatreilang bad ka BJP”, la ong u Bah HDR.U la ong ba dei tang ka Seng Congress kaba lah ban ialeh pyrshah ia ka BJP ban ai jingsynshar ba bha namar ki Seng riewlum ki kut tang ha khanapara.“Lada nga jop bad wan biang ha ka bor, ngan pyrshang ban wanrah sa ka civil sub-division ia ka Sohiong namar ba la ioh Block”, la ong u Bah HDR.Shwa ia kane, u Bah James Lyngdoh u Working president u la ong ba dei ka Congress kaba ai ia ki district council ha ka jylla, kaba thaw ia ka skhim bylla 100 sngi, ka Rights To Education,  ka skhim ja sngi ki khynnah, ka NHRM,  ki kali 108,  ka skhim khaw duk ne NFSA.U la ther pat ia ka sorkar NDA ba ialam da ka BJP ba ka la synshar donbor bad ia ka  sngi Khrimas  ka pynlong sngi Trei,  ia ka Good Friday  ka pynbna kum  ka Digital Day,  ka khang bam masi, pynkylla pisa shimiet shimiet haduh ba wanrah jingiap briew.“Ka BJP ka kular ban thep pisa ha account ki paidbah hadien haduh mynta khlem don eiei bad ki shu pynbiej”, u la ong.U la ong ba ka jingwanrah ia ka GST ka ktah lut ia ki paidbah namar ba tang ban thied top top ban phun la shah ot nalor bap hah siew khajna jingkamai ia ki Khasi ka bym ju leh mynno mynno ruh.Kumjuh u la ther ia ki Seng riewlum ba ki dei paralok bad ka BJP bad kane ka paw haba ia ka kyrtong President ka ri ki kyrshan ia ka kyrtong jong ka BJP bad ki kyntait ia ka kyrtong ka Congress.
title: SOHIONG: Wan phai iing kiba iaid sakma

content: Shillong, 22 Nohprah:Ha ka 30 tarik mynta u bnai ki heh ka Aam Aadmi Party, kin wan sha nongbah Shillong ban ia syllok bad ki nongtrei jong katei ka seng kiba don ha kane ka jylla na ka bynta ka elekshon 2018. Ha katei ka jingiakynduh ha ka 30 tarik ki heh ka AAP kin shim rai ruh katno ngut kin pynieng kyrtong ha kane ka elekshon MLA 2018 ha kane ka jylla bad kin ia kren ruh ia ki mat ia kanbas elekshon bad lano ba kin sdang noh ban ialap elekshon.
title: 30 tarik, yn wan ki heh AAP

content: Shillong, 22 Nohprah:Ki MLA thmu phet seng ki nang sngew jngan bha ban risain na ka jinglong MLA, wat la ki la byrngem kham slem naduh mynshwa. Katkum ka jingtip ka jingslem jongki, ka long namar ba ki kwah ban ioh shwa ia ki skhim MLA, kaba dang sah ban sam sha ki paidbah, namar ba haduh mynta ka dang sahteng khamtam ha ki jaka ba kito ki MLA ba thmu ban phet noh.La ioh jingtip ba ka skhim MLA la sahteng khlem pat lah ban pyllait ha kito ki konstitwensi ba ki MLA ki ialeh pyrshah ia u Mukul Sangma, kiba dei ki MLA ka Congress. Ka la don kiba la sam ia ki katto katne ki skhim hynrei la iaid lait ia ki MLA kumba jia ha Mawsynram ha kaba ia ka skhim tin sop iing bad ha kiwei ki jaka.Ha kawei ka liang, u President ka BJP u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingpynkhreh ka seng, ban pdiang ia ki MLA ban wan iasoh ka dang iaid shakhmat watla kim pat ioh ia ka jingpynthikna ia ka por.“Kumba ki la pynsngew ka party ka don ha ka jingpynkhreh ban pdiang ia ki ha kano kano ka por tangba ka shong ha ki namar ba ka rukom pyrkhat u briew ka iapher na uwei sha uwei pat”, la ong u Bah Shibun.Ki saw ngut ki MLA kiba la sma bha ban rung BJP ki long u Bah AL Hek, u Bah Sanbor Shullai, u Bah Justine Dkhar bad u Bah Robinus Syngkon, hynrei haduh mynta kim pat ai khubor lano kin rung namar ba ki dang pynkhreh kumno ban risain shwa.U Bah Shibun u la iathuh ruh ba u Alphonse uba peit ia ka Meghalaya ia kane ka elekshon ban wan, un sa don sha kane ka jylla kham bun ban ialap elekshon, naduh u bnai Kyllalyngkot bad ka jingpyrshang ban wanrah sa u president ka BJP u Amit Shah un wan ban ialap elekshon sha kane ka jylla.
title: Jngan ki MLA byrngem risain,  bym lait lut ki skhim MLA

content: Shillong, 22 Nohprah:Ha ka jingiakynduh mynta ka sngi bad u Chief Election Commissioner u AK Jyoti ki seng saiñpyrthei ha kane ka jylla ba kynthup ia ka NCP, KHNAM ,UDP ki kwah ba ka Election Commission ka dei ban pynbiang jingkheiñ tiak pa tiak ha manla ki Polling Station ban pyntikna ba ka vote kaba mih ha ka EVM kan ia ryngkat bad kaba mih ha ka Voter Verifiable Paper Audit Trail (VVPAT).Katei ka jingia-kynduh ki seng saiñpyrthei ia u CEC ka dei kum ka jingiasyllok pynkhreh ia ka elekshon MLA 2018 ban pynthikna ba kan dei ka elekshon kaba khuid kaba baroh kin pdiang da kaba hun mynsiem khlem kynnoh shuh kumba long ha ki por ba la dep. Lah ban kdew ba ka kynhun jong ka Election Commission ka la wan jngoh ia kane ka jylla namar ki jingpynkhreh elekshon bad shen hadien ba kin leit phai kin pynbna noh ia ka tarik thep vote bad niew vote.Ka Election Commission ka la ong ba ia ki vote ba ki paidbah ba la thep yn pynbiang jingkhein ia ka EVM bad VVPAT tang ha kawei ka Polling Station na kawei ka konstitwensi hynrei ki seng saiñpyrthei ki kwah ba ka dei ban pynbiang lut ha baroh 3082 tylli ki Polling Station kiba don ha ki 60 tylli ki konstitwensi. Lah ruh ban kdew ba ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong kaba yn pyntreikam ia ka VVPAT ha ka elekshon MLA ha kane ka jylla. Ka VVPAT lane ka Verifiable Paper Record (VPR) ka dei ka jingpyntikna ba ka vote ba ki paidbah ki thep ki dei ruh ban tip ba ka leit shisha sha ka Party ba ki mut ban thep. Ka dei ruh kawei ka ban khanglad ia ka jingleh thok ha ka elekshon. Nalor u CEC , kiwei pat kiba la wan mihkhmat ia ka EC ki long u Election Commissioner u OP Rawat bad Sunil Arora.Ki Party ki bym hun ki la ong ba kin pynbor ia ka Election Commission ban pynbiang jingkheiñ ha baroh ki konstitwensi namarba ha kane ka jylla ki dang don khyndiatngut ki nongthep vote kaba tang 60 konstitwensi bad kawei ka konstitwensi ki don tang kumba 30 hajar ngut eiei. Hynrei ha katei ka jingiakren ka EC ka la pynthikna ba kan ym don eiei ka jingleh thok ha ka EVM.U Senior Working President ka UDP u bah Bindo M Lanong u la ong ba ki EVM lah ban leh thok, u la ong ba watla ka don ka jingleh thok ha kiwei ki jaka hynrei ka UDP ka dei kaba la ujor ia kane. U la ong ruh ba ka General Council jong ka UDP ka la shim ruh ia ka rai ban dawa ban pyndonkam beit da ki Secret Ballot haba thep vote ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei Lam Mihngi bad ia katei ka la dep phah ruh ia ka jingdawa sha ka Election Commission. U bah Bindo u la ong ba u CEC u la kular ba kan ym don ka jingleh thok bad ia ki mashin EVM, yn peit hi beit tang da ka tnad elekshon bad u la kyrpad ia ki Party ba kin shaniah ha ka Election Commission.
title: NCP, KHNAM, UDP kim kwah  thep vote da ki mashin EVM

content: Shillong, 28 Nohprah:U Bah Comfort Doloi u rangbah ba pan tiket na ka BJP ban iakhun na Jirang constituency, u la ong ba ha kine ki 45 snem ba la ioh ia ka jylla,ka Jirang ka la ioh nongmihkhmat da u panah suda lait noh tang ar ngut kata u Snomik Kalwing bad u Bah Gerson Lyngdoh kiba dei hi na thain Jirang bad lait na kine baroh kiba long MLA ki dei kiba nabar ka Jirang konstitwensi.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi, u Bah Comfort Doloi u la ong ba ka la donkam kyrkieh ban ioh ia ka jingkylla ha ka konstitwensi Jirang kaba dang sahdien ha baroh ki liang kaba la mihkhmat da ki sohshnong suda ha ki 35 snem.“Ka Jirang constituency naduh ba la ioh ia ka Meghalaya ka la ioh ia ki nongmihkhmat kiba nabar ka konstitwensi suda bad ka la donkam ia ka jingkylla”, u la ong.U la ong ba kine ki ar ngut kiba dei ki trai ka thain ki long MLA ha ki snem 70 bad 80 hynrei lait nangta naduh u Bah Hober Hynniewta, Bah JD Rymbai bad u MLA ba mynta u Bah Lambok Mylliemngap kim dei satia na thain Jirang.U la ong ba ki kam pynroi ba shisha ki wan ha ka por ba long MLA ki trai shnong kynthup u bah Snomik Kalwing bad u Bah Gerson Lyngdoh ha kaba ki don ki primary school bad ka bording.“Hadien kine, wan long MLA sa u Bah JD Rymbai bad hadien da u u Bah Hober Hynniewta bad u Lambok Mylliemngap bad ki kam pynroi kim don satia ha ka konstitwensi bad ka daw ka dei namar ba la synshar da ki briew kiba nabar ka thain”,u la ong.U Bah Comfort u la ong ba baroh ki kyrtong na Jirang constituency kiban iakhun ha kane ka elekshon 2018 ki dei ki heh spah heh saipan suda bad dei tang ma u, uba dei tang u nonghikai skul.U la ong ba kaba nyngkong lada un jop ka long ban wanrah noh da ka Civil Sub Division ha Patharhmah.Hynrei haba kylli la un ioh tiket ne em na ka BJP, u Bah Comfort u la ong, “Kam long kaba suk ban ong la ngan ioh ne em ia ka tiket namar ba mynta ki don kumba saw ngut kiba pan tiket na ka BJP hynrei lada ngam ioh ruh ngan iakhun beit ia ka elekshon kum u kyrtong shimet”.Ha u snem 2003, u Bah Comfort u la iakhun teng ia ka elekshon na ka HSPDP na Jirang constituency.
title: 45 snem, 2 ngut ki trai  shnong, ki MLA na Jirang

content: Shillong, 22 Nohprah:Ki pulit ki dang wad mynta ia u wei u nongñiah Taxi kamai uba ñiah ia ka kali ML-05L 2896 ha kaba ia dei bad ka Laitumkhrah PS case No.147 (09)2017 U/S POCSO Act. Ki pulit ki kyrpad ia ki paidbah ba don jingtip shaphang utei u nongniah kali ba kin pyntip sha ki pulit bad yn buhrieh ia ka kyrteng jong ki. Kane ka long ka kyrwoh khubor na u DNR Marak , IPS.
title: Wad ki pulit ia u nongñiah Taxi

content: Shillong, 22 Nohprah:Kiwei ki Party ha kane ka jylla kim shaniah tylli ban thep vote da ki mashin EVM ha ka elekshon MLA ha kane ka jylla, hynrei ka NPP kam tieng satia ia kitei ki mashin EVM bad ka la ong ba kam don satia kano kano ka jingleh thok hynrei ka dei beit ka rai jong u paidbah. Haba ia kren ha kine ki khyndiat sngi bad u State President ka NPP u Dr.W Kharlukhi u la ong ba ka Election Commission ka la dep ban kob ia kino kino ki Party kiba kynnoh ba lah ban leh thok ia ka EVM ba kin sei da ki jingshisha.“U Arvind Kejriwal dei uwei na kitei kiba kob ban pynshisha hynrei haba la dei ka por u wanrah da ka EVM lajong, nga ruh nga lah te ban shna EVM ban wanrah ka jong la jong, thaw lypa naduh na ïng ban pynshisha” ong u Dr.Kharlukhi uba la kob ba lada ki don ki Party kiba kiba lah ban pynshisha ba ka don ka jingleh thok un ngeit ia kata hynrei kat bym pat lah un ym ngeit ba kan don ka jingleh thok.U la pynkynmaw ba ha ka elekshon MP shiteng samoi ha Tura u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma u la kynnoh ba ka jingrem ka lok jong u ka Dikanchi Shira ha katei ka elekshon ka dei namar ka jingleh thok ka EVM, “Ka sorkar ka jong u, u bat hi ma u ia ki EVM ruh, ngi lei ngim iohi ngim ktah, ngim don bor hi ruh ban ktah ia ka EVM hynrei haba la rem pat u kynnoh ba leh thok ka EVM yn ia ong kumno haba kumta” ong u Dr.Kharlukhi haba ia kren ha kine ki khyndiat sngi bad u nongthohkhubor.
title: “U bat ma u ia ka EVM, haba  rem u kynnoh ba leh thok”

content: Shillong, 22 Nohprah:U Bah Bajinwell Khongtim (60), uba dei u tymmen basan jong ka Balang Presbyterian Um-niuh Tmar, ula khlad noh mynta ka sngi, ha ka jingshah iuh ha ka kali linebus, kaba wan na Um-niuh Tmar sha Shillong.Katei ka jingjia, ka dei ha ka por 7.30 mynta ka step, ha kaba utei u rangbah, u dang hiar na kali ha ka shnong Tangmang, hynrei, ula kum ur bad kawei ka kjat jongu, ka la rung shapoh kali bad ka la shah iuh ha ka shaka kaba shadien jong katei ka kali.La kit mar mar ia utei u rangbah sha Civil Hospital, Shillong, hynrei, ula khlad noh ha shiteng lynti, ong ka khubor na ki pulit Pynursla, mynta ka sngi. Katei ka kali kaba don ia u number ML E 9854 bad ka dei kaba la niah da U Bah Majibur Khongsdier, uba na Umniuh Tmar. Ki pulit, ki iathuh ba ka jingur jong utei u rangbah, ka dei na ka jingbakla jongu hi, ha kaba ula kyndit ha ka por ba pynim biang ia ka kali kaba ieng ha katei ka jaka.
title: Khlad U Tymmen Basan, ba shah iuh kali

content: Namar ka shuti kristmas; ka ophis U Rupang, kan khang naduh ka 23tarik Nohprah haduh ka 26tarik Nohprah 2017. Kumta U Rupang, un mih biang ha ka 28tarik Nohprah 2018.Ngi ai khublei Kristmas iaphi ki nongpule baieid.Editor & Publisher Rupang lem bad baroh ki nongtrei jong U Rupang bad ka Riwar Offset Press.
title: Khublei Khristmas 2017

content: Shillong, 28 Nohprah:U MLA ka seng Congress na Mylliem konstitwensi, uba dei ruh u myntri ka sorkar jylla, uba peit ia ka tnad pynroi sor bad ha kajuh ka por uba dei ruh u nongaiktien ka seng Congress ha kane ka jylla u la ong ba ka BJP ka dei ka seng saiñpyrthei kaba kwah ban wanrah tang kawei ka niam ha ka ri India kumba long ka Pakistan. “Kumba long ka Pakistan kaba la pynbna kum ka Islamic Republic , ka BJP ruh ka thmu ban pynlong tang kawei ka Niam ha baroh kawei ka ri India” ong u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh haba kren ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha ka shnong Nongpyiur, Upper Shillong.U bah Ronnie u la ong ruh ba dang katto katne sngi mynta u myntri sorkar pdeng u Anand Kumar Hedge, u la pynpaw ba u kwah ban pynbeit thymmai noh ia ka riti synshar ka ri India ne ka Constitution bad u kwah ban weng noh ia ka kyntien Secular lane ka jingmane laitluid na katei ka Riti synshar ka ri India. “Dang shen u myntri ka sorkar pdeng u Anand Kumar Hedge u la ong ba dei ban pynduh noh ia ka kyntien Secular na ka riti Synshar ka ri India, lada pynduh noh ia katei ka kyntien ka mut ba ngim laitluid shuh ban mane blei ha ka jingngeit jong ngi” u la ong.Shuh shuh u bah Ronnie u la ong ba ha ka jylla Jharkhand kaba synshar da ka sorkar BJP ka ing dorbar mynta ka la dep pan thaw ia kawei ka aiñ kaba ia dei bad ka niam ne ka jingngeit jong ki briew bad katkum katei ka aiñ u la ong ba lada don kiba kwah ban kylla niam ki hap ban ioh jingbit shuwa na ki bor District bad lada jia ba ki kylla niam khlem da ioh jingbit kin ngat ha phatok 3 haduh 4 snem bad kin shah daiñ kuna ruh 50 hajar haduh 1 lak tyngka. U la kren sha ki paidbah ba dei tang ka seng Congress ka seng kaba heh kaba lah ban ia khun pyrshah ia ka BJP bad kiwei pat ki seng kin ym lah satia.
title: “Kumba long ka Pakistan, ka BJP  ka kwah kawei ka Niam ha ri India”

content: Nongpoh, 28 Nohprah:Ha kawei na ki jingjia ba sngewsih bad kaba la jia hynnin ka sngi ha ka shnong Umeit, Ri Bhoi, ha kaba arngut ki Longkmie kiba dei ruh shi Kiaw shi Pyrsa, ki la khlad noh hashen, hadien ba kawei ka par maw kaba don ha katei ka shnong ka la twa kynsan bad btep im, ia kitei ki arngut ki Longkmie.Kitei kiba la khlad noh na ka jingtwa kynsan jong katei ka par maw, la tip kyrteng kum ka Kong Rin Kharbithai (70) na Nongthymmai, Kyrdem kaba dei ka Kiaw kurim bad ka Kong Jesinta Malngian (28) na Umeit bad la ioh jingtip ruh ba ka Kong Jesinta ka dei ka Longkmie kaba dang armet ha ryngkat I khun ba dang 8 bnai ha kpoh.Katkum ka jingiathuh da u Rangbah shnong ka Umeit, u Bah Kyrshan Chyne, la ong ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia hynnin ka sngi ha ka por 10:30 mynstep, ha ka por ba kitei ki longkmie ki dang bunkam ban tam ia ki maw na katei ka par maw, hynrei khlem poi pyrkhat bad kyndit kynsan katei ka par ka la twa bad tap syndon da ka khyndew bad ki mawbah bad kaba la pynlong ia kitei ki arngut ba kin khlad noh hashen.La ioh jingtip ruh, ba tang mar ia twa katei ka par mar ki paidbah ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang ki pulit ka Umiam PS, ki la ialeh kat lah kat iai na ka bynta ban sei ia kitei ki metiap da kaba tih lyngba ki kor puh shilum, hynrei dei tad ha ka par janmiet ki la ioh ban sei ia ka Kong Jesinta Malngain, katba ia ka Kong Rin Kharbithain la ioh ban sei tad haduh mynta ka step.Kumta, hadien ba la dep ban sei ia kitei ki metiap ki pulit ka Umiam Police Station, ki la rah noh ia kitei ki metiap rah sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh.
title: Shah tep im ki shi Kiaw shi  pyrsa ba twa ka par maw

content: Nongpoh, 04 ‘lyngkot:Wat hapdeng ka jingpyrshah kaba jur na ki nongrep kiba la shah ktah bad ki bym pat ioh jingsiew na ka jingpyntrei ia ka New Umtru Hydro Electric Project (NUHEP), hynrei mynta ka sngi ka jingwanplie u Dr Mukul Sangma, kam shym la don jingwit ei ei, namar ka jingplie ia katei ka jaka pynmih bording kaba la tei naduh u snem 2007 ha ka jinglut kaba la kot sha ka T. 629 klur.Ha kane ka sngi, kitei ki nongrep kiba la pyrshah ban plie ia katei ka jaka pynmih bording, ki la pynlong da ka jingrah lama iong ha ka por ba u Dr. Mukul Sangma lem bad kiwei ki heh ophisar ka sorkar jylla, ki poi ha katei ka jaka, tangba ka shu kut noh tang ha ka jingrah lama bad kam don jingpynwit ei ei ha ka por ba ki pynlong jingialang bad plie paidbah syndon ia katei ka jaka pynmih bording.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Dr Mukul Sangma, u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ban iohi ba ka jylla ka la ioh ban plie sa ia kawei ka jaka pynmih bording, ka ban long ruh ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ia ki paidbah ha ka jylla h baroh kawei.U la pynpaw ruh, ba ha kane ka jylla ki don bun tylli ki jaka kiba lah ban pynlong ia ki kum ki jaka pynmih bording bad ha kajuh ruh ka por ka jinglah ban tei ia kiba kum kine ki jaka pynmih bording, ka pynmyntoi ym tang ia ka jylla hynrei khamtam eh ia ka tnat MeECL ba kan lah ban sam bording wat sha kiwei ki jylla ba marjan.“Ka jingtei ia kiba kum kine ki jaka pynmih bording, ka pynmyntoi ym tang ha ka ban pynmih bording, hynrei khamtam eh haba iadei bad ka jingpynneh ia ki umbam umdih, ka ban long ka jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah hi, hynrei sngewsih pat ban pynpaw ba ha man la ki jaka ba thmu ban tei ia ki jaka pynmih bording, ka ju don beit ka jingpyrshah, ha kaba bun ki briew ki nang tang ban pyrshah, ki klet pat ia ki jingmyntoi kiba ki ioh lyngba ka jingdon jong kiba kum kine ki jaka pynmih bording” ong u Dr. Mukul Sangma.Namarkata, na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka roi ka par ha ka jylla khamtam eh haba iadei bad ka jingpynmih bording, u Dr Mukul, u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba ki dei ban sngewthuh ban iatreilang, khnang ba kaei ka jingthmu ka tnat MeECL bad sorkar jylla kin long kiba jop, u la bynrap.Nalor u Myntri Rangbah, ki heh ophisar na ka tnat Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) kiba kynthup ia u Bah WMS Pariat, Chairman ka MSERC, u Bah E.W Nongrum, Director Power Generation ka MeECL, u Bah P.S Thangkhiew, CMD MeECL, u Bah A.G West Kharkongngor, CMD ka NEEPCO lem bad kiwei kiwei.Ha kawei pat ka liang, haba iadei bad ka jingpyrshah ki nongrep ha katei ka jaka, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla lem bad ki heh ophisar, ki la khot iakren bad kitei ki nongrep, na ka bynta ban iakren halor kitei ki jingdawa jongki, hynrei ha kane ka jingiakren ym pat lah ban shim ia ka rai kaba pynhun ia kitei ki nongrep kiba la shah ktah, ha kaba ia kaei kaba la dawa da kitei ki nongrep yn sa shong pynkhat bha.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingdawa na kitei ki nongrep, na ka liang ka HNYF, Northern Region, kaba la leit ban synranlang ha kane ka sngi, lyngba u President u Bah Marcus Marten, ka la kyntu ia ka sorkar bad khamtam ia ka tnat MeECL ba ka dei ban pynbeit noh kham kloi halor kitei ki jingdawa da ki nongrep kiba la shah ktah na ka jingtei ia katei ka jaka pynmih bording.
title: Pyrshah ki trai jaka, plie beit  U MR ia ka NUHEP ha Byrnihat

content: Jowai, 3 ’lyngkot:Haduh San ngut ki MDC Congress ka JHADC ki la iehnoh ia ka Party ban bud ia ki MLA jong ki bad ban iasoh noh bad ka party NPP bad BJP.Kitei ki san ngut ki MDC ki kynthup ia u ma Thombor Shiwat, u CEM barim, u Deputy CEM barim u ma Kilometer Lytan, u EM barim u ma Joinriwell Pyrtuh, u ma Phein Nanglein bad u ma Riio Sten MDC na Barato.Napdeng kitei ki san ngut, tang u ma Joinriwell u ban leit iasoh sha ka BJP, katba baroh kiwei pat kin iasoh bad ka NPP ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ban wan, la iathuh ka tyllong khubor.Ka Congress Party kaba ialam ia ka synshar khadar ha JHADC ka la duna paid mynta, hadien ka jingmih kitei ki 5 ngut. Ha u snem 2014 ka Congress ka la jop haduh 15 ngut bad hadien la rung sa u MDC shimet u ma Phasmoon Dkhar bad u Het Pohthmi.U ma Het Pohthmi ruh u la mih noh na ka seng Congress ban kyrshan ia u kyrtong ka NPP, u ma Stephanson Mukhim na Amlarem.Kat haduh mynta ka Congress ka dang don sa tang 11 ngut ki Congress.Ka Dorbar Tlang jong ka District Council kan long ha ka 22 tarik une u bnai ha ka por 11 baje.Ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep, U ma KM Lytan uba dang shu shah jied kum u Deputy Chief Executive Member hapoh ka kynhun jong ka Executive Committee ba lam khmat da u ma Awhoi Andrew Shullai, u la shah weng kyndit na ka shuki Deputy CEM bad kane ka la pynlyngngoh wat ia u ma Lytan uba khlem da tip ia ka daw ba sha lyndet.U ma Andrew Shullai u la thung bujli da u ma Deseous Pohshna (Ma Dhar) uba dei u MDC ka Congress na Narpuh uba dei ruh u nongkyrshan u ma Shitlang Pale, u myntri barim bad u kyrtong ka Congress na Sutnga Constituency.Haba iakren bad u ma Shullai lyngba ka phone u la ong, “Kam don kano kano ka daw, hynrei la leh ia kane katkum ka rukom kaba la leh na ka por sha ka por”.Na ka liang u ma Lytan pat u la ong, “Nga ngam tip ia ka daw bad halor kane ngan khot ia ka jingialang ia ki paidbah ba kyrshan ia nga ban ia pyrkhat halor kane ka jingshah weng jubor na ka shuki Dy. CEM”Ia kane ka jingialang u la iathuh ba un lum ha ka 2 tarik une u bnai ban wan.Ka don ka khubor kaba ia thuh ba ka daw ka long ba une u MDC u la shah pynbor ha u Dr. Mukul Sangma, myntri rangbah ka jylla ban mih bujli kum u kyrtong jong ka party hadien ba u ma Coming One Ymbon u la mih noh na ka seng Congress ban iasoh bad ka NPP.Kawei pat ka tyllong khubor ka la iathuh ba lehse u dei u nongkyrshan jong u ma Ymbon ba ka Congress ka la rai ban weng noh ia u na ka shuki Dy. CEM.Na ka liang u ma Lytan u la kyntait ia kane bad u la ong ba lada dei na kata ka daw, ka Congress ka la dei ban leh kumjuh ia ki katto katne ki MDC kiba kyrshan ia kiwei pat ki party khamtam ha ka thain War Jaintia hadien ka jingmih jyndat u President ka WJHDCC, u ma Lahkmen Rymbui ban iakhun ia ka Election ban wan na ka ticket UDP.“Ngan sa iakren bha bad phi hadien ka jingialang ha ka 2 tarik”, la ong u ma Lytan haba iakren bad u Rupang.
title: JHADC: Mih 5 ngut ki MDC  Congress ban iasoh NPP, BJP

content: Nongpoh, 04 K’lyngkot:Kum ka dak ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen halor ka jingshah jied u Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh, ban long kum u President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC), mynta ka sngi ki heh nongkitkam ka Party Congress na ka District Block Congress Committee lem bad na ki Block bapher bapher ha Ri Bhoi, ki la leit ban pdiang burom ia u Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh na Byrnihat, hadien ka jingwanphai jong u na Nongbah Delhi.Ha kane ka jingleit pdiang burom, kaba la iadonlang da baroh ki heh nongialam ka Congress lem bad ki nongkyrshan ba radbah kaba kynthup ia ki Longkmie ha Ri Bhoi, ha kaba ki la pdiang burom da kaba ai syntiew ia U Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh kum u President ba thymmai ka MPCC.
title: Pdiang ki heh Congress ha Ri Bhoi ia u President ka MPCC

content: Nongstoiñ, 4 ’lyngkot:Wat la hadien ka jingkyrpad jong ki nongniah trok ia ki bor pyniaid District jong ka West Khasi Hills ba kin tuklar lem halor ka jingmih khyrdop lum pisa beain ha Maweit, ia kaba la leh ha ka kyrteng jong ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong Maweit Area West Khasi Hills District, pynban haduh kine ki sngi katei ka jinglum pisa beain da katei ka synjuk ka dang iai bteng.Na ka liang jong ki nongniah trok, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingbynniaw da kaba ong ba lada ym lah ban pynduh pyndam ia katei ka jaka khrong khajna beain khlem pep kin sa mih bun tylli ki jaka khrong khajna beain ha katei ka surok.Katei ka jing buh khyrdop lum khajna beain jong katei ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar shnong jong ka Maweit Area ka mih hadien ba ka iing bishar jong ka Supreme Court ka la ai ia ka hukum ban kit biang ia u dewiong ba dang sah ha baroh kawei ka jylla Meghalaya.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba katei ka synjuk ka la khrong pisa ia ki trok kit dewiong ha ka dur jong ka jinglum synniang, da kaba khrong ia ki trok kiba kit ia u dewiong ha kaba kane ka la ktah shisha ia ki nongkhaii dewiong kumjuh iaki nongniah trok.
title: Bynñiaw ki nongniah trok ba  bteng ka jinglum khajna beaiñ

content: Shillong,4 ‘lyngkot:Katba ka jingialang ka NPP ha madan Polo ka dang iaid shakhmat u bah Rowell Lyngdoh u kyrtong katei ka seng na Mawkyrwat konstitwensi u la hiar na rynsan ba shong ki kynrem ki lyndan sha ka jaka ba shong ki paidbah. U bah Rowell u la wan shong tiap ha syndah ba shong une u nongthohkhubor. Tang mar ia iohi, ia u bah Rowell une u nongthohkhubor u la ai khublei kti bad u la kylli “Balei bah phi wan shong pynban shane?’, “Em phi nga khriat palat ban shong hajrong, nga kham i syaid shane ba shat ka sngi” u la jubab.U bah Rowell u la shong ha jaka shong ki paidbah ha ka shuki jong u lain ba -ar bad u la neh hangtei haduh ban da wai ka jingialang. Shuwa ban pynwai artad ia ka jingialang ka la don ka jingia shondur lang jong baroh ki kyrtong ka NPP kiba don ha rynsan, hynrei ha katei ka por la don na ki nongialam kiba wad ia u bah Rowell bad ki nongthohkhubor ki la iathuh ha ki bad ki kdew ba u don ha madan ha jaka shong ki paidbah. Hadien ba baroh ki kynrem ki lyndan ki la hiar na rynsan ki nongialam jong u bah Rowell ki la wad ia u ‘Shano i madeng?’ ki kylli. Ki nongthohkhubor ki la kdew biang sha ka jaka shong ki paidbah.
title: “Nga khriat palat”, hiar u bah Rowell  na rynsan sha jaka shong ki paidbah

content: Shillong, 4 ‘lyngkot:Haba jubab ia ka jingpan jingpynshai jong u bah D.D Lapang , u General Secretary Incharge Meghalaya u C.P Joshi u la pyntip ba ia mynta u James Lyngdoh un long u Working President jong ka seng Congress ha kane ka jylla.
title: U James u Working President ka Congress
